user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Scott Kerr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt6DQb0_mfxPgudV6ZRq4wI7VtstDgc7Qb_uCCLV1ODQpq4Ky2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The experience had at Omni, where we had the pleasure of being assisted by Luke, was nothing short of excellent. His service was top-notch. Very attentive and gave us a good bit of knowledge on how certain things came to be on the menu.

The food was amazing. Super glad we began with the starter chicken bites as the house sauce was delicious. Moving onto the main courses, the cajun honey glaze mac & cheese with beef was incredibly filling and had the perfect amount of spice in it to give it a bit more flavor. Very heavy, but so tasty.
The chicken Parmesan was also cooked very well. Not my meal, but I had bites and I definitely would order it myself.

I think that Luke and company have something really special here and I am very eager to come on back and try something else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGb8n7ae8J1saMml4QcGYMtnrVwlujcowe2Gw0&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"mikayla schneider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9ytTAwuelhxrLWhPzheXBmt7RewcKxL5Xs2Lokw9VuE5vgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paige was incredible today!My girlfriend and myself have had some questionable dining experiences lately, and Omni was a refreshing new place for us. We had some fun with both the food menu ( very accommodating to my girlfriend’s allergy ), and ventured for a “Dealers Choice” cocktail in which our server made us the perfect drink based on what I’d already been sipping on. I would recommend this place to friends and family alike. Food and drinks both get a “wow” from us both. We can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEl42tXtLlQFSVIPV-QzY8r_lE5jMCCu0c2dMI&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Nicole Bradford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2llpjC_3F5XtBLolWo4KUGvZmOsJHVACThhG2UwCY1oH0dc4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came with our toddler for lunch on a Sunday. We both got the spicy chicken burgers with Cajun honey fries and our little one had the chicken bites. Luke (owner) served us and made us feel very welcomed. It was steady busy wise. The food was delicious! We will definitely come back again, as both my toddler and I have dairy allergies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmVSImg6OJcQBArDgDedxtcZmECygb_l0kkEcA&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Ginzo Milani (Monckey100)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZJAMXcJZ4Q-fVQ1hK4TmeQ5-UBO877OkkYfk78A4TFUsqJzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Four cheese pizza is a thin crust pizza, shareable with two, the crust was baked to a slight crisp which enhanced the overall palatability of the mix of the acidity of the tomato. There's bocconcini which has a goat cheese like flavor with mozzarella notes which added to the overall experience. The garlic oil added to the overall taste and wasn't overly oiled. The chef did a fantastic job balancing these elements together.

The spicy chicken burger had small notes of spice which accentuates the chicken. The burger has a great balance of vegetables and was well seasoned.

The Omni burger was the highlight, the bacon was well cooked without being oily. The smash burger was correctly smashed and was well seasoned. The patty was very fresh as was the bun.

The truffle fries were spot on and amazing, the poutine was well made but the bowl style plate made the poutine suffer. If the poutine had a wider bowl, the top cheese curds would have been able to melt better. But the curds that did melt was really good.

The peach Bellini was sweet but might have been a bit too muddy for my liking, but if you prefer a more alcoholic experience, this is perfect.

Their signature drinks like the electric blue was amazing and definitely worth returning to have again.

Overall the food is really well made especially with the price point, it's clear that this establishment has put extra care in delivering quality food.

Some bonuses to note was that there is dairy free, and gluten free options, including plant based patties and plant based options for pizza too.

Final notes: A quality place, one of the only places you can get a good smash burger. I would consider this place more of a restaurant than a bar, I would consider the food too good to be considered bar food. Additionally, I believe they should advertise and highlight their smash burger as not many establishments provide smash burgers. The chicken burger is excellent and my co-reviewer even preferred it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHJ7aeBqWUqh1JaZh2Y8LzcZsqmL9Qq038Phss&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Ursula Galvão","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsRxiZN0DybNpuvqmxWQWm-edIin_sVOWzR85r44e8kPLlSM5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food and service. I’m vegan and was so happy that I could order anything on the menu and there would be a plant based version of it.
Definitely one of my favorite eating spots in Fort Langley! Will for sure be back and try more from their incredible menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUkcHlS_WHMsHyI2Y0W4wsBgtB5IY6JhYso3zs&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Harvir Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlu8YaUsOyyrDrUMW2qzgyGGIvYS8bw1884dkSJK16AUKvDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Omni Kitchen recently on a whim as we were close by and saw it had good reviews. I can say it definitely lives up to them! Menu is small but effective as it has all the comfort food staples - we had the spicy chicken sandwich and mac and cheese both were really good. The hot honey fries are a must try, we also got a salted caramel brownie dessert which was also great. Restaurant interior is small but modern and welcoming,  service is great - The owner Luke was very friendly and came over to introduce himself and chat and gave recommendations for some dishes. As someone who is also self-employed I really appreciated that as it shows he truly cares about his business and reading other reviews I can see others appreciate it as well. Nice to see a place like this in Fort Langley, and hope it continues to do well. We will be back to try that pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuIJgUp-uOxH5OO-50OsBZELb1Twh4UtpfFQfI&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Quinn DeGregorio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB20063ffVAZslOX6k8eokxKEwWHQ9Ar7q53qmdnQP1JIVSn-9jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza and service. The owner is very kind, professional and attentive. They take great care of you and very accommodating for any allergies or food preferences. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2N-px2Kam1YZXV3YA-wPMUf-y2EA7Z7DeSn-K&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Parbh Klar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX6pSTgVnAnKtW-yNe01BuPBUDSt_PHb5p5I2ROLPfXIm_MuEH_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"As per reviews, taste is way basic! Mexican bowl and margarita pizza were little good but very disappointed with Benny!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN21Bg-MySTignJGQeqdJHlGVBd8qn-Q_e7zadK&fid=0x0:0xb69e31edfea8c6f5"],"When":"2024-11-27"}]

descriptions: Low-key spot set in a converted house offering contemporary Canadian eats & live music weekly.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beatniks Bistro - Fort Langley

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We had an early dinner at Beatniks Bistro with my parents, and it was a delightful experience. The ambiance was cozy yet modern, making it the perfect spot to relax and enjoy a meal in the heart of Fort Langley. We were seated promptly, and the staff were attentive and friendly throughout our visit.

The menu had a great selection of dishes, and there was something for everyone. We started with the crispy calamari, which was perfectly cooked and seasoned. For mains, we had a mix of dishes, including the short rib and the salmon, both of which were cooked to perfection and beautifully presented. The flavors were balanced, and the portion sizes were just right. My parents really enjoyed the experience as well, and it was a lovely way to spend time together.

What stood out was the quality of the food and the relaxed atmosphere. The outdoor seating area looked inviting too, but we opted to sit indoors given the cooler weather. Overall, Beatniks provided a wonderful dining experience, and we look forward to returning. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a delicious meal in a charming setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIjf3DWc_qaY3F--653BEA8_r9sWDQKaMbjOSl&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Kat Sykes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUccyfg8kVkNFxM3K2eZWJ1jcQT3OuohgE_37gTeq5lt55yLpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little bistro with a large outdoor space.  Service was good and the food was great.  Really good burger and yam fries.  The only bad thing for
me was the amount of salt on the fries.  I don't use that much salt and had to brush off a bunch to enjoy the fries.  Street parking is limited and there is a small lot in the back for about 8 cars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjyj2vUaYdPOS6m0JaZiSkNQ7plcF3Qqq0F7_w&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Daniel Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfH4IGtDH-RZPfkWL0P5tVuSs9PJ8oLSHVNJs_o3NyG6_oaSvUng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It all starts with the atmosphere and location, the patio is fantastic in the summer; any occasion and for any meal, just super! The service is so good, all the staff have a smile and are so genuine in the service they provide. Now, last but not least is the food, so yummy. All the meals we tried were delicious and just perfect. Can’t wait to go back. Highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8GDPXlpZwQiZnq1SGfjwIEjBtrW-kbGozBVmR&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were assisted by Kelly and she was so full of positive energy. All the staff were helpful. Busy beautiful Sunday so lots of people. We had salads, burger, fries, and drinks. Everything was fresh and spot on. The salmon was quite overcooked so it was quite dry, flavourful though. Still good.

Will definitely come back. This place is a gem on Fort Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZtCzzLZ1tYW1-f2P58jLaguOuDRZ540_swUAe&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"WanderingNomadJunky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLV5nGXazxvMsF1gu1JToxDjQdzN7lbcZ-wJLf6VmKi487Kmt5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got here before the rush. 9am. Brunch was 😋 delicious. The staff was very friendly. The atmosphere is interesting. Wasn't as busy as the other places. Classic breakfast 🥞🍳. Really large patio area. Prices are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO08gSEmRYxza57UdCM-KA2jR2fiafgD3G77h0&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was a bit underwhelmed with the experience. I like my food more flavorful than they had to offer. The items showing on their Google reviews are no longer on the menu which increased my disappointment with this place. It was a busy summer evening so expect to wait at least 30 minutes before your table is ready. No reservation required, just leave a name at the front desk and you’ll be given an estimated time. Busy also means the service appears slower than normal .

Fare:
Coconut prawn
Crab cakes
Short rib braised beef on parsnip puree with rosemary jus
Halibut on wild mushroom risotto

Libations:
Beatniks Shirley Temple
Virgin mule

3.5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaLtkfToaxJBrzuLy5lFBgvieoGqDGJ1v4C_Bz&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"FAIS KHAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlKzzS_N_VjrFHFaIWN-Z9G7c1k4XbX_BTvMFUNoBuJ0tzmcRC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have a memorable experience to share from last year at this restaurant, which led me to consider revisiting. As a local resident, I rarely explore Fort Langley, a heritage village that mainly attracts tourists. Our initial encounter with the first waitress was lovely; she was friendly, took our orders promptly, and served our drinks right away. Unfortunately, she did not inform us of her shift change. The second waitress who took over was regrettably rude and unprofessional. Despite her assurance to refill our water twice, she never returned with it. Although we ordered promptly, we waited 35 minutes without any food. When we finally flagged down the waitress, she explained that there had been a mix-up as she assumed we had finished our meal. When our food finally arrived, it was a mixed experience. My wife's gnocchi was good, but my fish and chips were disappointing; the fish was undercooked and frozen, making it impossible to cut. The manager, who was very positive and kind, offered to replace my meal for free. I declined, considering the subpar service we had encountered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6tkrcqkdnNfWUf01lAEQT9DVTO6JJ8PVX4kmB&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a warm Saturday afternoon so we decided to get some shade under an umbrella at Beatniks Bistro.
We were greeted by a friendly hostess who was also responsible for clearing and cleaning the patio tables.  My wife and I were thinking since it was fairly busy the restaurant should have had someone host and someone else clean and set the tables.  Fortunately, the wait wasn’t too bad.

Once we were seated we ordered our drinks.  Somehow my wife was given a virgin Peaches cocktail instead of a regular Peaches cocktail.  I was wondering why my wife was not turning red.  Later the bill showed me a nonalcoholic drink was entered.  It tasted yummy though.
My IPA was cold and refreshing.

The deep fried pickles were good.  It had a nicely seasoned crispy batter.  The dipping sauce was just ok.  Personally a dill sauce would have been better.

The Artisan salad was fresh and crisp.  The amount of dressing perfect.

The salmon burger was good and came with nicely seasoned fries.

Overall it was a good dining experience and we would dine there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7UT8AOPYwRxdwCdsDZmRvHv55kTZyEaHmJeAU&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, the restaurant is very clean. If you're a cleanliness freak or super picky about hygiene, this place is perfect for you. The bar, kitchen, plates, and forks – everything shines! I haven’t seen such a clean restaurant in Canada in a long time.

There was live music, which was another element that made me happy.

Now, let’s get to the food. We tried (I forgot the name, but I'll call it broccoli fries), and aside from that, I loved everything, especially the meat, which was incredibly delicious, and the portions were very large.

The prices are a bit high, but considering the portion sizes and the quality of the restaurant, it’s totally worth it.

You might have trouble finding parking, but other than that, everything was great. Big thanks to the staff for their attention and great service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQfyozV9UhZfpNabnL4liNRc94-Ll1rIbVgl4W&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Jordan Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11-xeEA0Ih57ocfphXt0C50QwI614ll6t2qknklEqHoDt3aVy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A busy bistro with some delicious brunch options! The shakshuka was great, and the short rib hash had some really tender and flavourful meat, though the actual potatoes were not crunchy and a little soft and soggy. My friend did very much enjoy the pasta as well. The service was also excellent, as even though there was a car show going on this particular weekend and the restaurant was full to the brim, the waitresses were attentive, and very understanding and helpful with regards to our toddlers making accidental messes over the meal. A great restaurant with great service overall, and would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeBIa2-q_6F6HNh-vPg-xIAg_rVqfEoEc3se4q&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Jenny Anderson (jennycanderson)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5zBrQ2SgSAq7cjPWmWTgRLDBFty535Ptns-qCKJ_Edl0iJO-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic meal, prices and service. We ordered the risotto, beet salad, and duck confit to share between 3 people, with an espresso martini and wine to drink. For dessert, we got the seasonal pear panna cotta which was amazing! I feel like the menu was very well curated and each dish was cooked perfectly - kudos to the chef 👏

I’d recommend this restaurant for a date or girls night. Friendly, attentive, and helpful service. The ambiance was lovely and calm for an early Thursday evening and the live music was a plus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwRYA_-JP1Eos3hjeSCsdIuoNqAB9uC9fZTlDM&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Aneesh Vaghadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWrL7cKUXjPtxgV-J_aqDc0U8QhiCuyIUBtGHmUeqQs8V-GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located in Fort Langley, Saba is a great spot for a weekend brunch.  With double height ceilings and a brick feature wall, the atmosphere is open, modern and full of light.  The staff were pleasant and quick to provide service. At 11am on a long weekend, there was no wait for a table.

The menu theme is Mediterranean, and there are a mix of options for this and for a classic breakfast as well (see menu photo). The shakshuka was excellent, served piping hot in a cast iron skillet and full of flavour. The Croque Madame was also delicious. (We enjoyed dipping the fries in the leftover shakshuka if you have a willing partner!) Each dish is around $20-25 and was very much worth it for the serving size and the flavour. Also of note, the restaurant shares ownership with Saba Cafe around the corner, so the coffee is the same good quality.

Overall, this was a great spot to come on a weekend and would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWsb_AGxONIELaF3dIw8FJrIaMZg3dURTvIf8&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Natasha Giesbrecht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVy0F6zEhg7cM_bDmObBvf-3ZxIl5dG3C2TBScZ2piRGny9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love eggs bennies and I had the salmon benny today and added an avocado. It was very good. However, I had been looking at previous pictures posted here on Google Maps, and other pictures showed chunks of cooked salmon, and that's what I was expecting. Instead I got thin slices of raw salmon. I was disappointed and questioned the server on this and she explained that they had had a menu change a couple months ago. I'd never been here before so that really didn't mean anything other than the pictures posted from a year ago might not be valid any longer. In any case, the service I was given regarding my complaint was outstanding considering I still ate the full meal given and it was still delicious, just not what I was expecting. Seriously amazing service and I'll be back, though I will make sure to ask more questions before ordering the next time 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJgIPq5vsZFX38dNuFHzvesb4oTxCVxrbZmxue&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"AJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6v4uGyFg0WW8-vpkMo_Q1qI1_-YVeHcr9BrbnKxbwivkO5GDq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Peaches & Cream French Toast was fantastic, though I would recommend sharing it—it was a bit too sweet for me to finish on my own. The Lamb Kefta Flatbread was also really flavorful and delicious. Overall, it was a good brunch experience. The space has a beautiful open-concept design, but it can get quite loud inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_HrhNiPfFDJ23oVp-HFL_1jp3coO10XRhlWYV&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Darlene Kemp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgwwGuFoHvNYs2Uy7o6DnrTQFssfKNuG22yRrnqcR8DXBJmDcMGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love and recommended Saba Bistro in Fort Langley. The service,the ambiance, the food, the food presentation and selection of beverages that are available are great. A perfect sunny day to stop by for late lunch (after a nail appointment) was the perfect end to a fabulous afternoon with my girlfriend. We were greeted right away and seated at a nice table in the middle of the restaurant. Our server was friendly, knowledgeable and attentive. I started with a prosecco and had  their grilled Ceasars salad, dressing on the side, with chicken. It was delicious and the presentation was appealing.  We were able to have conversations (without being rushed) and really relaxed during our lunch. This is a fabulous spot to chill, enjoy a Thursday afternoon, great food and ambiance. I'd definitely recommend Saba Bistro (and their fantastic staff) ... see you soon and Thank you Thank you Thank you 🙏 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1x237tG-PKs3YjbTc2dcAJ_8w9-VFvaxybUfP&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Ingrid Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpJ7BDSOGvowBGNTTCIxIzO8iKdPQulZrzi56sGNYHPbL7Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Initially drawn in by its inviting ambience and decor, our experience at Sabà Bistro unfortunately fell short of expectations. From the start, our server seemed disengaged, rushing through our orders and neglecting to refill our water glasses until prompted by another more attentive server.

The food, too, left much to be desired. The burger, despite its promising description, arrived with a bland patty that made the bun soggy from its juices, and the portion size was disappointingly small. The lamb kefta lacked flavor and failed to impress.

While the prices were average, the overall quality of both the food and service felt inadequate. Regrettably, this visit left us feeling overcharged for what was offered. I do not foresee returning to this place in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb2bccR8gZOgQDPrdoIJyeZokKiJZKkcg0ElNA&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-6-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mellie Fricker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXedPrBha6Dr5UkAzDR8QJg67GQLCT6B8dgmXQ74_XOEoPfcF8i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came to Rail & River last night for our anniversary and really enjoyed ourselves! Our server was very friendly and the food was fantastic!

We started with the crab dip, which was very yummy and had the perfect dip to chip ratio, which is hard to achieve! Definitely recommend. For our mains, my husband had the steak frites and I had the crispy chicken sandwich. Both were delicious. The chicken sandwich was one of the better ones I've had!

We will be back! 🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND73hA99uhQmr-f0gSRmDHbzWP4xVvk6cVWBck&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s the BC Day weekend and we decided to visit Fort Langley.  After a short walk we decided to dine at the Rail and River Bistro. The server was great.   Dog bowls were at every table.   We ordered an IPA and  Sangria.    Both were yummy.   The lettuce wraps were super flavorful!  My beet salad presented beautifully and tasted fresh.   The Brie burger was juicy!  Overall it was a very good dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJwFZIhdo1oQvTXIG7txCas9XpglhmcwXRi_rw&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"Volodymyr IV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZVGyvm5axHp2o0FXy9Qi9k5Kf-vIAC9ZH_P6Y5QSR5XqiYTr_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a great time to meet my friends, I fall in love their chicken Karri soup 😉 A waitress was kind and polite! I will come for a visit beautiful Fort Langley","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrt5g-elOs-_eDZcsPmW_2ntTiFm5xu3tGOd3E&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Fiona Bratvold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkKVshxGxVMEEGCFFS3gcEVu3bxn4uRZ1N7p-__IzVtiTHsl7bdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went on a Saturday lunch to a nice place by the river in Fort Langley. We sat in the covered patio. Nice ambiance. I had the brie burger which was absolutely delicious served with the bean soup. Prices were reasonable. My husband had a Quinoa salad with blackened chicken which he enjoyed. This place has an attached pizza restaurant on the side as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9gEGqkpsvbyk8dAOCsf3WC7or2EQEdTXb2tGs&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2023-7-11"},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything from the food to the service and seating was fantastic. I ate outside because I had my dog. Each outdoor seating area has a dog dish with water and a nice private space where you're sitting. The service was fantastic and the food was delicious.
The bruschetta was perfectly toasted and was very flavourful. The war won ton soup had a really tasty broth and lots of great stuff in it. All in all a wonderful dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8FgHdN_WBkMWTb0h4XYDhDTxeSr0aXYIkFv5N&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Emily Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYgM6xz9g4tOlfhgN75kH_RwKTdviii5aghI5D4awZ7zRrYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It is highly inappropriate for a server to add a tip without the customer’s consent.

I visited the restaurant with my kids for lunch today, and the server, claiming to be super busy, made us wait nearly an hour just for seating, the menu, and serving the food. We ordered burgers, pizza, and lettuce dishes, and while we tried to be understanding, the final moment was frustrating. When it came time to pay, the server quickly added a tip without my consent and handed me the machine before walking away. I’ve never had such an experience in any Canadian restaurant before. No matter how good the food may be, I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Maughan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFmwJ1J5oKrkRIipxb6dxd1O_v-_Uqeaz57eoj96AoJoABMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dog friendly patio 🐶 fully covered so perfect for any weather. Tables are separated by planters and spacious which is nice. 2nd time there for lunch, lots of menu selections and food is excellent. Both times the waitstaff were friendly and on point. Fis & chips & Tuna Poke were excellent. Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ankish Jain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZtGDHPnah-DrtpgkggcAhhlSQVzJPmXNPvi48ydYGD1fNehDHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried veggie PIZZA - which is amazing (it's very soft and tasty)
cheese & and toppings are very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoi8Zjw8F-Efen4IFrpwPZGCoVeEyZdDL7wlS_&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Tomlinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeebA1PMrrmuv4hPWhfRC7T3fZP_mmx-afa-rPxvLvt7LN7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down, one of my favourite cafes for years now. The thing I love about this place is the fresh food, all made on site throughout the day, and all made with simple locally sourced ingredients (a story the owners really need to tell). Personal favourites include the rhubarb cream cheese danish, the breakfast croissant (or burrito) and the amazing chocolate chip cookies (with just a taste of salt on each one). During the summer months the evening wine bar is one of Fort Langley's best kept secrets.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmLmjeHM_fmky64NWFFjy8MivHrmcPWeewyT8&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a hidden gem in this small town.  The tea, coffee, baked goods are all great.
The staff are friendly and helpful.
When we visit this time, may be they are really short of staff.  It takes more than 30 minutes to get the drinks and baked goods.
The courtyard is so pretty with some good seating old fashioned chairs.
A nice place for a tea.  Hopefully, the line up will be shorter next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNreasOQwkfHh_lvL6wENePhwzchN5rns8HWoBo&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Elisa Kazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnXq79FXK6SM_3Qr0x9E7eqGAf2iM5e785pouauMfz2nICrvAIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A cute cafe with indoor and outdoor seating, lots of baked goods, kombucha and alcoholic beverages. We went on the weekend and the line was insane so we waited a while to order but once we did the coffees were made quickly. A little too bitter my liking and no seasonal drinks but the cute atmosphere made up for it. I noticed a lot of gluten free and even vegan options for baked goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUUMaRR7OIT4ui10e1mnR16A9KIeDdQCrCCtk0&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy_RY7OyFpWDMGpBPfEcNdhNvd_Bt7gU5qWs4wH5XumgCFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is such a little gem in Fort Langley. Wanted to visit the area as I had family in town and it definitely was a good decision. Food was soooooo good! Highly recommend the breakfast hash and mushroom toast!!! Wish I had an extra stomach to try more items.

Their matcha latte was perfection…
I hate to say this but their cappuccino was the worst I’ve ever had. Barely any coffee aromatics and it wasn’t cheap. That was definitely money down the drain.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfilL9hpCgiIr7indKKDg0KERZpB4AO28Nw8VK&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the best pastries i've had in a while!!! I loved the cream on the Danish, and the flavor of the pecan pie. the sandwich was also really juicy and fresh. there is a wide selection of baked goods and drinks. the interior is also really nice and cozy, and we sat outside in little picnic tables outside the cafe. we went on Canada day so it was pretty crowded and the line was long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_RjCTwx-1QUZ4jpeKijSg0VbcBuZ9GPv3atNu&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love, love this place! The quality of food and drinks are great. The service was quick even with long line up. The staff were great and cheerful. So many pasty to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaXSkTqrkjc_NFs2DziIIVRWwF4z95hn1IhQZU&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"GH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjL7JVV6ausdnP45ZqwT_MXpeCtJK50ZS4aFzmUFU_4i3_4eA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has very good service, along with the atmosphere of this restaurant which is nice and very comfortable and the food is amazingly cooked. I tried the breakfast hash, and I very much recommend it. This place is one of my favorite cafés. The only thing is that there are too many people sometimes so I think if they added more space for tables, and chairs, it would be better. But everything else is perfect for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnAXqcY9T3f03DQL8Gau2GVYH5mKemMR8Pr4oO&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had to try their goods here as it was very inviting! They have a lot of pastries to choose from. Although it was very busy when we visited due to an event in the area, it was worth it. Yummy!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMjJVp-_GFgolTtpmHEvTzB6ZAkmbF3SkFsFUf&fid=0x0:0x8e0cf664852e7f53"],"When":"2024-10-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Moira Casey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqH8ArDou9s_zoBtlaH2uA9ZPMDv3j1_WOTzaJd-UkxMhhAnEjxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were very hungry when we came here and were happy to find they had burritos which they were happy to make to order due to dietary preferences/restrictions. The burritos were huge. Adriana was our lovely server but all the staff were friendly. Didn't realize until we were leaving that they serve margaritas but that will have to happen next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2ZatjMgYikkgK_0-Nn52JfGlgJhFcKoliXkzy&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Maria Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVT4VIguuWaBPRzr3vwjMN5Oxv5461iYNuM4q-kfJX1dGCzcrcp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have heard many friends recommend this place. Finally got to try it for takeout. Had a four hour stretch from purchase to eating with a quick reheat (came from fridge). The wrap has a good flavour (huh? Wow the wrap has flavour?! Appreciate that!). Both burritos were delicious and filling. Actually only could eat ⅓ of each, will save for another day.
Will recommend to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMshMZwMPy3BVak2HSsy1QjeaKw458TF6MS0WtX&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Ben Moreno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXIQA5QNY2om_rvFeJhZDcAcErydWjpf8dpxFoZ8JJurbSZgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice restaurant with beautiful theme decorations, they keep all the sliding glass windows open when the weather allows it, making it feel  like the whole restaurant is a patio.
Very good taste and  good-sized burritos, good choices of beers, and soft drinks,  fast service,  friendly servers,  the seating areas are kept very clean, recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB-G40Vox86v_d_g90w5UHE4TWUu8Euihzj6SE&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Kim Lishman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoLip5cDVmyG9tqCTLI4iijakhf4W2VYZg3aEWyBWtOfnKc61HDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the Little Donkey burrito and it kept me full for the entire afternoon. I loved reading the sign about the owner and meaning behind the restaurant. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoB9ObAapXrCDCy_XxWu-OG6uDiJ-3cIDMSVxl&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"To Ching Chan (Raymond)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_JNaVYtt5g0NGwmOn0CZ8D3OYXoGeQEAGHictSSpxFK2__U6u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great burrito that’s packed with flavour and value for the money. I ordered a little donkey burrito, it may look not too much from its appearance, but when I got it, it was really heavy and kept me satiated for the whole afternoon XD.

10/10 recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjVz7VacEj2vjQ1eRCZFYPR_c07t-1HaTs0Dwi&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Josiah Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfIUxbBekeLBDf62gJ6QVeoeFzTIXl8WlsfLT8nsYKNjGbXs8j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were going to go to a chain restaurant when we stopped in Langley but decided to walk through fort Langley instead! Boy were we pleasantly surprised by this unique burrito spot! Amazing taste, beautiful patio view, and very friendly and fast staff! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8cSlP1uEVWoRq1FIEudj0_r5IAkC6Bcb_UDwT&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"harmen k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3qJRedpffMosEWeiRlm3_opTsV7XQ8-2XOHWsUXGSuTzHgxK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good, and the service was really quick. Very cute spot in Fort Langley. We had a nice day out here, and little donkey was a great spot to get some food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3r964Pr0cqjT4jD592eOeuwHyzUYzCA6S3Kn3&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing burritos!, we where starving!, and this place was excellent!, they prepared everything fast and the quality of the ingredients is sooo fresh!, the staff is very friendly!, the place is clean and have a very calm atmosphere, the burritos are big and pretty tasty! They give you valentina hot sauce😄, we order jarritos and enjoyed our meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR3z2wYWdwW0yw9RcXJNR0Ebu2UHnr7WpHMOZq&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-1-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emilia Muirragui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVbrBdWMJwAdDmTKF2rqn3OE2f7BKVf4ff7Eui90G41UPNKe7l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband discovered this place during our visit to Fort Langley, and it was a fantastic find! We ordered a couple of beers and two burgers (The Canadiana and The Terra Burger). Everything was absolutely delicious—the meat was juicy, the fries were perfectly crispy, and the veggies tasted fresh and flavorful.

I want to give special praise to The Terra Burger's magnificent flavor profile; the balsamic added a unique and delightful touch. Great service, a wonderful atmosphere, and outstanding food—I highly recommend this spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOexOgvNKuC4V2FnLI3QAJ3W5u739qph0zbphMP&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming here everytime we visit Fort Langley. Dining here last night with my family was such a joy! We really loved the food we ordered  like the Fort Sandwich, Soup, Salad and Bread, Blackened Chicken and Pasta, Cheeseburger and Truffle Fries, Yam Fries.

Our server was really attentive to our table. It's busy here on the weekends but nice place to eat with delicious foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt-yc6UjHKKelvEkQKK46-jZlLwGjPAzzlqLdU&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Afsana Tabibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzp6b-InW6PAK15vNh9v8ga8zbWmNjzR0Dlq305Lj5B3Ej-HpL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered a French onion soup as our starter. Chicken wings, poutine, and Nashville hot chicken sandwich with sweet potato french fries for our mains. All the food tasted good. The service was great. The atmosphere was nice, but a bit cold despite being under the heat lamp on the patio. Would recommend their food - good little spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5lLjd0ZVGX7GlkwIvniQsiIur9fok3Tv1xqym&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Adriana P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKENiWUoNjl33BSK6-y6ikvlUimDMPUhOFsrrXjNzQQ_axe1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here after hearing great things about it.
I tried the TP Classic burger with yam fries. The burger was juicy, fresh, tasty. It was big so it was hard to bite… lol. I was not a fan of the bun, kept falling apart. The yam fries and dip, was delicious! They sure know how to do the dip!
Paired with an Amber Ale and what a meal!
Friendly, family place, loved the inside sitting are, comfy, warm, relaxing.
Our server Katie, friendly, courteous with a  genuine smile!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNI8f6SxUrfe7htmEknUDg06Nc1R1TBeq0Fwr5&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick service, happy vibes running through the restaurant, fun patio and outdoor seating, decent food and amazing beer selection. Definitely recommend to enjoy the beer flight in this fun locale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkcShM74naOuHwdvvBbEMom345RW-llk1NBKxD&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Lex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIOoTFR1sL0065mPU_AeAGgpwzqHssyGAT0I917Apw20TmHTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food & vegan/vegetarian options available. Perfect for outdoor summer eating after a bike ride, they have bike “parking” available on the outdoor patio.

The truffle fries are amazing, a must try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRA0JDPbK6S84fz-K84Ee12h7EGaPDJIxl4-H5&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Rob Morrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO9EfGgaU9iGfMmvKzWkx3ft40f_mdKm2xKp6t-Xi5KL-iZbs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chicken and Waffles was superb - highly recommend! We had a table of 8 that they were able to accommodate and the server did a great job managing the table.  20% surcharge for large tables but I am glad the server let us know as we were paying so there was no misunderstanding.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFy1_SIX0oAVhYw14hJs7yIEjDAa8Yq58gfJql&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Cleemar M (CLM)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCGYDgdTLDzn3zRPmQzI47thdkSDXTgZ2wOwEV-c1M78oYSBe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were really looking for another restaurant and got confused and wow are we glad we did. It was rainy and grey and what a warm and welcoming space. Service was friendly and efficient without being intrusive. The food was tasty and well priced and the beers were a good surprise to a seasoned beer tippler. Our server Alexa was cheery and personable with good insights on food and alcohol and the accomodations for either are appreciated. There are a lot of varied areas to sit and the decore is inviting. We have this pegged on our must return list as regulars. Whatever the weather a must see spot for so many reasons. Lots of parking in the area. Swing by it's worth the trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEVYrlMH1BP0GgbomDuRkTLshVNTjlfCuIzXK-&fid=0x0:0xf6615e24e4530d4f"],"When":"2024-6-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed my breakfast here. The young gentleman serving me was very polite and kind.
My scrambled eggs were amazing, the bacon cooked well and not greasy and I loved the toast. It was well presented!
My potatoes a bit off...perhaps fresh oil would fix that.
Overall, I loved my breakfast and I would happily eat here again!

Exceptional service and a cool vibe. Thank you!

Ms Fancy
Google Reviewer
9 million + picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-504Fc9za_93HRDvAIH3H9ISlHhR97ENQj33w&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We visited The Bistro after seeing its high ratings on Google. The ambiance was pleasant, and the staff was friendly and accommodating.

We ordered Huevos Rancheros and Chorizo Sunken Eggs. While the presentation was impressive, the food itself was just okay—nothing exceptional as we had expected. One of our dishes had to be replaced due to an issue with the eggs, but the staff handled it well and even offered us a free muffin, which was a nice gesture.

Overall, a decent experience, though the food didn’t quite meet our expectations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbdXvBb4O6qLEyF4lF1XmDg4WFwAjZxVl1kgLF&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here twice in two weeks it was so good. The first time I came was for breakfast with a friend and another day I grabbed dinner. The breakfast was great. I’m obsessed with their lavender latte that they make. Lunch was also great and I ordered the goat curry of all things. Everything I’ve had has been so tasty, this place is truly a hidden gem in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ3ocZr7icFNXAw98rVDgGGm-WVQQQdELE-quu&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Open cafe space. It was already decorated for Christmas mid November, though and playing some Christmas music. 😑
I got the breakfast wrap, which was quite good. The other people at the table enjoyed their food too. They have water on a side counter, so you can get your own refills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOsH7pON0rYvBJylm038XMuDZW_Df21cbn8kWO&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Julia Segers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5Cr9XcQGc80U3UEnSy2K93Fs6U0AVc6Jg4gAQ9NTkCDom6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is what I look forward to coming to every Sunday.  The owner Patty has become a friend since coming here for a year now with my husband.  Not only are the staff all fantastic and friendly, the food is phenomenal!  I've tried every item on the menu and have always had a great meal.  The lattes are to die for and pair nicely with an in-house baked good.  The Bistro is one of the best hidden gems of Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwGRWIaYuo9fbdVDH2CUJtGaIY2A7Rl7VUVFu0&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Roberta Berzenji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWaRSKdx-HLRG0S9Y5WPHbwyVKiaViRayx1-anf3tkgEIMXi_-aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Variety on the menu was good. I ordered the sliders, my husband ordered the Thai chicken wrap.
Both came quickly.
Both were cooked really well delicious.
Will be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9knsjgBf-YJdpcxgZgDuTDjKosKfV34m7fcBA&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Clint H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCTsCTHF1FSzvzBhUd3dc_32en4hG6D5V6xeiSagdhUFomOopV6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This establishment, situated in a light industrial area, offers a delightful dining experience for brunch, lunch, and dinner.

The service provided was exceptional and prompt, ensuring a pleasant dining experience.

We savored the goat curry and Thai bowl, both of which were exceptionally flavorful and freshly prepared. The soup du jour, a broccoli and aged cheddar combination, perfectly complemented the main courses.

During the summer season, the establishment opens its large garage door, creating an inviting outdoor dining area.

Overall, this establishment proved to be a valuable discovery and is certainly worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWivGRsllYIWf42dk0v3bF8QztR_zTzXnL6xI5&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Manmeet Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAFj9DrnYycDPwPe308BqNgQ5LPf_kkdLO8iQvK63Eh4cUkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Remember--sometimes the map app will take you to the back of the building so just know that it is facing the main road!

Anyways, the food really has some flavor! I ordered the Desi Nashta (consisting of an spicy veggie omelet with green chilies-it was a bit spicy but still tasty!) and spiced hashbrowns were on the side. It was flavorful, but more on the oily side for my liking. I also ordered the pancakes and the portion was quite big, though a little dry. Also, the toppings cost 2.50 extra. I asked about the vanilla cream and was told it's just whip cream... so I'd skip that next time. As for the atmosphere, the place was very bright and clean and the layout is interesting. The garage (larger door) is open during the day, so you can sit on the patio, but it does get quite cold because they do not shut it for the people inside. Overall, service was okay. There is only one main server serving everyone and sometimes the chefs would come out and bring the food to you, if it gets a bit busy. Overall, the Desi Nashta really stood out, but the rest was like any other café.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObgJzk027qrejpMrCOwtDEL8EeYo03P8168FwL&fid=0x0:0xa4eb056a6caaaf59"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roman Diulin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9wcwcJdQkG1bILW4K-Mu2hlRSdhs0Y3sjWuZrazejdWWJ4V0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this place and was pleasantly surprised. The first thing that stands out is the friendly staff and the calm, cozy atmosphere that immediately makes you feel comfortable. We ordered breakfast: a bacon omelet and avocado toast. The omelet was juicy, although there was a bit more onion than expected. Unfortunately, the coffee selection was disappointing—only drip coffee is available, which doesn’t quite match the overall quality of the place. However, the ambiance and quick service make up for this shortcoming. The photo spots were also a nice touch, adding a special charm to the venue. If you're looking for a place for a quick and tasty breakfast, I recommend it. Our order was ready in just 10 minutes, which is very convenient for a morning meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc47RN2YtXwlAwC-3RKveT2Z1W_1QX0IEL3bVO&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Tosh Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIdmCEA6wFT3uk0g8rg0LilYkyyaWyf_o2WUOJ9NozdZG8Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Couldn’t believe this is a Moxie’s. Luxurious interior design with the appeal of a high class establishment, modern menu with trendy options, and a refined atmosphere the moment you walk in. Spectacular service from our server Jailyn. She went above and beyond for our table. Simply the best Moxie’s on the west coast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2bjT87UHYRIxbKq_UfCkhUepPTuPzrkwWPQW7&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"kenzie st.dennis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3IiK1JusZPNKOpAMznki3eR_elaK-RRfgSQNlRxvOGezdu57o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in for date night with a GC from a previous Moxie's experience in Kamloops, and I must say, the visit did redeem the Moxies name in our minds.

I ordered a virgin ceaser (not pictured) that was good but quite warchestire-y. The rim seasoning was delicious, and the little snack stick was quite hearty compared to other places.

The virgin ceaser, poke bowl, and lettuce wraps (lettuce wraps were an appy menu item) was over $50 before tip. (I believe it was low to mid $60 range.)

Lettuce wraps - the chicken was good, nice, and saucy. Personally, I'm not a fan of cucumbers, so I just kicked those to the side. Thoroughly enjoyed that it was ice berg lettuce vs. romaine hearts, etc. The mayo sauce was also delicious!

My boyfriend ordered the Poke Bowl and said it could have for sure used some more fish and rice for what we paid for it. Wasn't a fan of the mushrooms as they were an odd texture. (Just kicked those to the side) Fresh avocado and eggs were done just how he likes them!

Service was good. Our waitress was friendly and hosted a conversation well. She answered all of our questions and triple checked our concerns with the ingredients list. (Severe dairy allergy)

The atmosphere was loud even tho we were tucked into a cozy corner, it was just loud. No real complaint as it is christmas party season and get together season!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA-uWgBl2yRy-pngLAQgn3qKbk470gPyAIW-xD&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Rain322","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfhgisVz8guNZIE90tmDxeLuww3GLtbkL2J-6XXES04KcJHiFyNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Moxie's dinner experience tonight was a pleasant experience.

The food was really good. I went for the tried and true chicken alfredo, the Tropic Thunder mocktail, and the churro ice cream sandwich. They did not disappoint. I was pleasantly surprised with the texture of both the churro and ice cream together.

Jailyn was a gem! She provided some much appreciated help when we were looking through the menu. It felt less like we were waiter and customer, and like we were acquaintances!

We came in during the late night happy hour. The atmosphere in the restaurant really felt 'happy.' It was nice to sit and take in the decor, the happy chatter in the background, and the music choice.

All in all, I enjoyed my time and I will definitely be recommending this place to my friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6L5FsvBOVj0k5gGjVycMhDlZzd50qqnioP-SZ&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Marina Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZww_IgxoPGCPaRASjapp5LeyML7Y2ebsuU4hz9Ea-2zwM7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely 5 stars for this moxies!  Olivia D was such an amazing server! My kids wanted to leave her a review as it’s well deserved! She is kind and generous! A great server! What fantastic food as well! We eat Moxie’s very often and we were extremely impressed with the quality and taste! Sooo good! We will be back as we are staying at the hotel and if the food and service is this good we don’t really need to go anywhere else! Five stars for sure!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlH1N8xqvSqFiHiy8iHEPlvX5mgyAPIySqfBEq&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s about as solid a 4-star establishment as you can get.

Service was friendly although at one point it seems they forgot a part of our order and we had to track them down through another waiter because they were nowhere to be found.

The food is ok/decent for this type of restaurant but a bit on the expensive side. $27 for a plate of nachos and $7 EXTRA for less than a cup (ie 250mL) of ground beef is a bit over the top. Another $3.50 for guacamole and we’re already at almost $40.

Mind you, they have many other things on the menu and no one said we HAD to get nachos. Also, high prices seem to be a Langley thing so what can you do.

The churro ice cream was really good and apparently they sell out of them so get them while you can (summer menu only).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr3mvygY42wKgUZGlPqTtzz_40tK_LNCZZ0Nxd&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"J P Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVv-TZdheQ2KRgbv66PStcV7Bg2Aya6_K0c9TCrcSOX10hChF3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best restaurant in langley, they had humongous parking and seating area , food was mouth watering , we ordered kids meal and salads and Thai curry","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMadliHHxHefF_dYhl7C6l5GHvCOByTrExy48CG&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Annie Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnF8azbT8Lerz2gXJ6ATYREN60SCkJK_VFirXjkFbp6F4f70AJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our second annual Christmas luncheon.  We were a group of 22 women who went there for lunch. Everything from service, decor, arrangement was superb.  The food presentation was great and very tasty.  The service was excellent.  We will definitely return next year.  Thank you.  Annie","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSBXqsHDqHTQinbpu81IruTTvGM6-KpZ0pKmSx&fid=0x0:0xb8a9148fd201069e"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

title: Fort Pub & Grill
address: 9273 Glover Rd, Langley Twp, BC V1M 2R6
descriptions: Old-timey watering hole with front-porch seating & a classic pub grub menu of burgers & snacks.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Anastasiia Synytsyna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6GtbpkVSB1_OMuB4-2rh_LBp8QzPz0RILW9O9HCPCLHjCfPy9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I visited Fort Langley for the first time and stopped by the Fort Pub \u0026 Grill. We ordered 2 pizzas - with smoked salmon and vegetarian. The pizzas were very tasty, especially the smoked salmon - I recommend you try it!\nThe establishment is atmospheric with pleasant service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2qnv3K1xT4bxEMd8-fktzz_JTnv-BNOXou-TK\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Annie Isaak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVTCvx41kGYcH72iCQpkHbZFwDH754CPLMluwrDJaO3ZfWn5Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is incredible, I highly recommend the beef dip! The service was quick and food was fresh. The environment was cozy, warm and comfortable, however the people behind us were very hands on with each other and made us slightly uncomfortable . Jessie (our server) was so sweet, gave amazing food suggestions and an overall kind person. I will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOvNnv_XdRIGRoxSada8c0JPMKsR9NPtj28rmY\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Bradley Gionet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSEZxT9bss5Wm-8sYZqNZvpWBvD6hTQuaiH051enZwW5r2mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have been to The Fort many times and have often acclaimed them to have the best Fish and Chips. I went with a small group this time and I noticed portion sizes have decreased substantially. In the past I would have rated them 5 stars, but there does seem to be a decline. Still very good but noticeable portion and quality decrease.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZTQEJN1td2dfbq20dKc9ohpQ0VmhO3hQmOfO4\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Свят Мысив","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX93F7wrB6Dc0ihsqMdg_UZCsT49nCSpKfsLxLjyzUVquEapYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't want to leave!  All liked it.  The atmosphere is conducive to communication and a pleasant pastime.  The food is high quality and tasty.  I ordered garlic-honey wings.  The sauce for them was incredible.  There was also potatoes with vegetables and sour cream.  And, of course, beer!  Thanks to this cafe for pleasant memories.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNahQ8q7n9ycIyzGDe7g3nr8sp6hWPaBt7dOfrU\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"ali sajedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLKDfhtR-9CZ5pVLQ2sTZpiSQQL70tfH6bxSnPvVKzYE-A44E-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fort pub offers good North American food style , with their mac and cheese with sausage being a standout—absolutely delicious. It's great for a quick bite of comfort food, but don’t expect anything too fancy. It’s a solid spot for casual eats, but it doesn’t go beyond that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm_b7L5gYlasNB3UJPdHhP--vLu_BOMoTfsb3U\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"万竹","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsirj2w9NgKxB4GQZVGrpbGaK60xEpSi0cVmeVC0yEcSSkqbG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a good time, food was decent and excellent location.  Felt like our server was new to this line of work.  A little frazzled.  Recommend the ribs.  We also had nachos, beet salad, and scoobi doo pasta from kids menu and all was fine with the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSHss7sgWEHO7TdmOzT-IBFOPQbMywsvsZBCSF\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Max Nazarov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwRa8FhHppjONdUgPtVwWMh2QpzyUgICsAYlWwaSFJS2zuOcEx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"the service is great, the place is old, vintage, not my style, you can place a bet on sports right there, and even spend cash in the ATM. The soup was simply amazing, which unfortunately can't be said about the fish and chips, in general - normal)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOreCjNrNwF3KxPukFlFh2mu35WxxFIkRY9Qfp0\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Tiffany W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAoZUL06J-3CXOdQXWsiCnWiCx3SWbhu_G20BV_0JJNTD8ddpD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere at the Fort Pub \u0026 Grill. We sat on the patio and enjoyed nachos to start, with a white sangria and belini. Highly recommend this place for all around good place to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfrLJA5VN_rqK0XpT-YUgJSHgwsOAkpJ1qiZ3e\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-6-7"}]

title: Delphi Cafe

descriptions: Breakfast & lunch classics are served with coffee & mocktails in a casual, wood-&-whitewashed space.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sahil Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVPAccMBj5rdYBZ6FviGNJy5usQY2YiEce4L4PsFjmZVDTTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I were looking for brunch places and decided to give Delphi a try! I must say we had an amazing experience overall! The service was amazing and the atmosphere was very cozy! We ordered the Honey Bacon Eggs Benedict and Delphi Breakfast, we absolutely loved both the dishes, especially the Eggs Benedict! My Latte was great and my wife loved the Mocha Latte! Overall it was a great experience which we will definitely revisit in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8hFJPNaufXDdh2_oTYE9L3pcAGIQFKhmCxVbH&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Aleina Morris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd2I9gx3-6LbA6bDWwNYaVwTkMk5wBF5-jNd0gNGhO_8W1z9Un=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We wanted to give this place a try since every time we pass by, it’s always so busy. It’s a cafe, with a lot of food options from savoury to sweet or both.

I’ve gotten the Japanese Style Omurice, that was very delicious. The rice was seasoned well, and the egg was cooked perfectly on top. The sauce it came with was also very delicious, I wish there was more! The sausage seemed it was just grilled and put on top.. I wish it was cooked with more seasoning.

The rest of my family thought the food was not seasoned enough. Classic Ham Benedict, I feel like the potatoes needed to be cooked with seasoning. The hollandaise sauce was very delicious though, but it seemed to not revive the dish since almost everything still needed to be seasoned.

The Avocado Toast was very small for its price, especially how it was just completely covered with other greens and hiding the avocado.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO81rpsekIUHP4JXpNmGlSzAPzjcA90ETUzktBB&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Sam Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnlCb-ZEFmHLH5hGB6a7C0dj3Y2p-OSkBcAslG_Scec7XVMH0e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was really good! Portion sizes were great, I really liked how they have half Bennie’s on their menu. Everyone was so kind and helpful and it was really quick! Lovely brunch spot if you’re spending a day in Langley area.

Felt like a nice family run atmosphere and the food quality was awesome along with a large variety of dishes to choose from with breakfast and lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7fxhDnqHApK5Qri4TPUaSFjZEtdK5iYJhyLbE&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Lisa H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcBIYpsUm-wrWNP1zDdR6Hbkt2k5mMXw-Y97XRnYa7-8eWXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have tried a few times to experience this restaurant, usually a weekend, usually very busy. Found ourselves lucky enough to be able to get in on a weekday, and WOW! Such a creative menu, with unusual twists on many classic favourites, such as eggs Benedict .Truly an experience.  Restaurant was small (maybe 50 seats?), which is both a benefit to great service but limits who is lucky enough to dine there ! Service wonderful and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9tNL4giqaeexCX9IMZa-EEW3TMn7eQSgPBkD8&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Greg Strauss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEBswdohY8MKmXWQBz8h-sdArV7jglaxgxQOs9m79Qhj3fjm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had Sunday brunch. As expected there was a wait but their system is good for managing it. They will call you when your table is ready.

We were seated after a 30 minute wait. I had the Spicy Asian Shrimp Bowl, which was excellent; but not spicy at all. Added some tobasco to give it some kick.

All of us enjoyed our meals very much. Overall a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXT286H89eAqQeXaezZFOytY2XgQjX8XzVl4Y2&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Heather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlRH-MluE-r59gDMbhNGnmA6xQ093xPeM572UrizgUjntImBmZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome breakfast! Have been a couple times and has been consistent every time. There will possibly be a line up but it is worth it and they have a great selection for their menu with lots of new things to try.

Definitely would recommend their chicken and French Toast. The French toast isn’t too sweet and is paired with a nut syrup. Absolutely delicious!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOerYhRz0OFiKgyBbfRGTEDgfFaMMWjrhbwHkii&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Ethelyn David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzv23aUxSuwfPd_9AunPN-TlXxS_u-bqe6T7HTo7nOPXh6i-4Meg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe came highly recommended, and since I happened to be in Langley I checked it out. Certainly exceeded my expectations and did not disappoint. Come hungry, as the portions are huge!
I ordered the Chicken Toast: fried chicken on top of French Toast with pickles and pickled onions and a sweet sauce and syprup. It was an explosion of flavours: sweet, salty, savoury.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCxsDwkPJff-kwoK5LkpCy8s-LiGSnaPSnWH1J&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Cameron Appleby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfK7DVoNWzY4Tr2axkV9NzU-d_f97Lv-kg87iMyzH8Sw9NTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for a great brunch in Langley, this is the place. Had to wait a while for Sunday brunch, but worth the wait, and they have a good queue system to get your table, which nearby shops to kill time as well while waiting.

We enjoyed the honey bacon and the fried chicken Bennies. The chicken was crisp, juicy and the perfect bite. Their homemade Hollandaise was delicious and good size portions.

Anytime I want breakfast in Langley, this is the new go to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfLRW6sIFTDj5P9SEk47F68tfhXFaD0i5mXxVJ&fid=0x0:0xcf572f576141efb9"],"When":"2024-10-2"}]

title: Annora Restaurant
descriptions: Quaint venue presenting reimagined seafood & meat dishes made with locally sourced ingredients.
