user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Annora stands out as a hidden gem offering exquisite West Coast cuisine that rivals the best dining spots the lower mainland. Our family enjoyed the carefully curated and beautifully plated prix fix menu. We also enjoyed the intimate and relaxed dining experience. Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM27zuN_K2s_aW8ewulsbxlnfyy7wInXhB9zqvZ&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Chellé Tanner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQP4cCqyk_9yznRs5HPL9oWBdIaZ4RNI0pbWoz_lnKQw5kIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Best Meal and restaurant experience we’ve had in years! 5 Star quality food, service and Ambiance! It was our 32nd wedding anniversary and we were lovely  greeted by a hostess and seated to our reserved table with a mention of our anniversary and congratulations. Our server, Courtney, was beautiful, well spoken, kind and attentive. We went with the three course meal menu, which is an incredible value for what you get! Appetizers of scallops and truffle mushroom & goat cheese salad, with some bread, and to Die for caramelized butter! We both had the duck entree, which was amazing! The chef, Aaron, came out to greet us and congratulate us before our incredible dessert of lemon cheesecake and chocolate mousse that  came along with complementary port as an anniversary gift. We will be back many times, and cannot highly recommend this restaurant enough! Well done, Mr. Turkstra and staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmRpTBPwIv74VFWI2SnX4wHxwQv480VjkQWGME&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Ev Haus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhBn_RoFi4gHAZ_o2bWuZm9y05aVGbq1IyLL8dOPo4G5Bx98P4YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed our dinner here tonight. Tried a large variety of dishes and pretty much everything was very tasty and felt fresh & healthy. I think the perogies were my favorite. The portions are quite small but the prices weren't exorbitant, so don't hesitate to order a bunch of different things to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4EYWuVDLFv1y_ks-TUdq-lHn2C3dwG01NtFec&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Jon Szekeres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4TjzWM4-rYwKMzaJaRpelqECVckpWbT7on0MOTg3jdI05vv2ZYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite meal I've ever had in Canada. Small, cozy ambiance, great food, friendly, knowledgeable staff and fair prices. An absolute gem","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv-tcS9_c-xpMpRsigIfZLiuGJov8zjGOGBJrk&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Afsana Tabibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzp6b-InW6PAK15vNh9v8ga8zbWmNjzR0Dlq305Lj5B3Ej-HpL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Upon walking into this restaurant there was a (not-so-nice) distinct smell, but I figured why not give it a chance. We ordered the caesar salad, short rib pierogies, curry chicken skewer, and truffle gnocchi to start. Every single one of our starters were delicious. For our mains we ordered the chicken, and beef short ribs. We both loved our main dishes. We felt like we had to order dessert because everything else tasted amazing lol. So then we ordered their special of the day dessert - Apple crisp cake with caramelized apples and crumble on top. I'll be honest, the cake itself was a bit stale but the caramelized apples and crumble made the dish. Overall, this restaurant is really great.

On a side note: I'd definitely recommend vacuuming their floors, dusting their furniture and signs at the front table, cleaning their tables (my table cloth had stains on it), and maybe updating their decor. For such great food, the restaurant itself looks like there is a lack of effort and care in its maintenance and overall appearance; which is extremely unfortunate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYKR-c6y0EnyBySqJQ6X6oGPrC57Z3Fb6izBgd&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL02WHycytQrkTMwZQzbxJBywqloogUMKnqGbZYn4rSGcaaqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was there a few weeks back and there was a new waitress and she was rude, condescending and spoke to us like we were children. The food prices have gone up but the portion sizes have gone down. Our first two appies were burnt - no concession was offered. When I tried to call to give feedback I was hung up on. Seriously horrible customer service, really gone down hill from the last time we went. With the cost of food going up, we're now going to find a place with affordable food and better service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Nieman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhvQPcw1kZonY_9i6oT4Jc_XJLOy1VnlBSDMm-5oUai4gM7KUd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant with delicious food. I've never had gnudi before and throughly enjoyed it as an appetizer.  The stuff chicken breast was cooked perfectly and the flavours of the dish were well balanced. The braised beef was also amazing and tender. Our dessert was lively and the perfect size as well. All in all good restaurant with friendly staff. Would recommend checking out especially if your looking for something a little more fancy in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkbb1ObxZwSNvaKoyxx46UuLwkJH6yx7yjv6a-&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2021-9-17"},{"Name":"P. W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmlT7gcdEhVjzJPL5HX6Ah7jfzOEVc2hRSJ-651XvvYpUPPG0h-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coming from North Vancouver, I had heard to stop by Annora if ever in the neighbourhood. Turns out it was even better than expected - and Aaron the owner brought is in with a smile, even though they had closed after lunch.

The food is impeccable, fresh, and delicious. The service - outstanding!!

Definitely will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHDdAfBjQlmAdlOHSnWJLFEjG99WsCoT_QwG2c&fid=0x0:0x3ab541833210601f"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

descriptions: Quaint, counter-serve nook since 1997 offering seasonal dishes, an espresso bar & homemade desserts.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Golnaz J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwh094AvMjRiNSQoo9HjnFTPUMh8c3XSGOFZ78okUlI4KLdqnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The café had an inviting atmosphere, and the staff were absolutely amazing—friendly, attentive, and eager to make the experience enjoyable. However, the food left something to be desired. I ordered the chocolate cake and the cheese scone, but unfortunately, both were stale. While the texture was disappointing, the richness of the chocolate flavor was actually very good, which salvaged the dessert a bit. I also ordered a latte that was okay. Overall, I had a mixed experience—great service, but the quality of the sweets could use improvement. Would still return for the ambiance and hospitality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3kXu4yONvJUHT_HCLoS7VDmDWPtRXNdKdqYg9&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jordan Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11-xeEA0Ih57ocfphXt0C50QwI614ll6t2qknklEqHoDt3aVy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice cafe and bookstore with some good good options for brunch, though very limited table space to sit and eat. The short rib mac and cheese on special was pretty good, and what I believe was the Thai coconut curry soup was decent. A simple solid option for food in the area, with a neat bookstore area to browse as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHzOquZzu58zMEjh7qGHK4OuZlVQ8Rv_phoMIs&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Gerry A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVtoo7d9k-jl8g8Olh4q9lMKjWQOCXf8VHpTk3fUjsRUEkuuL-pA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for lunch and were able to get a nice table outside.   Pro-tip: you can find your seat outside scan the barcode order at your table and they will bring it out to you!     This will save you having to wait in line and avoid the temptation of all the beautiful and delicious cakes and pies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTvvzWohNQ3sDC30O0zigGZOh34eoWV-W0gGYc&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Dani D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGG8I4GIq7TGLsN0IQW0rGa_W6AS9VgHWmtPmBvQMWKi_VP1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place for breakfast and brunch, easy to grab a sandwich and a coffee on the way to school and work. Sitting down is another story because my table was very close to the cash register so people were constantly behind me. The Avocado Benny barely had avocado.. but the oatmeal was good. Also, two people in my party got their meal just under 10 minutes before me and another person got our oatmeal.. so maybe ask for all the food to come out together?

Enjoyed the experience and the food regardless.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5B8rWeb9rwImPxzxqmyuac3FHC3nnkPEUjbdo&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Luna Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrSWH180GU0prt7Q02XLGOunXawSpGLg-4tuh-HUvyxrXPOjZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sooo good, I didn't expect that much but it was really good. Even in the morning time and week day, still many line up for taking order. I couldn't ordered that chicken wrap because it's not lunch time yet.
I would like to try next time.
I ate there and take out for my bf.
Becasue I really want him try this place food.
I will come back 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9dmerpiNWfrQqKDTIBaqaPF03ijKRAgkk69d0&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to Wendel’s Bookstore & Cafe hoping to grab some lunch, but the line was almost out of the door and it was way too busy on a Saturday. We came back later in the afternoon to grab some coffee and dessert and it was still busy so we gave up. We did check out the small bookstore section though, which was nicely organized. But it did feel a bit clusterphobic with the queue and diners eating near the entrance and we didn’t stay long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2PVKaWHyB4cVKJpKb_SfIBWkvEBiCqU_aBJhs&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"MiCap19 nerd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR0O1WpksEG8SnIbTdyAuIebW4CtfJmRwbqcUOCwM6bvDmtNnu8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great desserts, drinks, and atmosphere. I especially love the connecting Bookstore.  It's always fun. It can get cold in the fall sitting anywhere near the doors, but still a nice place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzt7cvXTD1TwTnQlSnI-Yly1MjhBRkPnS1GaNe&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place and friendly atmosphere. Ate breakfast here with my family and it was good! Avocado benny was very disappointing… there was maybe a smidge of avocado on that. The mushroom and spinach hash was great! Gave us 2 meals out of 4 and then another 2 meals so service was a bit iffy and it wasn’t the most busy timing, but overall nice people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuE223PcDX3AJPr_1x3NIHe82h3O6wWSjkR3H1&fid=0x0:0x2ef72d1dd313a292"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harley Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Qq433-Ar1XcNkStIszjJ1vPqO_xcJopX5NLhTAwlv5u-LvY-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a tourist, I regret so much going to SABA cafe across the street. Blacksmith Bakery is so much better. The croissants are bigger than my face. It’s crispy and full of layers. The pastry looks professionally made and taste delicious. Most importantly, their hot food options are really good too. Good sandwiches, good soup.

Come here instead of SABA.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqupHgaugSUednF-t5qfrTmF2UDZroPz7eqCSf&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"joanna ch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXibOrMfRatQRTgVyt2rNvdN0IjcJMpMZ0slAO-N-RK6HAlw9KB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered Truly Chocolate Cake & Lemon Meringue Tart on my recent visit.  I love them both.
Was gonna try the croissants, but unfortunately saw flies in the open shelf.
Latte was good, too.  Bought a pack of coffee beans before leaving.  :)
If the bakery is much closer to my home, I will definitely come visiting often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKrvJYlmsaSP8MnF9CqGcjsFaEsfuL1sqDilQ5&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kim Lishman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoLip5cDVmyG9tqCTLI4iijakhf4W2VYZg3aEWyBWtOfnKc61HDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most amazing salted maple latte I've ever had! Such a great flavour combination and the coffee was smooth and creamy. We also tried the bread and butter pudding croissant which was delicious. Came on a Sunday afternoon and the line was out the door but worth it for the latte. Lots of seating outside and inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXAm4w0zXhSj8NCnf8nUZnaHGU3fgAaCTZbhyz&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Pain au Chocolat was crispy and tasty! The cappuccino was a bit bitter, probably because of a dark roast, but the Latte was pleasant. I always see a queue to enter here during weekends, but service is fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPovjtDjNrsvjOE89ciLhI2v9wPNFkIjb5mZavM&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Si Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7gLWIj8IqjPvI73xDmz2DmSJqju6RFiW9wQSZ86hR0FOK_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came on a Friday and it was nice and quiet! Loved the peace and vibe here. Their sticky bun was good as well as their latte! I would recommend this coffee shop as well as coming to fort Langley on a day off for a morning chill","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbGaScdGT7NYdWLAmPyfQwLH-zUVMl8RSFuthT&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPZIUOsDwlBkFebhG04vj0-2yRgvhqZ8FA0OSOGGM5zHg8Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic bakery! Everything tastes fresh and delicious! 😋. Friendly staff. Nice atmosphere. Also a very nice patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjIBa1b95RACefuw8j3WTd6a7xPlAXS08lcx8Y&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"y sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFngQqa2F90OIpbxkUL3vQVcASx5xoE2gyFjE4kMR1ydjk_2M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered Pumpkin Spice Latte and Spinach Pesto Savoury Bun. Both smelled amazing and tasted delicious. I’ve visited several times already, but it’s always crowded on the weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxTSUqzjWjuQN4NfCQbyxaaFDpymTcafXp04Pf&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Niki Ahmadpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwggyo4TIOZ6_D6Ue0eGM7Bl6RxBX8qkAAJJc_MGqSa1ChffwkcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You made our day with your delicious sandwiches and friendly staff. The warm service and great food really stood out. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC0AaCZ-pjTATs2eLmKPeDO1wApDHG9CX-uZIn&fid=0x0:0x3b15df3e07bb54f3"],"When":"2024-10-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chris Ryter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwheRFBd2iVyngm54GwWPWSojAWkPjALghck0RPDFXl-FBrrZn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were visiting from Alberta.  Coffee is kinda one of our things in life. We aren't total coffee snobs but almost.  We definitely appreciate a good roast.  We love the fact they roast their own beans and choose high quality beans.  It was our first time there.  We had the Aztec Mochas. Highly recommend.  Not your usual latte or mocha but well worth trying. Huge flavor profile.  Espresso with rich chocolate and some subtle hints of spice.  Gonzalo and stuff were excellent! Thank you.  We will be back next trip out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFWjgK0oqSpPpRyhFxVIiXg4zgRrWG7gDVcd8z&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such delicious coffee! Definitely one of the best locations for coffee. Many selections available. I liked the interior and outside patio.
Very friendly/kind service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuH6mUEHnQ5qgPkqS34hWTuNWBOl7lQTOzn7_Q&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s October, so we had to get the pumpkin spice latte (iced + hot). It was really good - definitely recommend trying the pumpkin spice drinks :).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm0_mSyd-WvGzY2mvohVwukYQeIsDVfqomtVCx&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"ami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyMBTHGHMdg8kWHJ3qt_CqqYA8ZEMT4_0AavwoK3viJhGeuQli=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a maple latte which was not too sweet and the coffee tasted very smooth I really liked the coffee here! Highly recommend!!The store itself is off the path but it's not very hard to find","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8NDKrfFPomwK1nr3C7Ta1ANVNNvQdGsqSbCEz&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little roaster and a cafe in the heart of Fort Langley area.

The owner is very friendly and the coffee is good. I got their light roast beans and it makes very tasty espresso!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEFOVLU7LTfSoHAjKx6yUIAHCOy0zEZt75pjj2&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Every time I went here, it was closed, until this time I saw that it was open, and I tried it based on the recommendation of many people around me. The taste was great. I recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCqXeDa799MtWNx2t4AjddvawLEiKjOprFrzGT&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"rouzbeh rouzbehani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0d205LJcHEcaMhPRwePn6BMeadKalR0gsnqBp1rUe6BnDhHxf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually try local coffees and cafes, and I usually feel good in the end. Locals usually try much more than famous brands for the taste and quality of their coffee, and they care and respect the customer much more. I also recommend this cafe to everyone and that they are also roasters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO44xNOUAELPc8feelZHMZLDyva_gYgCSxC8-85&fid=0x0:0x72c0c6119bb95aad"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Tantamount Readings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdda01mBRSTdPlI3Id2R0WaI50dVp0HBbZmaMUeYDsgM2cww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a hidden gem that I hope stays hidden but not so hidden that they go out of business! Every time we come, drinks are high quality and service is great. The people working here actually care about their customers and the products they are making. I love that their lemonade and the coffee are equally high quality. Have brought many of my out of town friends and family here and every time they are pleasantly surprised. Hope this place is always a staple in historic Fort Langley.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Robby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ-mLrUBAdbxFI-rq7JMdzcjfcQ46QLRBeK1iakz6QSOQJV1hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute gem! The food was incredibly delicious, the service was impressively quick, and the ambiance was warm and inviting. The fried chicken and waffles were perfectly crispy and flavorful—an absolute treat. The cauliflower 'chicken' wings were out of this world and a must-try for everyone, ev
en non-vegetarians. This spot is perfect for a gathering with family and friends, and I can’t recommend it highly enough. I’ll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTIf1_m3DKZQfuywNYQB7zvF5t8jr9RBh9yq-0&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"carmen e","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVUc_8fh43fFEQy9wzmkwODQOjFiZPwpRa6TaijEnz3fzDAjp4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smoked meats were full of flavour. Service was outstanding. Parking was easy and the portions were fantastic. A great place to dine and love the New Orleans bistro vibe. A pleasant experience and already looking forward to our next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlNhd2971Ljj2bzHbjlZYK0pRFm9M54huIkIRz&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Metellingtruth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2Ixwi5jN-cdh2Vu-fk-hv_6VlCc2I9AVnxQXyHSyTUw_H5WWv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Upper scale restaurant with great comfort foods. The menu is sandwich heavy and they are delicious, the star of the show is the 22 delicious sides you can choose from. The meat dishes are delicious also. The atmosphere is great, it’s very busy so be prepared to wait to be seated and be patient with being served. There is a reason why it’s so busy, the Montreal inspired menu is a fresh change of pace out west.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlr9kIlvozLGFodhRXg3z9GuVcb-nX4-qtZwc_&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Courtney Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyx7MeNfi-eae1uVY7Y9G6xoqjuwf55HncCeIYFmU3QoEapLfn2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great new transplant to Langley. I had heard of this place when it was further out in the Valley but never made it out there. What a neat space. Totally miss judged its size by the outside! It’s huge! Has a very French quarter style. Loads of delicious smoked meats on the menu. Our service was amazing. The waitress gave us a tip of getting the ribs with the sauce on the side, and I would suggest that as well, as you can dip the meat for the amazing sauce but let the meat with its salty rub be the star of the show! We also had the brisket beef dip, the smoked wings and the blackened catfish. This place has 22 sides that do not disappoint as well. We’ll be back with friends for sure. Welcome to Langley Brodeur’s Bistro!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM28bjWKKaxfPoTRwn35E2GiB5qNT3mESZ6GE6n&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Rob Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE8MC497TiO7p2JzTE0vIQpoUNfrufkc1U90jG5UYlRz7ho70a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every so often in life when dining out, the “Wow Factor” sneaks up on you.
We were expecting the average dining experience.
Brodeur’s is anything but.
Their Cobb Salad was a home run including the Tomato Bisque.
My wife couldn’t say enough about her Salmon salad and our son was extremely satisfied with his Beef Dip.
“One of the best”, he stated.
The atmosphere is dynamic.
Their servers are some of the best in the business.
We know you’ll enjoy Brodeur’s as much as we did from the many comments from other guests seated nearby.
With plenty of covered parking with the main door about 50 feet away, that’s a really great sign you’ll be well taken care of.
One of the best dining experiences you can have in the Lower Mainland of Vancouver on Langley’s north side.
Congratulations Brodeur’s, you’ve hit a home run with your format including your excellent customer dining experience.
We’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcZGfM-4dtCwGIc5rL7mP2-e-espMCEjNHDPPV&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Andrena Koch-Schulte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVELDNYR0HaRqqWJ7easUnxTlESOoCrQvhptP7NYFaeZyFJhOKG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic all around   A menu full of choice and staff was charming…  I walked in carrying travel luggage   The young fellow at the front entry offered to carry it.   (I said yes of course)  I’m 50 plus years old, so I don’t think he was flirting… or was he?   They got off to a great start and only progressed from there.   Will definitely be back.   Had a great Cobb salad    I found the pricing was fair.   Great server also!   Attentive!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy1fAWFDe3PLF8kpuBz6fN-iurCtED1xQyYqNv&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for happy hour and it did not disappoint. They had a double Caesar for $9 and it came with celery, bean, olives, shrimp and bacon, but I got 2 shrimps, I assume they ran out of bacon. The food was delicious as well. Definitely would go again. Service was excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-BuZef02TGxc7xml4dX-RpCm0MnEms1BvY-7r&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Nayara Ferreira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW62vboM0fy5NVkcmbVoWLfS4l7sIJerjlDofuPwsVg4_ETyLyW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb! From the appetizers to the dessert, everything was perfect. The brisket we ordered as an appetizer was melt-in-your-mouth tender, the wine selection (a 9oz Cab Sav for $11—such a great deal!) was excellent, and the main courses were equally fantastic. The mac and cheese was delicious, and the crème brûlée was the perfect finishing touch. It’s already our favorite restaurant! I couldn’t recommend it enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxzADpmhGIgXzIz3dbnsmQnH0sETw5tahwbhCl&fid=0x0:0x4c13000de7104ed4"],"When":"2024-12-9"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jordan Blaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_iD6bb17qljNA2aSFr9JfMC0Jg6j51TZ3bv9L9X_-KFOAVyjatg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Such a nice and quiet Italian restaurant. The food is delicious, and the staff are very friendly. I have come here multiple times and had great experiences every time. A great place to go with friends or on a date. The location is good, and you can wonder Fort Langley before or after your meal which is nice. The restaurant is hidden beside Wendell’s so I don’t know if a lot of people know it’s there, so I’ve never had a problem getting a reservation. What I also like about this restaurant is they accommodate bigger groups, even though their restaurant is small. We had a family dinner with about 10 people and they did a wonderful job taking care of all of us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwMM7LSaT5OlSCHdD52o6Z3RPqxXH6GZ2bDBvh\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We chose this place for lunch with our friends, I wish we didn't choose it. The quality of the food is poor, the service is awful, the men who took our order behaved very rudely with disrespect, he didn't take our order politely, he didn't take the bill politely, his behaviour with, racism completely made us feel bad, the amount of food is very small and the taste is ordinary, and it is also expensive compared to the amount. It is not recommended at all Even if you are hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxUpSTRrgtSNr-BJlLo5ebE39rlx3qIMYwNXxY\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Suman Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWA9Ue8ieMt0LJ2dBJ1w71cVbjmtHwxELi3E5si5x1Cseu1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was the best place to celebrate our daughter's Birthday today. With great food and the exact ambience we needed, it was also embellished with a Birthday wish, song and even a dance by the dinner singer. I'd like to thank him and all the rest of the diners who joined the celebration, and for that moment we felt that the place was filled with friends. Very grateful to everyone who made it special for our girl. Appreciate the great service, food and the hospitality of the ever smiling young ladies. Will keep visiting always!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here and it did not disappoint. We ordered Lamb Shank, Pizzas, Pastas, Calamari and Desserts and they were all good. Price was okay and service was awesome too. I liked the Patio dine in which was perfect for summer. We will surely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcMisBVJezJpJcvHJk-qRGkcMXBoSPtXN3NqnO\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Most items ordered were average. The Vongole was a disappointment, dry, and undercooked. The house made bread burnt and hard. Calamari was oily and underseasoned.  Service was okay. Small portions for the price. All the drinks were great. Overall, it was an average experience with average food. The paper menu was pretty dirty with grease and stains, which was a turn-off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzMXK0DzOYgBwFpMDhLLRoVYDP4FsopS3PEShF\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-9-17"},{"Name":"Angie Hallam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDRnMNO_Dh94L5sS51oaWPDwXJ11mwKshglWP_qM8VGKfyd5Oo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing place. Dinner was so good. We had the calamari starter and it was to die for!  Then my hubby and I had the lamb shank with risotto. There are not words expressive enough to say how very good it was. I had tiramisu for dessert and my hubby had the donuts. The atmosphere was great. The service was just wonderful. Their spritzers are so delicious too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV5lVJ2Ml32a890sChJL5pIIunZTmKzBFAoEkb\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem, great spot for family reunions or date night. Cozy dining room and private rear patio. Food is fresh and high quality but the dome pizzas are exceptional. Prices are on the higher end side but with their service and high quality ingredients it’s worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkaN21ZfqPFep2L-fP35pJVDiThZrGVVzogSRJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2021-8-21"},{"Name":"Angel Claypool","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInCmqnFK0WQ5UkL5con4MyZ2CXnepe1BfBoPVhZubxkFygiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I had lunch there on Remembrance Day. We shared a Fungi Pizza and the Chicken Pesto spaghetti. We were impressed with both. It was so nice watching the chef putting wood in the oven before making our pizza. The pasta was really tasty and served perfectly cooked. The staff were all really friendly and the service was great. What a great little hidden gem in Fort Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2uWOCXA2ZIwv-imi-k6kp8nIh5xt7OHJt-QY0\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tatiana T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbV5oHD9SloAtfH4Zg1CEzy_yx6stGLlZgzeQBxiJeZaZGfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Everything looked great but ended up being extremely salty. We went there for our anniversary and had gotten there for happy hour. We were looking forward to having oysters which they said they were out of. I was like ok maybe super popular for happy hour. We then ordered the shrimp cocktail which was good and then the crab cakes which were ok. We got the kids chicken and fries and the chicken was over salted. It’s fine I said since it’s a whole chicken breast and seasoning was just on the outside.
I asked the server by chance if the oysters were out only for happy hour, she said nope gone for the whole day. (Just thought I’d check.)
We proceeded to order dinner. We got the wagyu carpaccio which in itself was good and the capers understandably would be salty.
Then our main came, I got the flat iron with creamed corn and Yorkshire pudding. My husband got the sirloin creamed corn green beans and added a lobster tail.
My steak was super salty I had to scrape the seasoning off and my husband’s steak a New York striploin which was supposed to be rare “Chicago style” was medium rare closer to medium. Not sure what happened for our steaks to be cooked that way when the price tag is at that level.
Anyways what got me disappointed was that being out of “oysters” turned out to be false cause you guys ended up having 5 bags of oysters restocked at 5pm, I know cause I saw them pour bucket fulls of ice and then open the bags. Overall I had great expectations for you guys and got sadly disappointed especially going for a special occasion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyO1xRdgHdUdojxtqCzkYbZd4fXqMo9VFGaccx&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My fiancé and I came in on Sunday, July 14. He ordered the fish, which he loved, I tried the filet steak and it was dry, tough and flavorless. I requested some peppercorn sauce but that did not help matters. A high end steak should not come out like that. My fries were half good but half were small crunchy grease sticks. I pointed it out to Abby our server, and she just kinda giggled and said "oh sorry," and that was the end of the conversation. Although she seemed nice enough she didn't seem to know to ask how the rest of our meal was. I thought maybe she's new so I asked her how long she'd been there and she said "about a year and a half." I was taken aback.
I was rather dissapointed with my dinner and that we had used a gift card that friends had gifted us.
The chef sent out a complimentary item before our dinner and THAT was a sweet touch and delicious.
The atmosphere was delightful and the music was at an appropriate volume for conversation.
I would hope that IF we do return to this location that perhaps some training takes place on returning to table, making sure guests are happy and that the food is good.

Ms. Fancy
Google Reviewer
9 million + picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZA18O2CNYpwR0Wx8StmYMN2UGACJ92hj_s1w7&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"April","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlKY6gDYkk6ATbaZCFZffBjnuW8BPndntWAkSybL5P35CsbfwJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service/server was great. We were seated in a circle booth and 2/6 people in our group felt something was crawling on their skin but couldn't see what it was exactly because it was dark but they saw something crawl in between the seat gap at the end of our stay - because of this I would not be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvPtHIQVu_PCkPTFg6vNvUdz10gIDzfSTpcZJI&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very stylish interior, large space. Disappointed that they were out of several beers on tap. Steelhead was properly cooked but looked pretty much the same as a 'bowl' (which it wasn't) - expected more presentation and substance for $42. Chicken bowl was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk3OV0ZwsbK8A7AbWNqDkf1mrFcX4E5a4R7VCg&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"T G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHxIAWTJyeUKomBVztb2dp8Ua32R5CP6NVyFBXY_4gaY3BvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A group of 10 of us went there Dec 21 and had a great time. A special thank you to our waitress Julia who was attentive, and extremely courteous as well as Samantha Baker who helped make my birthday extra special for sure. We will all be back again for sure. The food was great and literally served up quite fast considering how busy they all were in there. No one had to wait for drinks all very satisfied when we left. Thanks Sam &Julia","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill knox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSRV11XH3-3P7ySnqI01hySFkx75lkH_2ysCH7LkCeT5zF-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After spending a pleasant day at the Langley event center, we wanted a nice place to have dinner, and S@L was 2 minutes down the road. The outside is very nice and welcoming, as is the inside.
The interior decor has lots of surprises from cows and knives on the wall to the fireplace in the woman's bathroom.  We were constantly looking and exploring with our eyes. The menu was a marvel to look at, and we decided to have the seafood tower along with the potato rolls and prosciutto asparagus.  This was almost too much food for 3 people.  But to finish off the meal we had the black forest chocolate bomb. It was a very nice way to finish the meal as a share plate between the 3 of us. Overall, we had excellent service from Abby, and food to table time was extraordinary. Everyone chipped in to deliver food and take plates away. This is the way to run a restaurant. The only thing that keeps this from being a 5 star review is the chips of wood missing from all around the dining room, and it felt like my seat on the bench was falling apart. What does it take to hire someone for an hour to repair these tiny things that are keeping the restaurant from being everything it could be?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkmMwThyqsqNWQD_1UjbiZd-rJZAEV5yit2yqK&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"Sara Goray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzKzyISWVrev_W-0uuOkO6uhQ5reqRdi2C9oT3FD6L_ltdlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered take out.  After waiting two hours, it arrived completely raw, cold and inedible.  Please note the “crispy cauliflower entree” for $26.50","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjj9AE9I-8-qf9VfHryQFWP7kKsbCnSHVguS2Q&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Daman Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNByJJlysFlwHdemqXqfSFTmUYUn2z8dV-KY--u9U8Ffuk7j4y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really enjoyed the food and loved the vibe too. We were celebrating our wedding anniversary and there was a congratulations card on the table which was such a nice gesture and then we got a couple glasses of bubbles on the house 🥂
Overall, it was a great experience! Thanks 🥰 ✨️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5KKYScnacdXCpeSshKPMCV5YrpT4W8xTYX7S-&fid=0x0:0x97b545a6613ea751"],"When":"2024-4-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVT4VIguuWaBPRzr3vwjMN5Oxv5461iYNuM4q-kfJX1dGCzcrcp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was given a gift certificate for this eatery. Had not been before, but was hesitant due to having tried a few other “plant based” places that were mediocre at best. Had lunch with a non plant based friend. Shared the egg bites, both of us were pleased with taste and texture. Had the Basic B** bowl, was pleasantly satisfied with the various flavours and textures.
Would and will recommend to others.
Four stars on atmosphere- arrived before noon and had to wait to finish sentence or speak louder to compensate for the active heavy duty kitchen equipment.
Parking - street","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwJoq_fWNv7T55hkDw8RtMkoy8IFBg2juVbYry&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Elisa Kazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnXq79FXK6SM_3Qr0x9E7eqGAf2iM5e785pouauMfz2nICrvAIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely incredible spot! Hands down one of my new favourite vegan cafes. I only wish they had a downtown Vancouver location.

I’m not vegan but I love trying plant based foods and this place knocked it out of the park! Absolutely delicious!! We got the breakfast wrap and the mushroom toastie to share and they were both so so good! I am someone who does not like Parmesan (crazy I know) but the vegan cashew version they had here was amazing! I couldn’t get enough of it! I wish I got to try the S’mores Cookie but I guess I’ll just have to come back again.

Such a cute restaurant, friendly staff and delicious food! Highly HIGHLY recommend stopping in for lunch. They are also on Plant Curious right now (fall 2024) so we got to use our coupon too, such a happy day :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV3ailJc9nG0a8fH-bt_3wEHwBkNi2QquRuM0r&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Tal Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdcX5lteMW7YGdoBC5XzBwLnJaPXqogWXPCXIWpiTDj9lk9pSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grounds & Greens Cafe: A Promising Addition to Fort Langley

Located in the heart of Fort Langley, Grounds & Greens Cafe offers a refreshing twist as a fully plant-based restaurant. Recently opened, my family and I decided to visit for lunch on their opening day.

The food at Grounds & Greens Cafe exceeded our expectations. Each dish was meticulously crafted, showcasing a creative blend of flavors and textures that highlighted the versatility of plant-based ingredients. From a vibrant appy to hearty mains, every bite was a testament to their dedication to quality and taste.

Equally impressive was the service we received. Despite being their opening day, the staff were attentive, knowledgeable, and genuinely passionate about the menu offerings. They accommodated our requests with a smile, contributing to a warm and inviting atmosphere.

The beverages, including the hot drinks, were also commendable. Expertly prepared, they complemented our meal perfectly and were a delightful addition to the dining experience.

However, it's worth noting that Grounds & Greens Cafe leans towards the pricier side, which might be a consideration for some patrons. Nonetheless, the quality of food, exemplary service, and the overall ambiance make it a worthwhile dining destination in Fort Langley.

In conclusion, Grounds & Greens Cafe has firmly established itself as a standout option for plant-based dining in Fort Langley. Whether you're a vegan enthusiast or simply looking to explore innovative cuisine, this restaurant promises a memorable and satisfying experience. We look forward to returning to sample more of their enticing menu offerings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLsUyrJXTJv15UIUfF5C4b0D9eSV6Imt1D1tyu&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"turnedofftvgrey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgq514V9RrfRkAHdCgQAOAZ2PwHOFzjma-ZVxWBUPcYqh-3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grounds & Greens has always been our go to favorite place when in the White Rock area and we were so thrilled when the announced their second location in Fort Langley.

We’ve taken non vegan / plant based friends here and they’ve always thoroughly  enjoyed the food. Who knew anyone could crave a salad bowl so much. The pastries will fool anyone who wasn’t aware it is plant based and the smoothies are a nice option for us non coffee or alcohol drinkers.

The staff are great and are so good about slight modifications for our kiddo.

They have a super simple to use returnables program that makes it easy to reduce all the single use package for take out and to go orders.

This will be our weekly go to spot now that they are open in Fort Langley and closer to our home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNACKxjrfiZRPJA6mPDQ7Xr5juzi0zEYL8oMFm&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"madison summers-kiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW6N_D8whi4OteZ_96P7UBqKtmoaWV7BldXWVRbYwOmRnaDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute favourite place in Fort Langley! Their food is unmatched whether you are following a plant based diet or not. Their staff are always so friendly and accommodating. I cannot recommend them enough! (You’ve gotta try the influencer bowl)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-1cH_A6kRRTSN7-kroMwUJR3AOrh6UYb0PhEG&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kristine Cavey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzB7YyNoTZcERBq3E2sz0G5Lf3K_zwDnwVyISed2DzOoN6XOhvRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The second location finally opened!! So glad to have GG located closer to home. Expect the same delectable vegan food, exceptional service, and all-round cleanliness as the White Rock location. The only difference is that it’s situated in the cutest little area in the Fraser Valley, Fort Langley. This will be a local favourite for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGOwwepVpoaPjqDURzm-tEg538ITD6HbDTI9dA&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Greg.Ashley Terepka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDi0002HXiRAamLSx5CpEnhWYa_0IZbC7PcJTteOWsZ_JIjJUP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Come here and come often  because every single dish which my wife and I have had were DELICIOUS!! Restaurant has no only moved to a sustainable model (adding reusable containers) but they have also removed seed oils from many of their dishes! Congratulations one the new opening!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVBnfNMW83O9UUyLbqwfJf1zPZYI0BuTmpMz7S&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Tara Treacy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUaMCFHAnvs5c23mM7gEoCIOSiUkeKiKWWHaxv7-E4QgUQW_xPRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely vegan cafe with lots of gluten free options!! The owner was very chatty and helpful! The food was 10/10! A must if you are in Fort Langley!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4PEUpYIbSTw_3fvGsDDQFfgo3Xf4ee_OZDAu-&fid=0x0:0xf7d35b852e3ea9d7"],"When":"2024-9-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vanessa Becker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjP-M2atXZC7s46eJ4wd5XC-RHr2pn3fRoPwoLQqghdxSrQBA9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Eggbomb is a super cute place to try out. They have so many fun drinks on their menu. My husband and I both enjoyed our sandwiches, they were huge! The eggs were cooked perfectly and the bread was delicious.
We went on a busy Saturday and knew we’d probably have to wait, there is an easy check in for waiting in line, no reservations. The restaurant is small.
The front door lacked an accessible button for wheelchair users or strollers, an easy fix to be more welcoming.
The chairs can be moved to make space for wheelchairs.
There are two individual bathroom stalls, one is larger for accessibility.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSsLMOkFSiQ3I7_IKbKomZdZzIIs4POyBCU_tK&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"James Geisinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUlhWyXY48zdpRt7zZErxEMiN2iJHNX8puFCQFrlhAwzXGQ6LM_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious. A little pricey for what it is. The menu was terrible - 30 or so pages in page protectors that were bent up and dirty. Mostly pictures and arranged in a way that was very hard to understand and follow. Most of the pages contain pictures that could have been put online with a QR code - so much more professional and cleaner. We sat originally at a small bar inside facing a window that has a table directly in front of us. We moved to a table that opened up on the patio which is right beside traffic filthy garbage from the street everywhere not an appetizing location. Well the food was good I did notice there was no regular egg dishes that one would expect it in a restaurant. All chef creations which are all well and good but preclude a family coming to eat. Was nice to try it out but we will not be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9IBqy2u7u6dXhwe0emQ6T19jJcrstQxdP8S7h&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a quality place for having breakfast. Food was delicious. My son doesn’t like eggs but he ate half of the egg -ham sandwich 🥪 on the pic you can see.

Recommended! 🤟🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1bBFuEkXFjBKttEY9VUKm9bGz2Z0eWotELVvC&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Trevor Ball","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0frHcSKEK2V-1uRZ1eE2LEFeXrCisGR32zw3WNqrTc1SQtIjS_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this place is absolutely incredible!!!!!!

definitely going to be back, the breakfast sandwich that I had was the spicy ham and cheese, and it was unbelievable because the bread is so thick and buttery. if you're gluten-free, this is not your choice.

we also had the egg calm, and it was unbelievable as well. scrambled eggs are done to perfection.

we both had lattes, I had the pistachio latte, and she had the banana latte.

if you haven't been here, don't be dumb, just get in your car, get on your bike or run to Egg Bomb!!!

JUST GO!

As Terminator would say.... I'LL BE BACK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQG1Q0lgBxWC586oympRWa6DM1HC9gsmXlaeI8&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Gazal G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNfRt6AYTRne5R5YyIlS82FlCPvw6yjMF8Wl3AyoUgCtB2w_8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"An extremely expensive cafe, with very delicious and beautifully presented food, but also very pricey! The staff were nice, everything was cute, but very confusing—I didn’t know what to order. Photos of the dishes would have been helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-q-olRWEPbNpl58D6EYhBaHxs2BGnzwLGH12j&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Marcee Hampton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQltwaS-c2dRxrbI8k8noJWroF5fLdRUhJGAfiNAo-uCKNzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in town for our son’s steel band tour and spotted this restaurant that was close to our hotel.
I browsed the menu online and one I wanted to try it. I am a huge fan of all things Korean and this establishment was amazing.
The breakfast was delicious and beautiful. The food was so fresh.
The service was friendly and fast.
The restaurant was very clean, including the bathrooms.
While we ate there was a couple that came in with a large German Shepard and sat outside on the patio. I loved seeing that it was dog friendly.
I ordered a breakfast sandwich and a chai latte. My husband got the croffles.
Would highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-hTpvfwsy9Kh19mFay_9oBdzWBEQY_5syA4fk&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Soeun Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGxT7R49a_opx58SkfmQEiVqxllWdvoH88dj5QPV0qDRazHB9y0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly the best brunch place ever! Every menu was so delicious!! The coffee’s great. Kids loved the place too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMDMPBnkGeAQ-qP5GjP-Rh7jqrTxCGg1aVnBXz&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of seating. Huge menu with tons of options. We ordered 2 salads and a sandwich with a bunch of drinks and some desserts between the 4 of us.

The macarons are well designed. Sturdy. Lots of flavour and well balanced. The characters were cute. We got the Totoro and Hello Kitty ones.

Sandwich was well put together and great presentation. However the egg was rather plain vs other places with the same style “sando”.

Chicken was cooked well for the salad, but was just run of the mill salad-wise (nothing extraordinary). Salmon was good - but it’s hard to mess up Salmon :).

All in all a good experience. I’d visit again if we were in this area again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWjaWNFxBKkEZ4izlpMXWKGUa_jE9t4T7mqacE&fid=0x0:0x2c102e0857540a66"],"When":"2024-6-23"}]

title: Sushi Gio Japanese Restaurant

descriptions: Contemporary, casual venue offering creative sushi & sashimi options plus other Japanese fare.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Manmeet Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAFj9DrnYycDPwPe308BqNgQ5LPf_kkdLO8iQvK63Eh4cUkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have no complaints! The atmosphere is so beautiful and though, more on the darker side when you first walk in, regardless the lights really do add a nice touch!

The food is really what makes them shine. I ordered the vegetarian combo (that consisted of a kappa roll, veggie roll, and inari pieces) and yam tempura roll. They are made with such perfection and you can tell they took their time. I love the spicy mayo with it as well. I have gone there many times for my lunch break and they are quite fast and efficient, and always ask for anything that you may need. I recommend it to my friends, it is definitely worth it coming here from Surrey!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUbnz80v5myfgo5lzw3wMOMKHAt6fEXvsL3ntX&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Brittany S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eFQkj626t8zGBNhG1j682nXYAY3vJkS1VdBBUNRvZlKC0L6p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in for lunch with the boss and tried a few things!
I ordered Miso Soup, Ebi Sunomono, Edamame, Agedashi Tofu and a Spicy Tuna Roll.
As soon as we arrived we were greeted with very friendly front end staff seated quickly and brought fresh hot tea.
Everything was absolutely amazing and we were checked on a few times during our hour visit.
The Mango sauce for the tofu was good but somewhat hard to get on the tofu. The thin sauce and the spicy sauce were my favorite and absorbed into the tofu nicely while staying crisp.
The only item I didn't super prefer was the spicy tuna roll and this is generally my go-to roll. I found the filling texture a bit off for my liking it was more of a ground tuna mixed with spicy sauce. Taste was good but texture wasn't for me. Will return to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh7Gq9KuGdEQacgTY7mRdSWDO0kDuBh4nLoupO&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJLdrp4_-PzGWs8I7cbVIruptxWktGjE-_19gAKtYsnjV7T8DB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First, it was a really hot day when I went, so the dimmer lights and cold AC here was a huge relief. The staff were friendly and very quick, efficiently refilling our cups and keeping an eye out for anyone waving to get attention. Food was delicious, great both visually and in our mouths!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfe9osj4HXojqhtyeD0ZIcd-5F0SJ_SUHr24a8&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"Savannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn2CD0vRivO2-5giVteHZMjb-4fmhyLsD9FrkqVRezsAZo_yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picture perfect dishes and friendly staff!

The food is presented so nicely you can’t help but take a picture. The staff were very knowledgeable in the different kinds of dishes offered. The inside of the restaurant is well decorated and clean.

My food was tasty and fresh. I highly recommend checking out Sushi Gio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6Wq4S41aqKhqU0z0tOiqo7v9BX5pUYbFX3vA&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-8-3"},{"Name":"Aaron T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6yeVYoOYlrWiU4-xdpCz0WgE82XOpObn1iG8FrHVsKVO78q4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi spot. Good values on the rolls if you wanna just be full. A huge variety of specialty rolls if you wanna be a little more adventurous.

My yakisoba was so-so. Very catered to the western taste with very little actual "yaki" but I feel like most people would like it and the price was right","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyUwrTf0acRjLKUVrWxI_ggE9JV_9ork_Jrfag&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-7-16"},{"Name":"Justin J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9qB0BPnH-SxgmMKD9knqz657T2834b2TJgDxXzOsqhmSY7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Neat little spot for sushi. Like their aburi and fusion sushi rolls which are unique. Rolls and sashimi is comparable to other sushi places. Prices are a little higher but every order I had tasted great! Friendly staff. Sometimes it is a long wait for items on a busy or slow day, hence the 4/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKsvNJgdyVhkWGVkShc4cirIQB8FoviUkCvHLU&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2022-7-13"},{"Name":"Enza Filippone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_4T1sn4KIogGwerK4mNB3SJHh_N5oTotv9Hj7N7yIInmloIes1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was very good, nice presentation , the spicy sauce for the agedashi tofu was a simply chinese syracha as its flavor was very garlicky, i was expecting a different more authentic sauce.
Overall good, but  lost 1 star because they don't offer the miso soup as a starter of the meal included with the bento as any other sushi restaurant offer. I find the miso a characteristic staple, and it prepares your stomach for the following entrees.
The atmosphere is nice, although they keep the music ( modern reggeton or pop) too loud for being a restaurant. I like to talk and hear what my guests are saying, and that was almost impossible without raising our voices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtWoVpeE5uvUTCb3D7bT8eZS5lP-Q5jSo0mUHM&fid=0x0:0xdc93bf01ac003035"],"When":"2023-1-29"},{"Name":"Valeria R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSwuyFcBm1yunK39jYL4GWencmZHfViUqyImRD3JWI6iVnhJ1W=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The tuna sashimi came decorated with a long dark hair. We returned the dish untouched and the servers were not apologetic what so ever. The reaction we got was as if it's a normal thing to happen at the restaurant.

Their special rolls are overpriced for the poor quality and presentation. The fish was dry and sauce was almost non existent. Needless to say we did not finish the rolls, they did not taste good at all.

Overall service was poor, nobody checked in or apologized for the hair in the food.

Definitely not returning nor will we recommend this restaurant to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Donghee Ellie Bae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVv1rG6UplN9ym3K7gGrRJluSM5q-nSSZFgsvXqHZKkSIIvLQu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The turkey here is the best I’ve ever had in my life. Their dish was tender, had no unpleasant smell, and the stuffing served alongside was absolutely delicious. Our party was perfect thanks to them. If you’re looking for an amazing turkey dish, Cornerstone is the place to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiLjHEpjSE2bTTHi1a_u2g4YDn-SAB9l1GklxD&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Tiana Chong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMHlCFZ6zNPZqaDlKS1a5XBaVZ2q5lWkAvIQIT-uIdqojUXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The inside is well decorated, clean and the music isn't loud. Ordered the fried chicken burger and friend chicken eggs Benny. Placed an order for the black bean fried rice to go for dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO_kjLzuFcVUHgsCUKK8GcvgCS1P9ekt3l_CJm&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Shira Hick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyUcEFUkM4HaZtXQtrIFh3PuxOSSiefOzuF25-OylsYrBC-IU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute little spot! I had brunch here, it was super delicious & the staff is very friendly. I would’ve taken a better picture but the food was so good I ate most of it before I remembered to take one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW8lng9sDPCVaJOoich0ldfPeDOOL63iTP6lK_&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Cindy miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRM-WTLH9rSn6nKQMOv7x2JEHpuJxyeCbmqebxfb7etMaVLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time eating here and the food is wonderful!
There homemade soups are what I stopped in for! The best wanton soup I’ve ever had!!!
They just started being open for dinners and great inside atmosphere! Definitely will be coming back for more yummy homemade soups!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2CvfQu6tmvNGHhvjtBvBlZeL3AH4nVOfeTmWE&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delightful ⭐️
My recommended spinach /avocado omelette was amazing!
I appreciated your attentive and kind service and your cafe so clean and delightful!
I look forward to my next visit!
Your prices, food, atmosphere and service are on point!

Thank you :)

Ms Fancy
Google Reviewer
9 million picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwILf0wTcKFhj07UhJt4ENrnEhhZGI9GP0OiEh&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Tara Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafp5-DbmdXd42lrIMIaPpUa4TG8IACFTFef3W9rqO44JjPcQgRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were pleasantly surprised to be able to get brunch without waiting for a table at this cute little diner. The decor is charming, and the wait staff was attentive. Our food was brought in a prompt manner with the changes we asked for attended to. I had asked for bacon with my French toast and jam instead of syrup and my partner hollandaise on his hash. The coffee was delicious too! We will certainly return when out that way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTASVSFDsgaOwqNoOY7VXmF4DRlfVZU2P8Eo0N&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kyle Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKPlp8ScdX_CwA86J5RNQ-8Jl3j4LC55E1ueX634EqThqYTnxz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My coworkers and I occasionally have lunch at this place. Always great service and food! This is the Megaburger (I asked to substitute chicken instead of the beef)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlKXSOoZz52X045GFMiyPyTJHJ7YnhLggfTn_E&fid=0x0:0x3fc0a58d46266914"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"William Knowles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw_dCMrmQPrxSq1xi-5dXkxYftEv0usWEYHaLqG3CJpwtybA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time going with the family. Easy menu, great breakfast. I had the fried chicken Bennie, was super tasty. Staff was very friendly. Oat milk chai latte was great. I highly recommend if you’re in the area. Wonderful family restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bonnie Acko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7W9_LRpWW1Wg7jrsjcJXqIqtyhH9cmYYWABcZeHaU-SqOAo7N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great breakfast here, food was delicious and good portions. Great service and coffee. It feels like an old fashioned Canadian diner,  a real friendly atmosphere. The family that runs the restaurant are very welcoming and friendly! We will definitely be repeat customers! Thanks so much! ❤️🇨🇦","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_wfNrYM-BvKUqRcwsC_XejuvPt6YhFjeknISx&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Sandra Braga Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb0zhic3XQWJsDL0A4TJ6SQOyjsvK6E15aalppaOgkYRYZH2K2xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best is not just the name of this place.
They mean it!

I love the coffee ( especially when it comes with this adorable kitty spoon) and the food is always great.

They have vegetarian options  and curly fries.

We come here at least once a month and  the service and food are consistently great.

PS: Even if the parking lot is busy on weekends check inside.
There are a lot of hockey families on the outside, but you may get lucky and grab a nice booth followed by amazing food!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNVPmNlDXXaA2zktedx3pZezR4lfvVYaynFGKE&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice diner for breakfast and brunch. Love the option of half bennies if you don’t have a big appetite. Good portions for the regular Their bacon is like thin sliced pork-belly, different from smoky salty bacon, but actually nice. The ambiance is simple, the chairs are rock hard (the benches are better), and they had Tom Jones’  ‘Green green grass of home’ on repeat, but not annoyingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRlwTGF_LLr0_Sb87vMIrmYMuXiCo-kh_e5o8&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Lauren St John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi3pWsd_jh8y8V1Pl7XbMiNRgCVHq-YYCdAOx_KkkOFRnXREk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The "best" greasy spoon place! Loved my salmon egg bennies. Generous portions served in a diner-style venue that's in an industrial area of Langley. Friendly staff. Decent menu. Competitive prices. Good value. Would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQyIadNDb8cy2B0P-dzF8lKmTkuaKj6VhzVeGu&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Kerri Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyd1968zbaqfOY0E9-I8F3-w-rXBcTc5CtbLTOkgw4AYR22IUTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and it was excellent! We will definitely be back! Our order came out much faster than we expected and everything was hot and cooked perfectly.
I had an eggs Benny that I couldn't wait to dive into so  the photo of it is half eaten, and my partner got the dish with the burger patty on rice and said it was very good as well.
Servers were very kind and attentive.

Would recommend to everyone looking for good food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvRXkwxOoXj7LKdwmJ8ae9tsgl6371TD-W50Pa&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Shannon Mundy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKepxe-nWptGEqB20pe6-OmOcvR3_xcn62pIGDl0tlgvg5fYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered via skip. Eggs benedict French toast and a salad. The food phenomenal two differences that I would do stop taping the utensils up impossible to open. Fry the hash browns on both sides not just one side. Other than that perfect.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Qz_zR8NAjeqpRnuANXJcQGSLJzNuS-ETk_THk3z82H5rG6U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great brunch place. Food is fresh and you can tell they put effort into the quality of their food. Ordered sandwich and egg benedict and both were very tasty. If you want a simple breakfast that taste good for decent prices, this place is worth a visit. I have to add, the hash browns were very well made. Crunchy and brown on the surface but soft inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPsGwqgbf3VH--M2ZORLQUwvb5gw8uGl9LB55V&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"John R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL0lMBkSYNzCoU3e3EtZTweMG9yrj7XdtrRXZG14WJ3tNoMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I were on the hunt for a new place for eggs Benedict as Browns Socialhouse changed their version into something that was horrible. After searching Google for the best eggs Benedict near me, they suggested the usual chain restaurants but up popped Best Grill and after looking at this location it seemed to be in a fairly obscure place. My wife remembered seeing it on her drive to work every day and after looking at all the great reviews we figured we'll give it a try and we were not disappointed. The atmosphere is more like a 50s diner and has a very full menu with fresh ingredients. The service is quick the food was excellent and now we know we have a new place to go to. The Eggs Benedict were awesome. Looking forward to trying some other menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSrTH2Tj8o2PBRtCrZOaRyJTy2DIqEC7V7R2aN&fid=0x0:0x12e8d9c8ec59cc15"],"When":"2023-8-14"}]
