user_reviews: [{"Name":"Shadow Catyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIeoVUpVDtQ6x5dfbddF7EvrviiV3NGveU1yu5DVb7HoxAtPIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place, the Manager and staff there are very friendly. Suggested a delicious pizza. BBQ Chicken and what they suggested was add bacon and corn. Sooo good 10/10 definitely a great place! 👍🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT1vpN64J5Id6MaCF90TfxgHFyuHm2y2V5xenH\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f94e3562e86488"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Cassandra Hayes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhPzGRb5vaOczAhNCF7tkeqKa1UqWinFnRE--jqKHBdc9UbVY2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best pizza I've ever had. The staff are friendly and funny, and although I only went to the food truck they made me feel welcome and comfortable. I didn't finish it so I brought the rest home and ate it later, and it was amazing even though it was cold. The ratios are on point and the dough is perfectly cooked. On this pizza, the crust is probably the best part. I cannot recommend enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Batoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqUVzSKn2yBNBRcmUwiUw6eAjjAWSY0ZO5myXfI0MtBkskyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional food and outstanding service! The team at this location truly goes above and beyond to create a memorable dining experience. A special thanks to Emma and Preston for making my visit unforgettable. I was unsure of what to order, but they took the time to recommend a freshly handcrafted pizza, topped with their personal favorites from the wide selection of fresh ingredients. It was absolutely delicious! I highly recommend this location and suggest asking for Emma or Preston to elevate your experience even further.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shahzad Khowaja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_aEvMPn_MH5jznZ_RBiRtBLHnNngbPbXKLzsNq_OhXQ86qg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited fire crust pizza and James is amazing. He helped us make the best pizza we have ever had so far. Amazing hospitality and such a humble human. Highly recommend the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWEsoF_3qJe6ForxPNV2QLmeYqwaUWvAc-YGK9\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f94e3562e86488"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Simran Angi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDdBcB4TZFJjRoCOUbxLYckSAnnpE4gUhnqPAGzf_-Raq7-M6kSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered for pickup and I was greeted at door with smile. The girl who helped me was friendly and explained their rewards program. It was my first time trying their Pizza and was not disappointed. The crust, cheese and toppings were 5/5. Defined coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqpU-__1guYSlo6fHOenc9ZhQnHBBLbhLBohiR\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f94e3562e86488"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Chris Rhodes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4wfTyJAXKccG99Qx-A8h0h87oVEBd-DsEyVXpWMbRmMEKESo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fire Crust Pizza is absolutely incredible! The quality of the ingredients and the flavor of each pizza are unmatched. What made our experience even better was the fantastic service from Angel and Preston. They were friendly, attentive, and went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect. Their attention to detail and enthusiasm really made our visit memorable. Highly recommend Fire Crust Pizza – thanks to Angel and Preston, we’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juno K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa0M9Rr6VdF3uOHElC5kJGWwX87eSFBm2wyjK29Fs45PrlNp_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute favourite pizza place in all of Vancouver. The toppings are fresh and the dough has great texture. It's one of the few pizza places where I finish the entire dough as well.\n\nI always order the combo that comes with a salad. Compared to other restaurants, it's pretty much a full sized salad so the value is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2f2zaSsUOoqi0vMlIgbZWJD7ptnJYWvQ0GImH\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f94e3562e86488"],"When":"2023-12-7"},{"Name":"Elisia Preston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoGFdLYqWZTagEDQYq9UCuI-un8zxcJaCGoqrmqCvi1MLBIO6T=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is the best! The choices are so fun, and the pizza is well made. Kylie, Sarah, Angel and Victoria took great care of us. The milkshakes are a must try. The patio is super cute for sunny days. Cannot recommend highly enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZi53wNdAfX16hWBcz-xaCGgawhBcEHUejdDlH\u0026fid=0x0:0xb2f94e3562e86488"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, great customer service, and great atmosphere.
I feel like they have a bigger portion of food than other places nearby.
Their Benny was served with perfect poached eggs, which were so good.
Personally recommend the omelet dishes, the Philly steak omelet was moist and well balanced with veges and meat.
Definitely would go try more dishes in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2L_GYTYldatrcLfabIGpnzGX3xX5WeBpaW3nx&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Lawrence Lacandula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfi3e35cU96zJJGkk7nxa2yLrVqrq6MqycUwswRzdSuhVKf7xD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food in a somehow industrial area. Service is efficient and friendly. We will definitely be a regular here.
7months after and yes we are still a fan of their food. The Smoked Salmon Egg Benedict is so divine- flavours are delicious and so balance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn3edCDhOV2i_6dEly05EAK4Cdb9-sBpdwFbT_&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"B P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx5LXiqNb9rmzqycwSvm0oGejfC5s7Si61_ns6_WoImlJIm18e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is so yummy! Their omelettes are so fluffy! The staff is super friendly too. Can’t wait to go back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqnIqnzywyhIzXbAunrn0JiV2gfi4nI4yR9uJI&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Shauna Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURWeI9v2UNbZk0uTwXmzSH--OukymD85DXZiaUVON0cQ9rJpBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it here. I just recommend car pooling because parking lot is small. The food and service is amazing, this is my Favorite place ever for breakfast!! Amazing Pancakes and Real whipped cream!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUaXFhXxkcAARbNPPh62GU0T3Pranwu3t1wqjV&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Barry ---","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7w9lOZdpI_JJrG7tsj_BF4aqaUmXHv1GXs1hLY3N061lodfJa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here.

Great little restaurant!  Really good food and good prices for what you get.

Got an omelette and the pancake combo. Both were really good and the omelette was absolutely loaded with ingredients.

Parking is a bit dicey depending on how busy the lot is.

Will definitely be back.

Would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjkte0mKnlYaBEIlDTxMYGIBMOEkfiSxBWg0gw&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Kiky Kiks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgIvVxxSYrbvp4RuGlQoIF1h8IVgflOoKH0hZNsG2lqQIRbhkfUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good restaurant, it's on the smaller side, but if u r lucky - it might be a slower day, u ll get seated right away; if it's busy it's usually about 30 mins wait. The staff is friendly, the food comes out pretty fast, the portions are big - you get 3 eggs for your Eggs Benedict 😳👍and the price is decent. Don't expect anything fancy, it's basic and clean, with good food and friendly staff. Great brunch place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD-ETaA0jAQ9G6tu_jAbYc260R89wSntDgEap7&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Andrew Gaudet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOLu4aR_S7XPHh8hmADlyGir6MF_Mw1r8lRlZMEB-vCJ_0iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to buy soup for my crew, and the price was fair. $5 for a small soup. I believe it was clam chowder. UNREAL. Very tasty, the dill complements the soup nicely. I came back with my brother shortly after to get a large soup and try the BLT. Very very good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Lamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxMV720K156UlWiPoX74pPRNfTqO_xMWxyKMj7B2cW7Z_FSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"THE BEST THERE IS!!! It’s quite far to drive to Northern Cafe from Langley and the lines there are terrible - that being said who cares! Roadrunner is amazing! The staff are so lovely and the food is the delicious. I highly recommend this place for breakfast.
The shredded hashbrowns are INSANE","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOizl0qdoLCXbbzsvGysws_vsQoZ43KNd1qxPqy&fid=0x0:0x2cc5bd5f08f128ab"],"When":"2023-11-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Boayes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjRQI-gc2UcMV-KDQ04Efc9YVTz0P7EzFU6DQMAGE8j-JqF0-z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing dinner here! Jasmine was our server, and she was incredible—so attentive and kind, checking in with us every 5 minutes to make sure everything was perfect. The food was outstanding, with rich flavors and super fresh ingredients in both the meats and veggies.

Our favorites were the fish pakora, butter chicken, and the baked eggplant dish (baingan bharta—so smoky and flavorful!). The ambiance was also spot-on: clean and modern décor, great music, and a lively vibe. We really appreciated the owner stopping by to check on all the tables—it gave a nice personal touch.

We’ll definitely be back soon! Highly recommend if you’re looking for delicious food and excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd2vXvaCD60mU6dtLDB1JXAL761GBaVmvODMEw&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Lawrence C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxVMHq3fFLOwcvfLxZFd8kk0GtI64zfNveegZnvEt40NruuDLY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time visit. Excellent place. Well upscale decor'd. Food was well cooked and tasty. Hot naan was soft and with good charred smell. Nice place for short gathering. Really love it. Already intro'd friends to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3U_s6U-tWKUmWEKXyt8_R-jdop5I7xWynj3lv&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Arugula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfskdG3gPQfjcZCkJkHF0tc1mtATONBAaeETvFMjVPCrfkz9eH1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious we had goat special dish and vegetable korma and naan filled with potatoes.
Everything was cooked very tasty.
The service was quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgDwOeayccT1WSHiWnhV3TCUx4y2Inxoiz0up6&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Vineet Verghese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxCVdxz8fmSrksMDop68s6o10lM6HkPN3s189Sw3SepfCSAHs9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I love going to An Indian Affair for our date nights and tonight we were served by Jasmine, who was such a wonderful server. She is prompt, attentive and happy to serve. Food was excellent and or cocktails were amazing! Thanks Gary and team for your consistent service delivery. We really love the new look and feel of the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAXSDdWyjvOkijxENl1ICORvVUQ1DwMN3GJeYG&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Cindy Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2x3WTsaq24Va-C0OXivTxrAK9IBM0CBE-EtTx2p0pPPdLzcxqkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the lunch buffet and had a really great experience.

Food: really great selection and the flavours were amazing. Generous amount of meat and the Naan is fresh and unlimited.

Service: Ishika was our server and she was so kind and sweet and attentive! She made us feel really taken care of throughout the entire meal 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMPfgqtSs9MQmeheq-NSmaIjFzwtaUWRIFQRFe&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"shampi jamba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVitlJ9E32dY8QdPHbTyf2w8HnAJcYRS9Q9WCynVcaFDzGrTiDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"we are from Edmonton,i search this place on google,I had an amazing meal at  An Indian Affair restaurant! The vegetarian food was absolutely delicious. The spices were perfect and everything tasted so fresh. The restaurant has a cozy vibe and the staff girl ISHIKA ARE super friendly and helpful. If you’re looking for great Indian vegetarian food in Canada, this is the place to go. I’m definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUx3LgULdo2YeL_wUzQ-GObUgkLx2w7Xjdf-hN&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Viktorya Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNnefadDinfRgker522lJnI0wXv4nlA_KLb_ruLOhzPa5m-VPzQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic food. The lamb chops are unreal, and they are so tender you can just cut them with a fork. Perfectly seasoned. One of my favorite local Indian restaurants to dine in at.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqSkKJFxTvSpy54HPTwILinT5CNwSHWJ8wEV5g&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"S A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOMOiZKMkVhzEB7ZORr37dwap2afh8DAG6IHDyoctwDav8XVN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our second visit to Indian Affair, and it never disappoints! We arrived around 4:30 pm—busy but not crowded—and ordered some chicken wings in two different flavors, fish pakora, and a glass of wine. Perfect for satisfying our cravings!

Fish Pakora - Crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside, and paired with their house-made chipotle sauce that’s simply amazing! (5/5)

Chicken Tandoori Wings - The smoky flavor is spot-on, and with the mint sauce, it’s a treat for the taste buds. (5/5)

Chicken Schezwan Wings - Good, but could be a bit spicier and juicier. (3.5/5)

Wine - Complements the meal well! (4/5)

We also love the warm and friendly ambiance, and the staff who is friendly and warm!There’s a happy hour, and they seem to offer something new every day. This wasn’t quite lunchtime or dinner, so we didn’t get to try more, but whenever we’re in Langley, we’ll definitely be back to explore the menu further!

—————————————————————————
We loved the food and ambiance here! We visited around 1:20 PM, and it wasn't crowded. They offer a daily buffet until 2:30 PM.

Food: The starters are amazing and the buffet is worth the price, with special mention to the fish pakora, tandoori chicken, and chicken samosa - all delicious. 5/5 They also have quinoa salad, mac and cheese, and other dishes as well.

Main Courses: The buffet includes butter chicken, naan, veg pulao rice, baigan ka bhartha, yellow curry, aloo palak, chicken curry, and lamb curry. We particularly liked the butter chicken and lamb - 3.75/5 while the other curries were decent but less spicy - 3/5

Desserts: The buffet also had gulab jamun, rice pudding, and tea. The only thing is gulab jamun was broken and they all tasted good, especially the chai - 4.5/5

Apart from the buffet, I ordered coconut prawns and a lime mojito. The coconut prawns were absolutely delicious - 5/5, and the mojito was well-balanced without too much ice - 4/5

Service: Ishika helped us today, and we really liked her. She approached us with a warm smile, offered timely help, suggested good food choices, and also informed us about the happy hour. She has pretty good knowledge about the drinks and good. We'll definitely visit again to enjoy the happy hour with more friends this time.

Atmosphere:A quiet, fine-dining ambiance. I really liked the jade green chairs, clean washrooms, and the spacious occupancy, suitable for parties and team lunches.

Overall, we had the best experience and would rate it 5/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODIlFxf0jKmU0WhAlie3MnmfPJk0UGHxP2yJuS&fid=0x0:0x7e3802fbec3226f2"],"When":"2024-5-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angela Landymore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeDqQJEI7jhShjDMDF5a7C3Y9Hk8Yhvgi-eIOWnEw5NZjCXgMp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service is fantastic...they make you feel like you've sat down at the family dinner table! Food is so delicious,  and the atmosphere & decor are absolutely perfect.  Go on a Friday night to be treated to amazing live music by a very talented gentleman! There is even an adorable kids play area - what a great idea! And it is extremely clean; I saw the staff cleaning the kids area twice while we were there, same with the washrooms which were also very clean. We will be repeat customers for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUhl1kvSjqGCOtBqEO6jM8Qg2NVXejh85RzDqB&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza. The crust is thin with a great texture , thank goodness. This helps when you need to warm it as leftovers. The marinara is not too salty or overpowering, which blends well with the toppings. Ambience is great and cost and can accommodate varying seating arrangements and group bookings. Service is also great as they are able to accommodate my requests to pack veggies separately. I would recommend this place as the best in the Langley environs","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfgYLNJhNi6aFn1qbnfmjnxzDVdZs9V9GmDwGS&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pretty disappointed ☹️ especially with the great ratings I read on here beforehand.

Pasta was so overcooked, it was all mush and stuck together, the chicken texture tasted like the ones from subway, and the dish needed salt? Or more pesto? .

The pizza was just OK, your normal local pizza takeout chains are better IMO.

The best things from this meal was the cheesey bread, and drinks.

Maybe I’ll try this place again one day, but for now, I’ve been left so unimpressed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyMLACzfZy8gUTHbFve0FbgNfJ2XtyWVA3R0HV&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"becky Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAcpzr_qZ0tHJ8i2epPczMv5nMp1TE0nZA9oYeqQ7f10pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seldom go to Langley and didn't expect much for good food. But Pizza Garden Lounge really impressed me. Nothing can complain. The food was good. Very nice environment. And love the service, of course. You can feel the chef makes the dishes  wholeheartedly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH33xPL-0TxVxaEcxg01p5ZjTxh3Mihxd2-_Y&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Yarek Hrywna Rivers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyhZ0JNTGGWwYVQc2x2RhSIADMCn9tcvBXTWwguc7T4aIyUAm7dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With so much mediocre (and frankly, bad) pizza around, it's always a delight to find genuinely good food.  Had the arugula and prosciutto pizza and it was delicious!  Will definitely be back.  Cozy little place, and very attentive staff.  There was live music later on that day, but couldn't stay for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMadXjdMYGjxU5flNSa1_D7nq7EokdI-30eExvv&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is 5 stars! Aysegul was 10 stars!

Everybody is smiling food was amazing , music was awesome! We enjoyed our moments.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZviUDqdziHbyEyOZe9PRmKThveC2eyhgg1kvX&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Dana Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWns9Obqs0woSr1Ts68KiDwp_BFLjIHf7KQr8QzjN-qYhkyxpV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza tastes really authentic here. Thin crust pizza with generous ingredients. Even though the store was busy, the service was quick and friendly. The interior design was classic Turkish style with lots plants, very much ins style. The cutlet were all from Turkey with special design, very cute. They also had little indoor playground space for little kids. This restaurant is very family oriented. I felt parents can enjoy the foods and relax at the same time being provided a safe space for their kids while they dine. The price is reasonable but I found the quantity is a bit in less side. Overall, very recommended, and will come back again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMg6PmZLEBLMf8K2XP8bLAlncR5wG9C1N7VkZG&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJLdrp4_-PzGWs8I7cbVIruptxWktGjE-_19gAKtYsnjV7T8DB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I arrived with someone who wasn’t even a pizza fan but we heard they also had pasta options do we stopped by. Cozy place, lots of fun decor with cute mismatched furniture, and the food was delicious! Staff was amazing too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7oj6xFJZwVBeYR5psWOVHzNtMhQxgtnv8ZEnh&fid=0x0:0xbd02d50ab3beae82"],"When":"2024-6-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Colin Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk81cVmo3yWDzrWIoGkyXARTxEQPH_Om4zV8kxcEUg4fdCJnE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Starting with the food; We had the Green Curry (Beef), Drunken Noodles (Chicken) and Satay.

The satay skewers were great and had a lot of meat on them. Probably more than I’ve ever had at a Thai restaurant.

The green curry was good, a bit runny and the beef was not the best I’ve had. My wife switched plates with me and loved it though.

The drunken noodles were amazing and came out hot and spicy with great flavour!

The service was great. Came at dinner time on a Sunday and were sat at our choice of seat (we chose the patio). Order was take quickly and food came out likewise. A great service experience.

The atmosphere on the patio is charming and  rustic with live plants and soft music.

All in all a great experience and one of go to restaurants in the Fraser Valley.

Picture of the satay is missing 3 skewers because we couldn’t wait to try them! 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeEQ9juPEdh8AiEFtUgUW7J-ElpIiGqHADoUWo&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Mori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzjNclSLYHoLurDMy1z6lBJJfgC1i3gQXUk28JpQQw8EIfuYkF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for dinner on a weekday, there were 3 adults and 2 kids. Had reservations for dinner as this place filled up quickly.
We ordered a few dishes to share, including an appy platter.
The food was good and each dish was a nice size portion. The green curry was probably the star dish of the evening as the flavors were on point along with the requested medium spice level.
The dishes we ordered were quite expensive for what it was though, for example, the green curry with tofu was $25.50. This definitely isn't a place you'd regularly go to for dinner unless you don't care about saving money.
The service was okay, the soup came to our table about 15 minutes after 3 of the 4 dishes arrived at our table and the server checked up on us once to see how everything was, which was before we even got the soup. Then the next time anyone checked up on us, it was when we were done and ready for the bill.
All in all, it's a decent Thai food spot and a spot that you should try at least once if you're in the area.

2024/09/23
Came here on a Sunday evening for dinner, 5 adults and 2 kids.
The food was good and the service was relatively the same as the last, all dishes arrived relatively at the same time, except for one dish, which arrived about 10-12 minutes after the majority of the dishes arrived.
The good thing is that the dishes have been consistent the two times I have been here and dinner times tend to get busy at this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNjcEUqe_4fiiowRtfAy-ggXeFpQ4AOJgFtKVO&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came with a large group of 9 people so had a chance to order multiple dishes. Most of us are Asian and very familiar with Thai food, we had visitors from Asia visiting us, and we wanted to treat them to a great meal..
The sampler was ok. The Red Curry Chicken was very nice, the Papaya salad was tasty, and the Pineapple Fried Rice was good too - good portions too. The Fried Snapper was disappointing (more batter than fish). The Spicy Calamari were very small pieces and a bit soggy (probably due to the wet garnish on the plate). The Pad Thai was ok, but a bit surprised the noodles were thinner than we expected. Deserts were ok. So overall, we were a bit disappointed treating our guests to Thai food, hence we only give 3 stars. It's a nice place, and staff are very pleasant. Perhaps we were just unlucky this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMJx1stvws1cj5Rdvw-K0oXL4Qqt55rP8U69I&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Kyle Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQa9hd5VqfhYkf7Se1SaeGQ890P9TQE7u9P6JtEfExGxdCnOT8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely terrible service today, we were there for a dining time of 50 minutes not too short not too long. We felt like we were a bother and got pestered over 8-9 times if we were finished eating, that isn’t service that’s supervising. The restaurant wasn’t even full yet and no other table was asked this frequently. Finally when the bill came we paid for it and then the server came back and said it was $20 short but they had just brought back the wrong receipt as the bank statement and invoice after showed the correct amount WITH standard % tip too. We won’t be coming back if this is the level we can expect, we had fond memories of this place prior to this as it was one of our first dates here.

Food was mostly good and drink was very delicious though. Props to the kitchen staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9FPTL59McEKBUlJKvPIGUXh9UKgpoAYz5aIEG&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Lex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIOoTFR1sL0065mPU_AeAGgpwzqHssyGAT0I917Apw20TmHTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven’t been to Langley’s Ban Chok Dee restaurant, you’re missing out! Visually stunning and even more stomach pleasing. Ban Chok Dee is our go-to in Langley and the best Thai food we’ve ever tasted. My colleagues constantly rave about how delicious the food and drinks are here 🍹 My husband ordered Pad Thai and I got the Cashew Nut chicken with a couple of cheeky white sangrias.. we discovered this place in 2020 while looking at highly rated restaurants in the area, and it’s the best gem we’ve ever found.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGCqW5uAGowqjz2x8sDUHtgx-wCLseZeFEsaBy&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"S Salil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHLEz5i6JHhYd1TSfmOhILHvAbA35-zO0yP4VKH163dIaYQCYW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is good (Patsara is better). Setup is good, nothing outstanding. Service is terrible!
They forgot my beer, then forgot about the nampra and then the bill. Maybe bill took time but definitely forgot the other two. Apologizing with a smile is fine the first time, second time it's like completely ignored.
Too much coconut flavor in everything. I was in Thailand for 1 year, never seen coconut cream/flavor in every dish. Only thing I liked was calamari which is not a Thai specialty anyway.
Better to avoid during rush hours maybe... Food didn't feel top off the line, service ensured I am not going there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0AVH-D1TH1zyvANq5f-Bi2zzeoxINOb8Llb9l&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and we were impressed. Got a 5 pm reservation and needed it. Steady flow of people coming is a good sign. The service was fast and efficient and everyone liked their dishes. The meals were all hot so not sitting in the kitchen. You can have them mild, medium or hot and each dish was prepared to our heat preference perfectly. We will return! They have a medium sized restaurant and have taken over the adjacent space to expand, maybe twice as large. Parking is on the street but plenty of it. Got a high chair for the squirt and all was well. Recommend👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7L-Iecy7Z-4LoEF5c1nXEqbQOeW8VF74SIEWI&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Alym Amlani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCS7cfdRd9yppSIvIAypDkWBSXz0qghmJF3r1Qs4AKnQ6BCK-zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an incredible experience here. The portions are very generous and the food is the best Thai I’ve had outside of Thailand. Very highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoAgi3wJgM2cb9Z8GYbOgLEOxGkb8USDHfMZNH&fid=0x0:0xf25db44faf68ba17"],"When":"2024-11-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a cute and simple place, pretty on the outside and toasty on the inside. It did smell a bit like the coffee was burnt but the drinks were nice anyway. I ordered the tiramisu latte and it was very tasty, not too sweet. My friend ordered the raspberry mocha and it was pretty but a bit bitter. The service was good, clean place, tasty looking desserts and pastries, and a lot of people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv4P37PpqdURqSYx6UDNq5P9FLVA-V54KPqmJn&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Sabrina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW7GOiTfxcq5DHknLdFBCCgjBAUa3QbkBltMJ88diGwUdT3MqWGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spinach danish, tiramisu latte and blueberry almond croissant.

Both food and drink are delicious. The server was a bit of impatient as we were deciding what to order (we stand on the side and no one else in line) so 4* for service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcKtASUaYgo0hODyGaCU6X_EQ4hKG_oHAHldJL&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Alex C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0b11JbJLcOSJbME_vWYkdgNV4w5Laypesod5V5b1SVCUTUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pistachio raspberry croissant was light and delicious. Coffee was amazing. I went twice during my visit.  Very busy location tho and lot of people just sat there and using their laptop after they have finished their drink, so  hard to find seats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv-goE8Dzv4zNk9kTZX5N3_BgxsqBAFCbCnXMa&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Ruitong Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhZF2dm1h0HNptc6eGn02-_AEoat-dH0vAjLcxg-Z2_jtR41o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I come to Langley to change cars I will come to this coffee store, give me a comfortable feeling, the environment is very clean especially the washroom. And a lot of people come here to buy coffee in the morning,also open at 8am. I've loved Panini since the last time I had one at here, almost a whole avocado.This is spicy chicken panini，I pretty like this taste.❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlEinMErwpekPVj7zc9XPu6M3ou0jXh63bpqZt&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Anisha Kainth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO_c4F0LuATTOFlPCUAiyJGZeJW1IPki4zmOJiuFkTD3yjIdtF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gratia is literally the best cafe in langley!!! Their baked goods are to die for, another review raved about the chocolate avalanches and compared them to those served in paris cafes. Although i’ve never been to paris, i wholeheartedly agree that they are to die for. Their iced lattes are so so good and the staff are so sweet and friendly. This location is always packed and for good reason! They are busy regardless of the day of week but if you plan your visit strategically you are guaranteed to find a spot to sit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq2emyTJgkCpEvRHK0eIL4m6CZodUHX4fYHTAs&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Michael Tetrault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOblNGbdNZ4FfoMdwgRA-V8sixAEwnNyg7ZpUaoUxqov7wNyQphQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gratia cafe had lovely coffee drinks and lunch options for our group sandwiches and salad), with solid pastries for those with a sweeter tooth. It was crowded, so if you go for solitude or conversation, you'll be hard pressed to find it during busier times. And if you decide to pop to an outside table for more privacy, traffic noise can kill the atmosphere...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKqZ90pxUyR4l714_yFB3rYUAbQghB0IMnR0i7&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Skylynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_43WPNfQZiPxkQNg46xeN7C1rm_Vp_A-msfxFSPDUSzZ_gHU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been the maple ridge gratia for years until I’ve come to this one and realized this is the best gratia!!!! The quality of the matcha at gratia has always been the best quality but the sandwiches here are incredibly made compared to the ridge location. The different drinks are a plus. super grateful this place is here, my boyfriend and I come here all the time. :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHxsmT0MwSXEHDP2aKvEXAXL98I2uN10rPYo0w&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Dash Car Productions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFXIkiwP_B3w8bR5Kv0hUcwxIR8TrJJKCnoNWdMmN1R5BApilx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chocolate Cream puff was very good as well as the tiramisu cold drink.

Highly recommend.

A little pricy tho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI9RP0TPdOVevi1Qn8xeKcan1GPYpbaHNxoXt9&fid=0x0:0x3d364862d98770ea"],"When":"2024-7-20"}]

title: Langley Vietnamese Cuisine

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYexcx0e6ICfw7JRjDUlQZ6JZl_1Bu5kNsviXXR5RZevzfYHC9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST Vietnamese food I’ve ever had. I’ve tried multiple other places in BC and nothing comes close. There is a reason they’re not on any delivery apps, they don’t need to be. You want their food you’ll make the drive.
#47 and #69 are my favourite. My BF loves the pho soups and wonton appetizer, we both agree the salad rolls are 10/10 and that Thai peanut sauce is A1!! . We’ve both been eating here for nearly 20 years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbRRqdvys3rq4SyKI-P9hgZ1o7c1VHR66p41Vg&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Aa Aaa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYaHKLgugfuCn8Vt_ts-yLXAptZH5HdNUsAmogbrtXm6yTYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"#27 deep fried wonton 4/5
#13 pho 2.5/5

Wonton was so good.
Pho has big portion, perfectly cooked noodle. but the soup is kinda sweet, not my cuppa tea. So low rating for me","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8sE5c-S2exX4XaeGnkdsVHKqTohM1Z5T7-mDK&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Maria Kristianne Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUropq5pa4AHt67VGg3QJuvN05K0Jqqd0Qy0g8cIiDWG6NP6nXx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've dined at this Vietnamese restaurant multiple times now, and we're always impressed! The service is unbelievably fast — the staff operate with such efficiency, it’s like watching real life robots in action, no exaggeration. Despite how hard they work, they always greet us with warm smiles, which really adds to the experience.

The food? Absolutely delicious, and the prices are incredibly affordable! The portions are generous, making it a really great value for money. Even though we drive all the way from Aldergrove, it’s always worth the trip because this place never disappoints! We highly recommended this place for anyone craving authentic and affordable Vietnamese cuisine served with top-notch service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"RIA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcNYzyYLe1_s-hZFbDwk--0zTwl73jt3QsEr6gpup4Z2N0IzfIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Langley Vietnamese Cuisine offers amazing food with generous portions. The pho broth is both clear and flavorful, while the savory stew and fresh bread contribute to a delightful dining experience. The constant busyness reflects the restaurant's popularity, and the great value for the price, coupled with fast service, makes it a definite go-to. The crunchy wonton is an added bonus. I'll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr_xEkUpaSccsjwwmaLK_ladUX3sWKQq-S60x9&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"XRY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWjcq2yPDAK-eKEjLBxPQ_EVcnqDDuIZAfL8rDiILU9B1BrSaa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Special spring rolls filling with taro, really like the sugar cane shrimps, juicy and sweet, very flavorful 😋😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzaHDtsdoSKxgpsFLpnw5sLgqhSsjsvx6UYAku&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a great place to enjoy Vietnamese cuisine. Most notably, the food is delicious and comes out quickly, even if it is busy. We usually don't have to wait unless if it is during lunch time, but even so the wait is about 5-10 minutes. The service is great too as they do their best to serve everyone. There are ample amount of seating inside and take-out is also available. However, parking space is limited and most of the time we park at the adjacent parking lot or park on the street. It can can quite hectic and loud so this place has this fast food type vibe. We really enjoy coming here and we will be coming back for more. Highly recommend this place if you want to enjoy high quality Vietnamese food with little wait time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJxjLVFgsEwM9s3AJNTuSLPV7pbikdzOvVUfIu&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0VcKAVTe7ZDh01hlHgR0aElCSuLJDgRSdfNkG4TKG7360ZlL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best place to have tasty big bowl of Pho and
All menu  is amazing and our family love this place a lot.
Kids favourite place from all langley choices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPREki4iVrDc5oaXGQ1DobICrnaFANSCbB-xCb0&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is good and price is reasonable the portion is good! Small size of pho  is suitable for girl! Busy restaurant a lots of visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwHnzzx-80C5ODdXviCKzEmcqHKvVQj10FhkDl&fid=0x0:0xce6b0868bbf046f3"],"When":"2024-5-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk6OcUgg97XJYgUIgbZBwyuQahPR5Cpp_Cgf1zZeSPmw5_9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was good but $25.00 was kind of Burtal for this, colslaw was not even full seem just over half. Brisket on a bun just barely bigger than palm of my hand . My hands are not huge by any means. Not like I'm walking in to a full on resturant , it's just a food trailer. Over head cannot be that much. Saving grace it was good. But price very Steep. For what you got. An awning off the side of trailer would be nice in hot sun or pouring rain. When waiting for order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH8L3z3unnx1pGdsQFJUpkHxCs_uc-Xbe8R8N-&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Anson Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpRG7sV65M0Vk9fJln2fqg-G8cTgdbnIHe6i_26HAHg5rk2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall, pretty disappointed at this time's  food - I've come here before when some items were sold out, so I came again to get the ones I missed because I liked my past visit so much that I thought it was worth the 1.5 hour drive.  Can't say I got my worth this time but at least I got the chance pick berries. Detailed review below:

Burnt ends (1 lb) - I think this was a borderline scam.  I was excited for brisket burnt ends, but all I got were super small cubes of brisket flat that were not caramelized but just covered in sauce - you just see that naked grey coloured meat covered in red sauce.  However the worst part is (you can also see in the photo) that it was 70% sausage.  I don't understand what justifies the price they are selling at, $27.99.  The sauce was pretty good though.

Beef rib - Singular rib that had smoke flavor but was dry and needed the barbeque sauce.  Overall, impressive looking but was not it, $31.99

Platter for 2 - Got this the last time and the star of the show was the pulled pork, last time it was the brisket that was juicy, smokey, and moist.  However, this time the brisket was dry and lacking smoke flavour.  The sausages were plentiful as always.

Mac n cheese side - Saw it being made fresh, nice southern flavor with smokey spices. Overall, it feels like a Velveeta based cheese sauce with smoked paprika.

Cornbread (jalapeno) - Nice fluffy, moist, and flavorful cornbread, but no jalapeno flavor, not complaining but there's almost no difference from a regular one. Kind of unfortunate that I liked the cornbread more than the brisket and beef rib this time around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRm0Lpp7OrziOMUDrC2MxSIwf628NWaDxniiT9&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"Kelsey McAuley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnAzavtz8qT6KmCgwueB6IQD6a-EXZK-ht_DFi_J60y91Dtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the closest thing to true Texas BBQ in the greater Vancouver area that I have ever tried. Amazing staff and people as well that truely took the time to show their passion about what they are doing here. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_7eexTW6HJW_-8kBrgQ2mRD9ZQ4jn3oJ-dZGV&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Phuong Nhi Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzxQom_VZJiDiz-vAIgLw8-Rc1YUoxHeIREAoVH0A4wtFvsEbhEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Um, I’m literally obsessed with this place. Having tried sooo many southern BBQ places around Vancouver this is the only place that has never (or will ever, hopefully) disappointed me. I dream about them every week (not an exaggeration).

The pulled pork, burnt ends, and fatty brisket parts are top tier godsent. Sausage and sides are okay. I wish they gave us more BBQ sauce for the drier meats though (because it’s just so good).

Other than that, the service is great. The wait could be a bit longer on weekends so I would recommend getting there early!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP46pD58aC2c5J9z5h2JJn0den_3q4qeA6PmJfb&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Truly amazing service and delicious food! Tried the burnt ends again, and this time the flavor was spot on; also the sandwiches were incredible!

Old Post: Got the Beef "Dyno" Rib on my third visit.. Just look at my photo.. It was amazing! I'm really glad she recommended me to try the Jalapeño Cornbread! Great addition to Coquitlam

Came back a 2nd time as they came by Mariner Brewing again. Got pork ribs which were tasty but... The Smokey Baked Beans was a home run for me.. I would bathe in it. Seriously, make sure you get some.

Old post: The food truck came by Mariner Brewing this weekend. Despite some negative reviews I read, I had a great experience with the service and food!
I got the Texas sampler and 1/2 lb of burnt ends.
I'll rank my favorites below:
1. Pulled pork (excellent flavor *one of the best I've had)
2. Brisket (juicy & flavorful *some dry parts)
3. Sausage (delicious but similar to other good bbq places *which is not a bad thing)
4. Burnt ends (although tasty and I ate it all *the sauce was a bit too sweet for me)
Overall I enjoyed the entire meal, and they even brought it to my car because it was -10° at the time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrKyU0t_uD4kwBNfX0QWF1PG9UlKwcAdtTQOA0&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Cole MacEwen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhpRS7fgywTci2-v2inzLsCrFpXqlOUccvdbBlGoooZY0u6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our wedding this past Saturday and we had Texas Smoke come out to cater it. THEY WERE AMAZING. Every guest came up to us to tell us how professional they were, how polite they were, and how IT WAS THE BEST WEDDING MEAL THEY HAVE EVER HAD. The team from Texas Smoke far exceeded our expectations and we would highly highly highly recomend them for your wedding or event! You will not be disappointed!! A huge thankyou from Angela and I, we will definitely be using you guys if we have any event that needs catering in the future!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM4xgncMQPsmciGTIVVu-T5elw1nIPFOjcKPfo&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live near this location. We have always driven by on the way home and can literally smell the BBQ driving thru! Finally we stopped in for the first time. We decided to try the Texas Sampler and Burnt Ends. I'm glad we popped by. The BBQ was amazing! I'm not a huge fan of coleslaw and even that was fantastic! the brisket melts in your mouth and don't even get me started on the pulled pork and sausage....OMG. Very filling, amazing food. The service was great, lots of parking, and some picnic tables to enjoy your food.  I highly recommend you stop in here if your a fan of BBQ. You will not be disappointed. This BBQ would turn a vegan into a meat eater lol. Kudos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxzArQM2-knJZ9drDdpB5PcB7xCvKYc55QPyYW&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Cassandra Dobson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV6D3O8wzulTGMAbD-VbIDIHkG8XZiLYYb9ykJ9n9wL1grm94=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my husband tried out Texas BBQ today for the first time and it did not disappoint
. Coming from a person who is personally from Southern Texas I would give the food 10/10. The brisket was tender and flavourful, the pulled pork was insanely delicious doused in bbq sauce which is a plus in my eyes. We ordered the platter for 2 and everything was super filling , it even came with pickles on the side 🫠🤤. This place made me feel like i was back in my ranch in southern Texas on a rainy day , with the smoker and grill out. The only thing you’re missing is the dos x ! 😋 pricey but worth it, only thing I could say on the negative side was that y’all’s brisket could of been a little warmer. Cheers .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz9VzxhLdW8WiVi2h-ejXseyd_tqNrr0yOoMPK&fid=0x0:0xc337a3f74351b29"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVius2vKggf3Zi4PNzAK1fmoDVsEJzmcNSqPnFdpzq52xizMnLjlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has become my favorite Korean restaurant in Langley! The food is consistently high-quality and has a comforting, homemade taste. The soups are especially amazing—rich, flavorful, and satisfying. The portions are generous, so you’ll leave feeling full and happy. Definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMiK2L-wWioYv_-dDQlxWu-ugUKxmWlTvprJXU&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"sharon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt1pUVcR0eNzGG9mEr2gKHrTkNQvOPbEkQiAWmVVsjrClUMwlN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the new beef volcano on stone dish and it was SO GOOD. There’s so much food so we had a little bit left over even though 4 people ate it. Comes with 4 bowls of rice so no need to order rice separately. 10/10 definitely recommend. You can choose your own spice level (we ordered level 2) Price is good compared to the size, taste and quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlSFunTd7dbQXk0Pf2hJL8dzE-4bST8OkWXsQT&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Regie Sacdalan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVDuCV38ynK6mxDdP-HlWdoPODHVpBYeLjIOghxaV1fgHRoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite Korean restaurant in Langley! I have both dined in and ordered takeout and have been impressed. Prices are reasonable and my kids enjoyed everything. I agree with another reviewer that they have the best Kimchi. Highly recommend the beef galbijjim as it is very tender but note that the soy marinade is on the sweet side. Rib finger meat set is also good. The seafood pancake was good but also very thick so I'd recommend you share this dish in a larger group.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW4LWHXNM2eNMzqw85si9Q7poogF2PIuWzILGq&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Korean restaurant with homemade appeal. I wouldn't necessarily give this place 5 stars because there are better Korean restaurants, but I did enjoy the set meal. Looking at all these 5-star Google reviews...seems a bit suspect, but I'll give them the benefit of the doubt. Anyway, Happy Hankki is not flashy, except the table-side tablets to order or summon the bill. The food was around average and I'd like to go back to try some other dishes. I tried the Kalbi Tang and it was a little light on the beef. Overall, my experience was alright. Just not enough to justify 5 stars, in my humble opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBphYqA3GoAg3jlnp7uCcGFQSW9g0l3fyHMm-U&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Jenjen Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs0E1WELTSbf-pv3dHy5KtlqxF1cxtGKbq5aYmvjIr-t7JBm-TSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good korean food! Coming from a picky asian eater.

Dishes are simple but good. Mix of taste that give your taste bug the satisfaction it need. I tried their soup meal and meat meal many times and never disappointed!

Love going around lunch time when it's less people and have more chance to get my favourites dish "Galbijjim".","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlAsJsCO1NpZM5qo_FeAFA4IcTABcSxI20yRZ4&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Hayley Deng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCnQXqSrqzLb0epl-UyUHTPwZ0PSLPzPhzyF5r2RrPy8Atl8ml=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across this restaurant on our way to Golden Ears Park for camping. Loved it so much! Probably the best Korean soup dish I’ve had, better than the ones at Lougheed (in my opinion). We tried the soondubu soup, beef radish soup on our first time there, they were so delicious that we went back the next day and tried pork bone soup and Galbi-tang. The side dishes were also very delicious. Love their kimchi!! Service was excellent, ordering tablet was convenient and straightforward. Food was also very reasonably priced for such generous portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgTKeakAK88_7-Ap2zStjbsy4aIRDd9QALNF09&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Po Izzy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOYrWD90r6E8iUuwLVeT35nKvBNcQ01mmcT7ObXcBLPfNHgkcv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Korean food we've ever had! Best kimchi, best japchae. The spicy pork short rib was phenomenal! We will definitely be going back! So good! 😋👍 The japchae was so good we ate most of it before we took the picture!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR3tfekNkif6qMCyxV4lOifdjA7Vy6jHff4jRf&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Cindy K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ95FA2O2uViElyjomPmFeDqY3gcumy_fYEgJNCcvqh1D9L=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently shared this restaurant to the Korean community and it truly impressed us all. The food was delicious, the portions were generous and the service was excellent! The staff were incredibly friendly & cheerful AND the prices were very reasonable!!!
We absolutely loved this restaurant.
Highly recommend it to anyone seeking authentic Korean home-style meals(집밥!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzyCJopoQKLUrt28zjE59boTjIFFO8biMHiEo&fid=0x0:0xc64791f967c19493"],"When":"2024-3-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"shelby krenbrink","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRSz_Zlqx8GRPEOgrqaqcJMA5TK4109Wyb_ARg5cP4zLgl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a quick breakfast before work with my partner and was greeted with the best customer service I have ever experienced at a restaurant. Our server Ashley went above and beyond. Her energy was so uplifting and the food was great! I look forward to going back and seeing her again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4UNZjKOxRSBN0in2gT5_aGnJSJJUzHILpzc4&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Parneet Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqz_l5BzN5_mBY3QC7SEZWEVervEPkE_VocF-ECzkBQsGcdPO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best breakfast places… Very friendly staff, our server Ashley was very kind and made sure our order was perfect. Felt very welcomed.

The facility is clean and staff is friendly..

The food tasted really good and at all times they made sure our coffee mugs are filled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBB7m8Gqi3nBKAdFkgN-bb8v7TAAOPwoyXVbWR&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Mario Villalta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5ZMFC9NS7kSmQkOqaAlMEID3js0wHxnU6mKTorP0Y-9ZMqIUvnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cora's Restaurant impressed me the first time I went for breakfast. Since then, the quality has declined dramatically. The coffee is terrible, the sauce for the eggs benedict is far from acceptable. All in all, it is still a place to be able to share with the family in a pleasant place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_oZiXHWY-xFjC_4mipUbfnd9T9JpOjf4beI7d&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Bubble BENAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4m4lYcXYD5-vWeSNCEbY3JBPm5RjwzL8p6j1jH5SzhotO286Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved the Cora's for breakfast. I truely recommend Cora's fresh and the choices is well done. Loved the service for Maria's who accomodate us and  she is a friendly person,  Be back here again ,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-quXkoVbYUubzfNo6iJyDdE-irD-fBM4YQOeb&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Dennis Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLC2KM0uD3-o2TDsNfvceuhRF2Thy5gxBBzglcneYM2Vp_THg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food and service here are pretty good. Unlike most places these days, they give you as much coffee as you want to drink. No charge refills. My only hesitation is that there is no sort of small items like toast or a muffin. Only meals. No seniors menu with lighter fair. Would be nice to have those choices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite breakfast places!  I love the food.  The service is always friendly and they keep your coffee full.

I really like the fruit they serve with a lot of the dishes.  The menu is broad enough that everyone is always happy.

The only problem is the hash browns are always cold.  Not sure why. Still a 5 star due to the yumminess of the hollindaise sauce and fruit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsoc-if3smOaVKOYTPtO3A2pfnhPg5aS4mAs-7&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"Sagar Amrelia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwetO8AN8lDxrrPrPJ9sFIBKLjVHU2FVw6Vqk9Fb5cxinxAl4j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent place for breakfast. Their early bird menu is really good and affordable. It was my first time at this Cora and the service was great. Server Ashley was really welcoming and charming person to talk to. Overall, it is a must visit place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johanna Copeland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwmfsHhMJwEF72G9qRa38x3dEAwbxGzYYYvbdhOeduL_AhOPez=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Worst breakfast in a long time. I couldn’t even eat it. Overcooked omelette pretending to be scrambled eggs and so much unwanted debris on the potatoes. I ate one and it was undercooked and greasy, while having burnt bits all over it. The waitress was very nice and listened to my complaints. She asked if I wanted a replacement and I said no thanks. She brought out replacement eggs and potatoes anyway and they looked just as bad. There was a huge chunk of burnt to a crisp something in the new plate. The bacon had debris on it too. The only good thing was the one (not two) slice of toast I got. If I’m going to pay more than $20 for breakfast I expect it to be decent at least. She comped it for me, which was nice. Even my breakfast partner had burnt grill debris bits in her pancakes.
Please go to the Surrey 10/152 location if you want an actual good plate of Louis the Undecided!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_vw6lZ2qLgmOoIb4UnRHPIJh2a2-gFOmv74Cc&fid=0x0:0x7ef47ddb37d968bb"],"When":"2024-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S. Fisk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbry0mGbwXoDs4q5cYtEeUvZ--bKLSfRTirf8dbDna0GLxkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Family run sushi restaurant in Fort Langley. Excellent food and affordable. Our whole family enjoys eating here. Peggy, the owner, is lovely.  Highly recommend! My daughter is a sensitive celiac. She orders carefully but she doesn’t react to the food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jora Nijjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1SrwCvR_91OwflsNXUktypNHNJBou3FUN2kfwRDbz6fyEg6MvHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great sushi place, in a great location.  The lunch box with the teriyaki chicken was amazing.  Good portions and good value.  The tempura was also very good.  The portions were good for the price.  We will be back to enjoy more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlE8Mp3ZTlABsrv_Q7eYsR3CAeJV5ejHtoP6IT&fid=0x0:0x9589c5791cff4933"],"When":"2022-2-18"},{"Name":"Alice de Crom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0RGq6b8NIJSCYX3FHf5nxTyaIFEWyI_epIlmIt7JSbP9l_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite sushi in the fort! I’ve been going here for years and I love sushi so much! My favourite bubble tea is the passion green tea with mango and pearls. They are fast everything is always prepared perfectly and consistently!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpM7iVpxfrxIJNz82SRvfT7LSFbCy3m45gyYW3&fid=0x0:0x9589c5791cff4933"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Nicole Brideau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ22gtzruL3--00Nr2oL-cWSwRunHvDmRtEmrgi9cXVXUMpuHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was very little portions for the money spent.
The rolls were not tight but loose.
The chicken tasted possibly microwaved and dry - simple roll for $7 just chicken nothing else in the loonie sized roll.
They charged for green tea and Sriracha.
Left with a $70 bill and still hungry..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brady O'Brien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHSPOI1O_sBWxD-WK-DbF_gdmb3Vh3wugvioj0sORcdut9LA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and great value, great service, and the atmosphere is great. Lots of cool Edo period paintings.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"susan anquist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf-_dXb14V_uxPXy2tdyWswVlnj-5NA046NU0vH-YxvOjyU-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. I love the calm music they play while I eat their very good sushi! A highlight of my visits to Fort Langley.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Shu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS1jubu3BD_aebsu2emIDna5JPsgqM6RfMEVBMrW0qDYHu4mTv9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Stepped into this small Japanese restaurant. Didn't have much for food. Also serves bubble tea if that's the combination. The teriyaki was ok and sashimi was not bad. Old city of Fort Langley somewhat touristy I wouldn't say there is a lot to see here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODD6QnK2MeHSSuw4hIbyky9nz_31A0gYm0ys6N&fid=0x0:0x9589c5791cff4933"],"When":"2019-8-11"},{"Name":"Kelsey Plett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtUNj5yKdDbLqWoU7jljRBr5ZNRnp2WO14JFOeKsyAPqJsZUqN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been going here for 15 years and it is our favorite local sushi place. The owners are so kind and are there everyday working.
The food is delicious. Always fresh, hot and displayed neatly.
Tempura is light and crispy and always fresh. Teriyaki chicken is the best I have ever had. Salad dressing is chef specialty.
Eat in or take out- we frequent weekly.

Lunch hour is busy during school year with high school students.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE0S2TotKqLF1pRAOnmJh0C7jtW4UjmaaBmk_W&fid=0x0:0x9589c5791cff4933"],"When":"2019-2-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Martin J.G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSIw1FXNvsnT_WlUVWipfCnxov_J2a6OwyhmUMSL7utWt7cXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Took my wife and son to Sammy J for the first time.  The experience was less than desirable.  Lady was nice when ordering or drinks.  Took over 20 minutes to get our drinks.  Ordered the chicken strips for my son and steak frites for me and my wife.  Waited another 30 minutes for our food, which is normal with the restaurant pretty busy. Drinks were empty and had to wait another 20 minutes to her news drinks.  The chicken strips were so dry and burnt. The veggies coming with it were dry and old.  The steaks were over cooked, dry and full of nerves.  It was like eating a leather belt.  Fries were good. But it's an expensive meal when an establishment don't care what's coming out of their kitchen.   Had to go somewhere else to get food for our son and his food was un eatable.
First time and last time I go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5riAg3MYX5rxbufQAUXGDZM9orWbP0LklfUyF&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Oberzocker 511","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAll_xEvA1rSl2y5kAtyiFKT1nQyPWdM4tCkfsEovR82UWnHI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there tonight for a dinner and must say it was a great experience. Plenty of space to sit, tidy, prompt and very friendly service.

Nice tasting cocktails and great tasting Gluten- free food, I could even try their Poutine as it was delicious and Gluten- free. They have a decent Gluten- free/ and Vegetarian Menu there too.
Prices are good and quality matches the price.

Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFLUEqYHYpRyCEnRPDp8L4O9C_Ec4-P-482M_a&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Melody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkveKXjhaflgRPGIPH62kWxkhDuVGqd6ylk7RJl2vdL7VHtoyn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"January 1, 2024 2 people.
Quiet and cozy, lots of window seating, has heated closed in deck seating, clean establishment, food is hot and delicious, plenty on the plate. Burgers plates are around $18, Breakfast $17, Chicken plates $21. Employees are young but attentive. Has a separate large bar area with seating. Handicap bathroom toilet seat dangerously loose and needs to be tightened. Large bathroom 9/10 for cleanliness. I do recommend this location. 5 Stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPApiMHu3KgFIIdyPUBLBuIukbyT2ahr-6bgFc&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhlRzWDXzdsN5IEg7ILK_EQ56zA9jcQ-fPPr3cS5cgV1YVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sammy on the drier side…

It has been awhile since I last been to any Sammy’s and this was the first time visiting this location.

This place is located across from Willbrook Mall in Langley. There are parkings available  in the plaza parking lot. Inside is a bar section to the left and a dining section with  booth seats and tables to the right.

Here were the food I ordered after scanning through the menu;

1. Original Caesar drink. It was okay, needed to be drunk before I say it’s good.
2. Cream of tomato soup. It was hot, rich and creamy. It’s one of those you either like it or hate it, but I personally find it a bit too paste like almost like pasta sauce.
3. Wings and drumettes. It was on the small drier side with a southern hot sauce.
4. Panang curry mussels. The sauce was okay but the mussels meats were a bit overcooked and small. Felt like another one of those frozen prepackaged ones.
5. Mini cheeseburgers. The patties were pretty dry.
6. Coastal salmon. That’s one thing about sockeye salmon, once overcooked it will be dry and powdery, needed some mastery skill to get this dish done right.
7. Cajun chicken linguini. The sauce was okay but the linguini was a bit undercooked.

Overall, the atmosphere was casual but the noises projected from the bar section were quite loud.
The service was okay and pretty straightforward from the staffs, tho could be a bit more attentive.
As for the food, more of an old school pub style and a little on the drier side. Not good enough for me to travel a distant for.

A 2 star experience…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzQg-8T8Cn5azLNX7LQrUi22qjoZsfFN-yJXtM&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Kiky Kiks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgIvVxxSYrbvp4RuGlQoIF1h8IVgflOoKH0hZNsG2lqQIRbhkfUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a really good experience, saw this place so many times, but didn't pay much attention to it, so finally decided to give it a try because I was craving mussels. We got there and surprisingly it was happy hour (they have happy hour every day 🎉), lots of seating, got seated right away, the server was nice, and sevice was fast. The restaurant is clean, food is good, portion size is good (tacos were kinda small with no side, but good), mussels were great. Will definitely come back 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bobbi Borys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVcGA21I8ksYJFNDaU6nUNZED52a53WcOe0HWQHHSgH3u-Gta0Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff were friendly and efficient. Food was great. Atmosphere is welcoming and cozy. TV’s throughout the bar for watching sports. Reasonable parking options for smaller vehicles but not necessarily if you have a big truck. Accessible parking and entrance available. The bar has mostly stools for seating at tables and a few booths.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a solid happy hour here. Food is consistent and the service is excellent. Fave thing has to be the mango habanero wings! They never disappoint! Great outdoor patio for the summer and nice and cozy indoors for the rest of the cold seasons!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Average family restaurant with spacious seatings & booths. Staff was friendly, but the food can be hit & miss. Linguini was too saucy, but the buddha bowl was delicious.

I would recommend this place for a bigger group!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv5cage5PwQpYvumF7wY1yDCEcF16t3nYej_39&fid=0x0:0xa1108e3b4f7b55b1"],"When":"2023-9-27"}]
