user_reviews: [{"Name":"S K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4AoCV3ThS2upSiegNZVplG9h1vtRpgDjKYyRHdLkGlEb1QvM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven't been here in many years. Hungered for quality burgers at fair prices ,relatively speaking. The order clerk was incredibly friendly \u0026 personable! Something I look for! You know quality is high because the owner is part of the cooking process! They recently did a major renovation  which looks great. Gives 80s vibe with a modern decor. I love that they have a jukebox! The burger with maple bacon \u0026 grilled pineapple is a must! The hotwings were so flavorful as well. I will definitely be coming back here often! Order came out quicker than I thought it would. Overall experience was one of best I've experienced!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgBxpij3ANXnLO8TRUt01BA2ck9JOXFZvOP0Da\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"SUKHBIR SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6hC-_Nl67fSy2WNyWDaLe5s1qQxPezSkJuGdf7lJzab65dHsE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious and very well presented by the staff. Raj was really courteous, a must visit place with family and superb dine in spot. Burger was awesome and lettuce wrap was really fresh..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTsxpM6BdSi8hvJt6WLgLTloV8XVXrAQ7DxQL1\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCpO5E8fVkCCUkR8MfqBk8fIZ2J-IdHtM-g_X8g2TmiHhIjjexug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Burger was greasy, I was told there would be lettuce and tomato on it, but they weren't there when it arrived. It was just sauce, beef, and the bun. The pickle chips were good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIKL_xTCjgakuhSoFkKOLSwouFeeCcrblTrAKL\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Fatburger restaurant in Langley offers plenty of delicious food on their menu, my recommendations to try are original burger , California burger and Philly cheese steak sandwiches. Pleasant atmosphere with fast order delivery , friendly staff and plenty of free parking spots.\nI highly suggest you to check out this place 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDo79NTl97goK624tL7vzSmh521-v_RVcNt7k_\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Karen PB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURAzOmypCxRHvfOdtuB0nqx9DAGpiJFx_w1YMSBCXlDCUZkyVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These burgers were juicy, fresh and filling.  Probably one of a few places that can add pineapple to your burger.  Deep fried pickles were also good as well as their fries and onion rings.  Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTTrDXIopczr66FkfKln73lNR-Wy-ehC0zju3E\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Kritesh Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfZRBagAA46Fs_5aPZos6nR0UESD7A9xjzs00dWoetnSEZ5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was incredible, and the customer service was outstanding. Every staff member was genuinely passionate about their work. We need more people like them everywhere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cornell K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDvcx-pntlF4E-8CbyTjEg-pvvEO5ZKSkaJDYaT7Fjq3BWvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The burgers were fantastic. I brought my kids and wife for a late night dinner and the burgers hit spot . Love this location as it’s easy to park and walk to . Enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfJrbGxCis-XgdjDgcwLQmy1vsERjNIzV511DU\u0026fid=0x0:0xf9b433cdc447f9cb"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Taylor Wingert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0y55kUNUJd3nhPL3aUBHM4bik0HWURWdXweM5Hx467bu4eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My mom and I came here the other day, because we do love the burgers. How ever we did stop coming here 6 months ago because we found it VERY rude and obnoxious that the cashiers yell across to everyone if you leave a tip or not. ( yells Tip or NO Tip) and I'm not joking when I say they YELL it in front of everyone. I was just getting take out so no service was provided, they just did their job. They made me feel that if I didn't tip they would do something to my food. I think it's absolutely ridiculous to treat customers like this at a fast food restaurant. I will no be returning here because of this, I was hoping it changed in the 6 months but it's still the same tacky service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an excellent place to enjoy Japanese cuisine. We have been coming here a couple times as a family and we enjoyed our experiences. The servers were welcoming and delightful, offering us the menu and drinks promptly. There are a variety of options to choice from on the menu, from sushi rolls and appetizers to combos and lunch/dinner boxes. The seating were comfortable and includes many walled, rectangular enclosed spaces. The food came out fresh and in generous quantity while maintaining quality in a timely manner. For the proportion we get and the freshness, the overall price is reasonable. The atmosphere is calm, soothing and laid-back. There is no overpowering music and no loud ambiance. The washrooms are generally clean and functional. After paying, we got little natural fruit candies. I highly suggest giving this place a try if you crave sushi in the Williowbrook area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVZcFcxMhiyVrGvn22QNDPOW28mEA2a8Cu502Z\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Pamela Laine Hoang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqrgGPhNg7LyO0ZZh9KDlIemtsBObXCLeRVArhIjoYDbDv4Mhu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I had lunch here and we made it for the lunch special which ends at 2:30pm , good value for bento box ($17.95)  the portions are big and was delicious ! They have kid size bentos for $11 super cute !  Food was prompt and servers so kind. We ate with our small children and unknowingly  leaving my phone behind one of the private booths. I called back and they kept it safe for me ! Thank you so much !! I would definitely recommend this place , food and service is great!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRjcCc0t_vqGGMb8cTtQftVu4YSfBMOPcnGngR\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a few times but just never got around to writing a review. But it’s a consistently good little sushi 🍣 spot in Langley with ample partying and decent pricing and well located. Service and quality is consistently good. They have lots of those nice little booth tables and private seating. Washrooms are always clean. Not much atmosphere per say as no music or anything playing. Just about coming eating and moving on. Not that linger longer type of spot. But definitely a great recommendation as you can always be sure about food and service. Enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg7KT9EKPzA8sK7i1zbduzG8rm4dZvhSRs082U\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2023-11-7"},{"Name":"Frank Yoster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZTPyUwUA84CCd3zLpogXzpKk-oEtUA7XXG4qL8W0aIRGPFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Place..actually infact the best place in Langley. I DEF WOULD RECOMMEND IT!  Try Their Seafood Udon! Its tasty and amazing! Staff is amazing, Their food is great10/10, and their pricing is very reasonable. !^_^ THANK You!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfeTvxFX7XsZRwhtFPDJ8iqqcNPLfnt_Lt0DF9\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Javen Kay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoUSR-retmDaLP5Jg3xQCy8bsN49n3Y4bmHUv6t1vWUqWT5Kiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went to Umami sushi and had some great food! I ordered a lunch platter along with the spicy salmon cone. The platter had plenty of food and the spicy salmon cone had large pieces of salmon all throughout it! We had also ordered an edemame to start and it had been cooked well and salted well (I've had edemame that was raw or too salty or not salted at all at other restaurants so this was great!)\n\nI highly recommend checking out Umami sushi in Langley for well made and we'll priced sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCJZ8M9wFFgRev1K0AVAp3AGlYtm7p599GZOyb\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"maria grey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8FEcpnfN1-xWJm6jpUVFyeTvrZDkt6N8m0gKvoNv1bcyE2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I always order at umami and this time I ordered volcano roll thru uber eats. It was missing a wasabi and ginger. Also the presentation was poorly. The taste was also a bit different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiO_BBpL8soBEedvkCEThYEtuZvE_fhI13Zpzx\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Christina Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO5iDvLphRNDMfh_xnJ_NCYYgSFpCIbEhnxUDyF57jGJKJ8tERAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to this restaurant for well over 10 years. The staff are always lovely, and the dine-in food is superb! Note: I've ordered through door dash a few times, and it is hit or miss. Still giving them 5 stars because it's my fav dine-in sushi restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vida Corvus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqINKLe9b1hKofrDcCLAKEL-6hQV6fdy1HehcGnPVwrDjBQXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, as someone who works in this plaza and spends more money than I’d like on takeout food, this place is a winner. Their prices are better than most of the other options, the food is prepared fresh to order, the ladies there are SO nice.  I often don’t spend more than $15 for a complete meal.  I really enjoy them. I encourage you to give this place a chance, even one time.  (Pls note my meal is 1/2 eaten in this pic)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP0Mv31xI8XBWO5-XVxyEUTYLuTIawpuQpjLLf\u0026fid=0x0:0x6bf1e6682e4d304e"],"When":"2024-3-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John Garrett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWB-1-a8PJM3Q4k9MmzAjFneMPAMmfDhNgciClAwvh4IUWsW1T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have been wanting to try OEB for awhile and today I did. I had the smoked brisket Benny and my partner had the breakfast tacos. The food was good, nicely presented and lots of interesting choices on the menu. One side of the menu was breakfast and the other side lunch. It would have been nice to see some interesting healthy mains, everything was pretty heavy. Service was pleasant although she made an error putting our food into the kitchen so it took a long time. These things happen and she did apologize so no big deal. My biggest critiques of this location are the pretty uncomfortable chairs and the acoustics in the room. Open kitchen (which is good) but super loud. I would go back to try a few more menu items and can see why this chain is popular.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMo6eJaYfnju2U4AI9fFJoaQ_rMJaOUOeKQ_hN1&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Legend Kay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzR0osL0AoK5S3Nb7t3t7Idfo9xB1vVPgF1RzvQE0BzRqoJY3O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had brunch on Monday 9th September. I Ordered over medium and my wife ordered poached medium egg. And we got over easy and poached soft. Server explained to us it was medium cooked when we were paying the bill. So it was cooked right. For me it looks like under cooked. And egg white was runny too. Also I ordered coffee and server never gotten back to us for refill. We tried to call but she was busy didn't hear and walked away. The coffee Never gotten refilled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdZk0Q41zFyAMTXgO2nrPZHY17JeyL4tVQI1FZ&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"D Milburn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYTJuyYJNW23XEIhyxDTO5WvOME5ipvEjz0dpndmARnqjZMtDf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My rating is based on comparisons with three other locations I have previously visited: King West in Toronto, Yaletown in Vancouver, and 1st Ave in Calgary. So far, I have been underwhelmed by this location. I ordered a dish that was recommended by the friendly waitress, who unfortunately did not seem knowledgeable about quality dishes. The dish was overly salty, and I felt it was important to mention the potential health issues this could pose for customers with diabetes, as the recommended meal might negatively affect their well-being. When we shared our suggestions to improve the dishes, she responded, "I'm just a waitress; the staff in the kitchen won't listen to me." I'm not sure what kind of teamwork is in place here, but I am not impressed.

We ordered:
- Montreal Smoked Meat Benny (I do not recommend any dish with the smoked meat, especially if you've tried Schwartz Deli in Montreal; you’ll be disappointed. Instead, order the Holy Crab, The One That Did Not Get Away, or the Eggs Florentine.)
- A new menu item that is Middle Eastern inspired called Shakshuka (I do not recommend this unless you request that the salt be reduced by 50%).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXEA3h5xbP-q-PLk6uQwjmBMhr3dGk4lU5znQj&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"C K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0sP-spxfMR49feD7bgUCr3-pleVWPCB44P4SYKEm3Q3Urihw_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very enjoyable meal. Not rushed. First timer - I will have to go back many times. There are so many options. Everyone was so kind and open from the server to the chefs. Accommodating for all choices. Yummy is the word. Quieter on the balcony/deck to talk or for older patrons. Great music! So many things to see and now at home looking at products and promotions. I still don’t know what OEB stands for….😉🤷🏼‍♀️🤣…not that it matters. I love the furnishings though I did wonder if the chair would hold me and I do wonder what the maximum weight is. Also the width would be a concern for a possible tight fit. There is other seating and booths.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcHJLmlWT39svO1-tw79eALOkyiLzIVwBpf1eR&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Almira Mason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoinwfCWAkibrPyNM_ictLYDnEQ6WlJExnRN6NWmGks7LX5lE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this breakfast spot! The staff is incredibly friendly and the food is AMAZING! My third visit was today and our server Julio was a delight (knowledgeable and friendly!) and the female server helping him (I didn’t catch her name) was also so sweet and personable. We will definitely be coming back! And 8am was the perfect time, it wasn’t busy and the patio was perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSQ8qKZSjv63OVjQR_f_zCJBVkyLlFjRd25jOB&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Mario Villalta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5ZMFC9NS7kSmQkOqaAlMEID3js0wHxnU6mKTorP0Y-9ZMqIUvnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two days in a row having breakfast at OEB Breakfast Co. in Langley. The breakfasts are varied and delicious. Despite the place being at full capacity both times, we didn't have to wait long to be seated, even with a group of seven. The food service is impressively fast. If Cora's, IHOP, and Denny's don't improve their service and food quality, they may soon be dethroned by OEB Breakfast Co. While the ambiance is fine, the standout feature is their exceptional customer service. The manager, Michael Moore, is the best restaurant manager I've ever encountered; he's incredibly friendly and always attentive to table service. Ariel, a busboy, provides service that surpasses many waiters. I highly recommend this place for a truly enjoyable breakfast experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDqca1wXXBLvJRxy5IceNmRpWOFICLS_cE1His&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Georgia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWzyMwRtm2krWlHnLvsDzF-4uBYPCQOWCWIwrrFSQXmPddWoTy7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10!
First time here. Was absolutely blown away by the menu options and atmosphere. Our waiter, Lachlan, was so friendly, knowledgeable, and soft tempered. Totally made the experience level up. The food was also amazing and so tasty! Can not wait to come back and try more options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq8IqyGkosFlJ6V9uQBg-VB48pULpjHBNda-pL&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Kathryn Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULBTPT57DGXc98joUj_cai8KfNmsUPMHA3DgpufJopEeAH2Dpa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When they say “fill the soul” they really mean it! Pictures don’t do enough justice to how sensational the food is here🤤 and the customer service…1000000000000/10! Everyone we interacted with was so friendly, personable, attentive, & overall great. It made our experience that much better! They really made the effort to connect with you and talk with you! And every dish we had was mouth watering and seasoned perfectly! I’m so glad we found this place! I would gladly drive back here from Washington anytime.

I definitely recommend this place for brunch if you’re here in Langley","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoq9vaX9e605wegCZQenPOJtrWN6Hwx2PQiGAo&fid=0x0:0x70acbcda9823973"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sidharth Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY2qqi6SGXcEVYEJ6HeAZWaQ9UZ9aMRb4bl9Ei0VN9hb2UDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're a fan of bold flavors and a bit of heat, the Spicy Peanut with Crispy Chicken at Noodlebox is a must-try! The dish is a delightful blend of textures and tastes. The crispy chicken adds a satisfying crunch, perfectly complementing the rich, creamy peanut sauce that has just the right amount of spice to give it a kick without being overwhelming.

The noodles are cooked to perfection, absorbing the delicious sauce and making every bite a flavor explosion. The fresh vegetables add a nice contrast, providing a refreshing crunch that balances out the dish. The portion size is generous, making it great value for the price.

Overall, the Spicy Peanut with Crispy Chicken is a standout dish at Noodlebox. It's a harmonious blend of spicy, savory, and crunchy elements that will leave your taste buds dancing. Highly recommended for anyone looking to spice up their meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOyRXFNWh-TqLsrjxcFgy9m2mO4irRzeUQo_DX&fid=0x0:0x8b219312b3113733"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Divya Sumbria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBhKr_DShgLeCKY2rKWUV1ONO1fi10hxxh1qHlhf1QOVqJBY0E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the best food experience, tried there butter chicken box and spicy peanut box which was the blend of amazing flavours bursting with flavours.The ambience was warm and inviting. The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive. I highly recommend it to anyone visiting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Helen Brooke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQjUeRcNke_ob6Vk_VAYxkqNMx_ESzv2mP5dqzDkucbgvqxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first visit to the Noodle Box in the Willoughby area.  Won't be my last, that's for sure!  Friendly greeting and great customer service. I had the Spicy Peanut Noodle Bowl with medium heat...just the right amount of spice. I didn't have to wait more long for my meal. It was served to me by a super friendly young man who clearly has pride in his restaurant.  It was piping hot and the portion size was larger than I expected. A great value. Looking forward to going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY74Z1MGc_KbdnBZzLpNKjI7ZdXuUqu0_sLhbZ&fid=0x0:0x8b219312b3113733"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hi 1st time eating here it was flavourful & spiced 2 directions. Great value box doesn't look like much until u pour it out into a bowl. Once again great flavour try something different each time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPX_damTQ0oUoaw6PMR7UnWYqqq4W1vu8Y2U9I2&fid=0x0:0x8b219312b3113733"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Harshdeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaYMeR-O7FQTFSdCbzygW7lN9rns9quxTjZlFq1VdSBr0_EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited noodlebox just few days back and the girl(Raman)  working at front guided me so well and helped me selecting the best box for me. She’s so polite and delivers good customer service. Thank you to the chef also who prepared the tasty meal for me. I’ll visit again for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly costumer service, great selection of noodles! I got spicy peanut noodle box, as recommended by the employee, and it did not disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUNvbI8lW-tnG5mnaqTfl6WxZcAZUWVUZ3fhLf&fid=0x0:0x8b219312b3113733"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Ivan Celuszak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUD7T6QUK-_m5jgLHeTZIcotEHFQ24zmGZUmqYdTw8PWaYYTLz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the yangzhou fried rice scorching hot. It hit the spot perfectly, the meal still tasted delicious but the spice had a nice feeling and came through well. Really friendly front end staff, will be back, maybe they can make it even hotter!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3yQ5eBCsB7cQBx3-1x5TQ2h1HyjWeSLjMuKxn&fid=0x0:0x8b219312b3113733"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Phil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPSaDSgTRlKeGwdPvmbMhVQqh1EC9T2IsTq_d01rRMn3vd6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Really nice guys working there ordered several boxes of the teriyaki and black bean sauce with noodles. However, the taste compared to my local Noodlebox tasted off. It seems like the oil either was old or the walk wasn’t clean properly or perhaps they were very busy with takeout I actually threw out, three of the four boxes I bought because of the smell and the taste of the oil. Really hopeful that this would be convenient for me to pick up.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp85P5JohieEKJOfTMzyjH1aTNit_eIhBL3dFVyxf0xS2BxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Missus and I along with sister & brother in-laws had brunch at the Sidebar Grill.  The restaurant was clean, received great table service, food was delicious and reasonable prices.  We had the fish & chips, Valley Breakfast, Meat Lovers Breakfast Bowl and the Mediterranean Lamb Burger.  The Missus has revisited for other occasions with acquaintances and gives Sidebar Grill the thumbs up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuZwS_v9WWkzNBvnJhY1_H1aPDCkSvpUREm99_&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Youstina Shehata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzsTGVeU4-cUZZ1vushC5E3sYZe1CPneelgW4NyvHbbl4BPy0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited the SideBar grill with family and was thoroughly impressed. The buttermilk chicken and waffles were a standout – crispy chicken and perfectly fluffy yet crisp waffles with the right amount of sweetness.

The smoked salmon delight was another highlight, featuring a generous portion of salmon paired with flavorful cream cheese. The strawberry banana French toast, while good, felt more like regular toast and could have used a bit more egg to achieve that perfect French toast texture.

The ambiance, drinks, and service were all excellent. Highly recommend! Looking forward to trying the rest of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0GlXqh--ixZRO2ae4K5NoA6Q1IJbAKTzjrkGC&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Space Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOMK-3hBgreRBsc6bcZBxDEygFrkfm7M6r7DFXN3LY4r8BiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have taken my family here a few times now and it has become our favourite restaurant in Langley. We have also done date night here and thoroughly enjoyed it. This time I had the ahi tuna burger and I was surprised at how much tuna I actually got. My server recommended the hot honey fries and I would highly recommend these to everyone.

I find that the prices are very reasonable for a family for lunch and dinner. The portions are a great size and the staff are amazing. And for a night out, they have some really fun drinks and the best old fashioned around.

They have lots of seating indoors and a large patio. My only negative would be the hard seats on the patio. They don’t encourage you to stay. Maybe some cushions would help.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlYr1sw7Oblmc8mSLG_y3Hl8-Db64M8Si4azWK&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Dwayne Guzak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaeXUCsWogbI98tALSvw3TcJMEZkzXrvwQmAD2akhoRrCZiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Thought I would check this place out for our anniversary , try some fancy drinks and some food. When I booked it there was an option for a “special occasion “ and I clicked anniversary, but it was irrelevant. Nothing happened and no little dessert or acknowledgment to celebrate like other establishments I have been to in the past have done .

This place is really great , I enjoyed the setting and ambience and when the drinks came out they were amazingly delicious. 10/10

I must say this place had the best chicken sandwich I probably ever had my wife loved the vegetarian tacos

I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family but not if your going to celebrate a special occasion","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHrh49Wt--JPY5YJSL8nc3xG2DgroLeL9FQxKV&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with some friends and had a great time. Parked in the underground parking. It was not busy on a Saturday and we sat there for a long time without ordering cause we were waiting for our friend. The staff was very patient and accommodating for us. I ordered the Ahi Tuna Burger which was so good! As well as the spiced honey fries. Everything was very tasty. It’s a similar vibe to Cactus on its newer and cleaner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDzKaFmLtZfoFQ0W4HztV9YC3B6xoq4d72Dn5l&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Sarah H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1aCuZ1iTSalemEsIpXEd83G27AU4vIx7ChdMHOmdUfiPS8m0z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the first time with some friends last night and had such a fantastic experience. The service was incredible from the manager, Jackie and our server Sarah.

Jackie chatted with us, checked in on us through the evening and made us his signature new cocktail to try. Sarah was also friendly and attentive through the night.

Decor is nice and we enjoyed the happy hour selection, especially the cornbread. Will be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-0drpvQTo584Nblp8T4FaZzVH7FpaShFnh16Q&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Norgren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIk09aoTobt2Wh_hTk4z-4ztvVcxUyc8x1oxXPSH0V_8UfxwZY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first visit to SideBar and let me tell you… the service was PHENOMENAL!! Lauren London was my server and she couldn’t have been better! My water was always full, she checked in multiple times to make sure I had everything and that everything was tasting good. 10/10 service experience!

I had the chicken strips - and I’m not 100% certain if they are breaded in house, but either way, they were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUThb74oQYm5t7ZqESbjJyxUmXSVm_skNMJKz7&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Sunny Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_Q9wwy8e1zmBkXce8UKHNDQ_RTLDIHp8PdamMTHl3h8GtqNXv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is absolutely amazing!! Such good vibes and the food and drinks are top notch 👌 Jacky and Marissa were so great and made sure that everything was perfect and well taken care of. Definitely will be coming back to try their other dishes and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRuwVl2xdkPvetLQdsdkk5151InqZhjx3SciPh&fid=0x0:0xacc21ee30ee27517"],"When":"2024-9-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rayna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd0D5yVmSpb85rg4uE_XJ---IJOMARGRVtOCYq6dLu7nZhfpU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’ve been this place multiple times. Most of the times were okay but the service isn’t very good. Not very friendly.

One time l went and they were like kinda yelling at me to quickly move forward and to choose the flavour because many people were in that place. I understand but they should say more politely and need to improve on services if they want better reviews.

One more thing, if you go with family or with group of people, they seems not welcoming, they say unkindly and makes people feel uncomfortable.

Lastly, ice cream taste is alright l, l enjoyed Oreo, orange chocolate and lemon but not very affordable ice cream shop to go if your looking for cheap priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-YoaNe8IvyNejpcyNV0h9IwyBSTnqtAWe08h2&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Pauline BILOT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV__-1xg8tuVOZLrpMh2veLnJmEx7mWPplH0igQQAhGCZztpVHZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our second time here and we weren’t disappointed! They have a wide variety of flavors, from the all-time favorite vanilla to the astonishing rosewater with pistachio and the staff was really friendly. The ice cream was really refreshing and delicious as always. We loved the warm atmosphere and the cuteness of the place! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONCvqCJXvnUi_vrczR7nr0oIHzVgqLmE-6ac7Y&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Creamy and delicious ice cream and a chocolate dipped cone with one scoop is $ 8.
We bought Cherry Mania and Creme Brûlée and we loved it.
Loved flavours and service.

They got around 20 flavours such as mango, passion fruit, cherry, pistachio, vanilla, chocolate, vegan and sugar free chocolate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiMTflHOqfEtY3TxnrADi7yrd5BuTnHNsCUIXc&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"During a holiday outing with my family, we had the pleasure of visiting here, where we indulged in a delightful selection of treats. Our order included a strawberry ice cream, a Spanish latte coffee, and a double-baked almond croissant, and each item left us with a taste of satisfaction.

The strawberry ice cream was a sweet and refreshing delight, perfect for cooling down on a warm day. The Spanish latte coffee was a wonderful one, offering a rich and invigorating flavor profile.

However, the standout star of our visit was undoubtedly the double-baked almond croissant. Its flaky layers, filled with almond goodness, made it a delectable treat that left our taste buds dancing with joy. It was the unanimous winner among our selections.

The atmosphere within the ice cream shop was rather ordinary, but this was more than compensated by the delicious offerings. The focus here seems to be on the quality of the products, which they certainly deliver.

The customer service was attentive and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE3EWRSGRhTodRsH_R3jzOMqGV5HGxnbdv8Zui&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2023-10-16"},{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another fantastic visit.  My mom and I love this place.
Quaint little ice cream shop in the heart of Fort Langley.  Very friendly people and warm atmosphere.  Great place for families.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMELuzGXtygrKvQRpdYU-ViYrJcTeo-kn4Lu0Rn&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Judy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3kDmGj78asqlzf_tS72aAgBIxvg1BiDWawr1gzZXzCgZ49Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"On August 3rd, around 3:50 PM, the staff provided terrible service. There were five of us in line, and they rushed us to make our selections quickly, even though there were no customers behind us. When we asked for menu recommendations, the staff member was indifferent. Worst of all, the staff looked at us and laughed among themselves, making us feel uncomfortable. We decided not to purchase anything because we didn't want to spend our money at this place. If you want to spend your money wisely, I strongly advise against visiting this store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNofEJ-cj3LBiH8n1GVRWU-8c2UZbfcvmoK88le&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Shierly Yolanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF095OeEzpSqLbe7Rx8sJGnw-Qm4kHB3lenS6Vg0qNm0JBnwBl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Normal ice cream shop. Love the Ferrero Roche flavor! nothing really special, they have lots of flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpkfMwvPI_Yiql9eEjSbcyejBwFUHzS_wxooM_&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"River Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwWlZ_qyMJPDFilNbSahYuhUAWfcgLtqwakyyZo6aVPjR6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So many gluten free options, including cones!
I couldn’t decide what I wanted and the helpful and friendly staff member behind the counter suggested a hojicha affogato 🤤 so good! Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTdWO-KvCLk-uAvY8nIek32-HuLEGJ3IVC-JE&fid=0x0:0x563249657425203"],"When":"2024-11-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz-fxx-9FhjJeZBVOjAjYALrXo8vJBbKx-sHZerG5aR3UGRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today we bought Paneer lababdar which was just okay and Chicken tikka masala which was pathetic. Totally tasteless and undercooked. Vegetable Pulao with no veggies. Naan was burnt. We went to this place after seeing reviews. I really don’t understand how can people waste their hard earned money on this awful food. I am putting this honest review so that next time nobody should throw away their food in garbage. We spent 50$ which was worthless.
Moreover we ordered food and were told it will take 25 minutes of preparation and see the audacity of their hospitality that I along with my family including 2 children waited to pick up food for half an hour and nobody even asked a glass of water. This kind of behaviour never go well with food industry.
Never ever going or recommending this place ever again to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvEpkyJAtaKt9De1JyDZXHu80faFGzEy_Uxy6V&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Kaveesh Kukreja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyGM5Wur1OIcPaIKHk8y8hADl72LlmzqOApRwMvp0cKEQAxid2PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wish it was closer to my place but I'm glad I ended up coming here. Went to check out fort Langley and found this little gem on the way back.
Their food was phenomenal.
Loved the veg Manchurian, probably best I've had in metro van so far.
Don't remember the chicken dish we picked but I remember the flavour was there and the chicken was cooked perfectly.
The veg platter was okay but it is all fried food after all so no regretas. The dahi kabab was the best there so I'd recommend just getting a plate of those instead.
If I'm ever back in Langley it's the only place I'm gonna visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJRgCOPqcUyg3VkJMQDIM3gvJTAYhDDQQ-iuWU&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"harpreet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOFZreFHSOkK3HCLKqeV3DDBX7FcGdLCNnfMrD0uRFAdKcrdor=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our 16th anniversary today.  It was indeed a special day. I requested the staff to arrange a desert for my wife ( as a surprise). They went above and beyond at did it at the last moment. We loved the food. The girls were polite and very social. I will definitely recommend this place to friends, colleagues and family","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX2NaUhik6wMjJXBk_eLmuBn4fVgsfuJIdack0&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant has a great lunch special menu.  I ordered the mango chicken and it was delicious.  Not too spicy (you can adjust spicy level) and a bit sweet.  The value for this lunch special is great with naan and rice included.  Would be nice to have a bit more greens would be nice but can't complain with this dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGm4uuGNFxjxA_Ko9ROWHfoLZUkT6wPMXn7fB6&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Jenny Mellow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHDYM_xHLaCzHlN4-sFsHmxZRnk4zUIWVrvY5WPleXbQ-n2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Searched for great Indian food on the local FB pages and it led us to Masala Boyz. Hear me when I say this was THE best Indian food we have ever had. We thought Diamond Sweets and Indian Affair were great but it pales in comparison to Masala Boysz. Gorgeous decor, wonderful servers and HUGE and delicious portions, we literally could have another family meal with the leftovers. We had the butter poutine, chicken samosa and medium spice and no spice butter chicken with rice, plain and garlic naan bread. You must go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPIx-ZFXccf1js5vUxBIvE8Y01BGaaYNeYPz0P&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Virginia Mouland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFs5Q25e-0FB3VxTDQlTK2Fu3k_59vAesmI0VGDRZeN00VvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is unbelievable. The restaurant is so pretty inside, decorated with string lights inside, wood, brick, chandeliers, and beautiful colourful flowers on the outside. I’ve never had a dish that I didn’t love and many options on the menu. The food is absolutely delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbKynwHM2jPW1aYy1U86NfJaAyzF7XE3UFYbU2&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Ibraheem Aziz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUCRwlr78GZ1GRHrfTkGx2BBnyawBYeFefuJjXBEr7AqN1NLIpSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this restaurant for recently and it was good! This spot specializes in Indian fusion dishes, and there is a wide assortment of options on the menu to suit all tastes and preferences. The honey garlic chicken wings were great, as were the lamb kebabs. Portion sizes are good for the price, especially the meat platter - you get tandoori chicken, beef, fish, shrimp and vegetables in a substantial helping. Service was relatively quick as well and the staff did a great job at ensuring the food was prepared and served in a timely manner. There's ample seating available inside for dining-in, and takeout is an option as well. Overall, worth visiting for Halal Indian food in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbN7JNMlWNBEGSF7s9CAvW6Z1WEl_7VMHHWp2E&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Ravi Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNr2hpEy1WpBxVP8loP8psjWRvBCcmHvOlnxJu_jIszGxpaPgBxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice ambiance and service, however the food didn't live upto the expectations.

We ordered angoori kofta which was described in the menu as cheese dumplings with raisins in creamy almond and cashew sauce, but the kofta served had neither the cheese or raisins in it and the curry the regular butter sauce unlike as defined in the menu. Tasted well and good quantity though.

Naans were again of good size and filling, but felt a bit undercooked. Stuffing in the stuffed naan was really good though.

Probably not a great place to have regular lunch/dinner. Maybe they focus more on snacks and drinks which we didn't order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_Rlmm53yfaIV5zQu-TKX0pVVRZycsKQQiqz2m&fid=0x0:0x2f8e191be138dd8b"],"When":"2024-6-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ian Sebasstian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5eNKqW2WKdIVzwatnWg0uhl9Fwth4ULHq_sirP0oVLN9l6sxkqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything you would expected from a friendly neighbourhood Pho restaurant. Their friendly and always some interested shit on the tv’s. I saw competitive axe throwing on the tv for the first time ever. Figure skating is nice to watch there too. Just the whole vibe and food is good. Any number off the menu is good. I’m Trying them all!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqlF9q2cbnKuAir11H_X1peSQ4yQnxYZ_-mhBh&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Petite.roseraie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdfVgVOh5yPovZnDrSYSwWwd69IqfGbJIdEaESko2GSD-F2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t do takeouts/delivery service. Look at the quality of the food and the portion for $21.45. The pork chop was all burnt and so hard I couldn’t even try it. And the portion compared to chicken is ridiculous. They shouldn’t do delivery service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuF7yN0LeDXtn2kqQNOGO1qfK4Yc4KFLHa9nXX&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"万竹","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsirj2w9NgKxB4GQZVGrpbGaK60xEpSi0cVmeVC0yEcSSkqbG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Quantity over quality.  I eat a lot of Vietnamese (see my reviews).  Here the flavors were off, a strange gamey taste and heavy msg.  Not terrible, but with so many other options I wouldn't come back here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZabrSud1qap3yAlAYurvxRusH2fuh-jLBuA81&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Aaron Tsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKselZh-MPsiIlbaET84bKWRWSIWJxPXUFBGJ7SEN047CFNigL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The vegetarian and vegan options are disappointing. I paid $17 for this portion of vegetables with rice. The beef pho is okay.

I think it's fine to not have vegetarian options on your menu, but if you choose to serve them they should be something to be proud of.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAdICk4jKoMqxyNVdjXIMOwGUYjis0fiZ15rt1&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Broth & flavors were very tasty. Service was friendly + prompt. We'll be back thk u. Pork Bahn sub so good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2ioR73hu2wK7_42rnR7ODsbewOga0_iiJyguz&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2023-11-25"},{"Name":"Neil Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTcDRCcRVHozp66z3tpb12CBzFK7EhG1yBwtJ4Ee1n9zHYrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Missed the flavor mark completely. One thing a good Pho restaurant is known for is exploding the pallette with flavors and, unfortunately,  the chicken curry dish I ordered fell flat on flavor. Credit must be given that there were subtle hints of flavor mixed in to the watered-down dish like a gentle tease. Other reviews seem to share similar sentiment. There is potential and I hope the restaurant isn't too proud to adapt to their customers comments!

I will return to try their broth, but if that has similar flavor issues I will not return. There's just too much full-flavored competition to choose from. If they want to charge a higher price, their dishes should meet the increase!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEF9Z_aR7bFDPzeaXoTsgJ9K5fU47cUKUJqJdm&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Adriana P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKENiWUoNjl33BSK6-y6ikvlUimDMPUhOFsrrXjNzQQ_axe1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We same form Chilliwack specifically to have lunch at this place. We were not disappointed!
The service is great, on top of it! Very efficient and we did not have to wait long for our food.
I had the Grilled Pork BBQ with Spring roll on Vermicelli. What a full meal! It was so flavourful, a the portion was big, making it my lunch AND dinner. My guest had the Grilled Lemongrass Chicken on Vermicelli. The chicken was like a full breast of chicken, so thick and juicy. The salad that came with both platters was simple , yet a good compliment to the platter.
The tea was good, not my favourite but that’s just a personal choice.
I will go back again to try the other dishes that looked so good as they were being carried to other guests.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8g5hEHIdu2XxQGUBSgYxE-aY89YP9JdLTndKcxvu6k0fn_XdJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is open 24 Pho Seven... lol.

Had the House Special Pho and it was amazing. A little bit more expensive than the usual Pho places, $20 for Special; but hard to find good quality Pho in Langley.

Seems like a family owned restaurant and servers were very nice and attentive.

I have a new Pho place 10 minutes from my house now to go to! 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIuFKq4XPL-uqPgstUVxM5gSVFdxhHmG0_ZvFB&fid=0x0:0x77a7251a8fcce1c3"],"When":"2024-4-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gunamrit Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWq3-F1c9vi-lUXjwF0pImwxbkNnF8hRD3XeR6JwabRP-t-r3hh5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at Wings Langley! The wings were super crispy and full of flavor, and the curly fries with pickled onions were sooo good. The nachos and mozzarella sticks were delicious too, and the portions were huge. The vibe of the place was really chill and welcoming, and the staff were super friendly. Also, you HAVE TO try the fried dill pickles - they’re a must. Keep in mind to eat with fork + knife or you’ll burn your tongue. Definitely worth a visit if you’re in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmflTUrscUP32lH4iCH40rv7Lx8omRVohNe9c7&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Lem Jo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVIJRvxTsKEqaWK-lQyWUU1JNKvw8c-e741IeRBz-MUvKR6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tiny portions, horrible service and a lackluster taste! From our initial appetizer to the chicken wings, it became pretty obvious this location is a big fan of small portions. In fact, our spinach dip came with a very tiny serving of Nachos. It can barely serve a single person! Plus, our serving of wings was so tiny. It lacked any meat and seasoning. Due to the bland taste, we complained to our server. She eventually took back the wings to their kitchen. About 10 minutes later, she returned with the same COLD wings with a side of extra seasoning. They refused to cook us a new batch of wings and expected us to sprinkle seasoning over cold meat! We refused the wings and removed it from our bill. The manager did not even make an effort to approach us or correct their mistake. What a total insult.

Overall, we refuse to support local businesses that insult the intelligence of their customers. The Wings Langley location has definitely made that list. Cooking a decent set of chicken wings is not rocket science. Stay away from this overrated place, unless you like to be treated like a 2nd class citizen.  We'll take our business elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHp-tL3w9IrkR-nY3oweeUXyyFYAytgGPsmlQx&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Ngoc Ha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBQDR7xuHV7zpmSmm8y3qArF6yv91O7Kuz_kGRJuYZ6FiARojF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my second time in Langley Wings. I have no complaint about food and service. I'm here just to say it is no longer half price wings on Wednesdays and Sundays. It is now a $12 for 10 wings with all the requirements stay the same. Also, the Fiji Larger is now $5.50 instead of $5 per 18 oz like in the menu. And, this is not in the menu, but you can order a cup of milk for $4.10 if you are not the soft drink kindda person like me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4hIyp7OQIiP8MyqCB-Zl9p8uWSJtAfntycU3H&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Those were some delicious tasting wings and nice cold beer to wash it all down!
Spacious restaurant and good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlMW5CjXODD4ZABBDBnHAQdlzob5ebptEM26cj&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Peach *","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUMDMNTo-ScTIy0d3Waujkda7zDY-CP98UQIkLaFQH-1RLIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If a restraunt from hell existed, this would be it. What a disgusting divey place (next to a divey motel), I honestly feel sorry for the people who work there. The wings were very underdone and almost raw on the inside. We didn’t eat the big wings… They were also under seasoned. They argued with us about how they check the internal temperature and took 1 pound off the bill (we sent as much back). They also comp’ed us an under done brownie. The selection of beer on tap was atrocious.  Overall, the atmosphere was loud, with extra loud rednecks yelling at the TVs during the game. Screaming like they are in their own living room and not a public place with kids. No culture, no decorum. No self-respecting person needs to patronize this “establishment” nor work there. This was lunch on a Sunday! Never again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOylZBdvaeQ3jYPO8I1-MC_diZmZSb0x8QwKlHs&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"The JOKER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQuiHl5446ZqSIBmhoQY8q4NuTHDo0F4Qr2KVa1APrDHGiVv22=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On Wings day the average price per wing is 1.10 to 1.20 each.
The salt n pepper wings weren't good at all as it was dry n tasteless. The peri peri was average as the flavour wasn't spread out evenly on the wings so some of the wings were bland.
The best wings were the outback BBQ.
The waitress was very nice and attended to our requests. 👍
We attended 2day for Wings. The wings were really good, especially the peri, peri, and the sweet Thai chili.
Our server was the best. She had a beautiful 😍 smile and a great personality.  She looked like a famous movie star and she attended to our requests. A beautiful woman.
Will be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjmA4ZczBvTy8qWz8nOC7bShPIPGLdajG9xsXn&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2023-9-3"},{"Name":"ron peterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLa3quAB-sm1UuH4PgFm4RcOqY54B68dSFrxfQzhVV9srSNRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"$20 for 10 wings that were undercooked. Ive had much better wings for a tenth the price.
Will not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPms4CbSxHioVETmCH-F_HDSwKG7XLWJlsmVb31&fid=0x0:0xecaae55a51723d32"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Amrit B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFLiapBA9KFgi0CTE9WEr9il_x64PVTSYHwPoN1VIUpgu9WLYm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wings Langley is my go-to spot for satisfying wing cravings! Their wings are truly massive and packed with flavor. The meat is always juicy and cooked to perfection. While some reviews mention the prices being slightly high, I believe the generous portion sizes more than make up for it.
Based on other reviews and my own experiences, the Honey Garlic, Salt & Pepper, Korean, and Roasted Red Pepper wings are all fantastic choices. The Korean wings pack a flavorful punch with a balance of sweet and spicy, while the Roasted Red Pepper offer a unique and savory twist. As for dipping sauces, the classic Ranch and the tangy Blue Cheese are always winners.
To complement the wings, I highly recommend trying the Fiji Blonde beer on special. It's a light and crisp beer that pairs perfectly with the bold flavors of the wings.
While the service is generally friendly, there's room for improvement in terms of attentiveness during busy periods. Also, some have mentioned the wings can be a bit dry at times.
Overall, Wings Langley delivers on its promise of big, delicious wings with a wide range of flavors to choose from. Despite a few minor areas for improvement, it remains a top spot for wing lovers in Langley.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjXHHF3vPFKXXTvrLI9L9GLLX-x9A-g0rYHpm8C9R04tRthXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Modern but cozy dinning room. Reasonable pricing that was at least 10% cheaper than Vancouver/ Richmond. Overall great dining experience

Room for improvement:
Servers could be more attentive as we often had to wave them over to get more tea.

Would Recommend the salad with ginger sauce","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2o1he9NOagZCPuyg9fPmeHWTzs4zOkKVwjJKk&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Russ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx2YszxoSLymT99LyleLNEENIKqP9MmFQ5MbM6PHvvpLXivdOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food. Great service. Generous portions. Will definitely be back to try other things on the menu. Highly recommend this new place. My new favorite Sushi restaurant in Langley by a landslide.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8Qzf2FDyWraKktW_mYPpelSPTgwV1nDR7QVBT&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Jessica Greville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi1HmvfZo6ZEH-pJLpLVVhH1StEVSZjyscQoBq0jggNNlGwyJW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kai langley at Latimer Village is becoming our favorite Japanese spot. The restaurant is very spacious and we like the minimal decor. The dishes are all lovingly prepared and the small touches of arranged flower sashimi or shredded beets and daikon make for a nice presentation. We are huge fans of the Spicy Chirashi - Korean inspired seafood salad with rice and an incredible spicy umami dressing. It's served in a massive salad bowl,  great for sharing with a few friends! The dinner sets are also delicious, and such good value. The seafood salad is also delicious,  perfect for a solo entree. The only "miss" would be the chicken karagge according to our teen son (a self proclaimed connessieur) as the pieces of chicken are cut like fish and chips, and not as crispy and bite sized as expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8isku-UjRjMkJurnO3v5r02RORGmhujwUeBb1&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Laur Missy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULX_R-ECCOPi2MFWqqpF8vFhJUId8FgF-hsJniKlBjWklfCaye=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The sushi here is AMAZING.

However their chicken teriyaki is subpar.
I really hope they change the onions to sprouts… cause I’m sure nobody enjoys eating a plate full of honker onions. It did not go well with the chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_lKleqIJ-RIrFo-wOM_3Om-80cQo-KsNUd_ie&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious and fresh nigiri. Loved the toro here.

The only thing I would not order again is the spicy sashimi - it was a little fishy, portion was small and it was an odd flavour profile to me with the pineapple.

Service was good and restaurant was clean!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT8CYinzLdoJRyzPn5QpODHT1n3S1YpNfK2Nst&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Lisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQwku8o1ZSoTroEApjrO8qHTMjU-5Kjd5FWDYg_XlI6fBz4W-Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great quality and consistent. My favourite dish is not always available but it always makes me wanting to go back for it. Quick and precise services. One of my favourite sushi places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTijvqVgnskC74L9JvI6tj9uDv_6vyH2BCsc2a&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Helen H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfR5ySpx_X9vVhECEymbWsEn0sw6FJ6xhDOOiMkfgVM6UlruWW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sushi is incredibly fresh, of high quality, and served in generous portions. The seating is clean and comfortable, creating a pleasant dining atmosphere. The service is attentive and very friendly, and the prices are reasonable. The lunch set offers great value, and I’m already looking forward to returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJXV4vcu0_nQz9SRxTaYyfSPCZY0dexLHYFu03&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious. The price is an affordable. I got the deluxe sashimi, and it was $70 and enough for 3 people as an appetizer. We had 6 people so we ordered 2. Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmlgW8Pdo87O6Pwk26VpZ9Ctx7vBayt4_ZvJXL&fid=0x0:0xaa87de9b4f0b826d"],"When":"2024-10-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Evan Northway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6ziVJpLyxdRklZ1N5zk_c2kHezlvCaEPFz4BD2TfQ6zJIvcM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the best tacos I've had EVER. The guy who made our food is very good at his job and knows how to cook. Very good and will be coming back to try more options. I ordered the Gochujang Tacos and fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGiZG9Rmo1mTkE12aW6uc3x7s-l43Br7Qj27VQ&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Attila Szamoskozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2AAt3w8V6vnjRCqXfUE0xqvAqQuLl4Zs8C3rG6vUvIyME7FzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My son and I had the Gochuchang Chicken Burritos with the Poutine fries combo tonight.  Delicious!  Ingredients were fresh with nice variation in texture.  The chicken was fried and crunchy with plenty of veggies cheese and rice.  Portion was size was good.  Prices were fair I think for what you get with regards to quality and portion size.  Be aware the Gochuchang sauce is quite spicy, but we loved it!   Service was very friendly and helpful, with good suggestions for us first timers.  Would definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl7NRAQAR6fJxP6YKKZblaOb28TBfB-ZvauvZa&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Arteris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX30Dyu-QK7wHTj3eMSizkcuOLMJe3eY1W7TqusQxucea24_Ur2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a craving for Coconut Shrimp that could not be ignored. And after googling options for the Langley area I decided to try strEATS for the first time.

And let me tell you I was not disappointed at all. The coconut shrimp was perfect. Hit the exact itch I wanted to scratch and the Baja Fish Burrito I had with it wasn't super heavy or dense in the stomach while still being full of goodness and flavor.

Being able to wash it all down with a nice and cold Corona rounded the entire experience out. The staff were great and the location was very clean. I'll definitely be coming back again and recommending it to my friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cindy, CM Gan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwjkEy2R3SrN-ZWmN_JNrc8_mQxrR31avZlGYUkam1BC75jxY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delightful food : tried the Gochujang chicken bowl (my friend has her gluten free)
Service was great; especially this young server Brath (hopefully I got it right) who took time to explain gluten free options.

Lots of options to choose: added bonuses","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPp3lVnLib4mkt0y5AX3QHzlKx6-xRzUDWSTw&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7RFvJkc5TcTHI1CNno7mWtnoVe5RPMM3SAlN-mtpAjXJnlFWX5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had peri peri chicken taco. Delicious sauce. Service was pretty quick and place is very clean. Harman was pretty awesome and very knowledgeable about menu. She also recommend best taco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8of84kg8EiS4aY-Zr8zcg-8lKuY7Fnj8Qt9xN&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Logan Dowie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBcQbhdTBWzPCaNK4V7L5zAUrb6ICXwA8YMYjEynp19ZBQcR5Y9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places to eat. Out of all the streets locations, I’m convinced this one is the best. I always get the fish tacos and poutine combo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo1WQ67dyxjyZOTgagVJjCN9KFKY2BMsXoy4WO&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Dr. Bill Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOOpO9U9EzDoHRU2ntsJ3YvH2FgT_9bEBTcuuF2Mt7K8ipCrna=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Three of our family ate here tonight. The food is consistently fresh, incredibly tasty, and so, so good! Tonight was no exception. The gentleman who took our order (Prab) and brought the food out was incredibly helpful and kind. And the burritos? Amazing! A great, great place to grab healthy, amazing good eats!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the fish burrito (Baja fish) as it was mentioned as the most popular item on the menu for the burrito by the front counter girl. It's definitely packed with flavour and creamy citrus hints in every bite. The coleslaw and tomatoes add lightness and texture, I just wish there was more fish in the wrap. Overall I think the price of 12$ for this burrito is spot on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUZHjy-6t7ftn8fuAiNRU0_FpfeAtbe_JwuTbI&fid=0x0:0x5daaf82e14c640a8"],"When":"2023-9-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christine Pothier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKop8cx8R7hLZOcHwcJ6BPimW-YsZwpb29lZejMj9hiJKW9AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We really want to love this restaurant and support them so this is a tough review to write. We have been multiple times with disappointing experiences.
The food is always delicious, beautiful and inventive. IMO they create some of the most inspired vegan food, done well. Poutine, pancakes, lox charcuterie board, Caesar salad are all fantastic.
Our issue is with the service. Multiple times we have arrived to find that they are out of many or most of their options (hours before closing). This would be acceptable if they didn’t seat us, take a drink order, bring the drinks and then inform us that they are out. Once, they only had 2 menu options left. Two.
The most recent visit, I called ahead to ask if they were still serving and was told no problem. Again, we were not informed until we tried to order the unavailable items. When I mentioned this, the server said they would never tell us over the phone if they are out of options.
I recommend their food but would order ahead for takeout or be sure to dine in first thing on the morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8dVkl0nBJK7r8DQ5WOcAyF6rrQsxYkzf8m-uW&fid=0x0:0x2d5f31ba0b655de6"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here. Vibrant atmosphere, nice interior design and friendly staff.
I enjoyed the whole dining experience, maybe a bit too much as I didn't have room for dessert but more the reason to comeback! You forget everything here is all Vegan. Delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk9XUJE6nYB-g6mNgoy2Nxnw3BIICz4yTBZZ6U&fid=0x0:0x2d5f31ba0b655de6"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Samantha Smirnov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUljxIT4Fms3H9uH5TSd-VeyQU2Aja1raOZWOr_GEtRUCYEE6M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Oat Milk Chai Tea was amazing, Its a super cute little vegan place that we enjoyed celebrating a birthday at. Food was tasty as a non vegan I was very impressed. My only complaints I would have is they served the adults before kids and didn’t serve the bday person first. The menu says things that aren’t vegan but they are which some of the party and table beside ours got confused by when asked the employee stated example its to help you think beef dip but its vegan but it isn’t labeled vegan beef dip so I could imagine that could be confusing for some people . Over all cute place and definitely would visit again!

Pictured is a fillet of feesh with poutine (all vegan)  and eggs benny (vegan)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUet2lLUzuUWoPZTeFMTwm3VyELF-sJgthKTy-&fid=0x0:0x2d5f31ba0b655de6"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Emily Odermatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUywkRbXYNcuGZN5C1HwyJkPGB4Luik6zyiyABorhQQtOBCtfWP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You’re always guaranteed a delicious meal from here! Hits the spot and doesn’t leave you feeling heavy and greasy!

My go to is the Meatball Sub, Poutine and Caesar Salad!

Can confirm everything is amazing, can’t go wrong!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO52WEl6YlS3_qBLaloYLWhFsL30lDwKqTAU0EM&fid=0x0:0x2d5f31ba0b655de6"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Serena Vibert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWz1CqOPVJabvtqobUI-pA9xQfYZL5oM0X4phfpA3xSrVFRDAZh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the best time visiting this restaurant for the first time today! The decor is so cool & fun. The service was phenomenal & the food was seriously so amazing.

I would also like to take the time to mention I’m a first time mom who has a super colicky baby. He has harsh reflux as well. When our food came he started screaming & I excused myself twice so that I didn’t interrupt any of the other guests that were there to enjoy their meals. The owner Alysa followed me out the second time & insisted to let her soothe/feed him while I go eat lunch. This was such a sweet, thoughtful & kind thing to do. It’s hard trying to get yourself to go out with a 3 month old, wishing for the best when you do go out & she made my experience so much more special. I will forever recommend her restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayne Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUms7PcN3Vy1M-xxhw_bkbo3QTmP5q-g8ISEeKG_LRu_HHeOy0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this restaurant and been twice now for lunch and their weekend brunch menu. Never disappoints, the meals are amazing! I love the waffles and the tofu benny. Delicious!
Service was a little slow but it was busy on both days. Overall, my favourite place and can’t wait to go back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPubYYuRH8S_J2_59g0CDQqB201LxXkdz9tK9ZU&fid=0x0:0x2d5f31ba0b655de6"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Tabitha Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNaBuz4gnbMmSK81fB05Q3m4-o58Ja9ITG_lznA_YTWZrdwvRWzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Server was pleasant upon walking in, handed us menus and allowed us to pick a seat

Liked that the server was giving recommendations.
Things like "this one's really delicious, but messy" go a long way if you can tell people are showing up for work talks.
I went with a very messy, delicious recommendation of the hot Nashville sandwich.

Opted for water for a drink but was only topped up once. My friend and I were both thirsty throughout.

They close early. Unfortunately we stayed late and were the last ones in so got ushered out.

Overall, good food, will go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nika Moeini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsFWIuYGkU_vQ-SNFAaTjcl5dIFjZe-4IFc2dLJ4QKoHNKEpklHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love down 2 earth plant parlour! Always delicious whether for brunch or dinner. The kale salad is a favourite as is the beef dip. The brownie for desert is perfect and I recommend the horchata latte. The burgers are delicious too including both the regular and chicken burgers. The vibe is always positive and the service friendly and kind. Will come back often :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwVfesEMsmSrmEY9YsuhsPU67QDde8AEt8qDC3&fid=0x0:0x2d5f31ba0b655de6"],"When":"2023-12-28"}]
