user_reviews: [{"Name":"Briana Magnussen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK79Bp5HL-PDMAKJACuxSuAx-3cE5LlYYzZMw0vfDKGbvnY9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantasticly fresh food and attentive service with a beautiful free sample! I highly recommend this sushi restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgLRRbjEvpbRi_lH3HBd9_vqarZdE2gDwNQdRv\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"sudip kc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWip5kBLnBa9j89Q8HUrlVvg2gaknlSO0fISHNENuHBE0_QfXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve a good sushi with a special sauce. I just love it. If you are nearby this location, try it on one time.....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7UVGZ3kzPzG18yIUA14nzF40am8dEM-ZefL8W\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTd1Rqs7VgPhdrfxxG4D9LIBsTUDrAsKvUnxDxUDS6a4O3GLQ_HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has become mine and my stepdaughters \"place\". We love it here. The atmosphere is mellow and low-key cozy with a pop of action figure/superhero vibe. Just so happens the food is awesome too. I got the Nabeyaki and she got the Crazyboy, a fried California Roll, with the Miso soup. It was all so delicious. But what we really love is that we have our table, we have our tea, we chat, we interact with our gracious hosts and enjoy some great food. It just feels like you're at home. I would highly recommend you check it out!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMup1w3hdUvVQDsLxlpeWG38NPQKSIMqOv7Db0\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2023-12-11"},{"Name":"Tehzeeb Buttar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC5kf9rhePC74FuVD05SvGk_rsAEXw7q6MkCNFdPqTD7HdFqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For starters the place is small but very cozy. When we got there the place was fairly busy. The staff were very kind and sweet, and they gave us complimentary rolls to try! Oh my goodness the food! Delicious and amazing! Definitely recommend and definitely would come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaspreet Malhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFqeDmTA-0Pd5ehTORDCo4cdu-TaxlQ606aqWdxhEXvOfEIVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service 10/10! I ordered my food 10 mins in advance and said I’ll be there to eat for my lunch break, they had everything ready perfectly on time and fresh when I arrived! Thank you for the amazing experience and service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOes9P0cMcnsIEXeXpVLO1Qw7bBuuptxog1h-is\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Ray Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnHoKzUHN2laU2bSp7bGdZulx8wlTrl7fcyIV2n_GmA8fi001AHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has to be the best Sushi joint in Langley. Everything here is made fresh and even the Miso soup is very good much more better than other Sushi places I been though around the lower mainland. I will most definitely come back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNapzuourHLoIBNCHEWoSKMwftWLxST3b6QV7GZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Laura Mills","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVthiElYPRWnZZeMADCe8CJBqvXAa4YsFBAgaFK5DScomR7__TR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute and cozy little restaurant. Food was delicious and fresh tasting, they gave me a little deep friend piece of sushi “on the house”. Plus my server was super cute! Will definitely eat here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsniG3zu4SwMphpH7SkESPPBxlDgD_IGwyVScP4N-Rh_5M1mDk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite sushi spots. Super lucky to have a spot of this quality out in Langley! I usually go for nigiri wherever I go. Akane also has really good miso soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfvHbbA055jjBi50q223GgFQD_CA73eeBe9wFV\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5cc2138c5bca098"],"When":"2024-4-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justin J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9qB0BPnH-SxgmMKD9knqz657T2834b2TJgDxXzOsqhmSY7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our family came here for a birthday brunch, and we had a great experience. Our waiter was nice, friendly, and very patient with our group. The ambiance and environment were enjoyable, and the food, while deceptively filling, tasted great. Parking can be hectic—you’ll be lucky to find a spot close by. We highly recommend making a reservation, as there’s always a wait if you drop in without one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa4uoPonS9TSsIolAhXEXhTkGrSvHgRuj5bW6K&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Kuma Hettiarachchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSmJYYcIaL5IyWFqSx2r32b36Wa0t2dSBlFY4nx237uNMhNI21=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happy hour options were great and had the pleasure of being served by Imelda, and I must say, her professionalism and clarity were truly impressive. From the moment she greeted us.

Overall, Imelda provided an outstanding dining experience, combining exceptional service with a deep knowledge of the menu.

Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhC-tvzycEX9xtEwRUM8hpwQb3ZRxo7yR5VPtA&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Rachael Susman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPoMtlBFwD-2vPTOE73pyX7mXXMT1R0OArtKsfrdk0kZSo9Zzk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at a Cactus Club Cafe and I will say, I’ll be recommending this place to anyone and everyone in the future. Everything was amazing from the food all the way down to the service. I had ordered the Filet and Lobster and it was the most delicious meal I could have ever eaten. The steak was so tender and the lobster had so much flavour.. even the side dishes of mashed potatoes and vegetables were delicious. We also got the Salmon sushi which was to die for. If you’re a sushi lover, you need to have this at least once. I also got the Riesling to drink which was Devine. It was a 10/10 experience and I cannot wait to go again. The staff were so kind and the atmosphere was so mellow and relaxing. I love it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiJgGXhjDAwawpt_SpPz93QbqLgL2A-nhUhexL&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Jordan Blaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_iD6bb17qljNA2aSFr9JfMC0Jg6j51TZ3bv9L9X_-KFOAVyjatg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Every time I have come here I have had a good experience up until last night. I went out with a few friends for some drinks and appetizers (Monday night at 9pm) and I was very disappointed by our service. The waitress took 20 minutes to bring us out our waters after we had to ask for them. We then asked for a second round of drinks and that took another 15-20 minutes to get. We were sitting close to the bar, and I could see that no one was making any drinks so I was confused as to what took so long. When we asked for the bill it took 10 minutes for her to bring it over and then another 15 minutes to come back with a machine. I normally don’t write bad reviews, but after my friend told me that they had had bad service last time she was there I knew I had to write something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLVozWgSusR7by9oI5UaXw4Vb3ZVGQCnPDJZOm&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing. The service was great. We went on a Thursday at 1:00 p.m. and didn't have reservations. We didn't have to wait long but the place looked pretty busy. I'd recommend reservations especially if you want to sit on the patio which looked beautiful.

The restaurant was very clean and upscale. The food was absolutely delicious. The bathroom stalls each have their own TV screen which made me laugh.

The bill came to $100 for a dinner for two. I had the $7 virgin mojito which was incredibly tasty.  And the spaghetti Portofino which had lobster and prawns. It was so good. I don't know how they make their food so delicious.

My husband had peppercorn steak with mashed potatoes and tea. He had the same comment as me, how do they make it taste so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbFwjzNfWR6rvVUYuXjLbzMXkOzUXHQH7sMq0j&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Marah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZv-rntCF5PMmTfmsmUbR5NBXphhWKaYdnqzRJHvCSkrXX8E7t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is always good and great customer service. The 6 layer cake got me it was delicious you need 2-4 people to finish it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQa3PaUi7wwl4SqzsICohXFieP9iJ9sPqktIQM&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Karan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW4OtQcfRznpkA6fmLZHSlpfaLSQUpx9i6S0sK3DkkYcdSq4GD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrific and terrible food. Ordered well done steak for my pregnant wife and received it completely rare and blood. It seems that restro doesn’t read instructions and cooks food blindly. It was worst steak of my life.🤮","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi9J9IIXBGpUoSTcGGocuNvHktDIE0lACvKGF6&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Food Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDYW8h-L0vyiCuSqxeTOVKrpbponkRXNcLpA7VOH_xiPkHt-q4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is good but the service was phenomenal.. People was so friendly and nice.. Kaela and Elise were awsome.. they made our dining experience extra special.. will definitely recommend and come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjJvD0OlZBVHyrF_jCxvyGGvvm6Q4624qAM540&fid=0x0:0xed138cbb6edda763"],"When":"2024-11-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The meals were larger portions than expected. Very tasty especially the short ribs. The service was really attentive and ensured my order was modified to my taste. Had the pork and prawns crispy spring rolls with a sweet pepper dip. Requested for fish sauce too, which made it tastier. The S4 special item which is marinated grilled pork sausage (skipped for extra lemongrass chicken ), chicken and bbq short ribs with vermicelli rice wand veggies in the side. Extremely tasty. And suited to a rainy evening. All meals can feed two","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPyH2paRKZMz5gP13aW6LGYba2NdJ327irZcDW&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Josamm Felices","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXslb7R0f3e1oSlcF7KtYyVv10LV44dHgzWJLqop5_m1KV_P1FW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, the best Vietnamese restaurant we ever been to. It’s so good that we frequently eat here at least once a month. Great customer service too! 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ42__QERb78mQx9OC3ca1jnrYzXkWuUT135-f&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Patty Lawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJ57zaddManS-BKaF-6lD-R2YkZkW8O9B-vtES-NEKTLDRgU-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food here is really great and the prices are so worth it! I ordered R3 which is grilled lemongrass porkchop and chicken and my husband ordered a bowl of Beef Pho which was so delicious. Service was a little slow, my husband’s Pho was served way ahead than my order and so he had to start otherwise the soup would get cold. It took probably another 10-15mins before mine was served. It would have been better if both were served the same time so one didn’t have to wait while the other is already almost done. Otherwise, staff were friendly and nice. The restaurant is spacious, washroom is available and there was no waiting when we came, we were immediately given a table.  Parking is free. Food portion is awesome and really tasty👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9V2zyWHTWWniEpqHQuiYCjfrM3wAJMNygTf-W&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Bernie W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL64yNcTn3hXOcEu6nvvEg8pFW8x0LnR_Lz6dsAr38shCFhbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho 777 catered my mother’s 80th birthday party at the restaurant.  There were about 30 guests and I have to say the food, service, restaurant space and decorations were exceptional!!!!  I can not imagine a better birthday for my mom.  The owner took care of all the decorating and the venue really compliments a party atmosphere (the restaurant used to be a schnitzel haus so it has Bavarian/Swiss charm).
The owner is so very accommodating and her attention to all the party details was amazing.
Birthdays, weddings, Christmas parties would all work well in the restaurant:). And the food was excellent, even those guests who had never tried Vietnamese food loved it.
Thank you for making my Mother’s birthday so special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBuiat0tnjY_7pbkejtOMMb7pdag2vvWC43TjR&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-8-27"},{"Name":"Aurora Borealis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxcvuKA9k7vcVWbxk1F0qb1OBc4jUy3IV-yls5YmSt6HsmRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I used to order from here a lot. They have a great customer service. The food is good but I felt like it changed a bit when I ordered it the last few times. I used to order #32 and the meat portion was way less than it used to be. Other than that, it's a good one to try, you won't be disappointed. The environment is friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lesley White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN5hZZOWkGC0Xm_8Ts_oULx6hXMKJu4N_MNa2rGGo0JXdtk1B2fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"True Veggie Pho! This broth is so flavourful,  and the quality is always consistent! Friendly staff, very reasonable,  $30 for vegetarian pho and a beef brisket pho. I recommend this place. It's a long time favourite (the White Rock location too!).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMy58Q2OyruJC-ahxKUxIqULOwQyfxQ-VnfbGk9&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Trent Omand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa33CPX_a5xXp8XMPsdVSEGV5uH9BmmvTAfFq0tCpXgqTaTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Second visit to Pho777 and have to say pretty happy each time we have visited.

I have tried the well done beef Pho twice here, the 1st time I tried the large bowl and was unable to finish it, this time I went with the smaller bowl but still a generous size and portions of beef and managed to complete it.

As usual so far the taste has been fantastic and if your in the mood for Pho you should definitely give this place a try.

My disappointment today was with the service, the had two servers working and the dining room was not particularly busy. My wife ordered a grilled lemon grass porkchop and chicken which clearly takes longer to prepair and cook.

However they served my Pho so far in advance of my wife's order coming to the table that I was at least half way done before she could even start her meal. In the future it would be better had they waited until hers was complete to serve both dishes at the same time.

Looking past that one issue for today, the restaurant is clean and bright, with friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8-m9zQHgjO_vlppJ_6GlHNwZfGEc7sg-jtyx7&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Maya Tarin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfKEnpihwYljZjv4ZEkoGZwmySggwhnvvx-CrDh6prjpGabQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Vietnamese restaurant in Langley.
You can not see anything from outside, so you might hesitate to go in but once you open the door, you will feel homey ambience.
Staff was very kind!
She was super busy but explained throughly  what she recommended.
Food was great, price was also good!
I'm sure I'll come back here again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRQjoM4Bm2VVFJu2wIsjbqf_NS5sR74OT2akDN&fid=0x0:0xe072fea0ca6a9ca0"],"When":"2023-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justbeing Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM9hiJK-AfVP-qSHlK2ogC-KKU9aHv9jB-f8Zpy8fNkox9PG5e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely insta vibes. I tried their Bellini ( not on menu ) but our server kind enough to make for me , haven Soda ( less flavourful but it’s soda ) and passion fruit margaritas ( too soury but delicious ) food wise I had their fries like in photo 11/10 sooooo gooood. For main was Ohana bowl yummy loved it great quality wish it was more quantity.

Overall great experience will visit again for their summer patios 🍸🍹🥂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPuMvbDhKhduJsapssp_erVNno-XzxXfrIhQCr&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Dylan W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbRiLfrHQc4OYC-IaGiC3v50Ld3wZILX8k8tQZMv8k8ZitbIyS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The decor and ambiance are quite appealing and often remind me of Cactus Club. However, the service is just average. Unfortunately, the food is quite forgettable and comes in small portions. I ordered the roasted lamb, which was slightly dry and consisted of only five thin slices for $43—an absurdly high price. The side salad was also small and lacked seasoning. Overall, it was a disappointing experience, though the atmosphere might make it a suitable spot for a date.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3BDqGHoMAZKGd4fNi6yO6OoZztD9rlOOrFyjB&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Mike C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFQoUSgNwKhSz205rcM0tW5K8pPs1r-mXzH5P-LiztofmWmkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW. The food and experience was first class. Great varied menu suitable for everyone old and young. Salmon was super tasty. Chicken wings spiced just right. Hummus had great texture and taste. Outdoor patio is nice. Value for money all round.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3SEWiG1LX-283r8NyeNue7cA_zSFymJmd80Tr&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Attila Szamoskozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2AAt3w8V6vnjRCqXfUE0xqvAqQuLl4Zs8C3rG6vUvIyME7FzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 stars straight across?  Yep, they deserve it.  Tamara our server went above and beyond to make it a special  experience for us.  It's one of those places where even though the prices may not be as low as you'd like, you still feel it was worth it due to the superb service and excellent quality of food.  Good value overall.

We started with the Truffled fries which were excellent with the sauce on top of it.  My son and I had the fried chicken sandwich dish and my wife had the Ohana bowl.  We traded bites and both dishes were superb.  The fried chicken was crunchy and had lots of flavor.  The dressing they had on the chicken burger really complemented it.  Even the brioche bun was high quality.  The mix of flavors and textures in the Ohana bowl were tasty and complementary.

My Spicy Guava Margarita was excellent.

The Peanut Butter Raspberry Cheesecake with Vanilla ice cream we shared deserves special mention.  I have had many desserts in my 55 years of life but I can honestly tell you this, it was definitely one of the best desserts I have ever had in my life.

The decor is tasteful and very relaxing.  Well insulated from the sounds of the street.  Did I also mention that Tamara our server was awesome?  😊

We would definitely come back here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFZO0OtXyOdnIiEfobhQ-lxgA8LFyH5wcA6_08&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The vibe and decor are definitely the draw, giving Langley a boost of chic urban energy.

Unfortunately the food was forgettable and IMHO not worth the premium. Dry, batters that are too thick, etc. Definitely need to level up their kitchen game.

Also, they tried to REALLY upsell us on the drinks which I didn’t appreciate. I ordered a double Caesar and there was no garnish (bean, celery, something) that you might expect.

I wish it was a better experience for the nearly $50-60 per person we spent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoct0d7l7e-zPiLgE1drHSEroO1jng6Jqwm61z&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been wanting to try this place for so long and lunch here did not disappoint. Such a fabulously designed and decorated restaurant - everywhere you look is picture ready. Miso truffle fries were next level! Truffle fries are common in restros but this was a cool and tasty twist. Coconut shrimp and main pork belly dish were also well made. No complaints here! Tasty food. Tasty mocktails.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOajSC0O_yJbAmv7HZmgQ4r2W2RYUw03PrTu08W&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Sawyer Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW18yXDLdsMmoU9cfP8h5sX8nTLFLzJtIlI45p-t0SrPGl1-a_X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice on all fronts: food, service and decor. Had a great 3 course meal and I definitely plan on returning. The Briased Pork Belly, Fried Chicken Sandwich, Dill Picke Chicken Wings, and Strawberry Shortcake were especially noteworthy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPefPQa4pEXGW8vkMiR2ZAN2iciplQlbhMnqT25&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Richelle B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXADAI4nqLu77CydGzFV7q63AtNd_ARea8M_3Mo4b8F9H-b6Gk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an excellent lunch at this wonderful restaurant. The ambiance and the food were amazing. An unforgettable dining experience with exceptional service. A must-visit. Our team would like to say a huge thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhOasy-FonOx9TRxTHkImRn-43F3KAgDciwOKM&fid=0x0:0x88168481ab6ec60d"],"When":"2024-6-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cozy little restaurant that design like a local Mexican restaurant in Mexico. The dishes are very authentic. We order soups. They were amazing taste and it big portion. You can possibly share it. Service was fast too. Perfect when you are in rush.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe8GVfwO-GokUSlCBqU0rg1_oi3ib1l29owlw&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Rob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4MsprCpC8FFjfHncD_i6ehbgUYgj1onkIOSl8mBsLVyiHqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first time and it did not disappoint. The food was so good. The service was excellent. Our server was wonderful.  We have tried many Mexican restaurants in Surrey/Langley and hands down this one is the best and will be our go to spot from now on!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAQeCwi4fW0O2_sYc52UEOeQXWjrrxMb1Wlyhs&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Tiffany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmBipHLVmLNTpk3raSEF81Fz_yYjDdhbPrar5AlArNmyvM1kYtHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious hidden gem on the langley one way! There are 3 other Mexican restaurants in the area but this one is the most authentic. The food is so good, the veggie burrito is GIANT and stuffed full. I had the chili rellenos and it came with rice, beans and salad. We were also given complimentary chips and salsa. This restaurant is family owned and run by very nice people. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for an authentic meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJoU5SvBlYX8OnhvYAnJOQWvQmfh9cJs6WLgbt&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4XSCizrqCxV5l-dktcH1a__SkR8NSGVXg9MQNW9HbBtksN1XK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took myself on a date to Cielito Lindo, and honestly it was amazing! Real authentic Mexican food prepared with lots of love. The woman who helped me was absolutely sweet and the atmosphere in this place is lovely. I ordered the enchiladas which came with a side of salad, beans & rice. I was able to substitute the meat options for veggies as well! Definitely coming back for more. 💛","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVR4nGBdJ7-XZzQkTPZEubArC-pHiffRsY9kel&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"Mas Rostam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn9N6jo_YK6Nshi-kTKKBlL6s75IIqo4-4Z0DhozzunRxm2uG_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was one of the smaller of the three Mexican restaurants on the same strip, but one of the better in terms of food. While it's a small restaurant with slightly higher prices, the food quality is good. They work hard and are very polite to provide you with prompt service.

I haven't had such good carne asada since eating in the United States; it's been difficult to find a good quality, and while food preparation varies by persons region, this one was tender and flavorful, whereas other restaurants are bland and tough to eat.

The parking at the strip is difficult to find, but it's a nice little walk if you have to park further away; I've returned many times despite the higher prices. It's worthwhile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfDy7nzkK6bSSHIFOHiH_Pqof23f3oNyBQKkJU&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2023-7-12"},{"Name":"D. M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwV7_2wvNf8BXxeCFtq4cWeYsAjwc85npawAOtRNzG6biKoD7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can only speak for the giant burrito. I had the chicken and it was very, very good. The green sauce is absolutely delicious and has the right heat. Complimentary chips and salsa is just an added bonus. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgKXDcGIDcbkesef0FqudeAjvBmr8QtlNItEK7Lr5yWNkI3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm glad there's a Mexican restaurant like this in Langley. Quesabirria is really delicious. However, it is a bit expensive at $22.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFFCFTgvh1yuxPjPlqF53NftVSGtRkfDb_rlsP&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want some seriously authentic Mexican food then this is the place. The interior isn't the fanciest, but it's cozy and simple. Our food was made by the cutest grandmas who you can tell put a lot of pride and effort into their dishes. We had the pork enchilada, jumbo chicken burrito, tamales, and salsa chips - our favourite was definitely the enchilada. The salsa was also very fresh and light. And their homemade hot sauce is a must try. Prices are cheap compared to other places. Definitely stop by if you're in town, you won't regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORXtLSLuRYSpQyAEE9id40DnhT7yuSSI9DgfOM&fid=0x0:0xfd7dd3ba62d4bcdb"],"When":"2020-8-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Winter Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq2XL4xCr2KMdlOIF3_RcQ3fn1As3QQW0hYOfphYQLd9Lmaa0k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered assorted sashimi and party tray A, and these dishes were delivered in a very fresh state. I had a delicious dinner with my family and had a very happy time. The California roll, which my daughter loves, was filled with ingredients, and the sashimi was so thick that each bite was very satisfying. I will definitely order again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCCdJQ9OMpOLsMbPxHjQoLU4Im9mQg1pjuckL_&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Ralph Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcVFnrxrmWMGhw4O7nV1ijNmdzUlx1e1uVAIEk-Lkz5ftJCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time to visit but definitely not the last.  Everything was super fresh, very tasty, colorful and served by the most attentive staff we’ve experienced in quite some time. The price was very reasonable and the portions were more than adequate.  Easy place to find and park.  Next time we’re in the Vancouver area Waka Sushi will more assuredly be on the agenda.  Highly recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFEtTpT2k1Fp3Q72uTePFSzC4EjWGfOugoexds&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2022-4-8"},{"Name":"domingo S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlAKSUF7FwtkQkvP8Lv_HYlbCT5EvYQpiNeJErGBn5iDlpSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far my favorite place for Sushi. You definitely get your money's worth on the amount and quality of the food. The servers are great and always greet you with a smile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbXH228Lacyt832x9AWbrXED343at-qAyDnf3x&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Mike Burge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNAufzm35P7WKYUsGaq4nX78UrH9cF6tcGhMUNx0wZkbgLkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent sushi place. Tuna was great. Salmon sashimi a bit too firm. Wasabi was very bland. Hardly any spice to it at all. Service was great. Friendly and regular check ins. Prices have gone up compared to the menu I saw on Google maps.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZC7jccSNCCfahgeaIx-vmruJyx9UGlcCdsNI&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"MiCap19 nerd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR0O1WpksEG8SnIbTdyAuIebW4CtfJmRwbqcUOCwM6bvDmtNnu8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Rainbow 🌈 Roll is as always absolutely delicious and well plated. O miss the orange  slices it used to come with, though the sauce  was awesome  as usual. My regular whenever I make it out this way. Would have liked a top up on my tea, which in the past they've been pretty good at. It was busy, but that aspect was a bit disappointing.  Also, no napkins given at any point in time,  which they were really good with before COVID. The honey garlic wings were ok. Probably won't get them again.  Next time I'll try it on the weekend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3QmB-jJcgjpVjn5zdblFwTqvgwWYWt9C1dfqy&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Amy Esterle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2YAxAk5ipiGN3G32mtDdQHIbzXOLK_YwrnFrQAslf9cuCzFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my faves, however last time I couldn't get anyone's attention to refill my green tea, I would have probably ordered more if they had been more attentive... I didn't spend 60 dollars to get ignored otherwise the Spicy Salmon Don was fresh and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgizywFCCQuvqGPSWF_C1nxXadJDCJHkxDvLLx&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2023-12-23"},{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here to try korean style halibut sashimi.
I would recommend and will definitely visit again.
TBH, I was hesitant to visit here for this because I read some of negative comments about the price and portion. However, it was a lot of food for $199 for vancouverian. They serve appetizer tempura, sashimi salad, fish cake soup, sashimi, and spicy fish bone soup.
* chef said the reservation is not required but it would be nice to make a reservation since they take some time to trim ..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrQ9x_TMVkOxC2bXucMOF2baCgMUmz-jVNvO60&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Jay Seo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMFFNpDIBzI7GiDjQ27KXZGEhMK-XVEfkeKZ0WYZmbXV1BzoCT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Hidden Gem for Sushi Lovers in Langley!
I recently had the pleasure of dining at the Waka sushi in Langley

First and foremost, the sashimi served at this restaurant is incredibly fresh and delicious. Each slice practically melts in your mouth, showcasing the high quality of the fish they use. The portion sizes here are also worth mentioning. Unlike some other sushi places that skimp on portions, this restaurant offers generous servings that left me completely satisfied. I appreciated that they didn't compromise on quantity while delivering exceptional quality. It's a rare combination to find, and they nailed it!

The waitstaff were attentive and happy to answer any questions I had about the menu. Their kind and hospitable nature truly enhanced my overall dining experience.

In addition to the amazing food and service, the restaurant itself is clean, cozy, and tastefully decorated. It's a great place to relax and enjoy a meal with friends or family.
All in all, I can't recommend this place enough to sushi enthusiasts. With its fresh and delectable sashimi, generous portion sizes, and welcoming staff, it has quickly become my go-to spot for Sushi place in Langley. Trust me, once you try it, you'll keep coming back for more. Don't miss out

** their korean style is real korean (try Spicy menu as well)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgV03AjqLygGz3JKOyWdWB4AwEYpaLgAkEuMz1&fid=0x0:0xd8fd537d2c861c9"],"When":"2023-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Happy Hobbits","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoVSyRTBWzOhwutkjaRPhGDbFDYLAlTdso8ILDATwQgXeAw6M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A unique location for a restaurant of this nature. On arrival it was surprisingly busy. Initial service required some prompting to get some water and took some time before the order was taken. The Virgin Caesar was mundane, and only 1 option for non-alcoholic beer choice which seems very limited. Once ordered the food came quickly. The calamari as an appetiser was quite good, the roast lamb was tender, tasty and well received with appropriate sides of green salad, rice and potatoes. The Greek salad dressing was very good. The Lamb Souvlaki was average. Finished the meal with a Chocolate Ice Cream sundae that could have used more whipped cream. The live piano music was entertaining. Overall, an excellent night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkWw-EcsckVETUk4OMAQf9wcaCvanKbfR35jEt&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"clark clark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3kMkSp6zIIdXN_93bZqDEA94CrfRkmXwNB7FzKR4LsL556sCH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is brilliant.
If I give you a tip for the lunch, plz ask for Schnitzel as 'Dinner Size'.
If you order it as a lunch Size, you won't see any vegi on your plate.

Otherwise, 5+ stars as well~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnhYb0Ne5lfBPeMhE1SiQGaq8RwfyHh6VbzXzo&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Aida Cowdy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOSMyUOPMwT4wqDue1PDS2-0KlV4tjaFl0JOj2dSBgi8VQ6U8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s our first time to visit. The food was great! My husband had the schnitzel and I had the specials. Although the meat(steak) is a bit fatty; but overall it was a great meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3vyuebvgmkGdgXRTihy6ki37PVrIIFQwYntBA&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Grant Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPVZjzTgRdA5uoLvVKg-CsCX0iXRgVZ445oLaupTWQZfw4R7aZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, great location, good value. Comfortable seating, interesting menu, everything I've tried was delicious. Staff are cheerful and friendly. Very helpful to an old geezer. Families are there with kids. No loud music!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lewis Mood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9-ctSfMHMyCKHO78910Rv3nF-Ed741100dRAeSxMof29eIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food was OK and arrived promptly, we found the restaurant to be too dark and quite cold, certainly not inviting. It annoyed us that there was no barrier other than a curtain between the dining room and kitchen, as we had to listen to the raucous banter of the kitchen staff and the sound of meat being pounded the entire time we were there. They were unprofessionally loud and regularly dropped f-bombs. Our 2&4 year old , who were with us, were much better behaved than the carnival side show that seemed to be taking place in the kitchen. I'd expect much better in light of the $40 we were paying for entrees. We won't be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R CHAPMAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp7yDTmDcpkKb5Q8eCRFiAkvEprLEjeg1Az3tEpfNDaNF0-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had heard nothing but good things about this restaurant - I guess I must have been listening to about another establishment.

First - I changed tables twice to get away from the noise of the kitchen. The restaurant had nice piped in music - the kitchen was playing R & R and the staff was singing to it.  (Really - you can't come up with a better division of kitchen/dining area).

Second - Even after changing table the acoustics were disappointing.  I couldn't hear my guest most of the time.  They had a baby grand in one corner and I hear that they have live music on Friday nights (god help anyone that visited this place then)

Staff - Yes they were understaffed and our waitress did the best she could given the number of patrons in the restaurant on that night.  Can't fault her for that's on management.

Food - I had a traditional Greek Dish and it was fine BUT I am glad that I had the Greek Salad in a separate bowl cause my whole plate would have been swimming in oil if it hadn't.  Why did they have a soak the cukes, tomatoes, etc in a vat of olive oil and then dump it on the plates.  ???? Oh I know - no culinary class

AND THEN THERE WAS THE DESERT - I ordered the New York Cheese Cake.  BEWARE they don't make the deserts they serve and they have no idea what goes into them. ATTENTION STAFF - It is called a ingredient list and I am sure your supplier would give you one if you asked.  I am sure I tasted coconut in the crust of the Cheese Cake (the waitress couldn't confirm) and by the way I was sick to my stomach the next day I am sure that there was coconut in the crust.

So no I won't be going back to there.  And good luck to anyone who walks through there front door","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0ghF60f0AHkdMsmksZ3q7ScyjYWd1IQvAbNuPKzvoIfPHU7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"27 Classmates from the Sir Charles Tupper Class of ‘71 met at Adrian’s last Saturday, Sept 16, 2023 for a group 70th birthday.

It was a virtual perfect night and setting for old friends and acquaintances to get together.

They set our group up on the second floor so we could make noise and visit each other at will.

Our server, Bella was outstanding - Bella is actually a 10+.  Due to the size of our group, we were offered 3 different entrees to pick from - Schnitzel, lasagna or Souvlaki with a Caesar salad starter as well as dessert and coffee for a reasonable price.

Thanks for a fantastic night - we will be back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaJnz1IUXkUZbG0Y_h7urlgCtJrTHsIA6Lc8Uy&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"Adette Balot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwGX2Ljjm03h2iaOHeJA0peR8s3wviRjr9IR8JHZWk73D31okDgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food and big serving, we order the mixed greek platter which is good for 2-3people.
Cleanliness of the restaurant and good atmosphere,and affordable.
The service is excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQgEANAWrGILlGeexBcHzQCG-inFy0LXg2zzVG&fid=0x0:0x6a0f8af7795713ec"],"When":"2023-9-21"}]

descriptions: Burgers, milkshakes & other diner-style comfort food in a vibrant locale with a 1950s atmosphere.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Bar on-site","enabled":true},{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Carleen Bonneau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7FVBS9PYOSOoXlUDlrWBh7vfrls9D08iy_dtd9RJHI2jmFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The diner is a cool atmosphere however our experience was that of a 1.5 star. Over promised by the atmosphere  and under delivered in service.
Took our wait staff over 10-15 minutes to talk to us once seated. Another individual that came in after us left due to what seemed like having the menu too long.
Once at our table she asked what we wanted, skipped over drinks & that was the last we saw of her until right at the end. So we were sure to order our drink with the food.
Once we got our food, still had no drink. The person bringing the food said she’d make the hot chocolate and be back with ketchup. She came back with the drink but no ketchup. By the time we stalled our food start and picked at the food for awhile, finally got ketchup , which was soapy from the wait staff having a soapy towel in the same hand. We love soap finger food or fries and ketchup, mmm.
This dining experience reminded us of why we do take out & have minimal aspirations to eat in at this establishment again. Seems like , if we were regulars or seniors, we would have got better service as they engaged with the staff more regularly than we saw our staff. We gave a $2 tip that wasn’t  earned & wished these people the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmbuELQUJB2lTcQo1GWDW4TGuQz8RxyfJ5JlfG&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO2DWHDNkytggbB-qrPWC6NlixBlQFqhqQjG5E3jl1ujR26N8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's very retro and eclectic. The server was very friendly and nice. The burger was plump, full, and juicy. The special house sauce made it extra delicious, and the house fries were crispy.  The milk shakes are super cute with candy on top, but don't expect a thick milkshake. It was more milky. I loved the decorations and classic music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSUZcPiSkTdj_XOOaZv2R4hz0SAT5932iVZzJ5&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"ZING CRUZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw_NX8aHJ5JUkCYvAU5jYvk_4mT8o4SuYGok3GnOs97LPbBEtE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They didn't deserve at least 1 star!!!

We placed an order via Uber Eats, which included additional gravy, steak with mushrooms, spaghetti, and baby ribs. However, when we received the food, there were several missing items: no spaghetti, additional gravy, and salad dressings.

I called the restaurant, and the lady who answered said they didn’t have spaghetti and replaced it with fries. However, this was not communicated to us, and fries are already part of our order. Additionally, items were still missing. She also said we needed to pick up the gravy and salad dressing ourselves, which defeats the purpose of ordering online. Moreover, the lady mentioned they are a busy restaurant, put me on hold for more than 5 minutes, and then hung up without even apologizing for the inconvenience.

This is very poor customer service.
August 4, 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYyEty-bSG9VkKyjwL9DhJJ63yxfmPAFaFZebG&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Cnd Traveller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-26C44JZC5R8i6BsbPLhkEVgK3nrhrrmm1a9e2hv7ib_7zNbYhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst service I've ever received! The blonde lady sat us then took 15 mins to take our drink order. When our food arrived, she dropped the plates at our table and left without saying a word. We actually never saw her again! 45 mins later someone else came with our bill.. note the restaurant was empty! Food was very bland, fries cold and overdone.. Definitely sitting for a long time. Save your money. Avoid","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO-PxmXB3sWpMTVXceooYQcGUcJKQWHnkYq6hf&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Daniel Stierhof","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTnxC26kuYF9GGcmGnd5PsIIr3J2upRJpAmop0SUGQrXDb68M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brogans diner is a great place if you want that true diner feel and experience. The dining room is full of old school diner aesthetic. Card board cut out of Elvis, guitars and records. The staff were friendly and the service was quick. It was nice to see a coffee and pie combo as well as the classic breakfast and several other lunch items. Today I decided to try the BLT. The sandwich was delicious, I was offered my choice of bread with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomatoes. The fries on the side were perfectly seasoned and cooked to perfection. I washed it all down with a hot cup of coffee and finished off with a slice of homemade apple pie. Overall, a fantastic meal at Brogans diner. I will definitely be coming back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiJd92zihvjlJXfxpcun8VM_XUSwvEmy2ceLzk&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"J Bunyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZShBXdlvweLPhbn4FoF-iFtvG6Klym7mz-dJePwaeRAte4u6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sometimes, things get pretty busy here. The gals at the till and in the diner do their very best to manage the busy days for breakfast or lunch.

For sure, the kitchen does everything they possibly can to keep it fresh and delicious 😋. Once in a while there will be a new waitress, and we all need to learn our jobs. It's all good for the atmosphere. The vibes are such that we don't come here because we're in a hurry. It's an easygoing Saturday, Sunday morning "Sunday funnies" kind of feeling.

But Heeeeyy forget about it!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVFf8iMabV-Z1QCddP-i7_rSegiUdjkdu0vtX-&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Chiara Berton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVoHIPZny_HXjOEt5Mn_N4aw_HMYg4UkNAZOXujodpGJqA3DzM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place!!
We ate 3 different hamburgers, and they were amazing. For the size that they have, they are very cheap and eating while one of your friends is singing at the karaoke is very funny!

It was my friend's birthday and they were so kind giving us a free milkshake 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtUEwKyJgnwdx3t-xQn40vFkyW6-e8dLlDxrFO&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2023-3-6"},{"Name":"jenny p","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMaWIyocHc_SoFmV9v4EiaCm1YlMpEqY1RtqHWYCaZR6crhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great restaurant if you wanna take someone out for a fun experience. Reasonable prices. Greasy diner type of food so if you're looking for health food I'd probably go elsewhere but if you're looking to have some good old American style food then it's a great place to go. The music was great especially if you like oldies and there's tons to look at on the walls while you wait for your order. It sounds like they also donate to the community which also made me feel good eating there. The only thing I'll add is that service is a bit slow (a lot) so I wouldn't go if you're in a hurry but if you aren't in any rush and just want to sit down in a fun atmosphere for some good food then this is a great place. Ok ... The last thing I'll add is that it's also a great place to bring kids (old and young) for a shake, ice cream or a dessert. My 5 year old had the kids size ice cream which was a scoop of ice cream (I think they had 18 flavors to choose from that day) and it was topped with whipped cream, gummy candies and cotton candy (for $3!). Now what kid wouldn't love that! We'll definitely be going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOe8_Mm3OOhUIWY4lL5SB-1QTttYP0-gLmibinT&fid=0x0:0x6c189cab5ab3cd1a"],"When":"2022-5-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Hawaiian food! The garlic shrimp plate was the star! This will have me coming back time and time again. Amazing!! The garlic furikake chicken was also delicious. Portions are quite generous, especially for the price.

The kalbi ribs had good flavour, but the meat was a bit tough/chewy. I think I'd pass on this next time.

The staff were very welcoming and pleasant. Our overall dining experience was awesome. Looking forward to coming back and trying other menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNde4euAogjtqV5CQeyT7q2V2FfsECYOG2NA1PD&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"Maggie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL47eQAiOWvOk20OV8KK8Xv4VLpdpXwPJLDMNXa7bN3YIpqUP88Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here. I had the spicy mochiko chicken and my husband had the garlic shrimp….. it’s sooooo good! Check it out! Decently priced and decent portion sizes. Look forward to coming back to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgfLhpSMECGe_DqFY1lfquyIRa2TZB-WEg_vSb&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried several of the dishes here. The loco moco is pretty close to what you might find on Oahu; the hamburger patty is delicious and the gravy is good enough, a bit thicker than what we’ve had in Hawaii. We found a bit of inconsistency with the gravy (sometimes perfect, sometimes really salty) on three separate occasions.

But it’s pretty good. The macaroni salad is addictive and has a perfect savory flavor that goes well with all of their dishes.

The interior is spartan and only has a few tables. It’s more suited to a quick bite than it is a dine-in experience (and it’s served on disposable plates and cutlery).

Surface parking is hit and miss but there is an underground parking garage and street parking behind the McDonalds is also always an easy option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5tt8iQCD2IVyHbxyLM2F1bkLp2fDG8p74w8UQ&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Tim Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8g5hEHIdu2XxQGUBSgYxE-aY89YP9JdLTndKcxvu6k0fn_XdJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wanted to try this new restaurant in Langley; very unique type of food.

The food here are traditional Hawaiian meals that are served in Honolulu local cafes.

Greeted warmly when entering.

Great menu.

Portions are pretty big.

I had the Garlic Furikake Chicken and my daughter had the Beef Short rib...

Quaint little tables and both amazing meals! So good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYOlSq13wUmu6juN2TwCtW1aAalbI7X_uUr5H4&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy to have tried this place! It’s a little gem in Langley where you can find delicious bbq! Portion size is good and the meals are quite tasty too. We have tried a number of things including Loco Moco, Furikake Chicken, BBQ Combo, Spam Musubi, and more! Check out their daily specials if you’re looking for some savings.

Staff is friendly and helpful, and the space gives off chill & cozy island vibes. See you again next time! 🌺","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJMwTYnYYDxD-y6fZZvC-E03137YItd-OphZ-L&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"fourest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNekehJvkpAL3Jtf15ZiZW5WR7mglgg0yoPUdXMlIjhKhD6SIkDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the kalua pork is SO good. currently writing this review at 1am with a grumbling stomach because I'm reminiscing about how good this plate was 😂 huuuge portions too! next time I'm ordering extra mac salad ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtPJgzTcnffsYaGmGr4xGjwv-a8xZRaWdL_XKR&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Jacque Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1Nzhti5TcnBjaVntfaR6AdqmLFLzIJBwNkX_N175H22PnOGM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Have been here twice for take outs and have tried both the garlic shrimp plate as well as the spicy mochiko chicken, both were delicious! The spicy mochiko chicken has got a nice kick to it! If you like spicy, this is a must try!! Only thing I don’t like is the macaroni salad that comes with it.. would prefer more veggies. Service and atmosphere both excellent!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Lieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1l6wN98L8CMs2OejtfywOkLZPKh8R8jVEhQtWEIkzvjWy4Xk9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was excited to find out I no longer needed to go to Las Vegas for Hawaiian cuisine. However I was disappointed by the food. So much that I threw out more than half of it away.

I understand it's primarily a takeout restaurant and they don't want a lot of dishwashing but it was very difficult to eat my Loco Moco in the small round take out container. The taste of the beef patties and gravy was not what I was accustomed to and it fell short of my experience. I love mac salad, but this also tasted different in a bad way. I hate throwing out food but I could not eat any more or wanted it for later.

To be fair my brother and sister in law enjoyed their food. It did look better than the food I ordered. I hope they tweak the Loco Moco and mac salad. They also should use plates disposable or not for the Loco Moco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw8UPjSmnJ8JUkiG3fv-TJVZFqXXygCO9E8OpH&fid=0x0:0x6e972474131ba192"],"When":"2024-3-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sunny Yerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwX9GsGvRD4Rmzpnxnt1YRL-Eg5T-wGNmWnsfNs3vgSTgJL4bc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As someone with dairy and egg allergies, brunch can be a real struggle—especially since it’s my favorite cuisine. I miss having eggs and fried chicken, so I was pleasantly surprised to find specific vegan options here. The vegan egg was a solid substitute; while not exactly like the real thing, it was impressively close. The vegan sausage was decent, though it would be great if they offered dairy- and egg-free chicken sausage as well. The smash potatoes were my favorite, though next time I’ll remember to request them extra crispy.

The place was packed on a Sunday morning, but we were fortunate to snag a table as one opened up. With the rush, I hesitated to ask if items like the chicken sandwich could be made dairy- and egg-free or if the buns contained any allergens. Ideally, I would still like to enjoy chicken, bacon and some sandwiches if they can be made egg and dairy free. Might be wiser of me to call ahead next time. For anyone without dietary restrictions, the menu is an absolute treat, with plenty of mouth-watering options to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxR2IJYsTiMg99iExxUEDcPq9Yc5Po6MQTyveL&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"pranav malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSL5eeGcXR0Jz-YBh5IzstngyuiPHOiOg7aMPejaDXK3jwMy1bDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very inviting and attractive place with fantastic food and beverages. It’s smart to have a full service bar seating that saved us wait time. The food was delicious. The omelette was filling and the pancake was savoury. The Benny’s eggs were inconsistent though. But, everything arrived cold and the service did not have any follow ups. The staff rushed us a couple of times as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvIN8Q7KX50PpjyhDLJWdyqCjv-wMLl_7BCppo&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Chantal Bonnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr3RgJXrnA8Dw6L5LTg3myMJrgsQNHzxENkXXIQdK39anB0vEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at The Hard Bean Brunch Co. It was a great experience. My partner and I both got the same Mimosa Flights. Our favourites were the “Pogmosa” and the “Watermelon Sugar High”. As well as both got the Yorkshire Benny for food. The Benny was super good. For dessert we got the seasonal Pumpkin Cheesecake which was so delicious. Atmosphere was very nice as well. Would recommend it all. Will come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEWBQeJnrsk2mJeHriEHffbzGX4zxGljDkPEpg&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Faith S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCrwZ311OzU1ncaoai9ZyVSP2gRJQPryRIbbSGJx16cP_YSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious food and friendly staff. I ordered the Yorkshire Benny (delicious!), however, my husband ordered the breakfast mac and cheese and was quite underwhelmed. The mac and cheese looked like (and tasted like) it was from out of a box, which was a disappointment when the dish was nearly $20. We expected better with that price. While some of the dishes are quite amazing, there are others that fall short and feel like a bit of a rip off.

Nonetheless, friendly staff and a nice atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZQu-CRQgJcFNWtp0tzHOgh9cCCdfyohxSrCG0&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a frequent visitor! Great service and great vibes all the time no matter what time I come! I’ve been here for brunch, lunch, happy hour and dinner! Amazing! The food is always on point and drinks are tasty! My fave has to be the pesto linguine! Their egg Bennys are also really good! I’ve had take out as well and the quality was still great. This is my go to restaurant in this area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzDxJQjf_atebMmoAEOTb-zHg_SvgRU6InHIMT&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Trevor Ball","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0frHcSKEK2V-1uRZ1eE2LEFeXrCisGR32zw3WNqrTc1SQtIjS_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"honestly, pretty cool place, great atmosphere, great staff that are super friendly, lots of tattoos everywhere which is a big plus in my books...

The wait time wasn't even that bad, maximum 10 minutes even though it was pretty busy there.

They made me an affogato and it was pretty good. The food was excellent, and the cool cucumber salad is a go to for me now but honestly the menu is pretty fantastic with the choices of food.

has Terminator would say it.... I'LL BE BACK!

xoxo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl1LQ3SwH17n4vRm_6Gp4PlKcLy8HAmi3u7_dH&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Anita Gaspar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQhWu67odWrQpaTFt7CgkA-_U6dvp0np3tAyYxfxLKPQnBxDnO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chelsea was a delightful waitress and so very attentive.  Super cheerful and helpful.
Finding such top notch service along with great food is hard to come by these days.  We will definitely be back for more great times and delicious 😋 food.  Thanks again for accommodating our dog!

Cheers 🍻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOexatZPm_ZSOp8Cd9yjwGaSSl3CEMI4-et2i0D&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Fredrick Zoller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL01F2QlXvuCUnZwPCtofa0r29cQHvBmtrY6v5OjsG39ImLPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places for brunch!  Everything I’ve had here was amazing. The Yorkshire Benny is amazing, especially with the ham. The mimosa flights are also really good. Can’t wait to go back!

The outdoor patio is also dog friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIpNF-xLH3pc1AvPYEwmTDmTjcoS83RLwdjQvb&fid=0x0:0x145c8f4a8245af3a"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

title: Noh Ramen
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt4Wu9x3vJ3lbIDFMmSMZKPjYEeK1aHJW6cp32mecQZ8iznXMm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This Ramen place is not authentic Japanese ramen but it is decent. The chicken karage was more like black pepper fried chicken. The house sauce it came with does not balance out the grease from the chicken but makes it even more oily.

Usually Japanese karage would come with a vinegar based sauce to balance out the grease from the fried chicken.

The cha shu itself is not well marinated, you can taste the pork smell that's supposed to be covered. Maybe add a bit of ginger to mask the smell?

Soup is on the light side, definitely not rich. If you prefer a light taste bowl of ramen this is for you.

Unlike traditional Japanese ramen place, they provided spicy sauce on the side for you to add to your level of enjoyment.

My summaries, and I did enjoy their tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3y1ckIDUUCWT2yUO_TC7g7TXieta3gIjd89E&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Mai P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7MpCKHi-lCJTFIoJ2DzoljsWEkGn0D_UOzmpDCQbwu4t30gUF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I can see why people say it’s not authentic Japanese, that’s because it’s Korean, nonetheless I still enjoyed my shio ramen. The chashu was extra thick and juicy and I ordered extra but was full with the original 2 pieces it came with. Gyoza was crispy and tasted like any regular pork dumpling would. My only complaint would be my chopsticks were moldy? I would probably still order ramen from here in the near future if I’m craving it since it’s a decent spot and not too far from home, I’ll just use my own utensils","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkXG342PBDOgDo96a3ilbQfsP7D5_iUy4WNFpp&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Anna Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEY89kMSzy7L18qwlW-T9Il5JxLeW6nvbQzk85EeuMK1eFzXMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just heard about the place from a friend and thought I’d check it out.

I ordered takoyaki, the crispy dumplings, the spicy ramen and tonkastu (I forget what everything’s called exactly). But it was I really loved the mains, and the dumplings were SO GOOD. The atmosphere is good, I went around lunch time but had somewhere to sit. It’s small but clean, simple and the price is very fair.

Loved it !̆̈ definitely would revisit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM03d7CxE2SwmSeAoBPRhdUaf_95eIGRElN6d2f&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying the ramen here! Super clean restaurant with attentive service. The fried chicken was juicy and tender but the sauce did not taste like anything. Ramen broth was tasty, the green onions were fresh. The noodles were the perfect firmness and texture (really enjoyed the noodles here). Also the pork in my ramen was amazing - tender and perfectly torched. My egg was slightly over cooked, which was a little disappointing but my partners egg was cooked perfectly. Overall.. Probably one of the better ramen stops around town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWnXzWyS1hP3FwURL4BM6SMxfhueNf3kJbNU9I&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Spicy Shio Ramen was really tasty. The chasu slices were thick and juicy. I really liked the gyoza, it’s like a fusion of dumpling and takoyaki. The staff that served us was very accommodating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfcVBbWMOFkvOgTO4GqNEJfnKuTQQOpsY8W5zg&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Daryll Ymbang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkL6T-BR-WabBAbGcCe-seQJO7i-mIMBoF-dJYx3h5EtnLsyhv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wife and I enjoyed a dinner here and we loved every time. Looking forward to coming back and trying more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0c-gOLxeA_thvzAy4NXYiLhXaICUE9Ij2NrEf&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Jerry Rocacurva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnpTBXh0SfEJSu5-bHpEGJL0taYoLD_2NUwDnc0ZCgCyqUa-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best Ramen noodles restaurant. Since I visited this place 6 months ago my family and I keep coming back. It’s delicious and I ordered the same ramen since. The lady server is very friendly and helpful. Nice to have this place in the community.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzn-Oul0CU4F0_eBU8a1IbYkQ5hvFYbie3-OEp&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2023-11-9"},{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think the noodle wasn’t homemade, but was still good.
Soup has cinnamon smell maybe because of the chicken karagae inside? :)
Store was very cool under the AC on.
Customer service is beyond the average!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0U9hzQEqc-fwFKQBo_4h44VMsOl7z0wR5m9b3&fid=0x0:0x7ebc97856c4269b1"],"When":"2023-7-16"}]
