user_reviews: [{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIbAZO04GwTHBmesMD6Kud2HmFft07_QE_1tY4KuTUSwin3qwi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location but car parking is stressful.. nice staff working as well.. however sometimes they need to focus on order taking on the phone more accurate and confirm everything. I asked for full whole chicken wings but ended up picking up small pcs of seperated ones. It is not greasy like\npopeyes which is nice and good prices unlike marry browns! I really think Hi Five needs more dip options with garlic. Halal everything is what I like so will be coming back for sure 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkrzBpJFD4ZuchuUW-FzdUF-Z5yyjqZKxnTnVS\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Farida I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNMTkKwdOMr4ub_wKd9GYVELWT4EByE1UnnnWA19O9vpX_Flsy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was reluctant to try this restaurant as I've never heard of the chain. Luckily, we had a coupon from our local entertainment book. Staff were friendly and helpful. We bought a 10 piece and were able to try their spicy fried chicken and roasted chicken. It was flavourful and juicy. Their dips for their roasted chicken were different. French fries reminded me of Costco fries. The gravy was not good as it was watery. The biscuits would have been ok if they were fresh and warm. They tasted stale. We went with our kids and got lucky to snag the 4 person table. There's also a 2 person table, and some bar stools across the front. Overall, would come back for the chicken. Thanks for the new experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN04Kl-2QWTZvFJNq_xpOsxEI-Vj16XyhYbUdpc\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Xin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKplMZu1128ZiuURn3P_L-DboDjYwnF20gV7ZQI2V-IyfkDzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the third time they’ve missed items in my Uber Eats order. This time, I ordered two chicken meals, and they forgot to give me a Diet Coke and fries. It’s clear that the staff at this restaurant are not paying attention to their work, resulting in missing items. Every time I place an order, I have to check it myself. Today, my friend helped pick up the food and didn’t check, which led to the missing items. I’m really frustrated. Can’t their employees work properly and take responsibility for customers' orders?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIGRCMOKaMA0jN90J6FmppXeyecN8sTXRrnnz9\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Gerd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG60pGjMF1_zRmFDjvcKxQFu0FW0NtKCeu57FksxgohZXZr-Qp6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Newly opened and thought I would check it out. The manager was very polite and helpful, the female clerk was efficient and also nice. I ordered the classic chicken sandwich, fries and three pieces of spicy thighs. The\nmanager gave me a roasted drumstick sample as well as a container of mashed potatoes. All in all a good experience however a drumstick at $3.99 seems a bit ambitious. The food was properly cooked and tasty. Good luck with your new location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIhFzSD3AX2LTzBzW9zo1CfnHuAmmmtIFfSqry\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"Helen Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMeNERA4_Lnbv5noQ1HdfnlgwsXB_oWH0PLyi1LK6dmIhhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We finally tasted HiFive Chicken when we visited their store in Langley to buy chicken for a friend's birthday and for the celebration of Father's Day! So crunchy and juicy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_ZYadfU_rAkpm5R71bFom4cXqTxIsSr5pldKl\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Freshly made, tender, juicy and crispy fried chicken. No complaints with my first take out order here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt93jRV9q8M3DnY323u_l0N7CABpxYG-AEyJAG\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"TBouzari N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_baPpMukUoOzON-1Bc0WVviV8MaaWCa_-KjbtB-g1KBRs9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the chicken tender meal and biscuit. Fries were good (a little bit greasy) and the chicken tenders were perfect - not greasy at all, just the right amount of batter. Was made fresh to order so we waited a little bit - what a welcome addition to our neighbourhood here! We needed a little bit of eating out variety within walking distance with later closing hours! Also customer service was amazing, very friendly front staff!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJjKWD9Vnp-4xVciaadxkOyT2vGPt3xExCVwgQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2023-3-8"},{"Name":"Theo Stonewall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwUMWVXXDHRJo3toI31UXB0A82O8Yx8XcYZ5yKkJ1ziR22mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It’s ok at best. The bread for the sandwich was stale, the chicken in it took up less than half the sandwich. The fried chicken was basic and overpriced. Best part was the fries. Church’s Chicken is 10x better than this place. They’re also paying people off with discounts for good reviews. As you can see in the picture. The staff Do Not wear beard nets/ hair nets. When we came in, the staff on break were spread out on most of the tables forcing us to eat on a high top in the corner. So no respect for their customers. Don’t think I’d come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIA-lMDUcQzKeUQ8C_osacB6XrG04cpX-azosh\u0026fid=0x0:0x445eb184695202e1"],"When":"2023-3-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"scott Meaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5VUhGdxkMXYX4iYr08Js8CTZEf_weyb2Rz41bOhmqztYmhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazingly fresh and delicious food! Lots of variety and incredible service. Plenty of spicy and non spicy dishes. Lots of fresh fruits and salads. Flaky, beautiful rice. Beautiful restaurant, could not have been better! My two sons and I went and loved it, and we are extremely picky about Indian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7sXyMnt4DqOAhotuKG2Wb6ASnuh4sHWXuIOKU&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Ritika Taneja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0HNAqLaWKhHgkSFVq6yJKFz5k5tMGB377eM-hS0pBO8WrYQHcVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the lunch buffet. So cost effective and good variety. Weekends is pretty good compared to weekdays. Also, gratuity for 6 people and above!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp_fLC5l8DrJesoIX7hUd2DImKtMzlAWZLWwWA&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"S Salil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHLEz5i6JHhYd1TSfmOhILHvAbA35-zO0yP4VKH163dIaYQCYW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the non-veg thali and non-veg appetizer platter : food was good, service was great! Ambience is awesome. They have an outdoor seating area too. We went in late, after 10 pm and staff were still full of energy and service was good. We were attended by Simrat and she made the dine-in experience awesome! She even stopped by while we were waiting to let us know that the platter is taking time and will be served in next 7-8 minutes.
Will definitely visit again to try other recommended dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDdLPAFVTBsTzXtzuVFX0fQvQZDDHe2HeQX8Ea&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"harwinder singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFAdSF8NwMBI1oFViUDq1o7caoRayCWphbi12dB_Tcww11Eo_88w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visited them. It was a great experience overall. Everything was on point whether it’s quality of food, hygiene and cleanliness, or customer service etc.
Highly recommended for families to have quality time meals, dinner especially.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaZlO_NKTSqDX2JMtGA4WcidcxfT5X7fSyeO_J&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have a lunch buffet from 11am to 2:30pm and it was $18.99 on the weekend which was totally worth it! The variety of foods offered was pretty vast for the price. Of note, the rice pudding was absolutely amazing! It tasted so fresh and creamy and not too sweet, I ate 3 little dishes of it! The naan included in the buffet was also delicious, fresh, and soft. Other highlights were the goat curry with rich bone marrow pieces and the ayce ice cream the server brings you. They have mango, strawberry, chocolate, and vanilla ice cream. The mango and vanilla ice cream we tried tasted good quality and was delicious.

The buffet had lots of food diversity including butter chicken, paneer, fish, vegetarian curries, noodles, chicken strips, pancakes, sausages, scrambled eggs, idli, tomato soup, chicken noodle soup, chicken nuggets, fries, fruits, salads, spring rolls, gulab jamun, snacks, and a chaat bar with pani puri and more.

We really enjoyed the buffet lunch here and it was tons of fun being able to try different dishes to find what you like for a fixed price which included naan and dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpLs5adFz9NyI5iGTyoE-bxXRd5zo1eq_lDxUF&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Galaxy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2SAi8C8-sgv273rJCEAb7O5a4ePaNVM1avULjSFd14coppaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place with my friend to celebrate her birthday and I ordered butter chicken. Personally, I asked to server that I want to changed chicken breast to thigh. Ekta was super nice and she was very kind to us. She accommodated all our requests. She is the best server at this restaurant. I am willing to visit this place again 🎵","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKNGJ6m9pRSedwVc4QZHgrAdKoFJEagB3wmoGW&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Wendell Mattos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrdluT8DLEPHBz4v-EfZpNbrNkl9OkjhUbWZovY8Wfcpx3BNmZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was greeted pleasantly and seated quickly. Ekta took our order and took care of us by making suggestions. All the food was GREAT! Great flavor and made fresh with minimal waiting time. Ekta was very pleasant. Definitely coming back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv1QMOPNnFCYOZ6aOIzGYdF_a8XcBQ3mCNqslT&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Amit Dhiman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZMi5QPR24o6z6CzJ-Wh99g0_xF8N8jfPKdwKAwepinYGGAN-4EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service!! Ekta was professional, polite and very friendly. 10 out of 10. Consider her for your next serve.

Also, The Bar Grill's cocktails are a vibrant highlight, masterfully crafted and bursting with flavours in every sip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYRg-jmX5YeKHMZm_CM8wYFTlSVCkcGVi5m8dg&fid=0x0:0x84ab0635ea22a8b4"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone in the reviews was so right about the bbq honey lemongrass chicken wow I could eat this everyday and the prices are so amazing for this economy!! Obsessed with the hot sauces too( must order on the side if you enjoy heat) so umami and actual spicy unlike most other generic ones at restaurants . Also ordered pork shrimp wonton soup not pictured. The wontons were perfect and the broth was light","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPn81KT0LZuMQqRfLofTHJzRo7QOsUGOk2Dkoc&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty Asian Fusion with Great Service

We recently dined at this charming Asian fusion restaurant and had a pleasant experience. We ordered two dishes: the Chicken Honey Barbecue Lemongrass and Pork Chow Mein. The chicken dish was a standout—flavorful, tender, and absolutely delicious. The noodles in the chow mein were well-prepared, but the pork was just okay. I’m definitely curious to try the chow mein again, perhaps with beef or chicken next time.

The restaurant seems to be family-run, and the service reflected that with its warm and polite demeanor. Overall, a nice place with great potential. We’ll definitely be back to explore more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHqfbSA0mj95bpCbsJBR_a4nsHQF18bIHsaPGT&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Island Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbJGwIG62aQA1csb4fnlABcLNnj_cBRZiqDGK6Io0jurINt5-pag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has amazing tasting food. We came here with no expectations. For sure will visit this place when we are in the area. Ordered item number 22, 36, 37","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyLQ428AewqmmC8t9EtX8Pc4_Pi40lXqm8Gd32&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Benzi Schnauzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg4Da1Z4WzIs-k4nrBAmbrswcwf-49CVVRmHpcw6VLF6kUyoZl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EMW is an interesting blend of flavors.  The menu uses fresh ingredients to offer up dishes which are Korean with Vietnamese and Chinese twists.  The result is a very enjoyable meal.

It's a small restaurant with a basic decor.  Everything is clean; but there is some wear and age apparent.  However, this is a small and relaxed place.  There is nothing to distract from the excellent food.

Service is fast and friendly.  Our waitress was watchful and attentive.  Dietary requirements are carefully considered and we appreciated the extra caution.  We were not rushed at any point.

As mentioned, the food is excellent.  A nod to tradition is notable in such items as the spring rolls wrapped in rice paper.  The salad was not overwhelmed by dressing and the chicken wings were fully cooked without being dry.  Portions are generous and we shared our dishes to sample the eclectic flavors on offer.

This is a strong recommendation for placement on your list of restaurants to try.  Well worth your time and money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLzkxbsd_ei-oo4HHnSaeZp_Hh_bBb8eZfURQU&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2023-5-31"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow… underrated and not well known. What they lack in decor they make up for in flavour.

Their food is best described as a Korean twist on common Asian food court staples, but better and (arguably) cheaper. Family of 4 ate for $67 all-in, dine-in.

Was originally curious because they had a 5.0 rating on UberEats, and saw they had 4.7 on Google. They definitely deserve it at this price point. The honey BBQ lemon grass chicken is charred rightly, and the salad has a savoury deliciousness. The fried noodles have an authentic wok hei.

Portions are “right-sized”; not overly generous but not small. Service is very friendly and attentive.

Would definitely come again for a quick bite or takeout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJcO7xU-ndBnLiRtxO9LBMlilB5sdnKrFpFRXG&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2023-9-30"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved by many and locals, this place feels cozy and offers very nice Asian fusion dishes which can satisfy wide groups of people with different taste.  We love their chickens and noodle dishes.  Their spring rolls are great as well.  However the place can be busy at times and food ordering can and may take awhile.  Overall, this is a nice neat hidden gem in Walnut Grove Langley for both dining in and take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN95WAURH3boyuAoqkqZ0RFp-i4QOClFD-cHhfd&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got take out through skip the dishes. It arrived in a timely manner and we really loved that it is packaged in compostable containers.

We were missing one of the dishes we ordered, and one of the bubble teas was different from ordered. The flavours of the food was good, but the meat was extremely overcooked and tough. It tasted like food that had been reheated and didn't sit well after eating it. I really wanted to love this restaurant, but unfortunately the takeout experience was not positive. Maybe it was a one off and we will try again down the road.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLUSAzWbBY8wOQ-6ScYyYMrayCivhWXfSvnOar&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2022-1-9"},{"Name":"S K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4AoCV3ThS2upSiegNZVplG9h1vtRpgDjKYyRHdLkGlEb1QvM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just found this korean restaurant. The food is amazing! One of best tasting korean restaurants I have ever been to. Dishes all incredibly flavorful!! Service is fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD77azPY0MFgTa9p0kPSSV_j9q3cgMB5hqw7gA&fid=0x0:0x41d864853751e009"],"When":"2024-6-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I can't say enough good things about Woking Dragon in Langley. My family and I visited with my elderly father, and the staff went above and beyond to ensure he was comfortable and well taken care of. They were incredibly respectful, patient, and attentive throughout our entire meal. The food was delicious, and the service was outstanding. It's not often that you find a restaurant that takes such care with every detail, from the quality of the food to how they treat their customers. We'll definitely be back. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMNBdTRC5588tx_s69TMEBbvdmCRVEFGd09cM2&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great option for Chinese. Puzzling that they don’t have (or know of?) mapo tofu. Decent portion sizes, maybe a $1 or 2 more on the expensive side, but the flavors are mostly there.

Like another reviewer said, it seemed the fried rice was mostly rice and peas, and lacked the BBQ pork and shrimp. But the batter of the salty spicy squid (they refer to it as calamari) is unique.

Langley is lacking good Chinese but this place definitely seems to be worth repeating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzfIvld4t-6Sdf1oPJ6Aq1IWilOJNWbOQPi27Q&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2023-11-6"},{"Name":"Adam Rostvig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMPPVe9oF6txApzCa2nMasL0fGXlH6i4AcxNXEKwPqVLIkW2dX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered for the first time tonight after deciding on a whim that we wanted Chinese food. Beyond impressed in all aspects. Granted we only ordered takeout, but the place had a great, clean, upscale vibe to it.
Service extremely friendly!
Great portion sizes, and even better flavors. Hands down the best we’ve had in Langley, we will be returning  without a doubt","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shiji J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgV_I_kDZenbRkSCZUtMN4Tzqh3CtpRE_xgAc0xQ_KjJXeZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered their one person combo meal.  please just simply take a look. Do you like it?
T&T is way better than this. don't waste your money here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp4ja4EfIu0M0V_V23LoXADNmHlgG9bgdaWOYs&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Marcel Larouche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxqpQNtg59HN-L13kMF__0BKj72X-mn32oyE9DKg2veqUE6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"From driving by it looked like a fast food place. Greeted by our beautiful young server, Jesse C quickly impressed us with her knowledge and skills. Which proved that you don't need to be of any ethnic group to properly serve and be knowledgeable. At first glance it looked like Canadian Style Chinese food for Canadian market but as the food arrived in proper Asian style we were so impressed.
We'll be back.

Update...
Returned
9 of us... loved it.
The whole crew is awesome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roben Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK03MUxcEpowcAnfZgg61DSfZ74V3XK2C1i-42ZPk-KPEQ2OA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sad to leave this 1 star review as Woking dragon Langley branch was until yesterday my fav place for chinese. I ordered as usual sweet and sour chicken balls they were extremely bad taste was awful not sure if they are serving fresh chicken special rice was terrible the other dish was beef and broccoli  and literally it had 4 pieces of beef if I’m paying 20$+ for a dish at least serve more protein. I wouldn’t recommend this place unless you want to waste your money.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clint H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCTsCTHF1FSzvzBhUd3dc_32en4hG6D5V6xeiSagdhUFomOopV6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing dining experience at Dragon Wok. We ordered the Buddha's Feast, spicy salty calamari, chicken and corn soup, and beef lo mein, and every dish was flavorful and fresh. The Buddha's Feast was packed with delicious veggies, and the calamari had just the right amount of spice. The chicken and corn soup was a comforting classic, and the beef lo mein was perfectly cooked.

The restaurant itself was clean, with a stylish contemporary ambiance that made for a relaxing meal. Service was excellent, with friendly and attentive staff. We'll definitely be back for more. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David McD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIf5dYz0v0RNVsAyFADOYMlbexBoChLyAntMr16EmmjYxmoDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service, clean restaurant, all the food was fresh, some of the dishes were great, a couple of dishes were pretty bland in taste and spice.  Overall it was good and I would visit again but be more selective on which dishes to order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUtSf2p8eEuIQx-W-mLVoIGqKDkJMNhLK6giXW&fid=0x0:0xa6258da5a08fbb2b"],"When":"2024-6-25"}]

[{"Name":"Youngjoo Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDb89fHG9rM-9x5KJ2uVxn1e9rKOTtNCCqmNQRbiuX7_dOww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried two of the summer special menu items. They were really delicious. Spicy chicken was super spicy, but it was worth trying. The restaurant is always clean, and the ingredients are fresh, so I feel healthier when I eat here. The friendly service always makes me feel good whenever I visit. It seems the summer menu is available until September, so I'll definitely try it again before then👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOo3VIhZ-91xBA2xpu4ZkFewLQcMnpvqnDX8wy&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Eatman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLAgqYaBUMpkBHH0grtwcpA057yUOwkUSgmEx4Zf06NcojqCY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying the langley location so YMMV... and strictly comparing it to the BBY location it's  night and day.  Portions are wildly different with Langley being on the smaller side.  Flavors of my favorite bowl, the torched ahi tuna was not as good, lacking in the flame sear, not enough tuna, not enough food.. might not try again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO1vbBCVAbxH8Ed-BvEfMEKKt5W5Wy2M1m7pLQ&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Olive Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2xiPy8HKde93MjogE8geFF59s-ra1lbOxiwUDYpvHTORrkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my new go-to for poke. Not only is it super close to my home, it’s also always fresh and the sauce choices are great. The folks behind the counter are always lovely, even when I come in close to closing time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO95FJ_FN93cA4dKDJVQxTrmyB53Pex_JohxHU&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service, very friendly and helpful, I ordered the regular build your own bowl. The portion size is big and the ingredients are fresh 👌😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIqCg282eDXpkqMV3HKsFZ-65IoAyiuHQ3cAfl&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"White Choco2","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM9-6piqP8OaI-9voKDk_2ft_UsMpsjdFS-9jwitto10f3Mjc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my second visiting here. It is always great to find a place that offers fresh ingredients and a variety of options at reasonable prices. The Bul-Dog and Hot-Dog with torched meat on the breads are unique and delicious choices. Made an extra order for my lunch tomorrow! 😋  The food looks fresh and yummy as well as the serving area is clean. Having a favourite place like this is definitely a fantastic find 👌 ✨️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuoUhawmvI7wzNFZglj-arp7peb0y9kyBwlze5&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"Sue Suh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2nTtbDS0xCdS3kuMushxldxDpU89Bk6U50jQf-_LkIGKnOvs42g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly the best poke place in the city. The restaurant is sparkling clean and portions are very generous compared to other poke places. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2V_gafT0IhgeEa8OEbHb_ub4lbA2iJXyspmz6&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Armando Ortiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8NahLMirfU1c4nTaaLQOD02Qg5Xms2bRNpu2Hblh5UtcWat8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow,🤩 super flavors. Really good and Jenna was so helpful with me thank you.

I sea Food was my dish, really good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx9R-0UG1IB7Hd8aYkGFtMhpPSFj54zhfy2BaX&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Chloe Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0bbjEYedQmkdSCJzUmLQSdkTzrtomVoVwqK478pXZxUfuVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited yesterday and it was so delicious that I visited again today :) The biggest advantage is that you can build your own bowl using the ingredients you want to eat, and there are many to choose from. And it is more cost-effective than other poke restaurants.

If you haven't tried it yet, be sure to add cilantro to the mix-in and try it with “Umami” sauce. Now you won't have to go to a sushi restaurant and worry about which roll to choose from among the numerous rolls.
Trust me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaKcaheoSSEMYYuY-A5HkQCsurkgrJRw-dqwn3&fid=0x0:0xb4e921b46e9120d"],"When":"2023-11-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Meriel D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdBZiOjd-GeyzGMWsBAXROxAGpgvxnw6omqBMdoCAEl3YzDBX0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner with my two kids and hubby! We ordered pho and the cha gio

The broth is very clear and flavourful I could definitely have it without any hoisin or siracha. This pho restaurant stood out to me the most because they serve pickled garlic and had a house made chili oil not many restaurants would have this option it’s definitely a true northern style pho restaurant!

They were also so accommodating and brought my kids drawing pads while waiting for the food! 10/10 service and food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGYpahxdN6Tytjo2_E6UTuSxo5ibZ5mj5iIbrz&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"burgess andre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7LWDqT2dsXJc6o6IW1v0oWGKmOM4xURWSQbTOjG16Vr6PeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such amazing food. The quality is exceptional 👌. You can tell how much pride they take in creating such fantastic meals with every bite. If you are looking for a well protioned, healthy, delicious meal on the go. This would be a top recommendation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnxQ6Otr8qhaY4acgC0qNlCQda5hT8cqfCO7xr&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Chi Hsi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcBbxQUmUDBINWW8gpiVBRZkPGVAvZUVKaxZbYRVQUj9Y0ACg0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried their pho last time which was great, so I visited again. I ordered the vermicelli bowl with honey grass chicken this time. The food tastes great and I ate every bite! The ingredients are fresh and the chicken cooked perfectly, so it wasn't dry and was very flavourful.

The staff are very friendly. I came right at 6pm on a Wednesday evening, so it wasn't busy yet, but more guests came in right after me. If I had friends visiting and craving Vietnamese food, I'd take them here for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3hrZAZv9mYiXQB0AXZlf0DSAg1dKycIRjyj6E&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoX78mA_gvcMxPZj7-sh1J-GZvHMRCSKKa04yU5joj0ZwvUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My buddy said "wow, these spring rolls are really really good, better than my moms" and you know these are fighting words, especially when i know his moms spring rolls are super good too. i have no picture to prove it since we ate them so fast.

The cold coffee here was excellent, smooth and creamy, not overly sweet, Bun Bo Hue and the dry noodles super tasty, wanted to try the mango sticky rice but i was too full.

will def come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9m3jm_lUKpqevOWnUu-3f6OTSVqoQ37D6xY4Z&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Reena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYlg624O4_V5cITO-2oeXE8EpXfvoKPej7---M08Beow9yozd2xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Pho was so good! The broth was full of flavor, and the ginger on the side was a nice bonus. 10/10!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlQ_w3NZzFE4Caw6rRSUGWiIfU2a-AQveYnXSb&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Linh Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKCOw3fQaWenPsQMxyxr1hU4-lI-2RuQ45Au2zrIWrR9ouchk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"edit: thought i gave another try for delivering but the packaging was poorly :( . soup arrived in a plastic bag with barely any soup left . disappointed :(

tasty food, authentic, and the service there was very welcoming! Definitely coming back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG-Udvs1Hz3MIXfmV4QI5Jel7F57rMqV57COCU&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Maika Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgVVe2-N9QG0cUu4liW3cr-lqVYHmwr_762FonybtiOFORwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pho and great service. Owner was very hospitable to me and my kids.

I’ll be eating here again next time I’m around the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSwqxkpRlmHO19FKfx4J0aukSDIk40l8NefCGW&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Kevin Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKPFSfALFBknu9CxcX682fDqC-ChhHSKnHN8ClWhQUWNez1b-0dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve delicious food with beautiful plating, the staff is super friendly and courteous, the restaurant is clean, service was fast, and best of all - they have many vegan/vegetarian options! Highly recommend their vegan beef with coconut rice and vegan papaya salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwBiYG-v8sI7Wc-F1-XiQFe2T-UvjXDemtn69k&fid=0x0:0xa03ec15c415ade38"],"When":"2023-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Securetwo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3TGrOYZYOifICWTCzhL4QiPqfHhgakPTnEwxPz7NNqefC6gpU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update:
Late November I returned after a more traditional experience = lasagna and Tiramisu; this was time to *try* something: Squash and Brie Canelloni and Canoli(last two pics.)

The Canelloni is an incredibly creative blend of flavors- truffle, maple, squash, brie, spinach- AND green apples on the side- not for a Normal-seeking palate. I had a Moment on first bites at the sheer range of flavors and how well they melded; I found it was really well done.

I followed my entrée with a Canoli- I think fairly well done. It had more of a "fair food" essence(fried) than I would seek out but I took my time and could definitely appreciate the rest of the flavors.

Service was pretty good, just depends who you get and how busy the restaurant is!

I still enjoy the ambience- quieter music than previous time, apparently at some of the [few at that pre-supper hour] guests' requests, but noise has not been Loud either time. It's been a few weeks and I'm hoping to return[again] soon.

Previous review, Nov. 8th, 2024:
If you want details on food, server and atmosphere(and first two pics.):

I ordered the lasagna and, as mentioned in answer to one of the questions here, I found it smaller than I expected(takes up space width-wise but is shorter than what I expect from lasagna) and tasty!! So, a bit confusing on that note, and for $31+/-.

I finished with Tiramisu- the lasagna was easy, and then I found the mousse quite heavy(kind of to be expected...ish) that, while the flavor was soo good it was hard to put the spoon down(!), I didn't get very far before taking the server up on a take-home box. I enjoyed some warm tea for the heavy mousse later. 😄(Lasagna gone before thoughts of a pic. dawned on me!)

Server Keira was just right in not hovering but also attentive enough to ask how it was as I progressed and promptly notice I needed a water refill. Her table-side manners were so approachably professional that I was quickly at ease- and at Friday supper time!

Warm but modern design inside- balance between low-grade pub and stiff-and-expensive. Lower lighting this Fall eve., but brighter for window-side tables. Music loudER but it wasn't overwhelming as I thought when I walked in the door. 👌

I would like to try other dishes- cannelloni, pizza?? And mayyybe another dessert in the near future? 🤤🍽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe5WGld991JNFkPAdN0SZSA11X7gUGjVSe5oLX&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Debbie Tuit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl1QRhiGTE0pawpm2Mt3BIssODHhrthbrxd62Ea1dwXPs0h0E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cannot say enough about this fabulous restaurant.
We are staying nearby and walked over just as the restaurant opened.  First to be seated.   Turned out it was half-price wine bottle day as well     Our server ( Brittany ) was incredible and recommended everything that we ordered
Honestly, one thing was better than the next !
Such comfy seating in the booths.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGUbeR1uF5F0qs6zYaGXzAIKvcIdkxIBZU94ti&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Cleemar M (CLM)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCGYDgdTLDzn3zRPmQzI47thdkSDXTgZ2wOwEV-c1M78oYSBe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a popular place. Servings were huge and I saw empty plates going back. Both our pasta dishes were really good and tasty. Service was amazing with some great recommendations. We were comped a drink as it was a birthday meal and that was a nice surprise. We will be coming back to try other dishes we saw being served up. Great option for Italian.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0ZH8XdxcHKSEfj1-vvBhB2JAB7A9JUhktelK4&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Rosa Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgxwKwGYZa5ZolcnIrIix77qAMZ1zxGI9KVT5k_Mku76RimgEn_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in Langley! I can’t wait to try different menus on my next visit. 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMM2e9tL3VWMWHx_iQrxBDD-4w41J2-uDQCkSSQ&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Erin Vetter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV7qc_5aDVd9QZ69vNa1t7RvSBZoFqu_CqQEizZk8KQ7VwgXo2eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came here for our anniversary, and we couldn't have been happier with the experience. Quite a loud room though, and when they dimmed the lights around 5:30 they went wayyyyy low.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuP2vQMBijny4PHqrk_XCc5GN49-QjLNOJfRpb&fid=0x0:0xa8a72d1e570d4071"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Aarti Jindal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPaOrSmA76tnAHbyahr9q0W6xIx_LyYSbHt3lJdrDJpY9KZtygQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of a really good Italian place tried after a while. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"aida amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzivz-wpDvxhLwFN5-ux45jGL5WgToKsHQSSj01Z8se_TWPzdi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We recently visited Koran Bistro on a beautiful rainy day, and it turned out to be the perfect cozy spot to enjoy a meal. We ordered the Pork Belly Dop Bob and Bibimbap, and both dishes were absolutely delicious! The flavors were rich and satisfying, making each bite a delight.

The service was also commendable—attentive without being intrusive, which added to the overall pleasant experience. If you're looking for a warm atmosphere and fantastic food, Koran Bistro is definitely worth a visit. We'll be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4qR0uAiQDj4l5PrQSC3iux26IUbF_UsQv-TTS&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Aly C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX14qJbGiu4ErnYNSYxXYO3vH_ZM_lhqNC51lsGZwrws0uvOvDF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Banchan Bistro! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with modern decor that still feels warm and comfortable. The food is absolutely delicious – every dish is packed with flavor. The pork belly was soft and the Korean fried chicken portion was massive. The staff is friendly and attentive, and they make sure you're well taken care of. Prices are reasonable for the quality of food you get. Definitely recommend for anyone craving authentic Korean cuisine with a modern twist!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPQPrd964XGMds_2owkXgxKNAGv3ToJ_3OHKqx&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Dele Balogun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvbghNhAsYYTLY9mGDqPUV3nfN-RCVIESmLU5pze_ElSP51vKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing time at Banchan with the family. It's a lovely atmosphere and the food is awesome. Fresh and tasty. Price point is also quite reasonable. Will highly recommend...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9RknlP4Ssa0MxqmdbFgAHmVhF4Pb2aoPAe03m&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited in late May 2024. First things first,  with a name like banchan, I kinda expected to have a lot of banchan (little side dishes) or maybe unique or different banchan. Instead, we didn't have any banchan. Not sure if it's due to the dishes we ordered or if they just don't serve banchan.

What we did order was the LA kalbi dupbap which came with brussels sprouts. Good flavour to the ribs but the bowl could have used some other veggies.

We also had the seafood pancake. This had a thickish batter which was a bit crispy on the outside.  Inside, it was mainly veggies and not much seafood aside from the large chunks of octopus.

The spicy rice cakes that we ordered were tube-shaped (like tteokbokki) and slightly fried giving it a bit of texture to the bite.

The soy and garlic KFC bites were Boneless and quite meaty.

Overall, food was pretty good but I kinda missed having actual banchan dishes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs_Di9fkj6279_KJJn6onIVJA5bnhlAsxLUtoz&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Pilo News","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFId9ZdkkvXmcYiLmTK0bEP9YVRba_LZHmLxWEpHSLdGMlepoT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Banchan’s chicken dishes are a standout, showcasing a perfect balance of flavor and tenderness. The crispy, well-marinated pieces are bursting with savory notes, making them addictive. Whether it’s the spicy gochujang glaze or the soy garlic variation, each bite offers a delightful crunch followed by juicy, flavorful meat. The chicken pairs beautifully with the assorted banchan, elevating the overall dining experience. It’s a must-try for anyone looking to savor authentic Korean flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu9qqm7Q0jPQ78yUvi6MrFJ_I2R18zCowB6Fwy&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Mike Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_kVO0xRO4Ad3bvJX_b-ifHPpp4O7CjaLfpLCJdbf7BFYm7eky=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here three or four times over the past two months. Each time has impressed. Service is very efficient, food is delivered incredibly fast yet is still very fresh and very hot. Prices are reasonable and food quality and quantity are top notch.

The Angry Chicken Bowl is the favorite so far. Chicken is plentiful and extra crisp even after coated in sauce (I’m assuming it’s Buldak). Cabbage is fresh and crunchy. What more could you ask for!

Full orders of boneless fried chicken are large enough for three hungry adults and are still very hot even as we were packing up the leftovers.

A surprise star was the seared tuna roll, the Tuna Bap. It’s better than most sushi restaurants Aburi Tuna Oshi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLMw7o8OcMf7PeJBt5_rUcXx7SO8iv1VZIjkkb&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Blessed Love Jamantoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiJkDfqK1tLHwmtym7NT7sodUjHvZSVRt9FJ_NqcdWkISaxfG4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their beef tofu soup! so tasty! with the side dishes and rice… i’m a one satisfied customer. 😊
i’m also someone who doesn’t do veggies, and they didn’t disappoint me w the amount of beef in it. although, a little more of tofu too would be awesome next time 😉
thanks much again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG00IyfPIMHsJI1cMh5HCRzUy6k4hxn-bbklm6&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Paul Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0iAFfRalNBMoShb3oKZB4f1oP9aLD_ijNnWuJCtX8F5JPOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food great portion size
6-9pm $5 beers and cheap soju","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnoPltjmMaRvaeUbG-UtfR2VjfnlAEh6suGV6a&fid=0x0:0xcfe58da922a51b8d"],"When":"2024-12-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lance Hakim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZwgA-Yqxa9xX_BrBrid0gcrr-1_HGW2J_cY60zLsmdt32Ogwl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sure! Here’s a fun and inviting Google review for The Mad Italian:

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

“The Mad Italian: Where Pizza Dreams Come True”

If pizza is your love language, The Mad Italian is your soulmate. I walked in expecting a meal, and I left feeling like I’d just had a spiritual awakening (but with way more cheese).

The pizza? Unbelievable. I’m pretty sure they’ve hired a wizard in the kitchen because I can’t explain how they’ve managed to make crust this perfect. Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside—it’s like biting into a cloud that’s also been to culinary school.

And the service? Out of this world. I thought I was a regular person, but after five minutes, I was convinced I was royalty. The staff treat you like long-lost family, the kind you actually like.

Do yourself a favor: Stop reading reviews and get to The Mad Italian. You’ve got pizza dreams that need fulfilling, and this is the place that can make them come true. You’ll leave full, happy, and slightly convinced you’ve found the meaning of life—hint: it’s pepperoni and their house made ranch dipping sauce and chilli oil!

P.S. Don’t ask for the ranch recipe….They won’t tell you. Believe me, I tried.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLYeqKv7TPyJmNvJ-HZrD0vKmVf4LVUceBOAQD&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"S. T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvRR4_n7-aBEiZRKbznJjpT4F7lgVqLiemg5GhtgKa3AE0GA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend the Mad Italian! If you like Neapolitan pizza and good beer you will love this place. Recently under new ownership and the service was super friendly and attentive. We will be back! Great vibes here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO46CCQBEbx01D5zNuO5u53qdiYSC7Qea-w4Ewo&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place and ambiance, great pizza with wonderfully glutinous crust. I especially liked the Nutty Honey. Pesto is a great topping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjtG1_ziToolR_ONoQT7N2aEHFWnT6-iAFTnLI&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fast authentic pizza with quality toppings. Ready in 10 mins or less. New bar with taps ! Just onpoint each time we go nothing but delivering expectations. Or take it & stretch it yourself at home. Most lively happening place in all of the village on weekends. NUTTY HONEY my new favorite! New products added to menu. OCT. 23 /24. New drinks & brews Nov. 30 /24","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlNprgtol6HQGZH5YuEgI7VxG4X8o4UNlcw1U9&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2023-7-21"},{"Name":"Vlad Kamchiline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3okq3NQWPOJqiOl4zd0Qrbd6N2ENO97CMPubcw7yyamKvNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to enjoy some drinks and pizza with friends. I heard there were new owners so we came by to check it out. Great price on drinks, pizza was great, and I heard they are adding cocktails soon which is great, will come for that again! The owner was very involved and made the experience cozy and we all felt welcomed which is important for a small place like this. Looking forward to coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janessa Harder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqH-3A-zadNRDmcAMQmEJeZe23N8e8eVIYcyCPWJNmkRedawwj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for the first time with some friends. Great atmosphere, the service was great, and the pizza was phenomenal! I’m gluten intolerant and this was the first pizzeria I found that has gluten sensitive pizza crust and doesn’t lose any taste. It tasted better than regular pizza crust. I got a Caesar salad, Buffalo Chicken pizza and a Blueberry Limoncello Cider, all of which were amazing. During the meal, the owner even came by to check on everything which added to our visit. This is such a gem, we will definitely be going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlZv7_BS76hKZVl0Wb4gyyjBqUyJq5wa407QgwWRTbVcuuHoaG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m a fan of a good Neapolitan style pizza (thin base, with a puffed airy crust) so this place is a favourite! They have a wide selection of different variations of “pies”. My go-to being, the Margherita or Vegetarian (love the freshness the arugula gives). I also appreciate how they have an option to create your own, although it’s not very obviously advertised. The only reason for the lack of the last star is that: one time I was ordering with someone who is gluten sensitive and we saw there was an option for them on the menu. Labelled as “gluten-friendly” or something of that sort, yet still contained gluten and wheat, just less. Long story short, they couldn’t enjoy the pizza with the rest of us because of false (or not clearly specified) advertisement.

Feedback for the company: Ultimately, I believe that they shouldn’t bother with any gluten related titles. As it can be deceiving and potentially harmful. If they want to cater to that group, they could make one that is actually gluten free. In that case, cross contamination is of course understandable and should also be noted","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlNmd8UTRerO9Ikk-8ZzTgQ8ApU9731lFl6jz4&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2023-7-12"},{"Name":"Chris S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmYHb_KmQh-jaUeScM_TxpeioRL8O096fWi7rSR_TSHEj6B5M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a weekend must for my wife and I. We make sure to come here every weekend no matter what. Friendly staff, quick service, rotating local craft beers, great decor, and amazing pizza. Many friends have tried Mad Italian as well, and they are hooked like us.

Update: Lately, the pizza has been hit or miss. We have noticed that going on Wednesday's have been amazing. Veronica, our favorite server, is always so attentive and so cheerful and gives us the best service. On some odd weeks, when we can not make Wednesday's, and go on Tuesday or Thursday, the pizza comes out soggy, and flimsy and waitresses hardly ever check in on us. My wife and I will continue to try to make Wednesdays more often as those are the days pizzas are made best, and Veronica is there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI9g7Jbi26mfcifzlA3PrJ9rajPgkhsGel40uB&fid=0x0:0xa114619d66dfcfb3"],"When":"2022-6-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tomb Raider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-DVDvevPddYuQ7gWiQ1QNF6dVcB31ejJTsHb5K0lsdkYlx0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time customer. Took my mother out for breakfast and it was a great experience. No wait, our breakfast arrived immediately and it tasted fantastic. Teamwork amongst the staff and our server did a great job. I loved that they had a larger menu with lots of choices. Prices were competitive with Ricky’s. Very impressed and will be going back for sure. Didn’t find any handicap parking though which made it a little difficult for my elderly mother.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZWzsuLepnScBIeL6UULmFtjtjQ5aoLcB8a_Kx&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Ashay Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpunORIClkGK59DeSdtpI47H5MRTAfmBiXxbFUlP_9jCRfSnAM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my friend there for his birthday today and we  looked at there very unique menu together, I was intrigued by there chocolate caramel brownie pancake but I thought to myself that it will be very sweet, my friend wanted something more basic so he went for the chocolate chip pancake. We got our food and ordered the Cinnabun pancake for my little brother, everything tasted amazing and the drinks (mango lemonade, strawberry lemonade) were very good and not overly tangy. Our waitress, Elisha was very kind, and helpful. When we came I we got seated quickly without any wait. I really do recommend this place as the food and services is exceptional, I am very impressed and happy that we decided on a place that we had an amazing experience at.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7nuQZoXqBsK9LnzdXKwFzSNbc3aQxTs-6643f&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"jas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwWnW7Bk89DkpR_L_gexT8_M_6s5bPJasxuJxftJaoZiC77SsS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went at about 11 am on a Friday and got seated right away. service was very attentive and it wasn’t too busy. Got the ny strawberry cheesecake french toast, others got the avocado burger with fries and pulled pork grilled cheese. I really enjoyed my french toast however it got very sweet towards the end (esp as someone who loves sweet foods) so it would be wise to get a side of fries or coffee with it.

The burger was decent however the fries were extremely good - the highlight of the visit it is a must get. The grilled cheese was also good however a bit mundane. We tried the house potatoes but it was a bit plain for us so if you like your seasoning definitely get the fries.

Side note they offer the normal free coffee adding as well as syrup right on your table, however they only have i believe ketchup mustard for sauce with fries and it is an extra charge for mayo and others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9nb2dtOoazSUgPestvXb8m2-86RRyyUF5zHJ9&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Buddha Sax","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMxZV0PDEGrU4pav2MNmJGl6fOYgN2r1Y9z69IXgE3ww0iZLJ6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not sure where to peg this one.  To give context I guess this may not be a proper review.  My first interaction here was to get breakfast to go.  I ordered the "Jumbo Express".  I get the feeling that when this is served on a platter it looks and tastes better.  I will say that the price is great for what i ordered.

Lets talk about the good...
-eggs over easy were perfect.
-toast and butter was just right.
-bacon was well done as requested

And.. the not so good...
-sausage was add-on and tasted like it had been in the warmer too long.
-did not give me peanut butter as requested.  Not a Jam fan.  Guess they forgot.
-hashbrowns... I'm torn here.  They were warm to cold but had only been in the container for 4 minutes before I opened it up to eat it.  I ordered the 1.29 onions add-on... I counted 18 tiny pieces of diced onion.  Not really worth it at all.  I will say that the potatoes weren't terrible in any way.  They were edible.
-only one ketchup packet.  I asked for extra ketchup... sooo... not sure how to grade that.

Kay.  So back to the good...

THE STAFF! very warm, and welcoming.  I could sense that when I asked for certain things like a sleeve for my hot coffee they actually didn't have it which isn't her fault but the establishment.  Holding a scalding hot coffee really sucks.  Help your servers serve better... little things do matter.

Anyways... enough was done to come back and try this place out with my family and actually sit down.  I expect the sit-down experience to be much better.

If that's the case I'll definitely update this review.

I don't mean any malice here... I think I just did my 1st experience wrong and I'm always transparent in my reviews.  We'll see you soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNQmTlwa7IpjnZYEtzHhG7FB1ISGOW3e1wblJ3&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great breakfast experience here and will definitely be coming back! They have great customer service and attentive staff. (My only one piece of feedback would be if they see a waitress walk around with coffee, to not trail too closely after them also offering if anyone needs coffee top up). The food was great with reasonable pricing for portion sizes. They have a huge menu for breakfast lovers, brunch enthusiasts and lunch items (like sandwiches and burgers):  they had 3 gender neutral bathrooms.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbn2Dauaox3JGaMDRL5v7Et9SAYIfF4HBLd6cz&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"liberty facundo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNBp5rH1To4BVHWq1Mfj3iKJNDPtZ8CbWa3yq0RypDCjJicJtkRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had to wait to get in to this place but once we were seated the service was unbelievably fast. The only thing that took long was us actually deciding what to eat :) the choices were impressive and the service was really awesome. The food tasted delicious, it’s perfect for brunch or lunch or dinner. Definitely would come back here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHo79lmuiUteJI0JegpKCLSP_hag7Wf9yUwBh4&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Vishal Joesph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPZYObJwFxt14mrrXb_mg5BlVGK9EV9RWaJ-2rHIQuD4BPuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"MUST TRY!! This place is amazing! Everything is great from food to service to the interior. It’s clean friendly and delicious food.

We ordered a birthday cake pancake, French toast stack with banana bread French toast 😳 yes you read right BANANA BREAD FRENCH TOAST! It was MIND BLOWING. The biscoff pancake 🥞 again AMAZING! And also the southwest Benedict was really good. 👍

Dare I say it but I think they are better than IHOP! Do give them a try I’m sure you’ll love it. Can’t wait to go back and try something new because the variety is great. I forgot to mention they have HOMEMADE JAM!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH92qlaAo06iEY5Ugr92k1Wn_2Yk35_J09twjx&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Ian Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEmO5CnikKIa45mHk7gZz48ytMeaDYVPMb55ITMjdUWjmOCNs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Stacked Pancake and Breakfast and was absolutely blown away by the experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by the restaurant's flashy new interior, which perfectly blends modern chic with cozy comfort. The ambiance alone makes it a great spot for a morning meal.

I ordered the Meat Lovers Breakfast, and it did not disappoint! The portion size was incredibly generous. The plate was overflowing with thick ham, three pieces of thick-cut bacon, and long, flavorful sausage links. Every bite was a delight, with the meats cooked to perfection and bursting with flavor.

The Texas toast was a highlight as well, especially when paired with their proprietary strawberry jam. The jam had a fresh, homemade taste that added a perfect sweet note to the meal.

And let's not forget the bottomless coffee – a must-have for any breakfast enthusiast. The coffee was rich and smooth, and the fact that it was bottomless meant I was well-caffeinated and satisfied throughout my entire visit.

Overall, Stacked Pancake and Breakfast exceeded my expectations. The combination of delicious food, a stylish interior, and excellent service makes this place a new favorite for me. Highly recommended for anyone looking to start their day with a fantastic breakfast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQH6kndJtW76h9UM-_oh6L1j6LmBcey9PoLk-K&fid=0x0:0x208a50bf2d071490"],"When":"2024-6-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Priscilla Lopez-De Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeAN6kUMCG1Ms1k3qvSXnf5fQPaJ3e7N5XotyQBC2Gxq2Pw4_XmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food is very homey. I’m not Korean but I feel like I’m eating a home cooked meal by a loved one.

The place is clean and well maintained too. I lobe their katsu chicken, their rice is excellent. All that we ate was delicious.

Finding something that does not cost so much but the quality is amazing is a gem nowadays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8nHhU8yi8edpCE-uyPxA57d4OPwvvXPPFAZDi&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Rubayed Nehal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpNBYlhjBFu9HX4rVFcnPIyepZ-39jj2U3wmjzdVrsNRGsA0g23w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice and cozy place. This is one of the best buffet I have tried in greater Vancouver area comparing the price and quality. This is a family owned business. Both of them are very kind and helpful. I don't know why there are some negative reviews on Google. Comparing to the price with quality they are the best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc18y3AaHNmHzNLKBMm2zR1for6wF_gzpBEnDN&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a basic and affordable Asian buffet. We went here on Weekends for lunch, so this is reviewed for that timeframe. The lady server is very polite and welcoming. Apparently, she is the only one welcoming people while setting up and cleaning tables, making transactions and assisting customers. There is one male chef who prepare the meals. The food, to our standard, is good. We enjoyed the various dishes available, and the food are generally made well. The cleanliness of the place is clean. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and there is calming music playing in the background. The interior décor and bathroom is, well, basic. The price is reasonable for what is provided. Be warned that if you waste food, they will charge you $10 extra, so take only one scoop or piece if this is your first time trying. I notice many say this place isn't good. We all have our expectations of how something should be, and with a buffet like this, don't expect anything big like Cascades' buffet. There are other buffets in the region to try if this isn't for you. I recommend this place if you want an affordable, accessible and quiet Asian buffet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL7WTLyeKIil1NRqoSM5W-2hoiYrpfIikiafQq&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Owen Hsieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjOZEKm4Dm4FMZQW7jb56czEZ-9yVZKfU1C-Z1WoAkeVCrIBKnTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No good service  the owner attitude not well

When I ate almost finished and waitress said 90 minutes limited ! !

What ? ! Are you serious?

You should told me at the beginning not end of my meal almost done it’s not reasonable and why only said to me not said to others customers?

Food tastes too strong and food was so so ! !

Terrible experience in this restaurant 😮‍💨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG4VgK3gvgYIxDjZ1YAgYrfps9LkEoeUoYes-z&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"David Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVius2vKggf3Zi4PNzAK1fmoDVsEJzmcNSqPnFdpzq52xizMnLjlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited this all-you-can-eat Korean-style buffet and found the experience just okay. The food was too oily for my taste, with too many fried options. Even the non-fried dishes were oily.

I arrived at 1 PM, and the trays were not empty, which was a plus. The bulgogi was decent, but overall, the quality wasn’t great. Kids below 8 get a half-price discount, which is nice for families.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsACdzhn-9rS00CwqSigwJFYA4lLcSqmWcv29M&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Kerry Owens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDuKwrRJvlDUaoluTk70MNVCvf7WS3XagJ3TxbLO_nBQ7tMnCD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasantly surprised! We were a little worried when we arrived ay 630pm and nobody was there. We were graciously welcomed and made to feel at home. Food was fresh and very tasty. Highly recommend coming. Value is super!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D. Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwN0XFE0840Kf_k12bWeM50WUzwUqBVLNBvWuQOCEQeLt_u37X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was okay for the lunch buffet price ($12.99 - March 2024) but not too much seasoning to my taste. Fried chicken was over fried, meatballs are bland, tteokbokki (rice cake) had just the sauce on it, not much flavour. The selection isn't the greatest and the refill of the one or two meat items were few in between so you often end up waiting for a while before they refill but given the price point, it's okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXIdxm1hXPO-qC78s0ayBdN7RnctNSo4uWhcBc&fid=0x0:0x9356f4839ccc6594"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Yui Chit Jiff Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-uUyC4o_20rrkv3nCKHjaAwDrVoN7ihm8gdC7o5yMrUXzfOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service was great but the food was okay at best. The fried food are too oily and not too crispy at all. The somewhat tolerable food were the tempura and the coleslaw. The soup was delicious but lacks choices. Also, eating lunch here is way cheaper and only misses the dessert. Overall, I think this is a good spot to try as an experience, but not as your daily spot for eating.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed celebrating our birthday here. Thank you for the princess tiara and birthday accessories. The meat is high quality, but it is very high prices, so don’t come here if you’re looking for value and quantity. The 6-7 person set meal was more for 5-6 people, definitely not enough for 7. *Maybe* 7 people who don’t eat much. We ordered a few more dishes and it still wasn’t enough. Service was really slow.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_KL3uvn99lx99zv6lMGw1OYQ2yCG932aGmk3C&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Gyanendra Lama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtsvQycg6FXXzN7cPvP4bQtpsQGC096JaeWWsJUSPSpxkbuOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My sister's family and I visited this restaurant to enjoy Korean BBQ during our trip to Canada, and it was a fantastic experience! The ambiance and decoration of the place were warm and inviting, creating the perfect atmosphere for a memorable meal.

The samgyupsal was absolutely delicious—cooked to perfection and full of flavor. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring we had everything we needed throughout the meal.

Overall, my experience here was amazing. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great Korean BBQ experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuAKZ2pHunv4m0SlZm0nDdLl-2L37yh2d5On4u&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Kristine LC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjV1Lh2nh8HCioueYroOivTrs5XdRaseNKbAWi-VUPIahXGEAM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family celebrated, my daughter's 7th bday here yesterday for dinner. It was definitely memorable. The atmosphere is definitely nice and lively. The food was delicious and excellent quality, and portion were generous. The staff I tell you are the most nicest and attentive we've ever came across. My daughter felt the love because the staff really went out of their way to make it memorable for her. We will definitely come back here and super highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeFlVQ1roUr3KHLmxxHh0VvCRlUSgHOgcBoQb&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Ess November","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuPJ8X9jOZ2CtOO2jCad-r9UmiPcylLXs6WZsf1PzrAZBsBSHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Skobi for the second time in a 5 week time frame. Both experiences were good. The first time we tried Skobi we had ordered the Woodae Galbi bbq and it was phenomenal. From the service, presentation and tasting all that flavourful prime rib beef finger meat left us full and with no complaints to speak of. Everything is carefully prepared and fresh with plenty of side dish options (banchan). Our second visit to Skobi included ordering squid bibimbap with side dishes and Japanese wild salmon Oshi plate. Both dishes full of flavour and not too long from ordering to having our plates in front of us to enjoy our meal. Overall, highly recommended and Skobi will be our new “go to” spot for fusion Korean and Japanese cuisine.

First visit w/ Woodae Galbi: $150++
2nd visit: $45","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzNwp-JvrYaeF87cfYjbO8s9ylII025M31OIsd&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"augy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWALNLzNsGWj3mHYKd-NQzcrua3n-BWaS1Oo5yunbFTYZ3Y0pV_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic, it is my 3rd time ordering the Woodae galbi here with friends and family. The marinated wang galbi is so fire, crazy how tender the meat can be. The atmosphere is lively, grills are very clean and always a fun experience. The way the meat comes prepared is unlike other Korean bbq spots I have tried.

Their sushi is amazing too, usually only order the Mom’s Roll and Crazy Boy Roll, goes super well with the BBQ.

Anyways will be back occasionally thank you SKOBI for the experiences and great food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3NywPeQqeJHvsUBd8mYGDeBfy_RWv_L3ZjkNk&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Andre Radsick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0Rci7uWGpSxS4b3POkRS8ht67niB_Jhj1sLVBsgaelTMozRDF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had great family dinner, super fresh and high quality meats, the atmosphere and service was outstanding. We will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7vFC-UaTJnryBkpznsG69lBOJEoHJp0QdXiTH&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"LeahTV리아티비","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgfhVEigY2Q6vvTqBVLRfSsaQGYeIi97XpHykM62pz4zskuNs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As I walked into the beef restaurant, I immediately felt a sense of nostalgia as if I had stepped into a hometown eatery. The atmosphere was calm yet warm, making me feel like I belonged there. The staff were friendly and provided prompt service, making the ordering process quick and efficient.

I ordered the combo, and I was highly impressed by the freshness and tenderness of the beef. The steak paired perfectly with the cheesy gratin potatoes and the sauce served alongside it, creating a delightful harmony of flavors.

Overall, my experience at the beef restaurant was delightful, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a satisfying and enjoyable dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC4AjpgWAfHCrppzeivPK4DT8OCWW9NPRhJ7VZ&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Annie H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_TiRGmvMe90ybCMhTvsUZAGobj5UlXFQJ0oEqHtn-W1rxw1_d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here! Passed by quite a few times and always wanted to come here and glad we made the choice today. The food and service is amazing! They even have sushi - which of course we had to try! Ordered the salmon oshi but only 4pcs though as we had a lot of other food to try! Decided to also order their bbq items such as the beef ribeye steak and the pork belly. Both were very good! The banchan dishes were delicious we just had to ask for more. Best kimchi and potatoes ever! Will come back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuqWSZKMEAxxLFll82v680X0pd6yx0_6slYQWD&fid=0x0:0xb75282c5dfe07ded"],"When":"2024-7-6"}]
