user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stephanie Southern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJy_HnS391vB2FxV_dCZYH7EIBxy7l-b_tuqoGcLGvtkwxQx-2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by yesterday for the first time and was pleasantly surprised with my experience. I ordered some chicken teriyaki rolls to go. They were made quickly and tasted great. Definitely will be back to try more. Staff were very friendly too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnKVkD3CB2G2ou0WiL_JnmM07J0pxfLW5Bads4&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Jessica Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI--Jv94Tg0FPNMmnzQ9uMdjx5jjoL9Y0_yiKbFFs1-NT3vrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried creamy prawn and it was 🤦🏼‍♀️
I love every single items and servers were so friendly.
I love this place at very first visit.
I’m pretty much sure I’ll come back to try their other menus as well❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv7fjg9YQdVlLBLfG302xtWRZlulsVnrSZVbrr&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Patty Lawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJ57zaddManS-BKaF-6lD-R2YkZkW8O9B-vtES-NEKTLDRgU-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time to eat at Hitori and it was the best decision ever! Lol. ;) The place when we came was quiet as it was after peak lunch hours already. We were seated originally on the left side as soon as you enter but we requested to try the cubicle style seating on the right side and the server was happy to accommodate our request. The service was fantastic! We were served with hot tea as we got seated and our orders came pretty quickly. We ordered the teriyaki dishes and I had Salmon Teriyaki while my husband got the Beef Teriyaki. We both were very satisfied with our orders but for me personally, i loved how fresh the salmons tasted. You can tell the freshness of it because it melts in your mouth and just really good quality. The teriyaki sauce tasted really good as well, it’s not overly sour and not too salty. For me, this by far is the best Salmon Teriyaki I have ever had. Price is definitely worth the quality, But, I hope they don’t do price increase so we can go back and enjoy their food again. One last thing, our server was really friendly and she was efficient! Thank you Hitori for the good food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW6gWdUtwOLj0qe8RZXlmU_l7W80QYVCMtj4gZ&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our go to Japanese place in the area and for good reason. The prices are great and the portions are reasonable. I ordered the Sashimi and Sushi Roll Combo while my boyfriend got the Spicy Chicken Yaki Udon and he found it spicy last time so he asked for it with less spice. Patrons be warned it is spicy!! We both thoroughly enjoyed our meal as always with Hitori. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGtRICh2tQRHFKKKH6yD5d8MsJvqmiJk5eFwu_&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"GDM Live Action Unit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9oZxCeXJ6z00Vx30lgtb9YetRrXQLjplMkpErmusXjy69I_OZUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered from Hitori last night for the first time and are fully impressed.  We loved the tofu twist and their original take in the house roll. Nice vibe here. We'be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gagan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHfCjGlwbJZKgEVGM-M5aBC9jSuki0r-GYISPYpBM7474iqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great, definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-jdAgS9rTwTKPxdQolu9j6GWuMvF0pRqHCyuH&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome first time & awesome first time dine in experience. Was lucky enough to be seated at a booth with my wife & baby. Delicious Food, friendly & fast Service. Definitely worth checking out. Will be moving to the area beginning of August & will definitely be back to try new things 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPljARym4DNNg1tA1eAVd1lIPZBF_hAEdBygLiO&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2022-7-31"},{"Name":"Dana Noh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlmQqx5HOfp8yIOHKO7DhS9P98X-FnubtAW7-CCM9T2dJdLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"salmon was so fresh. This place was a choice without any regrets. I would like to visit again. staff was also kind that I was more satisfied:)
Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrG3g19zW6pGdP2pj-bxPgPkES7YAcrssSyQkc&fid=0x0:0x446931c67a16a72"],"When":"2024-1-3"}]

title: Tacoholic Mexican Taco shop

descriptions: Modest, colorful eatery in a strip-mall featuring a Mexican menu of tacos, enchiladas & nachos.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cassandra Torok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGJoCec7fBtFvCfBVUrJLXpwxFlcfft5nkmxHkZpZbOKNckx4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely love the tacos here!! Has become a regular stop for us when we are in Langley. My husband is from San Diego and grew up eating Mexican food. He’s definitely found his little piece of home. He says the Jamaica is the best he’s ever had. All the tacos taste so fresh and flavourful, both the meat and veggie options.
The staff are always friendly and the restaurant is very clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDh2kglMUFgMVGv4xkjdN_ZdneT27sX9eIOpqu&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Ben Jamin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBIrMGp3ssnTdFXw942j2bs17qo6QnaMCC5En6PFKO8oF8KavW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty tacos and friendly staff. For first-timers, I recommend ordering sides with your tacos—it really enhances the experience. I only wish they served Al Pastor during the weekdays as well. Overall, a solid choice for tacos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8TnPmJz4-okGDE5eif-4x7SZmIInC47jFdwpF&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Anurag Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDVAiQjIqkVl9gS2UN9CAcU6qscY_EFRmFX2LfHlTQjO68277m6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly delicious and authentic tacos. Definitely recommended 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT3vdex23FwI3d4ioFWTV5mVY42pTX-CnNKxSE&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Anshul Bhandari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9zXUcEYBL1-7oQ2JLSl6rdYd3Es7REsppaZZGoZlNWMoKVZKSOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by for a quick bite after workout. The flavors and ambience took me back to the streets of Mexico (Mentally!).

The lady at the counter was super friendly, was prompt to suggest vegan options, and also gave recommendations. I'm glad I stuck with those.

I'll be a regular going forward.

The only critique - They don't have a water station or offer water in a glass to their customers. I avoid pop, so it sucks that I have to buy one to quench my thirst while dining in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiqF_IBvl9FBdUB1friyYR8w_s8BYBY9Ms1bPq&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Mika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpz-LbOV3-7TFDacJGAFh4bHBEPCFpmAXqvtIJiqnM9wSmVzJ-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great taco place in Langley!

OK, I'll be honest. I'll say I had better tacos before but this place is clean, folks are nice. I think they could add more cilantro & limes on their sides because they didn't seem enough but tacos (we tried beef, pork, fish) were all nice

Their guacamole was a bit different from my expectation as it came out well-blended sauce like  (perhaps their guacamole is authentic version in their hometown?) We prefer their amazing meat based (port & beef) tacos over fish ones and will continue to try rest of them.

Plenty of sittings, clean restaurant, interesting music (haha)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ8XxlE_kPfzYcvyRiVz6fCFG53MNMsbsx5Nri&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2023-11-27"},{"Name":"Wesley Quadros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLINb6T4aH2oH2pFtLjTPKAIzy260CAbUE0O9DZEzKKzy9kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Small portions, these are 4" tacos instead of the more normal 6".  The flavors were bland.  The service was quick and friendly.

The guacamole is store bought cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqcOjqLNqAVMLJ5SZU9j1SotH8t0fKfhCDObMz&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tacos here are amazing! We went at a busy time of day, the front area was a little congested but well worth the wait for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbTZggWxTBRWPU6QVcK_4sgaaExTeoPro8En0Q&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Suhas Vinchurkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU67shuljcZ-cOz4YBpwYk720sJSjpQHLDKBd1ZYZBUsyf0teNKyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little place to try the tacos. Tacos were nice and just the right size that I like. Taste was good, good service, great prices. Would definitely recommend if you were looking for a Taco place …","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN18RrOpi10bfwVfqPOThict539lh3EU9Pe6XA8&fid=0x0:0xb812d1c24d7aba47"],"When":"2023-4-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"RIA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcNYzyYLe1_s-hZFbDwk--0zTwl73jt3QsEr6gpup4Z2N0IzfIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here on a weekend around 5 PM and they were busy however, we were looked after right away. We ordered the party tray, their mix tempura and their house salad and everything tasted amazing. They have the cutest set up as well. Great value for the amount of food that we have ordered. Will definitely come back again. All the staff members were so polite. We even got a complimentary deep fried sushi from their chef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHFxisTBryLbuopISLZoYz8ry2JsAQb-pd6cVm&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Kristina Willing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuy27s0OcvtoC0MNpOrcc_H95qISV567q2IiSiwmlo3o1umoo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is still exceptional food, service and atmosphere as it was when operating as Seh-Mi Sushi. The prices have altered since my previous visit a year ago, as expected with rising costs all round.
I have included images of my delicious meal, as well as a picture of each page of the menu. You will not be disappointed if you choose your next meal here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIOsIecryZL4GNxpIf3VftqULuDhSLBAyf_bU&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Elisha Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdAmKDvZioBsIM8sw5lBj2d02yGCX0OMJF7a-J753LM6I6X0wv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really clean and tidy restaurant. All the food is so fresh and delicious. While eating at other sushi restaurants, digestion might not go well, but here, it's very comfortable. The staff are all friendly and attentive. Every time I come with my family, we eat deliciously and leave happily. The best sushi restaurant in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRgeX-5RdV_CFx8-Vb9r6KJIBnohDOdxi0pbiv&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Наталья Кошик","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOkf15zOTrM6iDn6jfgE-geBwUiBVYjMFUoNhIL49oYyVLH7_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order from here often, have never been disappointed. Love dining in as well, very friendly staff, great service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLtSlHdxNJB-NPntCagjBe1BT_HZMnRoR1xZD1&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ross Manson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEpVSqeqsTvRNtUJOrSLjIA9rzMulA6RrCY8I-EdxSNnHKVrVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really liked this place and they had great lunchbox options. I got the chicken teriyaki with sashimi and upgraded to sockeye (Lunch box D). I also ordered three aburi rolls, one toro, one hamachi, and one ebi. The only disappointing part of this meal was the aburi which unfortunately I was most excited for. They smoother the aburi in this citrus type mayo and it overtakes all other flavours and mutes the fish. I would note this on the menu and offer the sauce on the side to allow for a better tasting experience imo. Otherwise, great sushi and I will go back and next time just ask for aburi without the mayo sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXuwzPuZJ-ZQDdagyRcrfv64cQk0kdEsTMLCQ3&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Sargam S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnxwMBfNosAe5HYx1f-zyY5AfrRpmZ-TGLF-Blzt79fdG_lsPN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My FAVORITE place for sushi in Langley! Quite easily the best service here and the sushi tastes amazing!!

Ordered the Boston roll and another special roll (left image) California roll, rainbow roll and jalapeño roll (right image) - the jalapeño roll melts in your mouth it’s so good would 11/10 recommend all of them!!

Definitely also recommend any of the dinner boxes they are huge and portions are amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKXJWCxYHkB8mbAEjymDCyvVLPvb4OL4jC2GaB&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Dustin Christie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgoRlW7wyKUurnue58IGxqlfwR_zK9zAOmy2Sn6TZWMrJPBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional Sushi Experience with Outstanding Service! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

My recent dining experience at Sushi Ami was nothing short of phenomenal! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and genuine hospitality from the incredibly friendly staff.

Not only were they attentive and accommodating, but they also went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my visit was enjoyable.

Now, let's talk about the sushi – it was truly outstanding. Each roll was expertly crafted, with a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

What truly set Sushi Ami apart, however, was the impeccable service. The staff made me feel like a valued guest from start to finish, creating a welcoming and inclusive atmosphere that made me want to linger long after my meal was over.

In summary, if you're looking for not only incredible sushi but also a dining experience where the staff treats you like family, look no further than Sushi Ami. I can't wait to return and enjoy more of their delicious offerings, all while basking in the warmth of their exceptional service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAa13Z_fzsTBG3PwOWOpSdcoy5ob0eCSjB3ZLA&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick and polite service. Really cute atmosphere and up to par sushi with a few unique items on the menu. Lots of parking and a fairly big restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvheFpI36frkOxh8d5dxYyvg3YZpy2y-L_aWd1&fid=0x0:0x526d9d690244e4a6"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the bean burrito two days in a row and also had their pulled pork bowl.

I like the varying sizes of burritos to order.

Their sauce "bang bang" is crazy good.

Fast and friendly service.

Once again had an amazing small burrito from here tonight. Tried jalapenos for a little spice. Was so good.

This place is out of my way but I absolutely love their burritos. Well put together with fresh ingredients, tastes amazing. Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM05i-95aeJBeJOpHG2LrTXeCcFdSOHAbJNuXia&fid=0x0:0xa0d711a07377dbe7"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Sukhpreet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAvMAxQNoO-6He6ZWC74SYNq9LUht2NUkQj5RASuB1M3BMtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place so many times and I love the food of this place. Even today, I visited around 6:00pm and I saw there were many customers but their staff is very polite and cooperative with every customer. I recommend their spicy chicken quesadilla and crunchy chicken burrito for all to try. Really appreciated this place. 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barbara (Precision Quilting&Emb)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgPsUsBR3IAd294tNGZCk2DEqHtypbild1ZBSCSbqWB1GEXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered in. Birthday Dinner for 7 hungry people. It was outstanding! Food was fresh, orders were assembled to each person’s liking, even on a very busy Saturday night in Langley. Thanks for making our day memorable 💜","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying this place out today with the wife. I got the  large burrito & she got the regular.. the Large is almost the size of my arm!. Only thing is there is no barbacoa for some reason 🧐 got ours for take out. Fast and convenient.  The wife's tortilla got stuck to the grill that's why I gave it a 4.. but it's actually a 5 when it comes to taste!!! Will definitely be back to try this place again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2mas6j7er9hgUYLJZQvuiNGC1fiXslAnwbMWv&fid=0x0:0xa0d711a07377dbe7"],"When":"2023-1-9"},{"Name":"Andy Perdue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyMRksLvniMGBt1nvwewvEq-Fg38g4r1qPAN0U8lOPOtUhO37j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Employee with red bangles on her arms:
Argued with another customer over small issue, then was speaking another language and laughing out loud. She was condescending and rude. She should have simply apologized and fixed the small error.
She was more concerned about being right, opposed to being helpful.

Atmosphere:
Cheap version of Chipotle

Food is mediocre at best:
Mexican Rice = Rice a Roni (was incredibly salty)
Pineapple salsa = canned food

Crunchy chicken was actually quite good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kuldip kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJURZaFRGETtgi5tRDGkRE6JHiteF5et4CiTJfenHmv1mMqxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a regular customer more than a year it's having nice neat and clean ambience. Food is always fresh and well cooked Healthy and Tasty.service is always par excellence by the staff accomodating ,helping ,welcoming . I appreciate the efforts and Hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Walton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKala8w5j_tO6Cx3tn58Zn__eUr96Jx2XMaZEciaxP2_4Zo4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am not happy with my experience. We did an online order and it said the food would be ready at a specific time. I got there at the time it said to but didn’t get my food for 20min after I got there. 2 customers that came in after me were served before me, and the part that bothers me the most is that they had our burritos sitting on the counter for the 20min that I was there waiting before they packed the rest of our food so they were cold! I told them I wasn’t happy that my food was sitting on the counter and all they said was I’m sorry but we were busy. Now I get that when things are busy it is hard to keep up but you don’t leave food sitting on the counter. When I told them that they didn’t offer to make new ones or compensate me in any way. I am not at all impressed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manjot Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0fLAgHW02vTs1oVzHUum8dmqSGxVeeLaIawdEE0VbumJ1sOcX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a spicy chicken quesadilla, ended up with a beef quesadilla instead. How does that happen? Kind of disappointed as it was a pickup order while I was on lunch from work and my lunch was ruined completely and didn't have time to come back and get it fixed. Really disappointed as this was my first time having BarBurrito.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Fuwa Fuwa Dessert Cafe Langley

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harjeet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKJGKTn6KInLt5BIXAhV_eEC0YJDJS-rAKmZ9asmCB1hC9AAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Considering it was opening weekend, I already anticipated longer wait times - especially since brunch on weekends is already popular as it is in Langley.

With that said, we had a really good experience and the food was absolutely delicious.  We loved everything we tried & the staff was really great at communicating the wait times while also being apologetic about it.  I’m confident with time and practice, they will become more efficient! Can’t wait to come back here for some more pancakes and croffle’s!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtJNOAx6FymiRlE9RUck7IsA8ofMGB_pyFfLfB&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Gregory CN Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ76gG0YKDpRto4lxqvkYyyxmkUYYk9gHJykKS3tsTg-AMGLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Six of us attended the grand opening. I was pleasantly surprised to see a long line of people. We waited about an hour to get inside to place our order. Things moved slowly as we expected if they were preparing pancakes fresh. The food was fabulous. I enjoyed every morsel of my smoked Salmon egg Benedict. I've never had salad with pancakes before but it was a great combination. I really enjoyed my experience at Fuwa Fuwa.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPu3PkiaVvZHgrbhwos5tudCzO1ASyzL8jDQIL&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been hearing a lot about this place lately so decided to go check it out. Initially went in for the pancakes, however I was hungry and didn’t want to wait 30-40 minutes for a pancake. I ended up choosing the savoury Croffle (in-between a waffle and croissant) and it did not disappoint. It was filling and very delicious, overall I’d give it a 5/5☺️.

While the Croffle was great, the service here wasn’t the best. I had to wait 5-10 minutes to be looked after, and get recommendations for menu-items…and there wasn’t a lineup. I didn’t get much advice or help from the staff and just opted with a random menu item which worked out for me fortunately😂.

So, little bummed out about the service here but food seems to be delicious! Can’t wait to try the pancakes when I have more free-time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORcFdy24H5fOxbRy1dR2-gsnSHvAW_bjfmmIqt&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Vina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfKIygN7nK9JzhVk8hB_aqT35aXn4InaAC2_i5q8iu7tEllQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious and not too sweet. We really like it. The only down side was they took quite a long time to prep the food. Definitely needs more training as I could see most staff were struggling and not having enough confident on what they are doing. Strongly suggest the staff should wear hair net as accident may happen if hair is not well tied and held up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVaydg_vgwrQZAcoZqbW5IG29e31DdIh-VOYsZ&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Edmund Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUj1_HuZisWr7CytcMG4RWWGN3zGYGloHDj6Y4xsUPtDv8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came to Fuwa Fuwa. Ordered and got a seat right away. I would say there were only two or three tables in the restaurant, we ordered the crème brûlée and cookies and cream pancakes. Waited close to an hour just to get our order, even when there are multiple workers. Two people in the back making the pancakes, one up front assembling and one it cleaning. I did follow up and they gave us complimentary cookies for the long wait, which is appreciative. Complimentary cookies in my opinion were hard. The food was average at best and definitely not worth the wait. Due to the long wait I won’t be back anytime soon as there are better alternatives in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqZEzSTKqRRos_-0KBj-qmrLZxVCEA2HQUDA8&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I come into new restaurants as I am an avid Google Reviewer!
This place, recently opened but they are off to a good start.
My recommendations
✅️ greet customers as they come in
✅️ check on customer shortly after they have received their order to ensure all is well.
✅️ the coffee needs to be stronger for a true American
I would also recommend mugs that are lighter or that have a more secure handle. Older people will find the heavier mug with small handle hard to hold.
The food was excellent and well presented. I do recommend the 'Original Cheesecake' and the 'Tiramissu Soufflé Pancake.'
The atmosphere somewhat plain but I understand the business is just getting started.
I will make a point of checking it out again in the future and willing to re-review.

Ms. Fancy
Google Reviewer
10 million + picture views","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4gThqtwl7u1OEmmexeWRpwtRww3jVufAGmiaI&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"QTee me","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpJw9EZqKaTYTHvjLyvP_e_xMPv9A7BxzzD9E8lv_Bb3Vw369w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"best pancake I've ever had in my life!  Every single order is made fresh from scratch. So there will always be a waiting time, but it is very worth it. Staff were very sweet, friendly and kind. My pocket book is not going to enjoy this place. Lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGkSUIDie71vYd_sVhBgTiOdjAMxpMk7TciUv8&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Candice Yiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtmdnhcO4pUNN87PxXq0FORI0efuGLN7igqsoyLbniZ9f-x00=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My family went there for the grand opening Nov 2, 2024. We went there because they advertised gifts for first 50 customers. But we observed that the male owner (or manager?) didn’t seem to follow through with the advertising, we saw some groups left without a gift. If I didn’t stand there to tell him I’d like my gift, I would be skipped as well.

And the kitchen had prepared some cheesecake samples on the tray, the same male owner handed it out to the crowd, SELECTIVELY!!!!!!!!  We saw one table got to sample, then he walked away ignoring the twenty people lining up/sitting down beside him. I guess not every guest is equal in there.

The female cashier definitely needs more training, the guy standing beside her had to constantly pointing at the screen. Maybe spend some extra money and training them off hours? But not during a huge grand opening rush?

I was lucky enough to be able to order the pancakes and had them in a reasonable time frame. The food is good. Everything else is horrendous. Based on other reviews, they even stopped taking orders completely! I am flabbergasted! Not serving on a day of grand opening, what a PR disaster.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOfUkRjtPKGKVpsQtdJx75FfpoimLuibZ_z-Am&fid=0x0:0x53511e834a98cf03"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

[{"Name":"Ankur Tandon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJjgLPGW5s_dPkEeiYqZ9orsNeaZ4XtSAYewjDTfFKT_ATquMV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza72/Chillis72: Veggie Biryani Bliss & Tandoori Pizza Treat: A Tasty Duo!

Never had such good biryani in lower mainland since we moved to Vancouver. This is my Biryani place now.

Tandoori pizza was also very delicious. My daughter just loved it. This is our go to place for indian style pizza now.

Staff is very friendly and attentive.

check out Pizza72/Chillis72. You won't be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLjzwB1oqbnN4dOvqSOazmfJhhJDRJ6NehfAOH&fid=0x0:0x53ceeb03261501e6"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Irene Morzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeloX6HZSjduvwqAvtfLVglIEm9_T57n3tztlB4O6Fx6LRFA7K=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely customer service and pizza is so good! My favourite pizza place in Langley and they have deals for Mon-Wed. They also have a lot of option like vegetarian and Keto","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML7MRxI00uQASXx45sOtisArgkZfu68zt9629X&fid=0x0:0x53ceeb03261501e6"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Carly Lajeunesse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3LIi_e1-9V95sias2yf8ahp1aNuxokIRCEfKYitgux9ktyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love Pizza 72 in Langley. We had looked for a place that we loved since moving here 3 years ago. It was disappointing each time, until last year when we found this place. We gave it 4 stars for atmosphere simply because there isn't a place to sit and eat. Otherwise we love everything about it. The staff are awesome and really friendly. They really care about their customers. Top notch service!! If you haven't tried it already, do it. You won't be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"brittany plummer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8omCpOYONGRKAWW7AW-LMnlPA6ZUebiwmKVP581Su1fKIBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The toppings are fresh and the pizza comes  loaded one of my sons favourite spots to get our pizza from clean space and always so nice to customers I recommend to all my friends give it a try you won’t regret it :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mario Henriquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUayXvUBVgdBfhEE34gncJ2k0alNiflpB9vMPW2fFJlqYAokGipNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Can always rely on this place for good, flavorful, consistent pizza! So much variety and you can taste the freshness in their veggie ingredients. Definitely recommend (especially for their good pricing, wish there were more specials though!!)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olivia Ellingson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpzmJNI8ZkrChqCWx9E0lCncebImNIX9Cr1XQENbpqlGIsag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza 72 is our go-to for Friday pizza-movie night. Well priced and great pizza. Staff are always friendly when they deliver every week and it works out to be so much cheaper than ordering through skip or uber. They deliver fast too and it’s always fresh!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan O'Connell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcCEzGbxBxE6dN_X81x2zyH-4dNTWtglj9qurADB9nKuqgpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time we have ordered (usually pick up) the quality has been fantastic. Pizza and lasagna are excellent. Prices are reasonable as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sukh Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDII6n2bYOeT57gk8ScKHP7xpigW_vCccVlOLnVKXZ3aPkaiMaDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The manager is excellent. I put in an order at 11 am and she had it ready. About 11 pizzas and four salads and she was working by herself. Thank you !","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been here a few times and the food was consistently good. Today we had lemongrass chicken rice, chicken sandwiches, and chicken wings - a chicken feast!

Price was reasonable.

The place was clean. The table was big. Service was good but not overwhelming - I liked it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLt_Rr3qdeT0CU53nLrQKLr2sVHeFsF6y3R_31&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick and friendly customer service, I ordered combo 3(lemongrass chicken) for pickup at $17.50.

The food was amazing and fresh, I appreciate how fast it was prepared as well! I recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPm08YVbZ8or5AjKWZpLGVTzaf7C6zVGnl8rCyz&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pho is a solid 3.5. The steak, tendon and tripe pho was lacking the tendon and tripe, and the portions were a bit small. Their menu seems to be more expansive than other places so maybe it’s a bit unfair but if you can’t do the pho well… Not too many places you can go to in Langley though so it meets a need.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvf3n4lx66xGC2wZgO7ByrQrJDrZCSr6Ms8Lo-&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Ray Dubs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv4pQtKu2wy66jann-Dj8Exe3FIdSioz5JunQZJxz8XSK1GHcjzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review from guy eating his way through the Vietnamese restaurants in the Lower Mainland.

It was a Tuesday movie night and just a few minutes drive from the Cineplex is Naomi restaurant. Who doesn’t like cheap movie night and to keep things under budget we found Naomi with one of the cheapest bowls of Pho around. In this day and age you will definitely not find Pho for under $10 in Vancouver. The regular size (small) bowl of pho at Naomi is priced at a low, low price of $10! Now don’t expect to be stuffed as the bowl is small (similar size to what you’d actually get in Vietnam) but it’s a decent size if you’re just wanting to enjoy a light meal. If you’re hungry than get the large size or order some appys and share with your friends and family.

I ordered my usual (Bun Bo Hue) and it’s decent here. I’m only saying that because if you’ve seen my other reviews I have high expectations for BBH and I have my favs around town.

I am intrigued with their other menu items as they have Banh Xeo and Banh Cuon. I will definitely try one of these the next “movie night”.

Overall a good experience with the food, service was meh as we didn’t receive much attention and no tea refilled.

Ray’s Tips:
Cheap Pho $10!
Free Parking
Credit card Accepted","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwu9tBI4x2H4Vwi-t1UIPbZi099lx3og8UREFK&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2023-9-22"},{"Name":"Atamjit Bassi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-CCAG1d3JAdmNUSxxvmUHR8304lfHA6Q1xca1y5nzjuQ4NkRBIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was quick when we went in during peak lunch hours but food is mediocre. Tried spring rolls, salad roll, vermicelli noodles with lemongrass chicken. Dry chicken lacking flavor. Spring rolls were delicious. Pho broth has really good flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4ZNVDq38txwalvkRu_1fbIQIz8K9v6Fcw9u11&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2022-8-18"},{"Name":"En He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-fMPTnOQ_8eutpKukiF5Gmfty5Tf6KYmY2TuhxsQFYXzlAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super sweet server! the food came out super fast and they are very celiac friendly. They have a dedicated gluten free fryer and have meats that are gluten free marinade. The food was delicious and satisfying. It’s heartwarming to know that there’s a restaurant that cares a lot about their customers health! I hope they open one in Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfcj2lBqzcFo90s_tjY_kNIaRH_picxnajNmcb&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem. Finally, we found our go-to spot for pho. Consistent quality and good service.  Plenty of parking outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2MDIrzqZb6ggVOFQY8amP1SSBiBepxrwKkeRp&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Tolga O.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK720GkofpuLF6k0F0cVtzPKeAqviQIj_uwn4AVLO-ALEMplQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After my nearby doctor visit, I coincidentally noticed this place. I tried their rice vermicelli with chicken and spring rolls. The food quality was excellent, and the restaurant was clean. I received a prompt welcome at the door. I’ll definitely return when I’m in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrgqKuKuR0M6sRJgMgk5rMd_ejoCeHOHoFotyp&fid=0x0:0x72fc0b51f114e524"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kevin Fergusin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGFARUIwpKmpNmVXVmqd9T6Q3ptiD7veE8Scs7dppCUxjQWz-z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thx buttery chicken pizza is soo good it taste authentic Indian food on pizza . I was hoping it was too good . Taco beef has more spice than expected! I'm extremely surprised and glad this will be my new pizza place can't wait to try the pizza slid outs. Great deal for a huge selection of special pizzas. Thanks to the Staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUlEy1SI4nBBqoYciiIz3s6-bISlO4my0MgLMQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Kyla McCulloch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4gca3a4je7jHNkfYZtOKrjtWOTTo2YLaEjbW4k8fp3G_xerJ2Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were helping  someone move and I just saw this place so I got the two med three topping pizza deal . Came out to about $23 with tax. The girl at the counter was very nice. When i got back to the apartment we were so hungry I said I don't know if it's just really good pizza or if I'm just really hungry. My child said it's both. But this morning getting ready to drive back to Ontario and eating cold pizza for breakfast, I can honestly say it's really good pizza.🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕. I give it a five slice rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDfTSYBBMVzvjKWQS5J3HJGimhUzGFec_W8W6-\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Yashleen Chhoker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6HO7fpinefAl9owVBXCqUJ8y6e8kzAdGY_QST0BHvpIhc4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here with my family and had a great experience here. The service is amazing and the food here tastes superb, also the staff is very cheerful with the customers. The christmas vibes and decorations were great, liked the place a lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSoY3Ge7CnsYOZ-vjdx6Ot1OvuKWSCx6176FAq\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Sandra Guay Bennett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJbGCuUJYmo2VN0Qw6wjNLfgxDBVDQW6V8vaIW5Nuh8N3_WBGO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just tried their gluten free veggie pizza today and it was actually really good!! I never get my hopes up when it comes to gluten free but I was pleasantly surprised. I'll definitely order again!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bunana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4ddJ5_63nc2rd14npI2ffcGD50ysQ4MnzfQNq96bQYTYqmMkx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza is super yummy here, favorite to get is the mozzarella,  tomato sauce, cheddar, bacon, BBQ sauce drizzle. Jasmine in the front is super nice and always cooks the pizzas perfectly, would recommend :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAsG6vq_jnuwAY-v7ce0vb5bb3vbam9BzWhGTw\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Sam Gunit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi6oH4BD26VeCHItNz95xFJhdGKfMeFeqW7CfZx9yKEQc5Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good! The crust is so yummy not too greasy just perfect and they have the good type of pepperoni, the small kind that goes on top of the cheese not under.  Dominos used to be my go to, it tasted good and it was cheap, but HellCrust is SO much better and a better price! I always get a medium three topping take out pizza for 9.99 and that’s the normal price, not a coupon price. The girls who work here are always very nice too, top notch service! My new favorite pizza!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtrOohWaHxjPsV02cpD5n_5PI1r0zUUuo0Fi5Y\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2023-11-11"},{"Name":"Полина Старостина","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSIfB2TuiQtzcxuN83X9_ajmz19loQ9ekBYw1LKBbtIV_t7QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hellcrust pizza is really nice place! I like to have lunch here, atmosphere is so good. At my time there is usually not busy, so I can calmy enjoy my pizza and take a breath.\nPersonal is really good and friendly 🙌 No one rush you when you choosing what to order! And I usually use Uber eats for pickup my pizza, they make it always in time⌚ Pizza...Oh this pizza is one of the best pizza in the world (trust me, even Italian pizza not so good...) They also have more things in menu and I think it should be good too~\nSo I definitely recommend this place! Go and get a mood booster even in saddest day🍀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO97tnPtS6-xM8Ou8vVuHyMcVBLSFAjd1ZHsZY\u0026fid=0x0:0x206ef4aa0bb7554f"],"When":"2023-8-30"},{"Name":"Randy Rennes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvDo0XaZOQgWh2HXERPFz3rUz8xVyyWiSJhwiCm9TkTJW3GA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a x-large pepperoni pizza that wasn't on sale day and it was the worst looking and tasting pizza I've ever had. I could see the dough under the cheese and what few pepperoni pieces there were. And it was only $22. Should have ordered from a REAL pizza place 🤢","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tara B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgraxt7PhvuON5FZNtce0GrkB4U-yhJaDhuiU7fLwL-Nu8nWCzyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe I've never left a review for this place!!  We absolutely love it here.  The family who runs this joint is so amazing, they remember our orders, they always say hello to me by name.  We have been sooooo sick for nearly a week, so we ordered takeout tonight and I can't even explain how comforting and delicious our bowls were tonight.  Thank you so much for always providing impeccable service and the most delicious meals.  Your broth is to die for!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJd_vbCp1VtYrXCiD8dMsfZVNW0rhIThc2muY66NDVwjQZDtb-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pho in Langley! The special with spring roll is all you ever need. Soup is hot and delicious with a very deeply flavoured broth. They give plenty of meat and noodles. We love coming here for the soup but also would highly recommend the vermicelli bowls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMnGZNnXJaenqknguFKi1jPLjSp0ncBMo3aQfP&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Melisa Woo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhlFUkHJtdvNfxN4zXzQ_tF66YFk9ySyx_Fe6dkHmy02nmbTl5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone was really friendly, and the pho broth was on point! I didn't expect to find good pho in Langley but I highly recommend. Will make this a regular stop going forward!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOASO-EifQrl81V2E222aF4cZ2rS7bFXDaenf4r&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Sara Levy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1JhGGc9QY0ccxxvZGwmT2tEdashPeQZVjS8AuaUc2oWuCJyhlag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top notch food ALWAYS!!! AMAZING SERVICE. I would give 20 stars if I could. Just simply the best place around. So this place exists. My husband and I have been going to Surrey Central location  for over 10 years and they just opened this restaurant Langley. I am so so happy. I love this place. It needs to never shut down. It honestly has the best food around the fried rice and lemon chicken and then the pho soup as well as the spring rolls. Honestly. It's a hidden gem for sure and you need to absolutely try it because wow!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandy Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC1A4LByBq6OUwZJWG8H7Z-MLb4lMquAtIidNi78o8npp66g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came for their Bun Bo Hue. Large servings. Good prices. We asked for extra tendon. We assumed it would just be added to the bowl but we got an entire side bowl of soup and tendon. Definitely worth the additional $4.

The soup itself was average. Which is my reason for the 3 stars. I was tempted to give 4 stars because of prices and serving sizes. However, I feel taste is a better determining factor for rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDdsxbD5lEUs_Db8jS1r3QcsmSOvti93pcQRMX&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Brock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtmm_4iDxx2OSV2INX_nRXJUoqjP1z-IH6_wIHH55Ix8fBZPU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today. Thought we’d try something different, as we usually go to another Vietnamese restaurant in Langley, that is also very good. But I have to say, this place has now taken the top spot. Had the Bun Bo Hue, and it was fantastic. Lots of flavors; perfect amount of spice; lots of basil given (usually places just give a tiny bit); and a lot of meat in the soup. What made this place stand out to me was the quality of the meat; it had the taste and texture of a higher quality meat than you usually find in most places. The texture was actually a real meat texture; it felt rich, as opposed to something previously frozen and limp. Also had the fried spring rolls and everyone was correct: I think these are up there with the best I’ve had in Vietnam.

This place is a hidden gem. And it will personally be my new ‘go-to’ in Langley. Looking forward to trying some of their other soups and dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhKfG0fsbN48vvdq6OmWKDCBtmy-Y0fIYc2UT_&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big fan of this place! I’m a regular customer through Uber Eats but today, we dined in and the food is, of course, just as great!! Portion size here is good and the prices are very reasonable. I love how friendly and prompt their service is and their dining area is nice and clean, too!

I recommend the House Special Pho, Lemongrass Chicken and Vietnamese Iced Coffee. 👌🏼

Check them out online or in store. Lots of parking if you dine in!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJc16noCMt0r_RlP4KOMkmv4WPjxjXj_5QFfHO&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2023-8-18"},{"Name":"Elgwen Garimond Sazon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr-YJetWFyKZ_qiagb4emhdFKuhDB-t_w-QykljS6ql5cQoR_-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love this place! service is kind and generous! Best Pho broth around and amazing quantity and price","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk1AYz8zAt9XDfPZrEIxgUPId_jWmGM7N3bdbV&fid=0x0:0xe6869299035276c6"],"When":"2024-8-12"}]

title: Empire Garden Chinese Restaurant
descriptions: Local go-to with seafood tanks dishing up dim sum & an extensive menu of Cantonese & Sichuan dishes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We don't find ourselves out in Langley very often and we were pleasantly surprised by this spot. From the outside, you couldn't really tell you could find good Chinese dim sum.

Inside, the interior reminded me of your typical well appointed Chinese restaurant.

We tried their beef meatballs with bean curd sheets. While the texture was a bit firmer, it was still pretty good. I really liked the deep fried squid in spicy pepper sauce - nice crispness and a good bite.

We also ordered the beef and cilantro rice roll (which fell apart easily but wasn't bad in flavor), the Empire prawn and chive dumplings, and their stir fried vermicelli with beef in hot spicy sauce... liked the spice level of this sauce.

Overall, a definite good find in the area for dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsSaz1Hn8Uz5loxUhNxKXjrTYdZE3SmoEN6cqt&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"R Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-jrBZr0L2Cohp23WTfYqu0s7jxp32ljcl18krkzsKHxnH3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly hard to find good real authentic Chinese food and dim sum in the Surrey and Langley area, really happy my partner found this place and we're starting to become regulars now.

The food offerings are board and really delicious, in my opinion as good or even better than the restaurants we went to in Richmond and Vancouver when we used to live there.

Highly recommend to those who want authentic Chinese food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXntKZOibat6lSk7S5HDGX4XJoCY9kKXsEVp2J&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Brandon Lieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1l6wN98L8CMs2OejtfywOkLZPKh8R8jVEhQtWEIkzvjWy4Xk9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looking to have dim sum closer to Langley this would be the best spot and better than Lux. The prices were standard but the food was good for being this far away from Vancouver, Richmond, and Burnaby. It's not the best I had but it's passable for a good dim sum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiYBWOZ6aR3IHW3Qj17TWwJhMD2CiL_XC0tf0W&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Hannah Briere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2oTVJ6meTgC0xIDTntXzOciMZw20AfFvFvTuYuG1kUFbP9pM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Empire Garden Chinese is hands down one of the best spots for authentic Chinese food in Langley! From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with friendly service and a warm, inviting atmosphere. The menu offers a fantastic variety of dishes, all made with fresh ingredients and bursting with flavour.

The honey garlic spareribs are a must-try—perfectly tender and packed with sweetness! The dim sum is also exceptional, with the shrimp dumplings and BBQ pork buns being our personal favorites. Portion sizes are generous, and the prices are very reasonable for the quality you get.

Whether you're dining in or ordering takeout, the experience is always seamless. Highly recommend Empire Garden for a delicious, satisfying meal. We'll definitely be back soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"13 Gears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOBcTPNRdVGWuYDWhBEnwYxKqzRWxPI_fTQ0b841dyDHECp14Mxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've eaten here 3 times, and now producing this review. Each time the food was fresh, tasty, and served timely.  The service was speedy. The food isn't revolutionary, perhaps a tad bland, but not overly salty, or full of MSG. For what you pay it's very good. Remember that we're in a new era now, and while they charge $18 for a combo meal, consider yourself lucky. A Big Mac combo is now what, $13? Remember that this food is being served to you in a clean setting. Remember to respect a place while it still exists. Go anywhere else for Chinese takeout and you'll get half the plate and pay twice as much. Trust me, this place is still rocking it old school. Thank you to the cooks and servers of Empire Restaurant. I will see you very soon again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUepS5mU5WFNahjN2_H5_qypZBxBt-eN_Xlciu&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Brittany Stockbrocks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWU7FuHIJtJkjXsiU8iColApclnR7Xh4gioj7gaaMXzPf0qNfEm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Well… empire used to be a favorite of mine. Now I won’t go back. Here’s what happened last night. For context I have tried Xiao Long Bao all over different places in the lower mainland, and so when I called empire I asked if they sold them. She said “yes it’s the juicy pork dumplings in the dim sum menu” I looked and clarified they are the pork dumplings with the soup inside. “Yes” she replied.
Ok I’d like 2 orders. I arrive 25 min later, then I drive home and I get them open and go to eat them realizing the dough is all torn up, they put plastic containers of vinegar in with the hot dumplings so the lid melted and the vinegar spilled all over, and there was not 1 single dumpling that was sealed. When you see these pictures, I wouldn’t even serve them to my dog! This is not even the biggest piss of though. This is WHY I’m writing a review. I called the restaurant and told them I would send pictures. She stated I needed to return the food in order to get a refund. The restaurant is a 40 min drive. Then she proceeded to tell me I did not order Xiao long bao and that those are Chinese not Cantonese, when we CLEARLY had that EXACT conversation on the phone. It wasn’t until I wasted my gas at almost 2$ per liter to drive the dumplings back up to her, that she gave me back my money. Not 1 penny more. I told them I would write a review and they seemed to careless. Would you eat these. Spilled vinegar from melted plastic containers and mushy dough?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN4fdhpNIt3c6yegmkpIkwV-XtCAifP4dONlLJ&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"F Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6vHcN8tLOFToUPHk_F9AUzNJKmih1V2c7FVXEAPBTa5mDRWAq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner with family last night. The food was excellent! The more senior servers did a great job and were friendly. The atmosphere was nice.
I believe one younger server was extremely new; running food to the wrong table, almost dropping dishes, forgetting to fill our tea pot after taking it away, and picking her ear while speaking with our table which was definitely not something you want to see from someone handling food. I hope she is provided proper coaching and training moving forward.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Nielsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9RFXsBAxSZVz_eh_xkLBMifsrtKjTkyYMxCA57Lg70wIKbH8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We used to eat there all the time and raved about it. But that was years ago. My wife is sick and loves won ton soup and chop suey. For two dishes it was $60 with tip! We ordered delivery and my wife asked what was in the chop suey and it wasn't even close. 75% broccoli, 2 pieces of pork, 2 scallops and 2 prawns..and when we called to ask them about it (my wife can't eat broccoli and that's why we asked) we were pretty much told that's the way it is and the gal on the phone wouldn't share her name. Very defensive and it's frustrating. That's certainly not what their photo of house special vhp suey looks like. Very disappointed as this is not the restaurant it used to be. It wasn't great last time but we thought we'd give them a second chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbtHty4je_h-Y4_XCP4IpOJapKbMS2QWpMIx5S&fid=0x0:0x9a431f8c5176422c"],"When":"2024-3-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anu Chellappa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH7N2YO2IoIi-neotm_2REByHVF0LtBajaGmp8ZFPz1hy_kPhD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally found a gem after eating at many South Indian restaurants all over Vancouver for decades. Eating here always takes me back to Chennai eating Amma's home cooked meals. We enjoy eating here on every occasion possible. Owner Amaranth is also very customer friendly. Definitely a go to for us 💕🙏🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4hiyl4WbojIWX-ldeXZ81faQw6Nm7K6zg85w&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Souvik Basu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxVSo2Y3x9QlduJxGzsyK7FvRv6JZsmjOlPWmAr3ju-IARvuc1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has a good variety of South Indian, North Indian and Indo-Chinese dishes. We ordered Rassam, Sweet Lasso and Egg Dosa. The Rassam was excellent, the Dosa was good but not excellent, and the Lassi was ok. I feel they can make the dosa batter a tad bit better. Our server was very warm and friendly. The ambience is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRJ756Vv74qN3hnqkeGNEMQjGIYal9mlcXNJuR&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Mehmud Iqbal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzdKzd7CEtSWik7PUDkAL2bm7hm1Q3Nn4JMf0vY7aaPod9GjZfWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good but the service was significantly delayed. Probably they were short of servers that day. I would be willing to give it another shot sometime and hopefully they won’t blow it. One note is when you ask for spice level of ‘hot’, it’s really hot, which is a good thing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHleDFAgg3BhgqDXMIhgDTQYgSuGJq_wGtWYH6&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"KANCHAN RANI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAnieHhMX3GyyiFZXMODPgDzocMjo4XVGQ5EFX421EhqCsiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the Mysore Masala Dosa, which was highly recommended by a friend, and it exceeded my expectations. The dosa itself was perfectly crispy on the outside, with a rich and flavorful red chutney spread inside that gave it a delightful spicy kick. The potato filling was warm, well-seasoned, and complemented the dosa beautifully. Served with a side of tangy sambar and fresh coconut chutney, it was an absolute treat for the taste buds.

As for the service, it was excellent. The staff was welcoming and attentive, ensuring we had everything we needed without being intrusive. Our order was taken promptly, and the food arrived at the table fresh and hot. The staff was quick to refill our chutneys and sambar, adding a nice touch of hospitality. Overall, the experience was fantastic, and I would definitely recommend the Mysore Masala Dosa, especially if you're looking for a flavorful South Indian dish with top-notch service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0T5ZF0st8dSOVrPwSelMuWeGoqmXHEGO284Ix&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Mike Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_kVO0xRO4Ad3bvJX_b-ifHPpp4O7CjaLfpLCJdbf7BFYm7eky=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely hidden gem. Dined in and had takeaway from here multiple times and the food does not disappoint. Flavorful, well executed dishes all the time. Fish was cooked perfectly, chicken tender, sauces loaded with layers of flavour. Definitely deserves the 4.7 rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxr3AKlNYfR3cfwoj7hekxotKxRspC3AxlxMA1&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2023-12-8"},{"Name":"Harjot Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9vwbelG7LyCfGe0cOTx4grVg5n-CNIkCyf5a-KfefPOoQNXk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We entered at 10pm, and ordered 4 dosa’s and malabar parantha. I should say they must be short on supplies that the chutneys served were non existent. It was just on the plate surface.
Mysore Masala dosa potatoes were not good.
Paneer dosa had NO paneer
Butter chicken dosas were okay
But the malabar parantha felt like frozen and had no taste at all.
Malabar Paratha was not served, just Paratha.

While we were eating food they were mopping the floor right by us. The mopping smell was more than the dosa we were eating. Pathetic service.
In case you are closing please let the customer know, we would have been happy taking our meal somewhere else.
Worst experience. Would not recommend.
We spent $117 and this was such a WASTE.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG7CszcH5-xy-F0CjQLlj9qBNClmcM8OSa91o0&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Preet Nirmaan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJih0xhkn6oZ9tED3RS6tfJP4wGOis7Lq9QTilBUfSsjf94Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At [dosa delight], the Onion Rava Masala Dosa stands out as a flavorful and satisfying dish. The restaurant offers a cozy, clean atmosphere with a casual vibe, perfect for a laid-back meal. The service is attentive and prompt, with staff ensuring your dining experience is pleasant.

The dosa itself is a perfect balance of crispiness with the semolina base adding a unique texture. The spiced potato filling, combined with the fresh, crunchy onions on top, delivers a burst of flavor. Paired with tangy chutneys and hot sambar, it’s a well-rounded dish. Overall, a must-try for dosa lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM98Mx7XXWxqZd8de6s5ADUDXKQ5LqaBsjhYc1Y&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sheri B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5Nxp_GpA887_fJhFcXVHU4pEU2Em2vI5T8t0HdMNQuM91MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't recommend. Service awful,has the atmosphere of a cheap a diner, server was very inattentive(waited 20 min for water after I asked) and the next table got there order messed up. Just after that another table was arguing server over bill. Very disappointed on size of sambar soup. It came in a little 2oz cup not larger portion like all other dosa places places. Food was good I guess but if you want a higher class and thoroughly enjoyable experience go to DHABA DOSA. SERVICE THERE IS EXCELLENT and very affordable. Also in Langley. Believe me, DHABA DOSA is a whole difference superior experience and to top it off they have a robot server who delivers the food on trays to your table. So fun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcnrNtBYDuYHT3jOvIm_GG0Hk-o-2tFsnHxywE&fid=0x0:0x1f357cd885b8de63"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. The food we got was completely bland and tasted burnt. We barely ate it and asked to exchange it. The lady who said she worked there 3 years, with a nose piercing (I think) was atrocious. When we asked to get an exchange, she said “who’s gonna pay for it” - no sorry, no politeness, no Canadian etiquette at all. She claimed she called her boss but went to the back, said he didn’t pick up. She also went on to say “what kind of hour is this to call someone” when this dump is open late and it was not even 9pm. She was absolutely the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced in my life. The food was so bland, not even worth $1. If I could give zero stars I would.

This place is a complete rip off and the lady who was working needs to learn basic customer service. She was rude from the start for no reason at all. Power tripping over a fast food job. I’m appalled and disgusted. Save your money and don’t let them rip you off. Read the many reviews of the food tasting horrible and them doing nothing to rectify it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJznVYU9m7WEj5tyfvtkRewsBgYNzU2MtvG72GPlHg_7rSGfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"GROSS. I haven't had noodle box for a couple of years and figured I'd treat myself to my old favorite shinapore cashew curry. But I was extremely disappointed. My food tasted like a microwaved can of chicken noodle soup. Noodles were overcooked, and vegetables were undercooked and didn't taste fresh. Chicken tasted like it came fresh out of the microwave. All floating it a soupy puddle of disappointment. What happened to it being saucy? First time I've thrown most of my noodle box away. It was just Gross.
Also, no more noodle boxes. It's just a bowl with a lid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME6_RyJLoYjbEUgSudp7PSQ_Y1OkHix7GUqqS1&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2024-3-7"},{"Name":"Simran Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGfeZBvnLR3iZbVFBWPDks3S72q8fwzZHeR3XdXAhtv_v1h9cD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had dinner at the Noodlebox langley location and it was fantastic. Ordered the  Spicy Peanut bowl and the Thai bowl which were both very good. The ingredients used were fresh and delicious. I really loved thier Burmese Naan.
An extra star for the amazing service that we received. Andy was our server and I loved how he went above and beyond to ensure that people were enjoying their meal. They kept the place clean and tidy.
Thank you Andy and the rest of the staff.

The only downside is the place is too small and not a fancy dine-in.  Other than that totally recommend it. Would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN26pfmqh_nBkOPSBZEZ1syELlnYnpplsQ6bSxZ&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2023-8-23"},{"Name":"justin mckillop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXycL53shbjuiaMD6urzpkXK-Gz6EEnmXV8W8247HHolXRLn9Od=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Food was good. Fresh & hot. I got medium-hot which in all honesty felt like hot hot lol. Went with the wife & baby. I would probably prefer wok box.. however the portions were decent. A little pricey 44$ for the both of us. Seating at this location is a little cramped. I would definitely give it another shot just to try something different.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkSKlTVbe6giMyTIcieGuIpe68PMoIPx0c49Pm&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2022-9-18"},{"Name":"Hem Trivedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQt9DKVW5oFCcbeFCdDGlibvdWgRhpYnPVzNVfykxqcDyL1E-jlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want to “RUIN YOUR DAY & TASTE BUDS” then definitely come here. The food tasted like garbage and when we told the manger to exchange it as it tastes so bad, she refused without apologizing and no care towards customer service.
We told her to speak to her boss as well but she replied by saying this is not the right time to call. Which boss would be so busy to not care about his place.
Overall this place is a nightmare so never visit this and thanks to their management this branch should shut soon before giving customer food poisoning and worst customer service.
Please be aware of this place managers she doesn’t care about customer satisfaction at all","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neha Chaudhary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPWAV0HQrvaBG3ToUewKT6Sr12H5cF9sDx7yE9Z6ih1Z6qXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited the Noodle Box. The food was fresh and flavorful, with a good variety of dishes that cater to different tastes. The portions were generous, and the ingredients seemed fresh, especially the vegetables and proteins.

The pricing is reasonable for the portion sizes, making it a decent option for a quick meal.

Overall, if you're craving some quick, tasty noodles, Noodle Box is a solid choice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGygcMYUNNTPgtJETonIh0SNZDfW3Wc7dlMRD0Jeu40XSxEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Noodle Box is Exceptional. Fresh ingredients and loaded with everything in the option you choose off their menue. Excellent value. Excellent price. Comfortable clean seating area to enjoy your order. Bright clean windows. Server was excellent. Kitchen staff hard working. Clean and bright. Take out and pick up are extremely busy. Very popular for dine in casual, take out or delivery. Check their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0BnwzRqCSXOmLfcSwqjVlbqOzJiuxMLR2MG5f&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2022-8-5"},{"Name":"Sahib Matharu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCevdGlV4uAqwcOXtEziHuPxRY-QmuotN1uMjsmoDKOajUQYz_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was tasty with fresh ingredients. Service and staff was also good. Clean seats and table. Ordered 3 noodle 🍜 for $50. Quantity was pretty amazing, I had to take a box to pack left over.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGClOCX9wcdhCJO-8_ULCMVp_reH6Apiv2BKkj&fid=0x0:0xedeb9aaab30d7195"],"When":"2023-11-5"}]
