about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"steamboatgeorge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLK8EBenSgYmcurvjXdYMjaUjpeG_r07vnA_VYsyiS_-aUPNZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming 3-4 times a week since it’s opened. The food is always amazing. The staff are so nice and treat me so well and know my order. I will keep coming back this place is amazing and if you order right it’s healthy ! Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNjQ_5FjNMC6gi2qQa41mPVHFWHxhQFxOOQh0X&fid=0x0:0xc6a70d179821590c"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"HARVEER SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGR66004S5FQ3-E1-8um8oRbVqORGz2LnJO5EzMWj0MAwD_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently ordered from Barburrito through Uber Eats, taking advantage of the “Buy One Get One Free” deal with a minimum spend of $25. However, I was extremely disappointed with the quantity of food I received. It felt like they split the quantity of one meal into two, which is misleading and feels like a scam. The portions were ridiculously small, and I feel cheated as a customer. This kind of deceptive practice is unacceptable and is clearly a ploy to attract customers under false pretenses. I will not be ordering from Barburrito again and advise others to be wary of such “deals.” Very disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEK_JOCQmxzfGFnOL3Nma75fH7uGCbx9htdfTb&fid=0x0:0xc6a70d179821590c"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed barBurrito in Langley. I tried a chicken burrito and found it flavorful. Prices were reasonable and I would return if I were craving a quick burrito.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS-I-lIZoRf6lhTYROj-_u_MSanR2B5nNzC1-Y&fid=0x0:0xc6a70d179821590c"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"YASH THUMAR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVagV6OSFSYM6naNg621gQzLk7p0MjV9BI4G9vHOx0lQFKVHJHL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent experience at Bar Burrito! The service was top-notch — the staff was attentive and friendly throughout. The standout for me was the burrito bowl, which was not only delicious but also had a creamy goodness that left me craving more. The flavors were on point, and the overall dining experience was fantastic. Highly recommend for anyone craving authentic and flavorful Mexican cuisine. Five stars!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlhqg16bqniehYgoWnfuDcv03xp4Isz_HMFyZl&fid=0x0:0xc6a70d179821590c"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"RICHIE WATTERS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9oUKKu2XIt4xqmsQmmESsLxpATEw-c2eS19mkwl2F5PyRd93q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast and friendly service! Food tastes great! Store is clean and has good music!
I got the Bang Bang Shrimp bowl it was delicious. Lots of options for sauces","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJkVG48YK4vdEGTzV9I_yWvzqntFpk6z1i5cWG&fid=0x0:0xc6a70d179821590c"],"When":"2024-4-5"},{"Name":"Lacey Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNkj3OTRsEXV4iCeY5fc2ibDNDCmfuLBn_HSsGBcfyAMP-5UM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visiting from Seattle so this was my first time eating barBURRITO. Super yummy; kind of like Chipotle, but I prefer this to Chipotle personally. The staff were super kind. The food was great. The price was right. Loved the lime cream sauce! Overall great experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIP_g1HPAgm26j9oYtISU2MXdGfSsNvlsL8_f0sabBB56y8Ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a mild chicken burrito and a pulled pork burrito. Both were good - good flavour, meats were moist, and good amount of filling. Just a heads up that we went on a Monday for the Monday deals, but there's quite a bit of fine print. I recommend really reading the whole poster - the prices change for different sizes and only include certain meats, for example. We didn't read the whole poster, so it's partially our fault we didn't know all of this before ordering, but a heads up to confirm certain things aren't a part of the deal would be appreciated. We also couldn't hear the staff too well most of the interaction, so a little bit of speaking louder would be helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0rzvgIOsdnEhw8MgDsYG76X4vkg8oeYx7n43S&fid=0x0:0xc6a70d179821590c"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Keerthana Muralidhar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjeV7n0Q0PSxh0XojhJyT_KPGdLPTTuOZWtlDMrXXYdtqhiKXL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food portion is large and the ingredients used are very fresh and crunchy. I enjoyed dining at this store. It was very affordable considering my friends and my appetite. We usually have to spend 20$ at least per head to eat to our stomach's full. Here the meal box combo at 12$ was such a a great deal and so filling. We tried their Tacos, Rice and Burrito bowls.
Employee Ashna served us, she was very professional and asked us for our customization preferences and made our meals according to our taste buds. She helped us with her personal recommendations as well to make our choices.
Overall, a great experience. I would definitely go back to try their other items on the menu.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mikey Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd7FNXEw1_YzU-LYiPIU9iBnJ8TvJRP7ULRoqG2hDlpSbM-6Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stumbled across this little shop one rainy day. Upon walking in we were greeted warmly, sat and given menus and time to decide. The lady working was SO kind and funny. As we were sat a few regulars came in which you could tell she had forged really nice relationships with. She was joking with them and being so polite. It really helped to make the atmosphere of the place feel so welcoming and homey. Now onto the food, absolutely incredible! The burger was very tasty and was served with crinkle cut fries, I got the breakfast with sausage and bacon, it came with toast and shredded hashbrowns, i got gravy on the side and it did NOT disappoint! Such a yummy breakfast and we will absolutely be back! Highly recommend to anyone in and around the Langley area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzbRDlFBgkCM0fajKOw-MtlyN9Neu7Tf1rXkca&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Keith J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlRWh0fivjEETJm8n4v6cXjBgAqf6CEN7OeXI2sgbaOtOdPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"managing to have 4.5 google review for Katy's hospitality, but food is quite horrible. How can fries be YUK?  Worst fries I've tasted in years and the deluxe burger for $22 is a RIP OFF for this quality. You rather go to Cactus Club happy hour and eat. Burger wasn't impressive at any aspect at all, TASTE NOT GOOD HERE","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"PC Experts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMb8bSV9UMC1oG0k1qKZ_D1Qf15c14AG4IDwm0IqGuQtomutfH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is good and the prices are fair, but the best thing about Katy's Restaurant is Katy and the atmosphere she creates. It seems to be a gathering place for locals, and even thought it was my first time there, I was made to feel welcome and part of the group. I was included in the casual banter that was going on, and it was truly enjoyable. Katy told me she's closed on Mondays, so I guess I'll have to wait until next Tuesday before I return. I had a cheeseburger with a side salad, and it turns out that the lettuce was fresh from Katy's own garden. You won't get that at any of the franchise burger joints.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Penacho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkSKQHA3v096wdqO-IsTThzQ8ZwYWvsVi4GDLQkKygN9xpjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I came for breakfast and had a very enjoyable time.  Could tell that the place was well liked as many customers knew each other on a firstname basis.  It is very nice having small family run places in the community such as this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5a3Oex3kyNui7Xel_Fs5P07aC-zawstBLPG1g&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Sandra Ainsley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWztafMXtKRzwVehU70u2LV7YNBO2gNGouYmFeiFpwA87SBYjc_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katy's Restaurant is a real find. The food  was so-o-o good! Perfectly cooked and they make their own bread which is delicious! If you want good food and a memorable experience, go to Katy's. Katy is so lovely,  full of life, friendly and welcoming. Did I mention the food is cooked perfectly and delicious through and through. I had the Ham and Cheese  omelet with pan fried potatoes and sour dough toast. Mmmm! Trust me, you gotta go!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVfaPfNs4VEmacUEoOItAWfAokSLKDezdeKXJOigymu3pVWbxj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"2nd Time here.
2019 May 19 10:30am
We brought a friend for Breakie this time and not very good.
I'm thinking maybe there not known for a good breakfast so
We'll try Lunch.

1st time here because of the reviews.. it's not a bad place. 2 people $21.00 . Sausage..Eggs Toast..and Medallion style potato & Coffee. Including Tax.

The only thing is the potato was very Dry.. should have had the shredded hashbrowns instead..

I would visit this place again
We came back. 2019 May 19th","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZLEeDFX-zYZZZx8Cozmtz2m04GbjNkzD22OuW&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2018-4-21"},{"Name":"Michelle Wells","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvNRIjqpaD-7lGjKJQUstYMK_4eK7coNH_llfQJvZPo6DHh9s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best breakfast I’ve had in years! Everything was cooked really well, it tasted great and everything was actually HOT.  Our server was friendly and attentive to our needs. There’s free parking out front.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gord Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzqg26JTAvjLSvQR6iHAQ0vAHCgUM-McCo69jnkyAJxgQEMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always amazing food , never ever dissatisfied or disappointed!
Very friendly and welcoming, all the comforts of home with a home made meal !
We both had
Burgers & home made fries and gravy !The shrimp Wonton soup so delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLgIXc7evP-eXl9fMfkJOawxmuaEw4JOZRqed-&fid=0x0:0xe85fe34b13a07da0"],"When":"2021-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in for Lunch with a group of 10 of us on Sunday. Service was excellent and we basically ordered the Kitchen Sink for the table.

Everything that we had was simply amazing, and all the Dim Sum was outstanding.

The wrapped Sticky Rice was very good, and so was the Deep Fried Spicy Squid.

If you're ever in the Langley area definitely don't hesitate to stop in for some amazing food.

We had a reservation for 11am and I would highly recommend that everyone do the same, as the tables were all full while we were there for the two and a half hours that we were all there for. And plenty of people were waiting to be seated when we were leaving...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz7Uing-v9A4t-NVYZwLqWAks8G1hgyfr7usnV&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here because we’re in the area. The food was awesome and did not disappoint. We had Salted Fish Fried Rice, Chinese Broccoli, Chicken Wings and Deep Fried Squid. So yummy and their service was fast and all hospitable. They also gave free dessert and fortune cookies. Not only that they packed our leftovers unlike other Chinese restos were you had to pack on your own :) Now we have a Chinese go to in Langley :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXbAFNE5EW9x2PMPYrKwOPioE0KpR-ZCBNnFe_&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kaylee Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrnelwesLWszVvjanLNlsfSIxKVIQPnh9SEyYTfIQJ3XkS9yt8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying this dim sum spot in Langley. The prices are comparable to other places we've been ($20-$25/ person), but the food quality is just okay. Our top picks were the shu mai, chicken feet, and rice rolls (we preferred the plain ones over the beef-filled). The service was efficient and friendly, likely due to the smaller size of the restaurant. Overall, I’d rate it a 7/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxeybXs-DtTfeYkdgLXpQEmvV8nIaYIbFC5YTn&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Andre Jr Tache","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTr9Og2XxSKdpJ4we7DyLTZxqinbbHVcX993WJKMgDvzRwQpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you love prawns like me, I highly recommend their sautéed prawns. Not greasy at all unlike typical Chinese foods. Just perfect amount of reasonings for me. The seafood fried rice is also delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm5RdLTHosYuVdvorsdwRfG20WgSghHgIBYSHy&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"J C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9moUz718_Czx-EoJfqOxPFnCqSD2qipPlB5XAYJyXR0_KI8Bj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Expensive and portions were small.
Fruit fries kept landing on our table. Unpleasant& unsanitary
At 2:30 they turn off the hall music and servers disappeared even though you are just seated and ordered.
If they are going to shut  the restaurant down at 2:30pm, i don’t understand why they even seat us 2:15pm.

Price was too expensive for the quality and quantity.
One small pan fried rice roll dish( 8-10 pieces withe very little veggie ( 5? 10 bean spruces) no flavour) is $16 plus tax !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMIWkS5_dRJuSVEKKDXFgQxezp6skw1mpxD14L&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Stephanie Southern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJy_HnS391vB2FxV_dCZYH7EIBxy7l-b_tuqoGcLGvtkwxQx-2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Luxe is one of the only (if not the only) places to find authentic Cantonese style Chinese food. Prices are high but the food is absolutely worth it. Growing up with a Chinese mother I had the privilege to eat at some great Chinese restaurants in Richmond and Vancouver and the Luxe is the only place in the area that compares to those restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhXW9n9HmdbK0SowMYvHL8nvNmlK8z3RSLtokU&fid=0x0:0xf025f09fef8ccf99"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"kristalynnmcc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQeIDPi2Hja0NIoIW4zWtFLrr1wDCr58rxxOUlonTAf_SIxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great experience for Dim Sum in the lower mainland. Unfortunately they do not offer a cart service which is what we were looking for but the small plates were great as well. The food was delicious and fresh - it came so quickly. It is on the pricier side but it's worth the price. For three of us it was about $90 but we did order quite a few things. We ordered lots of dumplings, some fried eggplant, bbq pork rolls, sesame balls with lotus root which were amazing! And egg tarts for an end of meal treat. I loved their pork and shrimp dumplings and pork soup dumplings. Can't wait to go back and try more of the options next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAMbY-ZZzAUckf21N0AmXd4UY0hNnhT6l9J9lMME3FnjY23Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered takeout for Sunday dinner, and every dish was delicious! The flavors were well-balanced, but the portion seemed not enough for the price. While it was a bit on the pricier side, the quality of the food made it worth it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happy I stumbled upon this place for lunch. The pizza was fresh and tasted great. Not used to the crust but it was thin and crispy. The crust was glazed in some sort of honey. Napkins were needed for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiQi2cDiN3FaijY4Twipx1T6Tl2LuvX343cfZN&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unique pizza place with lots of great options.  Follow on Instagram and try some of there limited time options.  Gluten free crust is pretty great and calzone for $13-$15 is great value.  Not a dine in spot and take out Parking is near impossible lately so recommend delivery if you can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNacoNCgmhLBJw9AjBNoXoh75msYF2xi6gZv5g&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Kristyferr Arizala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOiyKUGqXqBNtbNLmS8wmqU3zHKkaodcEzR1ZZ8F-bn83TmDOs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've always loved this hidden gem. Fresh ingredients and always freshly made. The crust is my fave, thin, crispy and dressed in honey butter. It's on the expensive side but I think it's worth it. You get a free dip with each pizza and their garlic ranch is delicious. The customer service is great as well. One star off because parking isn't the best and it's in a weird corner. Food is 5 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNM4EG9n0-uw2ZJegEEU7Uc97c_zQ6MEsIhoKY&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2022-10-6"},{"Name":"Harrison Goeldner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv-_CrEOXVFYwpSQ_LfCH8ko4UyTLcFpt8ablig3f4s3p4JYy_Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s more expensive than other pizza places but it’s also some of the best pizza I’ve ever had. I’ve enjoyed every pizza that I’ve had from Emilio’s pizzeria. The honey crust is amazing.

The staff are also always super friendly. Never had a negative experience. I think the only con is the parking is sorta tricky because of all the construction in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMkax_2fXXooiAm9665uAreOW8DfWCb1muQl5VZguzF-YboA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Parking: probably 2 spots in the front, 3 spots in the back(harder to get out).

No dine in.

You gotta try their calzones! I had the Al Capone and it was amazing. Stuffed with cheese, meat, onions, and the crust on this was soft and thin. The calzone was better than the pizza we got. The pizza crust was a too thin. I knew the crust was going to be thin and I have nothing against it, but this one was thin to the point where the entire bottom was actually hardened and difficult to bite. But the flavours were great. Recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY_oFdIolMQ-F3-Fk2J7vMLd9-lXE1v8B20sCt&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2022-7-16"},{"Name":"Brittany Bandura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmHgvHChGos499xC_WEU4J7X-j7LXDT4Xv7LK8S3t__Sl6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Pizza in the Lower Mainland. Nothing compares to the quality.

They really take care to always give out the best quality products.
I have celiac disease and enjoy their gluten free pizza! Though advertised as 'Gluten Friendly' due to possible cross contamination, etc. I have never had a flair up anytime I have ordered from there.

Note: parking is very limited and it is take-out only essentially BUT their pizza is SO GOOD, those details don't matter.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Worth the hype! The crust really is one of the best I’ve ever had. And the toppings are also very good and well portioned. Primo Pepperoni was a big step up from your normal pepperoni! Prices are a bit higher but worth it for the taste. Way better than franchised pizza joints. Be warned however — they are only a pick up or delivery place. No where to sit and enjoy your meal. Also, there ain’t really a parking lot so if ever more than one car pulls in to pick up, suddenly it’s a traffic jam.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2uk6NKRvdPpIO397IAZECaTMqlD3Yr3NtQg4&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2022-8-31"},{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW052h_iZ3oec1jGvib9E5styWT6Vsc8nbAQ0k_SEHdDqcD1LWD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holy smokes- really good pizza. Person at the front was really nice.

Only wish that there were some chairs for waiting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIGoDUqlE4cHZoIKQx1b9BHHQDTrus10hFvEQl&fid=0x0:0x9099f5cea5a5fe8b"],"When":"2024-8-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Faith Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRU1l7lR0St2FKA3sFQRqByUMO0kTpIy7V5hHpzuF2subJjzXD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious food!! Recommend the Mixed platter if you want more variety, our favourite after coming back again is the beef shish kebab platter! So delicious! Friendly owners and staff! Highly recommend to check this spot out in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtGQ9JzfZqTUpGnxE99xtzPYKVKwlBNuPLn5Bm&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Rick G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgZ9duDhu59qGpOJtffGNYBZe0o4MjQlXXDgFvd1GqyeK2Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at Jerusalem Grill, and I must say, it was an amazing experience from start to finish. The moment I walked in, I was greeted by the friendly and attentive staff, who made me feel right at home.

The food at Jerusalem Grill is simply delicious. From the fresh green salads to the hot homemade fries and the perfectly cooked meats from the grill, every bite was a delight. The flavors were robust and the ingredients were fresh, making each dish a true culinary masterpiece.

One highlight of my meal was the hummus and garlic sauces. They were incredibly tasty and added an extra layer of flavor to the already amazing dishes. I highly recommend trying them!

The staff at Jerusalem Grill went above and beyond to ensure that I had a fantastic dining experience. They were attentive, knowledgeable, and always ready to accommodate any special requests. Their warm and friendly demeanor made the whole experience even more enjoyable.

What I also loved about Jerusalem Grill is that it's a family-friendly spot. Whether you're dining with your loved ones or having a casual meal with friends, this place caters to everyone. The atmosphere is inviting, and the staff is always ready to make you feel comfortable.

In conclusion, I can't recommend Jerusalem Grill enough. The food is delicious, the staff is beyond amazing, and the atmosphere is welcoming. If you're looking for a fantastic dining experience, make sure to visit Jerusalem Grill. You won't be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBBSMWEYKXmRCe-FOPiQIwxpQF4TqSgn8UZiAH&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Young Nam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlw-dJ_fhi33eywliXA-oI7QZE5wI0l22XhZ28mlY1aarbiF8b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pleasant surprise! I quite enjoyed their dishes. The server served us fries instead of rice for some of the dishes we ordered, but the fries were great. Will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN8orq-SDMs3PRkTTV6_QW0bU8tp8i7LdoGr6V&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Sheila Heslop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7BVYkBAuanGZfhLiotj2NJicLnpNflzARji7VIJvVgVQ1jP4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shout out to Hakim and the rest of the staff at Jerusalem Grill in Langley, BC

It was our first visit to this restaurant and it won’t be our last.  We were so impressed with the immediate greeting from the kitchen and also from the server that guided us to a table.  She was very helpful and suggested one of their most popular dishes which was the Jerusalem Mix Platter which consisted of an assortment of lamb, chicken and beef skewers.  They were very accommodating with our change of the dish as we did not like lamb and they replaced with another beef skewer.  The dish was served with either rice or home made fries … we had the rice but I also ordered a medium side order of the fries - they came out piping hot and was so fresh and delicious.  It was also accompanied with 2 choices of salads - we ordered fattoush as we were not partial to Tabouli salad (parsley).  Pita bread also came with the meal served with hummus and garlic dip (so yummy)!!! The meal also comes with a soft drink for such a reasonable price of $25.99.
The chicken and beef kebab skewers were both flavourful and we thoroughly enjoyed our meal.  We will definitely go back and try some of the other tasty dishes from the menu.  Thank you for the delicious food and we had a great experience trying out a middle eastern cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH9VbdqMaNn7Ad6ORj_2CuNTpM0u65wSpfKmwH&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Nora V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDH7qNm7XfFTfwn1WJYhPi7P1bg4CfpIaR0HbRci5iblqGEyYd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While looking for a place for lunch in Langley, I came across this eatery with great reviews. I decided to try it and the reviews are spot on. The food was fresh and tasty and service was very welcoming. I got the kufta to start and had the Jerusalem mix platter (pictured below), which was so delicious. I would definitely recommend this place and would not hesitate to come back to try the wraps and other platters. Oh yeah, the baklava was good too. Don’t forget to get that for dessert if you still have room!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr-7JYZabjhx7Q_g3GZEGQVRcKnXURD5MNK-J-&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Ian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULf3-OLI4O0rRpjZN45RE-3L47nWFMsmernLoGvf2fpd5t74ZL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly owner and staffs.

But also more like a cafeteria...  you order food from the bar and they bring you the food.  Just you only pay after the meal.

Good food and big serving.  Meats are dry, and lamb is tough.

Persian style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5y0rBIST2dTx8LdXZlT7ZNof-_V-jORmOYgg&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Varun Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1jDtQlOWVleDuFCAsjniAgSVMmPf8i8NxlAnY_1jN2GomzhgqQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious and was very tasty. The service was awesome and the server was really welcoming. Food was delivered in a quick manner. The balakava was also really good. Will definitely come back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6W6pFS5PsnWoOwCASwm59qHuk1NxbrHg-0iDh&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2023-12-25"},{"Name":"Fatemeh Sayadi (Tisha)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0iXGjcmugjaf-sxnw_j5g7IpzISbK9kqKoWSQpUn_JCfvpEr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was good and fast, the lamb was cooked perfectly and will probably try it here again we visit langley again. The only thing I didn’t like that much was Za’atar which was a bit dry but the food was good and tasty overall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxLY4NQ3V3ja_wLzWZJOBFuKjB3WQnOj2iwdkR&fid=0x0:0x8c004a33d046d471"],"When":"2023-11-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brady Van Unen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJN7ZsCk11eIv5pVr-ituh6C-S7T09pqg6mfTc8cVBONOTe5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here today with my 16 year old brother, after shopping outside superstore Langley. Miguel started making our hot dog and midway through we realized that payment was cash only; we only had a debit card.

Miguel proceeded to continue making the hot dog for my little brother and said not to worry. He didn't ask for any payment. In fact, he made my little brother one of the hot dogs he ever had and wouldn't stop smiling. I even had to take a bite myself.

Miguel, I'm not sure if you read these reviews, but you made both of our days today with your kindness and joy. You are a wonderful businessman and I will certainly be coming back  next time I am visiting Langley.

Anyone with a craving for delicious food on a hot day should head over to the Gypsy bite. You will not be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ardyn Wolf (FMC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtRm6B1hSu8D7rYpaHR34zFBRu8FgxugnppE7IpHo3omSqe8yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love his service and his kind support to other people. He earned my respect and pride to make this my favorite spot to buy and have a yummy hotdog before work!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz6LWEo49DktDKHYzid2OGGlem5jl9S8weBgt5PXq7vaEyaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this hotdog stand since a little kid, and turns out Miguel has been giving the same amazing treats for 22 years! Always a good time just saying hi while buying a snack, or just to say hi! No one does it better","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"304","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcNSPFUbJYejn9ThOItQHp4JSbPhr7ZezqkYQZh-Rt0wvS7jU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been getting hotdogs off Miguel for like 25years or so. He’s a real hotdog champ and always has the best most friendly hospitality and service. Thanks for many years of Miguel.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pine's GoogleStalker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNGob351-Aof0C_tj81JOmB87rtmj2X3urFDnu8cmtYxRobA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ive gone to miguel for hotdogs since I was 7.  Im 25 now and i still go to miguel for hotdogs when driving through the city since ive moved. Absolutely amazing hotdogs nothing can compare and Miguel the owner is beloved enough for the community to petition to keep him when other actors wanted him to leave. 5/5 Try his hotdog.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYLYBAuPmcF0qHlrjzb8LXmozaNbrUk50tCd8S&fid=0x0:0xf5f9a0cc79c57645"],"When":"2021-7-16"},{"Name":"Jay Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqSiqkvJnJmawhnEaIWIWNBKOPN-t-rT3VIwbE7lPtc2J-tsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The quintessential Hot Dog Stand with an owner to match. Miguel puts a smile on almost anyone's face when they come by for a quick snack. Plenty of employees of the neighboring Suprestore and the patrons that shop there count on this local hotspot for an affordable and comforting meal to get them through the busy day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lilah Brousseau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7UCcVBBwLy1oVCQDXUFHNhdI4zHquqhn9_igQaB1sjJhvF2Pl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"THE. BEST. HOTDOGS. YOU. WILL. EVER. HAVE. owner is very nice too. seriously though. get one of these hot dogs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Norman Dube","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7LpQ_8hSAFpuQF4IRitJcIRZhvp8WoQdegdT7zaWIt2EEbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Dogs! With the upbeat pleasant man serving.We will definitely be back","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jeff h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2hwUZHs5gB5Kyej34MtjpP2Hqzjy1rdhu3RFkVOsX-xs-Lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food, excellent service. Tenderloin was cooked perfectly and the blue cheese crust on top was the perfect way to finish it off. Scallop risotto was very creamy and scallops were cooked perfectly. Crab and cream cheese stuffed mushrooms were a large portion and had a great lemon flavor. Caesar salad was fresh with plenty of bacon and fresh croutons. Cool view overlooking the curling arena.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlzhjH80DvmieucDSXZWlYej370xB30enBgpVQ&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Crystal Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbSIETTo5dByrrM35CVIN5OHi4tEXJzVs-ePtKpEy1FWae1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gave the Horse and Ryder a try after our son's hockey game... service was on point and the food was fantastic... forgot to grab a pic of the calamari before we devoured the plate! Hubby had the Lodge bacon and cheese burger and I had the beef dip (swapped the horseradish aioli with garlic aioli)... we will be back to try other items.  Others at the table had nachos which also looked fabulous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwjeLEMnYl4Ur-OzQu1g6xafz3vuCEES3vSgii&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Nick H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsLwuGHXIoa1kZJzgg6GGJ4IwMUMcaj10KhKmoj8R6vY4s7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went in and had the Game burger and onion rings.
Game burger had bison venison and elk so I thought it would be neat to try.
Burger was very good but it didnt taste much different that regular burgers and was a little overcooked.
Onion rings the same as they were a little cold and tasted a little overdone.
Food was a little slow to come but not worth complaining about.
Place wasnt too busy fortunately.
The meal was pretty good but at $33 I thought was quite overpriced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa8UfSdxLMrKFZ8IWIJYio60-b-MkH5WV3jd2BlFjvGFlWOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First off staff here have always been accommodating and friendly. You can order food from the pub menu or the restaurant located directly next door. Some things to be aware of. It can get busy when they’re are tournaments in George Preston arena. Quite often you’ll have individual customers sitting at a table designed for six customers so not great if you’re showing up with a larger group for dinner. Some of the seating has to conform to the layout so some areas you feel like your sitting in the hallway or a revamped recreation centre. There are no exterior windows…not a big deal in the winter but in the summer it has the bunker affect. The food is well pub like the restaurant food on the other is acceptable but a bit pricey for the quality. Would I order the overtop expensive Tomahawk steak? Probably not, it feels risky for the cost/value. I have ordered $45-$50 steaks? Yes and honestly they were okay but just okay a little disappointing if your spouse can make a better steak at home for considerably less. Yes, I have eaten at the Lodge and this a review of the Horse and Ryder but when you can order from the same menus regardless of which location you dine in it’s hard not to merge reviews. By the way my favourite pub menu item is the fish and chips. If you live in Brookswood and you don’t want to drive to WG to The Keg for steak it’s worth checking this place out just ask questions and be fussy if you order a steak and it’s not acceptable for what you paid for. If your looking to have wings and beer and possibly watch the real “Men With Brooms” it’s not a bad local spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaXqMxkRARFPuIZokaC0SxPD1ZlFU4uuWuqtqI&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2023-6-18"},{"Name":"Sandy Vorberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRUnDlnJ9QoM0O9p2qDa5khVLT8gY3YyZXkZ6lUfwaAS-FLXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time here at the “new” location at George Preston. Considering it was Monday at 2:30 the pub had a few tables taken up. Our server Natasha was a total professional and nailed a Burnt Martini for my hubby.  Shared steak bites that were tasty and the price was fair. Calamari was very nice and not greasy. FYI… Hockey and CFL is on the multiple screens during the seasons so they have no problem catering to local favourites. Only complaint is that we would have like to see what is offered for brunch but no menu available yet. Indoor and outdoor dining available. Looking forward to brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsEkJb7S7D3_of2FFxifotxuHZ3jnk-ZGnREXD&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2023-8-16"},{"Name":"Louise Borg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW3YoQtRSnL6dSrftCznw3yk2Sm5YWWx8ViMh7-0b9LROb9DGqWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and was a bit tricky to find, go upstairs on the left of hockey arena and the pub overlooks the curling rink.
Nice atmosphere, great and friendly staff and delicious food.
I had the lodge burger and hubby had the steak sandwich which is open faced.  tender meat, good french fries and yummy dipping sauce!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF36yw2baPG9PgN1lHQuPu6Nows-cmBQUH88d1&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2022-10-30"},{"Name":"Dayana Bc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVeWeEVY-SJlI0T_asmbsv2-OSXUweH6nkN_vv8-rsrNEymxBV9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went with my boyfriend and the atmosphere was okay, not the best but whatever. The service is horrible, they don't come to the table if you don't call them. After waiting a while for some fries  and calamari THE fries  WERE SUPER COLD, as if they had been put in the fridge after frying them. The only thing we ordered was fries  and calamari , the calamari was not concacent at all. Needless to say, we will never go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rod Boss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ8bWvBqQdVdlR8CAIVrDmGyVwu1ywLx5ZZqCiiK1M7zCYkh_z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't been The Horse and Ryder for quite some time. I had a very pleasant surprise. The staff was very nice and the deep fried pickles were quite good. It was a great way to relax after a busy day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5RUN8BjV2E9rLpEJHjUnI_SIwzSMqkZaL-QRj&fid=0x0:0xb245bfb988363a45"],"When":"2023-12-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Toni is incredible!! Such an amazing server, patient and friendly going above and beyond  to listen to my mom talking forever, not to mention service was perfect. Food was great we got calamari, French onion soup, pork belly with spaetzle , scallop risotto, chicken & gnocchi, truffle mac and cheese, table side dessert and the new warm brownie with caramel sauce my mom loved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8KHgGaK2yzzp7bD8h7WKNImba81gKKyTc3vCr&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'll be a bit honest, never knew this was here 🤣 been to several of my mom's curling matches but never knew it was upstairs.
Very happy though, I found out about it. It's a lovely place for celebrating a birthday or an anniversary. I say that mainly because the prices are a bit high so just something to consider.
My wife took me here for my birthday and we enjoyed a few appetizers, some delicious food and a couple of very cool drinks, including their smoked whiskey!
Service was exceptional and speed was quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiT-FrpomhN9ZViNzQjti0P-Jm_OK8Oe4AS9fq&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"MyLinh Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkM1DP_X2gjlPJbZEqs4DhRdpkL-9zKdk9_CNYdTLj9LYqrK6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently dined at The Lodge Steakhouse, and unfortunately, the experience was far from what I had hoped for. Despite the high expectations that come with visiting a steakhouse, the food was disappointing. We ordered four steaks, all of which were supposed to be medium-rare, but three of them came out close to well-done. This was a major letdown, especially considering the premium price we paid.

Additionally, the sides we ordered were cold by the time they reached our table, which only added to our dissatisfaction. To make matters worse, it took nearly an hour for our food to arrive, making the experience even more frustrating.

On a positive note, our server was kind and attentive, doing their best to make us comfortable despite the kitchen's shortcomings. However, the hostess left much to be desired, as she was neither welcoming nor friendly when we arrived.

To compensate for the poor experience, the restaurant offered us two free desserts. While the gesture was appreciated, it didn't feel like a fair resolution considering the overall disappointment with our meal.

Overall, The Lodge Steakhouse did not live up to its reputation. While the service from our waiter was good, the issues with the food and the overall dining experience make it difficult for me to recommend this restaurant. I hope they can address these problems moving forward, as there is clearly room for improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd5W-h-4CX6qjpgiFXTbq0xV1T2arT-cJwAFra&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"chris leonardo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyBJaTKH0diyzovXlT4V_xnfZc9WtSy2qLDzwlaQYHKi-QM81g0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated my birthday at The Lodge Steakhouse in Langley, and it was our first visit. You wouldn't have guessed there was a steakhouse at this location, but as soon as we entered, I was blown away by how modern and beautiful the restaurant was.

Our server, Stephanie, was incredibly knowledgeable, and all her recommendations were spot on. We had the New York strip loin with mushroom risotto and the brown butter sablefish. It was the best meal I’ve had in a long time. We finished with a delicious dessert that Stephanie highly recommended: a molten chocolate lava cake.

Special thanks to Stephanie for making our first time here so memorable. We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzDYh_4VVotHpenhdh_ii5y3duLq4ouJe6AtgA&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Kayla K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYQQgW0puw0KLKA0_Vv2fWoL5twgpGyqE_ggZ8sMjkeva49Qio=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went right at 4 when they opened for an early dinner while road tripping and it was a great experience! The food tasted delicious and portion sizes rather large. A huge parking lot Wewith plenty of stalls and the seating area is also very spacious. If you're looking for an upscale steakhouse, this place is definitely worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMELnGdATF3RFO2Ows60N33DWft2LGw_1PI2i6V&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Patrick R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJWPbHwpFNDZ3pEWPQrLcMM0GxtLocS02anv0WkmHpRtCRLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Four of us tried The Lodge for the first time this evening. It was my friend Dan’s birthday and we wanted steak!!!

The location and parking are really awesome and made getting there a breeze.

The atmosphere is as expected given the location. The patio was open however we dined inside. Our server was prompt, well mannered and, in my opinion , took pride in ensuring our needs were met.

We all order different steaks. Albeit pricey they all arrived as advertised. My steak ( a porterhouse) was quite undercooked however it was still epically delicious and therefore I simply ate it. The others in my group were very satisfied with the quality of their meals.

Again, expensive but I’ll be back !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Le7LTZRAdaRyuZu7wDZDri5Gh_Mp5ZaBiT0-&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Hogan S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2J3zZ66zZx7iQ4BTL4LzKwIf1IEEEibAnGfkvCeqVvgQxFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came to this restaurant expecting a fine dining experience. Considering the prices we were extremely underwhelmed.
I ordered the ribeye. It was under half an inch thick and had the flavour of a top sirloin reheated in a microwave. Vegetables were undercooked and also resembled something out of a frozen veggie bag. My girlfriend ordered the short rib. Short rib was tough and not tender so she barely ate it. Presentation is important when dining at a nice restaurant and these meals had 3/10 presentation. We brought our concerns up with our waitress and we were satisfied with them waiving the short rib from our bill. Maybe it was an off night with the kitchen, but we won’t be hurrying back any time soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxRKDFexaEAcNk_nqoU45eGacWOq7ZHmmk7xi6&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Essy Martineau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaQl8HcI4YS2q_rB1MhWxpVWuYk6NnobD_JjLdB3Rc1gFvBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to come here after some recommendations by friends for my birthday dinner, and we were not disappointed! Food was absolutely amazing! My partner ordered the strip loin and said it was one of the best steaks he’s ever had! I ordered the filet, it was cooked to perfection, but lacked a bit of seasoning for my taste. We ordered some sides as well. Truffle Mac and cheese ( which was my absolute favourite thing there), table side seared scallops, and mushroom risotto. All tasted amazing. The customer service was very attentive and accommodating. We will definitely add this to our list of regular spots to visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHnyzJJCrB9Ec3_bpSLyske8AgVneY5PWAQ702&fid=0x0:0x92d04b3740178651"],"When":"2024-4-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cassie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVDFwcJpPSNZ2RWAsqoCPmucl16RgeATwSsfORQgvC_aaXJtGK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing experience at Atlas! The food was all amazing. Our server was even more amazing. You could tell that she genuinely loved her job and was having fun and happy to be there. I look forward to coming back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRQAcuCP92UmBh5m8hp_jlCoyWWd-pt6Fr2_Ss&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Grace Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2Qb5BK8BlHD8B-fNqpMIiwBP96of3n6s7qsHpu4xPXVSJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am going to come back for the soup!!! Mm!! I don’t typically order a soup but I wanted something warm and cozy with the rainy weather. The Josper Smoked Potato Chowder was rich and creamy— perfection. I prefer my meat medium well and they made it perfectly to my liking. The meat was juicy and delicious… I also had a mojito for my drink which was refreshing. I was pretty full but still had some cheesecake for dessert. It’s a really beautiful and classy restaurant. Servers were attentive and kind. I asked for a straw for my water and they made sure I had it right away. Fantastic service. Also.. don’t forget the fresh bread it’s sooooo good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdpjFBofkA53TfnBZUCRXQnLBqZCzbz5fQUj9j&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jean Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKauUtY-eHEVaqqy_5FDYhs46hew-lPpSWVfzpOfNvHxfjz3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve never left a bad review but I had very disappointing experience here when we visited here to celebrate an occasion.

Happy hour oysters tasted old. Sea bass tasted old and dry. There was zero seasoning on both the sea bass and the brown butter sauce. Other people had steaks and they were okay.

We did not feel welcomed by our server. We had to ask for our complementary bread after seeing all other tables getting them. Our server was rude to us but she was clearly more personable with other tables. We left there thinking if that was because of our race. We had to rush out of the restaurant as we felt very uncomfortable.

However, the hostess and bussers were friendly and helpful. The atmosphere was nice.

I do not recommend this place at all if you are looking for a pleasant dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcRaGCR0ITu_Lvs3OD0H3ZkYfkNMvE1qF4mYV2&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Alym Amlani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCS7cfdRd9yppSIvIAypDkWBSXz0qghmJF3r1Qs4AKnQ6BCK-zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful experience here, celebrating our wedding anniversary. Our server was super friendly, attentive, and personable. The food was delicious. We had the “gunpowder” tomahawk steak but I personally preferred the original one from when we were last here. This was still delicious though :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvPbj7bL4wgDmplKPh6lS_fYplkdegM7iXb8m-&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Kevin Mattinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN5HoU3WCvhzOkA6OoRbX8N3fA9KSHr1_21jegruOgbAE2zCdN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just came home from an absolutely perfect dining experience at ATLAS with my wife and a friend. Everything about the experience was more satisfying and memorable than I had hoped for. Sadie at the door went over and above her duties to make sure my party was comfortable and satisfied before we even sat down at our table. John and Liz were our waitstaff for the evening and made the exquisite food appetizing and extra appealing before we even got a first taste. Chef Jason provided an amuse bouche that I wish I could remember the details of but I wanted to order MORE of that delectable morsel of flavour explosion. My friends went to a different chain restaurant on the same evening and I felt bad to decline, but after dining this good I doubt if I could be tempted to ever set foot in one again. If you want a great ambiance and dining experience, I highly recommend ATLAS. Why are you still reading this? Go make reservations already! Thanks to everyone else on staff that contributed to our evening that I did not get to personally interact with. The bar got set a few notches higher tonight. Much appreciated","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlLMT4sbm9NP2l18vwwYyErqEnD3Gjn0Dt4sG1&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Al So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumQHIv-5W9wXPr4ZbA1zWCVnPk2w1Kc3bjsO93-VMG-v7JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Atlas Fish in Langley is full of surprises, starting with its convenient location connected to a casino. I wasn’t expecting it to be so busy, but clearly, the word is out about this place. We went with a group of friends and were definitely not disappointed.

We started with the prawns 🦐, beef 🐄 carpaccio, and oysterswhich we're awesome choices across the board. Each dish was fresh, flavorful, and had us wanting more. For the main course, I went for the surf and turf with steak 🥩 and lobster 🦞. It did not disappoint. The steak was cooked perfectly, with those beautiful grill marks that make your mouth water just looking at them.

All in all, Atlas Fish is a great spot for anyone looking for a good meal with a side of excitement, thanks to the casino next door. It's definitely a place I’ll be visiting again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbm8v4LWUOUzjDFiPs-x8moyMVNDa0Jz72vCkr&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Anny Velásquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIHwa1y0w-ZfHh0fg0DMJTEHFDHgyvucLz7bV4m3ixulWyWKjgZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was perfect! The food was amazing and our server too. We went there to celebrate my husband’s birthday and had such a great time. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5oivo-sSuQ6rZQzi5TQm__O8yAAa0IkyHuX94&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Colleen Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpsidLuNMQmiiJ7G6_DCNBVPCXA_23d9kjZqOPSrCn8oiIvlNz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Of the steak houses… Atlas in Langley BC is my absolute favourite place to go for a special occasion if we are looking to have steak and seafood.  The food is always consistently good… BUT… it is the tier 1 service that keeps me coming back.  Whether it’s the host who establishes relatability right away, or Tracey remembering me from the last time I was there or our server Devon who had to handle my relatively fussy mother with all of the grace and professionalism of a champ, to the piano player who played happy birthday when Devon brought out the cake… it is the considerate and consistent touches of customer service that sets this place apart from all other similar style restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk58OjJ2ip8d1FisJucZMAIXiEgQ67EwQDZ9PT&fid=0x0:0xc08ace3e4357f3f5"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

title: The Katsu Japanese Cutlet House
descriptions: Easygoing Japanese restaurant with a low-key ambiance specialising in breaded meat dishes.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tencia Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeace69KGm2UBszQAxnK8dcE4Sn56BqMcvPDZIpuTzIfoj_awQ5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The cheese katsu really fills you up. We got the assorted, and the kids loved the fish katsu. Also got the udon but there wasn't much udon or rice, there was bigger portions of meat and cabbage. The restaurants till has shields between tables.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7mC6EJDldlh7Yk-7ev8Xp_D6fY7KCDkUHTJc-\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Knives","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3BmCiyWD_sAHTxbiJc14skmpm80Tfy4n5KfCou7jITfWLhXU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and great portion. Its big and proper. Service is so nice they go above and beyond for customers. One of Langley’s best restaurant. And the price is very fair $15+ is the average katsu set and thats with rice, soup, and salad u wont see that price often these days. I really love this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHbH69BbsH_fz6RtZZkFgY30aXQYoZsVVX1tA9\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"crispy and tender katsu that melts in your mouth! the salad is also really good. the only thing is that the sauce from some dishes such as the hot plate and kimchi cheese nabe are a bit too overpowering, and then you can't enjoy the simple tenderness of the crispy katsu. service is also really helpful and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0PeVF9yLzj9pg3J5kTBycdoCRMumKeZ8WjGvK\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Sj C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBC2SqHV3Cxo8riKugJaIn71DjVvNX-TRuWGuRa0SPiKlavNJv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of our favourite katsu spots in Langley! Food is always delicious with generous portion sizes. The chicken katsu is crispy and tender pairing perfectly with the house salad. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDngFnicQxFbHW65F9bO9IOHAiNcVg8-ysdHMf\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"erin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVquEl9bL8o3vlHvd9GxA6hbaHT4vCbvygBkdFHOH5UOS-Dn1sl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"delicious!! the cabbage salad pairs excellently with the katsu ❤️ friendly service and overall great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzlJe-mzpGo79xwnm-O32PgykzwBZMN9QTC2vS\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I Work by the corner of this restaurant in Have never tried it, because the food is cutlet and in my perspective, it’s not healthy. So never had tried it before. Today we decided to give it a try and I should say the food didn’t feel greasy at all it didn’t come across heavy and it was done in a very, very efficient time. We got by there at 10 after 12 and the left 10 before one which for lunch is very great time and efficient. The service was great. The food this flavours really nice. It was priced very reasonable.  if you want to try something, unique and tasty, give it a try. The food was not dry and crispiness was just perfect. The salad wasn’t heavily sauce and the rice with the right portion. It also have pickles and a really good dipping sauce and it’s come with the soup. For the price you pay I can definitely say it’s really I must try this little restaurant in downtown Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQmnkKVxdhy2mYXP0WEI230HpO8vIxJzzgEUg\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2022-11-3"},{"Name":"Patty Lawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyJ57zaddManS-BKaF-6lD-R2YkZkW8O9B-vtES-NEKTLDRgU-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Katsu Cutlet House in Langley is one of our go to for affordable, quick and straight to the point lunch spot! We have been here about 3 times now and we have mostly ordered all of their katsu options. I would personally highly recommend their Katsu Nabe its deep fried pork loin with mushroom sauce served on a hot plate! It was delicious! I wish their menu will expand a bit more for variety, and also for the rice serving to be a bit bigger. Service is quick and friendly and prices are affordable hope they won’t increase their prices then we will for sure continue to visit this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqWvrxAB_2Ocaku7EQGe4wXL9SQaBEQdlxrooH\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2023-7-21"},{"Name":"Yuko J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr7VQRx2aC62asoeQNaw7F9TIdulsTA0Q5xzEBMCXJd7YTPMBn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy pork katsu.  Good service, good food.  Ask for mayo as they don't give it to you.  The katsu sauce tastes different than the store bought bottled version.  They give you a bit of spicy hot mustard on the side.  When you mix the mustard into the katsu sauce gives your pork cutlet a bit of a kick. I add mayo too.  The pork katsu was a bit thin but still crispy and good with rice they serve on the side.  Recommend this food on a cold winter day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5R6Xv4-NH8Lr_RZqn99Yu8wbS_tnqrjC1cs_W\u0026fid=0x0:0xc20f5bbd674aa840"],"When":"2023-11-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Italian and greek-centric joint with an expansive menu. A lot of the entrees are excellent value, and the drinks are fairly priced as well. Several of the items are fantastic, such as the calamari, greek salad and the pizzas are LOADED with ingredients and cheese. Not upscale but its got a nice diner vibe. Entirely worth an outing with the family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsM7fjUwkmuZoTqFMlUYwaF9-qvxCSu-bn48kr&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Michelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2FVGSlFFnT4DTUmJ1_d9RmQclA7X9RJV9xRw03otVVcjs9uJP8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a staff Christmas party there and had a separate room. The service was great for just one server who took care of us.  The food was pretty good, and the serving was average.  Some ordered the drink of the day (Sangria on Thursday night) and they seemed to be pleased.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd5oz3dyZ1eYRgTcZ-QoK6fd5AZwb6nZG7x6VX&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Wall E Bush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsKYOEr-emRnRDMvQb4Fe50cosacwOYlXOeUFcUM1BL-i4pEI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty big portions and relatively well priced. Drink sizes were bigger than expected (and appreciated) + free refills! They were able to accommodate for our relatively big size of a group (some arriving sooner than others), and it was quite quiet in there since it was decently late in the night. The server that worked our table was funny, kind and patient (wish I had gotten their name). If I ever find myself round here again, I would definitely go back! Definitely a good spot for both big and small groups, with booth seating available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtVxcwfQgKwOkcu9l7Wu_Wuq6cW5u6OZG6dKDZ&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Lindsay Paul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhZYH_3Q8tutSI1GbvfYvNv2Bw9YMxwHxvOYUmD63NypD8sxH8uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in tonight for the 1st time for my anniversary dinner. Was a lovely place great food wonderful choices lovely waitresses that were on top of it! The drink menu was insane! Andreas was recommended to me from a client of mine and did not disappoint. 10/10 my husband and I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFYqDqOXuqoCmzS2ViGll74YCfIaBeFSra7Wwr&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Samantha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYQIBfn48v5lobWBHfs3E15st0WWe4wywXSw2ioY2SRNWNxXVl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here last night as it was the only place open late. Oh my gosh, we absolutely LOVED it!!! It’s like stepping back in time when restaurants actually had character and just felt different. Our food was seriously incredible, highly recommend the Chicken Parmesan, and spaghetti with baked cheese and mushrooms. Our drinks were also great, and very reasonably priced. Rhonda, our server was lovely and had a great personality. This place is an absolute gem, and we can’t wait to come back !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylene Fast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDZDBZRQdhjFH3fhNZo3QjD0x0xghgydMBpJ6qUmutUjrBQwc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been eating here for 20+ years and all I can say is they're lucky the food is decent. For the last 5 years at least, there is something wrong with our order every time. If you call to complain you're left on hold until you hang up. If you talk yourself into giving them another chance and decide to use an automated app like Door Dash, thinking that if you type up the order yourself they couldn't possibly screw it up, you would be disappointed yet again. Why have the option to serve something on the side if you're not going to bother to read that someone chose the option?!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbrLgGpfwzt62Dr8R-dtLZStxl6n__mWE9e0Dn&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mariechelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs1f3BzYUpCZ4NolZAF3qz_fJTrE4JyxOp1hJl7A9aWCYo9O6O7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fantastic and the best ceasar salad I had so far. The service is great too! It was Jen who assist us and she's so friendly and patient. It was our first time to eat here but she gave a brief about the menu with a friendly manner. She also made sure that we'd like the food we're getting. ❤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1jzklMhP21-8SdnOEtcYBQWcaVQ5ucmvwobhQ&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2021-8-1"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good sized portions, very extensive menu, priced fairly, food was average, pasta can have more taste and lamb was a bit dry.  The feta cheese they used on their Greek salads were one of the best ones I've had.

Lots of seats at the restaurant, fairly clean, waitress was very friendly and attentive.

Parking available in their lot and street parking as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8MfH42ZOc4Wb4X4cSibPFz3y4T5dX8frqk0-0&fid=0x0:0x9894ced7893045ed"],"When":"2022-12-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lawrence C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxVMHq3fFLOwcvfLxZFd8kk0GtI64zfNveegZnvEt40NruuDLY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the small library feeling. So sweet. Good for small to medium group gathering. Up to 40 people I feel, or little bit over. Ordered buffet diner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVsz3QlQ6QNItsovlK6_-ow8BUgCpCyfxx_XZm&fid=0x0:0xac6c6e3cd1e43c32"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"K M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6uRG1fjhZ1Oa7-cTFnOSNvCo164TDegfKcn3oCGLK4PrPszTu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"2 patrons. One chicken honey sandwich. One adult mac and cheese. No beverages. Service was fast and friendly. It got very busy within minutes of arriving at 12:30pm. Good atmosphere - gets a bit loud when it's fully stacked with people and games going on but that's expected.

Total bill $42 so it's restaurant prices and GOOD quality food. Will come back. Accessible friendly too, which is a bonus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ZV9pFrJta2bXGGpPrDljQIf23eADV1xsfj3n&fid=0x0:0xac6c6e3cd1e43c32"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Jizelle Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyzSeMMMmQJNd8WDethczxr3uXNdjORpbX-butxHOVp0pXxetz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went here for a reunion with my old friends! We had lots of fun although I can't speak for their game selection because we only played uno for nostalgia sake.

As for the food, I ordered two dishes because half of my dish was good and the other half was disappointing. I started off with the Vegan Spicy Poke Bowl which was pretty decent but the rice was cold and tasted like it was old, hence, the clumps. It also could've used a sauce to bring everything together. So, I ordered another dish to compensate as I was still hungry.

The Vegan Crossed The Road burger was the highlight of my meal! I wish it had more vegetables but other than that I could not complain because I would come back just for that burger alone. It converted me into loving pickles, specifically bread and butter ones.

Also, I do not recommend their tomato soup. It tasted very smoky. If someone gave it to me without telling me what it was, I wouldn't have guessed it was tomato soup if it wasn't for the colour. I wish it was more bright and creamy and had herbs.

The service was average. Funnily enough, the server thought I loved my food because I ordered more than once, despite the leftovers I didn't pack, which is unusual for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPGTkUyDI56fwO_oBER2KryL24GBmwPfk6hkNJ&fid=0x0:0xac6c6e3cd1e43c32"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Flora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlzbErQLVss3kGeby9sz0OkhuOyGVQdZwSlbRUxvvwLu6nZ3c7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"TLDR: Fun concept! But they have hidden charges, badly made and overpriced cocktails, and food is hit or miss. I have had way better experiences at other board game cafes. 💸💸💸

I was very excited to visit this unique local business and check out thier restaurant concept combined with board games but unfortunately several issues made my experience fall short. First of all, I did like the fact that there was someone to greet you at the front of the store and help you pick out games so that you could have a more catered experience, I would have liked to be able to browse the games to try myself but it's understandable that you must have an employee grab them for you. When it came to the restaurant side however, there were several red flags🚩🚩🚩. I had high expectations due to the local sourcing of ingredients and the fancy sounding menu but the water buffalo burger I got had a pitch black patty and was so dry and smoky that it just tasted burnt. My drink, the Villanous Peach was horribly made and had 4 little ice cubes floating in a giant glass of mixer, overly sweet and unbalanced. For $15 this cocktail tasted worse than something I could get at a dive bar. Speaking of cost, my server charged me $1.50 when I asked for mayo, which isn't a problem, but he never informed me that the mayo was going to be a charge until I got my bill. Had I have known, I probably would not have gotten it. I will say others in my party had better luck with the cookies and cream milkshake and chicken and waffles. Although the shake was smaller than expected for $9. Lastly, my partner found a small glass shard floating in his beer glass and unfortuantely our server never came by to check on how our drinks were going, so all these details were missed. Don't think I will be going back here when there are other similar businesses that can offer a better experience. 😕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmLRkNJtOJAofSobYaUlKb275f__hinPLshujD&fid=0x0:0xac6c6e3cd1e43c32"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Jae Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSc1rzM1iBcqd5dfL1F2O2cQ7gAXV2IiZ66G1iMGHfoS2xgoio=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a must try! Had the coffee brisket sandwich and the bennys for brunch. SOOO GOOOD and the fries are amazing with the seasoning they put in.

The board game selection is huge and you’ll spend hours playing here with friends or family.

The staff is really friendly and have great recommendations for both food and games.

Definitely check out this place when swinging by Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOrncauPdR5ooFrU2IP_J5Wdz5D4o9FtdiijWc&fid=0x0:0xac6c6e3cd1e43c32"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Tyson Sonnichsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBlJkj-tE-AEoanqTQtdLwc2oNVNEg8cZtpHAP6hSzqOYmvt49=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a really great time here, there was a decent amount of games to choose from, but I'd say they could add more. The food was great, it was busy so the service wasn't great but that's too be expected. We will visit again! I particularly liked the platter of warm chocolate chip cookies.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2JDEzEmV10TdATgOUgbcRZ7qcEUz5gkRDSwhBgPxuqDQJPiyH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I booked the party room and held an event at the Raving Gamer recently, but even before that I've visited and has excellent experiences each time. Booking the party room was a breeze and I found them to be very responsive. The room rate is reasonable, access to the TV is a bonus, and the custom dinner table is really neat, there's drawers and spots to add your cups to keep the table clean for games! The fries are fantastic as always, I highly recommend getting the loaded fries to share. Or don't, eat 3lb of fries to yourself, I'm not judging. Our server Dillon was amazing, attentive, and had great memory skills (we had a lot of requests and questions), 11/10 cool person. Food is delicious as always and I appreciate the dedicated vegan menu too. We've brought cakes to TRG multiple times and they've always accommodated us. Thank you TRG!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTd1Rqs7VgPhdrfxxG4D9LIBsTUDrAsKvUnxDxUDS6a4O3GLQ_HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a good time. If you like board games and you like great food (like who doesn't?) This is the place to go. The staff are great, the service is great, and the boardgame selection is massive. They have damn near every boardgame you could possibly want to play. Kid friendly and adult friendly, you can even come to just play the games for a fee. I would suggest you book a reservation as it's consistently busy. Oh, and you can also purchase a board game on your way out. Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOucfxzgNc7mzr07iBjFTmvmZM_1TAcSMWLo9V2&fid=0x0:0xac6c6e3cd1e43c32"],"When":"2024-2-25"}]
