user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rizwan Ahammed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQVmLM5E8mqwZKQpg0yOi38K_fOmq_LhYvSO0LRr1mjd7K3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am very picky about Biriyani . The reason for that probably I come from Thallasserry a small town from Kerala known for its aromatic Biriyani. The Biriyani you get here is the best any place you get in North America and I am sure it will stand out even back home. I ordered half tray each of Beeef and Mutton biriyani, The meat was tender and got  DUMED so well it comes  so nicely. The rice he uses is special biriyani rice called kaima. Trust me one of the best Biriyani place here and one among the best if you compare even back home. The smell when you open the tray is unbelievably aromatic and makes you mouth water.
I don't write much reviews but this one deserves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK-_5DTeDJb3SR7OosXQoWynVGFfH_pc00rROM&fid=0x0:0xd4975d1f5fca976c"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Heather Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvInqByCwsHj7QVVeyALvkK3evD1ASUvRTClrlrurzXx-PLmjt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The amazing reviews led us to Abu's Kitchen and it was just as delicious as is shared. Seen here is the lamb biryani with roti. My son had the chicken biryani. We enjoyed our meals and will be back. It is a community kitchen space so expect take out. You will be glad you put this one on the list!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZA1O8DEur6XuJIBlpKu5BL-PDptfXO2OcrVVs&fid=0x0:0xd4975d1f5fca976c"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Sreejith K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwBp1rve9njGLnF4aJWeECWi31mRu8DQ4Sn3626eCTaVNdJgCeuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are craving authentic Kerala flavors, especially the iconic Malabar dum biriyani, Abu’s Kitchen is a must-try .  I ordered one Chicken Dum biriyani and one egg biriyani. The biriyani is perfectly cooked, aromatic, and deliciously reminiscent of home. A true treat for anyone missing the rich culinary traditions of Kerala. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsLYg_wlxPRjTqwt6NugNcseEYpFEbm6Eb9YyS&fid=0x0:0xd4975d1f5fca976c"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Aju Mathews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIi9GLIdvi20o3TwkqiAWh86xVNaAGfM3JUGO77WLmBtBA3JWI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the Chicken and Beef biriyani from Abu's Kitchen and it was fantastic! The rice was perfectly cooked—fluffy and fragrant—and the spices were spot on.The chicken and beef was tender and packed with taste, and you could really appreciate the traditional blend of spices in every bite. I highly recommend it to anyone who enjoys biriyani or wants to explore Kerala cuisine.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simran Fredy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2SxU3jF_gDPiAEJH3SF0sAWjqfPHpstUnejOhqcE_ruAbIGdl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently subscribed to a one-month plan from Abu’s Kitchen, and after using their service, I can say they deliver on their promises! Every delivery was perfectly packaged and arrived in excellent condition. They even sent a message with details about each dish, including numbering, which made it incredibly easy to allocate meals for different days.

The quality of the food was outstanding. While I’m typically more of a non-vegetarian fan, their vegetarian curries were so delicious that I found myself eagerly looking forward to them.

Overall, I had an amazing experience with Abu’s Kitchen. It’s a hassle-free option for anyone in need of a reliable meal service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rajinder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOckAJ04tRtFKHCC7Wu9_dV_EWsxNpkSsgtDBT66vt_xV1SA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The biryani from Abu's Kitchen is hands down the best I’ve ever had! We ordered Egg Biryani. The flavors were absolutely incredible—each bite packed with rich, authentic spices that make you feel like you’re enjoying a meal back in Kerala. The portion size is generous, and the quality is top-notch.

If I had one tiny suggestion, it’d be to add a bit more raita to complement the dish. But honestly, the biryani itself more than makes up for it. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be ordering again!

TL;DR: Best biryani ever. Don’t hesitate—order it now!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rizwan Rasheed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIP8_0L1bc6N9mFbJFmFUVmPL14_YlATtYSeZJmuXZtGshGmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried their chicken biryani and fry, which was absolutely delicious. It reminded me of the authentic Kerala cuisine I enjoyed back home. I have taken their tiffin service, where they provide delicious, home-cooked meals at very economical rates. It's perfect for busy people who want fresh, healthy food without worrying about cooking.  Highly recommended to anyone looking for convenient, budget-friendly meals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"fathima chekintakath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiJ88eSMouTq3FzvnFaOSuiUSb8Ug4fzEp-7patC3oHlxgU5Fi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered whole chicken potion of tandoori chicken yesterday. I Don’t think any chef in the lower mainland can make tandoori chicken, more authentic, and more tastier than this. If any of you haven’t tried this, you’re at loss that’s all I can say. Highly recommended. Looking forward to try other items on the menu as well next time. Keep up the good work.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"lion8584","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7TY6tA9D5L4oIlUJD4IxZ2fz7QaaZi8ptijAViSQG81uRbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a Thai place close to the hotel we were staying at in Langley, and we came across Naka Bistro and decided to try it out. There is ample parking, and the location of the restaurant was not in a busy area. The ambiance is classy and quiet, with authentic decoration to Thailand and Laos. The staff were friendly, attentive, and helpful. Now, the food. The food was very delicious! Great portion sizes and priced in the mid-range area. If we lived in the area, I'd definitely return. Would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY1Ufbeq6Piy4Fb3juH_bpv_jWaFf7k1lNWLie\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time - great experience.  Pad Thai, chicken Cashew and Spring Rolls all were great.  Service was quick, food was hot, no complaints.  Parking lot is a bit awkward, but lots of spots.  Delivery is next on the list!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS7el4rUK1WxuPjovejHpnxbON0q8ESHtamXmQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Shahrukh Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITgqgO0djSb_HSRBnLIwds0Zd-4BnA3WDUtW2lud3kYZBNaXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend! Food tastes great, and portion size is generous. Good service, nice ambiance, and the metal soup spoons are reminiscent of the food stalls in Thailand.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9tVpa3ps_Z7tztj3O4DTNzvb3qv8xS6d1524\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Kamil Chocimski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiqh1VSZRODqN-Djl6vCyrZVFOC1F520DSa-G8lhjPI6NkKSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Thai place in town. Fresh shrimp paradise was delicious, their curry is full of goodies and Pineapple chicken rice was divine. Gotta try fried banana Icecream for desert. Such a wonderful atmosphere, and great service! My first 5/5 place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOfB4cGE5N1d2SOotqgx8Nf9b0vw212UE_9bQp\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"What did Dada buy Today!","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7GTyMhR08A6awgaZC75A11vjN-sR6OzhegVertGwB80jthNLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and quick service. Food was delicious and excellent. We will definitely be back to enjoy more items off the menu. We ordered Chicken Satay, Tom Yum Goong and Pad Thai.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZmLqLcKg2ED98cIIfivtBuv4P6MuwACtjsQx4\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Kaily C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc3zGqSWfPVpFaA2IwnqPG6a7FfO86mHdvH_UHjMqk15C2TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time to try Laos dishes, surprised us. Even though that is little spice for us, but taste good, especially for the drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRPctHkruO2Yshz6MoY8DhovLHyGSvWK20jbUE\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"604 Eats","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKydooBZGXt2w5Pplqp4pqyT8VrJYMUXmY8f1v2W9oYs1nCEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"2nd review:  the flavours are all there - rich and robust. Portions are still on the smaller side, but presentation is nice and food is decent.  Ambience and service is great.  Although I wouldn't come here often, I would come here once in awhile since it's the only Lao restaurant in the lower mainland.\n\n1st review: The flavours are alright.  The portion is smaller and doesn't justify the price.  The ambience is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7kFWtW1ydOnHQNPKnTN1Vb_fvdMxZp6PmPj6v\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The taste is good, the service is excellent, the environment is clean, the Tom Yum soup is delicious, but the Pad Thai noodles are a bit hard. Price is reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWjG80fHMX4xXxGdSqM1EORsiol0mO4RsCTu0B\u0026fid=0x0:0xa61af3407795f607"],"When":"2024-6-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amanda Pack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5OFRosWldEFLKsJNzuvdaysvmYk8HBI93ZnGL4Vo3yCa1lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was great 😊🤗 everyone was super pleasant and friendly 😁 Hanna and Lisa were fabulous 🤗
The zucchini sticks were fantastic!
The portions were very filling! Good value for your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcnaiEpGQg1BjZ9vuoSm0Nt0iUuZ8lEtaGn5cR&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Huang Recca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDF647f8wTC9xYKRRSNQV8CPkQJrc1Y81nFNPZerRiknh_jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was decent. Service was great. Our family enjoyed the food here. Fries seems to have stayed in the fryer for a little longer than expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkOJ4PsGsp71bbcmm7nPr9MiO-iuMXdVvjyEf6&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Beatrix Cendana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrgEz8zi1JhWvuye6FwpWxBtelZ_X_lIGR9nTlf8HQ6_8C9mu0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good! We ordered seafood platter (tiger prawns with shrimp and fries) and rib eye steak.

I love the fries. For seafood, it was okay, not the best. But the steak was sooo juicyyy! Cheese bread is recommended as an appetizer.

The service was exceptional! This is the best steak restaurant thar I ever went to that is affordable with best service ever! I will definitely come back when visit Langley area again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR2pBgjPKYoqQjRmuETrOHYeh1n8XcRmFwQSQX&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Edward Stirling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn_anUrf8wXWCL0BThp-c_RZvARspPqKQikQmLrdt8iVc1bMmx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent steaks.  Excellent lobster tails.  Excellent value.  The restaurant is not impressive looking.   The service and food are great.  Generous portions and competitive prices.   Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN22Nm4U6toTDtmweMg_at595UbwyX7wsUkYBCQ&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is delicious! Ordered seafood and steak with baked potato and rice. Everything was high quality and actually very impressive in comparison to the price. The prawns were a little dry and the rice was a little flavourless, but in exchange the baked potato was phenomenal, they let you load it with as much bacon, sour cream and chives that you like. Steak was cooked perfect to the wellness requested. Flavours, quality and texture were very good. Their chicken soup was also surprisingly delicious. Dessert was nothing special. Service was timely and friendly. This place is above expectations for the price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-tg4_9_m_JzCGSM5P_EAOwKYRpbXoXHtQ6Ztb&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"CROW","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX35ZOmUx0U-Hu7ZIfEi2KA7Rrf-o_FWKZ_YUgAE-RENSTtH3i2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for years and as always the food and service was incredible! My partner and I enjoyed our time and meal here
Thank you for a memorable evening","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwWnaKj4DHCVZjgoLfwjI3-nTdsiiEf1dARdgS&fid=0x0:0x43462f5485523ab6"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Britt Owen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkZAoDOfQL5iO7GSqFH948ODd92l0avDiyKBQUYufV-0XVCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for dinner last night as the restaurant was right across the street from an outdoor play my friends and I were attending. Our server was a delight, her enthusiasm genuine. Irina is a gem!   Big menu, lots of options, including seniors and kids choices too. We all loved our food, steaks, prawns, chicken all cooked perfectly. Excellent value and generous portions, quick and attentive service. We will be back. Give this place a try, you will be glad you did!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travis Curtis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoVvOhgn0KHOqrrG3gY0wJp9xLtjdejQQ8KUgoJeZ1CglZ_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't say enough good things about this restaurant. My family and I have been coming here for the last few years and it's always been fantastic. I was just there tonight for a birthday party, and the service was on point despite there being 11 of us alongside 2 other big groups. Food was delicious and I guarantee you that all of us will be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Debbie Tuit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl1QRhiGTE0pawpm2Mt3BIssODHhrthbrxd62Ea1dwXPs0h0E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had such a wonderful dining experience today at the Match Eatery in Langley.   Maddy, was an exceptional server.  Sweet.  And friendly.  The food was really really good today.  1/2 price wine during happy hour was bonus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcre6yNEiuAoVX_vcWF_akOt1CvJGcVpwDllhp&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Kara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2RJAU9Ey6KrgoN0yjXNLbzTVWt--atIW-NoVOtJPdfkEZYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried out some new game day wings tonight after a great recommendation from our server Brie and we were pleasantly surprised. The Nashville wings were good but the Rising Sun wings were the real standout! Service was quick and friendly, the drinks were cold and the food was delish - all in all a great night. Thanks Brie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR8SeHHnnoV0t4g6s15gBuu_oIBVQJhA-GzfxW&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to eat. Bottomless drinks. Went during happy hour and didn't disappoint. We ordered fries, nachos, tacos and burger sliders. We had a great person catering our needs. Friendly staff and I love the individual bathroom. We would definitely eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI6jCh97dC7REXYWWHE0yXR8kdZHJTyYBOxORF&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2021-9-9"},{"Name":"Daniel Schmitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLOzsYV6DBSAoeEyNct7Y3fw_y_lnOMmh5h-We9se2jMTj7MkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff was friendly and the food is great I recommend the baby back ribs and the blackjack burger. And the barbecue chicken pizza 🍕.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8cG3UL4oS1sNwIruZ6o44C_Ce6vurst9XO-Wk&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Brady Yurik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICVVUH9sup9wD8SzLzSse2xCtFmsFEH57o9wufUhNDg3JlAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have come here to eat and have a few cocktails many times so I thought it was time to finally write a quick review . The food is always consistently great, everyone is very friendly and accommodating. Also has the best bathrooms I’ve seen in a restaurant. Aryz was my server today and  we never had to wait for anything. I’ve had him a few times before and I can’t say enough good things . Drink never got empty and always checks in to see if you need anything .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eternal Senshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTRrG77sAyC2Zc9gMBDh6QXUjLx_NMhahkW8Uy7mBoHFH37GK7PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like to come here often because the food is very decently priced and the service is always friendly. They have several various events that go on during game days and such.

Our server this time around was a gem named Aryz and he was a blast. He was absolutely courteous, friendly, and caring. He made our experience so much better than the usual great service.

I highly recommend coming here and sitting in the outdoor heated area. It can be a more quiet and intimate experience. And if Aryz is around, say hello to him!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Howie Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD4mFYNLrhmouUG8HDSxtKZr3rHrib8bLXPruDpfwlU6cD46WXcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service and amazing food. I went there during super bowl and I have to say, the manager, the servers, the hostess went above and beyond. The food tasted fresh and was really well made. Definitely check out this location - it is both spacious and definitely meet the vibe check!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNksDQ7_56QixhKP6KlCQMkX-TpzFXUBugkQ6P3&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"Jess Yarko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBC-DIRtE4Qc09jaYl-RH_WQcAMSfXlzG2Mzv4NWqBxFr63DB-tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here late night Saturday for a birthday treat. Waited about 1 hour for a table which was a little disheartening so went into the Casino to pass time. The dining area was super busy and loud. The food was absolutely delicious only issue was that I wanted my steak a bit more well done. Our server was nice and food was served roughly 25minutes after we ordered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1L4KYx1_hY_Vlw1_N20gTDYVHS4TUeCmcZ1Yc&fid=0x0:0xf1a600718ca0db9"],"When":"2019-4-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu2o94-TOfl6ea6WGk9y16UA_lYHgTBLK8OvnBHjJMDWaWjyJ_KA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious donuts and the Christmas donuts are so pretty! The drinks tasted so amazing.  The strawberry latte was my favorite 🤩🤩 The sandwich was filling and so good👍👍 Decent amount of veggies and meat! The interior is so authentic and welcoming. The employees were very nice and my drinks came out fairly quickly! Always a nice place to visit highly recommend 🤩🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM79NmazTRD6JHg-mWeolQrKbkKrz--MqH-kcPM&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2023-12-23"},{"Name":"James Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRy4tt5VGGL0iK_-djJIfjHplnD1UIaulpbY7EHrDW7VA0yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoy my coffee time visiting small local coffee shops rather than large coffee franchises, and I happened to visit Craving Cafe in Langley. First of all, the owners here are so nice and the smiles on their faces are always welcoming! The feeling of starting the day in a good mood! The muffins and fresh Americano made here are very delicious. I will definitely come back again for the delicious muffins and kindness.  The muffins I bought disappeared from my house within a day. Who is the culprit?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkMx22awCavRH2pc9J4_iJfe-0RXn542rG3ga7&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"GAYOUNG YIM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOxjwg2ECu_HdnyP6F4Go8-QV5A7Mgkj299r36xfLo6f_cBcGNwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is truly amazing.  The staff are honest and faithful.  The store is clean and the desserts are absolutely delicious.  Don't be disappointed if you arrive a little late and there are only a few donuts left on the shelves.  Even they are extremely yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDBE_ETgakNfoBuykFx86WggiZ6QzIK13PeU2H&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Ifra Kanwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmiUZg-RsxkK3Mc9a0s0Mq3C6T2gv50hGlaDf75E7WozdTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I can't believe this! I’ve been coming to this coffee shop every single day, spending my money on their drinks. But the one day I didn’t buy anything and just sat at a table waiting, I got kicked out! The place was practically empty, with only one other customer there. The owner had the audacity to treat me like this. It’s unbelievably rude and disrespectful!

In response to Cravings:
Here is evidence of one of the drinks I have bought from here just yesterday.
Also can you please explain what kind of calculations are being done here? Sitting in your cafe for less than 1 hour has suddenly become hours? If I hadn't ordered ONE day and was waiting in an EMPTY cafe with one other customer, that means it is okay to ask me to leave?

This is the kind of service provided here at this cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPwlOAljF-oV-RQwglKdPV5OkX-eiiakDhDjtc&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Megan Goss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM_CNHtIyteUQ7SdZF6o8XoyQQWhhJ4EgAxGNurEXxoPk1eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cravings in Brookswood is an absolute gem! Their coffee is out of this world—so smooth and flavorful, it’s the perfect start to my day every time. The service? Beyond amazing! The staff are always so friendly and make you feel right at home.

And don’t even get me started on the muffins… they are to die for! My personal favorite is the Sunrise Muffin—it’s like a little piece of heaven in every bite. Honestly, I can’t get enough of it!

If you haven’t been to Cravings yet, do yourself a favor and go ASAP. You’ll fall in love just like I did! ☕️🧁","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjt2jYHxMFs-uneKvVEMMXCwJpYt8iRfW8gopLQadPD9JGqDkgvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute cafe! My new favorite cafe at Brookswood 😊 the deco is so cute, owners and staff are friendly, and their baking is soo good. Ordered the blueberry streudel, cream cheese raspberry muffin, and sugar cinnamon donut. All were really good, but blueberry streudel is probably my favorite. Would 100% go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcNRylFK9wF1c8U2dRIn4xhlMGGIwkXe-_fNYD&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"jason K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuZpGDNIETcsC2RoXQsY1-7xpBe0XzD-13qV_rzMSHVjFk4s0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the best muffin of my life! Cozy atmosphere, warm service, and delicious muffin. All I could do is wish it was near home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAw68fpVqpmTXJ-bWhew4drCxgJFQSipK4yg2k&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Cathy Lyu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4TUJxvrdvSzWg4zZZUNyR1RgYlU64Iaey52yFzs4dAqUqpxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute little cafe in town! Tried their muffins, donuts, and sandwiches, and they were all great. Can’t wait to come early next time and try their espresso muffin 😀
The owner and staffs were very friendly and their drinks were good too.

Highly recommended 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEkHKJe-g71KPoGNjl9JSj0r3HkCo2FDuyHuma&fid=0x0:0x58318b0cc87b21ad"],"When":"2023-5-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sunil Pandya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj4H3hBVSDRbMxJH4IQ4XkDJPYbePXu8wjpN2N-WX6oMBBsQU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After nearly 2.5 months in Burnaby, I visited Langley and had an amazing pizza day at Pizza Factory. The taste was superb (सुपर से भी ऊपर), and although the pizza seemed a bit red, it wasn't burnt at all. The corners were also chewy. Above all, the lady at the counter (Ms. Sumanji) was incredibly helpful in suggesting the best items on the menu. I will definitely visit Langley again just to repeat the treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLOfaAA7dhuqSldjaFFOp1Fj7VKPMglIpbKU32\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"0123456789 9876543210","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVorV37Vnl6ySspIDeQoOCD__b_vkHJ8UGPet0i2A2aEqZtm3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My pizza was not cooked fully. It was uncooked dough in the middle. I called them back and they said..... that's the way its supposed to be cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjXt73K5ZFUkFpAUaICgPBnhSXp_KDZM1yXPBX\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Sheri B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5Nxp_GpA887_fJhFcXVHU4pEU2Em2vI5T8t0HdMNQuM91MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I arrived to pick my taco pizza that was ordered with NO ONIONS AND ADDED CILANTRO  and both were screwed up. I hate raw onions and this pizza was packed with tons of raw onions. Then they ran out of sour cream and I had to add my own at home. My family all hate onions,except one. I should have taken it back but we were all hungry and just picked off all the onion. Not pleased that our order was completely screwed up and ruined the pizza. See photo for all the onions. Yuk","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTZw9pCx88wnpSnKyyFs4f3ZLJ19IgCGO9s4mJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDSR6ld7IIeERLlI2cy9T-6eurgFxQ1iIIK-0vZvIP-61-tW6tzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good pizza tonight. Havent been here in years. This could be my new spot. Lots of toppings and cheese. Great crust and sauce too. Tastes very home made. Fresh vegetables. Also if you pick up it looks like a dump adding to why I like it! Those are the best spots. Looked very busy also a good sign.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm8b0Urv0K7A8ALJB3pIGSYKtF0Dp2rkrazlrYO9QBhrfmQv3F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tonight my husband ordered me a large Popeyes pizza with extra toppings, pineapple, spinach, supposedly black olives, which I didn't receive. Any way something in the pizza was moldy. My husband didn't tell skip, because he already made his comment and it was too late. So then we ordered me something for dinner , from Maru and we didn't get it. They dropped it at another house. But totally disappointed! That my pizza tasted like mold.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vinit Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvOThjwY0PPbIXG7HP_JJd3g2CwbKkP_LHozt41E_UnWoHiF3IGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never had such Indian style tasty pizza in my whole life. Specially thank you to Suman for serving awesome pizza. All pizzas are tasty and yummy. 110% recommendations pizza. #bestpizzaintown","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBjFPmqfe9_n9XEEDDf98RakyK0GM4BYuY3NJM\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Colton Onushko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHH77kvG3Rp1Zxqh948nasH4zzjYJdxz8iblCbl4dJe-YzNqBRvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Whole place is the biggest eyesore in the area. It drives me nuts every time I drive past to see it get more and more run down. Outdoor signs are completely faded from the sun. “Lights” are dropping all over the place and the sign leds have been burnt out for like a year now. No idea why this place has to be in such a prime location when they can’t even upkeep their building. Makes the whole area look so ghetto.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvwTCG_l1nPdychfGNOMNF9oQguuwnEC4AZzeT\u0026fid=0x0:0x90e64c07d781b233"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Todd Poirier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW65m2nKDL8AeXIMarnNT1yj7Hvh0dVf9vkHJ8Pf9qk83B1ds2B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I started ordering from here lately and i feel that this is gonna be my go to place from now on.  Got some pizzas for my sons birthday.  Great price, great quality, super delish.  Lots of great deals and an awesome menu.  HIGHLY recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kenzie st.dennis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3IiK1JusZPNKOpAMznki3eR_elaK-RRfgSQNlRxvOGezdu57o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Perfect place for a basic, affordable breakfast on a rainy day. The place is packed full of artful creations and art work. The instant smell of fresh bread and aromatic coffee can not be topped, not to mention the sound of families and friends clearly enjoying themselves! I had the 13 dollar and change breakfast that was delicious. Unreal sourdough toast and delicious hashbrowns. Farmers sausage was cooked perfectly and my Sunnyside up eggs were just as I had hoped. My gf ordered the 12 dollar and change pancake breakfast and was equally as pleased with everything on her plate minus the pancakes. They were without a doubt edible but bland and tasted like mix. The peanut butter cookie bar/square we purchased to go was stale, crumbly and disappointing. Again, this will not stop us from enjoying this incredibly cute, quaint, homey, aromatic and "general store-esque" breakfast stop in the near future. Overall, the perfect spot to wait out the rain or kill a couple hours enjoying friends company over a delicious cup of coffee. Tons of art to ponder. Looking forward to re-visiting on a live music day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPndgnPUobgnaNNjPs69BZRWUmTw8q_T3hTaIIZ&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"ross macdonald (Ross Mac)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvcMjvlUrIgQB_oLS0TBidM3GLEXeoiOjyCahMLwtz3aukXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited twice in 2 days which says it all, both times were for breakfast.

Really lovely location, with a great setting and quaint decor. Would be nice for a meal of just for tea and cake.

The food was delicious, I had the PY breakfast (eggs your way, a choice of bacon, sausage or ham with hashbrowns and toast) which was delicious and the next day I had the omelette which was best omelette I've had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGTR6vJUlqxmRnzfupNaymrBnmXMFTLAM3aDuy&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Kim Rhindress","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGV1bXDBhXJzPDI9KSedz8MMWu5WbOPshbJnxk8ecoAvwrcRUU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A local gem. Super cute coffee shop with a Carb-free breakfast on the menu!! Good coffee, friendly service and great vibe!
Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX4Atg2mjbQKy6zjkLrgd1iwOiwzyoT9QG3eHt&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Val Phelps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt16bYFSmCYJrTtFnISGfVeuD0t6mGHLjEOBZjyodkTlcx-9xh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a unique, quaint spot in Murrayville.   It's like stepping back in time.   Lunches looked amazing. We had tea and home made pastries.  The coconut macaroons are definitely a reason to return.  Moist and delicious.  The blueberry scone did not skimp on fruit and the cinnamon knot was very flavorful.   Tea served in teapots.   Staff were friendly and helpful.  The eating area had small, intimate tables with tablecloths. Small store with reasonable prices.  We'll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oscar Laurence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBdUpeJOcC_qCBmJysUpjZuf1KgWh_HXgcwVKcIl-fMPyhh5EcHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Porter's is a wonderful bistro. The servers have always been kind and hospitable, the coffee and drinks are better than I've had at any other café, and I've enjoyed using this space to study. The food choices are a bit limited, but I've enjoyed all my meals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kimcraigj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ9dXRSheU8ynhpv9Q7H122MpMVn7N-YTIKcXLLSSreZuzX4vE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed two very delicious breakfasts and lattes.
Kim's came with farmers sausage and mine with breakfast sausage.
Both were great examples of their respective kinds.
The eggs were well executed and the sour dough toast was great for dipping.
Mine came with fluffy, delicious pancakes. The addition of the warmed syrup took it over the top.
It's a busy little place, so there's a bit of a wait for your food...but it just gave us time to enjoy our lattes and chat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Valerie Sikkema","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjq-n0sEJkeYgvz-lwfDGG087oh9JMDL4qckJm3pP5muoEWc1j2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the cauliflower cheese soup, it was ok but not hot enough and too much thyme. The chai latte and cheese scone were very good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK8gyHkbtCJrbhtvHYdwz_GaeuZU-qqOsVaJ8U0AKETZNxZWY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this little place! They make fabulous coffees and tasty foods (lunches, snacks, desserts) they have live shows on Saturday nights with reserved seating and a dinner served (not sure if they still do that during covid) I’ve also bought some fun kitchenware and gorgeous art during my coffee visits there. Below are some items I’ve bought.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsSf_0yJuWzfLa4UYROyiR9QQlJF9ranGhfNOo&fid=0x0:0x51c26082325204"],"When":"2021-1-30"}]

title: Ashoka indian cuisine
descriptions: Casual, brick-clad eatery for Indian eats such as   tandoori dishes & biryani in low-key environs.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAFq69iTIcaZDekD27us44d8ngDu8WdKsqDyyYnNu7GaC-OA8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here for lunch and ordered Combo A. The samosas were so bad, I wish I had taken a picture. You can tell their from a frozen box. Secondly, the “complementary” rice was days old… tasteless, bland with no life to it. We told the waitress and she took it away. She was very apologetic, but we did pay for it. Butter chicken and naan tasted mediocre felt like it came from a food court. I don’t understand how this place is highly rated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp3jt01fmIve15EBt_BEBHTZi5q-B7aDV8R5Cd&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Kaveesh Kukreja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyGM5Wur1OIcPaIKHk8y8hADl72LlmzqOApRwMvp0cKEQAxid2PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not much to say so I'll stick to highlights.

Sev Puri is the only thing I would come back for.
Chole Batthure was Average, Lamb was Average and masala Pappad was ok(I'm a fan of fried Pappad) but this was roasted which I will say is atleast healthier and it came with no chutney.

Service was ok, we had to ask for plates and cutlery which is crazy.
Maybe I ordered the wrong things but yeah not worth another visit.
Prices are on the higher side!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt_FOqtpTbDfWTxxQUX7jRypx4mI9AGnvHzYyN&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Rajpreet Sondh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAk7ZbG_RZVGzOZ6pWcbFMXmqGN7O5Sh0c2FNyLITx2MVQDCI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never been a good experience. Some or the other way they would screw up the order. The last and my final order for Chicken Manchurian, where they left the chicken balls or the chicken in the Chicken Manchurian dish, their argument, we asked for gravy? Why would one order chicken Manchurian if they only wanted to have gravy? thus they assumed no chicken!! We open the container at home and are surprised to see this is what we’ve got! Major misunderstanding and post that ignorance on the whole issue from them has left me baffled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKivOVR2-awFoLTPAE8eFL3SLTsFyzp86d7zx0&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Tanya H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWEALA4eWsh5WLGY9qcuVFJdo_zm9Aj4UgrzkmZfg7H394SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I literally didn't even get as far as ordering. I went to order on Uber Eats, but the Ashoka page didn't indicate which items were vegan (I don't know why UE doesn't streamline this for all restaurants - some use "V" as vegetarian,  some use "V" as vegan, and some don't mention anything. Very frustrating!). So I called the restaurant directly to ask which, if any items are vegan friendly. She started rattling off chicken dishes! Huh?? I told her chicken is an animal and NOT vegan. She then said butter chicken, and again started rattling off more chicken dishes... again, I told her, neither CHICKEN or BUTTER are vegan. So incredibly unhelpful/uneducated, that I didn't trust even ordering! They lost a first time, and potentially ongoing customer, as I really do love Indian food. Please educate your staff on what the different food preferences & allergens are (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, etc.), and the dishes that correlate accordingly. Besides lifestyle or religious preferences, there are many people out there that may be allergic to something, and that can end very poorly, otherwise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurpreet Singh Gumber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuF3jN0JFgvBLB3WR4oJdPVDhgpPMUwV8NLcVhPj87ePZbWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Ashoka restaurant for the fourth time with my family today, and it was another fantastic experience. Our visit was elevated by the exceptional service provided by Sapneet, who went above and beyond to make our meal enjoyable. I also want to commend the dedicated kitchen staff for their excellent work. The entire team at Ashoka truly contributes to a memorable dining experience, and I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for delicious food and outstanding service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxsiRDAeubO1THPmrUHVDmT6bLEHIBTiZUl5YI&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2023-11-1"},{"Name":"Maya Tarin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfKEnpihwYljZjv4ZEkoGZwmySggwhnvvx-CrDh6prjpGabQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service! Our server was very nice. She explained very detailed about their food.
We visited here for lunch. They have a great lunch menu.
Everything was nice and clean.
They have 4 spicy levels; mild, medium, spicy and very spicy. We ordered medium chicken corma and spicy chicken vindaloo. I did not find big difference between medium and spicy. Spicy one was not too too spicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcJd3JAjJnmppazHIQHsjujx45JuI4X9byrmpM&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"Emma Bryce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkV2QE01SMTq5pWmdu7hEwuFK41S0j-1hMeveEqFezfjrBoDxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was good, a bit confused in regards to the garnish for the veggie samosas. Like 3 pieces of cabbage and a green pepper?!
Service however was slim to none. Waitress did not stop by to ask if we needed anything or see how the meal was and I had to go up to the counter when finished to ask for the bill and to go containers. I would go again for the food but if you’re looking for friendly service to pair I would suggest elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdBXy6gQJ1FsVwpGO_xKTOg0v2tlbs-FtoNzu0&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2022-12-29"},{"Name":"Atif Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ0jz1-8jq4lIhW-054jNy3keG7xjoLa3PjupI1zYKo2EE77MV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely perfect and delicious. cozy and nice place. We enjoyed the food and portions were perfect size the most amazing thing I noticed was the server was extremely polite , and caring and service was top notch. She treated some very old folks with so much patience and a little girl with absolute love and care so good job on exceptional customer service. 10/10 :) . Highly recommended and we tried pani puri:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7spDZr6jnVAvVafB7s6G1jBj3vdX0GawyCBRq&fid=0x0:0xcb6003f47d7fe769"],"When":"2023-4-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Subhayan basu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnLyySy-rQxPX6Sjbzk3vpNgTOnl2C_4KL2lIqJYptz36OlPcE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Indian Affair in Langley is a fantastic spot for delicious Indian food! We’ve been there many times, and the food never disappoints. We especially love their fish appetizers and Chinese-inspired dishes, but honestly, everything on the menu is excellent. It’s always a pleasure dining here, and we look forward to our next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS4ISIte2Io5AookIC6zK5am2aOOaUMYX2y6Se&fid=0x0:0xf75b4c8b71142b08"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Krishna Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGRmgKAGpkAtep13utwTt7HZyMNKL-yJwJ8Bkh-cpuV9v2aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone who relies on dining out regularly, I’ve been visiting this restaurant for quite a while now, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations every time. The food is consistently delicious, with a variety of options that are always fresh and full of flavor. Whether it’s a quick meal or a relaxing dinner, the quality remains top-notch.

The service is truly exceptional. The staff are not only kind and welcoming, but they also go out of their way to make sure you’re comfortable and satisfied. They remember regular customers, and it feels like they genuinely care about the experience you have here. It’s rare to find such a perfect combination of excellent food and warm hospitality.

The atmosphere is also worth mentioning. It creates a space where you can enjoy your meal, whether dining solo or with friends. I always feel at home when I’m here, and that makes a big difference in my dining experience.

Overall, I can’t recommend this restaurant enough. For anyone looking for great food, attentive service, and a pleasant atmosphere, this is the place to go!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Brubacher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWK_-z7Kyek9EuwiZwdazq2GiWfgjeGcZOK-GAhYrvTM_Qw68=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I can’t believe I’ve been missing out on this place for four years! Absolutely delicious, piping hot food, and a huge selection. Very kind and friendly staff. I will most definitely be returning. Thanks for such a terrific night. 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXXICdR45NsSqH5V4Dz_neptHPrxLdTUz2J8vc&fid=0x0:0xf75b4c8b71142b08"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Sukhman Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDD5CcG8BJk0EzP7hucdayezhJe78hAeQ4OIifYg0_ykCWVmJE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food at Indian Accent Restaurant was exceptional. Each dish was expertly prepared and bursting with flavor. The veg thali stood out with its perfect balance of ingredients and it was beautifully presented and rich in taste. Every bite was a
delight, showcasing the chef's skill and attention to detail. Overall a fantastic culinary experience.  I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for memorable meal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Himanshu Saluja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7hVP-OeANIC8_jnd7lDPK4HdFj6nMzeaU3Mant4xps1VG-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently used Indian Accent Catering for an event and was impressed by their exceptional service, delicious food, and great value. They were professional and responsive, ensuring all our needs were met and everything ran smoothly on the day. We opted for a mix of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, and each item was flavorful, earning rave reviews from our guests. The food arrived on time, which made a significant difference, and their pricing was very reasonable given the quality of food and service provided. I highly recommend Indian Accent for any event; they truly stand out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Khushi Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0Czz3P-_COsL2Ukn7U3Fc77AcHVSK5ZklomutefPpKWzG5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love INDIAN ACCENT  We travel all the way from Surrey on weekends just to enjoy their amazing food. The flavors are authentic, and everything is delicious—from the rich curries to the tasty tandoori. The staff is friendly, and the atmosphere is cozy. It's definitely worth the trip! Highly recommend it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley De Souza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3vmlhSBryxSDo5YXWJX8QizJTIQ3W-ipnOaMkvREIgpkSd-v_0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wish I tried this place sooner! Very tasty, Sauce is perfect, very flavourful, great price and portions. I wasn’t sure what to expect as friends told me to try but I was hesitant as I’m picky with my butter chicken (I normally drive to diamond sweets & Indian accents is infront of my house)

I was pleasantly surprised from the moment I walked in - smelt fruity & was VERY clean, great service.

Here’s a photo of my half eaten meal the second day. I am very excited to come back again and have this place so close","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5vHzSRu0ZlGFdInAs798s2WAYXRVfLoNwsP0S&fid=0x0:0xf75b4c8b71142b08"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Rupinder Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgBeD8PVjqSl6XmDYjvCBelHwO7SqwvQbYi3PIc8J1hKjU_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came today for takeout around 6-7pm I ordered shahi panner combo the food was scrumptious and finger licking and if I talk about atmosphere that is also best . I recommend this to everyone to enjoy the best food. The one thing I suggest you have  to improve is that you should change your front desk staff . She didn't welcomed and just asked me what's Ur order and then she gave me a machine to pay the bill. She is too rude and she didn't have that qualities which a. Staff should have. Thank you.... Others rest things were best","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service was okay… nice people.
I think our experience was a 3 but this place could get to a 4 on another day. We had margarita pizza and the Juliet pizza. Both were good and the dough had a great crunch. The best part was the crispness of the crust. I think maybe just needs more flavour
Also atmosphere is nice and spacious, not too many people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJI1hyHJQ-W8dMhBH4o7b_6WxXDot7tGjkY26H&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Suneesha Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwxbIwT5IzXjj2ZfjAGFJU3Ji8UBgaH_jGWWsxdMkV-kDpSkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been there twice. Both times were pretty good. The first time was better. This time, the girl waiting on our table was a bit slow, but the food was amazing. Kids had a lot of fun","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLzJVAonKE9iOx4qfjxbYV3a_x6vGdqO6-rIRY&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Michelle Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2FVGSlFFnT4DTUmJ1_d9RmQclA7X9RJV9xRw03otVVcjs9uJP8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had not been there for many years for I remembered the pizza tasting like cardboard and tasteless. We had a rehearsal dinner for our niece's wedding party and family with no expectations .   We had some appies and Caesar salad, and  several pizzas.   It was good overall.  The taste of the pizza sure has improved.  I liked the smoked salmon one the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olga Konstantinova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH6KLgE1n1y3NPHXNNaUiczCbhF9S84Y385nZyTNmru5sT2Gk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to that location for the first time today. Staff were just amazing! So friendly and courteous and very attentive. My friend and I had a classic simple pizza and honestly this was the best pizza I've had in years! Can't believe it took me so long to give this place a try. I don't know what their secret is but the crust is thin and crispy, lots of cheese, and delicious sauce with basil. Yumm! Definitely coming back. We felt very cared for and welcomed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6-KMw0P9pLdadDaXXdIupuy-a2gxL42t1TPJHI7r89HYZt3_3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here based off the Google reviews and wasn’t disappointed. Thin crust pizza acts as a great carrier for perfectly toasted toppings. Lots of options on the menu for both the meat lovers and vegetarians. Perfect place for families and friends, would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq8x2OUuoVaOsz7mjbsZ90KBPKZwZeqYom0v0w&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-4-2"},{"Name":"Dan Clunn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYf-u9opSoLeYYWWfM7aycSDzLyoSLymzFJjabdbUFJ9EQZIpLWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For years, my friends have been telling me to check this place out and I finally did!

Went on a Wednesday night. It was quiet but had a great atmosphere.

Had the pesto chicken pizza and it was delicious! Very filling and had some left over to take home.

Server (sorry can't remember the name but she had a septum piercing!) was attentive and very friendly.

Overall, great experience, and I'll be back again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBnwLPPHa--plinacaNc8JPnR8JqzEgvGZfYNF&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-9-21"},{"Name":"Manie Randhawa (Manie)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4I6oHsIGvirVrYsWWRSF7sua7bht2B5PgwM4Up3ev0g3EE_oW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would always wonder that how could an American pizza parlour sustain in Canadian market for such a long time ?? N I got my answer on my last visit to this amazing diner aka pizza parlour
I leave the task of digging into this place history to you guys and I am going to stick to my review of the place- So , the interiors and seating is very old style classic look. But the food is mind blowing. I mean the variety of pizza choices are mind boggling then there is garlic bread, nachos and wings along with sandwich and panini choice. Good amount of salad comes as a side and our vegetarian cheese panini was so soft and delicious. The bread is fresh prepared in the restaurant every day. Similarly pizza had the most thinnest and softest crust I had and that too made out of wheat.. so yummy but little bit expensive then the regular pizza place as it’s unique and freshly prepared. I m going again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObCBzKSzCRvEhFxlyxVVcTFiJvqnZW2zLViNez&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-1-23"},{"Name":"Noel de Villa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMDdEnO33EyYYYeZo_2ZfVwQtS-GcfpJ-ETGfvUvuXf7dIX24x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza in Surrey! Nice big place and attentive, friendly service. Red truck lager was refreshing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmnMDTglwHnaYgDV9KCYyQMzjWr1EZBQKhdu0&fid=0x0:0xe9ca684b5a900ad7"],"When":"2023-10-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmJKDr7DJ4CGvY4IhEGbbWGqO-ap4CiO1rDd-9zbUBZo3Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never disappoints! Always toasty and perfect amount of pate! They are not stingy on the toppings at all. They even give extra when you ask! All the drinks are delicious! Spring rolls are nice and crispy! Love this place. Quality is great every time whether I dine in or take out and even delivery has been good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYiLQll8QNhLoK9SUQ9YydWXVxHJ59Rm_vy7R1&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Trang Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgJ9pqHZKACEpFTPpbY5g0WbGIRIjuGIv5wyzXvbiO-BL2kLhi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this store during my Vancouver trip with my family. It came highly recommended by my local Viet friends, and it was totally worth it! Our beef sandwiches were phenomenal, authentic and packed with just the right amount of fillings. The side dishes were great too, especially the nem fries, such an amazing "invention" lol - a must-try in my opinion. I really wish they would open a store in Calgary so I wouldn’t have to drive so far for such delicious banh mi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9ONOWGlkHYLcfV3kohEgoaanBelptMfis5PZO&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Kerry Skea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3rkvFmzgaZUqrvXw6i_8zwZIHZDPQLv49eGSyUx9EQxyR2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have not been to this location for a few months but decided to go for lunch today. This used to be a great little spot to visit. Today it was awful. First off instead of taking our order the guy answered the phone and took an online order first.  After that he took our order. Then we waited 15 minutes for 2 sandwiches. There was no one else in the store!   Not sure if they have new management or just being cheap. Sandwiches were good but very small bun and very very little filling. A few pieces of chicken, and very little veggies.  Unfortunately we will not be back. So very disappointing ! A big waste of money. There are better places on the one way to grab lunch, don’t waste your money here

As per your response I think it’s a shame you are trying to justify that putting a few pieces of meat in a bun is okay. People don’t like wasting their money and what you are  saying is that we should have ordered 2 sandwiches each instead ? So spend double? A few months ago under the old management a sandwich at your restaurant was just that… a sandwich. It was enjoyable and had adequate filling, not a few stray pieces of meat and a couple of veggies. If anything please don’t try justifying this situation. Do better. If you want customers to return, give them something to return for!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT_gTcup8i_pjjBUElnomYqymRO2PLfH-pfr7M&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Gabrielle Kam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA9F1m8fcxvueG5mi1tMn86OcddGWaEg4oLcbjAGkv5ZLY7tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff, clean washrooms and the food was delicious. Sandwich was juicy and flavourful! Best spring rolls and the match drinks is amazing! Will come back here if I crave a sandwhich! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcuTxvqaAOYWj6MzQ5rtACDEQWlMgzoCwOTC_h&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Chin Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJt4yy2SkMpXfOMXIK8gVp0x-fSFni6zAZRloaNkFwAzccmaWu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to place for authentic crispy Vietnamese sandwiches FR!!! Visited the restaurant and it was a lovely banh mi shop with solid quality. The staff were friendly and polite, so you wouldn't have to worry about asking them if you’re new to banh mi and you could get your banh mi customized easily. Perfect place to grab lunch and a quick catch-up with your loved ones. I recommend the Taro Slush for those with a sweet tooth out there bc it’s just PERF. Well, these babies were from my takeaway to avoid my midnight craving. Will def be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj-Xf1IrYBDUyxujzdDqsx-qEFmGqNXOGzqWo2&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"hanna nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3WZRh6i47IMn1uiXuwuj7vxts-zp2mFtE78gFlBKGs0kidA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bánh mì spot is amazing! The bread is perfectly crispy outside and soft inside, with fresh, flavorful fillings and just the right balance of tangy, savory, and spicy. Their Vietnamese coffee and sugarcane juice are top-notch too. Great portions, fair prices, and a cozy atmosphere—5 stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPETbR9uyA7Fw-3VRj2_D2S3YHIzM37wpcn3ezl&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Michele F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDMx6n46qma1M05HLf0Rh8d1WOUD3NEo22c4UT5GhAHxY6Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying Obanhmi, and had high hopes based on reviews. Unfortunately, it did not meet our expectations.

Parking at the Langley location can be a bit of a challenge, but we know the area so that was expected. The restaurant itself is simply furnished, with nothing special to make it stand out.

We placed a takeout order online, saved 5% (no problems applying the code at checkout), and the order was ready at the indicated time. Service was friendly.

We ordered pork spring rolls, pork salad rolls, and the following sandwiches: lemongrass chicken, honey garlic chicken and sate beef.

The spring rolls were delicious! Crispy and not overly greasy.
The salad rolls were nothing special. Even the dipping sauce was not very flavourful.

We ordered all sandwiches with extra pickled veggies, no cilantro.
The bread was nice and crusty, but not as special as some of the reviews make it out to be. Unfortunately, the bread to filling ratio was way off.
Filling was sparse, including the pickled veggies, which we'd ordered extra of (would hate to see what it's like without the extra).
To top it off, one sandwich had full cilantro, and another had obviously had the cilantro picked back off, since there were still some leftovers. In this regard the sparse filling was helpful, as I could quickly pick it all off without anyone else seeing (and getting ideas in their head that they could still taste it...). Honey garlic chicken was quite tasty, sate beef was okay with just a tiny little bit of spice, and the lemongrass chicken was rather bland and full of gristle.

Pictures are of the honey garlic chicken and sate beef (1/2 sandwich shown; full sandwich size is about 10").","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQiywV8J_89aLLCVDPF9RAbuwR1Ba_5FcjYjTO&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Your Dad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsCraod052SzzpZMGY6lo4iWb9TrGcmdDrZnPN4UP7KVLJzFAp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh is the best adjective to describe this restaurant. In fact, it was so fresh that the jalapeno that I removed with my grubby hands gave me a fresh punch in the face when I accidentally rubbed my left eye. Might I say, that was the most painful experience I went through that day. Who's fault was it? Definitely not the restaurant or the jalapenos, only mine. I washed my eye 5 times before I was able to see again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFErh9CpYhLVjVPxHFiZc1rv4T8dA0cbMf_axW&fid=0x0:0x8604466a1d06f9d9"],"When":"2024-7-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tamara Barillaro (TamB619)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlEHZ4rs9QlMhGJd_Sp0_TQXexQI_Umgvb7b6nraCZLQ3cOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at the Hot & Toasty Cafe, the place is a cute and a bit out of the way as it's around the corner of all the shops along the main street were the parking is, my dad and I decided to have lunch there as he had eaten there before with friends.

Was happily surprised it's a cute cafe not very big but nice and spacious inside.

I ordered a matcha latte, a small cream of broccoli soup ( it comes with a bread bun) and a creamy shrimp crepe.

Loved everything I ordered the matcha latte was nice and warm not to sweet. The cream of broccoli soup was also very flavorful, but my favorite for sure was the Creamy Shrimp crepe it filled a whole plate the creamy sauce was delicious and the shrimp were medium prawn size were very yummy.

Dad had Earl Grey tea and a club Sandwich.
Which he greatly enjoyed as well.

Will definitely come back again and would recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice place with hearty savoury food or perhaps if wanting something for breakfast or lunch! 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG-UliXoMMJN9AP4xvF3N3gYNruf8GaETnam7v&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Rose G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvEHi00G2AzkQpToYhYZc_konbx2PTx2U0JWsCjrJO4pm6XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chicken sandwich was good but comes with nothing no fries no drinks.. order separate.  Very cold inside the restaurant. I got a little bone in my chicken but i didnt want to mention it as this is a local place. Beat luck to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcciLpFA7ftBzSTDJtkJYRJZ9b6GQ7bLZ-WCdL&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Emelyn Escobido","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXShaF-4CfqDIwiHgp6GLvqOIjErZkZveWLt-likxVp-osP2JLX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for breakfast in this cozy cafe. had the western omelette and the french toast. both were delicious, i devoured the potatoes. french toast with delectable. service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdwqxVsfTNs8eSovhiQRdvtE2f4BpMM12hxMcG&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Jack Peters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6tuotdk1_dATGiaaY-PEJ7e94vRmmulQ4gtBej1xawfyQQRAu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a casual, breakfast place and that's what we found. Great home cooked style breakfast with order at the counter and they'll bring our food to the table. I like this style and the food, the service was a "10". Clean comfortable family run restaurant and next time we have a hunger for good food, will definitely remember this toasty café.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNINFQewF9e0LP1tHQRYj8yy2QmG4aJ_MzMqIzp&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a hidden gem!!  Great food and enough choices anybody would find something they love on the menu.  They have great prices and a great environment!

We really enjoyed it and will definitely be back!!

Extra tip, there is more parking options closer to value village.  Best way to avoid dealing with parking on the one way section of Fraser Hwy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk0Sl4XlbtRgGFuaAsbJ0OwyAXSqLXKKEtGBFE&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Rajesh Thapar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-W5YbV-tquP8g0FytVLNeeQ1-zIZQosGq_0WkzJFia7FubG__=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic soup and sandwich shop! The sandwiches were fresh and delicious, and the soup was absolutely comforting. Friendly service and cozy atmosphere made for a perfect lunch spot. Will definitely be back!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2J2wcxHg0NTmwEML54gF2Yx0mweLPXQPaLzGP&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Rodrigo Flores-Recinos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaBWZJzy8cq9baG6OWaEhyUlGJSZXfWG7VfizL07VnMzFWYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the go to for a quality, delicious brunch experience. Although no other waffle or seafood chowder taste good now that I’ve had them here… no regrets. Love the owners and their food. Please visit with confidence","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0qT_m2vaYbQYUyWrd9SnEMhdiXPihXgWLKt2H&fid=0x0:0xfd3f985fb85ccb0f"],"When":"2022-3-27"},{"Name":"Andre Nasim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLtmab-DJHOweJLa0jTLG-9E5GYBkLE9jaDRzrlKmfqaMab6fU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great French toast and veggie omelete.  Even my picky wife enjoyed our breakfast here. Cozy hidden spot . Very old school and relaxing.  Friendly owners.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danielle Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAn7qBUq1NwIyiRNQmG_ZC3gUdAYZmX_iARhCDrycqI7aT7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stumbled upon this spot while thrift shopping and thought we'd give it a try, especially since it saved us a drive. The place has been newly renovated, but the ambiance feels a bit empty. Service was a little off—we weren’t greeted or given menus, which made me wonder if they’re more of a takeout spot. I felt like we might have been intruding, though the staff did share a few friendly smiles.

The prices are a huge draw! They have specials like $2-3 slices of pizza and a mango lassi for just $2.50. I ordered the Chana Bhature and Chat Papdi—both were delicious, well-seasoned, and the portions were perfect! I couldn’t even get a photo before diving in—I took a bite of the Chat, and my friend took a bite of her dish (a chickpea curry, I think), because we were so excited to try. 🤣 She also picked up a slice of pizza to snack on, which was ready to go but tasted pretty average, like festival pizza.

We tried the mango lassi, which was lighter and a bit tangy compared to others I’ve had. I enjoyed it, but my friend, who’s Indian, found it bitter and not quite to her taste. At $2.50, it’s still a great deal, so no complaints there!

Overall, I’d recommend this place for its great prices and tasty Indian dishes. A solid stop if you’re in the area and want some good eats on a budget!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVysvx9_wETLG8tdduhPP23pJifz6hCY8XmlHT&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"H.S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVawwjI3jTBIIuypRD-ffWOyIXBKBmow9aZMxBrnuyi0sbPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So glad I dropped by here to get some food on my way because its right next to the bus stop. The ladies at the front were all very friendly. My chicken birriyani came out delicious and had generous portions! The inside of the place is smaller but clean. Wanted to get some samosas as well but didn't have time to wait (takes 20mins to make).

Will definitely come back to try other items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdcthv1fNBATzppJW6waxAOyKRFP_dbB_VzplZ&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Sukhpreet Kaur Chahal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuNRKEUH-6e1tLOMRXP9yQD0Bbdrb7R0j0qARGYzV-EugEE3I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After my class, I always visit this restaurant with my friends ...and believe me guys...just love the samosa here.
Today we tried ...paneer panora....
It was soo yummmm💎🌸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJQa2zcgRRFDpwf4ej9Y8d2mWYmmnYQlDZThd_&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Ramesh K Yadav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUr5RlL_ZR_RqxN0l0ojgwIoTu9EaQy22NGhHVIFnlBZ47GCMd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service with very delicious food. Delicious Veggie thali.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpfAizz2RNGB8r9E-aNx8RhvacJoliUZdsf3Uv&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Yawer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVj-0msOT0dLoPmQKyWsee9UCHv27jZkm1HVKoctAWYRA-i_-sGFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great experience, it truly is a hidden gem.
I had no idea about it until I struck gold.

I have had their pizzas, samosas and chollay bhatore , and everything was as good as it was back home, bringing the homely taste here is no easy feat.

All the staff is so nice and always smiling, gives off a great vibe, loved the experience will definitely go there again.

Recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmMQzASyNP9pRSeqJGiCD5gqbczXtY8sBJnh29&fid=0x0:0xfe93e59823a4b076"],"When":"2022-10-16"},{"Name":"Melissa Vogt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTdUQKEouIZgWQ_bi9deV7V4kudPGmF20u8n34UEdDQql4IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the sweets and food here, i would get ladoo and samosas, very good prices. I used to come here regularly 2021 and 2022 on my way home from work via bus but then they closed no note on the door for when they would be opening again. Are they open again now? I would love to come by and start supporting this business regularly again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanya Zee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXP8WzKrR4HiHUmnx-EjY1haqbxw-lbtwBK6ZNRh4rNEi4SkU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They advertise their sweets but my daughter and I just tried the veggie samosas to go. They baked them fresh and we’re ready in 10 minites. Absolutely delicious and only $1.99 each!  It’s small, and has a some tables to eat in, too. The staff was so friendly, we will be back to try the main dishes soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqry0mt-JOKo4bZcT_ocPwp1TMRpQKg_YNnlVC9HGdY1rIvOCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't think of any other place in Downtown Langley that offers the best service at such a great price. This is the only restaurant I have seen where you don't have to wait for samosas. They usually make some quantity of samosas and you can pick instantly","Images":null,"When":""}]
