user_reviews: [{"Name":"Uday Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBuauSikHvtDIrQ4IuAiuDjA4upgMz0YY8-79QY2pPsnj9J7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Krishna provides exceptional service at Freshslice Pizza. He is always welcoming and friendly and ensures that every customer has a great experience. Whether it’s preparing fresh, delicious pizza or addressing customer needs promptly, Krishna handles everything with professionalism and a positive attitude. His attention to detail and dedication to quality make him stand out. I highly recommend visiting Freshslice and experiencing his outstanding service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adrian Wells","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZUC21qXqZzYsYAWcrBuWIoBeN56lUrK69WURJucenLo01x9v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered pizza and catering for my company from Freshslice's Langley location, and I couldn't be happier with the service! The pizza was delivered right on time and was perfectly made. The catering process was incredibly smooth, making it so easy to coordinate everything. The customer service at this location is top-notch—friendly, attentive, and professional. I would definitely recommend visiting the store and ordering pizza from them. They’ve definitely earned my future business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ICy3O0LQd7GRt586JTV_9w8m5LUOoTjNZTme\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Blessed Love Jamantoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiJkDfqK1tLHwmtym7NT7sodUjHvZSVRt9FJ_NqcdWkISaxfG4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"pizza is paper thin not thick slice compared to other franchisees. the front people are insisting on giving me stale pizza that was made 30minutes ago and says it’s fresh. fresh slice maple ridge is better and their customer service is way way better than this location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ2oh2joR1H15CqXb8o9PHQQi1id-GRRQvPjw0\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Pragun Gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAoMr4a6hxXRNj_r-xAf2cWke-P2xn2-J7VQmP6xCPs4NAAV6l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh slice over here serves amazing pizza. I am always there i guess once or twice a week and staff over there are friendly and quick with their services most importantly what I love the most is  the cleanliness. The pizza is delicious over here and i love butter chicken and BBQ chicken bacon pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCIE9NLiLcpadljLoEmfL4-4Rs9EVAwl_KW5-L\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"irshad Alam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBiceHD41WruRGOl0t2MOUIBPoRdfY8zh9XbILuuK-Rk-skw4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Another disappointment from this store. If you don't want to get sick then don't order here, I made mistake, but you should not, I wanted to order from other store, but excidently my order went to this store.   Dont offer free dip for getting fake 5 star rating, instead of that start giving better service and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2tqKrKgQhVs06Anrtj1lcg_PNNyl9A9My6wyL\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Raj MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHryKGh5-s-zGL3wjeIXVJiDpMy7hHL8226xPGSy_g4tzhDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The go to is the unlimited toppings medium at about $13 which is great value for money. The staff here are typically energetic and friendly as well, always serving with a smile. Every month they refresh their coupons too which is so useful when you're craving a quick bite. Food has consistently been really tasty and always hits the spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagraj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFOEZS-hIKNVMrra1orgpYaUWzUC5fgsi4_TtCPG1BTYZNxmiG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today I searched the fresh slices location then i got this location when I reached there it was very great experience for me. As compared to other locations i had a good experience in customer service. I liked the taste of pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUTWbnakjJd9UCGe9EVLtJZ0Z0fusnl8RNs_rV\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Ripan Rattu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY0TDhCqVYimIaczMbzhLxcNnzFWWQJ1MWqEVRBz6EKCL5rG0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today I went to fresh slice pizza store and it was amazing experience because my order was prepared as per my demand. Moreover, I also take some slices for dine in specially pepperoni and BBQ chicken bacon and it just mind blowing. I would highly recommend this calm friendly place to everyone. Again thank you to the staff…all are so friendly and co-operative. Lastly, I will visit that place again and again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqVLoRIMjipedmyamSIfSY7jc65trZrMkaI1MF\u0026fid=0x0:0x62aa27733aae52f3"],"When":"2024-6-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emilie Herbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa6gGO4bT4ElKcHiDo9r2yPxEVd5vEkF9aVJ5pj0jluZ2qhB2j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered 4 dishes for take out. Haven’t been to the coast in years and craving some good food.

Chicken Cow main, we couldn’t even eat as it tasted off. The sweet and sour sauce tasted like it was watered down.

Everything else was ok.
- chicken fried rice
- chicken balls
- sweet sour boneless pork

$60 and feeling pretty disappointed as we were looking forward to a good meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjnLNv5DlYOS_zcIR2KxTPIE1nKQCSxkBFlpXg&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2024-2-28"},{"Name":"Tannya Flinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXRpKnlHRGmbdmMiuObTTi5D1nWpb3BWxHmS803n6C5SpnFccT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Don’t order the sweet and sour chicken balls. They are bigger than an XL egg and all batter. The piece of chicken is maybe the size of a quarter. Rice was good and the chow mein  was mushy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPihrYzWygeRKBb8grZWA3B5dD362iJuhnwNHbD&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2023-3-26"},{"Name":"8T8","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaHAe29LTwj-kDB4Rxp2LPyCtNn-xUw5U4xwT2905ny-JNkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ingredients are fresh.  The food is completely alright, nothing exceptional but definitely meets standards.  If looking for a typical Chinese restaurant, this place will not disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgj2b8lSOAnLghSidbiUkVtAZaR7NIWAvomtAN&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Kyle VZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsBmQtD0NbHsbHXQgkoq4f4XKjpKhDnUyH5htVYUttnmo7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a $8.97 lunch time special pickup. Sweet sour pork, chow mein and mixed vegetables. Restaurant was clean. Seemed super old school and basic. Nice employees to help me. Food was pretty good. Chow mein uses thinner noodles with good flavour. Mixed veggies were crisp and good. Sour pork was lightly sauced in more of a brown sauce than usual red  sauce and very crispy outter shell. Good amount and heavy. Very nicely made and good to tryout for yourself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNro1lmmrF6z7Fzi2BwEOoKeYy7iZ8JFXeKFhJx&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2019-1-24"},{"Name":"Tom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrt_8M7WZPCBAKCP9i-fwwy5nLfGoky_j2w3jmAdKuSN6kaes=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No meat just fried shell in the wontons. Ridiculous and disrespectful. I’ve ordered here 3 times and the foods been good, but this is ridiculous. Was going to make this my regular for Chinese food, but not anymore if this is how they treat customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnzXnOQMI9o6PJEIvl0fjoxkzR_ScFJkx5ArWq&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2023-3-25"},{"Name":"R Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-jrBZr0L2Cohp23WTfYqu0s7jxp32ljcl18krkzsKHxnH3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A lovely family business and alway satisfies my cravings for Chinese food, the price is fair and the food is really good.  I've tried other Chinese restaurants in the area that cost a little more but didn't taste as good. Will definitely go back for again. Updated Aug 10, 2024 - dropped two stars because they've seem to be a victim of inflation. I understand higher prices to a pint but not smaller portions and lowering standards too. Hopefully things will go back as they were.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chad M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzyi9MjGLsk2OqEQpu5x3_hyL5AheIOqp-b_IYDFTXauiXjhbm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good Chinese food, had the $8.95 lunch special combo of chow mein, fried rice & sweet and sour pork. Was able to substitute the rice for chicken balls for only $2. Will definitely come back. The customer service was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHli_YFEyxbzzjwp5LVXw1FwGd4SEc9mXjrHeU&fid=0x0:0x4e1e2fbc496249ff"],"When":"2020-3-14"},{"Name":"Sandy Toews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQXDmkL3THG77kgX3p1Yea9Z0pycYW_ycHBM9iyOT7CjoDWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the combo meal for one, sweet and sour pork was mushy and and bland, almond chicken was terrible and the chow mein was bland and swimming in watery sauce, no taste, very forgettable, won’t be back","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andrea Till","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkAM6v731ouSbWkJSGb72C7yjI8qfxRIAh4EPMK-wxLFoqUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We stopped here and grabbed my husband a donair. Thankfully we didn’t pay too much for it. Because ummm…..where’s the meat!?? And the lettuce is brown! I definitely do not recommend this place to anyone. The girl inside had zero personality and the place is not very clean. There are lots of other places to go eat at near by. McDonald’s might be better then this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzi-kyRojyVfe6PRKClBulA5nEX6gNGtoD5qeZ&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Although its name is "Istanbul donair," this restaurant has no relation to Turkish döner at all. It's not döner; it's something served in closed lavash. Not döner. Taste 3/5, service 4/5, atmosphere inside the venue 3/5. If you consider it as meat and salad wrapped in lavash, then it's edible. But if you're looking for Turkish döner, this is definitely not the place to go. Apart from that, everything is good.
Just like an Italian would start a fight if someone put ketchup on spaghetti in front of them, as a Turkish person, I feel like starting a fight when I receive this "döner"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrPo7qW1Lp_QW4qduOf0L8uyru3eQ6oslBPpYc&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Ben Korman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5L2ACarH73g0VnzpPBLwXjZultIvoscPC2NJ-Pv_o3GjxfX2DAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t go here. Sketchy place

Lady was rude. Lamb was old, burnt and dry. Worst donair plate I’ve had

Baklava was stale and dry

An absolute disgrace to Mediterranean cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOweVCR1NIIuwNdebhhfQZr-eMcuGJyRmeGuW-Z&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Kathy Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZQTbqSANZv1SIZYpZMG3qHiN26EhHKI4MnyCufypfpYBSA1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve seen some bad reviews for this place but I’ve been twice and the food was fantastic, tasty and fresh.  I had the Greek plate and a chicken donair plate.  Both were delicious!  Service was good, and fast and prices are reasonable.  It’s a fast food restaurant not fine dining.  If I lived in the area I would go more often.  Don’t knock it until you try it:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Huhn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjPgKgZCO5PZiQnT0cs9yON3NEoowbu1SmDyHWquv1i9Z5rrCk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I remember liking this place when I first went and tonight my partner and I were disgusted by the lamb. So we drove back hoping to give them the benefit of the doubt and not leave a negative review but the chicken donair was just as bad and the service went from poor to worse and the girl showed a serious attitude so she left me choice but to leave this review. This was a Terrible place both for taste and for service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mamma Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ0M6Qh60UoqRB7gBHhR76swtq_sn84713ssVCukopRv8obA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service was terrible, took my kids here for lunch today. Ordered a Brazil salad and Donair. The Brazil salad had advacado on it which was so hard and not ripe, the dressing very bitter and tasted off.  Went back into the place to ask the employee for something different as the salad was terrible and was told "that is what we have, we can cut up another advacado".

Asked if they could give something else for my son to eat as it was not good at all, instead and she said "no' and was very rude.

Threw the salad out. Will never eat here again and will not recommend it to anyone. Poor food quality and poor costumer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhJLA39GO5wSlJ2sweHrYoLVucggy6HzL2DOs4&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2023-7-19"},{"Name":"Erfan Forghani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViQeUcI5jPldQOn-43NzHlzG69COV0b1geAjtP7crg6eEF6OD7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the Turkish plate. The chicken was tender and well seasoned. The rice was cooked beautifully, but the dolma was still frozen!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpOEsCy2apVYZgziveSAR9T9J_VgAIFM-vUrVY&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2022-11-15"},{"Name":"Austin F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUbk7FQhvLtKwjdS068ukXcfQMAnk-8eMfY9PBfdPtkoph0mM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Come here often due to living near by and it’s always good bang for your dollar. I order the Lebanese plate that comes with rice, chicken, hummus and tabuli.. I thoroughly enjoy it. The owner is great, clean place, really good chicken and some of the best hot sauce I’ve ever had! Also great homemade baklava .. I recommend this place, much better then donair affair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzOnySbPSFtlUjXQKSsV5CAR6g3eP59G_WctYp&fid=0x0:0xd65da48001a0f20"],"When":"2020-1-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Richard Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVa96SNko-8FpbFVlwxpnyXoCoNoW45QNrjLups3dwaiZQjxmC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and tasty. - Wonderful portions. Great service. Nice family-owned. Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaoIO3PiRi6wV2VJJG1-JuwanA9bSi1Y5-8OEq&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Simarjeet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKT5C9ANCpSsw7teTh6yZuMRRabAqatvHw2nyygzBhIeVT2GyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"i went with my family last night for my birthday dinner. we ordered chat papri which was good , chicken tikka which was not as flavoured the way it should be ( could not take the pictures)
for main course we had bhindi , chicken rogan josh , were delicious. lachaa prantha didn’t have the layers and softness , but the garlic naans were chef kissed . we were the only customers on that time so we were served fast which is obvious . Front desk girl was very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwsSCs763-FmS1nflDhjWb3RXbCRPYoHpAlz4q&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Wild Wanderlust Photography","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYPQeHy2fRvptt6V1NtTq0t9CdOFiP_rQd_Emm8iYNczU9hCDSwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is DELISH!! owner is so friendly and they're always smiling
The Butter Chicken is So sooo soft! Falls apart in your mouth. Unlike some places that taste like a rubber chicken from the dollar store All food was good ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHgdimJE5P4Oqw0EMP1LgHLSzjXYBo1jDCXc58&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"R Uppal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeg06kPCjasGvdDMLDI8dy_NDMzHY9N-e0n-9NDOAuYQu1gxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UNREAL FOOD! We ordered the chicken Rogan Josh and lamb korma and we were incredibly pleased. I ordered the food an hour later than I intended and within 10 minutes they had everything ready to go for me. The food is VERY flavorful. I don’t think I’ll be going anywhere else to get my fix for Indian food. 10/10 would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9G6RYc1QqoQtl8NToA_2sKSv4r9LYzZTYSBCz&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2024-1-11"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This review is now the latest where I am still giving the food only 2 stars.
Ordered fish tikka and it was not good as fish was not properly marinated and was very chewy.
Ordered Butter chicken, the butter sauce was okay but the chicken was not again marinated plus was not even cooked in tandoor which it should be because it's butter chicken 🐔.
Garlic naan bread was good

This review was old about 2years ago
Ordered Chicken Saag and it was okiiishh.
Haven't tried anything else yet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8GHurszlYL1MH9LiIwNSPtsT0BdNBLkDDhxvL&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2021-11-23"},{"Name":"Mr. Beaver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL3M8ZH3qEl_RyevO5nyLbhHPG0gb_f64YALWS11Pc92lQ0bBO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this was a really good restaurant. i was very pleased with everything! the food, the service and the atmosphere were all top notch. especially our server. he was such a nice guy and super friendly. kudos to him! overall a satisfying experience and authentic indian cuisine. 5/5 stars!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpqHXRVP97ahMExWgczXTC8FOT_A2uthnWaUt_&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2019-7-30"},{"Name":"sandeep sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwZGsbvIJafxVAC_uafkmfUCiShzJt1L497Afsik4fBNjifQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very welcoming with charming service and the food is better than I have tasted since I was in India, easy access to parking in the back , lot of dining area space, nice and clean. would definitely go back here and recommend this to everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wilbert Salinas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO4_5cVex8IhimeOWomj2Grp5gDb8cr4ltDoyGdfVE00Kr-f68=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff is very friendly and courteous.
Thanks to SHALINI😇

Some of the best food in the city and the best Chicken , I ordered: Tikka Masala I have ever had! Perfectly spicy and yummy ,while still enhancing the flavour.

Highly recommended  restaurant in Langley😇👌🏻😇👌🏻it’s affordable price,neat and tidy restaurant, the music 🎶 🎼 background is fantastic I loved it. Thanks again  to Shalini","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJouKsTOzxz-sDVXuOVOsA4JkQCj9HlskvLvOd&fid=0x0:0xc3808ec90d0f7f54"],"When":"2023-7-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aliyah Janzen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfQcapUfid0msuuOS1wIJTZaHTUCxc_YpuGm3QtG8MZi007dM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The butter chicken and samosas here are good, but when I tried the pizza for the first time it tasted alright, but I ended up in excruciating pain from food poisoning.
(UPDATE) tried again with Indian food, ordered online charged card $40, went to the store it was locked with no one inside and no one answering the phone. Extremely unprofessional.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Lilley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1AVXG-09fpqwR7vrRVqlU_gVsakUeNhfUOQSZKiUeEEqdhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have ordered the spaghetti and meatballs from here a few times now and every time it’s been amazing. There is always lots of cheese and sauce which we can’t get enough of and it’s always so hot and fresh. My daughter is an extremely picky eater so for her to tell me she’s love’s their spaghetti and that it’s the best reeeeally says something. It’s now our go-to when we are wanting a quick pasta night.

Thank you Camy’s Pizza!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmFP4EfECAwa62KvjAlz3vB6KXvYvzyfLw5OQ5MLftSrOpbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is great for some quick pizza slices. They have a good deal 3 slices and a pop for $7. Everytime I have been in here around noon they always have lots of pizza pre made. Pizza tastes good no complaints. Try the butter chicken lunch combo as well it's very good to. All employees who have served me have all been very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIDG3hF8mtftN7KxHKHL7ZfYRs8e2qKBr1mROn&fid=0x0:0xc828948c644ed492"],"When":"2023-3-17"},{"Name":"HKJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJBW91mxv0efGkMIYzvJQ_YUcJ47SnBH_hj5AN2jcANNTCfLYM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered ravioli and cheese pizza it gave me diarrhea for days. I was puking and had the most horrible fever and pain. They dont use gloves and proper sanitizing methods as you can tell by glancing. Please go somewhere else","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kashmir Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ20FZkviqFBx9VpVYebB4Ld04MetS0XIb2DF8Txmsmq7lXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The girls working front very rude and very wrong tone. Do not know how to speak to people who know right and wrong. This is why Indian community is being ruined. Wrong tone girls who speak horrible to everyone. Please go kwatlen pizza or gate way. Nice staff family friendly !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HARPREET Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7SkHflKukI9OZsEWifkT39sce3SWiJ0tuIzu3MM8c8-s1lA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had ordered Indian style veggie and garlic paneer pizza's.... So  really appreciated 👍👍😊😊😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Quite an array of items on the menus... donair, Indian, pasta, and calzones. Chicken was good but lamb was better! Only a few chairs available along some counters. My husband always likes to come by for lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5zhMz6XoiGMDh5Cahcb2bvGjjkdq39sEfPP6V\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Samantha Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUlM-2rB8OtiW9hDniE1MhXAbwnDPYOBzgfv7kFAHS2eIHrpCV2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff and team here make great pizza and have amazing service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObAtl865SbBOcFj_yvnQAz3FgzEEp8GElyj1n5\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"irshad Alam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBiceHD41WruRGOl0t2MOUIBPoRdfY8zh9XbILuuK-Rk-skw4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They won’t let you choose toppings by yourself, even though you ask, they behave like we are fool, I told I will choose the toppings, then they asked me to wait and did not let me choose my toppings. And I asked for no crust but they did not, moreover  they behave so bad, worst customer service, and my pizza was like I am eating some vegetables with a sauce and was nothing like a pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSmRIlRXM_hdxpgvdDU30CMEuq2PYYo2pF3ffD\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Grovr X","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf45t0arSAA66w-92VJS7ZYkJQmi3mCjAt2vleR1dNrC8o6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Chiranjeev at Fresh Slice makes amazing pizzas! Delicious, perfectly cooked, and full of flavor. Highly recommend his pizzas!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfedztO2nRcF8LL_4gfJJ96bL5qYu7tX7_jNCz\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Embellished Trinkets","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnj6xAHz8D20Pw4G9NwqmNUxyBgoEqbLcj6wfrb6D0uN7KYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered regular crust pizza and the pizza that arrived was so thin, you could see the sauce leaking through the bottom which made the pizza so incredibly soggy and flimsy that the kids couldnt even eat it without falling apart. Asked for hot sauce on the side so the adults could add it on after and we were literally given a teaspoon amount, the cup is always filled up so I'm not sure what this was about. We order from here frequently and this is the worst we've received. It's made me not want to order from here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY3puIuVktkZjg7SX6HIHzTjhhJmTMy-_KPILp\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2f5357fd679af22"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Draws Mp32","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa76eeqHQryxDZiaPkkF8TMW7ygHRX2jlaIYwhLmenqMHS-Shc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They are super friendly here! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Raymond Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXldjV3i4-BTickKCXNM1ff98zOTT1RjfPjijGIUlY6ZcOfNWAP5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been eating at the Poseidon for years. It is my first time at their new location. Wow… what a cool place and atmosphere. Busy busy place so make sure you make a reservation. 4 of us stopped in for dinner. We had lamb souvlaki, lasagna, escargot and authentic Greek salad.
The meals were all 10 out of 10. The service was amazing. I highly recommend trying this place out. My girlfriend loved it and we look forward to going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO6zBp6xOfQO3XZByHKvcqTMAJUlody04la_Km&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a pretty good restaurant and I recommend making reservations. We went on a Sunday and picked up right at lunch/after church time. Our server (Shanna?) was very nice and accommodating to our group. The lunch specials are a good deal. I found the food and portion for price was affordable. Calamari was light and crispy, lamb souvlaki was tender and chicken souvlaki was ok. Overall - I found it a bit salty though to my liking. I would be interested in trying their other dishes (kleftiko and roast lamb) but I won’t necessarily rush back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBE7Jyd33Y94ye5GG_rT5NSdYUJaEowu5oTzg5&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Alicia Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRvUKAt1E5MAgBEss_TB2_5jwJghFINS96SeHx15rTExbEszLx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food looks good, but it was not tasty. Bland and overpriced for what you get. My friend did not enjoy his salad for $25, and he did inform the waitress. It was plain, and the chicken was nothing specia, just charcoaled on the outside. I ordered whatever the special was yesrerday, Sunday. We ate and left disappointing. We ended up going to eat somewhere else an hour later because we were not full and satisfied. The service was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPapcITWfKnGoEklcAIbD0tX-2K7cTvr-677YYu&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Chantae Lester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAjujbbvuYg6gl2OFHF2Vtqwvh1NwK7_qoTIxKWR0iZUtPoGTc5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here to celebrate Mothers Day and my brothers birthday! All of us shared some delicious appetizers and had the most delicious main courses meals! The pita bread was warm and fresh, our server Kate was an absolute gem! She checked up on us and made sure we had everything we needed! Not to mention she went above and beyond and gave us a box of donuts to share 🥰
Such great service and amazing food! Definitely cannot wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAo7hreyQi7MksxqRHzCtzzo8H03bxJUJVX-lS&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Manfred Rust","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEzdje012JUF1eIsRNA6YTAPihii_EajvYLzFoefVLI3ilBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Once again we had a great dinner.  This is our go to greek restaurant. The calamari was excellent. The chicken souvlaki perfectly done...very juicy.  The Greek potatoes were not mushy..perfectly seasoned.  Over all great service even though we came in un announced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUQpp1JkU0_r80orAG6W6rH1bycxIYXsLNCQqi&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Victor Coulthard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVzaMZ-mJiSciATJo0_vmyqllN6m7TsaHh6k4ZWnfevzG5hG9P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just moved into the area and we were craving good Greek food. Instead we experienced GREAT Greek food. Our server Alana, was great. She listened to what we wanted and made it happen. We wanted a carafe of the house wine and Alana suggested a local red wine which turned out to be very drinkable.

The four of us ordered two platters to share: The Artemis and The Athena - all four of us have been to Greece and this food was better. My favourite was the roast lamb - (you just put it in your mouth and it melts) my wife loved the lamb chops- but everything was great - my son-in-law said they simply do everything really well. Our daughter also enjoyed the atmosphere. I highly recommend this restaurant . Well done everyone!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terry F. Malchuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyXvW5mh3s5enBHIQ639SYIaaTZmXBnI3-RJ1Dcb3ta5UMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the Schnitzel, which was on special tonight. As soon as I saw it, I could tell that it was something they pulled out of a box. I think it was frozen. Absolutely no flavor to this poor tasting Schnitzel. I am sitting here at the restaurant as I write this. It came with Greek potatoes and rice and veggies, which tastes good. It also came with mushroom gravy, which actually tastes like it was from a package and had that thick consistency as in a packaged gravy.
I ate here before, and the food was great. This dinner tonight, so very disappointing and not worth $33 I paid for it.

UPDATE: Management took care of this meal for me. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODrUqjQva9YnOiF-2EZTOxUf9qdgtOo8PzJcba&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Shelley Bradford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4DjFmdvoWRNZpWJVqCUFsfMXIYk23BBDHDdvlL3QltIYS56Vk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sit outside on the patio when you can.. it's summer! Food and service are out of this world! Lamb,  dolmades, beet hummus and falafels, Dead Frog Brewery Hippity Hop beer, a rosè,  baklava, and what was that fried cheese YUM!! WE could not eat it all but we definitely tried! Jana is a lovely hostess and we are grateful for her recommendations.  This place makes Langley memorable. Thankyou Poseidon Restaurant.  Oh and if you are inclined with a little puppy, bring him along to sit outside, by your table.  Just a wonderful atmosphere to enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQOIZAX7x5OeGa1jmWr4tznW_dTVzlfBccC23H&fid=0x0:0xa800c6c4433ae452"],"When":"2024-7-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pk Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU80f10TTFg4fPHEBuL_4eMm-8z1_Ii6PQHaM120TGnIKsWy9W_RA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not recommended! Staff is Rude! Doesn’t provide you right box to carry cake! Make sure to confirm twice or thrice, before ordering.

If you ask questions, staff get rude and start insulting you in front of others. Girl with specs is rude and doesn’t know how to serve customers. She ruined our custom birthday party cake, while packing in a wrong box. If she doesn’t have the box, she could have arranged or called us to arrange. I have to put a lot of cake toppings to hide. I came back next day to pick with the hope that she could have dine something better, but all in vain.

She packed a big special order cake in a small box, due to which side corners were wrecked and then she didn’t do anything to accommodate. Not even tried to arrange anything. Though when I asked her this question, she started shouting and instead offered to refund the cake cost, but that wasn’t the option for us having party after 1 hour.

Manager who prepared the cake was nice and professional, she made the beautiful and delicious cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcgMKVoMO5DoRjsbXUregMI9c6Fgyo15HTnfvy&fid=0x0:0x13a10bbaa28992a6"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Emily Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVVFMqTVtAbEXJCzx75OG51Iy6iSJv1MSc7wUbxQRGjH7RHorv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered a custom cake here. I asked for a Coraline cake for my birthday and I loved it so much. Me and my friends enjoyed it and I would definitely recommend coming here. Thank you for making my birthday wishes come true with your bakery. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC0-b8tPwBDjInhktciCDthyvYQztGa2-AwkgX&fid=0x0:0x13a10bbaa28992a6"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Hiring Team","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXV0T14iOMeoeTiBjP2ehqSUY9wNmUi89LOobA_BLGjfbO-B-v2Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Highly disappointed with their service. Rude and not cooperative! Not recommended, don’t waste your birthday party as they will ditch you at the end when you were left with no option.

Ordered two cakes including a big size special order for my daughter’s first birthday. They gave me main cake without box, I requested them many times and allowed them an extra day but all in vain. How do they suppose me to carry the cake 50 kms away without proper box and the specs girl was so rude and non-cooperative.

I wonder they want us to celebrate the birthday at their gate, since they wreck my daughter’s birthday cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeAjaADYVvuHTqCE6UcmTj5lctdu-Xknxyjqh8&fid=0x0:0x13a10bbaa28992a6"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Nathan Daws","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0CGLZ83Pit_kYSAhk-S7wq2uNfZp2mYlSW5fwsCuYXf_F2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place, been coming here since i was a kid. Sandwiches and bread are always fresh and the baked goods are amazing! Cedarbrook birdsnest cookies are possibly the best cookies on this planet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeXaA83hwAm45iu5fkFyAu5iP7JgVvlPLqKRYr&fid=0x0:0x13a10bbaa28992a6"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered cake twice so

First time for my birthday was chocolate cake but we all thought the same that it was too sweet. My father in law picked up the cake for me which my husband called to order. The cake was delicious just way too sweet for us except my father in law because he loves sweet so all for him

Second time, my husband ordered for our daughter so this time he said not too sweet and turned out perfect. We all loved it! I went to pick up cake myself so got warm welcome from the staffs, fast service, everything looked inviting for me to take them home so will go back to try more because didn't have a chance to try anything yet other than cakes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3p1jO3d2o-jQnlZVp-IXxNJr_vNoiQnN1jsch&fid=0x0:0x13a10bbaa28992a6"],"When":"2022-9-10"},{"Name":"Gail Erickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOdYtgxyJsdORwp7kVyRDZtxbUZLGcHxlCoc6Nmddb-zBcBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A good place to stop in and check out their Deli meat and Bakery goods.  Both excellent.  Their Samosas are great with their Chutney,  The baked goods are just wonderful.  I go there every 8 weeks or do to get my goodies.  Yum!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shadows","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxseKzAFVKUv6VDoaM9JabgSyVfzQycasNJ_hZWGlRPLThljbo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time here. Special thanks to Jewel we had a wonderful experience. There were lots of delicious cakes to choose from. We got the German Chocolate cake & will be trying out the Chocolate Raspberry, Lemon & Tiramisu cakes next.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paulina Chow-White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-l8ET-9GdIvqjBIgk7JG05G_tosGR-mZpRzL8pmzEJFRGUv4i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant surprise to find Blacksmith Bakery during a tournament at the LEC. Spacious and airy space that is nicer than the usual places I work while I wait for my kids here (ie Starbucks). Friendly service, decadent looking baked goods and good coffee and tea selection. I didn’t eat today but liked what I saw.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT4cM51-aXtgcImqF499DekjOU0Tsv7L-fiWKn&fid=0x0:0x13a10bbaa28992a6"],"When":"2022-12-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amor Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9kbKHYqRX_Gg2uVn_SGYTu2Tq6BfdN21XTd_KihWjWjlXpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the new Chaii Thali. It’s amazing and very fulfilling for a single person.
2 of us shared the talli and enjoyed it. I received 2 Chaii / 1 Vada Pav / 2 small samosa / 3 piece sweet dish / Poha / Mix pakora (Paneer and veg)

Fresh, Tasty and valuable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgFx7PL5Pd4aGQfVIs_FpQUWa7VkY7cHwkv5z-&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Nandini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqGAGCY8WFdEDdmWtICcXIGUNH2gIHxAibr_QSMwVfqnxS_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Indulge in the authentic flavors of India at this delightful restaurant in Langley. Their commitment to using fresh, homemade ingredients ensures a healthy eating experience every time. The Kadhi Pakora is a true delight, bursting with flavor, while the Pav Bhaji paired with a complimentary cup of Masala Tea transports your taste buds to the streets of India. With the added convenience of their Tiffin service and affordable prices, this is a must-try culinary gem for anyone craving genuine Indian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlJOFLuyBTPy5INcC2McOyY27ZMX9r5y_-15ce&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Gavya Goyal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCeuOuLzr3z6nRiOYAJItGzFu6vPftIFwR5-ibg7OfWlTkJmU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Navaratri thali from Namak Daani. It was so so good, worth it. The packaging was so good and taste was amazing. Keep up the good work guys. I am so happy I came across this restaurant. Thank you so much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD5wmh7cI8uxFNRFY-DUaAvarmSwMxZf6bcnSV&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Puneet Sehgal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlum5y_kUvsZYQGDbIwe5TizSKb92nZk2KExxOp3CUtL_fbMfjuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Navratri Thali from Namak Dani, and it was absolutely amazing!

The food was not only flavorful but also generous in portion—more than enough for one person.

Every item was prepared with such care, and the Sabudana Kheer was definitely the highlight of the meal.

Perfectly sweet and rich in texture! Highly recommend if you're looking for a satisfying and delicious Navratri feast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7njhII5E1XAZqZJbtUnCZPvZbDsr8IjCGOK_gUrhVVRnM7x4vDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst food. They microwave frozen food. Reviews are not legitimate. Uber drivers can't find this place as they operate out of some warehouse. Their food is a health hazard and causes food poisoning. This place needs to be shutdown - that's how bad it is!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanyukta Kumandan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKL5gP6RsdeU-MbLKZUl38198ov5H9n9fYPHfxFs-BF5GIvZaW5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered food from here and it took forever to reach us. Almost 1.5 -2 hours.
We ordered rajma chawal and chicken pepper with garlic rice. Rajma was okay but too salty.
Chicken was the worst. It had a thick layer of oil on top and it tasked as if raw chicken is dipped in oil and sent to us. I had to throw it all. Sorry but this place is not reliable. Never ordering again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"deepak sharma dhami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWex5Q_sn_edqreuRwID0XO1gRmv85yacm57ZY3IwlxN_sUle8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Looks like a cloud kitchen and a good option for pickup. The food was tasty and good value for money","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN_Fjejk_kDtkn1qIaUItCQPQhQ4M8q86kIal7&fid=0x0:0xc9b4f9095d8c8d4"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Himanshu Chadha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaVrnjBUh6SfeJydxSOE2Utp4QCNhiXEjDVsSkLNn19kjYDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have one of the best Tiffin service. I have tried several tiffins before, but you guys beat them all by both quality and quantity wise. I have ordered food in the past from Namak dani , it was really good, so I thought to try your tiffin service as well. 10/10. 👍🏻👍🏻","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Sarah von Innerebner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX02Bcygz4hSFQhNZDY8pR5lMHdZU7n3AFW7bOZFNTJ81Oo4W0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to live in Brookswood and always went here during the 2000s. Was visiting the area this weekend and was thrilled to stop in for the western bagel and a specialty coffee. Was just as good I remembered it. Still a cute cafe with a great vibe, great variety of options, and good quality. I also appreciated the price point. Such a gem for the Brookswood community. Good memories and glad I was able to stop in!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"georgia susheski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVonT73Ed6O_A6z7oiiURRpX3VsVuc7mqo3_7780QgUNUjM1uAK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"probably the worst food Ive had in a while. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"VISHNU DEV S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH6h5mT-a0eO3jksZUAY9bPgRLzYy84Fq7HybAcYdVfmHs_Kgo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful dinner with my family at Apana Indian kitchen Langley.The food was excellent, beautifully presented, and cooked to perfection. The service was friendly and attentive. It was a perfect setting for a relaxed, enjoyable evening. Highly recommend for a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlf_50GIlCW2nRaRi-iPwfduvX0ETCzcFoxn9z&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"rajiv malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQCQMj3G94-c35uv6vQI2xmTltiEbdYT0doqFtdkNj6IHOJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently had the pleasure of experiencing Chef Dhyan Singh's food from Apna Indian Kitchen for my Son's first Birthday and I can confidently say it was the best Indian food we’ve ever had! From the first bite to the last, each dish was packed with authentic flavors and made with fresh ingredients. The spices were perfectly balanced, and the presentation was exceptional, showing his attention to detail and passion for his craft.

Our guests couldn't stop raving about the food, especially the paneer lababdar and Honey Chilli Cauliflower. Chef Dhyan Singh and his team went above and beyond to accommodate our needs, providing excellent service and ensuring everything went smoothly. If you're looking for delicious, high-quality and very reasonable price Indian cuisine that will impress everyone, I highly recommend Chef Dhyan Singh’s Apna Indian Kitchen. We’ll definitely be returning for future events!"
In the Appetizers:- Manchurian, Noodles, Honey Chilli Cauliflower
In the Main course:- Mix Veg, Chana Masala, Paneer Lababdar, Rice, Yogurt , Garlic Naan and Ras Malai.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUK5Fe9UpkfTHgLS_0QbrFBxyMyqVGYuFYO3qU&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Abha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz-fxx-9FhjJeZBVOjAjYALrXo8vJBbKx-sHZerG5aR3UGRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 for authentic taste. Great value for money! Staff is very polite and friendly. I highly recommend this place. Butter chicken and kadai paneer I loved the most. Naans are always very soft and tasty. Overall great experience 🧡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb7VzdBP3TBj_45nNUGpcqH6F0oRjQr8uwp31l&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Danny Chaho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfl6p3PlByZ65HjhGr5R2hAltNBiIDERZrBs0LnzNtZi6g-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had googled best Indian Restaurant in Langley, and Apna came up. We went as a group of 8 guys on a Thursday. The food was simply amazing! So much flavour and the taste was out of this world.  Food portions were also extremely generous compared to other places. All the guys said that this was probably the best Indian food they ever had. The fish pakora, Palak Paneer and veggie pakora were so good as was all the other dishes that we ordered. Apna was also very reasonably priced. You need to try this place if you are in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjyb3fh76Qh6xVDnzCR_lmSDJy3xgn8OMYFEO7&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Dr. Sanjiv Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZdOonCGhZAJ_YOzeI3QSOxfh6TiDkTr9RNIx-E0qIakRX5CRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice Indian restaurant away from congestion of surrey . Paneer Parantha n Pickles were too tasty","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOQ1osG90q93rIv33utP4cmUcoowsB7ovwA2sG&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Benjamin Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAzrZNvmG0L4mBSCr27Mh8B-Fpc3EO5gD2Y0eZ6giQE029QxAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently completed a school lunch order with Apna Indian Kitchen. It was executed flawlessly, our entire order was fulfilled accurately, and the taste and quality of every dish received nothing but praise from our students. The portions were incredibly generous, leaving everyone satisfied, including us parents at home when leftovers came home.

Not only were the students impressed, but their positive feedback was echoed by the parents during our taste test with another reputable Indian restaurant.  APNA showcased the essence of Indian food culture, leading into our Diwali celebration at the school. It's evident that the exceptional service was a result of your team's hard work and dedication.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTzsPUNBWoj238qik0gUQMeAZT_Dq443akB8nl&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Yesterday was our first time eating here. We ordered Jaipuri seekh kebab and Murgh Achari with garlic and basil nan. Everything was super delicious. The chicken was tender and the kebabs were also fresh and tender with an amazing flavour. The service was good and we felt welcomed. Thanks for that.

Wondering why 4 stars well I wanted to give 4.5 but that is not an option. So that 0.5 less is for the Faluda Khulfi. It was the worst I have ever eaten. The Faluda was more like maggi noodle and the kulfi was too crystallized, we didn’t even eat it. We did tell the server about it. Hope you can improve that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv5RVUX73TocZSAtUOFMsDSlasS5HzwgFmEjvl&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2022-6-30"},{"Name":"Aida Cowdy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOSMyUOPMwT4wqDue1PDS2-0KlV4tjaFl0JOj2dSBgi8VQ6U8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was very good! It’s just bizarre that they put a water in their vase because they are using fake flowers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCNvJHt7te-BEOtZKTKg2mTiN74LdzDbZYYqUe&fid=0x0:0xd47f9b89a904dbe0"],"When":"2024-5-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danny Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPFpxTFJ3u9SzLCSXea0v-aXlg3umR59y0nfTLYbCzwas4amM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I would give this place zero stars if I could.  Worst meal we’ve had. The chicken was cold, stale, and definitely not fresh. The portions were small and overpriced, and the side of coleslaw was ridiculously tiny. It’s no surprise there were no other customers. I’ll never return or recommend it to anyone..

Owner, please take action to improve the quality of your food instead of just offering generic, unhelpful responses. Customers expect better, and if changes aren’t made, you’ll continue to lose business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug Kasdorf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsCkpeLH63sLQLetj3g11ngy3dL7wlvrbEo92jXjxVPeMskrSP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Usually only order when they have a deal like the Batter's Box This summer was a fantastic deal during the Blue Jays season. Yet to have a bad experience. I suggest ordering on the app. Our first order was a walk-in and the weight was too long for my liking but you can order a head on the app and even specify the time and it's always ready when you get there and hot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoiWMySe73NNM6qtYNuA3bcP79qgYNw1vF7gg3l5P375EI0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Atmosphere is Average, as expected at a Fast Food location, nothing bad.
Have ordered from here a few times now, never an issue with Food or Service.
Go to place/location for Fried Chicken orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ritesh Kavungal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIT7ub_0gtR4cA1CzMeXYd8O33SAFBrB0oUiEstNQ70ckoC--QyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wasted $40 for bad tasting food which looked stale even after the long wait. The portions were small and expensive. I would not return for any fried chicken here. Very disappointed with my first Mary Brown experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK0nzUMOj7GHKry-ZCGLN2hHT-_6TubDdjThUfW7o4jHDyhHmq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I will not be returning to this location, the fried chicken was tough and tasted old. The tenders looked like they were cut from random pieces of chicken and the coating was barely existent. Id rate it lower but I've had great chicken from other locations..

I emailed them before posting a review (off nights happen) and was offered a 15% discount on my next visit instead of any refund. I wouldn't have accepted it but the offer would have been nice, I won't be returning here, the overall experience was disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3fR7wNPxCJvyna1TqQKDVCMrlW0yyr_b9585n&fid=0x0:0x2c02a98a5e9b37cd"],"When":"2021-10-30"},{"Name":"Ellaura Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2a3DgcX76zCyZhDpyhEE7R790fzy2ui7yLTQXgfgG7oWLQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never been to Mary Browns before, it was the best! My son loved the poutine and I loved the Buffalo Mary browns burger and the service was friendly and timely!
Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Vo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVot8ZwaPBXt4APjYLH0mRztluPP5wDP4QONOwCz4AmdYj8ZbLR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting the K Crunch Sandwich for my mom from this Mary Brown’s for awhile now since it came out and the food and service have been great. Always super fast and friendly. The $5 sandwiches on Mondays are a great deal as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good fried chicken and wedge fries.   Clean tables and washroom.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYEnCEtkrLVX0fb2GCRW-Oo0LkIiD3PN_kndwc&fid=0x0:0x2c02a98a5e9b37cd"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Justin Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLPBkoM_t1crblCZM8Cyhes_KDBNfCItSDNgqusvRJnCpXNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard about Donair hut from a friend. I went there for lunch and I ordered a lamb wrap. It was prepared very efficient and the service was very polite and kind. The the food was amazing. It was so good I went back the next day for another.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG4qV-w364MRZc7c4I6Jkc_qBan5OcygB6Oo5B&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Tony McGarry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ-xUbjUWNq_4KAWrIEJ6sjhVDwqK8rNocFIoSkNYebs3FpYU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A chicken rice platter and a big lamb regular Donair. It was good food, but the hummus was on the salty side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeLtP6ESwE9aBv9Wrz-JWcIIlbLaY2e7FE4Z8E&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Justin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0XUoP2j69ve7eTSxok0YbV4-J15ptLc1ioxlVM2hLC85NRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great donair spot, first time here while walking through downtown langley. This will be my new donair spot.  Kid loved it too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV0Q-jMwJvR5yx0bM3MsVFIuga769Swkn44cFY&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Rye Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIumg5DEsmhDkuZZXSGINBJhUsqtEAUFq68BysneU4qN4LgUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Lazy people sitting in the back when a customer walks in they seem annoyed with the fact they are getting business!
Ask for a little hot sauce and it looked like it was dipped in red paint the put so much on.
The hot sauce taste like generic crap
Definitely not worth the $20 for a donair that rips ulcers in your stomach.
This place used to be the best spot sad to see it gone so far down hill.
Learn to care about your customer service and respect people’s request while making the food and you won’t be so bored your falling asleep at your business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karan B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL36l_bvxw-BMTrnkWqGVutZvWpCuMU5GtqXAQXtkQ4l4Acqjk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went there after reading lot of reviews about how good the taste is. At entry water drips from AC right on your head. I ordered chicken rice platter. Quantity was very good. While everything else tasted good the taste of hot red sauce on top of the platter ruined the taste of entire food to a point that I had to trash half of it. Hot red sauce was not even hot, it was like a cheap store bought tomato sauce. Definitely wasn't freshly made that is what the expectation is when you buy food from outside. Everything else in the platter was good. Service was quick. Prices are pretty reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwMJauFbm1lEewdDIizewByRQNhZKwIu8R2O65&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2022-9-1"},{"Name":"Jen N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB3GVXqH4s1Ii8BceXwVYeZcJlutUxLdc58c45HuDWmJzj_50=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got two donairs and dessert here tonight - our first time trying them. Slightly more expensive than the place we frequent, but omg WORTH IT! Quality and portions are at least twice as good! This will be our new donair spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uzair Haroon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcZiCPIe_j4m8EYrPoIWrilLczaav4hGJbTmfNLILptUfyTkwc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by after our workout for takeout. The gents at the counter were very friendly and courteous. I ordered the lamb salad platter and wife got the lamb donair. The quantity of food and the flavours were amazing and delicious. The platter was large and had lots of meat on it. The donair was big and tasted delicious. We will be going back again !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7J6oTSatuMPTN7u9UXlghGaWU7hMa_9FowE1q&fid=0x0:0x96b93646b5bf9e0"],"When":"2022-8-29"},{"Name":"Mike S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIdxloX2N4NAXB_1gevmWVD8jL7e2WL4frg7dVACANfAn9gg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far the best donair I have had anywhere in the lower mainland. The regular size is bigger than any "super" donair I have had anywhere else, but does not sacrifice quality for quantity. Lamb Halifax donair is my favorite! Halifax sauce is perfect!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: John's Chicken House
descriptions: Counter-service chain offering honey-dipped chicken, biscuits & other comfort food.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Don Hornsby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWud7ZjXHDKcLJnmqLpqYOCTup0vSRkaM6qPoNNs5LLhODssRnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was on a business trip to Langley, BC, and decided to try something different for dinner. As a fried chicken aficionado, I noticed John's Chicken House was nearby my hotel, so I thought I'd give it a try.

The exterior of the restaurant is unassuming, resembling an older fast-food structure. Inside, it was sparse with a large counter for ordering. The young lady who took my order was friendly and efficient, and in a short few minutes, I had my takeout order.

I opted for the 4-piece dinner combo with a mix of spicy and regular chicken. The combo came with a small container of gravy that tasted a bit off and a small coleslaw that was almost negligible.

The real stars were the chicken and the French fries. The chicken was decent, but I couldn't really tell the difference between spicy and regular. The thighs and legs were well-cooked with a coating of crispy batter that had little taste besides salt. I relished it, though, as I was hungry after a long day of driving.

The fries were tastier, with a crisp crust that surprisingly went well with the slightly "off" gravy.

I probably wouldn't visit here again. It was an interesting experience, but I believe there are better options nearby, like Popeyes down the road and even the Canadian version of KFC.

The cost of the meal was expensive for what you actually get. I guess everyone is experiencing the sticker shock these days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM781QtnBK1lmRkNUBdumEur0IKPEIj3hM-OCDy&fid=0x0:0xcab89a5b1b6a2cda"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Eomji Jeong (Syd)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUW-SDj43DaWbPaPzD4OPiFMr-waYCH1P0AnzIAHMwziQ2cACk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place!
Best chicken in Canada. Juicy, crispy, and not greasy. It's different from Church's Chicken.
The staff is nice, and the interior is clean and well-organized.
You must eat the crispy fries before they get cold!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfjcr2cfJCSJO-pFnhuUZlVpXeG7SfKk1PcZ71&fid=0x0:0xcab89a5b1b6a2cda"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Surrah Indubitably","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoVn3IOArl4jkN9EEZKnSlW3FYJl06XpzrKjXE1OO7Rr-SdIs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Literally been going to “Johns” which was once Lees since i moved to langley over 20yrs ago. Its always been our go to spot for chicken.
And before it was very worth ones money. But today I went in to get the normal meal; was met with little…and now outrageous pricing for what one gets.
Econ FAMILY meal : 8pieces of chicken, med gravy, med fries.
Okie cool normally fed 2-3 people with the fries and gravy to combo… (perfect, great ,thumbs up)

Today i pick it up ans (see picture) this is now what they are calling “mediums”
$34 for this… SMALL and SMALL with pieces of chicken…
Cool so the meal that was suppose to feed more then one person is literally personal size… literally 1cup of gravy…in dixi size…
And basically a wendys “large fries”
Im really disappointed in Johns new owners.
1000% rip off now.
Jollibees you can get 10piece plus sides for this amount.
A childhood fav now crushed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw_KI4n4KdzdT8vvBGh2BgcriEBugVQuBXJloC&fid=0x0:0xcab89a5b1b6a2cda"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Vida Corvus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqINKLe9b1hKofrDcCLAKEL-6hQV6fdy1HehcGnPVwrDjBQXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My first time ordering here and I got the 9 piece family meal that came with 2 medium sides, medium gravy and large fries. I initially called my order in based off some old photos of the menus that were posted by another reviewer, where the 9 piece meal was $31.99. I paid $41.99, after tax it was $44 and a tip brought it to $50. (Don’t come for me with the tip, everything is really expensive right now).
The chicken was freshly fried but really under seasoned. I asked for half reg and half spicy and just like everyone else mentioned, spicy ain’t spicy. But it was still quite enjoyable.
Fries were good and crispy, and stayed crispy after a drive home, not soggy!
Will I order again? Probably..it’s close to home and was tasty. But for $50 it will be a very special occasion treat.
They get bonus points for an absolutely stunning live tree in the corner that’s currently blooming with these large flowers that look like magnolias 😍

My 4 stars is strictly based on the price change because I was genuinely expecting $31.99..

I posted new pics of the menus as of Sept 30.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr0kvP2bcX3jarBr_FMlv0K8jZsudwmw4ZUHoL&fid=0x0:0xcab89a5b1b6a2cda"],"When":"2023-10-1"},{"Name":"Ren Gregory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFJYpLN9POrWBly1uAvuMqO6CoUExAfOdsAmUHF-za1wYjRxK0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying John’s and it seems to be Lee’s Chicken with a new name which I was hoping for. Not cheap by any means and sides aren’t “large”. The chicken was good and fries decent.
The guy behind the counter is less than friendly. Zero smile and looks like he would rather have a root canal than be serving people.
Dull old interior but looked clean. I’d probably go back rather than KFC.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mike towns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRwXnuJVubI5KY7aTifzMUJf42nYeTs4Ynqo5eLolauWyigg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very unfriendly service, though prompt as the place was empty.  Not cheap, and moderately unkempt (with a cheap fast food decor).  Food was good with good portions (chicken burger, fries, mozzarella sticks, gravy), but the fixins in the chicken burger were weak (a piece of lettuce and a Kraft single for cheese), and the fries are unsalted.  Overall, a less than pleasant experience, but the food nearly makes up for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV1hWitow-z8iKYYE6bsGh_NXrNN4xTNruezgj&fid=0x0:0xcab89a5b1b6a2cda"],"When":"2022-9-7"},{"Name":"Leon Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6-KMw0P9pLdadDaXXdIupuy-a2gxL42t1TPJHI7r89HYZt3_3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fried chicken joint in the area. Less greasy than Popeyes. The menu is simple. Friendly service and my takeout was ready in 10mins. There is spicy and non spicy.  Get the spicy! It isn’t actually spicy, it was more crispier!  I highly recommend this place. I got their leg and thigh special 6 pieces for $17.99 ( $3 per piece) not too shabby as inflation goes.   Definitely will be going back when I get a craving again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8Oo6rV2GNYfA-yBXraa-e3taWvdEzRK4-rgU4&fid=0x0:0xcab89a5b1b6a2cda"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Jeremy F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5zTFFZKsFfwA612EH-DOpdFm0ncZvsIEsz-b9UlLmul3ajw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is ok. The food is average, price is high but in line I guess with most places but I don't know how you actually get a piece of white meat. I ordered the 3 piece dinner combo. It doesn't actually specify what pieces you get but there is also a 3 piece value meal that tells you it's all dark meat so for the extra money I assumed I'd get a piece of white meat, but I got 2 legs and a thigh.
It's ok, but next time I'll buy the cheaper option if it's the same pieces of chicken.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julio Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe1K3IZyiZR-7k2j0sgZj91NSxbSIJoheL2gAuKU6XMgwqQkJAEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch there yesterday with my wife, and it was quite the shock to find what an amazing place they have put together.
You would have never guessed from the outside, but as soon as you walk in the door and you see the hallway, right away, you can tell that this restaurant is special.

It's very easy to give them 5 stars on every category without having to think about it.

Food: A high-level culinary experience with a Thai fusion. Their chefs take their time to create each masterpiece. Both of our dishes (Soufflé pancakes and Midnight burger with taro and yam fries) were extravagant, with fresh and rich ingredients, the plating was on point and the food was filling.

Service: You are well looked after the minute you walk in. The staff is very attentive and is happy to take care of you.
They check on you without making you feel rushed.

Atmosphere: Just one word, Fancy.
We appreciate the attention to detail and honesty. We even felt a little underdressed.
Even their washroom has nice decor.
It has a great ambiance, making you feel like you're in another country.

In closing, you get what you pay for.
I am a happy customer, my belly was happy, my wife was happy and we will return.

Highly recommended for a date night and dress to impress 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3XS5umWpuOtMcl36_IYp-JN2jfnuTfyBPxcbj&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shortly, if you want to bring someone you love and to show off that you know fancy restaurants, bring them here.

Other than the elegant atmosphere inside, I have to congratulate the chef 👨‍🍳’s success of detail oriented plates. Moreover, the texture of all the foods were well balanced and you feel yourself in a cosy seaside, or holiday.

Stuffs are polite and friendly, prices may seem high, but if you come here, focus on what quality food you have after a big effort, but feeling full.

Finally, I am lucky to have a place like Fanta here, if I want to have quality conversation, looking around the beautiful decorations, quality of food and feel somewhere else makes me comfy, I will come here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOixp1G7wmDUtNgo2Ia6Xk6OqqyO8D2IdBp7FIQ&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Sofia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3DifFwDMTB58GBwUcG7HSGccjUCVlplE2gzWFv3JhMyR4mjDT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is absolutely beautiful! I visited a Thai restaurant for the first time last week, and while I’m not a big fan of Thai food, the overall experience was better than I expected. The staff was incredibly professional and kind, taking the time to explain the menu in detail, which made me feel more comfortable trying new dishes.

For starters, I highly recommend the Siam Sliders(mini burgers) that were absolutely delicious! The Fettuccini Scallop Pad Cha was okay, but nothing too surprising. However, the risotto was a standout dish and is an absolute must try.
Finally… the coconut crème brulee! I was already full, but thank God I tried it! It was the perfect ending to the meal.

Even as someone who’s not into Thai cuisine, I’d consider coming back to explore more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpZ4iwuphy6rEFq7c8oV_3DsGeHwCxj8Tpvl88&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Jeff Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS7f1cJwUpU6pw0PsQWajaPJted73gQZ0lbkvXf8YADsG8KpPh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty much everything you think it should be and more! Great service great food. We were amazed at how quickly things were served to us, especially with such great presentation. All of the servers were helpful and kind. We had a great selection of food. Happy hour pricing is nice. Fresh ingredients served to perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHVtQEnc1Io_fhFRbVjBF8TOQbR47Eh4FkjbU5&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Kristine Dalisay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcLt02amtZMIH0nGVOp_lAFwSAH2eimnaBxmoRHPGqXeXyGmHa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a lovely dinner here 2 months ago. The food was amazing and the ambiance made me feel like I was royalty, like a princess. 😅 I was wearing a dress, but if I were to back here I would wear a prettier dress to match the atmosphere ☺️. I have been craving for their nachos. I would come back just for those. 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7qB3Tn7IurSJ2GDiH_P1SxeOQMLEOiwHxKy9o&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the vegan coconut creme brulee today and felt good and healthy and full afterwards. Beautiful and cozy place with memorable atmosphere and welcoming people. Loved other items on their feature menu too which had low prices like eggplant fries. Hope to try some of those next time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNhnbFwQzre3raXn8PyXiI_d-OGLrQDGYzwDcq&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Joanna Fahmy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTznlA_q5Xa6Whv5wHF-yEDXEyOSOXOXBiPU7xtZRDBuF4Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for Valentine’s day dinner and this place definitely stands out. The decor is just beautiful and different from anything I have dined in before. The food was phenomenal, the dumplings were the best I have had and were so colourful. The Lamb was yummy and just fell off so nicely and the burger was quite unique and flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-F64m5GnMwhOGfZk45qiYsqHzXz5fkWDBitlE&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Dean Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0pEsEURd4htP2KCqkfiSgm0pKFb3Qf7AweqGbEsp0o8JM9Ta4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was unique and tasted decent. The overall atmosphere was a bit chaotic, but it was decorated in a colorful style that would likely appeal to women.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg583TwhmqmkLvzJ9osfHim9GdGtb-ndl6czCe&fid=0x0:0x34c51ac8732a9cdf"],"When":"2024-12-3"}]
