user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Isabel Grealy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw8yUSIFQAQ1UllfQib93wXiqGv4srInaEEpoZ90YxznQm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited Browns in Langley centre and had THE most incredible, hand-breaded chicken strips that were part of their new chef’s corner menu. It’s been a long time since I’ve been left speechless by a meal, and these strips were worth every penny. Our server, Benjamin was awesome and made the entire experience a 10/10. Would recommend everyone head to Browns Langley to try this new menu item!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdtWiU-p4NsTaJkvxnoTpVJPnrg0Gw_YJ1K4M&fid=0x0:0x67ea3f97caff7489"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Charlotte B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOKD082gqbGb5WoI6A-3DYLMosVJCYQnVkxWTwi4BHbyx_ALxvFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I decided to have a quick bite before work, only instead of getting my food in about 10 minutes, it was taking around 30!!!! The waiter said it's been a really off day, and was very apologetic. I ended up having to take my food to go. The waiter more than made up for the inconvenience, and it's honestly his great service and friendly face that'll bring me back here. Those chicken tenders though.... to DIE FOR!!! My only complaint (other than the unusually long wait),was that 1 dipping sauce is not enough for 3 tenders!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa8hJkijPEiNYIos4AuJG1t-q_fd0F2pu7cDQz&fid=0x0:0x67ea3f97caff7489"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Alex Franklin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeiENMvZOrk2K-H7FWd5r-wn5DH802JdY7Xw0ix3ogZqdTnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First of all, service was amazing. Our servers were kind and attentive, so thank you for that.

The food was delicious, but I have to say very overpriced for what it is. The portions are very small for the price, and the ingredients do not justify the cost. Even for 2024, I just don't believe it's worth it.
Secondly, the music is just too loud. It's called a social house.

In any case, people were nice and food was good but I likely won't be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vasisht Raghavendra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJdqlfXhrv4xWlObHOUik-BEmjW2vxVvFad9PSosG433WUa8GN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Post Golden Ears Hike Happy Hour. Ordered all the happy hour items and couldn't be more satisfied. The ambiance does justice to the name - social. There are multiple screens throughout. This location also has a porch seating with a fireplace.

Parmesan Garlic Fries 🍟
Fiesta Fries 🔥
Crispy Yam and Avocado Roll 🍣
Chips and Guac 🥑
Crispy Cauliflower 🥦
Spicy Fried Chicken and Pickles 🥒","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrgYG0YRiCuif1vVRdjYa3DIuaMThtWHpkPpzD&fid=0x0:0x67ea3f97caff7489"],"When":"2023-4-12"},{"Name":"Shadi Khosravi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9byyoLG0vbUTG8BTH19JpqGooSAgrLBE8hZI9bmwV0mDFTDFllA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome cocktails and super yummy French dip!
Perfect Staff!

Update: never disappoints me! Super nice staff! The cowboy salad was exotic! They comped the burger and fries as it took them a bit longer to serve our meal! Will definitely come back🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlM4Qidu1WmEABuqKqIpin0WMzCvQp8rndP1Po&fid=0x0:0x67ea3f97caff7489"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Beatrix Cendana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrgEz8zi1JhWvuye6FwpWxBtelZ_X_lIGR9nTlf8HQ6_8C9mu0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the food! We ordered a burger (forgot what kind) and dynamite roll sushi. All tasted so great!

Love the yam fries🥰🥰 this is my favorite one.

It's just too crowded. We will try to come during weekdays next time😎","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq1utffCsLreFi3mcG8OWsXuyAXB5JN4k8wvL2&fid=0x0:0x67ea3f97caff7489"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"Jeremy F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5zTFFZKsFfwA612EH-DOpdFm0ncZvsIEsz-b9UlLmul3ajw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've tried so hard to like browns but it's just frustrating disappointment after frustrating disappointment.
Try calling for a take out order and the recorded message tells you to go online. Go online and you have no selection to pay when you pick up. Not to mention it automatically adds a 15% tip until you go back and select no tip.
Finally get through to place an order and I ask for cutlery and napkins in the bag. Pick up the order and no cutlery or napkins. This has happened multiple times. Then there is the food. The rice in the cod bowl is always burnt on the bottom. The Cajun chicken cowboy salad has a ridiculously tiny sad piece of chicken. Like 2 mcdonalds nuggets are about the same amount of chicken.
I'm over it,  browns used to be decent a couple of years ago but it has gone way downhill and it's way overpriced for the quality of food and the portion sizes.
Its not inedible so I won't give only 1 star,  but it's the low end of mediocre at best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christian Metatron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbB71b_6BYyu3cZ6xoveog7lX2YqgJi2mdnK2HUb7ekKzx5V6I1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Music and atmosphere was mellow and upbeat, the service was polite and friendly even though she forgot the cauliflower we ordered but it all worked out, and the food was tasty and fresh. I would definitely eat there again 😊💫💫💫💫💫 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvbBK9wYys7OQ-5al7O3d-CqjS_20rXdbc-RCG&fid=0x0:0x67ea3f97caff7489"],"When":"2023-6-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtS-zKRr3tNdHER3Yfc_MVEdupAvLyOTlNqhvHp0LGpPQLrBs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So so so good. Everything they make is amazing. It literally takes you to streets of Delhi. This is the one and only place in lower mainland that literally serves authentic Indian taste👌🏼
Customer service is great too!
HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGeQOmDDxmPM6lzlK4Upz2NxdodS9RDOGy8Nfa&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"angela Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm15du404Pyq1LGGpi0PLlorhv3XaV5vDh7MqI8ssK2xr8bGXG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Although it may not look like your typical standard restaurant, trust me the food, service and chefs are above and beyond excellent. It was absolutely delicious eating here and honestly the food was the best I ever had. And so affordable. It’s as authentic as you can get. The only time I’ve seen this kind of cooking is when I eat at my Indian friends house for a celebration. We got the butter chicken bowls btw. And proportions are large.  We’ve decided to comeback every time we’re in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjPqiiG5v6UDl44wzm74ufFfBhW5masnycG5aN&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Nikita Purohit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB6Km0AeEXD7qcdDIGd6av-n5-Fm7Mes7Wgfrgb1WwefHHDrGI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem… They serve food directly in your Car with a sweet smile… 😊
Their Paneer Makhni Pasta, Kathi rolls are to die for… We ended up ordering so much that we couldn’t even finish some of the dishes…
Totally worth trying. We’ll definitely be back soon…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBxYp53oeFZZQDeXm3XO-g69HCDIJfrIjiBYaU&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"SANDEEP KOUL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwGE8qmu0mLcdxhIV2r6ravPkLMC83r017hWV3t1iuDixWmcAr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Here's the revised review:

---

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

After five years of searching for authentic street food in lower mainland Vancouver , I finally found a gem in Langley—Hunger Strike. This place is an absolute delight for anyone craving genuine flavors. The momos are perfectly crafted, bursting with flavor in every bite. The mutton keema pav is an absolute must-try—rich, hearty, and incredibly satisfying. And the rumali roti? Soft, delicate, and the perfect accompaniment to their flavorful dishes. Hunger Strike has nailed the essence of street food, and I can't recommend it enough. If you're in Langley and appreciate authentic street cuisine, this is the place to be!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMrrRMVWDDD1LC01hGREHD6fIM0JFYqaaZVFxg&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Anshika Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsZu9FW0QNtTqrTz7V8iGP1eC2GVtBcs4jnlsWdzcsEA6c8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hunger Strike is a hidden gem for anyone craving authentic Delhi-style momos and Kathi rolls.What sets this place apart is its late-night hours, making it the go-to spot for a satisfying snack after a long day. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX13nXCrZydycOhvmEs-4P5yeDz3dadivCj7mg&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"soumya rastogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoOSf5EEwUectWj3FTSaat7hv9FbQGSvRLEa5sv_VJj63pc71U_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Harmeet and his cloud kitchen, Hunger Strike, really nailed the authentic Delhi flavors for my Diwali get-together! It’s great to hear that his recommendations on quality and quantity were spot on. That kind of trust in a vendor is so valuable, especially when they can bring out flavors that impress both you and your guests. Having a go-to for all your future parties must be such a relief, especially with that perfect taste of Delhi cuisine….","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ravijot Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfWheaeQwlj_3V62qLZyLdDTeGbVbFmDU4rLVvxFr3EGkQb4Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always in search for street food from home, away from home, our search has ended here. We tried three dishes, and bang!
1. Aaloo Chaat: The famous aaloo Chaat from the streets of Delhi has been recreated here, and your craving can be fulfilled! Did not expect crunch to be found in all those chutneys, and it was there!!
2. Dahi Ke Sholey: I loved this one! Cooked to perfection, the crispy outside and the yummy gooey inside, packed with flavour with that awesome chutney will be had again and again!
3. Veg steamed momos: If you eat spicy, these are for you. Freshly steamed, unlike many places which sell momos which have that rubbery skin, these were delicate!

It was a delight to have visited here. Everything was freshly prepared, nothing frozen was used (as ensured by the owner). They do not have a done in place you'd fancy, but if you are a sucker for sitting in your cars and eating (like back home) or sitting on some benches and dining (like we did), then this is the place. Or order at home 🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCZiSZt--rqjdBIPTHEzRdgOnVH6Ij-wx_GtNS&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Kanishka Rawat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIx_UtbuaDgE7oklMd_2hYfV2PDhl3OAv0m8nToXWpegdbH8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in langley for evening and late night grub. Best place for mouth watering momo, Kathi rolls and mutton keema. Moreover, the owner Jasman such a gentleman and humble guy.
Thank you so much for the great food😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxr7V5nnyOLU0UmlMx0PpBIurqqSFzxvlKA1F_&fid=0x0:0x6d275031322916b3"],"When":"2024-8-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"navdeep kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrB0uUXWRSNuv97skNjieEKJuHkYTrtR1KARBCSOB7LA_VsWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was absolutely delicious, and the service was excellent! The atmosphere had such a warm, homely vibe. The inside was spotless, and the staff made us feel genuinely welcome. We were celebrating my sister’s birthday, and they surprised us with a complimentary treat and even played a birthday song for her, which was a thoughtful touch. Such a wonderful experience – we left with happy hearts and full stomachs. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHfMOTTxRTTgZEq7NTpLu5RgUXqNYpSoIZhPJh&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Rajat Nagpal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrOXaMmdu3KZuggRrrsA8pd4C-gtBFsaZktZNcL-v07p8MNiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Udupi Adda in Langley is a hidden gem! From the moment we walked in, the service was beyond exceptional—truly 200% out of 100. The staff’s warm welcome and attention to detail made us feel like royalty. The owner was incredibly kind and accommodating, especially with our last-minute reservation, which we truly appreciated.

As for the food, it was nothing short of spectacular! Every dish was bursting with authentic South Indian flavors, and we left with not just happy faces but satisfied tummies. The ambience added to the experience, with a cozy, inviting atmosphere that made us feel right at home.

If you’re looking for a place that offers top-notch service, delicious vegetarian food, and a wonderful dining experience, Udupi Adda is the place to go. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5V8k9Wo8uhgBpsE60cn1W0CPSbZmwfkHcJ286&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Berton D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6fcYxhd4DazB0tuw-35SfyOvRJu1fYhORZqPZrnm_DkatQSmzRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem! Udupi Adda offers delicious South Indian vegetarian cuisine in a wonderful setting. Every dish we tried was perfectly spiced and well-prepared. The service was friendly and attentive, and the atmosphere was very pleasant. So glad to have this restaurant in Langley. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoZSttFTw82ZtiLkI4AbflqO4IowUp8acT98oY&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"S Bansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1TZbIDK9B79onJjhHBxnn6sya3bvuXFA5FESWwEchs0hPrCwRoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a newly opened restaurant, and after reading great reviews and word of mouth, I decided to give it a try. The ambiance is great and nice decorated place. Service is also good and timely. Food quality and taste are good but wouldn't call it exceptional. However, it is still better than many South indian places out there. I still have my favorite go-to place, which is far, and I was hoping this would become the closest new go-to place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf1QUnT-U9hiZjOhH5jvyEdLxdHBMSBsWso2tz&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"R Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJisWG1o247vyOOw6LTrQfJtevyYBeuHvjvz4fV0oogdXT3GF4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great experience dining at Udupi Adda recently. The ambience was warm and inviting, with a nice blend of traditional and modern decor that made the space feel comfortable.

Our server, Samaira, and the Restuarant manager was excellent. They were attentive, friendly, and quick to make sure we had everything we needed, which added a nice touch to the evening.

We tried a variety of dishes, and everything we had was delicious. The idli sambhar was light and flavorful, and the vada pav and pav bhaji reminded me of classic street food done right. The jini dosa and sada dosa were crisp and paired perfectly with the chutneys. The set korma was rich and satisfying, and the chana puri was a hearty, comforting dish. For dessert, the kesar sheera had just the right amount of sweetness and saffron flavor.

To round it off, the filter coffee was aromatic and strong, just the way it should be.

Overall, Udupi Adda offered a great meal with a nice atmosphere and attentive service. I’ll definitely be back to try more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLKLaDbUVeUfVqG0S-xcwy1ePxDDwe3zxCXe6f&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Jerlyn Dsouza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYAnwZztUegEVQ08RAgZVJlVoilOkaZsQmNtRDZyM1ko6sCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Udupi Adda and had a fantastic meal. The idli vada and manchow soup were delicious starters, but the gunpowder dosa stole the show with its spicy kick. The rose chai was a highlight, perfectly complementing the meal. My favorite was the flavorful puri bhaji, while my daughter enjoyed the idli sambar and chocolate dosa. We ended with the iconic Gadbad dessert, bringing back fond Mangalorean memories. The pricing is reasonable, and there’s parking across the street. Highly recommend for authentic South Indian cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMv8_Ps7bd076Xd8eXiQzV8NCFldSeD-KxS2O0&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"A B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKTjeUpH_77OW3hC9oA_t81yv5otFoS-5WYzpJlRbxj8XZCG-T1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic South Indian food, great flavours and the best part is it is pure vegetarian! Enjoyed our dinner here. Great service by Shiksha ( she is one of the owners and personally takes care of all the guests). Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMhApUXF58kcDBp7QvwOTZ8mO26ecMHog1vN4m&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Nikita Kuckian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUenktKqsk6kyHyXReajlMH7lYDK7SyMslvAV5jK0QE6ouiOUUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday we dined at Udupiadda, and had a wonderful experience.The ambiance was warm and inviting. We tried a variety of dishes, including Dosa, Medu Vada, and Pizza Uttapam, all bursting with flavor. The Burnt garlic fried Rice had a nice smoky taste, and the Gobi Manchurian was perfectly spiced and Idli manchurian was super tasty, and the highlight was definitely the holige and seera both are must-try dishes 😋 Each dish was delicious, and the attentive service made the visit even better. I highly recommend Udupiadda for anyone craving authentic South Indian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMutubkFON8wA3akV0-fiqrArcc8qNwLI3h0pM3&fid=0x0:0x2e89d6f1b23c83c3"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"maria grey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8FEcpnfN1-xWJm6jpUVFyeTvrZDkt6N8m0gKvoNv1bcyE2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I usually order here at downtown location for takeout and delivery and always get the half \u0026 half boneless chicken (Yangyeom and Cheese Snow, sometimes Soy Garlic). The portions are great. However, this time the chicken wasn't evenly coated with the Yangyeom and Cheese Snow sauces, and there was so little Cheese Snow powder that it tasted like regular fried chicken. Also, the store atmosphere was very hot. I don't know if they changed the owner, but the Yangyeom tasted a bit different, which I didn't like. I think they added some spice to it, maybe cumin or masala. I'm not sure if I'll go back. I might try the other location in Langley Township.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjMDB-wiq0AcRCd9TKBO8ll747-1AytRs_dqJ5\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkLgz8VOQBYFJkG7ndvY_ab42z8hujUknrTT6hp96Tk396SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good fried chicken, they use a light batter so it's not as greasy but you still get a good crunch. Took off a star because it does not come with picked radish, which is a staple. I can't believe you have to pay for that separately. They should really include a side-portion of radish like most places.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Guninder M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXG8PtH2OmGWVo6ojcV8teQbztUa0HaU-3qwzAIOG0oO7xsDti=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their chicken is amazing but hate the fact that closing time on google is 11PM but they won’t accept any orders after 10:30PM. You should change the opening times online, this is stupid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Carlyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUfagfxPSsqRzysTwGF0HJYhcU468FFL0xhcJkSC6KqdQt-JTe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely clean, simple amazing Korean fried chicken. We always get lots of different sauces to try. I’ve never seen such a clean fast food/takeout establishment. The prices are reasonable we drive all the way from White Rock just to get it. My family and friends are all obsessed. So far the best chicken place I’ve ever been to! Ample parking and lots of tidy area space inside to eat or wait for it. The pickled radish is to die for. Again, house made not store bought. I love the boneless chicken option, but you can get bone in if you like. What a great place! The outside doesn’t do it justice. We got a bit confused finding it as the whole shopping area is a bit hidden, but not too hard to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrCjnpRkTqenYBFXEXrNi_yI5gRrmxqkqS_mtS\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2021-12-4"},{"Name":"Catie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnCSg1Tyc6KyG_BoUA7Jz5bc-AL8cRCmCKFFcZuiWQfljRcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from here for the first time yesterday.  We decided to get a half order of boneless fried chicken with soy garlic sauce ($12.50) and it was crispy and delicious! The chicken was fresh and cooked to order (took about 10-15 mins) which we appreciated as it was hot. The sauce had great flavour and was not spicy. We also tried the regular fries ($4) which had a good crisp to the outside and tasted great.  We also got a side of yangyeom sauce ($1) to try. There were plenty of fries for the two of us and the yangyeom sauce was sweet and a bit spicy but tasted awesome! We thought that this was a great way of trying each sauce which could in turn be put on a fried chicken order. The restaurant was really clean and staff was very kind.  The lady at the front explained each flavouring and their corresponding spice levels.  She even gave us some of the cheese snow powder on the side to try for free as this is what they put on their shake-shake fries and it was surprisingly good and sweet. We really enjoyed our meal and highly recommend this restaurant to others. Just had to watch the Korean Netflix drama “Crash Landing On You” while we ate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnbUOKZCLNwlQECnZ_3iqOU3uNdac4Z30uoyEd\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2021-1-3"},{"Name":"Jamie Little","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXF1ipaOzq8nLinMTMqg5tfTdIlQQzEU_ka7XxFe7cceaH4Kk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On word, Delicious!\nThe chicken is crispy, juicy \u0026 not overly greasy, its all the things you want in fried chicken. Plus they have a boneless option for all the chicken as well, witch is pretty great. The fries are also really good, crispy coated goodness. Looks like it's family owned, they are very polite and give great service.  The resturant/kitch was also very clean. Nothing but good things to say, I'll be returning here without a doubt! Picture really doesn't do it justice 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX08uxozH-zrXs4T18byhA6jrmiOEq8kveI4TD\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"Ying W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMgp1W6R7soMe4Pt0-9nIyFSxdU5hG7emawp3cioYUe42MraTX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little hidden gem in Langley. The restaurant is fairly small but very clean. It's mainly for takeout anyway. The chicken comes in many flavours. We got half original and half with the sweet spicy sauce. The meat was tender, juicy and extremely crispy. The sweet spicy sauce had a special aroma which made my taste buds tingle. Best of all, they have bone-in option which is more authentic and harder to find in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8IIj3fNO6zxh7ZLOFp6HA3HLlBsFw_17qUKfR\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e97afaa1fc9e24e"],"When":"2021-2-7"},{"Name":"Weihan Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2K1oAaP93dVsjAYqt3nP2QNT2zVWrSKXXudwYM19IhMHrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice people, I am very impressed by their chicken. If you looking for tasty chicken with a fair price, here it is.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Avishan
descriptions: Intimate spot serving halal Persian fare like kebabs, lamb shank & shirazi salad, plus saffron tea.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at this restaurant for a family lunch and had a mixed experience. I ordered the lamb neck and the vaziri. The lamb was well-seasoned and cooked perfectly, but it was a bit too oily for my taste. The vaziri, however, had some room for improvement—the chicken was overcooked and a bit dry.

On a positive note, the customer service was excellent—attentive, friendly, and efficient. The ambiance was also quite nice, offering a comfortable and pleasant atmosphere for a leisurely meal. While there were a few dish-related issues, the service and setting made for an enjoyable overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtjE2R0xpMi0EXvpLTbOBlGP43pdnJs0QzfDri&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good, this place is always recommended by my Persian friends. It feels very authentic inside, from the music to the decor. Loved the complimentary tea they provide. Food was very rich and delicious. It is a little more on the pricey side but the food comes in large portions and you can tell it is quality food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsZAOHv5lGtwXc9JzRRURXB0Xi73l9JVk_nSVB&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed a late lunch at Avishan, a charming Persian restaurant known for its quality kebabs. We sampled a variety of dishes including koobideh kebab, chicken kebab, lamb neck, and appetizers like marinated olives and shallots with yogurt. The lamb neck stood out, cooked to perfection, while the other kebabs were decent but didn't quite impress. Meals are accompanied by a fresh salad and fragrant rice, and they are happy to provide extra rice upon request at no additional charge. Overall, a cozy spot with some standout dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbcQTB7mHACTjJ6sm58VoaCn7oEHw7FpXnKmMK&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Mounika P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlrnW_AFUjRmmd7lKhMq5nZT_eiPE-cEtUlqvjcjDqoy9no7qI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we arrived at Avishan, they welcomed us with complimentary saffron tea, setting a warm and inviting tone for the meal.

We started with two appetizers: juicy chicken wings and Kashk Bademjan, an extraordinary eggplant dish that quickly became a highlight. For our main dishes, we chose the salmon kebab and Vaziri, both of which were exceptionally well-prepared. The lamb skewer was particularly flavorful and complemented the rice perfectly.

To finish, we indulged in their famous baklava and Persian saffron ice cream, both of which made for a delightful end to our meal.

The ambiance at Avishan is truly a reflection of Persian culture, filled with warm hospitality and meticulous attention to detail that enhances the dining experience. From the decor to the service, every aspect of Avishan makes it a must-visit destination for anyone looking to enjoy great Persian cuisine in a welcoming environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_vaMyC9UAW45D_EMq7-_ik6Tzvr5vK76PaorI&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Zeeshan Sohail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQzSgXcEIo5d0fY039IL3LLi7k1i-9eyjB9u0xnur9BQekUdtD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You won't find better koobideh kababs, steaks or lamb chops (shishlik), king of the hill, best of the best. Must-have for any meat lover in BC. Kitchen and waiting staff is incredibly friendly and courteous, always a top notch dining experience. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7nAtpi9ZbyQ_LqpugOdr23sxxMuIgk2cIU0N8&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Parsha K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu47MMs78Zh70xQTUat167UUfVc1TKgAopuGm6DQ9eewv85NloeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food and service.  Had the koobideh, which was amazing.  Also the waitress was extremely friendly and courteous.  Will definitely make the trip out this way again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5nagX-wf_kwyjoD3tF3vfPREBf-5L1KfMHaG_&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Shervino T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6zkqt2zKitqKAocpq4XdjLGLKYwV6h6SPfkXKLCO94ZOjBHOX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic family restaurant
Great authentic food and great staff. Most importantly, the koobideh, the lamb shank and lamb shoulder, and all kebabs are authentic and taste great. The prices are also very reasonable for the quality and portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZq_jZzM60d0gzJTDGQx-MMg3Qny3AUo4pW1Ph&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Melany Roa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDaqmc7hNUPKajxQaQq8twL_yxdm9E9kZJX3NBeub-ZWDsbbbG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found my new go to Persian food! The lamb is very good, positions are generous and the price is reasonable. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8o8GUQ3SpagIeVl0XJkivRzDd_i-fFPKBkIjj&fid=0x0:0x95841dbba01e6c46"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rye Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIumg5DEsmhDkuZZXSGINBJhUsqtEAUFq68BysneU4qN4LgUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a great place for a donair the last good spot in Langley!
Small little shop with a ton of flavour
I especially enjoy there lamb beef mix with there garlic sauce and hot sauce.
These people know how to make a good donair and have great customer serve or and are always happy to greet you…….unlike that Hut place on the one way….
Make sure to check them out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zigman Freud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeWzqyC41pFsPRa8vtwoT6E4QT1PSQfhjt6zoQfEKRv8hZmIlz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not a good value for the money. I used to come here a lot with my friend. It was nice to see that they did renovations. And the last time I ate here the food was very tasty the staff was very friendly and you got a lot for your money. This time I went and a new person was working that I didn't recognize. She was very friendly. And polite and got the order correct. However the food quality wasn't good at all. The hummus was as runny as tap water. She put in the smallest amount of rice I've ever seen and barely any chicken on top. The salad wasn't even to the top of the indent in the container.  And to be honest the container looked much smaller than it used to look. Before the hummus was thick and you hot lots of it. They could barely close the lid you would get so much food. Now only a few bites and the food was gone and had to make more food a couple of hours later at home. Not a good deal for $15. When restaurants lower the quality and quantity of their food. They will lose business. They have lost mine now. I would let the owner know if they are reading this, it's better to serve a good portion at a good price then to be stingy and lose a customer. Remember when running a business it's easier to make one dollar from  one million customers that to try and make one million dollars from one customer. Do better please.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TBouzari N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_baPpMukUoOzON-1Bc0WVviV8MaaWCa_-KjbtB-g1KBRs9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered from here recently on Uber Eats and the whole order was inedible. Generally some crispy chicken pieces are a given but this one was entirely bottom of the pan old tasting chicken pieces. Can barely see any white meat of the chicken, literally both pitas and the bowl were all filled with this. Incredibly disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2Dzjv7Jd0k2v817kGx_uXdGUhy8ivo9vfcgzT&fid=0x0:0x5edf3ddb1f20003a"],"When":"2024-1-26"},{"Name":"Shawn Afsharkia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB3GiVNqw_1BKcftMPSHTLBH0rnEroj2aRcCD5-VrmKEwZGn_hAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered from here thinking it's similar to the Donair affair in Port Coquitlam (which has always been amazing).

The worst donairs we've ever had, ever. It was soup in a pita bread. The soggiest wrap I've ever had. Half way in hoping it'll get better we decided to throw it in the compost bin. Maybe it was just an off day but at least grill the Donair so it's not like chicken noodle soup.

When the paper turns into rice paper before you even open it, you know you regretted it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjrK_3GirYHUkqC4UuCtzNmORxPEXt1_1hhill&fid=0x0:0x5edf3ddb1f20003a"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Ramin Tahouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3PGFwXhFR5wrjRgqZ8C6g76cQqHMugwCusafBYZgKtQdvNkVR0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This spot I like for the ground donair beef which is my usual to if I'm craving some. My only critique is this place does over sauce your dishes so you do have too ask for it to be lighter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1HEu-DxmVV_MGV-FTOUJe8KJY7vbI5Z-ech1I&fid=0x0:0x5edf3ddb1f20003a"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"Matt R Knez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXRPHFeBmHGU_c2-yEkVkgN-tPWgOJzI3XZqlR1LezhHOGUDS0Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ĺunderstand that "donair" is originally a Turkish idea adopted by Muslim countries like Lebanon. Creativity is a bliss. Too many options to list, but here I go. I don't understand why a regular lamb donair is $9 bucks and the "lebanese" variation (nothing different except for a few parsley leafs and two table spoons of humus) is close to $13.
In any event I celebrate diversity and like I mentioned lines above, creativity. These guys have managed to reconcile eastern, arabic culture with  Mexican "cuisine"  and they offer hybrids (that probably work for the culturarely naked Canadian eye) such as "Mayan platters", that combine Mexican rice and guacamole with donair meats. :-)
I highly recommend this place in any event.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"supercoachobrien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtSOmIM341ZJvmU-Zhuw68RMom7ftSs6OdjraTe9rk0Pdn71zo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff are always so friendly and take the time to know their customers! I order the fries with chicken  more often then I should and love it. Their chicken donair is also another tasty option you don’t wanna miss out on.  The store is clean, and the food is delicious! 10/10 recommend stopping in and trying their amazing food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Jaggernath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrLZyhcOWBgM5pLOZv-IoGPQX3EU86WQLxTmBhWdLt5kwGzpR7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in on a whim for a donair to go. When I mentioned it was my first time in and what I wanted, the friendly staff showed me the ingredients and made me a delicious chicken donair. It was fresh, tasty, and very reasonably priced. I will definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brandon Lieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1l6wN98L8CMs2OejtfywOkLZPKh8R8jVEhQtWEIkzvjWy4Xk9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic and delicious Vietnamese cuisine in the heart of Langley. The owner and the staff were very friendly and accommodating for our large group. The menu options for expansive and the dollar value was great. The only negative is the area it's located in looks unsafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6qBVdWDVaZVtgsH5341hChUHd84wzkXgoXi6J&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Ray Dubs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv4pQtKu2wy66jann-Dj8Exe3FIdSioz5JunQZJxz8XSK1GHcjzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review from guy eating his way through the Vietnamese restaurants in the Lower Mainland:
This place took me by surprise 😲
I’ve actually already eaten here 3 times before writing this review.
I wasn’t expecting a really good Vietnamese restaurant out here. They’ve got some fantastic menu items.
If you’re craving some pho, rice or whatever you’ll be covered. I tried their combo rice plate which came with grilled pork, lemon grass chicken, meatloaf (ground pork, wood ear mushrooms) and a fried egg on top of rice. This was a large portion and will fill you up if you’re hungry. Also came with a side of broth.
I also ordered Banh Cuon which is steamed rice rolls with a pork filling. This could be a light meal on its own but we shared amongst three people.

Service was friendly and quick. The server helping us kept our water and tea topped up and was always smiling.

I also ordered some take home items. Banh Gio (like a giant dumpling made with rice flour) and Flan for dessert.

Ray’s Tips:
Lots of parking in front and back of restaurant.
Cash or Debit accepted for payment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbAda1IEylQ_cTJlPjgkvrN_MDa4VJXXCHxuUn&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Jenn Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqiLL9ZvTs9bElLAJ5ArjOgyozUzBDv3c8c8vRSIbNaw4xv5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best Vietnamese spot in the Langley area! I will drive from out of town just for their Bun Rieu. It’s so packed with flavour. Service is quick and friendly - you’re always greeted with a smile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ6umGOxVtvJmiTSxJ9-CRsncmNV9T8pgZ9ety&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Brandon Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJftMou5k5OJyPtZPxUAjCRk0hWFHK-OghGtQJYsSNzGar9YlLzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wow !!!! Definitely the best Vietnamese restaurant in  Langley and all of the Fraser Valley.  The food acutely tasted authentic, and no added substations . I ate the bun bo hue and my wife had a dish with rice noodles and grilled meat and with so many options on the menu I wanted to try more of their dishes but I'll save that for next time . If you're not afraid to try new things I'd recommend coming here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4b2j81u-7MTAXLhhRtxWaODQIgmnHowrsG8ky&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Matt Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-1cTdGJYtRes_Awu4xeoewyyheOy2LaWq2bb12NtzUz5-2z37=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were referred to try this as we love the Vietnamese food. We were not disappointed one bit…….wow!  Open 7 days a week is a huge win for my wife and I. She could eat here every week. We will be back next week again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvI9uw4WMY4EvnQt0zVJItsHBENmcioylcDyFo&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Jack Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9-Eu6ScoS7SffxHNYrDtow8p7sKhUSwC3v0Kst478iG5GTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered this dish bun mam, $18 and this is what’s in the box. 3/4 of it is noodle and very little meat or seafood. This should be $8. Why am I paying $18 for noodle? Please don’t be cheap and give customers what they pay for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyCUctUbp8LPr3Ys-mo59-Rac_kVUavOYS63wP&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"B. Glenn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD5rLv28RwFRiGVz9W0Gzr1cuZpBy7hoFtK7l1VzG6_pABgXUU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While dining by myself, I enjoyed the fresh & fried version of their spring rolls. Both filling and tasty. Generous portions & Affordable too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtElOiBOjxTDmHfcb8MVELVDjSJWeKZptWtsfQ&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Nikki Torculas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKplzqPQYX01OamjEWTQDH8N0vzbKCYHBlC3ClM-AbJEIeUOcUdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I love this Vietnamese restaurant! Their  food tastes authentic and good portion. The staff is very friendly.  I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVtYu7FzeQMFMXSc6ztd2Y8Nq8gZH-2gbeDEff&fid=0x0:0xea74b02a243bf2e"],"When":"2024-3-10"}]

title: Woorinara Korean Restaurant
descriptions: Family-run restaurant with a warm vibe dishing up hearty portions of bibimbap, hot pots & bulgogi.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food and service.

The dishes were pretty standard, with some standouts and some that could be improved on. The seafood pancake was a let-down: a lot of batter but with not much taste, even with the dip. The bibim naeng myun was super refreshing, great balance of flavours and the noodles were perfectly chewy. We got a small gam ja tang jeon gol and it came with a lot of meat, super yummy. Bi bim bap, chicken and bulgogi were average. Seaweed soup and rice were great! There were many side dishes and it was pretty standard. I’m picky about the potato side dish and this one was below average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF-cUHuZt2eNzl6rcOW_aKGvBcLaxve5As_10Q&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Pilo News","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFId9ZdkkvXmcYiLmTK0bEP9YVRba_LZHmLxWEpHSLdGMlepoT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Woorinara is a delightful culinary gem, offering an authentic taste of Korean cuisine. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for both casual dinners and special occasions. Dishes like the bibimbap and bulgogi are flavorful and beautifully presented, showcasing fresh ingredients. The staff is friendly and attentive, enhancing the dining experience. Prices are reasonable for the quality offered. Overall, Woorinara is a must-visit for anyone craving delicious Korean food in a cozy setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwQEuug2NkBzHsGJXCf10p3-WMzRUR7E5lacyM&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jason “tsoiboieats”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIWaEolTsQNS6_6nXtQ6x5fK1zvKAOLiIJ0oRsu25a3O_nSBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good tasting! Service was quick and easy.  The shop is nice and clean.

Cha-dol Doenjang Jjigae - assorted bean soup stew  got some beef, clams, tofu, veggie
Buglgogi - staandard stuff maeinated beef
Bo Ssam- steam pork belly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuKcbbOSw8nXZaxoo2QCp2U8kUbqWhE0fUN4U_&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Brett Karg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO0aMTCPD4ROW6Sna2Of0gRAu2fnOfk6eU8K7K3X6WO3XovCE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We did a walk in order here (takeout), the staff quickly greeted us and handed us the menu, about 7 minutes after placing our order it was ready! Upon opening the order, we found a very sweet note saying “thank you” with a little heart next to it. This simple little deed made us so happy and honestly boosted our moods so much, the staff are very sweet and the food was delicious. If you haven’t gone here yet, get your a$$ up and go get some sushi from Woorinara :) !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9h31lShVs5hu9ND5afGIMh2F24DuzhIiLkN-6&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"M E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJV42WOHiPv_nzFMOrmSgnA9fyB3Vddp6glkHUZ9acj8oPmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and the wife just went there. We really enjoyed ourselves. The quality, portion and price was amazing. It is very nice to have all those side dishes and tea when you order something. We are both extremely full at the moment and probably are more than we intended to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlos Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWux4U6rOLToeeC3gIE8Jf9_HYneBTroavlw5rmZaFqxZye6HW-Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the opportunity to visit this little establishment around langley downtown area. So glad to see more Korean food alternative on this side of the town.
Bossam - originally I was worried that it might be tasteless and dry based on the look. But it’s actually flavourful and soft. Wrap with cabbage and spicy radish salad. So meaty yet refreshing. U can ask for bean sauce on the side to add extra layer of taste.
Woorinara soup - basically a spicy beef soup. It’s very rich of beef and kimchi flavours. It’s quite spicy though so be aware if u can’t handle the spiciness. Too spicy for me but I really enjoyed it.
Spicy cold noodle - it’s good and refreshing, add some mustard and vinegar to make the taste more vibrant.

Overall i really enjoyed my meal there. It’s a small restaurant so it could take a little longer for food to come out but I don’t think it’s an issue. Come give it a try when ur in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwwnERCRJz-aKvCD0vsLuAfPs0OvY8Ilt39Cfr&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2022-8-7"},{"Name":"Aggarwal Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUjYgjiaTTiySFcNlNlZUyERwjN1An3jqtf4pMul5ngPukOFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Falling in love with Korean food every single time I have it.  Super happy that my friend took me here for lunch.  We ordered two diff items and both came with so many side dish.  I really enjoyed the soup a lot as it had a lot of flavour and perfect amount of spice. I appreciate the complimentary tea that came with our food.

Cozy atmosphere, clean, and friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTOfW5lPOSZ7PP4T3B9OIw3-wY2I9h0O9IdQG-&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Cijaye DePradine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKJSMdwK2iv6Ld8Ky_xytOJ1Y_mb1td87xx6ntW2_ibZUL2I_G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Likely one of only a few of the real reviews on here. As someone else alluded, the others seem paid for. So sad. That was pretty evident upon pick up when it was pretty dead at dinner time, and validated further when we tasted the food.

1 dish was okay, the other was absolutely not what we expected.

We ordered takeout and had a difficult time getting understanding with the order, then when we arrived the order was incorrect.

The Rice Cake and Raman (Robokki) was okay, but the boneless Fried Chicken barely contained chicken. It was breaded with an extremely crispy batter that had the texture of a dried duck (that I give to my dog). Admittedly this might be a different dish or specialty that we simply don't like, so to each their own. But we wanted Korean Fried Chicken and this was not at all the double breaded and fried KFC we are used to at all the other Korean Chicken restaurants.

So sad. Not only did it cost a small fortune for two dishes, we now need to find some other food to eat to feel complete.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkF8Xk8tr_HcqWA-nXAOJUFe41GTbLU9xzyoqf&fid=0x0:0xf66493fc4ceb78b7"],"When":"2024-5-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarwar Alam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdLN8fos8BYd8ys9UvqY2yvLT8sMxEbBPZcHsHAMB94WL2Wf1ywQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food are very good! I specially enjoyed the "egg bonda" as shown in the picture (we can compare it to egg-chop in Bangladesh!). Plus it's a pleasant surprise that all their food are also halal! Finally, the Hyderabadi chai was really heavenly!! Hope to be a regular here from now 😇","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh0dWu-cpNvoZOmJj8uSAAG31cXQKi4vjRLDKs&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Swapnil Kambli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdhhWN0KCMgQl8JxSlRxuwT7oQItuYRCMRTco9Mv-DKvRQLHe2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"- personally, I found the biryanis very mediocre.

- Kodi Kura gravy was watered down to the extent where it barely brought out any flavour, and just felt like it was too saucy.
- chicken seemed to have been boiled and put in sauces, so the overall culinary expertise was way off.
- we paid extra to get the biryani gravy, and found it to be very watery consistency. Same with the raita  (usually such tactics are deployed at establishments that are optimizing food cost/ profitability at the cost of quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxWk6aMlSQw3ttc_dwgFxM1NQ2yK0PSWN0Qqpu&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Nitesh Reddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCDak6iDPAO5NknQbSbO-mmxu1E4cZKGdQYyI-Lk7sGueM41c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment I stepped into “Friends,” I was greeted by the warm and inviting ambiance that promised an unforgettable dining experience. The restaurant’s dedication to authenticity is evident in every dish, making it a true gem for Indian cuisine enthusiasts.
The menu offers a delightful array of flavors, each dish crafted with a blend of traditional spices that transport you straight to the heart of India. The Butter Chicken is a must-try, with its rich, creamy sauce perfectly complementing the tenderly cooked chicken. The Lamb Rogan Josh is another standout, offering a robust flavor that is both comforting and exotic.
The service at “Friends” is impeccable. The staff are not only attentive but also knowledgeable, providing recommendations that enhance the dining experience. Their passion for the cuisine and the culture it represents is contagious.
To top it off, the restaurant maintains an immaculate environment, ensuring a pleasant and hygienic atmosphere that aligns with the high quality of their food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ3fW1xjCVOOst_uriypigvuvqwkvK8u6hDj_L&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Mehmud Iqbal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzdKzd7CEtSWik7PUDkAL2bm7hm1Q3Nn4JMf0vY7aaPod9GjZfWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite a unique biriyani recipe with tasty sides gravies. Fun fact - the number 65 in the name of the recipe came in as it was invented in the year 1965! The service is top notch and I appreciate the sincerity of the server. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDLOsAgraBeRDbFxGGUzm2jLVsbtWPNYMVFx4K&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Akhil Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkeUREjk88_RFA3h3TzuP5Xdg-hAzENDtD4-abKjwoB6cAG573TA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the ambience. I went with my family. We had Hyderabad biriyani after so long and it was worth coming here. Delicious and Reasonable!!
The restaurant staff is friendly and they also customized lime juice for my son.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMacWafclTuFf2mVFanOIU8QQob4vxEky5iqzzJ&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Clara Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu5QyaJnjZZNpUDZRriEXp4ntqPQ7lkWGjk-JYwvl9SHS0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic South Indian cuisine in Langley at a very reasonable price point! The fish pakora is a MUST try, and it comes with a lovely mint chutney sauce. I love that spice levels can be adjusted (our table went with mild!) and they really do cater to all flavour profiles.

We tried the fish pakora, chicken lollipops, chicken curry, and goat biryani. Portions were great for sharing and service was awesome as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO49i9blnhTPN0XJ6mUiCVVUWmYd0bq69Rr0VA&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Howard Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWgoU1Vg6B6QN9_7lEa3Sz3zzeO_TPqKlZfue8fuwvDYyYug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far, the best Indian dish under $20 I ever had.
I gave this place a chance because of its 5 star rating on G maps while having a lot of reviews, which made me a bit suspicious, seeing that it's not that busy. Let me state up front that this place definitely earns a 5/5 on G maps: stands out amongst the crowd of Indian restaurants around just because of one dish.

But before I get to that, let me get the not so great out of the way. The appetizer I had (I think it was the lollipops but I'm not sure — pic attached) was a solid 6.5/10. Spicy, sweet, salty, savory, but not much else going on in terms of flavor. It was somewhat tender though.

Thali was a 7/10. Lentil curry was good but not great. The chicken curry makes up for it though.

Their magnum opus and what keeps me coming back is their Biryani as many of their G maps reviews mention. NINE POINT FIVE out of 10 with sauce even after coming here multiple times but 6.5/10 without sauce. Seriously, use a generous portion of the white sauce; it's included and refills are free.

I would say that Indian spice profiles are high risk, high reward. If you mess up, the food will taste disgusting even to the most unpicky eaters (I'm one of those). But if you nail it, the dish will take you to flavor town and back; and back to flavor town and back. And this restaurant nails it with their Biryani.

In addition, their rice is always perfectly cooked: fluffy and soft, yet the grains are individually separated and not falling apart. It's just a bit dry, but that makes it perfect when paired with curry or sauce (as you should) as it won't get mushy as easily.

The atmosphere is adequate: clean, and there's signs of effort placed into aesthetics. It's definitely not fine dining.

Serving size: huge. Expect to be full after only an entree. They can definitely serve 1.5-2 people.

Summary: definitely come here for Biryani if you want some Indian food without destroying your wallet with those Michelin recommended restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwps4_fdX4YjQlgVqT04e8Of9DFXlLJMVfYrE&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"vishnu viswanathan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkkvVnC4XYZ0OswhnAV1UJR62w5i_u7SRPGRlZgiLQTTivcWcp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered chicken 65 biriyani for a group.
Absolutely loved the Chicken 65 Biryani! The flavors were perfectly balanced, with tender chicken pieces and fragrant rice. It had just the right amount of spice, making each bite a delight. It's definitely a must-try for biryani lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEEYyCeofE5erfsd9EH64fRONY0MUzJphSWraB&fid=0x0:0x97c7d84b6caacd36"],"When":"2024-5-12"}]

title: Fresco Pizza & Wings, Langley Pizza Delivery ,
descriptions: Chill pizzeria open late on weekends turning out creative pies, plus wings with a variety of sauces.

[{"Name":"Phil V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpjl1Y21skGRQNlBmsFhHWXae2yxtJoUrEFk_TE2jl2W71vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Placed my first order to try it out and there won't be another order.

1. Garlic bread is literally hot dog buns with garlic on it

2. Ordered a medium specialty meat pizza and a small Hawaiian. Meat pizza was salty and the toppings on both pizzas looked like the outlet was emptying crumps from the bottom of their topping bags. Lack of toppings looks to be an issue in reviews from others

3. Onion rings were OK","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee Anza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuDvfmcryjwOjwanTQuEN7AbN4_OTGhgnUrvsAvmaC8DYcw52j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"From the 4.4 stars I had high expectations. The pizza was flavourless and a bit too crispy tasting for me. There was barely a chicken on the pizza.

The service and price itself was good, though. Probably wouldn’t get again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naomi Kragh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZLUAmyQRHAJJOvAgnTAMFOCBA9leIrpEFbTsp7S0XsUBWx9lRKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered pizza from here tonight and asked for "no onions please" and there was so many onions we were gagging! My kids wouldn't eat it and I had to make them sandwiches. I was able to get a refund from Skip the Dishes, but I still had to make dinner for my family. Super disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvV0nSOK9ntjo-DS6qgTOcG_Uxr0grss4XX90S&fid=0x0:0x712413cf7e8424ff"],"When":"2020-10-21"},{"Name":"Austin Trowbridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsUREz2RTY3ARDp3baX5cC-SngJjM6wJ39ia9LzwWg5hXzRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this place since i was a kid and just picked up two pizzas today and its still the best pizza i’ve ever had","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx85oVG5334zs78M_Mv_-3dXIb0JRWHUwH7xyXbx09W2qbqZk7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their signature pizzas are always tasty. Gotta try the wings they are KILLER, variety of sauces too. The owner is really cool and open late weekends too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kay Munchinsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJH4RGAMCvDN8Nv7wekwvSRyO_f7Y5lbMkW6WwHKxZNEtGM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect pizza. Everything comes together so nicely. The sauce is delightful, the crust is the perfect crunchy/soft combo, the toppings are fresh. We order here a few times a month and we are never disappointed. The prices are reasonable for such high quality food. It’s not the cheapest around but it’s worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Fish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq_XxjjrFGF3mtuK8GMO7r3RNitbdTQNo4pGriHNJd0uA8z4c-kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza everytime I've ordered. My go to place if I'm feeling a more classic pizza (opposed to emilio's thin crust). Great hand tossed crust and I highly recommend trying the fresco favorite with the sweet corn...so good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Varkki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8GXnT9U3qBOPC7eU9G5Sm4hRBnlhnXEiQ523gizDhz4xT3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this place twice before making a review. Their pizza is fantastic. Very fresh and doesn’t taste like a generic pizza recipe. Had the wings the second time and garlic fingers. Absolutely delicious and the wings were fried perfectly. The person who was at the front(I’m assuming the owner) was very friendly.

Happy to see that there is a great pizza option here in Langley, at very affordable prices.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"PNW Wildlife Watch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsjdGdJ6XqbcDSMhzRNp2TpkDVuwkGF1FUMlfT5h3isfkF9Rob=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quick service with tasty sushi. Miso soup was lacking in flavor and not quite hot enough for my taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJD5CXDf0WbEhJrI1uanttgm9VB_6RDVnCUTTz&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Vida Corvus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqINKLe9b1hKofrDcCLAKEL-6hQV6fdy1HehcGnPVwrDjBQXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for my kids 8th birthday dinner and they ordered the Crazy Roll, which is a deep fried California roll. I also ordered the hot night roll and crunchy spicy tuna roll. Everything was excellent!! We made a reservation and they seated us in a private booth, which 100% added to our experience.

We will absolutely be returning here. The food, service and atmosphere are fantastic","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5L9wY971YD9c2IBUumOMUavrcUIzVmGq8GaP6&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2023-9-25"},{"Name":"Yedam Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLA5bKCx4V5jK-Q0hYbDNsrpG_GfVmBG2OeMnq3vHkNcS6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi for best price. Unreal price in this economy. Their crunch spicy tuna roll is best in the town","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoTYOTauTgXP67IfwxjXaxM7ETKe73iZIqau7w&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"ToothPick Tony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVQ_CiBei8DBX6r81FhuD9joulsmUhtl1gmulEmmowKoxXST0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped here for lunch with my mom and was pleasantly surprised! When I looked in the area the other sushi places had 4.7 and 4.8 stars and this place only had 4.4 but we decided to come anyways because they had great prices on their lunch combos.

The service was excellent I requested to sub out California roll for gyoza without complaint, the food came quickly and while me and my mom were waiting outside they knocked I the window to let us know our food was ready and our server was very friendly!

The atmosphere was very relaxing with some down tempo music on the speakers, they sat us in a private booth that has privacy screens as well as a call button if you need your server.

The food was amazing everything came out perfect! The ton katsu was perfectly fried with an amazing sauce, miso was very flavourful gyoza was soft with a light crunch and we were also served edamame beans while we waited!

Overall 10 out of 10 would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlmkSgst8RwvELizvL8FHvYe1pvb8Ci4SCm6lD&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2023-3-24"},{"Name":"Sandra Braga Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb0zhic3XQWJsDL0A4TJ6SQOyjsvK6E15aalppaOgkYRYZH2K2xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious and super fast!
They carry Sapporo and it is such a nice place to have a conversation over dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn8k6VnC7OnXeOUbCwMeePrmA5y7CznxtBPkpA&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Ivan Shtogrin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIzruMKsCEkLCnMQsS432l4LIrEOtMBbfRB-uT4sGio_bZ0O7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff.  Tasty food.  I really liked that you can sit in the cabin and eat.  At the same time, no one will miss you to communicate and eat.  In the cabin there is a bell when you need to call the waiter, which is very convenient.  Small price list.  We were very pleased and we will definitely return to this restaurant.  And we advise everyone to try their food.  Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5ZpqiUubUxjXussxIXC1eyrxFbNhsqRt_Qg2W&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2021-7-21"},{"Name":"Gabriela Rossi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk07NnPKE6IVgf1sbhh7dmKHLW2dA2a6Wz50WdRnHnHL5Wig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As soon as we arrived they put us at a table and left the menu, they took a long time to come back and pick up the orders. They left a little plastic pot for the shoyu and the chopsticks, nothing else. They didn't serve water or ask what we would like to drink. I asked if they had water or tea and the attendant said yes and never came back. Another attendant showed up to serve a dish that arrived well after and I asked again about the water, she said she was going to check because they were out of glass. A long time later, we had already finished eating, the water appeared. They don't serve small plates for sharing. The food in general was ok, nothing too much. But the service didn't deserve even 1 star.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Centrally located in Langley. I was happy to have been greeted as soon as I walked in. There is a great selection of sushi and wide variety of choices on their lunch menu. Miso soup is included in their combo. The reason I took off 1 star is because I asked for the 2nd and 3rd order to be ready in 15 minutes when my guests arrived and they brought it in minutes also I was not offered a tea refill and had to wait to ask them for it and for water. I look forward to coming back here in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ-IionevXxSHq1hK69jd35Pf-6XedsbP1m6MV&fid=0x0:0xe0d71cbaf9d27022"],"When":"2023-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVZMVi230Ra3hWeAcKIoMpyeLMSWFQ2xkY9PdwY9F1OSbaUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great sushi place.  Food was fresh and tasty.  Friendly service.  Will visit again when in Aldergrove!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzTCOh0PzihBGSg_rDWuI8LgMh7YPvWSt_vrvF&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Nadja Burmatoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP-YEPighB8iaB6Ge-ID1tY71GflN0sb09YQj8M2k-zRWXCgqf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sushi restaurant is absolutely amazing! The food is top-notch, with incredible quality that stands out even among the best sushi I’ve had around the world. The flavors are fresh and delicious, making every bite a delight.

The staff and owners are fantastic. Even though there have been changes in ownership, the quality has remained consistently high. The team is super friendly and attentive, ensuring a wonderful dining experience every time.

I can’t recommend this place enough. Whether you’re a sushi aficionado or just looking for a great meal, this is the spot to visit. I’ll definitely be coming back again and again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dawn Petras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGvKUD4J1CH5PwPcCeW8yV0QmQs98tEoraxrTkUspYovG0Qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Impressive! Fast service even on a Saturday night, and staff were very pleasant when I picked up our takeout order. Food was excellent, large portions and reasonably priced! Awesome chicken tempura, Agedashi tofu, Crazy Girl roll,  mixed tempura, tempura udon bowl. Will definitely go there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zachary Bay and Jacqueline Bay Mortgage Brokers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKHzAYRmGe3PtU6SGBLOKn7z5Jf7I2mF-Di7Z9zLiI5KxrWk5C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great Sushi experience here. The atmosphere is nice, service is great, and the sushi is fantastic. They have some great lunch combos definitely worth a try, as well as some very reasonably priced platters. I highly recommend this sushi restaurant. From your local Mortgage Broker Foodie","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, we had a really happy time here! We went in for late lunch which no customers in the restaurant but they were busy with take out. Got warm welcome along with fast and friendly service made us so happy. The foods were really delicious with fresh ingredients! Reasonable price with perfect portion. My daughters made a bit of mess on the floor by accident which normally i tidy up before we leave. I never leave any mess wherever we go because I used to work in the restaurant so i know what I should do to make them happy to welcome we back. He saw and came to clean the floor, thank you again! Anyway, we cleaned everything after ourselves. So can't wait to go back to try more because many things that I never tried before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_vRI61AUtLc5Bu1eh3DaFHNadFxATupfu973X&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2023-2-19"},{"Name":"Kate Snow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPCjE5BkQiytaMbxjVpZ5vTBKSSzY4cn6MV-sEdQDQ5piCWZ73Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch special was delicious and we also had teriyaki tofu. All very tasty, nice portions and quick friendly service. Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIJHbHKQKjhtfSshrGulLS5K5YqC_Ko7fs994Q&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"james C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcO3h6TuKOSwOtsHvIzzHMtZ5I5xM0yqZ7rhWl4TzLVMBkaXe9og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute gem, great service fish quality is extremely good and a very diverse menu. Great pricing and really impressed with the sear quality on some of the fish I tried like the unagi and Ika. One of my regular new go to sushi bars and just a short drive across the border.  Soo is amazing wonderful server and very fun and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG9DRXB-wA9K01LJ5sECezrE5Z6jPv7lYbBAP2&fid=0x0:0xf9ae362f4bc20624"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Sharon Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEiQdhVGKuiRx9GE3sfld5Qj0ICZz_zuQ8FvE8IvVrBqGM6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant serves the BEST Japanese cuisine I have ever had.  And trust me, I have had a lot over the years.  The food is awesome!   It is fresh  full of flavour and beautifully presented.  We have eaten there several times and keep going back because of the delicious food, you are NEVER  disappointed in your choice, the flavourful dishes, great selection of dishes to try,  and the pleasant, comfortable atmosphere.  The staff are all wonderful!  It is a relaxing atmosphere and you feel very welcome,  ot just another customer.  And did I mention the portions?  Large portions very reasonably priced.  So come hungry!  They are located right in downtown Aldergrove.  Don't miss trying  this culinary delight!  It is our FAVORITE JAPANESE RESTAURANT.   I am sure it will become yours too.","Images":null,"When":""}]
