user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shez Nur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNMeNokGGhBUAZIr69dHUmDoQ-dYiukEbTF3m0RcDe1NxGQgk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous food, great atmosphere and great service by far this is the best Vietnamese restaurant in Vancouver.
Our server Jasmeen did a great job. I highly recommend. 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpVfm1lUGXicsUz5AiOXokh9FALIM3JOdwAvXX&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food at this restaurant was delightful and the people that worked there was incredible! I ordered a vermicelli chicken bowl with fish sauce and my husband ordered lemon grass chicken rice plate. There was so much flavour and they really hooked up the chicken for our dishes ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrWXpxw6n6mMmf75s_lcKJn6t-E---Lgn_-CBE&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"T K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjs_8XvvkzBMG-1HmgIjTdYzywRXtx1m_K9OxV4qzE99dY0-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You gotta eat here!!! Omg delicious signature seafood pho. ORDER THE SIGNATURE PHO. My seafood pho was over the top yummy for your tummy. Come on a rainy night and it will make the soup taste even better. Jasmin our server was fabulous. Sorry for the picture … I couldn’t wait to eat my soup. But you get the picture (😂) no pun intended.
PS - try their spring rolls!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfTXkf7eqC_VtuuorZCQW_yJ6RXxM-kg48vR0&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty decent for the foods, nothing special for me. I can say because I've been tried a lot of Vietnamese restaurants. My first time here but second time for my husband and stepdaughter who ordered seafoods noodle last time and complained that too much noodle and too little seafood so she ordered extra seafood this time. I ordered spicy seafood which didn't asked for extra seafood and my stepdaughter was right about it. Had only one server who did everything so can't complain because she was pretty busy. I like the restaurant to be clean and organized so we sat right inside which a lot of stuffs pile up next to us so would be nice for them to organize to make the area look nice, not messy and dusty So 3.5 stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT5ye0A1ikDH0UC_7zlwu2x-e_oH2gHveK-kFZ&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2023-2-12"},{"Name":"Se Rene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJMVjPO3YMLKyt6X6JQQ7SAO_Q6lAbeE4d3eRMimE_p0DiRzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really appreciated that this restaurant serves tea (instead of cold water and making you pay extra for basic tea).

Dishes were simple but flavourful. I was pleasantly surprised that the fish sauce and other sauce accompaniments to the dishes were WELL BALANCED in taste (not sugar bombs).

Atmosphere was nice & easy-going.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND9RcORcQMD6Rl2mwGknH7-SrexPHGjZDW3et8&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"Naomi Fazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8X_K9zqJBscJ5-zT635d-5KkttndwKSf6nQ7WUK14aNp8eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"3.5 - Randomly stopped by this spot and was impressed. The beef ball broth was actually really flavourful and not oily. I also ordered the veggie spring rolls which were also good and a bowl of white rice. Will be back to try more dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCg29g3IrsXuJNQJKLirpsjNnPcHUUKySlhdjZ&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2022-5-23"},{"Name":"Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXhuzY9EtR995iv_JzHNxVgZDDRgXt0WC3JFvr8EOcJVa9t_1N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho Tran is my go to Vietnamese place in the Langley region.

The food is good, the service is excellent and consistent.

Pho Tran is a family business not a franchise. In December they even ran a customer appreciation discount for the month.

It isn’t a fancy restaurant however none of the best Vietnamese places are. I go here time and time again when I am in the region. It is even comparable to the Richmond restaurants which I usually eat at.

Pictures attached.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHTSpuMg0u6lhOMaNOKYNhLsFSHWsPSKoaMOPs&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2023-6-20"},{"Name":"Cassandra Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwc-16-1MJ_LmQ7eq3bs-alapEfhCMPc7TLsuKBsQdOwzApxUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time experience here was beyond great. The food was phenomenal, the staff were friendly and the service was fast and efficient. 100% would recommend and will return to this establishment again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGW1P8kHo_FgmtXkwfcH9dl17eTplZlhq5UJZ_&fid=0x0:0xc35c95ebafdc70cd"],"When":"2023-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anmol Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIqs-DEEam06WIATuIgQ4_uYHyxJBjj_4IGyu-BtbI9QBaxYMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Current: I use to like this place as a quick bite but its gone down hill. For what I'm paying, the portion has been reduced in half (literally half of what is seen in the picture from 2 months ago) in the mixed donair plate and it isn't fresh! The food today was just barely warm and not hot. The meat was dry and clearly just kept on the "hot" table prepped from hours before. This is the 2nd time in a row now.

Salad dressing taste like the krafts italian dressing (quite sure thats that it is) - was never found of it to be honest but it did the job.

Wouldn't recommend coming here anymore! Much better donair/shawarma places in Langley and Abbotsford.

This review and picture was from 2 months ago: So glad this opened up in our area! Their food is amazing! The chicken is seasoned to perfection and the hummus is one of my favorites as it's not the typical plain old hummus with just tahini,  salt and minimal garlic like most. I like ordering a mix with lamb and chicken - best combo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdEaFrqS2Oo4jKs4pQFv42p9cZCYMc374_HY_g&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2023-9-12"},{"Name":"Parteek Maroke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf8LqPmR5qVUgiNSIY42f1zPZ0VekkYkyxhK_5WKoqNAjgfa6N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a work event and ordered catering from Hashtag Donair, and it banged. Everything that was ordered was delicious and was loved by everyone there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN59c-xI2jO6944ezvzlW5gpgl39mLALYJkZePy&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered: Donair loaded poutine (Lamb, fries, cheese curds, garlic sauce and taziki sauces) they offer hotsauce but im not a fan of spicy

I've been to all three Hashtag donair locations and they're all fantastic.

This one just opened last Friday and I finally got to go today. So happy to have one close to home! I hadn't had a donair poutine in a hot minute.

The staff were super friendly and personable. Fries cooked fresh from frozen. Ingredients taste amazing as always.

Definitely the food I needed tonight.

Also, they give you a fabric bag with your order.
If I could give more stars I would!!

PROTIP: You can reheat leftovers in a frying pan with a little oil.

EDIT (cause I can't review twice):
Went for a second time today and ordered the loaded Donair fries with lamb, feta, garlic sauce, taziki, cucumber, tomatoes and lettuce.

THE BOMB DOT COM my friends. $15 🙏
Sorry for bad photo, had to eat is asap as I was soooo hungry. Well worth it. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrbSRc-cYSEKzwcnRFpHLEFP7vQbAgTm9Lqjsf&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"sukh kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbJgTPpAmZHVzQ46ye3J8LwL5TBJovZKofq4lqL4ZjNO2DqYOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered hawaiian donair for take out and it was Amazing. Definitely coming back to try more. I recommend this place to others for tasty donairs.☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8fhzaVuDO4jV-muk1dQ3EMIGKFxH9DN7wd5h1&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Jason V.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBXDpyZaxkjHFTndYd2VHF2DVpGqiU6kpV9CA_8J-sqmIRq1InBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent food. Reasonable price. Service was decent although ordering was a little confusing and wasn’t what we expected. But worth the trip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzngRWbgson5EbvmU8JQY3sJu6bgl1wtw8NnVGV9ipbUgZMNhR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The donairs here are so good! I usually get the Greek chicken donair with no olives, and their “sloppy fries” with tzatziki.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charissa Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXksrH5todun7kxHpj2scssptCGpR3TS4axJA5Ri7r8wKxeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and friendly service.  Our first time to this location and we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3yo0e456KZ-bKaMvWxjxfS1g5AdRLDCIN3VDH&fid=0x0:0x2b01e7e8e1b2986a"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Daniel Sproston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG4vFSFnutzVXL3nHxra1xZDmIJiLMzYOl55-nkmfV6o7tgIXy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just ordered from skip the dishes and I must say that the food was very good.I had the Super beef donair and the wife had the loaded rice bowl with chicken,also had fries and gravy!!
Thanks for the new find.. food was great!! We will be back again!
Best Regards our happy stomachs!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ronald Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1AA0COaI7rivDW2feSPCNyXG0VQ-phrOsoMTKHPA9vE24xGU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service with great food! Lots of options to choose from. Always nice to come here. Pleasant dining experience always!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ3VBFY09lQcBV6uZgveEpGpysbRMb0_5J3CjE&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Austin Fedrau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBhJi_X1ADNHaw873MP9NTeH11BUo4xxZwo2tVnoVJSN7ERbeR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to white spot during our lunch break when we were working. Hands-down, the best lunch break of the year! The food was astonishing, as always, as well as the service was beyond compare! Our waitress, Fatima, deserves a raise, and a promotion. She was outstanding. She was very friendly and interactive, and taught us that to eat at white spot you had to be awake and sitting down. Highly recommend her as your waitress at white spot. we got a dessert on the house which was clean and very good. All in all just a wrap this review up, we had on exquisite time at White spot Aldergrove, highly recommend attending, you will not be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOz1FkCFR6K2Pj3-mhdASDw5h8C9WJ_ppnuDRN&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Pare de Pensar Pobre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0E-G6nVkWoWdyIf2H0c81tlIO1UN1nw_M5gDJwit-nsPI04hA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, fair prices, great happy hour time (2-5pm), & 8pm-late) every day. Best wings and onion rings that I’ve eaten in Canada. So delicious that I didn’t have chance to take photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsUntwxAoI6rJ9jhKmk5oAVdq4rXGiJdqQdq-X&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"David & Patti Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCrwxnBL2_VqJnEgLg0JtK_fNSDOCo9bnsDqabFska_Kpl4DON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were four couples with various needs including one wheelchair. The staff accommodated us nicely and set us up in a back room with a fire place. Our server had fresh coffees in front of us (both regular and decaf). Soon our orders were taken and we sat and chatted. There were several TV screens showing the ball game. It actually took quite a while to get the food to the table, but I was impressed that they all arrived at about the same time and all were hot off the grill. I went with the Legendary Burger as it is their signature. I recommend it. We also ordered variations of breakfast and brunch that looked tasty. We had to wait a bit for a refill of coffee only because they were making a nice fresh pot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObt48Gx-QZESr2i7GDDeuAlQmvLC5MAkphMBUU&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"David Juras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmTuNiSSXEtYWd7WU1cSJaKv3adp1TPVJwNjnDgIiiGZ4sgk8vVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had lunch at White Spot in Aldergrove, and it was a nice experience. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was just as expected for a White Spot — casual, welcoming, and relaxed.

Our server, Anna, was absolutely fantastic. She was friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal. Her great service really added to the overall experience.

As for the food, it was delicious. Everything was flavorful and cooked just right, making for a satisfying meal. Overall, it was a lovely lunch, and I’d recommend this location for a great dining experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DoctorPepper0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRsOKJNw6wFTuC10khJg9LT3Z_fAKKPiQP5gav4l9bh2oaKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing dinner. My wife and I met at this White Spot working as hosts 10 years ago, and we were lucky enough to bring our baby to get her first Pirate Pak. It was amazing, and it was also nice to see how great and well kept this restaurant still is 7 years later. Service was great and we were even lucky enough to run into some old friends from our serving days. (Also, the Chipotle is still the greatest sauce at any restaurant)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzOX5c33LZWMpEeAR8WRiWJ4hsrgR4B5PbTw5x&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Brian Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWU1UtiVhrA3MqUkqG6HvwLdPfMoRYgYmpagV4AO4QNNsrN5VIx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had the pot roast, 2 tiny pieces of roast on a tiny scoop of potatoes in small Yorkshire, tasted good, portions are meant for seniors, 😒 and the horseradish arrived after I completed meal, Iam still hungry thinking about Mc ds","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVHgrJUsZyS9y-iCc-z2_e9i_uY_x3GfLF7Wlv&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"David Large","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEl1keGTx9sV65ZdqCt2FFQUPQ5pgkCuE-qdyAWQmUgsmY2l8H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing came in for lunch sat on the patio enjoyed an amazing burger with my brother! Waitress was very friendly and professional outstanding come in check it out !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvCfVs6eGtmMKJHqQHrEdZogv9tBqap8KeVQ4z&fid=0x0:0xaa38658f04d8a008"],"When":"2023-8-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Art Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKREvj9N5sCAlhMaL2ttZWAoa_ePfZEBayeT_zJsd4z-lgakYx7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The original owners were awesome. They were friendly people. They knew how to serve you when I read reviews that people are giving this place a five star restaurant. I think you need your heads examine we ordered skewers of chicken. They were so dry. They’re like they’re old not one person in that place smiled. The lady that served us was constantly on her telephone. It was like they could not wait that we got out of there so we felt very unwelcome. So people take it from me that we visit a lot of Japanese restaurants. They are right at the bottom don’t go there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never been here so I decided to indulge and order a variety of things. Let me tell you how everything I ordered tasted amazing and had a lot of flavour. I ordered gyoza, miso soup, Gomae, ichiban roll, caterpillar roll, yam roll and beef teriyaki cone. They had my order ready in 20 minutes and when I went to pick up the food I didn’t have to wait ☺️ I’m a super happy customer and will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0FsApmm1ZZVKCJ547zo4Ys4jATgiFr79os34C&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small sushi place next to/attached to a gas station.

Relatively fast sit in service (only one single table left available) (were also filling take out orders while hosting an almost full house)

Went alone to dine-in, ordered:
- Philadelphia Roll
- Chicken Karage
- Rice
- Miso soup

Total was under $25 before tip.

Friendly, welcoming and kind service.
Food tasted surprisingly good and fresh.
Miso soup tasted a bit funny but otherwise pleased!

Also very easily asked for no wasabi no ginger and was pleased to have that fulfilled as well as the sushi didn't have any residual of those flavors either.

Edit: I've gone here many times in the 3 years I've lived in the area. They're fast and reliable. Food is always on point. (Take out)

Edit: September 2024, rainbow roll, chicken teriyaki roll.
I don't usually like tuna. With this rainbow roll i didn't even notice there was tuna at first.
Not usually a fan of chicken but this teriyaki chicken roll was better than anticipated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5CWkEKlnFhhGXYdjHInJ2AnCqYTRPW1sUfU86&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2023-5-12"},{"Name":"Culinary Slut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxK_lkCU4fd_RQlg9nZ4gMHwzV5x-r0tALs-GITthQjkvDASA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A nice spot for inexpensive Japanese food. It’s not great, but it’s not bad. Food is priced fairly for the quality.  Good middle-of-the-road fish is used in the sushi, but the rice was a touch stale. The karaage had a nice spicy kick in the sauce. We enjoyed the tempura. The Goma-ae (spinach with peanut sauce) was just okay.  We wouldn’t go out of our way to dine here, but if you’re in the neighbourhood it’s an acceptable option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA8QsW0Cu7HVpc_4SDZtVey6-0Y-smgFsKRVjL&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2022-10-28"},{"Name":"Parvesh Raju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyirvXqL3ged_ilNdZ3FcZC6U-NlUwPlR7ghVuaYQdqNcpOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgusting food. The sushi roll had stale rice and brown avocados. Disgusting. I called the restaurant to inform them of the quality but they weren’t interested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsySXPr7qdPZWT1uNtOIgGyl9PipLESSSqmaLw&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"West Coast Mini Dachshunds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxuq6syWw9T9CsBhKm71Kjz1HXIj0GLsrwdCbSrdk3e1K1EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A pleasant sushi joint.  Their prices are great.  The chopped scallop roll was great, lots of eggs in there.
The lion king Roll was nice.  Pretty much a dynamite roll with chopped scallops on top with spicy mayo dressing.
As you can see, I enjoy scallops and ebi.

Overall, a good bang for the buck.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwiu97IgWXDOJO_Bs2XWBU4iaCSzqjq17Kr-Og&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2022-12-23"},{"Name":"Ryan Hamman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfODq72KSeDrZd3H6EycvxaLRTq0HOQffqMFV_PiWZtRyCRWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant area is small but it was nice and clean inside. The service was excellent. The food however, tasted exactly how you would imagine “gas station sushi” to taste… Our rolls were slightly cold but mostly room temperature and the avocado had  looked like it’d browned due to air exposure. Not appealing. I ate as much as I could salvage.  The Sunomono was ok. The tempura was good! I believe the prices are a little high for a no frills restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmwCMs_Lt4_xZpH4cDTTRJfkK4hqoHRMm91e_a&fid=0x0:0x57e56aeaf53a4080"],"When":"2023-6-13"},{"Name":"nick tassone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK04y85EYj4Uf_FEbLmpvugnJmMrJ7CYNn3YcwnQ2aUmydFlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered sashimi that was paper thin. Thanks for the edamame Beans that were free I guess since order was 130 dollars. Asked for wasabi extra on the side and they said it was extra. Never heard of anyone ever charging extra for something that comes with the food. Hope they enjoyed the money because now I will never go back there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wes Jamison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlloxxuqMRq-c6n85oTKnEJQjSJoGGxrSOU4RCcUpC7I_nkACu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out for lunch after shopping. Good menu, reasonable prices at 13 bucks. This is an older restaurant that was taken over a few years back and its improved. The veggies were hot and crisp as were the prawns in combo 4. The owner said he personally shops for the vegetables every day. We will be back.  See my pic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKhMAqov2nhgvU8-2Zkd3Qbzazz1s4HQAnAwCr&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average sized portions, prices were high, food was average, service was great. Food was ready in a decent amount of time. About 30 minutes for takeout. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They had a few people waiting around dinner time.

The chow mein was average, the barbecue pork fried rice was great and full of flavor but had an insane amount of peas, the almond chicken was good with an unusual twist, they sprinkle sugar on top, in all my years of ordering Chinese food no one else has done that. They blend the sugar with the crushed almonds for the topping. It reminds me of the sugary coating on donuts. It actually tasted pretty good.

I was not a fan of the honey garlic pork. My usual place in Surrey puts on a generous coating of sauce leaving a pool of sauce in the bottom of the container. They're all sticky and dripping with flavor and you can spoon the excess sauce in the container over the food on your plate. But the honey garlic pork at this place was almost dry. I couldn't taste the honey or garlic at all.

I also wasn't a fan of the size of the pork pieces in the honey garlic pork. For me the smaller the better. I like the nice crispy ones. The pork chunks here were very large. I got a few super long ones the size of chicken strips. They should be diced much smaller. The pieces were so large it just wasn't appetizing. The chunks look like chicken wings.

That spring rolls I guess are hit and miss. We ordered two. One was perfect nice and crispy and the other one was completely soggy. I don't know what happened there.

Overall I think their prices are just a bit too high for what you're getting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcUIp0jf3EaOI6OSoFptclS72dZDw-s3hAd1dx&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2022-6-28"},{"Name":"Liuyi anne Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPeMXbzK_zxfQcTdoZbLil-2cY-Ve-4rCHrHE9xb_WljZHc6I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to this place and the people were so kind to me the food was great I got the BBQ pork fried rice it has so much flavor and it was just so delicious I also had the egg rolls and they weren't too greasy which is great and they tasted awesome I totally recommend this to others","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Happy Travels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8gwB52_vB4Z1eS3qVA02GQnIsvYEL83tvsPSkH0k1kn-TBwEJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered here first time in along time. The vegetable and chicken dish tasted like canned veg,  chowmein looked like scissors was taken to it, sweet sour pork was chewy. The beef was beef and a tonne of onions? And top it off no fortune cookies  a tiny bag of cashews?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Third","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIksvYLJq_Nv4hyDZmteKRmFuj8Ld9KnSOAi8WO_0oUSvcU5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went to pick up my food and the lady at the desk said my food would be out shortly. Immediately after food was brought out and placed on the counter. She didn’t say anything but did look at it. Then 4 other customers came in over the next 7 minutes and they would go into the back and grab their food and bring it out to them. After 7 minutes of my food sitting on the counter they said “your food is ready!” When asked why it was the only one left on the counter they just said “have a good day”.  This was clearly on purpose as it was a very fake interaction. Terrible customer service. Food was alright.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"teresa campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw0U_RhegUVAknkm9hUzIAniWfrWrF88GbzSEQGyV-DtCZvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place was horrible. Years ago it used to be dragon Fort and it was so good. Well now that it’s dragon house it’s a big no. Portions are small. Expensive. Disgusting. Food tastes like it was sitting out and reheated. One dish we ordered was deep fried wontons. I have had them many places and never seen like this. Was all batter and the supposedly “wonton” was the smaller then my pinky nail, a spec. I called and asked if they would exchange the dish or issue a store credit. They told me it was a 10 year recipe and would do nothing about it. They were very rude. Don’t eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG1QExtfMhunkn6DAwyRl3SOQYGno-y_T8MLOD&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2022-7-26"},{"Name":"Damian De Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyC4cQ6ZYwXgtf_2CSqx1WcQ7VvXuw9rfGPAdmiFlCXf5cmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a beef fried rice take out. They prepared it less than two minutes. It got Hardly any meat or vegetable on it. No flavor at-all. Waste of money.
Highly dissatisfied. No more Chinese food from Aldergrove  again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8WSbcVVwKmLjquUwN6SAi5eC4qKeO9aXTitV_&fid=0x0:0xc33fb80dba01832d"],"When":"2023-4-20"},{"Name":"Ronny Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkyEJ77YlpYtNT5dUPYr4jYYYDONLf4Xxs9JUwKEASZI7OQo8e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was really good, colorful and vibrant. Meat was real not some processed stuff some restaurants push off onto you this was real authentic Chinese food, reminds me of the one my mom used to make. 10/10 also, very good with children. Staff was very accommodating. Thankyou!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jay Trinca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6xYhqAOfxjRzPh9l3XT62ds3D8DImj9Jcn_UZ1Ze8_eTkXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First off. The staff is lovely. They're always nice and welcoming. I once frequented this place 4-5 days a week for their fair prices. Infact I loved this place and felt I never needed to bring a lunch to work. 5 dollars for a pre-made bread sandwich just last year. The same bread sandwich(many varieties) are now $9. I get the economy pushes prices but ill be back to making lunches again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Bridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxGZq6jQto_wvYCkfqzlC0Vib6_uZ1CjzvUJnHaKx1SxJIYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried a cinnamon bun from Firehouse Cafe and it was excellent! Sweet, warm, and lots of icing. I will definitely try more from them and I would recommend you give them a try!

Their Sandwiches and brownies are also excellent. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxT5crfScPCvkO_ZhQltQE5Sr5z4E1469XPA3s&fid=0x0:0xbfd9f70b2231a212"],"When":"2023-2-24"},{"Name":"Jason R. Cummings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeJ31fMrZTYCW3jao-64EwjkyZoizf5bzU6-AVqKzFj_36RnM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem of a cozy cafe and community operation!  The staff (all volunteers) were delightful to meet. Baked goods looked amazing and are all made on site. Next time i will come for the $7 hot breakfast.

The Americano was delicious!  Not all coffee shops get Americanos right.  They did!

I was given an orientation to the meals on wheels program of 300 made in house meals delivered daily to Aldergrove and Langley residents.  They sell containers of frozen soups made on site for $5, and frozen meals $9.

And, The space to sit in is lovely","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brayden Hilbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-HqGp9Mmulp3tCtregm-5Syt0OuSieeBNpytdHS_AXPaNSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's hard to find places like this these days! The prices are unheard of, food is amazing, everyone is so friendly and it's a really nice Cafe to sit and enjoy your meals in. Definitely come check this place out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpdWdwSsRHLUbyrF4Vytj6Xf_tQrR0o9iXBICD1k_VuCVXUdh_WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is amazing! Meals on Wheels is run out of here. All profits I believe will go to supporting Meals on Wheels and most of the people that work here are volunteers! They are very kind and lovely people with kind hearts 💕 Also they have a food bank once a week on Thursdays but please check before you go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt3U9kJ4EVrfdkxVMMX9qNHf1S1HM2pSgdSPpH&fid=0x0:0xbfd9f70b2231a212"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Lori N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmtMtkjNfkcOZjUstSIaPewdazX3LaSbWZ-fPdp_MqWNPH1dsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is perfect for meeting up with a friend to have coffee or hot chocolate and a treat. I tried a hot chocolate and cinnamon bun and they were both delicious! They also have sandwiches and soups, as well as a fridge with soups that you can purchase and take home with you. The staff were super friendly and you can't beat the prices. I will absolutely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1xp_oNVlzsgoA-brCzRL0I0NOjVzgsSGHMBWS&fid=0x0:0xbfd9f70b2231a212"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Babs Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZhEcX__fOasawWraEsXKFOxPAu13IqEilgu1jdyBhz1126mF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful baked goods , hearty big sandwiches, and tasty meals at very reasonable prices. Nice environment.  Come by Mwals on Wheels Langley volunteers. Check it out M-F 9-2.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsW6auhWOj2lADkUJrGuRJI5lGDMuRwRNuJ-b5P6rjeEhx2c5f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome pastries!!!
The cinnamon rolls are the best. Good and friendly service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Upasana Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHFvebGTEjsWdA3Rawh2ja5vLonvJTP-FsuufqFwoeesxvLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
I recently visited Chicko Chicken Aldergrove, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience! They serve the freshest chicken and cook it immediately upon order, ensuring that every bite is super juicy and crispy. The dedication to quality is evident in every piece of chicken they serve. The flavors are outstanding, and the texture is perfect—crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. The staff is friendly and efficient, making the entire dining experience even better. If you're looking for delicious, freshly cooked chicken, Chicko Chicken Aldergrove is the place to go! 🤍✨","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxMCePZFz2PcZTvOdWgM4GMHk8fsmJU2r-7cfCz1GF8gXb4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 that was amazing
Chicken was hot and fresh even at 9:15pm, so shout out to Mehak in kitchen.
Gitansh took our order and he has some of the best customer service skills I’ve seen in a while, and I’ve trained fast food crew for almost five years now. Outstanding service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SorrelCritter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJevXn8zwl51aYOqoNQe3SpLC5RangJ4KHJn7sVXt95mTUs5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Found out their secret they use frozen chicken sometimes, because I saw it sitting there already cooked and they put it into the deep fryer. Chicken that has already been deep-fried has a dark golden brown color, which was exactly what this was. I also saw them drop food onto the counter (counter looked rather dirty) and just put it into somebody’s order without discarding the piece that fell.
I ended up  ill and threw up most of the night. I will never eat here again. Not as long as they keep up with the non existent health practices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Therealsanosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS_BNs1oUjiNm3tLqKatEP5Qwdib2G6qba7nTIKk02QMzTCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to be good but did owner change? All I got in my box is just batter. Crumbs. Used to be lots of actual chicken meat pieces. Hope I’m just unlucky this time. New Owners please don’t let this place down. It was such a highlight to Aldergrove!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNPFNQyCUqtAk1fKL1JoWgn8ihsnAJdgwxNXim&fid=0x0:0xbceb7a36f13a60f5"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Taylor Munroe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfAH8WY8qWubkYvoF71gc9NY2dMLcgf5lv3KbMZqeXAAwyp_eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"With a craving for chicken and a desire to try something new this definitely fit the bill. Easy to find, lots of parking, and clear menus for ordering.

I like the fact they don't have dozens of options - there are a few varieties and that's it. Ordered a half & half pack, which ended up being quite a lot of chicken. It took a few minutes (they made it fresh) but was well worth the wait. Deliciously crunchy, but not greasy.

Restaurants have gradually been raising prices while dropping quality and shrinking portions. It was pleasantly surprising to find such good portions (it is $27 for one box so not exactly cheap but you don't feel scammed).

Worth going back to try more flavors next time.

The only issue I had was with young (under 8) kids in the dining area the staff decided to blast 'In and Out' by Lud Foe (a heavily explicit, uncensored rap song). The music was also beyond loud for a restaurant. It seemed quite out of touch and actually quite offensive, but I'll assume it was one person being unaware and hopefully not the norm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb9AHAGNBDACt6EExzv1yGpxJnBWXDZKjRqD_D&fid=0x0:0xbceb7a36f13a60f5"],"When":"2023-6-4"},{"Name":"gregory poirier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK4iTnygveNDyqdBIiIWQ3rBKcFh9QJ64iwQLJ_B_2juzm93k1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chickos has been our go to when we are craving fried chicken for a while. They are super consistent and always fresh.  We love thier soy garlic, order some chives on the side and enjoy!  It took less then 5 minutes for our order to be ready.  And stayed nice after 20 minutes of driving home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roxane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnYq6FpOjiy74mU6OFTo8LZltsrOnT2KWUZJrp6XQomQtD1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ever since Mother and son left the food hasn't been the same unfortunately. No crispy thick breading and found skin on our order. I hope it improves like it was before.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jak 251","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULRmfDkzrFf-N2A7ojNm3_oHU1EESAM3HbvXQBakALlJWeU2mJ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"SO GOOD! The Chicken is so crispy the portions are huge! This is the split order and 2 orders of Fries! The Fries are unreal! Everything was so fresh! Order ahead for pick up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqmrOsdicFe8hBXEqgOMQrbWj5lvO1bzbo8EHs&fid=0x0:0xbceb7a36f13a60f5"],"When":"2022-2-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvePfh29sdRgf0mTUfJXf4ltd9IP8MiF82BDkjzhbShMUOjZgG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great option for local well priced indian food. Chicken is tender, and made with a decent amount of care and attention. Comes with rice included too. Not a sit-in restaurant. You get lots of naan even when you order just 1 because a huge nana is cut into 4. Value is A+","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS9fWBmh8gVuTPb35rsuBHQ2K3nOMZ-jOfw57f&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Karan Creation","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0lTXfxL1ZhKAZyMvdkg7THq0xxAgLUhWetg3_oir8OtEVd1E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're craving authentic Indian cuisine, Mother India Caters is a hidden gem that won't disappoint. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with the warm, inviting aromas of spices and herbs that are the heart of Indian cooking. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it feel like home.

The menu offers a wide variety of dishes, from classic butter chicken to vegetarian delights like palak paneer and dal makhani. Each dish is rich in flavor, perfectly spiced, and beautifully presented. The naan and biryani are standouts, with the right balance of texture and taste.

One of the best aspects of Mother India Caters is its attentive and friendly service. The staff is eager to explain dishes and accommodate dietary preferences, ensuring a pleasant dining experience for everyone.

Whether you're hosting a party or just in the mood for a satisfying meal, Mother India Caters delivers top-notch food and service. Highly recommended for those who love traditional Indian flavors and a warm dining atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPGjKHp4ZTtWvH2ArlDO1Qt-rMG2Vvin8xgyOE&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Gaz Virk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkH7NkkMgpsiOk3d7oJjy91ikp4CbXdxsk61JXx5zq9M4WIV7K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""Absolutely delightful! The English-style fish & chips at Mother India Caterers transported me back to my incredible visit to England, where I first fell in love with this dish. The crispy, golden batter encasing the tender, flaky fish, paired with the perfectly cooked, fluffy chips- it was a match made in heaven!

The flavors were spot on, with just the right amount of salt and vinegar. It was like taking a bite of nostalgia, and I couldn't get enough. The portion was generous, and the service was top-notch.

If you're a fan of authentic English-style fish & chips, look no further. 'Deep'- chef from Edinburgh, the vibrant capital city of Scotland has nailed it, and I'll be back for more. 5 stars, without a doubt!

P.S. - If you're a fan of fish & chips, do try it with a side of mushy peas/gravy, just like they do in England. It's a game-changer!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTHcclRKVJvK2ShaVlBTzSH-mMq5uP8nn6jXfc&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"chester dixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4OVZM3iowg7vbxhfXh8fDk9tX1DqAZ9B8r8t6fbCpZgl4OLP4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want flavorful, spicy, Indian food, with portion sizes that are HUGE, this place is it. Amazing. So glad they opened up in the neighborhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOexm8_kbgHmb_ITZC6az8AAC93Nm4VozHOB2vD&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Navdeep Grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLN9A-Uiz6dNgbO34dkvvDa5QhjET0ya7RNbMZlWuC6KX6G2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I order food for our small birthday party gathering, and food found out to be delicious like always, I highly recommend this restaurant.
kheer was super delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoiz5rR5he5guj9lUbAjmsUoFGvgCK0gG5W3wt&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"kiran nagra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBcRWVeaWl-mBAayDJdMFBec-TdipfvbbeofOiEp-7zq3x_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the fish pakora it tasted so good and fresh! And I had the paneer pyaza very good, my fiance got the butter chicken and it was soo good not like the others that tasted like tomatoe soup this was very creamy and authentic! We also got garlic Naan and the stuffed Naan delicious! And samosas are good too!  And the owner was also very nice!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Inder Thind","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_VS7C2CkE8gawqBmzJtNGA7FQoBWvngyqNJs5fmskZ6DNrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Your fish pakora was delicious what a great Indian food. No food colour and original taste. Masala Chai tea best ever. Must visit 🙏🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7ftaaPH1PI4ZE4BxiG9-sOwXRzFhgs286qEOx&fid=0x0:0x88904ada95bb7b3f"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jaskiran Pandher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgocCjI_xXFud3UQxxrD4Wh9R8A4JbD2HA1qlhZiZqHBQHvbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Mother India caterers & restaurant. Their food quality is really good. This restaurant is very conveniently located near to my work, making it easy to choice for a delightful lunch. I ordered samosas with chickpeas and chai. Really liked the food. Definitely my go to lunch place. This place is new but amazing.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good Korean fried chicken that's on par with those in Vancouver.

We had the half and half with the original and sweet and spicy flavour. The bite sized chicken is tasty and just the right size (not too big, not too small).

This place is great for takeout, especially before or after going to The Outdoor Experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCy7QRKXH2ehH54GNnPB2YcHf9l4G36qRn2Adr&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Daesang Kwon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNXkCk3azbq3Y23gsGxmwY_KHLjEw4uhn7N74k05paCPXr2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not usually one to write reviews, but I just can’t let this one go unmentioned.

I tried the Original and Yangnyeom chicken, and honestly, it was the best Korean fried chicken I’ve ever had – even compared to what I’ve had in Korea. The batter was incredibly crispy, and the chicken was juicy without being greasy, with a crunch that lasted till the very end.

As someone who truly loves Korean chicken, I can confidently say this is hands down the best I’ve ever had. I highly recommend it!

The staff were also incredibly friendly, greeting us with warm smiles and bright energy, which made the experience even better.

I really wish I had taken a photo before digging in, but by the time I thought about it, the chicken was already gone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laurel Anne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2r68KcVxlaBbzNNCUC5EFoY8CgogCX1UJLt6olScSoGlOeU8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best Korean fried chicken I've ever had! The batter on the chicken is so light and crispy, and the chicken itself is unbelievably juicy.
We ordered original, yangyeom, and soy honey garlic chicken. The yangyeom was so flavourful, mildly spicy but I can't handle spice and it was the perfect level for me. The soy honey garlic was the perfect balance of sweet and savoury. Don't skip the cheese fries either - I would have these as a deathbed meal.
10/10 can't wait to order again, and can't wait to see them hopefully expand to more areas so everyone can enjoy. This is truly a gem in Aldergrove :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2qHgBQhRku54BDRnoXvtTo2_TVodCKseCMG61&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Miss Asia Canada Vancouver, BC Patty C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVvGXqNWoYaCyfXFYAejHk320OBSpPOuBn3M8eruqJH-qPLIRx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been eyeing this place before it opened and it was definitely worth it! I ordered the Oliv party combo which came with 3 chicken flavors of choice, cole slaw, and fries. Their Korean fried chicken was crispy, tender, and bursting with flavor. My favorite is the original chicken with the onion sauce as it was such a game-changer. I just never thought of tasting onion sauce with chicken before. The employees were so welcoming and friendly and even gave 3 drinks on the house! I wanted to try their cruffle waffle dessert and it was a pleasant mini treat after all that chicken. A must-visit for anyone who craves fried chicken! Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ_dLOERz7kqE1-etTDkq6eCDx307GNTmOS5yq&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"A Cam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdc4yAx8KI59xffsXe3vJtCvFKTIjlNn_W1Zx4iGb8O9oMaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My landlords love this place and mentioned it to me. Tonight they were ordering some and I asked if they would order me some as well. I chose the soy honey garlic. Prior to this I have never tried Koren fried chicken. It was SO good!!! Crispy and crunchy! Sweet and savory! Hot! Juicy! My son and I absolutely fell in love with it. I will definitely be ordering on a regular basis!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"안은숙","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJQT0HC6tdSWus0-Dh75zuonu4hk2GClpzfZRlWAzHMtW3BA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staffs were so nice and the lady, I assume she's the boss said she made all the sauces, the coleslaw and even the kimchi, which taste was above beyond.
I loved their Korean styled sweet and spicy chicken, very healthy and the chicken  was so crunch and delicious. Thank you! Me and my family really enjoyed it!^^
Try the party combo to try three different flavours:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPneU91VRGSMxDg1JgTBs4TA6p8Sxvcz4MBvK9H&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-8-9"},{"Name":"mckenzie w.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7Ah7R-f0ZM6ZOKzP3Bhq4cTN8jgOsQzArcjFloYh3ojSAnhq_fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time having Korean fried chicken. Very crispy and very good. Beef bagogi is delicious. There was almost no seating so we had a trunk picnic.
Edit; trunk picnics bring fun memories to us so we were not bothered about the seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1tC9EaSa3HFXcxOYepb8QgQWWuLx2_hFUvB5A&fid=0x0:0x63b82931e122d9a0"],"When":"2023-10-13"},{"Name":"il sun song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5HEBvXIsbmaUpL_BhSS--tD0159gB7YDQHHarQxWsyN1_95k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Several time.. I tried Buldak chicken and stir fried kimchi rice only. Was enough good to me. Tonight, Owner, lady recommended K Bibimbab(various kinds of vegetables & Bulgogi with sweet&hot sauce)..wow! awesome, great!. ...Amazing!!! K food is right always! Never regret!  Probably she is best chef of Korean. Thank you Raina!","Images":null,"When":""}]

I'm so happy they opened up here in Aldergrove as the one located at high Street has lost a lot of its quality. Highly recommend this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNknhkLSkvxLo9VYIjbP1kD302DuHHn-Dx-vfP-&fid=0x0:0xb62c0f7f140e611a"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Alice Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpdWdwSsRHLUbyrF4Vytj6Xf_tQrR0o9iXBICD1k_VuCVXUdh_WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My burrito bowl was amazing!!! So fresh, I had the Chicken my husband had the Steak.  Also my Mango jarritos was delish!!!! So excited you are now in Aldergrove!! The servers were so friendly. We will definitely be back soon! 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDsZMRMUHJ8E63RFBzQ3z6Qbco8gF761YY5n78&fid=0x0:0xb62c0f7f140e611a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Brandy Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX26JgMkXhDhVb-dxpTzrCvQxo1gI8RXDNh4_fS7otI7KVz-n1z1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are so happy to see Mucho Burrito in our community, owned by one of our locals! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ekta Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9zfUlfUKwABpvG9ljbjWm-OMsuXeF5SHDKCPNeRPUZZiGtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and delicious food! I always get an upset stomach when I get mucho from the one in surrey on King George, but never had issues getting it from this Aldergrove one. Hopefully they survive here! Owner is absolutely a gem. I've never eaten at a place like this and I was explained all the different flavors and textures and what I would like and it was just a really nice experience so please try them out and let's keep them around!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Komal Bhullar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTVpDeWKETUuaoVqK1-GpXTiOb1afJe1IfzRYPMFT0VxXDCI-B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is perfect place for fans of fresh Mexican cuisine. The menu features a wide range of options, from burritos and tacos to salads and bowls, allowing you to tailor your meal to your tastes.
The moment I entered the store the aura was mesmerizing. The service was typically fast and friendly, making it a great spot for a quick lunch or casual dinner.
The best place to visit for those craving a satisfying meal with plenty of choices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ha La","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKr0X5ag_gYly90Xi2_ZiPf7T5IOeu67mTiVhVQS6WMqtlHjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Just don't like when you service with out mask or cover.

Good luck to you.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I recently tried the new pizza spot in Aldergrove, and I have to say, I’m impressed! The pizza was absolutely delicious, with fresh ingredients and a perfect crust – crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The menu offers a great variety of options, and the staff was super friendly and accommodating.

The service was quick, and the atmosphere was warm and welcoming, making it a great place for a casual meal or takeout. I highly recommend trying their specialty pizzas, especially the BBQ chicken one—it’s a must-have! This place is a fantastic addition to Aldergrove, and I’ll definitely be back for more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaspreet Parmar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNkH-P0F0l6jA0wUQDdEzGypRseqjFOilsuvp0Wozl-hhuISs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will get this coupon on picture, but he not give me pizza. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nikki Colson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyfGy7bgl6e1bYlSbWx0h26IQAyFi7RSREOXmjIe2hyywXt84=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I know I know “OMGGG ALDERGROVE DOESNT NEED ANOTHER PIZZA PLACE” and I hear you, it’s getting out of control.
However, I want to talk about Red Swan Pizza. We are lucky to have this place.
We tried it out tonight and out of the 15 pizza places in Aldergrove, it’s officially my new fav. They bake their dough fresh in house every morning. They use quality ingredients (none of those gross bacon balls, REAL bacon!).
It’s not paper thin like some of these other places.
Prices are really reasonable.
I would highly recommend giving them a try!
They only are open 4-9 this week for their soft opening while training etc but they did say they would be open 9AM-10PM in the coming weeks.
Customer service was amazing, food was amazing, 10/10 from me!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipManN_jvCzj4pkduhEpTiKNu2lioHKbcgNam4zC&fid=0x0:0xbcaea6b148b4ce05"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Khush Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq903wJ2hPG1CHHvXL4Czl5soM3U_M05nA24u-XDXDXHsxMgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally saying must try guys…the quality of pizzza is so different as compare to other pizza stores and the customer service is also so  gud . [{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yahoo, finally I found what I really wanted that I can't get anywhere else other than Henlong in Surrey. I don't need to go there anymore. It's mushroom soy sauce l, we love it! They have pretty variety of Asian grocery, I am so happy to see what I like there with reasonable price. Amazing customer service, very friendly and helpful! I didn't have a chance to try their BBQ yet but they look really delicious so will definitely go back grab some soon. Many kinds of noodles which I will try them all. Overall, really happy with this Asian grocery stores. It'll be my to go for Asian ingredients from now on. Didn't get anything much because just did Asian grocery shopping","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvlUFUdITULt1Ri-_xXfplA4EKWhF4-X2DD_9d&fid=0x0:0x76807706766773eb"],"When":"2023-3-15"},{"Name":"Kimberly Worsfold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-5lM_MK9x2B22SaRpxeqPDq3w4uh5JSNP9hDIckksGAx02w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So friendly and helpful. We will definitely be back next time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"cori douglas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJchmF3eRG_psCKStmY9kBRllUy8w9dumZRdk2gVUko1IoejA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I thought bbq duck was supposed to be crispy. A little disappointed thought  we were getting  a nice treat but for dinner @ about 50 bucks a  bird I’m a little disappointed  for it to be soggy, and not very warm
Now I’ll take it home and see if I can crisp it up, without overcooking the meat.. 😬

If I thought they might trade this soggy bird back for a crispy one I might call back, but have a feeling they wouldn’t..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Koenig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnuOF-QDLJBAe8c37uSgjyxTOUKUtp3R_IhHSKHNiV1Ah2FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little store! Would highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cat Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL972MgZRReWMOxJM8juDWpd7nGXF0KbLOPtRP8Zr4SICQUUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good selection of Asian grocery items to choose from.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hike To the Sky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_dlEBnNvec-0XZ1M-PRajz_Jlg2mzHrfB4jU9zoIWWJuEL9RS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are craving for Chinese BBQ then come here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shadows","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxseKzAFVKUv6VDoaM9JabgSyVfzQycasNJ_hZWGlRPLThljbo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Variety of things to choose from.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DAL426","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXnSLAXRLiTR2LLzjI_Jibu2r91m61x0pGTyId7YKGfyeItLDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"childhood place to go","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Katie Zaharik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpdMoBs2HYyaSVc9z5gmTf70-rPz1U3yQX_sH3RShYQa_8fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food! Tender, flavourful, perfect amount of sauce, and probably the best fried rice I’ve ever had.  We ordered multiple dishes and were extremely happy with everything. 10/10 will be ordering here again.

The lady we placed our order with over the phone was SO lovely. Very impressed with the customer service, portions and quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The temple is my favourite place to have Chinese food when I’m out in Aldergrove. The staff are nice and the food is delicious! The delivery was so quick when I ordered. I couldn’t be more happier with this place ☺️☺️☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMvR_BwrewrkX46DDt80oJNqECJb-7P9tXxgHW&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Carmen Poley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdnYhToXtdEZQWNLyMuuIIzP903XYDvhxUrlLIR3EmV7olWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you so much for the continued consistency, and quality of your food.
This is a great restaurant that treats you like you're part of their family.  I highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikki Colson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyfGy7bgl6e1bYlSbWx0h26IQAyFi7RSREOXmjIe2hyywXt84=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from temple today (second time this month) and once again the food is amazing!
We were apprehensive to order from there since in the past we have had some less than mediocre food which we were disappointed with but I can really say they have turned things around for the better!
So stoked to have good Chinese in Aldergrove again!
Good portions as well and they are always very friendly and personable.
No more driving to downtown Langley or Abbotsford for Chinese food 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUPG2NIh0PXCo1sqtOCj4emLmGCHSbw6fa3P1S&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2022-1-2"},{"Name":"Kerin Swift","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJW9r2HQxO01vhxYCvZitD0_3FSCABlRfD2KAKEU39AMRMzfes=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not bad but 18.45 for prawns and its all batter....I threw it in the garbage...portion is good....i just wont order prawns again...that was disappointing😒Just went to eat my wonton soup today...they charged me extra to put broccoli in it...guess what? No broccoli in my soup...I will not spend my money there again...too bad that I will be telling everyone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv5miffcvSpMqyYPnRllMcS6YofT_N32_xzFU-&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2023-3-1"},{"Name":"Cliff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGdv9jHpJK2CzTr44_aLBKd8m9dEDYvf61S2lfLke-RAVcWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly and polite staff the food was excellent I ordered chicken Chow Mein sweet and sour pork and beef vegetables and of course spring rolls I'd have to say the best Chinese food in Aldergrove and best I've had in awhile","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7iPm7KVUgKoTVIm4u7ENu_KQ_g2wxj5HGhj7D&fid=0x0:0x60f6218ec456de4c"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Blake Marsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8nadzo-VCRBlWhSlB7Gtb9x14z6uDU3sdeU9k4FHJ3-tJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered temple for takeout for the first time last night and the food was great. We ordered honey garlic chicken and at other places it’s usually very doughy and heavy, temple’s was super light and fluffy almost like fish n chip batter and the flavour was awesome, it tasted like real garlic, not any fake flavouring. All around fabulous food, we will definitely be ordering from them again! I’d recommend the chicken chow mein, veggie fried rice, sweet and sour pork and honey garlic chicken. 10/10!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rick ab2006","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgFSSofTCIrCtkecXcNssOMjKsiwKWHeliX5Faj2LqdDqIAkc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only place for Chinese Food in Aldergrove. My only present critique is the pricing is getting way out of control.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Preet Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlEXZq8NkVRk9QaPYrqE7CMvUst53KW9MGJ-tsny_HmjE_U-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the best place for punjabi cuisine in alder. The new management is really good and kind to their customers. Really working hard. Very delicious food I ordered panner bhurji and salmon tandoori. My family loved the food it was very tasty. Recommended to everyone. Good management, delicious food, not expensive, cleaned area loved it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO-quGYILpxAKeRVL0D019pLOoUIb6FmjL87_V&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Harman Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9FMTrK05C7PyiOJ4NYcuSKIQLLeOPv8cze83SdBf9skyN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice area and the new management working hard for their customers I ordered  chicken tikka and Dhal makhni.
I would definitely recommend it. The new management are really kind and sweet to their customers. Ordered  alot from here. Worth ordering food from here not that expensive. Very delicious food everyone should order once from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsIiw8Z98cfeMZ6pAAfJCCdAmRgmJh5MT93HM&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Navdeep Kaur Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKIvKJMYqlmuYqvslxeEMDWnbxprwcp4KG5dvNO-df3PlLr7c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You all have to try "Veer Ji’s" chicken tikka, Dhal Makhni, Salmon Tandoori, and Paneer Bhurji. It’s so delicious and the staff is so friendly and easy-going. Just a day before yesterday, I ordered all these items for a house party, and everybody loved them so much that I had to make a special request for more of them on the spot.

Thank you for this delicious food and the wonderful service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGIoYCaEzr3AU7VxNVUYIXeg32qP3VJJ1AgbSs&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Amitinder Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiFXQTpQt47PZMLRxMUi6cQBnkib8DDh3RYGlHatma-MrpFWwh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My personal favorites : butter chicken and fish pakora. And the Indian sweets they have - Laddu and Jalebi - definitely recommended when it’s fresh. The girl at the front counter has a pleasant personality. So overall experience gets 5 stars always.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUoRTM0w0GwQ_YPQkVgQ2bt090ESljN682mxEy&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2020-10-29"},{"Name":"majhail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPfH5DPbcbX-7NOH5X7vXB75TGmPMtKzNiPEvNYtYuuwnsJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered fish pakora. Worst taste, returned it. Even don’t took money back but please don’t serve this type of food. give 0 star if I could.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristen Stokes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnB8TMgrLX1kBisa0c99bM2sYxfA3ketCbxuwRgoUidWe_Fwar=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One star because there isn't anything lower. Although I would love to support this business because they offer to feed the homeless... I just... I can't. I called to order for pick up, after giving all the order details I get hung up on. I call again to confirm the order, to again, get hung up on. After calling several times to recieve nothing but their voicemail, I tried calling from another phone, just to recieve their voicemail. I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt, that their having phone issues, that they received the order details and that it'd be ready in about 20-25 minutes. I get there, and they have a mask required sign in the window- which I respect. I put my mask on, and go inside just to see that absolutely no one is wearing a mask, let alone gloves for handling food. I ask for my order, and they say they never input the order because they couldn't confirm. They tried saying that they called me to try to confirm but got voicemail. However, I was by my phone(s) the entire time I was waiting. I called them on their lie and they were silent. Nevertheless, I ordered again and waited patiently. However, within that time I noticed that the place is filthy - every spot that the customer could see is clean, although when looking closer there is dust and insects in all the nooks and cranies. After receiving my food they said they were having technical difficulties and had to use the debit machine from the business next door. As long as I paid for what I received, I don't care.

HOWEVER, I'm once again let down and disappointed from them when I get home. I asked for spicy butter chicken and it is the most bland butter chicken I've ever tasted. Lacking all seasoning and flavor. All I can taste is the yogurt. Their Naan is more like flat, tasteless, pancakes than actual Naan. Veggie pakora is also tasteless. Only flavor I taste is in the sauce.

Won't be coming back. Highly disappointed. Disastrous experience. Not worth the money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI7RK4WYfKLf8Gl3tFcgnhBYao4nAioTMdsD-7&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2021-8-11"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got one dish from here and I believe all locations preparations are same and good in taste. The service was quick and easy. I ordered my food on phone and it was hot and ready when I reached.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPFXo3SgsypzW_EfzQt123IJPlNRbBZ5jFhU3m&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-17"},{"Name":"Nam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6uXfmmArUYZbtjHP5ojEJ-Wc2-DJpCPohc0IRcSdAOp7csOA-ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Indian food in town.
The tikkas and pakoras are to die for.
The chaat items are my favourite.Butterchicken,chhole bhature and samosas are best sellers here.
Lipsmacking food indeed.
#SmallBusiness
#SupportSmallBusiness","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6NgGctFDT3MKlPGs9Uqb_wHHDdggXD_trf8l6&fid=0x0:0x51bf20010fe73d62"],"When":"2022-1-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jak 251","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULRmfDkzrFf-N2A7ojNm3_oHU1EESAM3HbvXQBakALlJWeU2mJ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best experience here the other day for a solo lunch on the patio! It was surprisingly quiet! The service was friendly and quick! Best steak sandwich I’ve had in a long time! Big and so so flavourful. The fries, super fresh and crispy! Sunshine, beer and a book! Wonderful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4Em6an6SiuGHviAh3u7M7ROwKIkGEhN9wyZIf&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"PK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvgtyPrhy9siOOPNTRBiF7aMccr9bxzL_OUZqA6xntKhqOBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently attended a company year end/ Christmas party at this place. The place I work for booked the function room. We have had our staff party/dinner at this location two years in a row - this was our third visit. Previous times were great, they cared. This time not so much. How standards have dropped! The plan was to have starter platters and then a selection of main courses with desserts. The starter platters were tiny and barely sufficient for the amount of people (literally half the size of the last few years). Most of us commented on how poorly they were presented and how little variety they contained - its almost like the kitchen had no idea on how to make or present starters. The main courses were below mediocre and the service was very slow (serving staff should ideally not smell of tobacco/weed) . No music was available (because the hockey game was on) - one would assume that they would have a separate music system in a function room.  When the meal was over, service vanished and then we were asked when we are leaving as they had other restaurant customers who wanted to use the room (seems as if the torn pool table was a key attraction). Not a great experience.  Average cost to the company was around $70 a head for this staff function.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cdn Bev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvlpNw6NTcP_Twj-s_iapZEnvHYblTTl7vDtXCUfJo49kX8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Four of us went and met up this past weekend here, was pleasantly surprised they had a Breakfast Special for $5.95.  Two eggs, 2 bacon strips, hash browns and 2 pcs of toast.  They had a breakfast egg sandwich also available along with their regular breakfast menu I believe also for the same price.  Before we went there I was looking online for a breakfast menu and couldn’t find anything on their website,  or here on Google, so I took a picture of it and am posting it.  I see their regular menu is online and here on Google.
We all enjoyed our meals and will be back for breakfast.  We have been before and enjoyed regular items from their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFlNlhpjp9m60a3Jj-aCJDtcioSAaXs41Srdng&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Mr. L. black","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpEcd6DvCmwZhn7TZ4jf3R5N0DEOYxkaK-L0-gRYLD1XZeVj0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My steak was ok. Vegetables good, potato good. My wife fish tacos were cold. She didn't finish them. Happy hour was only on winter beer and certain wines. Very limited.  Would we go back ??  Carpets need a hood cleaning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSskvdn1-gD3-B1Dc-AHKsNEGs5YKvoNHb8NA6&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Firstly, I know it's not their fault but damn the flies!!

I came for ribs but their menu didn't state they aren't served till after 5pm.

I asked if their calamari comes with Jalapenos or banana peppers. The server said it did come with jalapenos (but this detail wasn't listed on the menu)

Stuffed mushrooms weren't in a mushroom serving plate. Just a standard deep dish.

Poppers were decent.

All the food tasted wonderful.

Atmosphere was quiet for 3pm on a Thursday. Parking was easy. Servers were a pleasure.

I'd recommend they better advertise the time for certain dishes and also their ingredients per dish but otherwise the servers and chef made this experience.

Management seems to be going down hill. Their chaulk sign outside was for March/April... It's July.

First time coming here. Not sure I'll return due to the lack of attention to detail with menu and other displays but definitely not the servers or chefs fault.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQhvOmVtOKrSg4jH-Ra0z7fmARu3-YT5pfz2zl&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"J M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqJzKIxq5auEW8yna1-gGEfd9AqCnDkW4WBUWAmRF_i9a9SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s a pub with keno.

It was quiet this morning, service was prompt and friendly and the food was ready in minutes. Super fast.

Breakfast was good and the report was that the poutine with bacon was sublime.

Pretty big menu so we’ll come back and try something else next time.

Basic beer selection and they had my choice of drink on hand.

And a fireplace!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_lxcgpL6lcczjTp_4mBmKriUzdU8WTSFSmZw&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Deb B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDbP3nEX_Uf7JWJnDafGPKEq7T3muGuMsq_lGLaRwInbUMrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped for a bite to eat at about 1:30 in afternoon on a Tuesday. I was very pleasantly greeted by my server Allison who went on to provide me with truly excellent friendly service. I decided to try a Classic Burger with added on for a price of $2 each cheese and bacon, and a small red wine. This came with fries which were really nice. However, the bacon was undercooked so I sent it back to be cooked more. Once it came back the burger was good but now fries were getting cold so I added a side of hot gravy for dipping. So, food was okay overall... but... sadly the wine glass was dirty and had to be sent back, and then the knife was also dirty. So that turned me off a bit, but overall... the good made up a bit for the bad, I'd give the place a second try in future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnCsjr69rM4IifwHArOl6e8v8bpZao-61ZM8sK&fid=0x0:0x21ff93eefc747c20"],"When":"2023-11-2"},{"Name":"Chantel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLs5rRaALXvXPDJJ2MOsJewagdU58VU_wcydk_UrHj0aotl0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible experience, we order our food at 530pm waited an hour , tried to ask our waitress Kalyn I believe her name was, how much longer for our food, she told us the kitchen is busy so we waited another hour, after waiting almost 4 hours for our food we never got it. So we left. We watched so many tables come and go, they got there food but we didn’t. We were really nice every time we asked about our order & she was so rude to us, once we asked for the bill and to cancel the food we have been waiting for , she rolled her eyes at us and walked away mid conversation when we tried to explain how to split the bills. I’ve never in my life have had an experience like this. So many other servers apologized when they realized we never got our food, but our waitress Kalyn didn’t apologize, overall her whole attitude was not appropriate. I’ve never been so disappointed in the station.","Images":null,"When":""}]
