[{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe I didn't give them a 5 star review yet. This is our favorite pizza place. Really good and friendly customer service. I don't mind to pick it up because it's really delicious. I don't eat much pizza but can't stop eat their pizza.. hehehe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhzW5f_bkKYFqCmYwmsFxxgTwqJDr14b17keqx&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Julie Sherwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTr_NJ1Aob-1dPJkR5kAPdHikX9SsIBMiMkWN9IxQRlpB6xJPH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered 7 large pizzas to be delivered to the Otter Co-op in Aldergrove for my daughter's birthday party. Since I live in Coquitlam, I took a chance ordering from a pizza place I had never tried before. The gentleman who delivered the pizza arrived on time and was very nice. The pizza was just delicious and the kids loved it. Exceptional quality and the sauce was really tasty. I'll definitely order from this pizza place again if I'm ever in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madi Weiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdN_7Dx48TLxOVLJowLEbAOvERMCJFN8bIAXr6i7wl0s4KHzKH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The people who work here are such genuine, friendly and kind people. I went in asking if they can do a heart shaped pizza for me and they said they’d try! and it turned out great! not to mention their pizza is absolutely delicious. Forever my fave pizza place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGfzKIpP4X5niFXpk-z4Lp7YqbVE8AC42QCclc&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Amandeep Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyzMmM-hifpvSuTipXYlZ8D-0PVxH__j6oOf4Xglcv2BJSZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s not just the best pizza in Aldergrove, it’s ‘The best pizza ever’. I have been their customer from many years and their customer service and food has always been top notch. With their wide selection of pizzas, they always use the best quality ingredients in their pizza and are generous with their toppings. Whenever I want pizza, I know where to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUFSuwP5X-hkv7GQBiKKgSru7zAU7Qzf4wLSNV&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2023-7-24"},{"Name":"Nancy Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIi-XhUbbfsZ4-LDhNRfOQEFwSw1HghnpU1bUUWqI06NjB1sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have lived in the neighbourhood forever and just recently decided to give Choice Pizza a try. I was pleasantly surprised to have such a tasty pizza. They always offer to put fresh cilantro on my veggie pizza which really takes it up a notch. I highly recommend, the flavour is absolutely delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Apar Dhanju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQtV3X9RUUJWlsdhpp0E3dn0M8OkCjIwS_2qRJAafYbfE_wA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious, osm
I came from Surrey
I tried veg pizza
Its very delicious
Super service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1wQJLHbhlXLyUBHk6t_ApR7ZlIAHHoczFgI_Y&fid=0x0:0x9aef7082e8f29ad2"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"magnolia light","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTDpHmRrlMuor1kxbYQUmPuljcIniKAhH7YFHqyDOl40sUS4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love that pizza! Crunchy crust, generous toppings, delicious sauce and reasonably priced!
Have only a counter to eat there but perfect take out place! Top 3 of best pizza I eat in my life!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arlen Sagard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4E2zAgtDKDiNCqMuLsUUzvNqFXKEsVuwlZSJVyZpTarI6xbGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They say is 2 for 1 but they changed $43.00 for 2 pizzas, the price on the board they said is the old price. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"People weren't kidding when they said the lowest tip option on the ATM machine was 15 percent. That's ridiculous considering they do take out only. The options on the machine were 15, 20 or 25 percent.

Food was very tasty. The service was nice. The restaurant has been closed for dine-in since covid began. We called for takeout on New years Eve and there was only a 20-minute wait. They were out of some toppings and called back to ask if it was okay if they skipped it. Of course they didn't offer a discount for missing one topping. But they sure don't hesitate to charge if you add a topping.

Lasagna was very good. Lots of cheese. It came with garlic bread. The pizza was average. My husband got the barbecue chicken pizza. He loves getting barbecue sauce in place of pizza sauce. In this case you could barely taste the barbecue sauce. Also the bacon on this pizza was really gnarly and my husband spit it all out.

I ordered pepperoni and bacon. I was disappointed that the pepperoni was like bologna sheets under the cheese. I prefer the Pizza Hut style with the crispy, greasy 1 inch diameter slices on top of the cheese not the fat 6 inch wide sheets of meat that look like bologna placed under the cheese. I guess it's just a personal preference.

Oddly enough the bacon on my pizza was delicious. You can really taste the smoky flavor. When we compared our slices you could tell the bacon on my pizza was completely different than the bacon on my husband's. Not sure what happened there. His was awful, gnarly and grayish in color. Mine was pink. Strange.

I parked in front of the restaurant where they have street parking. It's usually hard to find a parking along the street. I'm not sure if they have parking in the rear.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQEJqsRLnHB4VOcBe-kaed2U1T4KLvZIX9Mb31&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2023-1-3"},{"Name":"Traci Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2yCVMJ6TOXZt15phALmUlVF_ShVyFIyRY5Kyu1Xfwt7m8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We often have delivery. Great food options, always hot and good prices. We recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pete MacLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5kdEgWG8rNy6XAmjYXVq_7Ovaj56gCJkJaw_5cIHHv9ztUVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good cheesy pizza. Was more expensive that cheap Dominos but much better quality and tasted very good. Was ready in 20 minutes on a Friday night.

The restauraunt is still closed for eat in and only open for take out or delivery but not a deal breaker for me.

Will definately try again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzXg6rx_i0eH7iUY_yDAmIySS3-e0Sqze1-ikU&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2022-6-22"},{"Name":"Painter Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPm-0DQnbmajvDnkBVj6usloVH7omiAsTdyMuT6wG0LPB77Z4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's a far downhill from the glory days. Food is very good. No dinning in service. The guy serving pu has a real negative attitude and extremely condescending. Had to fight to get a wooden fork and a single napkin. Good place for a hostile take over!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Isis Goode","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPe-8SfLM1IvjMasEaMTfKGhJkRTNSxyUhSBqDENUMMlnn9PO8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"RATS! DO NOT EAT HERE: If I could put negative stars I absolutely would, after placing a take out order at the last call I went in and no one was in there but a young male and the owner. While sitting there for already 10 minutes my best friend, little sister and I were in absolute shock when we heard a group of what sounded like very large rats run through the walls and the roof for about 5 minute straight along with chewing. When we stated we wanted a refund and that they should really close down because its a safety hazard the young male went into the back and we heard him say “they don’t want the food now because they heard the rats” so they already knew about them, the owner comes out and starts yelling and arguing with me acting like we were doing a disservice to him because we didn’t want food from a place infested with rats. When we said we could call the health board they said they already knew and they’re were told it was fine and I have no idea what I was talking about, it seems unlikely they would still be in business if the board knew. Any ways very concerning and I wouldn’t eat here if I were you (I inserted a picture of what a already covered rat hole in the front lobby looks like)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjvSWkeBDLdjNlrN_6-56kuMAmxhPX-OSXDBGK&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2023-11-13"},{"Name":"Greg Dietlein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9UkJNp9uMeV37Upe_GGK8pHLehqrqM8mY2CTh2Nq32-JM3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an amazing restaurant. Great food and very reasonable pricing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Uyen Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr0V5wEvhPPcQnA-afbHFMhtw3wYt_rzpvtLqHaXlGVmZ2ZSG6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The kind and generous owner gave it to me. Thank you so much, I’m very appreciate that.
Taste is really good and yummy, I’m totally love it 😍
Cheers,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR245Bfr15yZxQB6XcqAbU3tXEcBvZVIaGhhlB&fid=0x0:0x3d3e6ef388481383"],"When":"2021-5-16"},{"Name":"Alex Ocampo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMt5X2rIPheFZw2mQlWPedA6h9JBzBx4XpCxFlcTxHHiYV8z9S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza. The pizza did not look appetizing &&& DOES NOT TASTE LIKE FOOD FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION let alone PIZZA 🤢🤢 waste of $35","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5TwWqpSL4yBu2pU0t_CVtkNnOSPLCOQz_m_E9&fid=0x0:0xc6d1902ee44eca96"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"marty bryant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvv-VrS9mltOA7EntyGXzUvvzCfoz3eKA8CBi16U2gbr5UxCTS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave 0 stars I would. First time ordering from here and definitely the last, Lasagna had no meat/tomato sauce and was literally swimming in water. Wouldn't redeliver and would only offer a credit for the next time we order, which obviously won't be happening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhoydB719-ZrA14lUP9b6OmyuaD7YuapDqxcjz&fid=0x0:0xc6d1902ee44eca96"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Alex Connell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaCUfxY-AUpno1w5l43b8vJwy2YCRWUGPFRmrJcXOddhvunQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just bad pizza..cheese is processed garbage...7 11 is better than this...save your money..Aldergrove sucks for pizza","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel E. Tennant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEWOxow4SEdaLYYMU-Un4mYsgfW7RnehW4KEuKVB4tn_uZ-w0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's always good, but I only order new York no 4, so I'm not sure how other pizzas taste. But I know the owner puts love and effort into the pizzas I do order. Way better than dominios or any other pizza place in aldergrove.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Holly Gaden Williams (GUDGOLLYMSHOLLY)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAsDGFEOwjetTVSnGFXXHaOSK0wyBGP2IxrGkFfKr4Ujw7iAjMzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW!! if it were possible Id give this place 110🌟 outta 10🌟!  My Husband & I only went in for a Pepsi.  my husband only had his debit card and so said forget it..the owner said, "no worries its on the house" we ended up chit-chatting for a while and letting him know that we had just moved to town less than a month ago and he said well you must try pizza so that you can see him in the picture making my very own personal ham and pineapple pizza...again on the house.  this man makes the most amazing pizzas real pizza the kind you'd expect to get in Italy!  absolutely mouth-watering not over greasy not soggy from too much moisture perfect perfection all the way he also has an assortment of other Foods he offers like pastas and many other items!! you have to check out the menu!
Youll also see 2 pictures of hand written script. Both those letters are to say "THANK YOU" from a Dr Mary Pollack as he donated prizes for community events.
The owners are a Husband and Wife team who demonstrate their LOVE to everyone in our Community through allowing us to taste their the love in every bite, as well as by supporting different events through donating prizes!
if you're reading this and you're nowhere near Alder Grove they also have a pizza business in Hope and in Abbotsford!!  and all sincerity I mean this if you are thinking of where to eat tonight go to Abby pizza not only will you be over the moon with the enjoyment of the food but the way you are instantly welcomed by the staff is something all businesses could learn from!!  WAY TO GO ABBY'S PIZZA!
THANKS AGAIN FOR THE WONDERFUL HAWAIIAN PIZZA, COCA COLA, AND THE KINMAN SHIP!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN65K2EUTYzHdGCp27bvgmgU3AXAj2A-avPFh7S&fid=0x0:0xc6d1902ee44eca96"],"When":"2020-9-23"},{"Name":"Robert Crocker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUJqnDzNzEGXgPTp-lea1CbYKeiHJs46oBS6svu0BkRcOihzc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Couldn't tell you how the food was. I walked in in the old man told me to get out before I could even order","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike MacDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi3y0x87VpcaaMqpny7_x6ZHjri-oH1DMeyUeUZ6UqasGGVW0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was great~!
Crispy crust, good flavour~!
EXCELLENT PRICE~!

I’m sort of new to Aldergrove, and have tried most pizza joints over the last 2 years. This one is my favourite so far~!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nate Russell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHMvwEIS8Nq8ZkbcbQbybUfqVHOW2egdTILLTG6f3FxzBEaP2fAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza is absolutely fantastic. My new goto joint for pizza hands down!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Devin Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqB0jKvGPvgMvBnuRFcMRyHkvPXYzckm05Y7uLaFORyiW8K-N4xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Raw dough. Tried calling the store to tell them, but it only went through to the call center. It's their policy that they cannot transfer calls to the specific stores. This isn't the first time from this Panago location. Will be checking out the other local pizza places from here on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harrison Goeldner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv-_CrEOXVFYwpSQ_LfCH8ko4UyTLcFpt8ablig3f4s3p4JYy_Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their pizza combo! Super cheap and a great deal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Korrin Morrow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5nVHTxdx9Ej4BUXu9qpCk3NelfsQz_Zgz_ZbvmPdpwtt1S7kUFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The flavor of the toppings is good, but Im not too sure if I ever want to go back. Every time I go the past few years, it's just less and less toppings on my pizza. Even when I paid for extra. I dont think it's worth it anymore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adria Matthews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtlH1X0bTerXnMeZ881-UKoz48lH1gPtf-FGNx3nv-gcIyhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Missed a part of my delivery order yesterday , when I called the store to explain the situation as I had already paid, the owner went above and beyond to make it right. He could not issue a refund over the phone since I used a debit card, so instead he sent a driver to reimburse my order total in cash. Did not have to go out of their way this much, and it made the world of difference. Really wonderful customer service ☺️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nathan Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwFR_3k4ynSGS9Rbo-tQTLLK9HK1DqUQDA5jU9vKCvECgxuCgIkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Of all the fast food pizza places, go is always been my favorite. Even for a quick snack the cheesy bread is great, but pizzas are awesome too with lots of choices. I think during covid most of the panagos took away their seating. Can you please bring that back?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Al O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4p7gVERHUN4Zg5wNIoeNpSLmOtu9BpWLdzo5oFBiHGASqAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I won't give a one because we did eat the pizza. I traveled the country for my work and have a favorite Pizza place in many cities, so I kinda love pizza.
Here is my review: Been going to other pizzeria in the local area, which all have a different crust and flavor profile but you find the ones you like. Which most people will agree on.
Now the comparison. There is a Panago Pizza at the Abbotsford Canucks hockey food court, which we have had several times. It has been good every time, right up there with my favorites. We have had the New York Deli and Hawaiian, both were cooked nicely and a good balance toppings. The Hawaiian has more than the standard load of cheese with a nice pull to it as you would expect. The Deli was good, period. They both had a nice chew with some exposed crust for you bread lovers, but not a jaw workout.
So.....we figure the local Panago must be the same, it is a franchise after all?! Simply put, the pizza was hard work to chew and the toppings were just not up to a standard I expect anywhere. Cooked a bit much on the bottom then gets doughy and tough as it progresses thru to the toppings. Should they not be able to replicate a franchise standard? I hope they can fix their issues, maybe I got a bad dough day......
No I won't be back and no I don't want anything.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandra Vleeming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG1qVUP-bTaTnRkR2Vt1QZDJ6h0TXVO7kR_EJ_MKQQpgLLNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This has been the worst experience. I was at my grandchildren house and ordered pizza. 45 minutes later panago phoned and said they will not deliver. I asked why and they would not tell me. I asked if I could pick it up and they said no. They made us wait 45 minutes with hungry children and wouldn't deliver in Aldergrove. I had to phone pizza hut and they delivered but we had to wait another 45 min. Last time I order from panago.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Raymond (Lukeo2412)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrjPAWuMoqQafvFWNpdnVSR9URjp96ycbpNnDbAoFIiCPOmarW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rajinder (the owner) and his team are courteous, and friendly. Excellent customer service and delicious pizza. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wax Media","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlYLWDEwUY7kbjq9MSQFitSBzRMnr0oo2LyJEDq3N_qMybidTK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible the service was bad their fryer was so dirty. My burger was built upside down. We asked for extra ketchup the manager threw it in the bag rudely and walked away. No care was put into these over priced sad looking burgers. Ow and the fries had a hair in it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"savana bibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGqh62e2hztrYgtCMldzCzG6ZIAM8KYnvd4ijjmq3HnB6_FaM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I feel cheated. My husband and I bought two drinks, but only shared one. After a few minutes, the remaining drink reduced to half. I realized later that this is why there was so much leftover drink in the jar after pouring it out into two cups. An employee gave the rest of the drink to another employee on break. It's unfair that we paid full price but the employees got the leftovers. The drink didn't taste good either…I'm really disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAn8xeTAuW7nQfdVl2UDrES6NzlVSKkM_TQPjl\u0026fid=0x0:0xfc1de6f09e267f1c"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"Maria Kristianne Santiago","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUropq5pa4AHt67VGg3QJuvN05K0Jqqd0Qy0g8cIiDWG6NP6nXx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far the best branch of Triple O’s I’ve ordered from. Safe to say they really follow their customers’ requests which I honestly appreciate because their burgers are one of my favourites! 🫶🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHc9jTn-Qx6UieGxO2DfUFfW7sjnuqyU3W97lz\u0026fid=0x0:0xfc1de6f09e267f1c"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Rob Sebastion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjakSj6i9_7dOk20y3wCpxp4vXE8xXOrxZQc5WQ3-s5BmvTvRT-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very young workers that felt that it would be a good idea to sit on buckets and play on there phones. I understand it's in a community center/ice rink and not very busy but they need to look professional.  My burger did not look fresh nor was it hot. These employees need a tune up and do there job in a professional manner. As an owner YOU should be embarrassed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVCS_l2tEBg0UwqR18Bwu1Bs9SuGuJkZ8vAy0IMHtf5Cf48p-ETQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was friendly, food was yummy, our order was ready super fast! This is a take out only situation, so there's no restaurant seating.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"megan O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCl-QWBmLm167HWP4fhPjtpmTHw0LW08YEj9uIQ_l3sOiTjdoWhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sooooooo\n... Was such a cow omg! I fidnt see kid meals on the menu so i politly asked her if theyre was kids meals...she says uh huh with an eye roll....Anyways long story shortAnyways long story short it wasAnyways long story short it was the worstAnyways long story short it was the worst customer serviceAnyways long story short it was the worst customer service I've had in years!\n...... I could have understood the attitude if they were really busy but I was the only one there.","Images":null,"When":""}]

If I lived locally I would eat here frequently for sure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Ivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWawoRuhcvA5BxfL_MgMGARz5R8RJaIoCFWWwRQCzTPfpwUFYU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family had the lunch bento boxes and they were wonderfully larger than expected. The staff are wonderful, the prices are great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgdVqRMWuANsQnzAtjxtuda-gtTvb777g6ISHb&fid=0x0:0x897280d284a36061"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Minhee Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzmhrcM5_NmrLZUPk897P_c4YJMcrDKf_P9g9x2vheSBJ4jY3h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"stopped by for a quick lunch and I was very pleased! I was very happy with the experience, will be coming back again and would highly recommend this restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo10XvP_8jjif3E5WaTwwWu6Q-XV6QYZ6DdP2Ldz5EZnmnYuXc_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food!!!! This place needs to be health checked or get someone in there that has a cleaning background. Ps we got up an walked out.
I used to enjoy this place a few times before this happened","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Jolley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCE3mrKGfyop6M-Rp4VC1UQG9ZiJeI79WOfXHZ9Uk4mVLYYaKh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite sushi restaurant. And i ordered two pizzas from this store.. no ranch in the box and worse service ...this store is close to my house ...its better to order from pizza hut on 264th street ... much better quality and franchisee service.....they never compete them ...
We support local business but their service and staff provide worse service
Train her well whoever on phone ....","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-4V5W0G1mVSiYPlXNP3e6PmWdiwm9d2AsXHSO3qltApSdfAI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Has always been our go to ……for good quality pizza 🍕

We did an order on skip the dishes but something went wrong and our order didnt get Picked up.

I am beyond grateful for the kindness.  Thank you so much for taking care of your customers.   Highly recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jas Buttar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMF1NSTQHF27_gXQtRex3cK4G05wyrsIHZhYepX3CsiTAwpYVc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"on friday morning, i ordered shahi paneer pizza. pizza was very tasty. the girl on the front was very polite. i really appreciate her service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sun dental Gallery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6VUhgokDBgj2CWFu2pHUVlp60rf3tKON7trz0lvtIml2r4y8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza served in the whole Aldergrove area .we came here to visit and tried their pizza .it's yummy ,pizza was loaded with toppings and blessed with cheese .I would recommend everyone to try it.Staff is well managed ,helpful and too polite .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Game ER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdGk8mL9XR7caz6k1qefYV-hzkp7p4VFzX1zukgyBKiFKH-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Every time I order for pick up over call they get my order incorrectly. We’ll be going elsewhere","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDZiD9OuUVuOH3hGcC8A1fuc-AxsGYdwSuUArL\u0026fid=0x0:0x16096b7719cab017"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Laura Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMQ6nNO1m6ZgKfHihON38zVs8yBp5UtJfu8aqE6M-O-Zzvdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service. I gave a 2 because  once it was cooked properly, the taste was OK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGTaapUcoTLzKHPLrOXIPM2vpC7DVw1uWFZna0\u0026fid=0x0:0x16096b7719cab017"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Gardengal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoqVczeUTEhCIZRlifT2tA4bbrsY96bS0xtR0pR7QWQY5iRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here a few months ago but wanted to do a review. Keep it up!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Nicole Beaverstock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINlxlqrls3P2n0sb12ZhDTVLEoEcSNKk-nM6JWCwRB8vGQug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Called with 45 min left till closing and asked if they'll still make pizza, they will!

Domino's came in VIP clutch. Got a pepperoni pizza at 12:30 on a Tuesday night.

Absolutely hit the spot. Just what I needed. Gave a $5 tip for a $21 pizza. 🙏

Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYjItPCaMS8oDIvY1PHXeTM5K4qaY0Ttd-pNn_&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Andrea Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdZW_b7rUJ_f2WCuBemTQvKzKHUd5lEuApubxMvKRaw08GFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nothing is better than Domino's pizza fresh out of the oven. I love that I wanted pick up at 12:15 and last box was being closed as I walked in the door","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIoHAqOtAEUqJFw107CA4cLJjDozjZNYc1mIC-rCMqsK9wJvAx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good pizza, fast service, and more affordable than most other pizza places in my experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMyq7L08S2bAEP2EsfM4Wl434pAJQk_cSFK1p1&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiTo_wMls_R6ZNJ6aOiyMQXWh11V6szVkBrZy0NIS70n918Byl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered here a number of times now and they’ve been fairly consistent with me. Be wary of people who give 1 star reviews who have had one bad experience out of their many and throw up a bad review.

They’ve been great to me every time and I’d go back to them if I’m ever in the area of this specific location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPj1ZXjqB0eZY6kwdgh6gRDIcyzeU5GjzpIDnU3&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2020-1-24"},{"Name":"Thomas Waite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZnL5d79bpI4w6UuYfxXFy-IlThp-PA5mIhGiGAcrgzokBw2doHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Piping hot, what felt like pounds of dough, delicious gooey dough and was finished more quickly than their tracker. (Which is admittedly automated and not actually tracking what's happening in the store though I still like watching the little bar fill)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devin Mowbray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8o9zHvcXHzuepg1gIDqB2ZneIWb6K2fXDNZyAJ5lCGDvdovcq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They used the wrong sauce on the pizza, I called and the guy said he'd add some store credit to my account. UPDATE: never got the free pizza. I just made an order for the first time since then and I got a call from them saying they cant deliver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYJtoZvhultrvK1Wqy1C6NWZq6mfvXXBKvoxs7&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2019-4-11"},{"Name":"Jill S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI5ikzdbEeWw39PyuQSQkjtuQFCGzsAQQZw6KJbatxyDlFr78TsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such amazing pizza!!  We love the 6 cheese, Canadian and the spinach feta (amazing with a thin crust!).  I’m sure the others are great too but these are our favourites.  Love the coupons too!  Makes it affordable for a large family or party!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Jurka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8Q4YZeKE_kYD6glXOeyWCX6U02LFfLD97Bz1YyMXIccr3Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been getting bbq sauce drizzled on top of my pepperoni pizza for 10+ years but today all of a sudden it’s against policy at the Aldergrove location and instead I was offered the chance to purchase a dip which btw is not the same sauce. I ended up taking my tip and heading to another location who low and behold had no idea what they were talking about and put bbq sauce on my pizza 👍🏽 will not be going back to the Aldergrove location!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNESHsRNIiC4VrQqqicOp4fMHqgkPTrcPeuckrX&fid=0x0:0x984fd7a3c9156984"],"When":"2023-5-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paul Intile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-RdF6AqnACOqZqUL4lGMbRn0v2LQUG3z990_n-NEYD3TIS02q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Deluxe “Bro pack” (9 perogies) hot lunch with sausage on Friday. It was delicious! Better than any fast food place for the money, that’s for sure. Their frozen perogies are also amazing; we’ve had them several times. And everyone’s always friendly here. Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeaDUQKEJlbvPjbAG9SMVsfMCIX5RDC6pcg7zu&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service and perogies! I’ve been wanting to grab some perogies from Veronica’s for years now and finally had the chance to pop in yesterday. Service was delightful. Even talked me through the best way to good them. I got the deluxe and made them last night, they were delicious. Also got the jalapeño popper and plan to make them tonight! Please support this wonderful local business! I’ll definitely be returning!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ6fwsSHBI6QqspPHKo45iyEp6zruzML6c8rcK&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Rachel Stephens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGsdjSv1O_vgn32KLkelaO9Nw1vBtGCZ0CTwqr6vVKEq3Kybo32Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I joined yet another gluten-free group on Facebook and noticed someone posted about Veronica's Gourmet Perogies making gluten-free pierogies once a week to pick up on weekends. Apparently they clean their entire kitchen so it's safe for celiacs like me to eat their pierogies.

Within 30 seconds of seeing the post, I messaged the business by leaving a comment about how I wish I had known about them earlier because the cut off time had already passed to place a gluten-free order for the week. Within 2 hours, I received a response and they let me squeeze in an order because I live in Las Vegas, USA.

Two days later I flew up North and drove our rental car to pick up pierogies after sitting in Vancouver traffic. We made it 20 minutes before they closed and they had my frozen order waiting for me. I saw that they also sell a gluten-free pork sausage for $7 CAD (precooked I believe) and added that to my order.

We had a kitchen in our time share so I cooked up the sausage. It was very nice. I brought a cooler picnic basket with me through the airport full of ice. Because I have Celiac disease, I can bring food with me on planes. Security checked it and luckily, the pierogies are professionally packaged, labeled and sealed so I was able to bring them across the border.

I believe we paid $16 CAD for 12 pierogies. We got 12 garlic lovers and 12 delux that are seasoned with feta and bacon in the mashed potato filling.

The instructions were clear and accurate. They were easy to cook once we got off the airplane.

If you're Celiac, preorder from them. I don't know of a single place in the States that even offers gluten-free pierogies, so this is likely your only chance!

Visited: April 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6C08OqboGv0jjfCp_rby2YVTNEIA734rsUFln&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Scott Perry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA62UgdjYO9FAc0ZgOmsWeN-u7IMpZi09R1jSwr4rklxDZlO9l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently my wife and sisters ordered a large order that was being picked up by my sister from the Fraser Valley and driven to my home in E Van but part of the order was not grabbed as part of our total order that we were going to serve for a family reunion type of meal.

Veronica's son, Logan, drove into E Van on a dark, rainy evening (in Canucks game traffic!) plus they added some treats and other products to the order!

Unbelievable service - going the extra miles to keep customers happy (and it's fabulously yummy food)!

We're so grateful for this company!! Thanks Veronica & Logan!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tal Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdcX5lteMW7YGdoBC5XzBwLnJaPXqogWXPCXIWpiTDj9lk9pSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Veronica's Pierogies never disappoint. My family is vegan, therefore we always get the vegan pierogies (you can't even tell they are vegan) along with the vegan borscht. We always load up our freezer.

The shop is super clean and all the staff always greet us with a smile.

Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxWLEY8QfvnQ1zFAMmyTipQ8TTAVGUpox44KOQ&fid=0x0:0xe24f9eb92ae6477d"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Gary Pihowich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo_Zm_pNpWzz3n303EJRGHhQPI1rpyoUxD6ICc39Vp8kMvZuJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Veronica's makes Authentic Ukrainian style Perogies that my Great Grandmother would approve of. I highly recommend trying her Sunday's Fresh Perogies (Variety varies each Sunday). Numerous Frozen varieties available throughout the week.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tasenka K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJggB8xHx4ewr3cXswiDul_7Z4Fu83e2sAxOp3FYStNygTb0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious perogies I don’t feel guilty buying (instead of making them myself) because I know they are all hand pinched by real people- like babas and Ukrainian women, Same as the ones I learned from! I usually get the Vegan options. My favourites are the dill potato and Russian garlic. I’ve tried her fruit  perogies in the past when they are in season and the Blueberry ones are out of this world! The borsch and cabbage rolls are also good, but usually I can muster up the energy to make my own. They also sell things to go with perogies like sauerkraut and sour cream and sausages, etc.  And seasonal crocheted perogy ornaments for the tree! I love this small business! Veronica is always a delight, she makes you feel good when you come in, and I see her giving back to the community. I feel lucky to have a business like hers near me, and so should you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amy Strobel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlXZnWwbPYeEBjVfx0mAELywBS7D4ukLoqLoZ567llPGFVKIk_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celiac review- Veronica’s perogies are amazing! So tasty!! They clean the kitchen top to bottom, sanitize equipment and wear fresh aprons! And best of all I didn’t get sick!!!! I will definitely be back for more! 😋","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryley Crayford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ7Bsz8BtdfGGrw7WPcBw95UDG6XqixPZHKBnp8SAmEMK7W1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We stopped in as a couple to have a quick meal before the movies.

Ordered  2 Teen Combos, the restaurant was busy with 3 people ahead of us and at least 5 still waiting for their food.

After taking our order it took 15 minutes for the kitchen to produce our burgers and an additional 10 more minutes to produce our fries... Needless to say our burgers were cold by the time the fries arrived.

After taking 25 minutes to be able to eat it was disappointing to say the least.

Been to this location many times over the years but this was definitely the worst service I've experienced here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shenandoah Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqqyWHIdvWbCR0SUbsytrSLAtU9KSLuFOcqs1soDWxH_UWQ1rj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My husband went out of his way to pick up burgers for us tonight because I wanted burgers, but I am allergic to cheese, so he asked for one without. But he got home after half an hour of driving and both had cheese all melted into them and it's too long to go back, so now I'm washing my burger and hoping it doesn't have any residue left. We're both sad that we paid for this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw0GqnrgN8KBf4imVwn2jvxZ6tmYo1jLXn8qAl&fid=0x0:0x2eaaace5097b6da3"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Nancy Pech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqMSXXkUn-mA21ybHJLVVItfwPo-HXe0gG56O3z08Tq4KlwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went here for the Halloween kids pack and decided to get dinner for the family. We waited in the drive thru for over 30 minutes and found out at the payment window that the kids meal is not free unless it was dine in. I went through three advertisements and it was not noted anywhere that it was a dine in only deal. I was surprised to learn about the stipulation at the window and the cashier proceeded to ask me " do you want it or not?" In a rude tone. I did not appreciate the customer service provided when given misleading information through A&W's advertising. At that point, we took our food and left and additionally, to our surprise, the drinks provided were also wrong. I would not recommend coming to this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arun Sarasan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpb7xy7H2HMPhXGtXxAE_Iujiw1TWe6jr5snMAUyzbODzyhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional customer service by Shubham. He went above and beyond today.
I was at his store for breakfast and I forgot my wallet; and he paid for my meal. Is that amazing and we need people like you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wayne Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSW27WloSv-Ltl4n7UXxgV821Nl6OZFtsc45AZkP9nS4WkVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drive thru order and now almost every time I order they tell me the total but when I get the machine to pay there is no total so I ask them to show it before I tap and they say they can't, couldn't really understand what I was asking ? Seems a bit sketchy to me, anyway asked for a receipt and will compare my bank charge with the receipt and if it differs I guess I'll sit on hold with my bank for an hour until i reach a customer service agent to complain. And the the fries are cold !!! Seems like they are now always cold ! Gone down hill here...w'ont be back there as gave them too many chances.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Royer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCTBWZctKVbXLo_R3by2XLM-2T6Iq-7HPq6SIpzj-7QYb96YKp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Orderedbthe Chubby Chicken sandwich.  Received the Anorexic Chicken sandwich (chicken patty was very thin).  Staff was friendly.  Fries and root beer were good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C vdM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqpCDnjz1LQHBT6m_-XpDVyKgcFVlaaO6F0r9gUqhOAuQBf1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently used the A&W drive-in service, and it was a great experience, largely thanks to the excellent service provided by Shubham. From the moment I pulled in, Shubham was quick to greet me with a friendly and professional attitude, ensuring that the ordering process was smooth and easy. As soon as I place my order at the mic he already knows it's me and what I usually order.

The food arrived promptly, hot, and exactly as I ordered. What really stood out was Shubham’s attention to detail—he made sure everything was correct, checked in to see if I needed anything else, and delivered everything with a smile. It’s rare to find such attentive service, especially at a drive-in, and Shubham made the experience that much better.

I’ll definitely be returning to this A&W drive-in location, knowing the service is consistently excellent. Thanks again, Shubham, for making my visit a pleasure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amyann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9h724YdvHaF1NyioaDsN6xRNEeWTOAdoL8U7OK9zewN3n5MCP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cost of food here went up. The quality went down. Usually when I have a mozza burger and poutine I can NEVER finish it. This time I finished it and wasn't even full. The burger patty was comparable to a mcdonalds kids cheeseburger patty. And the poutine when you dine in is served in a dish thats half the size of the take out container for the poutine they give you when you go take out  ... I was appalled. So expensive for mcdonalds quality...never again am I going to a&w","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Platinum edge Gaming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5z7ocM7A9QGCTqPxscn445CrJd9uzX5h5N05_dFzvSl9S1tk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to give a huge shoutout to Brian. He is an absolute gem of an employee—always hard-working, incredibly polite, and goes above and beyond to ensure customers have a great experience. Every time I visit, Brian's positive attitude and dedication stand out. He is a true asset to this location and deserves recognition for his efforts. Honestly, he has all the qualities of a great leader and should be promoted to manager. Keep up the fantastic work, Brian!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dylon Burkart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXbBNxKMca5c8VkQhPG8kij4oFnOrQPPEKvaFictbFaQY6qg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A review for Brian. In an industry where customer care tends to fall behind and each customer is nothing more than a numbered order Brian has remembered us. Kept it professional, while keeping his job #1 but returning a sense of appreciation to his returning customers. His ever positive attitude is a breath of fresh air, we wish him the best in anything and everything he does. McDonalds is lucky to have you on staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristin Cote","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlsZjHQpVbzUo519-_sdr7hAomHbNkLWSEndEh5R9rhgRHn8UE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This has to be the worst McDonalds ever. Every single time I go through the drive thru my order is wrong. Last night there are 5 of us in a truck going through the drive thru. Whike we where ordering the lady was super impatient and rude. When we get to the window she hands me some bags and I check my order because well its always wrong and sure enough they shorted me a medium fries and my happy meal. I asked for the happy meal and fries and she gets me the happy meal and than says you didn't order 5 meals even though I did have 5 drinks. So I said I ordered 4 meals and 2 cheeseburgers and a medium fries and medium drink she gets super rude and goes and gets her manager. The manger comes over and says you didn't order. So I said than I need to buy one and she gets super rude rolls her eyes starts arguing with me than slams the drive thru window as hard as she can and goes and grabs me my fries. I don't know why they have to be so rude. I always thought McDonalds was about good customer service. It was a medium fries that they didn't hear me order so I said I would pay. I don't understand why I had to be treated so horrible . My husband goes here almost every morning for the first 2 weeks we lived here for breakfast but since they never had McGriddles he stopped going there at all. The owner needs to teach his staff customer service training. I will drive to Langley or Abbotsford for McDonalds from now on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarbjit Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpoeiFX0Oi2mfwjcYcqPfDfAfZCjegbPMFxUajM_OhXawvtHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It’s 2:30 AM, and I’m exhausted. The last thing I want to do is write this complaint, but my experience at your drive-through about 45 minutes ago definitely warrants sharing.

The girl at the drive-through, wearing a brown sweatshirt and large glasses, was rude while we placed our order. My son had changed his mind mid-order, which seemed to confuse her. I thought she was adding a second meal rather than replacing the first one, so I tried to clarify by repeating everything. She abruptly snapped at me, almost yelling, "I got it!" Her reaction took me by surprise, and even my son, who usually stays calm, was shocked.

When we got to the window, I mentioned that I found her response rude. Instead of apologizing, she got defensive and agitated. When I asked for her name so I could speak to her supervisor later, she refused to give it and then slammed the window shut.

I visit Aldergrove regularly, staying weeks at a time, and switched to McDonald’s for my coffee from the Tim Hortons across the street because of the incredibly delightful service I receive from Brian at the drive thru. I recognize that working the late shift is unpleasant and difficult, as I too have recently done graveyard shifts in a restaurant, however,. that is not a reason for attitude towards paying customers.  I genuinely think this young lady could benefit from some customer service training from someone like Brian.

As a Punjabi person with years in hospitality and service, it really frustrates me to see rude comments about us on social media. After tonight’s experience, though, I can understand why people sometimes feel that way. I hope this feedback is helpful and that it encourages some positive change.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trevor Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbti2GWbWUVVS1VT-Cwy_QcvMGjcL36n3i03y_nnekuVXxyjMJNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"McDonald’s has ALWAYS been great even though I will sometimes eat at the other fast-food joints… But because Trump loves McDonalds AND because they got world-wide attention when one of their workers called 9-11 that led to the capture of the “CEO Killer”, Luigi Mangione, I’m very happy they did and put the Altoona, Pennsylvania location on the map 👍🏼","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalie Bryant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-o7CKzU-dl2H0f_Qe9d5EC0Xb6pfbvuB9_pTU6vmREbJvIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This location says that it is a 24 hour location for drive thru and eat in yet they lock there doors anywhere from 10pm onward almost every single night. Tonight I
came at 10:10 the doors were locked and some guy came to the door and said the store was being power washed inside and that it would be a danger to let me in and told me to go walk thru the drive thru. Are you kidding me you want me to walk thru the drive thru I come to this McDonald's almost every night before I go to work and the service keeps getting worse and wo
rse. There is clearly a customer in your restaurant for 15 mins from 10:15 - 10:30 but I was told to walk thru the drive thru worst customer service ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhndW9IiVbXQVR9Rtk70ZoqU0V1ZUINLNMDfc2&fid=0x0:0x70b5126d66e3a256"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Irish King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQw6fRdFF-VQ_YAc6zYe44z2Sv-O_zd3aKMHNb9rY9y56E8g9iGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately for the community members of aldergroove were stuck with the horrible service at this location.  Just ordered a double quarter pounder Blt.  They chucked the food in a box and kind enough to included a huge end of the lettuce.  The location needs a complete audit and some mystery shoppers.  Hands down worst McDonald's around.  Don't stop here plenty of great choices at each corner, they would be happy to take you money and give you quality in return.
This is not the first time but it is now the last. Can't knock the staff when managment is to blame. Hands down worst McDonald's in BC","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Evans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2iXAqjVeneujT02InS5UMF4w8VpzuiRrMRXbpdwHnJFSEdSJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service is the worst I have seen in years, as one who works in service industry it was completely unacceptable. The customers around me felt the same way, everyone was talking and saying how no orders where being taken or completed. The crew was in the back fumbling burgers and not having anything ready, the least they could do is acknowledge that the customers are there waiting to order, the most we got was a finger pointing at our face to wait. Honestly disrespectful, one person I would like to highlight was grace she was rude taking my order ruder serving my food and had some of the worst body language displayed I have ever seen. She repeatedly rolled her eyes, scoffed at my order, and had no sense of urgency I was waiting at least 10 Minutes to order, all I was getting was a refill on my drink and a hamburger using my monopoly game piece. The customers around me would agree and had very similar experiences. When I received my hamburger it was clearly sitting there for a long time the Ketchup was all the was trough the bun soaking it, while the top bun was as hard as a rock sitting under the heater for too long. It is honestly unbelievable that people just don’t have manners anymore or the decency to be a good human anymore it shows a lot about who the company hires and how the service industry is just going down and down. I come here often after baseball practice and it never changes this was the last straw for me.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVZMVi230Ra3hWeAcKIoMpyeLMSWFQ2xkY9PdwY9F1OSbaUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great donuts!  The apple fritters are huge.  I couldn't finish it and saved the other half for later.  I really liked the strawberry chocolate one.  It has chocolate cream in the middle.  So good.  Definitely worth a try and I'll be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFvjrN6cyeaAKfZm6WgG_X8bOdi79LATQwOx1j&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The variety of donuts—plus bites and twists and the huge and delicious apple fritter(!)—is worth it. Fun and just enough funky enough. Price is very good for the quality of food and service. I’m going back for another fritter and to try the cinnamon twist!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOZyaYgvz72iO5mKNhcbvHQCb_66_eW0Oukaw&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Princess K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCM_T1SBbdqP6IOybsih_CsnLLCQsc8VKA0xXgB_lNDV064K9U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a MUST-try hidden gem of a donut
shop! Drove out from Chilliwack just to try their fritter, as it is so hard to find a real in store fried fritter that are huge!

Their apple fritter is so BIG with nice chunks of apple and all those nooks and crannies. This is definitely my absolute new fav place for fritters!! They’re so crispy and crunchy and so so tasty! Made fresh and not that pre frozen junk most places sell..

Staff are amazing and the owner (if she's the one that runs the social media who I chat with) is absolutely amazing, kind and so helpful! Truly make you feel like a valued customer.

Can't rave enough about this lovely place!! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQuhrg5QUSPFRpGhkg0yWA5TGtMWGrbiK6Vc7y&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing all around! Food, service and atmosphere.

The lady behind the counter greeted us instantly and was super helpful. We got there shortly after lunch so there wasn’t a full selection but still good options left to choose from.
I’ve been following this place on social media for a while so it was nice to finally make it to try it out.
Highly recommend the fritter, it’s huge but well worth it! We bought a few different ones to try out.

Highly recommend Hive donut hut!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP2ZIc4F7PK1-FU_mo4Nf3GWWPaWKyYjaXX9Aw&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Brittany Koop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCN6yVI0iNR54-Bax9vL7yIbxC43H2vamEQzdqUvMeQ4Gm3I8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love the location, the vibe and the staff. I ordered some Homer donuts and the smash burger fries. I will 1000% go back for those fries. The donuts however I didn’t love how they had a flavour in them? Possibly strawberry? I’m not sure but it tasted artificial and I just didn’t love it. The donuts were fresh though! Just my opinion on the flavour.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug Wiens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEJQzlwSnFNgwZgIz_49QUIh5YrmXuvexImjfYGx12BGWMkw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great to have delicious “old school” donuts.
These are quality donuts the way they used to be made before companies started using pre-mixed ingredients to cut their costs. You won’t be disappointed with any they sell.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynne McGowan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJREMz7O6lI7R8CYca-rB2EslZb-5GTzrVjw6hb7uE-7kWrHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been looking for an amazing apple fritter, I can give up my search. They are amazing and actually have apple in them. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMATz_WcbEa5uXrzJYqAKgN74GpGQux4pbvS0wf&fid=0x0:0x5c86981b5fa373e1"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Cody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWySkgkaQ4CPfZtn9M5Rfs6puRSJsfmEg_J8FeELmGC9RhjaR6nfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The donuts here are great. 4 or 5 stars depending on which donut you get. The smash burgers though are amazing! I've had the bacon BBQ and the mushroom Swiss so far. Bacon BBQ has the perfect amount of delicious homemade sauce. The garlic aioli mayo is so good and the BBQ sauce  is even better. Fresh pickle, crispy onion, and cheese melted on a perfectly grilled pattie. The bacon is weaved together like a lattice and bites through clean. All on a softly but toasted brioche bun. 5 stars all day. The mushroom Swiss is top notch as well. Perfectly grilled mushrooms and real Swiss cheese on the same patti with crispy onions. Also 5 stars... By far the best burgers you can get in the Fraser valley/lower mainland area. I'm writing this review in my truck after just leaving their and I'm seriously contemplating going back inside to grab another one. I love that they are close to my place, but it's worth the drive if you don't live close. Just don't be late. Everything is fresh and I have come by at 2:00 and they were sold out of their burger patties. 5 stars all day. Riley makes an amazing burger.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Danny Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7uIYz7vEyRlzc_sXf7AZKfTfm0JEbWhx8kEmQrYQim7HLQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food quality was stable as a chained restaurant. The turnovers were however a bit disappointing. They were cold like they were taken from the shelves of a supermarket...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9IPR5wNa8BWjXIg1kmA6fANCdtbi3u6z33gg7&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what can I say pretty impressed with our first visited. Right we walked in, wow clean and everywhere looked wow for us. I like cleanliness and organized especially the restaurant is the most important thing for me. Amazing customer service and we loved everything we ordered. I normally didn't like fast foods and I barely have it but Arby only place I can eat without upset my stomach or dizzy or throw up. I didn't like french fries but can't stop eating their curly fries, so delicious! Really clean washrooms and a lot of parking spot. We just moved here so this place will be our favorite place. Thank you we had such a great time today for our first visited both me and my friend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMECWt9h7gpEwwo-8iHNpelq1sAVjty_JjamA48&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2023-1-12"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh and juicy burgers with curly fries. I tried spicy fish sandwich and that was good in taste.

Friendly staff and spacious outlet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0Stb8TePWGt4rvAIuHqLHJyG_7tYiF--Q9T4u&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Alex Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh2B0SBidCJr18JIydy1YvgrNEDCrAGnyabxL4oDVJbnt2_Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ate the number 1 combo. I enjoyed the messy roast beef until it actually got repetitive. It was getting everywhere and salty as ahh. Plus the curly fries are actually so garage. 1 stars for the fries. I don’t get why people glazed the curly fries. I’ll try more but honestly this is a solid 3 stars for mid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elijah Levesque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7Aczv7Ghc-Yorwk6DsXa-HtxJfAu1znMhtnvYvSc2hJofQRM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean space, good architecture besides tables, not too much leg room. Appreciated the open layout plenty of space while ordering. Cashier was nice. But at the top of it all the food is what made this dining experience incredible. I got the chicken Swiss and bacon sandwich and the variety and strength held in the flavours were remarkable. Going into the restaurant, expectations weren’t particularly high, but they were most definitely exceeded. 8.6 out of 10 overall. Will be coming back soon if the opportunity presents itself!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiY8ysBjyJcViql_ofFIiOqubIUSlFxB5EgVEOmpGrGAkCTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Order the new Triple cheese turkey blt. Looked so good in the photo on menu. What a disappointment. Bad lettuce, Mushie tomato, thin precooked microwave bacon, squished bun. nothing like the photo - size wise and presentation wise. Husbands double beef and cheddar was good. Photos added.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE4Y4724N9BMHmoFm3ZObQcDjKspg1b7QO_-qt&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2023-4-20"},{"Name":"Poinciana CPU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdibQ2gubUyoRUvTaX40BeneNjXu2Ge9hW-Tz6WToj05_X6cM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent But they are missing some menu items that the US Arby's counterparts have such as the potato cakes and the arby's rib sandwich which is OUTSTANDING -
Hey Arby's management - bring the rib sandwich to Canada","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTlvv5fXWpnx2YTbOTERFQ7Qf2gZ-xWEl2aSQ9&fid=0x0:0x49f9dbeda8426cf0"],"When":"2022-12-27"},{"Name":"Dean Ziyone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDfsPi251XGpQm-15MJODmGslvopFJzSP9iFENEYFLmKJP2LgBNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sunday night 9:00 pm purchased 2 smokey beef special 2 for $9.
She said they were out of battered oinion string. I asked could I get some cheese for missing onion. She told me the cheese cost more. I said just some to make up for the missing battered onion.
I ate one and started feeling sick 🤒 4hours later. I started loosing my caugnitive ability. I thought I was catching my friends couff from a throat irritation he had for a week. Went to bed that next day I felt okay and ate the other burger. This time it hit me instantly and went back to bed the whole day. I am still having this insatiable appetite to eat to make this feeling go away. I hope nothing jumps out of me? It is getting me concerned. I still have the wrappers. Anyways that what happen and that gut feeling is bothering me alot right now. I half to eat something.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Devlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUM1WGpVmQ8GMr0lpbrvDP3HJ1p5BpA4mdAh6hWVWnWnv04p29=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hey there, I ordered pizza after camping on the long weekend. It was very good. I ordered again and it didn’t really taste the best. I called asking for a refund, the lady was sincere. She felt really bad for the bad pizza. People make mistakes. I recommend this place because she could have just said sorry I can’t help you but instead she gave us some good pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Our daughters were craving for pizza but the one we wanted to visit no dine in, we didn't know so we walked in to this pizza place which no customers. A guy was on the phone so I thought a customer or delivery guy waited for food but later turned out to be a staff there because he didn't welcome us. Then a lady came out with serious face, not even a smile or greeted us until I felt awkward so I asked if we can dine in, she said yes. We had to connect the tables ourselves. She just sat at the counter remaining serious face like why did you here I really wanted to walk out but the girls insisted to have pizza and hungry. The whole time my husband ordered, no smile, nothing until we were about to walk out. She came out to ask if the pizzas ok. My husband liked it so she smiled for the first time. So we won't go back. Not only one place we can have pizza in Aldergrove","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyijSPPpygRAR4_KQL59AUcmGWeDuBel3yX0OS\u0026fid=0x0:0x10d432607e47bccb"],"When":"2023-2-1"},{"Name":"lela grierson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKovxPHlP_pSw5I-5WV5o_M_DPjC1CM9dY20-rbWPo1FMOUtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pizza not good any more last three order pizza old doesn’t taste good will never order again.. used to b good what happened??","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherried Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0Z7_tVpj4QCds8dWontqVSw8ATN1p-8LRd2I1NgjVirNfz8JT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Received my pizza still raw. Ordered 2 smalls and added my own toppings xtra cheese. Pick thick crust as it’s also thin","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juanita Sjostrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7qWxX4V5eATVNbtAq5TOQ4B6o2ufbUNs4sEhlaC_aFQdE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a taco pizza because they used to make the best.  Sooo disappointed.  Barely any toppings maybe a handful of cheese on each pizza, lettuce pieces just thrown on.   Sparse toppings. I'll never order from there again not worth my $$","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Mckay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnk1tQoRHUFH53PQ36XCkijTTN0Jjb4JlgvHXvf94uX1Nyc0WB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is not very often you come across a 5.0 rating, so I tried it out. The delivery staff was absolutely amazing. He explained how it's family for 35+ years that keeps it great! I tried super Hawaiian and chicken fajita pizza. Both were absolutely delicious and I couldn't put down. Even as I was putting it in the fridge I snuck another slice. The toppings are real and fresh! The top layer was just in long enough to create that beautiful cheese topping that crunchs when you bite in. Honestly I don't know where they get the ingredients but I am going to believe that they buy everything fresh from the farmers markets they have all around Aldergrove.\nThank you to these owners and family for keeping it real!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Dairy Queen Grill & Chill
descriptions: Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh2B0SBidCJr18JIydy1YvgrNEDCrAGnyabxL4oDVJbnt2_Cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I went almost every Friday to 2016-2017 after school club. The service is great because they would call you up when order is ready. The manager use to give my friend free food because how often he went haha. The cake designs were actually Comedy gold. The manager would let any image or writing slide on the cake.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pam Buckshon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkGcrsTBdpsfDJmbTx0BC6ext62NUK4FmnjrTCFHP1rQHvL465XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good burgers and fries. The kids love coming here. Ice-cream is obviously decent with quite a few variations available on some items. Not the cheapest but that seems to be the case everywhere these days. Like small fries and two medium blizzards are $20, for example.

The ice-cream cakes are also popular with our family. Pretty tasty if you like a lot of sugar.

The staff is very friendly and even brought our order outside when it was ready. We walked over as a group for a birthday party after our session at the Otter Outdoor Experience. It's only half a block and turning left onto the Fraser Highway can take an extraordinarily long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvZ1UemfdLEaSKMXCiYDIAVD13sKu7cBCkFSgd&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2022-7-15"},{"Name":"Dmitry Katyshev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3lxr1C1amiUkWVzIk5XGrDSxKb_gp3vJf1cdhUP4ICo9ujVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am beyond disappointed with the manager at Dairy Quin. His behavior towards the staff is absolutely unacceptable. He is rude, condescending, and clearly lacks basic managerial skills. Instead of leading by example, he seems to find satisfaction in belittling his team. It’s disturbing to see someone in a leadership position acting so unprofessional. No one should have to work under such a toxic environment. He thrives on making others feel inferior, and it’s disgusting. This restaurant deserves a manager who respects and uplifts their employees, not one who drags them down.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just went in for treats. Really clean and organized plus good and fast service. So will be back for meals. Pretty happy with our visited","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHp_VpEt3O8NzvTcq3K61MB7WYFTT5Z49vw4LJ&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2023-3-14"},{"Name":"Deb B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDbP3nEX_Uf7JWJnDafGPKEq7T3muGuMsq_lGLaRwInbUMrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This DQ is absolutely horrible! I had tried this place a few years ago and I gave it 2 stars... now it is down to 1 star! 👎The food was awful and the portion of gravy you get for dipping is a ridiculous joke! It is barely a tablespoon of gravy in a tiny container (manager says it is 1oz)! And when I asked for a bigger container of gravy, I had to pay $1.05 to get a slightly bigger (2oz) one which was equally ridiculous! I'd also ordered a 4 pc Chicken Strip Basket... I got a bunch of TINY and hard as rocks pieces of Chicken Strips instead of 4 actual normal sized Chicken Strips! If you tried to bite the pieces you could end up with broken teeth in fact! When I took the food back in to get a refund the manager Robyn did apologize and give me my refund, however, his explanation was that the Franchise reduced the size of all "dips" and "gravy" due to inflation raising their costs... and the Chicken Pieces was the fault of "suppliers". What ever the reasons, this is unacceptable and is a for sure rip off for customers! Please see attached photos of both the gravy containers and Chicken Strips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEHIWC8Hrpf9Dlit__uyIrFUMGXrEaVUBNNZHj&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2023-10-2"},{"Name":"Chirag Panchal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8-qc6-zQY5U0Yo7X11gH3apizNJlw_cgpHt6gbvWyDmO2vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Paid $8.18 for strawberry cheesecake Med. I have got only 2pcs of cheese in blizzard. I would like to say here is just don't be so cheap. At least give 6 to 8 pcs that's is the reason I ordered the blizzard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5yefQ7ybGMYUNfTd94LzfoxYioTEg_UARPOQr&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Tanveer Wander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAIPlZNHmLocy0goFK6XoaNOq46o80Vhqu7xjCx2zKuuGRyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday i bought a cake for my friend’s birthday from this dq. The decoration of the cake was very nice, also the staff of this DQ was very nice and helpful. I will defintly recommend everyone to visit this location😊.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq8Ff5G9cKQgPS8-SWzPVigJrxbGx4b9HE3Kur&fid=0x0:0xf39edd4df21f4a37"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Krystal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0fZcwF77tlJ3T7Myml3PBpzzu1nQHXbdRqUrvoTR7La7-xRx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming to this location because you always get kind friendly service, food is always fresh and the restaurant is always kept clean.","Images":null,"When":""}]
