user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kolton “kolton honest reviews”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn8DP_xqAJTPd83Hy-6p1uX1qHXGtx3qKpalqF_JqVjsMnHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My food came out in like 10 seconds. Don’t know whether that’s a good thing or not but, i get a weird vibe from here like it most likely isn’t fresh. The food I had pretty greasy but overall it’s kfc so I kinda expected it. But not the worst thing I’ve tasted. This would be probably the last place I go for the restaurants that are in the area lol idk just based on the other reviews.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"peter x","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINkfwQjnNgZXiLHNYVUVjjbRcgOxxj0mRIXNPuG8BODjEuDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought a bucket of spicy chicken to take out. I emphasized three times that it must be spicy. When I got it home, I found that the chicken in the bucket was not spicy at all. They were extremely careless about customer needs, so I give a bad review.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Hildebrandt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTVhbl7hd3Us-RB4Ypzg87bw0GG2ZLS1uhOqj-pMirgp1wL0_S=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Our family has been long time customers here, today the manager yelled at me and my husband, accusing us of asking for free food when we asked for a side of spicy mayo. We were picking up food for our family and asking for a condiment that is not available to order online. Hamed, the manager, was very rude. He started yelling at us the moment we tried to explain the situation. Every time we have gone there they don't charge for it and it's not available to add to the online order. The manager yelled over my husband and I as I tried to explain that we tried to order it online and it wouldn't allow us and he says alot of things aren't available online! Stop asking for free food! Upon opening our family meal, come to find out 4 crispy chicken tenders didn't make it in our bag. Call back and all they can do is make 4 tenders if we come back. No real resolution as we live 30 minutes away. They denied not giving us the chicken tenders but say they will make them for us if we come back just because they don't want to argue. They don't believe their customers and they don't value our business. They are the dishonest ones who accuse us of trying to ask for free food.

Won't go back to this location. Disturbed by their service, or lack their of.

I made a complaint a few days ago and still haven't heard back from them. This is why Popeyes chicken is WAY better. You actually get what you pay for and the chicken is way better there. And check this, when you ask Popeyes for a side of spicy mayo, they give you it!  No questions asked! because like the rest of us they realize it isnt coming out of their pay check and its not food its a condiment! If it was on the menu we would have no problem paying for it but they decide to charge however much for it when they so chose. Also, Way bigger pieces of chicken and way crispier yummier fries at Popeyes. Save your money. This place will scam you and leave you with a headache.

I tried to give this location another chance after they double charged me and didn't refund me for 3 months, now this.  Should have learned my lesson the first time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Hildebrandt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInlTjAfA3g8wkYqT4L1grFtpXQyGBE_ZKaL5rtbNbXRRWxGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was a horrible experience for our family today. We have been long time customers but today will make me never go back there.
First off we ordered the family special and we never received any chicken strips for our order.
Secondly we asked for spicy mayo which we have never had to pay for before and you are unable to add to your online order.
Hamed the manager insisted and yelled over us saying you don't get free food... We just ordered a large meal from you which then came incomplete. That's not food it's a condiment.
If I could give zero stars I would.
Horrible customer service with no resolution
Save yourself a headache and go anywhere else","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Rafuse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4c9_an6z0kXI9VEp7Ywq8f-8j1a0wiUvIX1HEZmeS_zuk_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Count your chickens before they hatch.
Annoying how you have to count the chicken pieces to make sure you received the correct number.
I was shorten on chicken from this location.
Will never order from here again. Should have gone to chicko chicken.....my wife was right again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Wetherill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfIpQVRyVxTx8o--98h8Jm4QiG8wmiftkgK9COtB5YG7hMIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a 10 piece bucket of chicken and the skin and batter was soggy and smelled like fish sauce. I felt a bit ill after eating some of the chicken. My girlfriend felt nauseous every time she brought the chicken close to her mouth.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjiuQ_wZpZ4orSMIhGbpqHuBlz2rX-pXKqo019UH3obN2vKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pathetic !!! No spicy . And are you kidding me ? This is a drumstick , never in my life anywhere have I ever seen a drumstick this small , both meals had the same as well as the smallest thigh pieces I have ever seen .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_I64499C3AsO0HqKqTBTg5huRFzMfx4DH6C9L&fid=0x0:0x9f21303a884523e5"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Ross Ibrahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0EnCgqia38eou2tJUYfICq-nAPdJi0JQkpkowChIT3sd5HwGQUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm not sure, but I found the chicken pieces here were smaller as compared to another KFC outlet 😆
Dang, how I wish I should have taken some photos... But I was starving!!
I ordered a three piece meal, with a request for a piece of ribs (my favorite). Upon checking, there's no rib inside. Glad I'm having it there, and not home. So, back to the counter, and they were kind enough to give additional ribs with no charge.
Still, it's a simple request for one piece of chicken rib and it shouldn't get screwed up 🙏🏻","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jen Pavel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2Z7PIAMsfPx6AMANg9-gSiokubxQRIi6L17qEDMpEDO1IvM0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff. Great prices & most of yummy pizzas. 🍕 We always choose 2-flavours Large pizzas and you can pick and choose 2 different flavours to be put side-by-side in one big pizza. Yup, 6 flavours in 3 large pizzas!!! Used to be called Classic Pizzas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chinedum Nwokeka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXV2I7zs85THenDM3DAsNPBASTd5_yg4bTzHkDvQAAfqSw7r2qOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love the pizza from Classic Pizza. Ordered the all meat pizza - ham, beef, Italian sausage, chicken and it tasted great. Customized as wanted - spicy!💯

And the good part - it’s so filling. Couldn’t finish the large pizza we got. I definitely recommend the classic pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuXXU7TSh2VrCYYOIy461XQrO6FuZUssUTf4gb&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Ryan Lua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1b7AaoAW8_3i4HIQEbwmNLNvn-Kr7gPxNxKc_OZ9_pL4K5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners have been taking good care of this place. They made sure it’s clean and the pizza’s are always fresh upon ordering.

You can definitely tell the freshness from your first bite!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Kirkwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtHYuCdQoGI4awm_jires8z8bbgVXlt3qMJFU-SYubP1X1WWM9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such good pizza!  It is our new favourite.  Fresh toppings and the crust is amazing.  Super friendly staff as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Sparling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzXkwrDlMEPefpQXePw4SVfAKq8ClSXI2sxNZN0PVV9o0ZSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time ordering here, and will definitely be going here again! When I arrived the told me the accidently toasted one of the pizzas too much, so they just didn't charge me for it! Amazing customer service, even if the pizza wasn't good I would still probably order from them. Super delicious pizza with tasty toppings, way better than all these chain pizza places!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdAGrDd8Hw5c0LBYHzitnXEp4TdbYq5gMkhWem&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2021-8-7"},{"Name":"Baljit Rai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK3Z-9L8Nibxt5RnPPm1HBiA2rCtLahAI_GkbVzPasT9e3yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered two pizzas this Sunday, one was desi style veggie and other one tandoori chicken, pizzas were so delicious,  best pizza I ever tried , I recommend everyone to try once","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kam Bad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5SkOynajuWOz_iWniekJ_SC5mMff_5XyxHVvDlSPZRFVWH21M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was great until after a few orders in. They are really stuck on making pizza a certian way. Second time now asked for extra sauce and no cilantro. Lone behold for a third time now time to write this place off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnD3IZZBZxhblsfw2QDFv8NK6gbf6sHZnVN9JW&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2019-6-3"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff extremely friendly! Your typical pizza place but it definitely is good. I have absolutely no complaints about this place, check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBiD2iDcIdMnLauEIG5Ci9k6Hhxe4aaeNBzWsb&fid=0x0:0xdd892cdcc06de99f"],"When":"2021-10-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service in a venue with cool atmosphere, lively vibes, a vast menu for a brewpub with an impressive Canadian Whiskey line up that does whiskey flights. The only thing more impressive is their even more vast line up of 50 beer selections!  Prices are fair, and portions are adequate. Place was remarkably clean as well. Great place to get together for game night (Canucks opening game tonight was broadcast), or a great dining option before/after a movie as a large movie theatre is literally next door. Enjoyed my experience here and will make this a repeat place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUXuGExEf2k1nQKq9nGoN2aFkczWCQl0EWhLyS&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I don't normally love brewery food but this place has the BEST brisket sandwich I have ever had! The meat was so saucy and fatty, it was absolutely delicious.

I also shared the beer cheese dip which had a nice beer flavor and came with both nachos and pita bread. Again, one of the best beer cheese dips I have had.

Unfortunately the clam chowder was a disappointment. It had nice presentation and tons of ingredients but it tasted like water, and there was not enough liquid to solid pieces ratio. I do not recommend the clam chowder.

The fries were also soft and tasted old. Would have preferred if they were fresh, hot, and crispy.

The food and drinks menu here is huge so I do want to come back and try more things!

Staff were very nice and attentive. Lots of seating inside with dorm patio space. Tons of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHOYh4lHPBis8GzoaZFHlhxQwO4y5yiXQnh928&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Nathan Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlKwIGO9PHjqLgc7mRGN7qYIzJ_Yb1JOij4343pL12ye4fG4D-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Just stopped here by chance, and thought why not

Walking in it's a nice expansive area, looks clean and inviting.

We were seated right away into a booth that overlooked the bar. I always disliked it when I look at the back of four managerial type people working on their laptops. People come to a place like this to get away from the office not to look at its back...

Anyhow, they didn't have my favorite Fat Tug however I ordered a house IPA that was quite tasty.

The only real reason this place gets a low reading from me is because of the staff. Starting off looking at the back of all the people sitting at the bar that are all wearing Merchant aprons, then the young person serving our table, well she didn't take into the fact that we just sat down, and she was dismissive, bordering in impatient. Ma is 83, read your audience better.

We ordered two burgers, I had the bacon cheeseburger.

Too much pickle juice in the burger caused her bun to become a soppy soaking mess, I think I ate mine too quickly for that to happen. They are messy perhaps drain the pickle juice a bit more before creating the burger.

That aside I enjoyed the burger, and we always asked "would you come back?"

No, unfortunately we won't. But do give it a try, maybe this was a one-off, you can be the judge of that!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUryv3Y3uWhrzd2HWuA8LwIJcw82yq1dP2c_Zl&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"V S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDD56Lg95QgSyRqp-OciGfYa66WYmMBVx6ekU9w-8Pk827S6u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of excellent beers available on tap or flights with a combination of great food. They also have daily specials on food. The dirty bird sandwich was on point and i would definitely recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM84-347ZG3J5Wsxaqn8zdwq25yYIZq4S4HdF0A&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Liz Zers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkOHfVpoCxPKz8bIeqIWMryF2AextqQfxb2v6V0DaflzQRcR9t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this restaurant! As someone with celiac disease, surprisingly their menu and substitutions mean that I can have a safe, delicious chicken burger and dessert. After moving I was so sad to leave this place behind but I get over now enough that I will continue to go there as much as possible.

Pictured is the delicious Dirty Bird with Filthy Fries. So good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA1rPLzBDW9IXgmoPQO6umtXrmFtvdA2-PvbK7&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Sima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa1uCjxIK38PRHyykjdDBV_mHSpwBVaybw1VktpZL1KHn9RSqO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very nice place!
Large patio with a lot of seats and a good  indoor seating. Reasonable prices. Food is very good. Great service and friendly waiters. All of the serving staff were very helpful and friendly and checked up on your table even though they were not serving your table.
They have a very large selection of beers to choose from and .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVs3RhTRAELYOFQNiYAfGo5f7U1PuwZU67y54p&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Connor Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp0N9dcsC49uBMywrSx1Ghet8CCRoNoUpzRDl2rhN0_7dqoqsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From a celiac/gluten-free perspective, this was an absolutely exceptional experience. Not a dedicated facility, but they have dedicated fryers and are extremely knowledgeable. Food is clearly marked on the menu and the GF buns are brilliant. We had a feast of the filthy fries, regular fries, yam fries, Dirty Bird and Brisket Sandwich - all were exceptional. Can’t wait to come back and try other elements of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzAVMNjvddlejdDC19QxmJIpd57I0sUy-LSo51&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Leanne F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX70PsONzL32Howlxgmq7QkOocG0M7k50MzeBvaMiLXgW2QOfT1Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We love this place. The service is good and the food comes fast. Didn't love the chowder but we are fish forward people. Found the wings to be soggy and tasteless but everything else was really good. Husband had a triple burger which was amazing, and the dirty fries were so good. Roman salad was ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnXdsVgk6BRXaeF26fo8o4Dm1RTAbUiwcemRwc&fid=0x0:0x76700d92dcb14c0c"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

title: Best Western Plus Country Meadows Inn
descriptions: Straightforward quarters in a relaxed hotel offering free breakfast, a restaurant & an indoor pool.
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenna Bolton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXPbgCWPOjI_9JHuI_cxAwmmp9-1xJ-SgnZCALSVNpJM980wQSDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We come from out of town to come to the Langley Drive-In car show and we have such a great time and I would like to thank all the staff and management for such a great stay. They're always so accommodating. The rooms were clean and if we ever needed anything all we had to do was ask .They're kind. They're patient  and they look after us really well. Thanks for making our stay so pleasant..
The pool is clean and available. There's a nice continental breakfast in the morning with all the fixing, coffee all the things that I like!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Max P1991","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD1rg881dkmkTleYjGzl56qGGoPtdSQsukO-lqroFbyO7Tgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The only way I'd ever stay here again is if I have absolutely no other option. I contemplated giving 2 stars but the room was so gross, you get 1. The doors in the hall slam hard all night long and they shake the beds. There's no soundproofing. The door between adjoined rooms blocks no sound, so I got to hear every movement from them, even the russle of clothing-couldn't believe it. My room was filthy! There was some mystery reddish brown stuff that smelled like iron on the floors and walls, and also all over the bathroom walls and inside the bathtub and shower walls. Just enough to make a long drip streak about 5 to 10 places across the entire area, bed and bathroom. They need to wash their walls, seriously! It was very noticeable upon entering the room. There was no cleaning staff at 6pm, so I actually had the front desk give me their mop, and I cleaned the entire room myself when I got there because they had no other room available. There was very clearly fecal matter on the wall under the toilet paper holder, so I went to the grocery story conveniently across the street for some bleach, and I spent a couple hours washing everything I could before I felt comfortable enough to sleep there. I told the front staff, but she said she's new. I asked her to tell the manager. I'll edit this post if I ever hear back, photos were sent from my contact info, as well as the complaint, so you know how to reach me. I submitted pictures to the staff at front desk already via email, but I have more. I tried 3 times to talk to someone about this, with no luck, so you get a review now.

Of note, the ground floor rooms have windows that can open, overlooking a very sketchy gravel path behind the building. If you're uncomfortable with that, like I was, be aware.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jake","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYNTn42uhzKgc1iwTMYa-IKKV-A_0UKLwpYNWzz8LHzh1rYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I stay at a lot of Best Westerns to travel for work and this has been the first one I have had issues with. When I checked into my room there were empty beer cans on the windowsill that weren’t cleared off or cleaned by the staff before my arrival. I was moved to another room where the sink was covered in toothpaste stains. This is the second time I’ve stayed here and both times the hotel has been taken over by youth sports teams running and yelling down the halls. Definitely not a pleasant experience and will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristen Exelby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8tVmZEeABud1-vlZvanzt47CC43ogxCDA0xC7DBMsUqSb4YUY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"General Manager would not return phone calls or emails regarding a reservation issue.  Something that could have been handled so effortlessly and promptly took over 2 weeks!  I was forced to stay a night at a higher rate as they would not honor the  initial rate I booked at.  Just a stressful, unprofessional experience with Barry the General Manager.  Our team won't stay again.  Was also left waiting at check in while the agent picked up the phone half way through check in and proceeded to spend 5-10 minutes helping that guest whilst a line up at the desk.  Other staff member (supervisor) did not jump in to assist at all.  Just a really bad booking experience.  When we complained of slamming doors and kids running and yelling in the hallway the desk agent gave my husband ear plugs and did nothing else.  We had to solve the problem ourselves and confront the kids ourselves or it would have went on and on.
If you are playing sports in Surrey this is a bit of a drive.  I would book something much closer.
Beds were comfortable and rooms were very clean though. No issues there.  Breakfast was good too.  My daughter loved the waffles!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanza Banza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqOLfeirv8oiZiBkLMOAoiPJ6jWIxc0bGZ_dpoNplQRlEmh4M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"this place is extremely outdated. The blankets had stains all over them. I did not feel comfortable taking my shoes off in my room. Very stale feeling no ambiance at all. Way overpriced and not up to snuff compared to the other Best Western ‘s. volume on the TV didn’t work so we couldn’t watch TV and they didn’t seem to care. The man that works at the front desk is not nice at all, and if you read all the other reviews, people will say the same thing. I would not go to this Best Western I would go to another one usually they’re pretty decent but this one needs a little bit of work. I will not repeat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ed Prior","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw8wFZqq3xihcHKQj9lvL6q0GqZwzsiw-Wi1plZsbhHIZsJf9a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place is a great spot to stop after a long drive before facing the craziness of Vancouver traffic.  Clean, comfortable, and relatively quiet, surrounded by lots of places to eat if you don't want to patronize the on-site White Spot restaurant.  We didn't go in the pool, which looked nice, and enjoyed trying the fitness room.
Where the place really falls flat is the breakfast.  They provide hot food as is probably required for a Best Western Plus, but the quality and variety of foods is not very good.  Both times we visited this year the choice was dried-out sausage patties, lukewarm potatoes, and anemic egg patties.  Aside from that, it's a pretty good place, spoiled for us by the poor breakfast offering.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfHhPp0vyvo1Wo3WY4NH1G5QOPAHGBMv_XiebXLZtHzVwVa3wkRhb3dykyKrUCZPlawDA=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"This was my second trip to Best Western Plus Country Meadows Inn. A group of more than 30 of our car enthusiasts were in town for an annual car show. Same as last year, our stay was awesome! Great service and great staff. All around excellent experience!|The on site White Spot restaurant was also great. They took great care of our entire group for dinner after the show!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shah Babur Rais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfpy04fX8eU1SWBi1gGmmSfUYeKEsc_ozYdpzlC0WdiYmJpUog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome breakfast and very clean room. Not sure why they have a 3.9 rating on Google when most hotels surrounding this hotel are in a very bad condition and have higher rating. This hotel deserves at least a 4.5 out of 5. Thanks for your accommodation","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"조아","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUwh3iCI9XvJ1_58Kv1Vd-K1t9bOp2QQxaWiCPL4gMTcenFsqU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hi I ordered earlier and I got them in Ubereats app but I'm eating chicken, and all 3 pieces of chicken legs are bleeding.
It's not just the red part. Red water came out together. I had to spit it while eating it up. I was upset. That's why I called you 8 times to raise a problem, but you didn't answer. Also my brother is sick because of it. I often ordered it, but there was no response.. I disappointed .. Im going to Never reorder","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp92BETmy2OY94D7y4TTQoHtHXdy4S2Q0d_iVQ&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Jimmy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsbYP1cWZHx71rRanOuz38YcAFiEQfK-do7A-NB4jJmRXyrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered the half and half boneless, medium spicy and snow cheese. I usually prefer white meat but figured I wouldn’t be picky and get a mix. It was alllll dark meat which is great for some I suppose but they should state that. I assume when it says half and full they mean half chick or full chicken, both would suggest a mix of white and dark which is what I expected. Mine was all dark meat which was super disappointing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn_H7AJ_dVTSyYWP_u8lSlBdd_MRyi33aMKrIM&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Carl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMHgpY4gNAcNxsjCJZezquqHjF2-t37wSg--P1LqmEVCp-Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent chicken. Highly recommended the “CHEESE SNOW”. A great wine pairing would be a Southern France Rosé","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFnqvVTzSKfYe3cC29Ty333-5GE6P1kM07yN-N&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Jora Nijjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1SrwCvR_91OwflsNXUktypNHNJBou3FUN2kfwRDbz6fyEg6MvHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered some take out from here.  The chicken was very delicious.  My favorite flavor was the Buldak chicken.  The original and Soy Garlic was also very good.  We bought the bone in this time but I would try the bonless next time.  The quality was good.  It is a little on the expensive side, that is the only down side to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlBPIbz0pIj0ZAek1uB54KfbCHYXSZlb-r-meh&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2022-1-25"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious korean fried chicken at Chicko Chicken in Walnut Grove, Langley. Batter is a little thicker than other Korean places (e.g. bb.q chicken), but still 5 stars in my books. The original and soy garlic are my favorite. Staff are friendly and polite. Since they cook to order, I prefer calling ahead since it can take 20mins for a freshly fried and sauced order.

Update (Oct.2021) - I tried the extra spicy HAEK buldak and it is delicious. Yes, my mouth was on fire and I needed several glasses of milk, but it was still worth it. Serious spice on this one! Try it...if you dare. Love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONoTKsfLRxZQ2uZWI7Kuceuhm0e4ognBkHOI_a&fid=0x0:0x6bd46f766736e802"],"When":"2021-8-31"},{"Name":"Alisha Thom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXujOxoEyJUcYNNvuzgsvO8ilLH0ZWp5Rv5b3mSVGZbk2ezq8qu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve ordered here many times before. tonight I ordered the exact same thing as I always do and when I got home, it was wrong. I called to tell them and the woman argued with me that it is correct. she agreed that the flavour I get (soy garlic) is a dark brown. I explained that what I have is more honey coloured and sweet and not at all salty, she argued. the entire time she kept sighing and complaining to another coworker I. her own language. I asked if I drove all the way back, if she’d look at it and replace it, she sighed loudly again sounding very annoyed at the thought that a paying customer might actually want what they paid for, then said they wouldn’t replace it and theres nothing she would do.

I will forever more go to Chitos chicken down the street. They may be more expensive but the quality of food is superior and the customer service is much much better. So disappointing for a Walnut Grove Business","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Grecu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRF50Yszo6VHwTXer7CgPOABOaF-7CJkoAkbdxNc6_QZf4yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I feel like not enough people know about this spot, only 97 reviews and it’s been open for a long time! One of the great spots to get Korean fried chicken in Walnut Grove! Highly recommend the cheese snow and soy garlic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arsh Girgla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1LT1rdXwSzExuokFRAqQKlS8pagJkNyX-Hz7U-sqGsSLl94Dt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yangyeom and snow chicken is the most delicious chicken we have ever had.
I wish there were some sitting arrangements as well to enjoy the freshness and crispiness more quickly.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lori N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmtMtkjNfkcOZjUstSIaPewdazX3LaSbWZ-fPdp_MqWNPH1dsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing!!! They turn into a nightclub on weekends. I went on a Friday night for the After Dark Halloween Party, and I had an absolute blast. The servers were great, and the DJ was playing epic tunes! I danced the night away. I'm so excited to have my birthday party here!!! I also love all the artwork on the walls/ceiling, AND they have a little arcade section, too, which is awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR_Pyn5ODCCtASD8dquMis_9WSiv4XGEJ_UUkW&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Philippe Filiatreault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbgxGZPQVrP7MObEa8aq5atLxMSBir25PUjBU7NB6nZvGuww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Understaffed at 1pm on a Friday. Took about 10 minutes to place an order. Got our food at 1:40 with ten minutes to eat before leaving to go back to work. Buttermilk chicken sandwich was overcooked, coleslaw tasted 5+ days old from the fridge, not enough, sauce was virtually non existent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwXxp0NQndJpTt47_HdInvQJe3-EyGwU7Pc6nP&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"2nd time coming here and both times were good vibes! Quick and easy to get, good drinks, food was okay, I like the interior layout and music was great both times!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQDjusceuW1IPO_2IhDykKMxK_g5Zu3OqR125m&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came once for a fundraiser, once because we wanted late night wings (and it happened to be in nightclub mode), and once for lunch. On all three occasions the food was decent and the service was very attentive and friendly. Prices are fair.

I feel like the fried foods (wings, fries, fish tacos) retain too much oil (a sign of the oil not being hot enough) but the overall flavours are good.

Food is served until late on weekends and there aren’t too many options nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO948Ubg3hVLgjD9uhaYnZufJotVlxiEIskOK1K&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Ryan Muirhead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ5WOAJn3zPlZppWxH-h-JB1ms6nzPNJSgz_5im5qta-IKd28L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thorne in my side maybe. Hard to rate the food when they never brought it. Staying at the Sandman and went for happy hour with a group. Half the things we ordered off the menu they didn’t have. Went for brunch the next day and waited over an hour for food and eventually left after getting tired of hearing it’s coming right away. The last time we asked he just said he didn’t know if it was coming. People who arrived later were being served food. No offer to comp drinks or anything. Just excuses. Poorly managed spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food but the service for the second part of our visit was not so great.

The inside of this restaurant is very spacious with lots of great spots to sit. The decor is great and I especially loved the bookshelves and perusing the books that were there.

They have a good selection on their menu and some good options for happy hour. Had the corn dog happy hour and wished I had ordered the trio as it was very tasty. I enjoyed the perogies and my friend had the fish and chips- both were delicious. The French fries were especially delicious- nice and crisp and very flavourful... I would come back just for the fries.

Near the end it felt like our server had forgotten us. And when we were finally able to ask for our bill, it took about ten minutes before she reappeared. This was annoying, but overall I still think it's a great restaurant and I look forward to coming back, and hopefully the service will be better next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxaTZQayIMyZAMGy7t5jbSdwYZdMeA1RfGV7ip&fid=0x0:0x41b740371a8a4d7a"],"When":"2022-4-21"},{"Name":"Melissa Moretti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGNuTLSsgCXXcz9wovHeN_ZoLBKSItE-QDlbuPetn07Y71rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went to oak and Thorne last night as the prices were decent. We got there and had an amazing waitress. We got our pepperoni pizza within 15-20 min it was so oily and as I took my first bite I saw a mouse run across the floor near the entry way of the restaurant. Will not be going back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stacey Hood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVznOGUSzzv0qwt76iwof1jvM3q6fBJ0JYrW35B8xH8BPLqSGqyGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some friends and I booked reservations here for the Tyson vs Paul fight and we had a really great time! The service was great, even with it being crazy busy and the food was delicious. We will definitely go back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lorie R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrjQmMekEW7VIAhb5e0Y9mzrzcbkDFf4gZ5vwPrwyLSi4ANcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent service, delicious appies, dinner, & dessert. It’s so refreshing to go somewhere, especially for a birthday, and it turns out perfect. Our server was very attentive and provided top notch friendly service. If I could give 10 stars I would. Will definitely be back — I’m already craving the baked garlic shrimp!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfKpP2ORTpo9CBxwaCWWl-oYojZOFbeOBg1P8x&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Jilla Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt4msPQ-ZtWKxHrbgA-jPbAFgGk28DTO3iW4ZviMYijJh39A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came I n for my 65th Birthday . Ordered 8 Oz steak which was cooked to perfection and delicious with sautéed mushrooms on the side. Had Mocha ice cream cake ( to die for).
Thank you Jesse for your great service .❤️🙏🏻👍.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ0WmCEOvt9B248I9JxLw1awhy4Dk0Gxwec9Yk&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"V Rod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTrzw13i53c8jaZAQC-VybAVyFuKfYJ-hgTzXZbk5cO2LMW5zu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite chain in Canada. Matt was an excellent bartender and server. Prime Rib sandwich was delicious! French Onion soup never disappoints. Finished with Billy Miner dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIZH_exRNtxbOnrNtyVxjhJzZui6NGJpM6K8XB&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Agata Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-YULIycbfinB9D1WRgBT2Rg-LTwqfjwr1V9CxEB_PH_6Vxoucmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quite consistently this location of the Keg delivers and fixes any issues that may arise. We last dined this week for our anniversary and had a few mishaps (wax on forks, mashed potatoes sloppy and without flavour, dull steak knife) however our server Holden was very good at rectifying all issues quickly. My mashed potatoes got subbed for a twice baked which was great and the cutlery got fixed. On a previous visit, when we booked a reservation with OpenTable, no one read my notes for the reservation which was disappointing, I had to bring it up with our server. When we reserve we ask for a quiter spot as this Keg can get loud in some areas. Washrooms are very clean and serviced. Pretty happy overall with this location of the Keg and looking forward to coming back again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJD4hUxwpcRlpTHBNogkOo2TMbarkPtys7TMB2&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Troy Gaglardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDtpd9uvxivFoJXG3wnvbutjdiA1u5279JuW08j7ITz7Spog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Classy

Cleanliness
Fastidiously clean

Service
Solid service

Food
Very disappointed this time.  My blackened chicken was excellent,
But the Calamari and Mac and Cheese were not good.  No flavour (completely bland, like flour taste bland), they could improve

Drinks
Good

Cost
High to mid high

Overall
Normally Recommended, but this time mixed feelings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDP87otRE1PtfxxnFLKZb6TMMhiTbxrQ5KkKI&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"whatthefuk4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6LEi31F-If0ZN1nUlwh1yJvDZQpCsFPxdXQdaeAHMr0ETGp4j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is top notch but only topped by the great service. I have always thought the keg is a little dark but is very comfortable. The bred and butter, the garlic baked shrimp the prime rib oh my haha.  It's one of our go to spots always.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrCbPnGGWTvCsVue7Y3eEyqdGGvXCZF6F-RMoy&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The fall off of The Keg needs to be studied. We came in on a Thursday night, nowhere near being packed. The service was great, our waiter was incredibly accommodating and there were plenty of drink options to appease everyone, however the food and wait was terrible. The bread wasn’t baked through, yeasty tasting. The Escargot was the highlight as an appetizer but it went all downhill from there. Waited over 40 minutes for entrees and they were tasteless. The veggies weren’t seasoned, carrots were hard as diamonds, garlic mash had no garlic and had a glue like consistency to it, definitely not how they used to do it. I know some places have a hard time with rare steak but it was cold to the touch and was mostly fat. The lobster was rubbery and overcooked, and the other was undercooked and almost slimey. The real kicker is that sometimes you can live with having an underwhelming experience or an off-night at a place you’ve trusted in the past, however at this price point it isn’t acceptable. Get it together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6BHsOx1fvTPDz78zUPx2zyKhUsgFUizL10OFl&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our server was enthusiastic and upbeat but some of the check ins seemed more transactional and quick than hearing us ask what we needed. Nevertheless - he still got my birthday billy miner special and made the effort to make that special for me. This is a busy location so I recommend making reservations. The tile can be slippery so ladies be careful with your heels! We got seated on a particular kid/family oriented side and it was a bit loud for my liking but we didn’t have a reservation so we were fine with what we were given. Good good as usual just a bit more hectic of a visit but that was partly on the crowd we were sitting near. Nice welcoming staff which always helps too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMst2neGJGvcJlNRmFJ4qp48BFdHhP5ZefOdglc&fid=0x0:0xf4dd29cf2d46a2d5"],"When":"2023-11-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying this restaurant and it was to celebrate a birthday. We ordered some appies and for mains, our table had dishes with each protein so we could try them all! Lamb, prawns, chicken, and beef. All were super tasty. Came with a huge serving of salad for each person. Our server was friendly and helped made it feel like a special dinner at the end to wrap up the dine in experience on a high note.

The PLUS was all their meats that night had the option for Halal available!! Such a bonus!

Will be coming back! Great portions, well made, nicely decorated and clean inside, and good service!

PS!! I forgot to take pics of half the dishes! We all dug in too fast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlg8hGFX_7glyLPw16pBk4kUTJas9CgdELMmvH&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Ben Jamin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBIrMGp3ssnTdFXw942j2bs17qo6QnaMCC5En6PFKO8oF8KavW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't had Greek food in a while, and this place reminded me just how awesome it is. The wait staff were super friendly, and the food was excellent. I'll definitely be returning soon. Prices were very reasonable as well—overall you can't go wrong if you want Greek food :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn0dAIUZHgphKiUuyhblxAzWcOTZg2ANdk7tLB&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good standard Mediterranean cuisine.
We had work lunch reservations for about 15 of us, service was exceptional! Thank you Viktorya. We were in and out of there within the hour. We all ordered a variety of dishes and they all looked good.

Thank you Zythos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOEv7iAznUjAEabsmjo0iB3FC5ZtYZ8APNTteg&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Kumiko Murakami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrzaF6KRvUp_QuDlErcjgBgm4H4mGAcgrFn7sjBqNDAMqeO3GY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came with a large group of 3 families to celebrate high school graduation commencement. The staff were so very nice and food was delicious!

We normally order take out and this was my first time dining inside. I will definitely dine inside again in the future!
Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipModp1_8ZYLxf_eG3UB-zHiFrHvg-cEUc20uZkr&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Having recently dined at Zythos Mediterranean Grill in Langley, I am delighted to share my positive experience. This family-run establishment, deeply rooted in Langley for many years, exudes a warm and authentic atmosphere. The cozy ambiance sets the stage for a delightful culinary journey that extends beyond mere dining – it's an immersion into the heart of Mediterranean flavors and hospitality.

The fact that the restaurant has been a staple in Langley for many years adds to its charm, indicating a level of consistency and community support. The emphasis on great food and service is undoubtedly crucial for any dining experience, and it's commendable that the owner took the time to personally ensure your satisfaction. Such attention to customers, like checking in on your dinner and comfort, adds a personal touch that sets establishments apart.

Additionally, the mention of Zythos being suitable for large groups or parties is valuable information for those looking to host gatherings in a welcoming environment. A restaurant's ability to accommodate diverse needs, from intimate dinners to larger celebrations, contributes significantly to its appeal. In summary, your review highlights the positive aspects of Zythos Mediterranean Grill, emphasizing its longevity, welcoming ambiance, excellent food, attentive service, and suitability for various group sizes. It's insights like these that guide others in making informed choices about where to dine, making your review a valuable resource for potential patrons in Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0h2LQuChQyp2sHnrB8vCA3kdqjbMcmzpir0fe&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Rick G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgZ9duDhu59qGpOJtffGNYBZe0o4MjQlXXDgFvd1GqyeK2Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had an incredibly disheartening experience at Zythos Mediterranean Grill in Port Kells. It is with great disappointment that I express my complete lack of recommendation for this establishment. From unhygienic practices to disrespectful treatment, my visit left a lasting negative impression.

Upon entering the restaurant, I observed three customers waiting for their meals at a table. As I stood at the bar, waiting to pay and receive my order totaling $110, I was approached by an older lady. In a hushed voice, she whispered, "I wouldn't eat here. Look how disgusting that is!" She pointed to the owner, who was using a mop to wipe down the fan above the grill, with food still cooking directly below it. This unhygienic act raised serious concerns about the potential for cross-contamination.

In light of what I had witnessed, I politely approached a waiter and expressed my apprehension about paying for the food. As expected, he laughed at me and directed me to speak with the owner, who was conveniently seated nearby, eavesdropping on our conversation. To my utter dismay, the owner greeted me with a smirk and callously stated, "That's just how we clean here," as if my concerns were unwarranted. His mocking attitude made me feel unheard and invalidated.

Attempting to explain the gravity of the situation, I emphasized that I have two children who depend on me for their meals. I expressed my deep discomfort in feeding them food that had been handled in such an unsanitary manner. However, the owner continued to dismiss my concerns and laugh in my face, showing a complete lack of empathy.

Faced with such disrespectful treatment, I made the decision to leave the restaurant immediately. It is crucial to shed light on the unhygienic practices I witnessed at Zythos Mediterranean Grill. Cleaning the fan above the grill while there is raw food actively cooking below it is a clear violation of basic food safety and sanitation standards. This lack of regard for hygiene puts customers at risk of consuming contaminated food, which can lead to serious health issues.

Moreover, I must highlight the unsettling reactions I encountered during my visit. Before entering the restaurant to address my concerns about payment, I had a conversation with another customer named Mariam. She claimed to be a frequent customer who knows the owner personally. I shared the video footage I had captured and explained the situation to her. Surprisingly, Mariam initially downplayed the issue, assuring me that the establishment is clean and that I should proceed to pick up my food. She even advised me to delete the video and refrain from posting it online, citing potential negative consequences for the business.

It is important to note that the waiter and the owner seemed to be aware of my intentions before I even approached them. This suggests that Mariam may have informed them about our conversation, further adding to the distrust and lack of transparency that I experienced as a paying customer.

In conclusion, my visit to Zythos Mediterranean Grill was marred by unhygienic practices, disrespectful treatment, and unsettling reactions. It is my firm belief that the uncleanliness of the establishment and the disregard for customer concerns should never be tolerated. I cannot, in good conscience, recommend this restaurant to anyone, as the health and well-being of customers should always be the top priority.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPjywBrLfYA-NnAv623KQt9w4PRPvRWwG1LOvZ&fid=0x0:0x82bf87a3db20203d"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ralph Wyatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN28UZv5zBQyNqkHdh4edz4iBwoslU-5vQSp6k9ZPs8OvdAN6z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a gathering of 25 people in the group room.  Food and service were excellent.  Our orders covered the spectrum of chicken, beef and lamb souvlaki, moussaka, steak, and salmon. Everyone was very pleased with taste and the size of the portions.  Very friendly manager and staff.  It was a delightful evening with family, friends and conscientious servers,","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Lavie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDg89QlGNoudCFoK2VbqQIuCoGJWL42o6nb1pdITun7YsWdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a huge Christmas luncheon and ordered food from Zythos. Everything was so tasty, warm and we had enough leftovers for most of us to go back for seconds and then some. Thank you to Zythos for making us a memorable lunch menu. We will definitely be ordering from you again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louise Borg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW3YoQtRSnL6dSrftCznw3yk2Sm5YWWx8ViMh7-0b9LROb9DGqWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were charging our Tesla in the lot nearby and we were starving so Ricky's was the closest place. One of the best burgers I've ever had!!! I had the mushroom melt on a brioche bun, with sweet potato fries that were crispy and cooked perfectly for me. The burger was so juicy and thick and damn tasty.
My husband had the fish and chips and I tried a bite of it and it was an amazing ratio of fish to batter. It's a bit dated decor but the waiter was super friendly and Quick service. It was quiet afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtH1sa34EbQm1J__FjFx3KCMWRY9yXZVSZ6J1i&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Anthony P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLs_ykHpfHDvJPmbpAk7xuu_rUuFVGzhemf4k3aZWq9pxQhww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had our last meal in BC here.  We stayed right next door.   If I knew breakfast was this good I would have had breakfast there more often.  Lunch menu was great as well. Thx guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR8ZD_DyZNxj_Tzgm3NdKgoa84cVO6GvRNJybJ&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Ricky’s is just across Holliday Inn hotel so very convenient if you’re staying for a night and having a breakfast, my recommendation is any kind of Eggs Benedict, serving is fast and all employees are very kind.
Plenty of free parking in front of the restaurant and fast connection on Highway one.
Thumbs up for this place👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTJ07lyrqeG59kL0i1O9MMvUF4SLACkCL0iBAq&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Terr Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUvJqIl312nnim5yQsoDvhmngJtTJvM4AIHciQ1yHjv2rkaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location was right beside our hotel so we met up there with an old friend when passing through town.
Our server was fantastic, very polite and relaxed. We got sidetracked so many times catching with each other’s lives it took us forever to actually decide on what we wanted to eat and finally have him take orders.
The food was delicious, our meals ranged from salad with grilled chicken, to a turkey dinner to a burger and fries. Everything was hot, fresh and fantastic!
And at the end of our meal our waiter even offered to take our pictures! I actually think his comment was, “No selfies, I can take the picture for you!” and he did, about three or four of them to ensure we had at least one we all liked.
If we’re ever in the Walnut Grove area again we would absolutely stop in again!
Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dean Cosmic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDpjZ7Y2icN3G7Wuc6znZ5WsLhmGcHuOpA0KMZ25qf3dUCwP3T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my go to Ricky's. I don't go very often though. Our waitress was really good, nice, friendly, checked on us. Food was good too. I tried the loaded hashbrowns and they seemed to be mainly loaded with sour cream. Burgers were well build and tastes yummy. The Benedict was plated well and we enjoyed them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaXrtY_0Vyao599ubVUQk6531sVATQyaD3rwUY&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2023-5-21"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I forgot that this place existed. Used to luv Ricky’s in Edmonton.
My experience with this place was alright I guess.

I was torn on what to eat until the tent card on the table caught my eye and I saw the schnitzel specials. I ordered the chicken cordon bleu schnitzel benny. As lucky would have it. They were out of chicken so I got the latter option for my schnitzel benny. In the photo you see I lifted the piece of meat to show how cooked it was. I had to saw through that thing and it was so dried out and over cooked. Our server hadn’t stopped to ask how things were during the meal. Had she done that I would have sent it back. Was pressed for time, took the meal to go and fed it to my pups. The bf had a good breakfast though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvnCy02fXlANTWBRlPkjU-I48VsyUhl0jsXPrC&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"brooke clemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnz30--NRKBL_pJAp8N4YTaoKNRXtARZv7wySEZSj-V4GBUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the turkey club with fries. The lovely waitress I think her name was Tatiana ♥ suggested it and asked if I wanted gravy. What a great decision. I came with good company, the food was delicious and well served. Will definitely go back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzl73gKyNHvoLHqscj0akm10CksNwrchKJ0EcO&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2023-3-21"},{"Name":"John Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX_G2KhQ4UDvw4Nu1dqA3AsXfC53tIj_AZn0iIn-6oDOg1Yst1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tomato Soup, Pasta and Fish&Chips are all great taste and big size.

Until I pay the bill and ask for packing the remaining food, I don’t understand that ordering Fish&Chips is an all you can eat dish. Because my English listening is bad, I am very embarrassed. But the staffs are very nice to explain for me, and let me pack it. They are so friendly and thoughtful that I are very appreciative to them.

My daughter hope that It would be better if there was a kids menu and there were waiters at the front to greet us so we won’t need to wait for them to come. Since they packed the Fish&Chips for us which wasn’t supposed to be packed, I still gave it a 5 star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODXpXZXXMv_IzCYOWxHvCJUxkrM2GP04K74zjb&fid=0x0:0xc8e748884dcda11f"],"When":"2020-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiba Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuHro-qapQOzrHp5ems5S0P5Yy5lxJqwsPP7Xxmp2p8J0h84Axfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Date: Nov 11 2024 @ 10:40 am.

My girls and I went out for a great breakfast time.

This White Spot is not welcoming.
As being a person of colour, I felt very uncomfortable. All waitress are seniors.
They should not have waitress who do want to work and only complain and roll their eyes.

There was four of us and I requested a booth seating than where we were given. The waiter said loudly of you want a wider seat , she stated it loudly twice, our seat there’s isn’t very much.

I said excuse me? What are you trying to imply ?

She said is that the reason why you want another seats.

1. How can someone just assume something, 2. Reason of us wanting a different sitting area because my mom was not comfortable sitting at a small table.

I ordered a class Benedict it was not tasty it was cold and my potatoes were tasteless burnt and they gave me the end pieces like the left over. (Attached images) the a bunch of small crispy unwanted pieces .

We all won’t be coming to this locations anymore.
Please do not hire senior waitress, because they can’t act normal and  simply do their job.
They might as well just stay home and pickup OAS

Just because you’re having a bad day, PLEASE DONT MAKE OTHERS DAY BAD.

Manager at this location please follow up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBvlTmE6fQvwfusLGkT68fcGtZr0PEzxWNPqKQ&fid=0x0:0x60f83ab675b3561a"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Adam Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMHrsBOCfw2yTxdERqQKMJ2ji-mtRUDAFRu6AyxgyffHuakcfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at this location has always been very friendly. The food has been good and fresh. The environment and bathrooms are always clean. We had excellent service from Colleen and Cheryl. Thank you for a great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMjrDEGqJM1NlONbpOHrnF5klCsrDmmg1PvNVl&fid=0x0:0x60f83ab675b3561a"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Curtis Polysou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMRtlOyCuysRb72_UW2gH3zC2ril0xgJXLcNkjjH3WSYtc4ovc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for lunch on an incredibly busy day.  Parking lot jammed, dozens of people waiting for tables kind of busy.
I was blown away at the efficiency of the operation here.  All staff were friendly and professional.  The wait was shorter than anticipated. Table was comfortable and clean.  Music was nice and perfect volume.  Bathrooms were clean.
Order was taken quickly. Drinks came quickly. Food came quickly. Didn't have that annoying 20 minute wait for the check.  Everything was delicious & kids left full and happy.  Our server (Ashley) was great.

1 piece of constructive criticism - the salted caramel cold brew needs a rethink.  Just packs no punch.

Anyways, we rarely go out anymore due to restaurants mostly just sucking from start to finish - but today at White Spot was great.  Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamie Duncan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIECm4QI3OVBGvKkJlEPmvDEYqyH1xur_f8VWKkQ14RhSRrrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great White Spot. Food was fresh and came on time. I was also impressed with all the amazing Christmas decorations. Lots of effort went into it. It's a well run very clean location. Will definitely come back. Great location too being right across the street from the movie theatre.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Curtis Monks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsm0NwEzhgNKyW5m2ZaP3Iprs0UA0ntaOAh6Ole3B2mJXKeD0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a regular at this White Spot location - It's not uncommon to eat here 1-2 times per week, if not more!

The food is always consistently good, no matter what time of day you decide to come by. It's hot and made exactly as you ordered.

The servers and hosts are all extremely friendly, and go above and beyond to make your visit memorable. The atmosphere is clean and open, and easy to converse with family or friends, or simply enjoy some peace and quiet if you're alone.

Highly recommend this White Spot location, and looking forward to my next visit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tara Pastora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLw4umIy-7U4pWYJl8OMt0iFCX3W2f3GHcLpLanxRaenD6-zA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family hosted a birthday dinner for our daughter here the other night. The reception on the phone when reserving was really upbeat and friendly and made us excited to be coming there for dinner. There was no issue bringing in our own cake. Service was fantastic.  Kara is a real professional and was super friendly and helpful and got us all eating in no time, no complications or issues. We had forgotten candles and she made sure they were provided without us even having to ask. Truly going above and beyond.  This was for a reservation of 13, so definitely a lot of work.  I would recommend booking here for larger gatherings and we will definitely be back. Amazing service! Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_XYu-hONYlWVKFabmSHTAIJnFyzjrhHMnxnOR-St2VApePfRJVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the nicest and most updated looking White Spot I've ever been to! It's definitely been renovated and more modern - I was quite impressed!

Food was fantastic, fries cooked to perfection and everything was very fresh.

Will definitely be making this our new favorite White Spot location.

Highly reccomended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dylan Theriault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUivnDREmWGUlN2hx1k5kow-bMR63m2_fh3w9YigKJHT2wONQfO7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our service was fantastic! Food was hot and delicious. No complaints at all and are already planning a trip back even though this is not our local white spot.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jaide Balaberda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLor9vcbVQ8HEhzw-nEfXS266XK3tM8WkzV61uOvHK6HsCR0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered steak souvlaki takeout that usually costed 19.00 and it cost 28.00 picked up. 5 minutes later I am home and open it to 4 chunks of “steak” that is literally unchewable, bland no flavour rice and uncooked potatoes. Save your
Money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQRG8HzkbL8DMxJKo37rJ4CuFv4vXawiBlJh2g&fid=0x0:0x7bde060a80d2903d"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have eaten in and ordered from here for years.  I'm not sure if I will again.  I ordered the lamb Slovaki and a side of pita and tzatziki.

The lamb was good.  The potatoes looked a little different than usual.  The salad was a bowl of cucumber with a slice of tomato, one piece of pepper and 1 olive.   It definitely wasn't worth what I paid for it all.

The kicker was that I ordered a side of pita and tzatziki.   I thought I'd get 3 pita bread, 1 with the meal and 2 for the side order.  I didn't.  For the extra $5.50 they sent 1 extra pita (so 4 halves total) and 2 tzatziki sides - one of which comes with the order.

It was so lacking that I called them and the guy basically said prices are going up.  This is what you get if you don't make it at home.

Only, O dont have to make it at home because there is a great greek place just over on 96th.  They have better tasting, bigger portions AND every time I've been there, great service.

I had always gone in person to 96th and ordered from Ocean Park by habit.  We'll, habit broken.

I almost never post bad reviews.   I call the place and talk to them directly. Usually it's a one off and not worth sharing.  However it's been a couple times in a row here and he really wasn't interested.  That's OK, I'm no longer interested either.

Just thought I'd share.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4ha4Y01PKOAtyEU64J0W4ybQ-EDzpdTZhKvm4&fid=0x0:0x7bde060a80d2903d"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Don Saumer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyuRZ1kwyvxuPyLofoLJ07WKEjNOE2UE_dlfvZsMGNydYy-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sadly I have to say the pizza we received last week was terrible. It was quite dry and definitely over cooked. The top was over done causing the dryness but the bottom was so over cooked it was almost black. My wife sent them a email to let them know how disappointed we were but didn’t hear back. She  sent a second comment and still no reply. We had tried to eat a piece each but couldn’t so it was sent to the recycle bin.
We were looking forward to good pizza instead of the brand outlets. Maybe newer owners / operators?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIadxwENoakgYqJMmcChJPhR_Q20h7_BuceoOBW4XIhbvOAyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was very disappointed this was an over cooked pizza. Should never have been delivered, should have made us a new one.
I cannot believe I didn’t get a comment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuhC9fENESu3vucz-8qgV2UBzLUQEFHOCzDSmz&fid=0x0:0x7bde060a80d2903d"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Vicki Castro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv3MXiGAt-KkZ2stx_6h6EgSWkvsWrgXiRFC6J67JH6HkDbSBx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always amazing food. Best pizza in town, great pasta, and love their Greek too! The chicken cordon Bleu is soo good. Never been dissapointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shae H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUmLnrBXdiTMCo17N3_6S3e7o5I79aVNxzpCFu3jkz4Wxtgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff was very friendly but the food was just awful. Everything tasted musty and over oily. You can just tell nothing is fresh and for the pricing you can just go to an actual higher end restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best roast lambs I’ve ever had, it was incredibly juicy and moist and the top of the meat was perfectly browned not over cooked or dry. This was properly braised on a low and slow heat. Also the chopped tomatoes and red onions added another layer and depth of flavour to the dish. I also loved how they did not drain the lamb jus as it was liquid gold. The rice was below average HOWEVER it’s amazing when you add the jus to the rice. Their menu claims their lamb is best in town, this place is not lying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhSxW9hCWJmlzWIWw_qWpgTPzDPB3ZbbvmmYbB&fid=0x0:0x7bde060a80d2903d"],"When":"2022-9-11"},{"Name":"Saliya Lokeshwara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpKTnEnNOKtY7JgtUJ-du_GTLdsecN4eGSkLwvjDFY3mUrhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is super friendly. It was a hot day and the nice lady gave us plenty of ice water with lemon. Buffalo wings are extremely good and the meat lovers pizza. All in all it’s a great place. The beer on tap which I had on another day was also great.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I recommend👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUNPq0zIH020tD3uCk1Ti0pzsX3F48mnTRYw1F\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4abbd9ef126e1b2"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Sierra Pitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6k-NKqS7SK0CQFSnK_R-AS2_tTG5pdbzT0S2FsOHY0udA65k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was hard to know what to give as a review. The first time we ordered from here our food was amazing! We all loved it so much and were so excited for a new sushi place in Langley. It was made fresh and generous. We got one of the platters and enjoyed it. But the second time we ordered from here it was so bad we couldn’t finish our food. Our tempura was burnt and the vegetables weren’t fully bettered - on top of that they were soggy and seemed old? The fish tasted old too… maybe they’re just working stuff out? I’m not sure if we will try again tho :/ bummed because we were so excited","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tyler Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5zjlDHIW2eimgK9N0Pfy7atxzdOGEAjZrHiKZEoFv2jCnF-k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a long work week this pizza definitely hit the spot. Got pepperoni & a meatlovers. Both were amazing! Also my drink was ice cold which was perfect after biking in the hot sun. Very friendly service. Would recommend👍🍕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZPBwUZagd682DzbKXDFQVxaWaL_p8E-FhCRNm&fid=0x0:0xd1a4e163e9ba7eb4"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Brian Jenkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPMZVUYcvqlVBoU0DryP2BM57j0_ZYWVDCQrjumGHYJxLerP8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So I ordered my usually veggies with extra cheese and YES I asked it be cooked longer!

Crust was great tasting! A tad on the chewy side but in a good way, if that makes sense.

Sauce was good.

A decent amount of toppings,

And when I asked extra cheese there was definitely  "more than the usual amount" of cheese, but "extra"? Meh . could been just a little more.

Either way GREAT TASTE, good quantity and quality for the money. Over all, a good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhV2tBzmvBPp6AGm2qAW85tZ8JoJWenHvK6_Q&fid=0x0:0xd1a4e163e9ba7eb4"],"When":"2022-10-5"},{"Name":"Tyso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-PMAamIzccUC1PqMGbnx_ywowjHedHr-jT-4dCeppN2zSweu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just moved in the area and now happen to live close to one of the Great pizzerias in BC.

When calling in my order I asked if their deluxe pepperoni was made like the photos; normal-sized pepperoni on TOP of the cheese. When this was confirmed, I was already sold. A bit pricey, but these guys know exactly what they’re doing (see below pic). Sauce, cheese, topping, and crust ratio are all perfect (and the quality of ingredients are all better than the last).

One of the top 3 best pies I've had in a (rigorous) 3 year search for great pizza in the lower mainland.

Thanks guys, you've earned a loyal customer by your greatness.👌🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzZ0vu7FaOAnzJd_-GW6bjdHSqBXeixH106Tpr&fid=0x0:0xd1a4e163e9ba7eb4"],"When":"2022-9-6"},{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Happened upon this place and needed food. The pizza was good! Took about 20 minutes. Wish you could buy individual slices but the small pizza isn't that big and was a lunch and dinner. I liked having the option of sauces instead of tomato.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Robb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIy2USX3Fylvd8ILb93474pjatni-xuDZvCuLY0rVdZi5Jc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1st- the medium is sooo small for the price. This place wasn’t my first choice (they were closed). Compared to other spots the sizing is whack.
2nd- upon trying it- so damn flavourless and bland. It’s not good at all ! Cheap ingredients and the sauce is so plain.

Don’t recommend. At all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHsIqO9yA73sOpKawfiwW-BqxnmaYnA0JVjaQ&fid=0x0:0xd1a4e163e9ba7eb4"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Master Yeti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvjZJXI7OBuvQNuQk8IIcvtqj21IUjIvdjretXyPosQagVqAzj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expectations were high based on reviews.

Pizza's tasted great and were well made but the toppings were incorrect.

Good customer service for the mistake too.

I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqXRjQ2F5VDHmdos1sFzpQTFfLPKDngrlU9vY5&fid=0x0:0xd1a4e163e9ba7eb4"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"Alex M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8bapUUgzjcxzZdVpHYuWcn0BUb0lR3zsA6pQDRZ9HYcFFEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Horrible pizza. I ordered a Spicy Capicolli and added pineapple and it was big awful, not little awful but big awful. The banana peppers were Woody, like tree bark woody. The pineapples were completely void of any taste or moisture, All the meats tasted and looked like they were forgotten out for a couple days to dry out and the tasted reflected that also, the sauce was so thin I could barely taste it. The people at the store were pleasant and got me in and out quickly but I wish I had tasted it before I left. I've had school cafeteria pizza that I'd rank as a 1 star and this is much much lower. Perhaps their other pizza is ok but I'll never risk spending money here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKx3d6DD1F8_EQzN_DHUepRWPWdUOFKflHwr4TfKLK-vyKwEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza shop around everything so good here and taste great amazing service the staff if so so friendly","Images":null,"When":""}]
