I’m not entirely sure what happened but I think this Fresh Slice location probably noticed that I had put another order it and that there was an order mix up so they just gave two additional pizzas to us. Honestly unexpected but thought it was a super nice recovery…  Thanks so much we appreciated the gesture!! 🙏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Mack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlVS9T2QjpLmAjcf5lOKIlCUCEddOtmeZbWcChqxetcI2jsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Staff is super nice. But, food safe It’s not the number one priority! I was not pleased watching the cook grab the dirty dishes by the garbage area and place it on top of clean dishes to be used again.  Also, saw the that she wore fake nails and was not wearing gloves when making a pizza…. I will not be going back to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bhumika Bhateja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvsytwXSGnxxIZJK_JxEm4Bx-tVV3cKBqIoTd7Rfewg9dqsW4O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited here and had a fantastic experience thanks to Harjot and Mannat. From the moment I arrived, Mannat’s warm greeting and Harjot’s attentive service stood out. The pizza was delicious, with a perfect crust, melty cheese, and fresh toppings. The combination of excellent food and exceptional service made my visit memorable. I highly recommend Fresh Slice for a great meal and outstanding customer care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rajat Gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVokysEzEChfzr6FGWUrwD9FKTDTm0qbgi1P7TrnajFmVHnNZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Pizza and great service.\nInder and entire team is Amazing♥️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQBtn_7a6BOThmWJnFPeDy-1uNcZ_5K4L-3JS8\u0026fid=0x0:0x6cc2dc6a805ae1c3"],"When":"2024-3-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Euraj Vivekanandan (TravellingWithEV)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDI9OyxUxRYP6XXNPCFZ9bD0J230TJQ2-8G5T5lDuLBrk5KHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They advertised lunch special starting from $10.99 but there is no lunch special for that price and nothing special about their food. They mentioned that they are trying something different with the lunch special menu and the lunch combo menu is $16 onwards. This is not trying something different, this is just raising the price. False advertising. The food is really bad. Almost equal or worse than Lin’s Kitchen in the area. The meat is stale and fried rice is very oily. Tried once and will definitely not return. A disappointing Chinese restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpPTljRg_z3i1Hg8A390Q3Gvd7QpQzhUsk51mn&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Carson Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAqvoKhDH5nBZYgZ9k2zpBQTdZeJzu-c7PSBxsLF9m20cNOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been eenving some beef chow hau/fun for some time now. It's not easy to get access to classics even in food courts out in Langley as in Richmond or Burnaby.

This definitely hit the spot. Food was piping hot still even after the drive home from takeout. Service was quick, food was made and packed quickly.

The photo doesn't do it justice but this takeout box was actually packed full. There's way more here than what the picture shows. Will be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPR6mCEGwvo71It-JyhQsrRGBLQvJ13kBTv4pI&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Fairly average  Chinese food. They have your typical western-influenced dishes like chicken chow mein and sweet and sour pork. Take out was alright.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNsNSVzOYwn5eQfX5CHWKv-AABBctlxRSUgm9n&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Lora H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoZeNEO5L4rrMh6V21br_KmGz9H9-d_fM-TT68UCIwxe-Cga68=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Fried squid was good portion but it was too salty and lack flavour. Crispy noodle was too dried and the sauce tasted awkward. Mouth was thirsty a sign of MSG. Szechuan green bean was fine. Service was fine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq_uAKj9TLCU7A6vaptjIVNgk_WqjLOzXGzamH&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Benzi Schnauzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg4Da1Z4WzIs-k4nrBAmbrswcwf-49CVVRmHpcw6VLF6kUyoZl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think it is always important to rate any restaurant against the standard it should achieve.  This is important when considering Golden Medal.  This is not authentic and refined Chinese.  Rather, it is westernized Chinese food that is common across Canada and they do it well.

The decor here is in need of a refresh.  There is visible wear and tear.  Maintenance and updating have been put off, likely the fault of the previous Chinese restaurant that occupied this space.  Even the outside signage is in desperate need of replacement.  Things are clean though and there is obviously an effort to present the best face of the old space.  It is not overly distracting and should not deter you from considering a dine-in experience.

Service here is very friendly and efficient.  Tea was recommended to us due to the wet and cold weather outside, this was a thoughtful gesture.  Our order was taken without any delay.  There was some dialogue to find out our interests and ensure we were satisfied.  It met our needs in a very helpful and personal way.

The food we had was fresh and well done.  I was surprised at some delicate flavor profiles that are not often found in this style of food.  Vegetables were cooked but also remained crisp.  The almond chicken was nicely battered and the nuts were fresh.  Portion size was large and we walked out with leftover containers.

Is this a good choice for a meal that is large enough for most appetites.  It is westernized Chinese and they do a good job delivering that style of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLvrLVmGqWa9T0Z08PBMAXjPKt4P0XMwo4KJ78&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2023-1-19"},{"Name":"Lawrence Lacandula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfi3e35cU96zJJGkk7nxa2yLrVqrq6MqycUwswRzdSuhVKf7xD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great authentic Chinese Cuisines. Excellent service. Jean and Sharon are very welcoming. Glad that there is a Langley Branch. Hot and Sour Soup is amazing. Food is freshly cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwC5XyzItZ_ur3Xhdq1AnSmU0FVq3MnX5KkeKv&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA5TZfzqdNofEhxcda41zOMq8oxaSM_bqZRwD-Tnxw9HqFYsk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered take out for the first time tonight. Wanted to try something closer to home as our usual place is in Brookswood. Ordering online was convenient and they were quick to prepare. We did family dinner for 3 plus an extra dish of the honey garlic chicken. Food lacked flavour and just honestly wasn’t good. Everything just tasted bland and off. No one finished their plates and we ended up tossing the rest of it. Would not order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great place to enjoy Chinese Food, especially if you work nearby. The male server who greeted and served us was friendly and uplifting. The seating and tables were clean and the floors were tidy. There are a variety of food options you can choose from as well as a couple beer selection. They serve lunch specials in the early afternoons at a discounted price. The food came out in a timely manner and the quality and proportions is worth the price set. However, sometimes the food can be a bit too salty. The bathroom is clean and well kept. The only issue is the stall in the men's washroom is dimly lit, due to a wall blocking a light from reaching the stall. Overall, I highly recommend trying this place out for anyone looking for tasty and reasonably priced Chinese food. It is accessible directly through transit as there is a bus stop in front of the restaurant. Note that there are no Dim Sum or live seafood served here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGFSHLCBxQve92_R1WKd-R5Ra4ZPnyEpT9WZIn&fid=0x0:0xafaf0dfa81cddc75"],"When":"2023-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food tasted amazing! It came out fast and the staff were super nice as well. Definitely will come back again. It’s not an upscale restaurant but it’s affordable and tastes great. Definitely on the authentic side","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMN5PtM78hOk2AlWDnJd9KvbBvlQ85W3VWtexm&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"MrEgrass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAJkWyksLi8Em65E-PPcT-kNUmbyu6r4HHpABPX6DElNCP1f0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Pho in Vancouver as far as I'm concerned. Also, great deep-fried wontons. Priced well and food come out amazing and very fast. The atmosphere is basic, but that is part of its charm. If you have eaten abroad in places like this, it brings back fond memories. Don't miss out on trying this place!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQLdiC4v6bG8pAd16e6XRbmnfpbhZm1aCw_0uj&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Normal pho restaurant. Can’t get wrong.  Just a bit under renovated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZjEFmMAB2nfZSvF2a0L2kkBOTGcmrexYver3B&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Darcy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9CSSiU-uC79dWrDwPGpKpZTdHa7GEPqFul9fxTdBkOUM4-vA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered #9 pho tai with well done and tripe. Just what the doctor ordered for a cold wet rainy day. Servings were generous and delicious for a $15 bowl of soup. Definitely a solid place in Langley. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7MlcPuGYgq4AvIOpgzzPOikHxIE6jtZXK1e4a&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little family owned Vietnamese restaurant. You can tell that the owners really care about quality. I had the beef ball and rare beef pho, it was great and really hit the spot for me. The broth in the Pho was amazingly flavorful, they had a good amount of add ins and a decent amout of meat. Everything was fresh, came out quickly and we loved it. My wife and son really enjoyed their meals too, my son had the wonton soup with bean sprouts and my wife has the beef ball pho. We shared a salad roll to start too, which was very good. I would definitely be back...it is a great location... we stopped on the way to watch the Giants game. I would definitely recommend Pho Triple 3.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPle4Tu2Byl6R684RYGUZONMgUHT3tR8wxfV6Ep&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Bohee Warkentin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Us2b77KmpIDoMYOWppMf6UBDNkYM3zVv2vFIrPPAaHYaGBBkoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Update:
I've dined in several times this year and I'm disappointed in the decline in their food portion and flavour. They increased their prices, which is completely understandable due to the inflation. However, the portion of noodles and meat are substantially smaller, the broth tastes watered down, and bun bo hue lacks flavor. I thought it was just one day, but the last two visits left me feeling unsatisfied.

By far, my favourite Vietnamese restaurant in Langley. The bbq grilled pork and chicken are moist and tender. Pho and bun bo hue is great for the cold weather and full of flavors and generous portions of meat. Staff are friendly, and the service is prompt. It's not as nice looking as its competitor nearby, but the food and the service is top notch. And the ventilation is poor inside, be prepared to smell like grilled food for the rest of the day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJE3GSoDtGiB3v_tlmBhT12V3YqhtlnhH81l6t&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2020-12-8"},{"Name":"Jaylene Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIav-9zoyY9lDIuknaSnD0Xt8SxqwCSeF8yyROKohYLFQTGZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place! I’ve been a loyal customer for years, and despite trying many other pho restaurants (mainly on Sundays when Triple 3 is closed), this one remains my number one. The food is consistently amazing, with rich, flavourful broth and fresh ingredients. The salad rolls are my favourite. The service is always friendly and attentive. If you’re looking for the best pho in town, this is the place to go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sampson Low - eXp Realty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5-nAJ3Hfrda7C10R7DZFzGI9EIQe40LQVumTj4ikshD9ogtV4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the Lemon Chicken Com and Pho here!! The marination and grilling is to perfection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-UVhtg6mQ0JGPffI7VCjaIlOeoOh0n88f4mF7&fid=0x0:0xdd0f62780c5a0753"],"When":"2024-6-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Olive Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2xiPy8HKde93MjogE8geFF59s-ra1lbOxiwUDYpvHTORrkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came in here because it was close to home and rated well. The man behind the counter was so sweet and professional. We was cool with me choosing half rice half salad, since some places charge extra for that. He was also chill with how many of each side I chose. The bowl was huge and delicious, made with fresh ingredients. I appreciate the sauce combo suggestions they offer (firecracker sauce combo was a tasty blend of spicy, sweet, and umami). This might be my new local go-to!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkBzK2P-dfudRVQ4VGPp7411FLJLEtxzbpWI__&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"kerry andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPbC_mt5KZwWO8OIH7sD2YfrVDv5xCUx5mQyZ523roRd2onGU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Signature bowl Tuna so fresh. A great place for Poke. Dine in is comfortable and pleasing. We take out mostly but super fresh Poke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Gk73MT4x-At7_M1rlrhnGzYc4E34v4h8nLYB&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Aaron Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwH-T4meTA46mZWwBX8SW-8HRP3aTbI4qdWLp7QDk8OwKOg_kvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had 2 bowls, my wife and I love it here. The girl that served us had great suggestions  that made them better. I wish I took photos. You wouldn’t believe the portion size. One bowl = 2 meals. If you havent been here your missing out. Worth the drive but delivery is great","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael-James Roman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyUHuACQAavj8UP8GoxL2c95ZNkVdxJ51KnMUKvEGYSQ6bWuY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Half filled bowls for 22$ each.
Highway robbery

Chipotle gives better portions","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJxDPhnKJG9JVk--bEO-BXjWIPUma-Nwod4Mk&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"J K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6uO_76uX1R0iBkaJFVU6WUtPchC8OEOsN73PrM4Xw8fbtl8Gr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time here and the servers were so welcoming! They recommended the fire cracker sauce with plain salmon and it was the bomb! One thing I wish it could have  improved is they could either put more rice or less sauce to make it a better balance. Overall, it was a delicious poke!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5ABCjjYvZcRV5taGpYArVkSR03RDsp8dwvQ1C&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Athena Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMml6gCYTxiKd_ngDzL7fxyNQfdZ62qCh-sjsb5_FJDO9sCNno=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was extremely fresh and I appreciated that the rice was warm and the cold items cold. Had the ahi tuna and salmon with firecracker sauce. Just the right amount of heat. I think the avocado added to the texture with the crispy onions. We also had one bowl with octopus as a treat! Very friendly service. Extremely clean and well kept restaurant.  Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODRy-0oGh2ZFS2TlWNrQbytcnMf0QOPrmpFLPu&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update June 2023 - went in for another poke bowl today and was pleasantly surprised by the kale noodles. These were delicious on a hot day. The original sauce is yummy, I will definitely be back. Still 5 stars!

‐-----‐-------'

Nice poke joint. I ate up my small bowl pretty quickly. There's a lot packed in. Staff were very friendly and the place was very clean. I wouldn't get the imitation crab topping again though - it seemed a bit dried out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi7d0ocjVRY4qBQyKO_pCnCYpdW8xSt0uAN6Uz&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2022-3-27"},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so excited to see a poke bar in Walnut Grove and I finally got to try it the other day- it did not disappoint. The staff were really friendly and helpful, there were many different topping choices and sides to choose from. The amount they gave was very generous and the care and detail put into building the bowl was great. Each bite was delicious and I enjoyed it thoroughly. I was sad when it was finished because it was so tasty, but the flavours lingered long past my final bite. I look forward to returning and trying other combinations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm7YwM-oStQvFwy5n0MiuOsnA--t4FiGrSSYww&fid=0x0:0x98cd2633d2fda7ef"],"When":"2022-2-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Priyanjali Das","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj-NnUPdUrcf6vwRgWS0-NwaBK37hP6hHBr-OtHOL1NHIbnAjF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I live somewhere between two very prominent chinese takeout restaurants in the area and in an attempt to review Lin’s and Ming-Sing’s, I ordered both their choice of three and you can see the difference in both the quantities. I was very disappointed with Lin’s and how I had to fish for pieces of chicken in its KungPao chicken. There were no additional condiments. When requested for utensils, all they sent was a fork.

I will never be ordering from Lin’s ever again.

Ming-Sing’s 3 choice combo comes with an additional box of the third entree instead of cramming it all in one box. Generous serving of the side (I chose noodles) and they stuffed that box with so much food, it fed two adults.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ5MSGTeCRVvQNnkImo1d4nfb1bhFZ4nYvq3F0&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Dhen Ranoco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHbtN3g5UsisOKhWJCfbO_QlTRi7hT8HS4dho2ERrE2wiU0hUI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything went well and perfect. Food is amazing. The preparation is really good. It’s clean and tidy. The box that cover the Party tray’s are perfect. I regret I give a little tip. Sorry for that. You deserve more. Thanks to Cynthia she’s very accommodating. I promise I come back again to order. So happy I chose to order in your restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzb2fs8XGZwg0MDrHr-f1J4mJrrHtu1DtxLmBd&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Adam Vengroff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmsRRNYkFlEzpBn64QsUc7tpFnpnQl_-UEHmdP_ZNdqjA_kk2e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family of 6 ate hear for a late lunch.
The lovely lady at the counter was very helpful and made great suggestions.
All of us enjoyed the food.
The chow mein, the sweet and sour pork, the honey almond chicken, it was all good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLL0hQmoejWquCKNBh-OgGZAHfiWk1hylqh27p&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"chris scales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcQlGT_JebDw8TeR0BiT90PZSVOJbjeVfeeUktlVL2FJiKpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Placed and order for the 3 items, came to over $50

Had a single bite of each item and couldnt finish it. I absolutely hate wasting food but I don't have a choice here.

Very disappointing as I was excited to try a new place out. I would hope this food quality isn't normal, however some reviews seems to suggest it is.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gerald Crone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQpW1yDqpqVoLP88S3TNGYdaBv6HK25fYzCkdXU-C46r-LcSx6lw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When I picked up my order, I looked at the portions of food and thought it was quite small for the price I paid. Got the deluxe dinner for one, had vegetarian fried rice, chow mein noodles and sesame chicken with sweet and sour chicken. The meal itself wad quite bland and hard to finish, each bite was a challenge as there wasn't much flavor . Also got the wonton soup and wasn't much flavor, until I added some soy sauce to it. Unfortunately the food did not sit well in my stomach and lead to a day of constant bathroom visits. This will be my first and only time eating from this restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brad Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafvXUQjDjB-n6LKFM9s_zLA1fkrAM0i_mXEMz6c-CQ9J5o6Oi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought the Deluxe combo at 2:00pm. With 1 can of pop. $20 with tip. Portion size was no bigger ( for the extra $) than the other combos. Size of a side plate. Very small. Food was Luke warm at best. Empty. Worst flavour ever. Dry af chicken!!! Very disapointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_vC8dxCnr55oyiXtJUtHAw1epuubuPGOPy1wI&fid=0x0:0x7ff518ab7e41e384"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Utah Cumiskey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIe-sp6283_2Xi-rfew6s5PohhP92TJ80TWxNpEnjed0QngSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely disappointed. Almost spent $40 and had to throw it away after tasting. Poor quality food. No flavor at all. Tasted gross and disgusting. We got sweet and sour pork, almond chicken and lemon chicken with veg chowmein. Not a single good thing to say about it. The pork made me wanna throw up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"suckz2bu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkW2zl756S1c7P-rqmazrhHcTb-d3ZySyEr3yZ2vW5Rq9IXQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food tastes like chemicals , cheap and extremely low quality , portion sizes are decent and service is ok but nothing special . I won't be eating here again . Better quality at Chinese buffets .","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BARINDER SINGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnHJmw8mSAwFFSN_I1ydxaWlAD_YOMye1qL1TYo1TC5S8lXao=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always order delivery. But i was in the plaza doing shopping so i decided to pick up my food. As soon as I walked in I was greeted. The place was very busy, but clean, and smelled great.
All the pizza was cooked perfectly and had a generous amount of toppings. This location has earned a spot among my top pizza experiences!
The pizza dough is fluffy in the right places and has a perfectly done, crunchy crust that isn't overly thick♥️ Don’t forget to add garlic to any pizza to take the flavour to another level! Thanks guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqVk67wdI2BsVTXGtwIl-ZLpi6VXml0NiVq1r6&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Manjinder Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQUYaK42k5D2gkCECi8xEsdcUhTNUW1AVtXCPRJUuMcfkl2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered All Dressed and Veggie Fans pizza; cooked just right including crust, lots of toppings which I like, sauce was good amount and spread out and tasteful. They are known for sesame seed crust which is really good; you can also request no sesame seed crust and just as good. Inside is very clean and orderly, well lit menu signs and lots of parking spots around. Pizza is right priced to it's quality and competition. Highly recommend this place. I wish I had taken photos but ate it all too fast; but I see others have posted.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ishaan Bhargava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeiWM1lqZb3DXk38kZcFsDbOvWYtz8le9dej96i2imapp36g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ohh my goshh!! Must try pizza place, eating pizza in Fraser valley last 12 years. But this place man hands down. Really good and soft dough with Sesame seed. Feel the freshness of dough, toppings are unbelievable. Fully loaded. Every bite we can feel the satisfaction. Price are very reasonable with this inflation. Tons of deals. I believe will not get pizza with this price in north America. Store was neat and clean. Great customer service. Overall they deserve 💯 % for their hard work.
Will definitely come back to try more. Or hope they will deliver to surrey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkQ0QHhW4ymA7zWX7FliR_f0FFD71-W0B2hGCA&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"M Prins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYWCMj9HZ6_2jMol4qrWBbE6l7uCmTatsMh6ch4jbiMYWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent price for value, exceptional service, pizzas were good—evenly spread toppings, well layered, and I like the signature sesame seeds on the crust (tho, not everyone’s favourite). Their name led to a robust conversation around what is a “red swan” anyway? Eitherway, I’d totally order from them again, better price and food than most of the other pizza chains","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTUnwfPyUAdmPvTliWlcauTnHf9ewpbOHwdqQ&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Deep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG0E_LuJH5JoQwHTbknmxPI1KWwMVXocDBrWKRnGWvZGaOCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order XL chicken Supreme with chili pepper 🌶.
Delivery was super fast. In 30 minutes we have received our pizza. Flavor was perfect, nice combination of toppings. Sauce was tasty and dough was perfect proof. No so thick or thin. Surprise with amount of toppings we got. Definitely spread the good words around the community.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mr David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1mR-iWGyYWaIoi88--8oia3Zeaq8olTYlC72g5Pcb1-P7hpE8cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious and yummy pizza. My family enjoying them a lot. Very testy and professional prepared. Staffs are very humble and welcoming.
You want some yummy and very delicious pizza? Order or go here in person.
Enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN46Djx1wEMOtA4z1livki8f3ZmDgZTZ1osjegu&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTd1Rqs7VgPhdrfxxG4D9LIBsTUDrAsKvUnxDxUDS6a4O3GLQ_HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza that came out hot, fresh, and not at all greasy. I really enjoyed the sesame seed crust as well. Two toppings, $10.95 for a medium pizza. Good deal as far as this guy can tell. Give them a try, you won't be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORTIw8N1HXWD2PVeh1YavSmn-RFfryGWqb2nA1&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Umang Yagnik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsvNGWq1_VlqxVaqJoAM3ejmgUT-SZy1H8xfohJpGTKVkKRGIj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out of the two locations in Langley, the Red Swan Pizza in Walnut Grove offers top quality pizza and amazing service. Overall the location with the small dine-in area is kept very clean. The person taking the order will offer recommendations and suggest how you can combine different sizes of pizza for the best deal! Keep it up…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF6yFD1p4cPknZnZRC3lIC-n-PJI1vbnt6kR_T&fid=0x0:0x5c9e508c9d7b7a34"],"When":"2024-3-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Donnie Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKrgFCWWAgyr6oyOSTC_agl8Ej_NIyJg60Fr6ShfF4Psi8Kps=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""A Feast Fit for a King at Katsuya in Langley!"

If you're looking for a meal that delivers on both quantity and quality, look no further than Katsuya in Langley. Their pork cutlet isn't just a meal—it's an event. The portions are so generous you might find yourself wondering if you're supposed to share (spoiler: you're not, it's all yours).

The set menu is the real star of the show, offering an unbeatable combo of great taste and wallet-friendly pricing. You get a perfectly crispy, golden-brown tonkatsu that's tender on the inside, accompanied by a lineup of sides that will have you feeling like you’ve just won a flavor lottery.

Whether you're fueling up for a big day or simply treating yourself, Katsuya strikes the perfect balance between indulgence and value. Pro tip: bring your appetite (and maybe stretchy pants).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFSgY7Qw0TI4_FF_Knyw5QWoOn1h6jOF3B4Ipd&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Bala888","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwpXKXLnWVbmRWE49mxf-yYsdsA4jpYsnTuSzc7_Jf6iiW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time here everything looks good on menu. The best was the fried chicken, maybe the best within Korean and Japanese fusion I’ve ever try; however, the honey fries was too sweet for me, the drumsticks were too salty same as the miso. The katsu rice portion was not enough to get full and tasted soso.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjuzjV2Q7L-kkda4I84hUu7Ry5XWCaKaO4Yu4&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious, however they were sold out on chicken. We did come near the end of the night. The service was great and they were very attentive. The atmosphere was cozy. The pork loin katsu was my favourite! The bulgogi poutine was pretty good as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMm1kMnyP_OdwUSSsrJScTEQX1YnfQtubrGS6d&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"JP Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9vi3Bp36xsGTL3r3KclHMk5eg4_F8gSie3yx2AA9q4iEIFuFLAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The clean and modern interior of Katsuya creates a pleasant atmosphere from the moment you step inside. The space is bright, well-organized, and exudes a sense of comfort, making it a great spot to enjoy a relaxed meal. The staff were exceptionally friendly and attentive, providing clear and detailed explanations of the menu, which made it easy to choose dishes even for first-time visitors.

The highlight of the meal was definitely the pork katsu. It had a perfectly crispy, golden-brown exterior and a tender, juicy interior. The texture was outstanding, offering a delightful contrast between the crunch of the coating and the softness of the meat. The flavor of the pork was rich and satisfying, and when paired with the accompanying sauce, it created a harmonious blend of savory and umami notes. Every bite was a joy.

Overall, both the quality of the food and the level of service were excellent. It was an enjoyable dining experience that left a lasting impression. If you're looking for delicious pork katsu served in a clean, welcoming environment, Katsuya is definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZM6yqgkpTbplluuzIHWPwIF12LGyifJgf25Vz&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"N Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqG1vB0EkjrfhX571hMLSRtKiSPHm51yK-oGL_xujLvLRGsAf2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem for Japanese and Korean fusion dishes. The food arrived quickly and was all served nicely. The taste was excellent and we enjoyed some dishes we hadn't found elsewhere. The server was quick and friendly. The restaurant was very clean and neat. My one small complaint would be that all the seats are hard wood with no cushion. Would definitely return","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNosMrwG1hn5NS98MLB_q_1Z2dda5Pie23_CKn5&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited Katsuya Langley and had a great overall experience. The ambience is lovely, with touchpads on each table to order food or request service, which makes everything seamless and efficient.

We ordered the Crazy Chicken Shrimp Pizza and Carbonara Katsu (pork loin). The katsu was good, but I’ve had better elsewhere. The pizza, while very spicy (as our server humorously warned us), had great flavors and was enjoyable. Both dishes were fresh and nicely presented.

The service was quick and friendly, enhancing the experience. Overall, a good place to try, especially for the modern ordering setup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAb8VAR_2bG3wg7hgDzB48l26fkAXM4vH9z4Di&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Candice Roxas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ18HELMGAoB5rBTjrGZdp3HNt5l0SgnYRpMry7MP9POyoBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the special set, half-half Korean bulgogi and sweet potato pizza, and takoyaki all to share! It was more than enough for three of us. Both the katsu and takoyaki were crispy and flavourful. The pizza was delicious but we were bigger fans of the bulgogi topping! Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a tasty lunch in Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8DCtxBGLYkDby30a_lGD9sGBPf1JLt-9y8x7n&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Arvei Mariano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQYBEIqtvWKeTOR9NTN9UasWMIvU_iA6WF-ug9gff7MnG-bw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time at Katsuya and we have been wanting to go there for a while. We finally went and it did not disappoint. It had so many choices and food came fast but hot and it was so delicious. I enjoyed every bite also tried my husband’s and sister’s dishes and they were also very yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd_X2MYVlxCZPJ5RYGSH3w-gOB41XC4xe2NaCR&fid=0x0:0x7549bf650c090cbe"],"When":"2024-11-3"}]

Crust has a nice consistency and taste to it. They have an XL pizza as well. The driver got lost which was odd because we were across the street basically. Lol.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOUdekmyrQQweZBpCnpxvO_CzXoZ_DQJkq9BLJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf62ca5720c319a2a"],"When":"2023-3-21"},{"Name":"Ali hosseni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdJvZ9QSmrmRGiD80veGDyWOXeNHq79m6j3HxIB118jRKBZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Is it look like has Extra cheese on it? And why is it raw","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6lj8Ky3kvEytr5DWIvYmD2ylVOk02mOsqx9lw\u0026fid=0x0:0xf62ca5720c319a2a"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"A Google User","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/default-user=s120-c-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great store, good pizza, awesome and kind staff and fair prices. What more can you ask from a great pizza place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Putman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXVBqZPIZWA67RYto4oI7QJFKln7ED4FQoSC_Vl9gBrsLHRE4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disgusting! Every item was wrong and foul. No pizza sauce on my pizza, no sauce on my cauliflower bites, no creamy garlic sauce on side, no marinara sauce with half moon cheesy bread, no caramel with my funnel cake sticks and to top it off everything was ice cold. Permanently turned me off pizza pizza. Asked for a refund and they offered me $8. With refund I still spent $42 on this slop! Cherry on top was them asking for a review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ68cdI_D6Y7iCkp0tdVBX1af3ynMdr8X9oaGX\u0026fid=0x0:0xf62ca5720c319a2a"],"When":"2023-1-11"},{"Name":"Matt Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-1cTdGJYtRes_Awu4xeoewyyheOy2LaWq2bb12NtzUz5-2z37=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very nice on the phone quote 15 minutes for pickup and was 45 minutes. Not the end of the world but a heads up would be great. In store the team was less friendly which is too bad these days as people count on good customer service. The pizza was ok but not amazing I must have not done the research that it’s generic pizza with nothing special. My son loved it though which counts for something.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel States","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFgkAGly6ZfibnUvwldkGL24ovRFW6P8n6aJ9xeyOVrH7YP8C8gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered pizza three times from this place. It is very easy to order via the app. The pizza is always hot and yummy. I would give it five stars but the toppings are a little light. Good take out pizza though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sukhvir Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv6K2-01I-IyaAp_HdVGONpl6TyX8BD-QlypQsI3Fu6U_XSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their cheese pizza is so good. Always fresh and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhMwEeKBvRCfzd-fusz2A9k13xmM39kYcAPmCE\u0026fid=0x0:0xf62ca5720c319a2a"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"David Inkster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw2gqZn29wadvd6uJ4wHrhBlF2KkFNyVFxRaI3_FmbYcg-9bY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff was so nice to my kids - wished them happy birthday and made their night\nWith some brownies","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Fatburger Walnut Grove
descriptions: Long-running LA-based chain serving burgers in several sizes, plus other classic fast-food options.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Manmeet Sohal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAFj9DrnYycDPwPe308BqNgQ5LPf_kkdLO8iQvK63Eh4cUkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Being a vegetarian, it's sometimes difficult finding vegetarian friendly options that actually taste good, but wow there Impossible burger tasted amazing! I have never had such a flavorful and juicy impossible burger that actually tasted like beef/meat! There are other vegetarian options as well, but I chose the impossible burger and it was crafted really nicely. The burger was a bit pricey being that it was $11.99, but I'd say it's an experince because it was very big and tasty. I enjoyed the service as well, everyone was very friendly and greeted every customer that came in, and came around to provide me anything I needed. The atmosphere is pretty cool too, it gives a bit of a "Red-Robins" feel/vibe. It was fun, casual and bit quirky.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwpDXZPcWA5npQ00mAV6SuhQzGTkSgS8LwWpi4&fid=0x0:0x8a2756cf4e607e23"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Isabel Lummis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW18Deq5WPH5BYFaP_ZHGXyGZuP-h5tLaSgm_DfQmAXl9LtY1p=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a breath of fresh air! The staff said welcome when we entered. The burgers were delicious! Service was excellent! The restaurant is very clean. The staff checked in with us to see if we were enjoying our meal! We will definitely eat there again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carson Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAqvoKhDH5nBZYgZ9k2zpBQTdZeJzu-c7PSBxsLF9m20cNOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for lunch, food was quick and fresh. That was an amazing burger.

Staff and team culture was super, you can really feel their energy and buy-in","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM4F7g8AI1CDsueGUnPx9LZMVZMpH2LSj3cpZ0&fid=0x0:0x8a2756cf4e607e23"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Teresa Lyons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfAh0Mbds7LE0tV_4Z8YdjbNYckxhrlFaHZrH2Jk96WBa82UoM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The burgers and wings were great but the best part of the whole thing was the service.  We’ve never been to a friendlier, more welcoming restaurant!   They greeted each person as they arrived and a friendly goodbye and merry Christmas. We would come back just for the service!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody Ouellette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQcxiUJ7VJ7NuMtjJAlGi_olOfuXhnI6XRedOwesivtd7PuNCo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. The service was really good here. All the staff said hello as we entered, all interactions with staff were with a smile, and there were three separate staff members that stopped by the table to ask how everything was. Very impressed. This really doesn't sound like a big deal but it feels like nobody has good service anymore.

Props to these guys. The food was tasty and quick as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Nuytten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlLM7epvShgtHGsO0IfiONmpD6DdQALwIBY_CnjRA2hTDNK6zk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The warm welcome and smiles from all staff was appreciated. My fried chicken sandwich combo (was actually a burger bun) with fries and pop was hot, fresh and extremely affordable. They gave me the option to upsize the drink and fries which was well worth it. The only snag is I was expecting a booth to sit at as in other locations, but there was only one. All in all a great experience. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6W_KVZMnJr8nhuW5Ki94OLGZR9uX5A-Rci16u5fRqeAWjTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fresh and hot.  The customer service was the best I've ever experienced at a burger place.  They were happy, attentive, and really cared about our experience.   They also got our order right! I would recommend this fat burger any day of the week!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1OFjTkVbUhvRP2CvHWlQz8bO3z3lVyBNztTD3&fid=0x0:0x8a2756cf4e607e23"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Mark McDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo1botryxWQbdHIlVYReI6WOQPsffteIyCDKTnCGErPr735l0c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go to Fatburger spot. Really great food, cooked fresh. Reasonable prices when compared to other options out there. Only $4 to add good amount of fries and a drink is great value. Staff are super friendly. You can tell they have a good team culture and it shows in their service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alyssa Becker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY6yLOJC8FHbZyNnvdB9FRJMHiXeHs1u8gK7cue0KwMXsHcu5wBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a delicious signature high tea here today.  Made a reservation online, and they were ready and welcoming when we arrived.  They took the time to walk us through their tea menu and each item on the high tea platter.  The restaurant was cleaning and the staff kind and welcoming and helpful.  All the food was delightful.  Very glad we came and would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvKRbYI1RfMF-5o_MWVIKMKoXOTNJcdT55wVkM&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Diego Morelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyGOdmyh_aaZKbmtPlRdUQO58QGcJWQzqGoQYfQ-tJVPGzVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely place, good service and food but a bit overpriced. Doesn't specify whether is per person and I guess is a bit too much almost 150$  for a tray with mini treats on top, 3 scones in the middle plate and little pieces of sandwiches on the bottom one . I really thought 40$ was the price for the tray, not per person. 25$ max per person would have been reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3V_adW87tEztwXCbTrgYm89VGvdSp60bDbyTy&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went in without reservation because I didn't know that I needed it to have high tea there but he was so kind to make it happened for us. It was my birthday, my friend, my daughter and my friend's daughter, 4 of us were born just close to each other so I asked for the candle and champagne high tea to surprise my friend for the first time she tried high tea. So he checked and told us to come back in an hour. We all had a really amazing time! We loved everything, so delicious! So thank you so much again that you made our day amazing without reservation. Next time, I know I will make a reservation to have high tea there. What a wonderful experience for my friend and the kids because they never did before. It made me so happy! So I highly recommend this location and I will definitely go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPetUD_a5yFGFnHfH9XrcbpDnFBPjJApp_dZSZO&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2023-8-30"},{"Name":"The Explorers Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlFlaGfpbZbARKuFT06llRkHaPaxL_iow3r7cscok2hzSjqNmT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After hearing so much about it, We recently visited Tracycakes and had a delightful experience, our server Hannah was friendly and attentive

For our meal, we tried the Grilled Cheese and the Veg Panini. The Grilled Cheese with Pesto was a perfect blend of classic comfort with a flavorful twist—the pesto added a refreshing kick that elevated the dish. The Veg Panini was equally satisfying, packed with fresh vegetables and deliciously toasted.

To top off our meal, we indulged in a brownie for dessert. It was rich, fudgy, and the perfect end to a wonderful meal.

Overall, Tracycakes offers great food and excellent service. We'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNkaOoMnWMcsl22CkRUwJyA4xk3eLrTusiBGXr&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Arden Laliberte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrldTPnTbLdXEM31wNXt2_H3aYtzzPuiYPdbRfkRkBvK-hIzp9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here for high tea and had an amazing experience, so I knew they would definitely be the place to go for our wedding cake and cupcakes. They were delicious, we got so many compliments from our guests that we wish we had ordered more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOENuLmi3hdR7lgFfyVD5_h10VFm5nnAiMa-1xZ&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"J H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8i3SMHXB7EUArK-qLLIRiAAz_YC3jm2LveEjYX0jo5E56c0Zi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my Mom for High Tea - The tea room was decorated very pretty - it was warm and inviting. The Hostess, Alexandra, was so kind, accommodating and exceptional! The tea was served in a pretty teapot, with flowery China cups & saucers. The dainties and savories were fresh, tasty and served on a lovely tiered-display.  Thank you to Alexandra and Staff for their awesome customer service!!  We are definitely going back again! 5/5*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG7tJAqI1_bCV6OCsGEzcuc3pmjcgrQbuuLqde&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Dave Ballance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYX6nq_HLwpfRDMsBw6lLqPrWnr9cBkodLmufnMfPWG9e9gYI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wife and I stopped by for some high tea. Sadly, they were sold out for the day so I’d recommend making a reservation for this if that’s what your after.

Instead I had the turkey and cranberry sandwich and it was a 10/10. Delicious.

The wife had the grilled cheese and it was a blend of multiple cheese types. She said it was excellent.

We also had a scone with cream and jam that hit the spot. The coffee was also a tasty blend. Highly recommend this spot.

Update: we came back for high tea and were not disappointed. The scones were delicious along with the little sandwiches and treats. Hi had the Japanese Treasure tea and it was lovely. The wife had the Earl Grey Lavender and she throughly enjoyed it. Very nice blends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJanrxiuPB3gs3JnSJFqzAjJnIwedyVI1Gp5yN&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2022-8-5"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bullis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJIZgqzlZtkN9Tdc7Ih-y7aryMLksKqFC3u7JMS1k3E8JUdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our high tea experience at this location was phenomenal - the service was attentive, the atmosphere was spectacular and the high tea itself was amazing. Highly recommend! The sandwiches were perfect and the scones were clearly freshly made, and the desserts were second to none. Make sure make a reservation so you aren’t disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfBcnaP38nCtMwAG1yMKC9yBfbX8MQbZC0pOxG&fid=0x0:0x1944b5bed71291e2"],"When":"2023-6-19"}]

title: Murrayville Town Pub
descriptions: Homey neighborhood pub serving beers, burgers & bar bites in a low-key space with pool tables.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TE Alba B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWja93ZRsxtwFym-fSrklsHeV99P939k3COcBDstnzDYN8CpFvF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As usually very nice pub, great ambience and delicious culinary .
This time we were a table of 11 people and Cassie A offered us very diligent, courteous, professional and nice service …..impecable .
We love to go back anytime from Burnaby to see family and to celebrate with them .

Nice restaurant pub. Very great service and ambience .
I will love to go back .
Waitresses are very professional and friendly.
Food is very delicious , great culinary.
House White wine is delicious !!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2i2qiAHx_uQjsWQGj_KDlcAfJy7WTR5dph8_H&fid=0x0:0xb48b14db609cafb4"],"When":"2022-6-8"},{"Name":"Kartiki Bhatnagar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR2hN7n4UdD4WBGEEsoR9or_Ztn5wSsBSC6xMHcAchy-6EyHbywg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere!

I got the chance to try their French onion soup which was the BOMB. You’re gonna regret not getting it - it’s so flavourful and the cheese is just right. I also had the Mile High burger with the fries which is enough to feed like 2 people. Didn’t take photos of it because I just devoured it. SO good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQvdtgvLpP5hdhTmJK-xJA1l1FQhV73dgqBKTp&fid=0x0:0xb48b14db609cafb4"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Robyn Haley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw3kWQpqm9DMTN5UjARhhcn4_dmcycLwJPQ3oNmuWeXMPj5pA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had not been to the Murrayville pub in about a decade and I was there last night. My server was Mel and she was beyond fabulous. Honestly, I could not have asked for somebody who would Be more attentive or considerate of my needs. Honestly, I haven’t had good service in five star restaurants. Mel, thank you for making my terrible day end with a smile!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Severena Godin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX987JJsNcQDxvFIUWVOFfzE8IQ4Z_zA7IXQcPnHnXSJpHY2GnJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for my first time tonight & had the French onion soup. SO good. & our server Carly was the sweetest. Checked in on us lots & was very engaging. I’ll definitely be coming back :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Oram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6NZn3T0dV3MqJrLmDa5abNn06kP3ZllmfR3Gic6il666P1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food ordered was grossly overcooked and unfit for consumption. Upon pointing this out there was no attempt made by staff or management to correct the situation and when this was pointed out there waitress became belligerent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"robert fogarty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfg0OfIZoLwFOb0qhPjH5w1cOOZtzizUHltV2S7WkNLRzFlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is what a small community pub should be.
Friendly welcoming people, who made us feel at home, even though we are from Toronto.
Great ambiance, great food, waitresses are very friendly.
There are also a couple small pool tables which is a nice touch.
Highly recommended!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Bosch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBJALiTaE9-Mot5pHuVyUxBg5uRZb7D6sR9r6mLdk3YWOqONIa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food and nice atmosphere although the menu is quite limited especially when compared to another local pub The Fox & Hounds whose menu much larger.
All in all it's still a great place to have a good meal but just wish they'd add to the menu many more meal options. I've eaten there over a dozen times and would go more often if I had more to choose from.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jan Timmers (VE7JBT)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEVBXecTkWs0YfdbYKSKLEwi6tF5_Gx86PpHLzcLy5ZYey8Voehw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pub food, friendly neighbourhood atmosphere - like in, everybody knows your name type of friendly.  Lots of TV screens with all sorts of sports and entertainment playing.  I tried a Red Stripe beer here today - first time I've done that - they've got a good selection of beer and wine.  It can get busy and the parking lot will fill up fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7M-PrYG3ObIcb4HEVVZi0hINJOaPxDbZbfdlr&fid=0x0:0xb48b14db609cafb4"],"When":"2017-11-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dale Carr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl496F52IXXOFx8IZn_3Hwez8W82C881ygySzf8RPc_NvZ83c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a very busy Sunday morning at the restaurant all staff were very pleasant especially our server Tammy. She has always been great when we go there.  The wait was a little long but considering the volume they were dealing with it wasn’t really bad at all.  The food came out perfect and hot. My wife had the Brioche French Toast and Chicken Tenders ( I ate some of the French toast!) I had the meat lovers breakfast bowl with poached eggs. It was super!  We always get great service and food here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUjEcOtpiKCjQRWSQ3p3YGNGFauHuu6hPPaYLo&fid=0x0:0xe3fe0f1e468925f8"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Ryan Riot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtmR4bHM6f5Ai32Kc7RL0q7X5k3VRaCdwWxeNfmfaJmBwiTkb-SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't been to a Ricky's in several years, partly due to lack of nearby locations, partly because their menu (as I recall, anyway) used to be pretty abysmal. Don't know when -- maybe it was gradual, or maybe they did a major brand revamp -- but at some point in the intervening years Ricky's became awesome. Seriously amazing menu filled with excellently-made dishes that focus on flavour over trendiness etc. To read the menu, it just looks like something similar to IHOP or Denny's or other breakfast joints, but what came to our table was like a lesson in Canadian eating, whatever that is. Yeah whatever it is, it's fantastic. Wish I didn't have to cross 6 time zones to eat there 😉","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ewa Ferguson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCBR5Z1sedqnSKsdtprQWdSpfuAp1YS4j3Dmn7iIDMmxPhew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Ricky's with my husband a couple days ago, and we were both impressed how well this place is run.  Service was very efficient and friendly, even manager is involved helping servers.  My husband all day was bragging how delicious chicken strips were. Also, this place is very clean, we visited in the evening and bathrooms were spotless.
Highly recommed this spot for breakfast, lunch or dinner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tannis flynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLyhclPfH4WMe8mtC-WGRmguEuya-54wzDHYBp1rBgukBAoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We often go to to Ricky’s for our team meetings and the service is always amazing fast and food is great. Our server Hailey always greats us with smile and even remembers our coffee order and food orders before we sit down :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lyse Bissonnette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKkXFM2-NNP4N3mCXkiHi7YNlJJzel8izjvXZKg9Es9_qNN76p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were there for breakfast at lunchtime and we were not disappointed. Food was delicious and plentiful. Service was prompt and our server Laura had good humour. I wasn’t sure I’d like it there as I’d had a disappointing lunch at a Surrey location but I have changed my mind; I’ll be back for breakfast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA-Hm0i3hwUs25ioDkMta6EceASLSiRWE0FWee&fid=0x0:0xe3fe0f1e468925f8"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Alana Toms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAS6rrJG7aCG1weCxvplonQRK6FHUI-qrIuqIVUMr0MXZRgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lack of service from our server was ridiculous. I believe her name is Nhang, but not sure since she didn’t even introduce herself. She sat us at the table, came back 10 minutes later, and said “are you ready to order yet?”. I ordered a ginger ale, and they were out, tried ordering their frozen coffee mocktail, and they were also out. My partner ordered a burger and I ordered a grilled cheese with soup and it took over 40 minutes to come out to the table - no explanation nor apologies. We came in at 3pm and were one of three tables in the entire restaurant. Food was fine, nothing to write home about. Asked for the bill, and took over 10 minutes to bring the machine over. Honestly, the experience was a disaster, and I cannot comprehend how this place has ever received a 5 star rating from anyone. I have worked in hospitality for over a decade and usually find myself to be pretty understanding, but I found this to be ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Berton D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6fcYxhd4DazB0tuw-35SfyOvRJu1fYhORZqPZrnm_DkatQSmzRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had the lasagna and salad for lunch, Ceaser salad was excellent, although croutons were very hard, try biting one,  there is soft and then there is hard.  Lasagna was overcooked,  smaller portion so it overbaked and dried quickly,  pasta noodles were dried to the bottom of the dish, side garden salad did not have enough dressing so asked for more,  prices are higher. $$$
Overall the facility is great but the franchise should provide a better Lasagna. Serving sizes should be checked to ensure the value for the price is there.  Service was good.  Will return.

12/15/18
Ordered the Wine briased beef short ribs, very tastey and the risotto was excellent.  Pesto veggie flatbread was also good, flavors of the  tomato an avocado, pesto and feta cheese. Very good.  Fish and chips, French fries could be crispy, too soft,  fish was prepared perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0OzYkw7rUkfDLAvwjDH6sskcCSiAgniB9zkT-&fid=0x0:0xe3fe0f1e468925f8"],"When":"2018-7-17"},{"Name":"Karen Neal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3q2bxQBJbbxJgUNFaf7m_Uehwt0UmqiHbNPK7Gjgea7QpS2-8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is always great and the servers are very nice. The prices make eating out affordable, glad I live nearby 😁","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First visit and we liked this restaurant very much. Great service and delicious food. Big portions with reasonable prices. We had a really good time so thank you very much 🙏 Highly recommend. See you again 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJCpYNJT17DPvmcL8Dt7KtxqamBziq6J8DlR-n&fid=0x0:0x15bef7176d03d320"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Laura Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViNFkdVMDW7y1tNOpt3SHWdLieAs9f_0cEL2UUxauanqTQgJ4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite place to go every time I’m craving spicy soup with big noodles ♥️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxewEI06dIzpfR4btNic0i5MZcfordqL-w38U&fid=0x0:0x15bef7176d03d320"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Tracy Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU50zW8mp7Xzcoon5Ku0EAIupjH74BiRc3YU3WYZd_QJpc6bOQE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came with my family and ordered the rare steak Pho and I nearly ate the bowl it was so delicious! The broth was phenomenal and the steak was perfect! We've ordered take out before but this was my first visit to the restaurant. So pretty and very clean! The staff are very friendly and attentive. Thanks so much for an awesome meal experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oh Swan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrj1SlhCa9GCUOjnyP5U4gTmyQMOHrVNCkuQGtV13P9vEV5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it's brand new!
The food was fresh and clean.
Cute and trendy space.
Food is not salty,
very light and healthy taste.
We were very satisfied!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrckFI1kCwZqQJZBaFAz0WoH4ZmHJH6Bdld4Xq&fid=0x0:0x15bef7176d03d320"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Zachary Bay and Jacqueline Bay Mortgage Brokers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKHzAYRmGe3PtU6SGBLOKn7z5Jf7I2mF-Di7Z9zLiI5KxrWk5C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a cute place! Its atmosphere is very chic. It feels like you are in a bit of a fancy restaurant. The food was very good, and the service was great! Also really enjoyed our bubble tea to go to end the meal! Highly recommend, from your local Mortgage Broker foodie!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wade Callaghan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJa4CE6MBtnd_6RQehMkPUq8AmhCyTOn6oAYHgkV13l9Nk80w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this place a couple of months ago, it's our go to place now. We have had a few different things, beef pho, wonton soup with bbq pork and veggies, springs rolls, deep fried wonton, all super good and fresh. Nice clean , modern place. Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sure was a great find! My son loves Pho 🍜 so I drive by and saw this spot while we were visiting Langley and then I took him to grab lunch as we eat at a lot of Pho restaurants.

From the moment we walked in to the moment we walked out, EVERYTHING was amazing! Best Pho we have ever enjoyed and best service and operators. Manager Jimmy is incredible with personable service and attention to all our special requests when ordering. Food was fast, fresh and well presented. Would be a regular for sure if we lived out that way. But for sure you will be very impressed with this spot. They also serve great bubble tea and smoothly options. Washrooms were immaculate. All round awesomeness","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoKixG57l0BYfDkWQVeeWMMy0o9GWwrsJl63uY&fid=0x0:0x15bef7176d03d320"],"When":"2023-7-1"},{"Name":"Dilan Bandara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgTtRFJH1AfVsxYs80u1gEY4tZiTGo78POtRjvEVJ6SQXspRo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent. I would appreciate abit more rice for this dish since I’m paying $20 for this dish. The price is high compared to other Vietnamese restaurants in Langley. Love what they have done with the place atmosphere is great. Very good customer service. Highly recommend it if you got the cash.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8LTtAH0qNqBGFUCMhr5qd1TrJbWdBqCiyDnKI&fid=0x0:0x15bef7176d03d320"],"When":"2023-6-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mr. Siaopao De Langley is a standalone store with a bunch of purchasable products from the Philippines as well as dining tables for food service. The owners or workers are from Cebu and we had a lovely chat with them. We got a few products like their custom made vinegar, atchara, and 3 in one coffee. For food, we got the pork asado siaopao and the pancit canton. The siaopao was a little bit different than we were used to but was nice and fluffy. The food was ok and we got really good service for everything we requested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfAlmSxg8ofS4lNd3gXqvygLYGrIoxr_ANt_B0&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Timothy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI13h5FW-28uuiMWcvt87aPxokobmNsxxo41t8wpKkORLHJHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"you guys are horrible people!

you advertised 3 of lumpia for $19 but you only gave me one, cut in half!

you did not have what i ordered (lechon for $27), but you gave me sisig instead ($24).

is this a restaurant or a scam?

if there was a negative star, or if we could report you for theft!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVaIay0b4pjtGPnONv-a3xxifOhrZjJw0azMSJ&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very home-y filipino place here in Langley! They have a small shop full of filipino snacks with plenty of classic drinks as well. Of course, their food is delicious, especially their sisig, and I highly recommend it :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuo1vVvyZHkDfpw7dvY4xSdLfiYsc9o7z3bXYM&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"探险家Ramona","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVNVrqOQDND8IML5kfLwIR2bh_LDHY6JMIG9TSXsAZeBAYpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutly love their steam buns. Drove all the way from the valley to get them.  We got a frwsh badge of a dozen made and it was worth the wait. Easy to freeze and enjoy when needed .Taro and red bean steamed buns pefect with oat soup Perfect for the cold days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiy3AM_5YqQsuF6vZ2SdqQIZu5MehEB5sILIDN&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2023-12-6"},{"Name":"John Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvOMWAxTT73j63z3bZqraOTJDC4pwhvvmVNTsjoweNuYUIhHG1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's run by the nicest folks, and the food is fantastic. I hadn't had Filipino food before so I can't comment on authenticity but they tasted good :) I would love to come back and try their buns and other Filipino snacks they have.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lai Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZhn1RF4oQ88AJoOZD2TNabiwCO_Sz-MclW8GplPkuuyxKcqiN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"(3.5/5)

Service is good. Store looks nice and clean with great chairs and tables but there was an odd semi-open door to a dusty construction site that gave a strange ambience.
The sweet siopaos weren’t bad (4/5) nice and fluffy, good flavour, not too sweet with lots of filling. but the chicken asado (2/5) were disappointing in terms of taste and amount of filling. The chicken was dry and bland and I think a recipe change should be considered.

Atmosphere (3/5)
Service (4/5)
Food (3/5)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-Ws-9HlCSYAw89SYLLdFu9bvk2JYHGccnHcFt&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"J C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRid-486EHf3vFFlqzxc7hc71kbL9n1FDLFiUelrs10b7uY4If=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"3 stars at best when you eat it fresh.  Bun is for sure fluffy but the filling falls short of the better ones out there.  For $4 a bun it’s decent and will fill you up. It’s not something I would drive all the way out for.but would be happy to support if I’m in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo5Ys4HbLDhT6G0kbc9xPIHPwG1YEO97ur4fud&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Mik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgbA3pjUHs6I-7cIfmRiU2gSggvkGxhVXym3GA2ZUTNLPeMHKv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like their asado siopao! The calamansi juice was refreshing too. You can also buy siomai (usually frozen). We wanted to eat it there and they were kind enough to steam it and serve it to us😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ0y9MbuYvF7iXjGs7X1AJdC4IEpv2K1ZBuauc&fid=0x0:0x597733d6dfed346f"],"When":"2023-6-12"}]

title: Rendezvous Pub
descriptions: Relaxed joint with a patio, live sports & a liquor store, serving cold pints & standard pub fare.
