user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCJjjKmxvdlYVLgHJWU9fhNR0mY4e-amBSsy4UAm41jw4HbgNB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Chicken Creole dish.  Caroline (my server) recommended it.  ❤️ thank you.  My food was so delicious that I almost forgot I was sitting in a pub.  Ah, this place is a hidden gem and it's giving me the foodie vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4I9_ksVg5RLQMflvVP0zqv2w5fLrzpBsYoHHH&fid=0x0:0xeeb18d55a23831cc"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"kev bot (mello)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo1WtxIJmS7gO1c0hDBzGdygOdmxlMJqGbxTK1z0Vb_yx1mTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place deserves a solid review. Went here for the first time on Sunday night. It was packed. it was also karaoke night. I got wings and some potato skins which were delicious and came out pretty fast. The bartender Marissa recommended me the Fat tug beer. She looked so busy but she was always smiling and asking how I was doing. Very nice of her, I will be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqLehOMnoy2LntXXgBaOtXCb9J_2dgger2AELwKLm6lz63pgNF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Took my family here after hearing about it on socials as we live down the road. Service is not good, honestly the waitress was grumpy and not friendly as if she didn’t want to serve us and we were so kind and didn’t even want to ask her for anything. Servers are always friendly and go out of their way to give a you a good experience, right? Well of course when it’s time to pay the bill she decides to be friendly, smile and talk nice to us. She rarely came to our table, service is slow. Not even that - the food is alright. Burger was great we all liked it but when the service is that bad we refuse to come back. I run a business myself and the first thing I do is train all my staff to be friendly and smile with everyone. It’s a bit dirty inside. It’s not horrible but wouldn’t come back. They were out of a lot of drinks and even the ladies behind us were shocked a bar would be out of so many wines and only have the cheapest one - Barefoot. Far better pubs around Langley. The rotten cucumbers threw us off. From the looks of it looks like they serve old food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOykiBIMsK6ZorLdYmzkFpY6Wcnb5tleqD271vu&fid=0x0:0xeeb18d55a23831cc"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Nic F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzngRWbgson5EbvmU8JQY3sJu6bgl1wtw8NnVGV9ipbUgZMNhR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I order takeout from here sometimes and their food is so good! I haven’t been into the pub in years (used to go for beers with my dad before he passed) but I’d love to go dine in someday soon. Their chicken club is amazing, fries are perfect, and I love their Caesar salad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have to give 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 because, this pub has karaoke events almost on in two/three days, Disc Jokey is changing everyday, food is tasty, wings are really good.

I visited there on Thursday, Friday and Saturday nights in a row. Stuffs are friendly and they visit you most of the time if you need something else or if you like the food.

Prices are good.

Atmosphere is okay. This pub is not a huge place, but it is not also super crowded so, that’s okay if you go alone or with a friend.

Only the thing, I tried 2 different cocktails. Taste was good but I couldn’t feel alcohol. Maybe it was too dry (I tried vodka and rum), so I prefer beer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDyTZr9h208O8y9GNYViI2GjEdjXVBKnn-OPyM&fid=0x0:0xeeb18d55a23831cc"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK35ahV4hkPwt9liBaQVJOuJdCmlpZnlf__j0F9HC89HRt-MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a pretty busy evening because it was a Saturday night! I didn’t have anything to eat this evening, but when I have had food there, it’s always been really fantastic. The service was as good as could be expected for an evening like that they may have been understaffed a server; I’m not sure! Still a wonderful time, great entertainment, nice cold beer and great drink specials.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lori N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmtMtkjNfkcOZjUstSIaPewdazX3LaSbWZ-fPdp_MqWNPH1dsX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this pub. I've been going here for YEARS! The staff are great, the food is always good and the prices are on point! One of the best pubs in the Fraser Valley. They also have fun nights like trivia, comedy, etc, and sometimes they have a DJ on weekends! I highly recommend checking it out. ALSO, the nail salon beside the pub is amazing. It's called Lunaria Beauty Studio and Aria is the best!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO9WaY3MIQs5deeVaYjiXWxNBo9KeSGYQYgfZx&fid=0x0:0xeeb18d55a23831cc"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Talent JET","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKh6a8tKW_9s2sJ9Nty0LCnYLDPEPoUDV_gBDC2NK0LcL8mLJE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst pub I have ever been to is definitly this pub.  I erased my experience here, but honestly it was something out of a freaking horror story and their response was even worse.  You guys. Dont go here there are soooo many nicer places in Langley and these guys are effin horrible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEv6nrAgX4sgDbiOK00QM6hz0irzfwillNVJs5&fid=0x0:0xeeb18d55a23831cc"],"When":"2024-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abbiee L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQah8oDFlL_LzeWtJxyJt5YWvZIt1zTGTVUa4-ubawFbvjjoEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We made reservations last Saturday at noon to celebrate my niece's 10th birthday. Unfortunately it was anything but a celebration.

We were told the restaurant was heavily understaffed. However when we arrived the area was quite empty. There were 6 people in our party and we ordered drinks and a couple of platters to start. We were not offered water or given any cutlery. We asked for plates twice as we were sharing and were told they didn't have enough plates, so were washing the used ones.  We never got the plates, and as seen, we resorted to using napkins as plates. No one checked up on us during the visit, and once we gave feedback on our poor experience, our server became very hostile. We had the supervisor come over who was very responsive and said that he would bring this up with the manager who is in later that evening and would be contacting me. We never heard back from them. Also, we were overcharged on our drinks. Safe to say that we will never be returning to this establishment nor recommending to our friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5-0AnnBmbjwDoheeg4U90W9FmZ7A4OLgQLI41&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Steve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVzye2bejZi9is8vCHJK2PG4wfBMpqZvIa7DUB9fY1EmXEow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is good and the weekend brunch is the best deal in town. That said, the service is laughably bad. I've been several times now thinking "oh maybe that was a bad day for them" but no, their service is genuinely just awful. Expect to wait 15+ minutes just for them to take your initial drink order and give you a menu. And half the time you'll need to go to the bar and collect your drink yourself because it's been sitting there for 10 minutes with no one bringing it over.
Prices are good, food is good, the atmosphere is fine, but the service is so downright embarrassing that I think I've given up on giving them another chance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emmy Lou MiKoula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8UCkcFL0A9py0FpngKTmCyQA-1m6TEhMMNrMDJ5dfK8KPNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered from skip and didn't go in. Didn't find the food anything to write home about. The caesar salad had so much lemon juice squeezed on it, that is all that you tasted. The burger was pretty small and quite tasteless. And the chicken strips and fries were really small. My 7 year old niece actually ate them all, which normally she wouldn't be able to finish an adult meal. Most disappointing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Newwstgrl82","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm6h7s4OVvX1EAtozk4hqnD851AD1pW6JN0M33WtPJHM3ULQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent weekend family brunch spot. The quality of the food was pretty decent. Service was inconsistent. We waited 10 minutes for someone to acknowledge us/seat us despite a mostly empty section, and watched others have the same issue, with 1 server but not the other. Will go back but fully expect to wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"saran samy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId3tLOAv75Dn1v7FhYDfK0ZjoMAHpnlb_HoxyOl4wRaK0o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Dined in here by Feb 2022 for a dinner when the Covid relaxations were relaxed a bit.

Very spacious with a bar and the seats were nicely spaced.

Raylene , our waitress did a wonderful hospitality from beer selection to attending us regularly.

For some reasons, we did not like Spicy Ramen bowl that we ordered and they offered to replace it with another dish. Excellent customer service.

Ample parking but it’s hard to get parking when crowded.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkBLX-CdmtsNJRNskJ6q7tWBfqWyE2SQcUnUI&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2022-2-19"},{"Name":"Phuong Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhl-qI4b5XW1hOGSCXgriuHTcfEtZ7r_f5L2tvHJefwqiz-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We come on a Monday night when appies were half off. I counted three other customers there. They were training a new server and it was hard to hear her over the music; which wasn’t too loud.
It took a while for our food to come but it was good. We had the beehive pizza which is basically honey on pepperoni. We ordered it for the novelty of it and it was good but nothing special. The wings were perfectly cooked; crisp and juicy. There wasn’t enough sauce in my opinion but I enjoyed dipping it in the crispy Brussels sprout sauce. It was the BEST part of the meal and I’m obsessed with it. I’ll come back for that alone.
We also ordered the truffle tator tots and it was also really enjoyable.
We also had the caeser and Lucky lager. Both really good. An overall delicious experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kami A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfyBLZ-EdU9UP46CqzC54eCVK_QlTJ9qkraPPbrTn9w1HK0iY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went here with my family the past weekend and oh, what a waste of time, money, gas and effort it was! It was supposed to be a special occasion for my niece’s birthday.

The food was below average. We ordered two community plates to share amongst the 6 of us. Aren’t nachos supposed to have cheese?

We were sat for 43 mins before the food came out to us. I asked for plates as soon as the food came out and the server told us “it was in the dishwasher”. Not sure how long their dishwasher loads take, but they might want to consider switching up for a faster one, or buying more plates. We ended up eating on napkins. Not once were we checked on. There was no water served or plates given to us during our entire meal. The table next to us ended up cleaning their own table (pic below) because of the lack of service.

When brought to the attention of the server, she decided to get argumentative about it and make excuses. We asked for the manager, but no manager on-site (convenient). Spoke to a shift supervisor who continued to make excuses (as follows) for the horrible service and provide us with almost expiring coupons. Excuse #1: “you came during our busiest brunch hour” (the picture below shows how empty it was)
Excuse #2: “We always wait for the customer to ask us for water and then bring it to the table”
Excuse #3: “We’re human too” and on he went…

The one and ONLY restaurant I’ve been to where the word “sorry” is as scarce as the people at its busiest hour. If you’re the server or supervisor, you know who you are. I won’t mention your names, for your sake. Hope you’ll learn how to provide better customer service. Never coming back here again and don’t recommend it to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM55wBaiGqdUAhWXi7wE_j2eB_GMFtGRwhThHdq&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Jina Estrada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjz4Dd1aF85Wxta5MB_gJChlVEvd-lxhjIye7x6GqkBOMB08sy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good price. Good value. We sat at the bar and was nice. The bartender who was working on Valentine’s Day and was helping us that morning was seriously amazing. Super friendly. We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbDku9funNxjredeYtOXg3Sl3mmsSYXpgJAPhr&fid=0x0:0x3db86c98b54ebcd5"],"When":"2021-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Catherine Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvZUA-DrXnbDWR7wBL1JcTwQ16BBt7mGlMvihH64lvGm9OhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful brunch here with my daughter and we instantly fell in love with the charming decor. We were especially delighted by the beautiful latte art on my little one’s hot chocolate. The food was not only beautifully presented but tasted just as good as it looked. I highly recommend this place for others to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJqLds0SBVEV8AgJ5jPNZv3ABlI_nd36YVl6hi&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Viona Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5PMLEtvgkAwv2IjmL8XXm0-Ly_XpBo5Kd0Hv2pxoQ26_Hfy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was honestly surprised at the vibe and cozy ambiance this place had when we first walked in. Not to mention the mouth-drooling display case of their pastries right by the entrance door.!

We came for brunch and absolutely love the menu options. We both got the egg bennies on a bagel and they were so good! The eggs were cooked perfectly and the bagels were not too chewy as we were slightly worried. They serve as the perfect bed for the eggs with just the right amount of bite.

If you ever come to visit, you MUST get their cream croissants. OMG, they're the best and I still dream about them. We'll definitely be back to try other things.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOy4DVUPwxHeIn_A0VeZSyCarh3qINncqDQPtjd&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Victoria Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvX6ljBDQ1a55cjAyGZUeeaCRzNItWEJMB98yXmD5iJcLImw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible brunch! We've had the pleasure of ordering to go and eating in and O Treat never disappoints! They have the best pastries, amazing pasta and the fried chicken benny is to die for. Honestly you can't go wrong with this place, everything we ordered ended up being above our expectations! Highly reccomend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7ECWP3RCACbzxUIgazkPmD6jgzO9Un-PIRGKu&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"YOUNG TAE CHOI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOyrN2dsxgMNqTQWYXlAYe3iEOBhHKrOYhnoJPgapKFebRoitd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an unforgettable dinner! This was one of the best Thanksgiving meals I’ve ever had in Canada. You could truly feel the care and effort put into each dish. The sad thing is that this family style dinner is available on Thanksgiving Day only for now. Don't miss it out! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNB9ow9iyaNSAVWRdifAm9gbR9lV9fC9uxYIjMk&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for Sunday brunch, and while there was a bit of a wait to get seated, it was absolutely worth it! The food was incredible—so fresh and delicious. The ambiance is beautiful, clean, and elegant. The salmon bennies are my go-to, and they were perfect. Highly recommend this spot for brunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOj0pRadgchiAyeo9acB-36M3kjX3h22g5vzeW&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Ginn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFOOQZPhZylsgMOLmtSB5bJOkt-NwtAZ31Ulkb5_TUEpijBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is worth the visit.  We went for brunch and both loved the food.  We each had a pastry to take home and OMG, definitely do that!!  They are filled with the tastiest cream!  Wonderfully decadent treat that was shockingly light.

The place was packed by the time we left and the noise was a lot.  We sat outside for the last of our time together and that was super pleasant too.

Great service,  tasty food most of which they make daily and excellent desserts.   I highly recommended it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvM4jDHaowINl5MjVkRiDuzTEwHG5tfT2EE-gk&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Amber MacDonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiIAAasuYSgIJ9wKSgvwaES2RmP7Jx14d1tylay6x4VPknGboF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch and was very impressed with the selection of menu items. We opted for breakfast and I had an oat Chai latte- probably one of the best I've ever had! My breakfast was also very delicious and it was a very large portion! The pastries in the front display case also looked amazing but unfortunately, I cannot eat wheat so I wasn't able to try any. Definitely interested in coming back and trying their lunch items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTn18HekA5M3JVTL--_Xsl0JCSI1y-pX6ibvLZ&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Sha Ocampo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdm5IgIMU7SvsHCilkf1in2MS6Ihpq3-BCS6qypG5kW460CBo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends from Ontario and Williams Lake ate here few weeks ago and we all had amazing food. We went there without a reservation and had to wait for 30-40 minutes which we didn't mind since we weren't that hungry. I suggest make a reservation ahead of time if possible.

The food were really great. The croissants were yummy & creamy (if you are into that)

Overall lovely place, nice and welcoming staff, and great ambiance!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPycs5O_58vQ9zmFFt1ITtm_KuHytznsAH16F8F&fid=0x0:0x225e5e98753096ee"],"When":"2024-10-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chantal Bonnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr3RgJXrnA8Dw6L5LTg3myMJrgsQNHzxENkXXIQdK39anB0vEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got the Surf N Turf steak with seafood. It was very good, their Loaded Mashed Potatoes (cheddar, bacon and green onion) are so good; I recommend. For an appetizer I got the Coconut Calamari it was good but unfortunately there wasn’t a lot that came on the plate. I also got the Original Peach Bellini and it’s for sure one of my favourite peach Bellinis I’ve tried. Overall was a great dinner and would go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO9rCs2clfd7_bg0-t9okxUlZ5VDFVYnBvBCtw&fid=0x0:0xdd994dd91f4ed4ba"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Jora Nijjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1SrwCvR_91OwflsNXUktypNHNJBou3FUN2kfwRDbz6fyEg6MvHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have always been able to accommodate a large group which is nice. The food is always consistent. The service was good. The Mediterranean chicken was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPwSrTcsNIjvH_V7QkKw98fY0bgrtSWI1H2rDe&fid=0x0:0xdd994dd91f4ed4ba"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLe4T3aFCfYzoG8uGYbMPaVU2SiVDN01m2K8PyFVafNSJ887Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just wanted to thank our server Ruhi again for her great service. It was quite noisy where we were first seated but she said there was another table leaving soon in a quieter area. She got us moved very quickly. She was excellent throughout our meal. Very happy and friendly. Thank you Ruhi!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgM7VuFuaa4fCDimKZYaOS-Tf9BV0lkTNCSmZDiZSPYoBkYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Milestones and was quite disappointed with the experience. The food was bland and lacked any distinct flavors. The service was slow, and the staff seemed uninterested in attending to customers. Additionally, the portions were small for the price, and the overall cleanliness of the place left much to be desired. I wouldn't recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a good meal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rania Atef","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_mSDAaRrsyZfC2j4o0vn7Yl9zOJyq1u2VBUW060aOEAUodx3J=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to milestones for a dinner party with about 10 of my girlfriends, we had an amazing time and felt so welcomed with our loud and big group😅. Our server Ashley was very accommodating, kind, and helpful, and the manager Biji was very sweet! Our food tasted delicious and it was all in a reasonable price range. I highly reccomend this restaurant. We will definitely visit again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leviticus Samson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEuynwXnTT0NOpVHwkUVHADtzTx7__CqFPIhldUqx8U_sn6Z4P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was alright, very similar to a browns/cactus club.
Prices are in the 25-45$ per main course.

We ordered surf and turf the black and blue burger and a pasta dish along with a few drinks. The pasta came with a decent portion size and tasted great, a decent value for the price. The surf and turf, which was the most expensive thing we ordered, came out rather sloppy looking and underwhelming portions. It's not something I would recommend to someone.
The back and blue was surprisingly good, considering I would usually avoid something with blue cheese. Complex and unique flavors. It's worth a try if you wanna stray from a traditional burger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKiiyEzLYutk8GouRma5H4U-x3rJOP9VdG14m5&fid=0x0:0xdd994dd91f4ed4ba"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Nicole Arondus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIL3VxSeMQ8QEKvVgOK3NJgaOclC_647ymEhY_I85eYczJeqbStA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went for brunch, it was terrible. I had the seafood eggs Benedict, it  was disgusting, I couldn't eat it. The waitress was amazing, brought me a new original eggs Benedict. It was also terrible, just slightly less terrible. My husband's breakfast was old and not fresh (except the eggs which were done properly). The waitress was amazing, above and beyond. They didn't charge me for my breakfast, only for my husband's which was great. I would go back for the service, but the food is overpriced for cheaply made and awful so we won't be going back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdMFxyZ9UKwNMBMqgYHm_a3D5OYI-3Jkb2gMa9JbQ5al6pOak=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service could be better, but we did come late near 1-2hrs till close.  The food was great and so were the drinks. It's a little pricey, but what isn't now away ways.  Good date night spot, tho.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rahul Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfG3uUtQy1Inmsl_ErjRfMc7dfjoUXUPGazSt5hGWa8AELNW1V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vegan pizza here tasted surprisingly amazing! I've noticed the vegan cheese in pizzas having a weird taste, but the one here tasted really good. Only recommendation i have is they add vegan meat replacements. Otherwise, they can pretty much veganise the entire menu. The owner Thomas is a nice and understanding guy, he customised my pizza nicelyl👍.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNExrrDsxZswogLTuICj16hsTuBPaq9L6mvgz8&fid=0x0:0x84767e316b09a932"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Order through Uber Eats. The pizza was good - I'd order it again. The Italian sausage pasta could have been better. The onions and bell peppers in the pasta weren't cooked. The pasta would have been better if all the ingredients were cooked in a pan, prior to being baked.

I liked the Sesame seeds on the pizza crust - it's a nice touch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8NyzRTOIrZHf-pTYB_x2oDXDWLHvWkb9X3BqE&fid=0x0:0x84767e316b09a932"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Liam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGZXdqThMawjCghdg_ZLfuTMAfnTd4rDf_kubUfpSBoaoAI1go=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I loved the pizza it was very hot and filled with topings it was probably the best pizza I've had. it had a really nice crust that reminded me of a pretzels.the pizza was cooked pretty quickly and eaten even quicker.it had the freshest ingredients/toppings and the staff were really nice and welcoming.and this medium pizza I am talking about is only 10$ !!!!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj5bb1u4VkU824Wk-vbNeljUeaz2Azb3399mu1&fid=0x0:0x84767e316b09a932"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Ümit Demir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uHDzWsdbW3ua-zfBRWHS2tHFkBpaaiVRXieRUB0eFZwRwjn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the taste of the pizza. Especially the crunchy sesame corners.

Stuff is friendly, service is fast. I tried Large 2 toppings and without ketchup &mayonnaise it was already tasty.

I gave 4stars as atmosphere, it is a small pizza place but I gave it for the neighbourhood and the transportation.

Anyways, it is a nice pizza store!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS4SGtm26pykuSRcI8YtBb5uqWcHmv-htzeZvX&fid=0x0:0x84767e316b09a932"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Stephen Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId6XitEyHoAzK51ujjCxfVMf6FkpQR83baQ8XAUzumG4dQtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Red Swan Pizza in Downtown Langley has quickly become my go-to spot for pizza nights. The moment you bite into their crust, you're transported to pizza heaven. It's perfectly crisp on the outside, yet soft and chewy on the inside. The sauce is rich and flavorful, and the cheese is gooey and satisfying. I tried the "Meat Fan's" and was blown away by the generous toppings and perfect balance of flavors. The service was friendly and efficient, making the entire experience a delight. If you're looking for the best pizza in Langley, look no further than Red Swan.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roddie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqBa_SudQrA8lQV5TwCxEko2bBTKmubomw6zfTLQWSvQb56HLkhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decided to try this place due to vegan cheese options.

We got the bacon and beef pizza , Hawaiian pizza ( vegan cheese ) and all meat pizza with wings and cheese bread .

Overall great pizza and the wings are super crispy delicious, downside , I wish more sauce for wings as it comes separate or mix it with the wings.

I will be back again!!

More in-depth review :

Bacon and beef pizza was delicious with a good ratio of cheese to topping to sauce.  I seen complaints of lack of sauce.  I disagree with it . Sauce was right amount . It's to add flavor not dripping off my pizza , order a side of sauce if you want that.

The all meat , I love the long slices of ham topping and the flavor is what I was expecting. Again delicious and a hit with the family .

Hawaiian , though I didn't eat , my son said it's alot better than Pango version . He was unsure about the sesame seeds on the edge of the pizza but he said you can't taste them but like the crunchy of the pizza with them . The cheese looklike it was real cheese.  Normal I can tell which is which.  Good job there.

The cheese bread was just that , it's cheese bread , nothing special but it was good for what it is.

The wings , I loved that they are crispy and dry style wing . I wish the wings were mixed with the sauce or extra sauce should be given . I was running out at the end of it . The hot sauce was good and what I was expecting for a hot sauce .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPAfY4TdWv1a8uzbFyQNeRz5cgT5uGAxLWBZ_K&fid=0x0:0x84767e316b09a932"],"When":"2022-9-27"},{"Name":"Gurjinder Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUb8o672qayHknWowI43IdYvob55m7s6C4NP7799rbPNStKbes=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza was outstanding – the crust was perfectly crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and had that authentic, fresh-baked taste. I ordered the Panner pizzas, spicy and tikka which came loaded with high-quality toppings that tasted fresh and flavourful. The sauce was rich and has a balanced flavour.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oceane A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0ZkQ6osemLbFSBeJ8rZC3vNfpBJ6DL53fr2CmvE2QUSo2AjqX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will not be finishing my pizza now… found a hair in it, please consider wearing hairnets while handling food. It tasted really good before I looked down and saw this, I’m so sad!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQOTe83vaK7LKeVFqfRN6gKomORcsQfZGkD4s1&fid=0x0:0x84767e316b09a932"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Texas Smoke BBQ in Vancouver is a true gem for barbecue lovers. Their brisket is incredibly tender, flavorful, and smoked to perfection, making it one of the best you’ll find in British Columbia. The smoky aroma and juicy texture leave a lasting impression, and every bite is packed with rich, authentic barbecue flavors.
The menu offers a variety of mouthwatering options, but the brisket truly steals the show. The portions are generous, and the quality of the meat is outstanding. Whether you’re dining in or taking out, the food is consistently fresh and perfectly cooked.
If you’re a fan of barbecue, Texas Smoke BBQ is a must-try spot in Vancouver. The friendly service and cozy atmosphere add to the overall experience, making it an ideal destination for both casual meals and special occasions. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-ZOFMfIx2S-E07AWPUJ83FTZV1BHOf2q0q_hq&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Merlin MacGillivray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV4Ke9zogTPKQ6e0ewa6H259cBaGspehigS06P3B7dK4Jcldk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This food truck not only serves up delicious BBQ, but the seating area they have is the nicest I have seen at any food truck location. There is an expansive green space with ample wooden picnic tables, each with its own umbrella sunshade. The ladies working the counter are friendly and welcoming, and the service is pretty quick as well. The sound system jams out great classic rock hits as you gobble your food. This place is a vibe, man! I sampled the Brisket on a bun as well as the JT Sando. There was plenty of thick cut brisket topped with a chilli pepper aioli providing just the right amount of heat. The JT Sando had pulled pork with sliced pork sausage on a bun with a light topping of BBQ sauce. Hard to say which sandwich I preferred. The JT had a little bit more smoke present, but the texture of the brisket coupled with a kiss of heat is hard to beat. Just order both. You won’t be disappointed. Will stop by this place ever time I’m in the area. This is the kind of business I love to support. Great food and great atmosphere. Outstanding!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQdyq-eqZPkhk7WZOQbcMVdsJQzvqWYeHOrJSR&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Ram Kumar MN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP-T0kJxmR1xU9Xh4To3vmOPzxA9mUI1PkhAJutJRGc9mIVYirqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ok to be Honest with the Review....

1st things I tried it for first time I would say this is not type of meat I would prefer... It was bland for me but many liked it... Best place place for smoked flavour lovers its an different experience may be if i try different flovour it would be good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCgUHQ1zNYeJFTVBozf_-_ZGort_TsQC9PkUOO&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got to speak with the chef about the cooking process of the brisket, 18 hours 😮.

Had the platter for two at Martini Town.

Sausage
Pulled pork
Brisket
Mac and cheese
Coleslaw

The sausage tasted lean but so tender, and the skin was not chewy at all.  One of the best I have had in a while.
Pulled pork was tender with lots of sauce on top.
Brisket was moist and tender and just the right amount of fat.
Mac and cheese was cheesy and full of meat.
Coleslaw was crunchy, tangy and creamy
Came with tasty pickles and onions as well.

The portion is enough for two hungry adults.

Would have again if in there area.

Three locations in Surrey and Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs8yKm1hN74fEgGDqk1Sy-CAKJU8RGsHzqjhmL&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"Jade Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJWSVoZW1CCY-_xhdgdeWOnL28P_e39FAE_t38PKZ_hYo17g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the $50 platter. The sausages, nothing special, and the cut was quite chunky. What blew me away are the pulled pork, brisket and mac cheese. They could have asked if customer wants the pulled pork sauce packed separately, personally I don't like over saucy meat. However, I have to say, the pulled pork is so tender, so soft, so good, and the sauce is not overly salty, a bit sweet, and overall it worked really well. Still would have preferred the sauce was packed separately. The brisket was very good too. Nothing bad I could comment on. The mac is the star. It's not dry, it's just...perfect. We drove quite far to get to this place to eat and was definitely not disappointed. It is a food truck, with few benches and umbrella but no washrooms nearby. For us, it was alright as we took the food to a nearby playground/park area and picnic there. The two staff who served us were friendly too. Five stars. Would you offer chicken option too?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Crasto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLS_TsXHhU9d8eFAjDSO_BNn9MQgePcQYZELwIqUKgt7h-gNE-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BBQ here was really good! Went to their truck in Pitt Meadows, and the service was very friendly. Will definitely be back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNJ3sSyZt7OiEuW-QKgKLPSSX9vx6NqprWCKAV&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Chantal Bonnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr3RgJXrnA8Dw6L5LTg3myMJrgsQNHzxENkXXIQdK39anB0vEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the “Brisket on a bun” (without onions); It was super good. Service was great, nice ladies and got my food quickly. There are picnic tables where you can eat; would be nice on a warm sunny day. Would go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN8Tn_m8zRa7j2v-GB6bx6QPrF4eQ9Y_F0k5hG&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"AMAZING service from the girls at Texas Smoke BBQ at the Milner location. They were super helpful guiding us through the menu and making recommendations.

The platters have a nice selection/variety of different meats. The portions are generous.

The brisket and coleslaw were OK. The sausage, pulled pork, Mac & Cheese, and Texas walkin' tacos would have me coming back for more.

Great place for lunch, especially on a nice day. They have plenty of picnic tables right in front of their food truck.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON76TRBDsRW8d6nUkfl-zaG698y6Mu3AgJRzo0&fid=0x0:0x7cd15f0e44f7b9df"],"When":"2023-7-4"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Keya DeSmet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWu9G4SU60K28nB4nMalRZMHhH_Q6VxpKkCVfEu8LyJ_Kiy2ZXl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean and nicely laid out restaurant. Inexpensive for the quality! The pizza is not greasy and heavy but still has so much flavor. We ordered a Greek pizza, added ground beef and also got a side Caesar salad and they have a large portion of parm \u0026 delicious (maybe homemade) croutons! The staff was friendly and easy to talk to when ordering as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcOesinkfe9FLjRvY8EBpiS8V5cwQnBsz56sYl\u0026fid=0x0:0xe5c75ba07364e87a"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Pin Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXj8Gbi1JAZYfoRasF7WIGuWIZnu21g2Sl2CJScRN8ah0j_lX5f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVE Paradiso Pizza! Nice crust, great quality ingredients and excellent pizza. Our favourite is Italiano Meat Lovers pizza which I put a picture of here. Veggie pizzas are also exceptional. The garlic sauce is amazing wish they bottled and sold it! Really nice small business, employees are always really nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOord_OHtyqVL1mcu3YcnuxzmP-BlleX-qBLIU0\u0026fid=0x0:0xe5c75ba07364e87a"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Michele Lavery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5tt6l31yB3v-_h-7f6H0XDHPzYoTyDhlMurr00Pg5rByOsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have done pick up 4 times and have been happy with our pizza each time. Thin crust is great. Once when our order was running about 5 minutes late, the owner even called us to tell us to hold off another 5 minutes before heading out… Now that’s customer service. Also, when I was having troubles with the website one time, the owner entered my points for me when I showed up to pick up my order, very helpful. Once the pizza was cooked a couple minutes too long, but it was still yummy. As long as they don’t skimp on the sauce or cheese, this will remain our go to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkSqlvqoxi0iZJXIOJjYG2QdJBLGXq52M8Jx-wJ1zNJBKxFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been going here for almost a yr now and I can say that have never been disappointed. The toppings and cheese are high quality. All the pizzas that we've tried and the wings and salad have been delicious and excellent service. Thank you Paradiso.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPBKYu1rsoqpWJj0V3lz2gZw0346gnq3z3NYQj\u0026fid=0x0:0xe5c75ba07364e87a"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Ida Dutt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_XJt325GqDEVSWL8lH8sDFaDNAolC5lCYLwx5RNt0YP8AVhKPGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far the best pizza I’ve had. The crust has NO OIL, it’s made perfectly. The toppings were phenomenal and the taste was unbeatable. Everything from the sauce, to the toppings, to the dips was phenomenal! 10/10 would recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edward Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOVFChrnuqRNCiaQX7jKSRXcIvlzedUExE3ILKjv8dgvdk1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time trying their pizza and we loved it! We will be ordering again.\n\nWhatever that dipping sauce was, that came with the pizza, was really good. Next time I will be asking for more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Barnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ca2s2Ju78fXB3WcTna5eoONK6rtbXd-or7AsBLVFqiGf04UKIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We've ordered from here before. Was really dissapointed with what we received this time. We asked for extra cheese. The pizzas look like they had barely any cheese let alone extra. We got slices with zero cheese and next to no toppings. We had the wrong pizza delivered and they were cold. Like they had been sitting a while. I think this will be the last time we order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlrsEVb5UDmpWWDSSJVkfhxlMhhou-p2oNG9RF\u0026fid=0x0:0xe5c75ba07364e87a"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Simone Briese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9FGcdlmbIwNUu_F7bGjLbwlkN8Dpoq4SXt0vduyBXfYQkOCo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic pizza!! Great flavour and cooked perfect!! Thank you so much !! Will definitely be back and recommend to others!! The dip was delicious!! Made our Saturday night dinner!! Glad I stumbled upon your place !!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jennifer K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMkax_2fXXooiAm9665uAreOW8DfWCb1muQl5VZguzF-YboA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They're all you can eat is good deal. $20pp unlimited fish and chips. They give you paddock fish. It's a bit tougher than cod and halibut but pretty fresh. Includes bottomless drink. Street parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMulFJWtUZx6U_BSw3fizgIqiL8lPt63C-MAy4j&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Marshall Mcrobbie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIO4Fe-_yZEL5hNBq1Q8uMJjgN9EsygtjOFPLWmkYLbR-4EnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and fresh and fast food. Staff was very attentive. Restaurant and facilities kept very clean. Had all you can eat fish and chips excellent deal at $19.99.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFnAEETr43-UxX5nqItp-vZWg1cBb1VcR88cV7&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Richard O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINe1BRSUCVq1fV1fUyreQ4FJrzCh_ErPtNv2Pj0AelKz5auA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried all you can eat, the fries and fish were superb. They were crunchy, and it's a shame I can barely finish a plate. Good service, will come back next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc8bSj1tYMAyU3RmMXoBsoY1YHTcf7jC8XHayo&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Keri Dudley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIU0nW-erPFdbQyCJzT1YYvrZRl6uUFeZUGwOs_h_rYrgGQfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visited C-Lovers for the first time today and tried their all-you-can-eat dinner deal. It's a fantastic offer for the price. Despite the restaurant being full when we arrived, we were seated very quickly. Our server, Michelle, was incredible! She was managing about ten tables, most of which were 4 tops, yet she checked in with us every five minutes. We never had to wait for assistance. This exceptional service alone makes me want to return to this restaurant. If Michelle ever moved back to Alberta, I'd hire her in a heartbeat. She's a true gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkmaV41GkWXeY4caGEelvWqO04YPuCSfVmE9dW&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Mehrdad Arastoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLJDbkhqpTugxGPFktWQCHTy7tTS0QQzNtQ-tZmgt_218gIxxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited a few of c-lovers and looks this one was one of the biggest ones. I can say around 25 to 30 tables were available. The food was good and served fresh and fast. Staff were nice and friendly. The restaurant located at the main street but there was a back door too. The parking spot in back was decent and free. Also customers can use the shopping center parking too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf2lbracN0v6W0MOA-eUtPbpUzgAE-4LmaLOj4&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Gurmeet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwJ6ziCSVpCfDSASiAIoGZwUAahJ_S2l7pN9PmPcbDV80ZuJqDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Me and my wife visited C-Lovers for the first time on the evening of Thursday Oct 24, 2024. Food was good but service was NOT good at all. We felt like we were treated with bias. Even though we were dressed up nicely, the server (young lady)  thought we were food delivery workers. She was welcoming and thanked everyone except us. Her every little small actions, the way of staring at us speaks a lot about the server. This may not be true for every staff working there but we can vouch for the server that treated us. We are NEVER going there for sure. I hope the management will look into this matter and train their staff to treat everyone equally without any bias.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mj Shon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmjdo6IVgKlxhA53Q4bfK6LS612oLPIIOhKF-VqKOkwVR0CIyC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for fish and chips.
Food was fresh.
Our sever was nice.
And restaurant was clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGEepGLdO3_YYd2NX-HvPRJ8NuFwYIhdPQ7x-1&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Tomb Raider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-DVDvevPddYuQ7gWiQ1QNF6dVcB31ejJTsHb5K0lsdkYlx0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For $19.99 you cant beat it. Quick friendly service every time. For two people I spent $42.40. Susan was our server and was very quick, polite and attentive. Thanks Susan, we appreciate your service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtplgZOT3mkdxrtnwcEv0ihw2MGsIvVMZ8oWVw&fid=0x0:0xfdb72b9075dbe1b7"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Katana

Location: 19957 Willowbrook Dr, Langley, BC V2Y 1A7

Upon entering the restaurant, we were promptly greeted by the hostess, who exuded warmth and professionalism. We were seated immediately, setting a positive tone for the rest of our dining experience.

Food:

As a starter, we were served a small plate of salad accompanied by miso soup. While the salad was decent, without any standout qualities, the miso soup was flavorful and well-prepared, providing a comforting beginning to our meal.

Appetizer:

Ebi Chili Mayo
Deep-fried king-size tiger prawns served with a special chili mayo, topped with corn chips.

The Ebi Chili Mayo appetizer was particularly impressive. The crispiness of the prawns, combined with the rich and tangy chili mayo, created a harmonious balance of texture and flavor. The prawns were generously sized and cooked to perfection. This dish is highly recommended for those seeking a flavorful and satisfying appetizer.

Rating: 9/10

For the main course, we opted for The Ultimate Dinner, which featured a giant lobster tail, filet mignon steak, shrimp, and scallops.

The portion of rice served initially was generous, a notable difference from other establishments. The filet mignon steak was undoubtedly the highlight of the meal—cooked to a perfect rare as requested, it was tender, well-seasoned, and delectable. The scallops were also commendable, with a beautiful golden-brown sear and a delicate taste. The shrimp and lobster were equally well-prepared, with a good balance of seasoning that enhanced their natural flavors. The accompanying vegetables were fresh and well-cooked, rounding out the dish nicely.

Rating: 9/10

Chef:

Our teppanyaki chef was exceptionally friendly and engaging, adding a personal touch to the meal. While the performance followed the typical teppanyaki format, he did manage to surprise us with an unexpected trick, which was a pleasant addition to the experience. Overall, his skill and demeanor contributed positively to the meal.

Service:

The service throughout our visit was outstanding. Our waitress was attentive, courteous, and ensured that our needs were met promptly. Her professionalism and friendliness greatly enhanced our dining experience.

Rating: 9/10

Ambiance:

The ambiance of the restaurant, while generally acceptable, would benefit from some modernization and upgrades. While it was adequate for the meal, it lacked the refinement one might expect from a venue of this caliber.

Rating: 6/10

Price:
The pricing was reasonable, given the high quality of ingredients and the entertainment value provided by the teppanyaki chef. The combination of visual spectacle and culinary expertise justifies the cost, making it a worthwhile experience.

Verdict:

Despite the need for some improvements in ambiance, Katana excels in delivering high-quality food and exceptional service. The overall dining experience was enjoyable, and I look forward to returning in the future. This restaurant is certainly worth a visit for those seeking a memorable teppanyaki experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaM4OKd2KhyPNz7exU4L9Q8RpXhfY6SIvjOzwm&fid=0x0:0x858be81c5fe06f32"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Anita McNicol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0JW5CHjmARyzVTPTZ-TkzzAfoHjlwQrVWvIpZxMySK5mX5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful experience. We sat at the stove top table and had a wonderful show by our chef. Very skilled. Great humour.
The food was delicious and perfectly cooked to order.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaun Loeppky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWobRNKsgksYFhsNuW2KTzv7UpZq7WBteBft6goLVUVqkAg9nEf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Having never eaten at Katana or ever had Teppanyaki before we had a lot of learning to do so we could order the right amount for our party.  We asked many questions about what to order and how many dishes to get since we have kids with us. It was a bumpy process at first due in large part to how lively the restaurant is but we got our order in and it was just the right amount. Our chef was great and put on a wonderful display that the kids loved.  They are already asking to go back.

It was a great experience and we left there full and happy. We'll go back again and try some of the other dishes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jameela A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGmIjT4W8Bo17-ggNSzxcoDgtO-KQSSmnpYgy_oZo7qm1k2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My friends brought me here for my birthday dinner, the atmosphere was nice, the food was absolutely fabulous, and the chef was excellent 👌!
The only thing that brought this experience down was the service from our waitress. She had a bad attitude and seemed extremely annoyed about everything. Every time we asked for something (a drink, or hot sauce, or anything), she would roll her eyes and huff about it. Everyone at our table felt this. I really did not appreciate that type of service. IF I do come here again, I will specifically request another waitress. I hope management has a word with her about her attitude. You could lose a lot of business with people treating you this way, especially on an entire table and a special occasion.
I will have to strongly think about visiting here again due to that kind of service from her.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlUirm9tceKwz4D_asSRl8X-IfixwbKAz3-K9GtcDkrGLe_BvGMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very tasty! We went for our anniversary and had a great time! The chef was fun and I like how they separated the rice and veggies so there were different courses. It's expensive but that's to be expected.
My only issue was the decor; it was very dated for such an expensive place, all the photos on the wall are cute, but not suited for this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO18Wdw9uYIj4nykE38vltPo1PoHIqJxA1gpxN7&fid=0x0:0x858be81c5fe06f32"],"When":"2022-6-19"},{"Name":"Fletcher Moyo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFjAWlExE10FPUac4wG2ZWfER-k_6xnO8JEFwsfJnGyi8BzeQX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner a little while ago and had a lovely dinner. It's important to note that the portions of meat and seafood get shared between groups of people sitting at a station. So the piece of steak gets split and shared between several people. If you're a meat lover such as myself, I recommend you broaden your selection and get a number of things.
The chef's perform exceptionally well. The drinks are great too. Try the applies while you wait for the setup and enjoy the show.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRX3fZBCz1sJlbrF4bKBiKNPzruKkzgf56yF6a&fid=0x0:0x858be81c5fe06f32"],"When":"2022-8-23"},{"Name":"Manmeet Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMXWGi0PTwBnnJPx-2zRWWQX9viRcadnjBye5zp3cT1qRomGuzzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great experience with the chef cooking right in front of you. The restaurant has a super cozy vibe filled with polaroids of customers on the walls. The chef was friendly. The chef does some tricks with his utensils, fascinating to watch. He also brings out a huge fire which is probably the selling point of this experience. You’re seated with other people, total of 9 people on each table I think. So it might be little uncomfortable for people who don’t like sitting with strangers. The food tasted normal, nothing out of ordinary.
Overall great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdH0goizRdJVdrZ5Dx_qHv0y7l0aZ5clOhzg3S&fid=0x0:0x858be81c5fe06f32"],"When":"2022-11-23"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good experience! Came here with friends for a special occasion. Highly recommend the Saketini! I had the Steak and Scallops, which tasted good!
Heads up: If you have a dairy-allergy, they use incredible amounts of butter, although they offer to cook it without butter but only in the back kitchen.. Which ruins the whole concept.
Chef we had was fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0DFe58spr5neSky-1-llbsA3yTsdt35nhqatI&fid=0x0:0x858be81c5fe06f32"],"When":"2023-7-14"}]

[{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful evening at Montana's, trying their limited-time Surf and Turf menu along with a cheeseburger kids' meal.

I upgraded the steak to a 12oz and ordered it medium rare, but it initially arrived well-done. Our server, Sarah, was incredibly attentive and asked how everything was. When I mentioned the issue with my steak, she quickly rectified it and ensured my meal was perfect. Sarah went above and beyond to make our night out truly enjoyable.

She also kept our drinks refilled throughout the meal, which we really appreciated.

The quality of the lobster was excellent, the steak was top-notch once corrected, and everything tasted wonderful.

We’ll definitely be back, knowing Montana's values their customers and takes pride in providing a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1ZLOzQn2A2tqrHLvClndJuGA0GfuUdXou3B3h&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Metellingtruth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2Ixwi5jN-cdh2Vu-fk-hv_6VlCc2I9AVnxQXyHSyTUw_H5WWv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the last places left in Canada with big meaty dishes. No one has a more meatier menu than Montana’s and everything tastes fantastic. The prices are good also. The down side is, the portions aren’t as big as depicted in their picture filled menu, nor is the presentation of skillets and pans actually real, everything is served on ceramic white plates. This is one of the last true Canadian menu’s","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6XzA4h3WOnDsTmro-dtTh96rpnaUFLMvfLKPr&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were bummed when their South Surrey location closed down. So happy that they have a Langley location and when we had the chance, we went here to celebrate a friend’s birthday. We had ribs and my sides were yam fries. So good. We will surely be back. Shout out to Sara who attended to us. She was awesome and very hospitable. We will surely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvxujkKr1B_13XHkkEp6_hfR6ztmla0zoHO_jF&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"John Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuV5ODBnNIimWAyoZ_GtD_Id5KnjSp-Jr-bHjiZST2Bk9M_N7G7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I know the food is excellent, and the ribs are always a sure bet, but I challenged them to have a burger that could hold up to other restaurants. It was great, everything I want in a burger plus a smokey flavour from the grill. Good job everyone. The onion rings could be better, but I was mainly there for a burger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNym4zfhhNTF0mlU3Nea6UGSpzIu80riVnCE97_&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Jordana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJvxqFr8nGL8vok-SCRwxhp2_EJmOiFDFc3qAUH70xw1rrHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to go for lunch. Went on a Saturday afternoon and the place was cozy. The server was attentive and made sure the food catered to our dietary restrictions. Serving size of the food was huge, we ended up bringing the leftovers hoome. Great value for a decent price. Gotta come hungry next time. They also have all you can eat ribs for a good price. There was a lot of families with young kids that seemed to enjoy the meal.  Definitely recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONpx9CAs27Ng8eFKpc1MKNqIrNjJ3WxPzJy-z-&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Dione Jongs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EWKYRjfPgMRlMaWj52om6lMD09RLXogqSqkoftVp2Z27bh21=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I  celebrate my birthday there 10-24-24. My apologies sent before finishing. We had an awesome time 🥳Big Thank You to the sever ( didn’t get his name but I have pics 😃) for his time and talent! Great customer service!! Also thanks to the young lady with the best triangle tune happy birthday ever with the vikiness helmet of joy‼️Thanks Montana’s BBQ & Bar Langley !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeM4jbrjx_iB4oTIpI2YGHSslJUm3p1pk5OZ4W&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Chantal Bonnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr3RgJXrnA8Dw6L5LTg3myMJrgsQNHzxENkXXIQdK39anB0vEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was pretty good. I got the 7oz sirloin steak and was cooked to my liking. The onion rings are also good. For my drink I got their electric frozen pink lemonade and it was super good, would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnXdghTg_knsVak-b4qzC1uAldKHfh0b5gvdYh&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Belle Reisdorf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIrSQA5hxoEtBeqDOzbwOZIVzpz4MkZ5ohghSHBxyIash5rHxf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my husband went here for our anniversary, the waitress was so kind! Checked on us a good amount of times, brought us what we asked with no issues. Food came out fast and was amazing we also ordered the cookie skillet which was so bloody good! My husband is a little picky haha but loved everything about this place ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdzgUkH3hW2zyDrG85dF1W7Si7fntYOSvEAW7t&fid=0x0:0xe8b6de88ec3a90d2"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]
